
-----title
西安（长安） (出生地)
-----detail

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=769&endYear=769')">769年</a>　本年，随父居官。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='c01b7cbe29334ed9852986f067da5b55_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c01b7cbe29334ed9852986f067da5b55");'><span id='c01b7cbe29334ed9852986f067da5b55_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=774&endYear=774')">774年</a>　本年，韩会赴长安任起居舍人。随兄入长安。已启蒙读书，较聪明。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=775&endYear=776')">775-776年</a>　本年，随长兄韩会居官。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='79d4ad385272494c996bafc187ed8f6f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("79d4ad385272494c996bafc187ed8f6f");'><span id='79d4ad385272494c996bafc187ed8f6f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=787')">787年</a>　年初，抵达长安，参加进士考试，落第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=787')">787年</a>　本年，居留长安。准备再考进士。未遇马燧时，有诗。作品：出门。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49563' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49563?labeling=true' target='_blank'>出门</a><span class='authorDate'>（787年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49563")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49563_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49563'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49563'>长安<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49563", 49563, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>百万</span>家，出门无所之。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49563'>岂敢尚幽独，与世实参差。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49563'>古人虽已死，书上有其<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作遗）</span>辞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49563'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49563", 49563, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>开卷</span>读且想，千载若相期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49563'>出门各有道，我道方未夷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49563'>且于此中息，天命<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作诚）</span>不吾欺。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49563'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49563_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=787')">787年</a>　本年夏秋，在长安。吐蕃劫盟，从兄韩弇殉难，唐朝连遭吐蕃入寇。有感赋诗。作品：烽火。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49545' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49545?labeling=true' target='_blank'>烽火</a><span class='authorDate'>（787年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49545")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49545_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49545'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49545'>登高望烽火，谁谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49545", 49545, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>塞尘</span>飞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49545'>王城富且乐，曷不事光辉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49545'>勿言日已暮，相见恐行稀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49545'>愿君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49545", 49545, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>熟念</span>此，秉烛夜中归。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49545'>我歌宁自感，乃独泪沾衣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49545'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_49545_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=788&endYear=788')">788年</a>　来长安已近一年，准备再考进士。因家穷，得马燧接济，其两子并从韩愈学习，马畅与韩关系尤好。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=788&endYear=788')">788年</a>　本年，在长安。北平王马燧家有猫代死者乳其二子，韩愈认为此系主人仁义品德感应所致，因作文赞美。作品：猫相乳。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_1370727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370727?labeling=true' target='_blank'>猫相乳</a><span class='authorDate'>（788年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370727")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370727'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370727'>司徒北平王家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370727_comment'></div>猫有生子同日者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370727_comment'></div>其一死焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370727_comment'></div>有二子饮于死母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370727_comment'></div>母且死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370727_comment'></div>其鸣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370727", 1370727, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>咿咿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370727_comment'></div>其一方乳其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370727_comment'></div>若闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370727_comment'></div>起而若听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370727_comment'></div>走而若救之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370727_comment'></div>衔其一置于其栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370727_comment'></div>又往如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370727_comment'></div>反而乳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370727_comment'></div>若其子然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370727_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370727_comment'></div>亦异之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370727_comment'></div>夫猫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370727_comment'></div>人畜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370727_comment'></div>非性于仁义者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370727_comment'></div>其感于所畜者乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370727_comment'></div>北平王牧人以康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370727_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370727", 1370727, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>伐罪</span>以平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370727_comment'></div>理阴阳以得其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370727_comment'></div>国事既毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370727_comment'></div>家道乃行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370727_comment'></div>父父子子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370727_comment'></div>兄兄弟弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370727_comment'></div>雍雍如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370727_comment'></div>愉愉如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370727_comment'></div>视外犹视中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370727_comment'></div>一家犹一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370727_comment'></div>夫如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370727_comment'></div>其所感应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370727", 1370727, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>召致</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370727_comment'></div>其亦可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370727_comment'></div>易曰信及豚鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370727_comment'></div>非此类也夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370727_comment'></div>愈时获幸于北平王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370727_comment'></div>客有问王之德者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370727_comment'></div>愈以是对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370727_comment'></div>客曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370727_comment'></div>夫禄位贵富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370727_comment'></div>人之所大欲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370727_comment'></div>得之之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370727_comment'></div>未若持之之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370727_comment'></div>得之于功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370727_comment'></div>或失于德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370727_comment'></div>得之于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370727_comment'></div>或失于子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370727_comment'></div>今夫功德如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370727_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370727", 1370727, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>祥祉</span>如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370727_comment'></div>其善持之也可知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370727_comment'></div>既已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370727_comment'></div>因叙之为猫相乳说云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370727_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=788&endYear=788')">788年</a>　本年，在长安。荐薛公达于徐泗濠节度使张建封，有书信。作品：与张徐州荐薛公达书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷32。）</span><div id='poem_1370628' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370628' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370628?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与张徐州荐薛公达书</a><span class='authorDate'>（788年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370628")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370628_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370628'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370628'>愈闻士有己未达而达人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370628_comment'></div>大夫意宁实之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370628_comment'></div>小人诚其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370628_comment'></div>今言则无故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370628_comment'></div>过濡恩惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370628_comment'></div>思以极报之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370628_comment'></div>伏惟閤下仁义风天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370628_comment'></div>任帝室宏奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370628_comment'></div>名誉之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370628_comment'></div>刑政之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370628_comment'></div>化道之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370628_comment'></div>使四方无声色之娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370628_comment'></div>金帛之富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370628_comment'></div>车服之制以从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370628_comment'></div>则亦称显位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370628_comment'></div>雍容暇豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370628_comment'></div>而又何求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370628_comment'></div>则可以取特达不羁之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370628_comment'></div>奉之以非常之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370628_comment'></div>俾耀名天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370628_comment'></div>答天子鸿恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370628_comment'></div>侧见河东薛公达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370628_comment'></div>年二十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370628_comment'></div>抱惊世之伟材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370628_comment'></div>发言挺志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370628_comment'></div>夐绝天秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370628_comment'></div>服仁食义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370628_comment'></div>融内光外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370628_comment'></div>直刚质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370628_comment'></div>与世不常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370628_comment'></div>想其升朝廷议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370628_comment'></div>凛莹冰玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370628_comment'></div>隐慝潜奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370628_comment'></div>灭心铄谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370628_comment'></div>然今尚幽塞未光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370628_comment'></div>韬缩铦利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370628_comment'></div>静居河洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370628_comment'></div>惟高公之清风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370628_comment'></div>驱马千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370628_comment'></div>文以为贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370628_comment'></div>求拜华轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370628_comment'></div>公则见之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370628_comment'></div>遇未甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370628_comment'></div>惧左右者不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370628_comment'></div>喜蔽能黩听不令之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370628_comment'></div>故小子忘惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370628_comment'></div>激愤献此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370628_comment'></div>惟公明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370628_comment'></div>夫垂纤饵溟泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370628_comment'></div>冀吞舟之鱼则疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370628_comment'></div>施薄礼天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370628_comment'></div>取特达之士亦难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370628_comment'></div>大夫其裁之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370628_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=789&endYear=789')">789年</a>　是年，在长安二次参加进士考试，落第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=789&endYear=789')">789年</a>　在长安。此期间有文，权系于此。作品：通解。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷34。）</span>择言。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷34。）</span><div id='poem_1370709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370709?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通解</a><span class='authorDate'>（789年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370709")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370709_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370709'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370709'>今之人。以一善为行而耻为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370709_comment'></div>慕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>达节</span>而称夫通才者多矣。然而脂韦汨没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370709_comment'></div>以至于老死者相继。亦未见他之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370709_comment'></div>其岂非乱教贼名之术欤。且五常之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370709_comment'></div>与天地皆生。然而天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370709_comment'></div>不得其师。终不能自知而行之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370709_comment'></div>故尧之前千万年。天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370709_comment'></div>促促然不知其让之为美也。于是许由哀天下之愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370709_comment'></div>且以争为能。乃脱屣其九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370709_comment'></div>高揖而辞尧。由是后之人竦然而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370709_comment'></div>虽天下。犹有薄而不售者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370709_comment'></div>况其小者乎。故让之教行于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370709_comment'></div>许由为之师也。自桀之前千万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370709_comment'></div>天下之人。循循然不知忠易其死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370709_comment'></div>故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>龙逢</span>哀天下之不仁。睹君父百姓入水火而不救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370709_comment'></div>于是进尽其言。退就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>割烹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370709_comment'></div>故后之臣竦然而言曰。虽万死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370709_comment'></div>犹有忠而不惧者。况其小者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370709_comment'></div>故忠之教行于天下。由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>龙逢</span>为之师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370709_comment'></div>自周之前千万年。浑浑然不知义之可以换其生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370709_comment'></div>故伯夷哀天下之偷且以彊。则服食其葛薇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370709_comment'></div>逃山而死。故后之人竦然而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370709_comment'></div>虽饿死。犹有义而不惧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370709_comment'></div>况其小者乎。故义之教行于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370709_comment'></div>由伯夷为之师也。是三人俱以一身立教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370709_comment'></div>而为师于百千万年閒。其身亡而其教存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370709_comment'></div>扶持天地。功亦厚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370709_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>向令</span>三师耻独行。慕通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370709_comment'></div>则尧之日。必曰得位而济道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370709_comment'></div>安用让为。夏之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370709_comment'></div>必曰长进而否退。安用死为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370709_comment'></div>周之日。必曰和光而同尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370709_comment'></div>安用饿为。若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370709_comment'></div>天下之人。促促然而争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370709_comment'></div>循循然而佞。浑浑然而偷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370709_comment'></div>其何惧而不为哉。是则三师生于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370709_comment'></div>必谓偏而不通者矣。其可不谓之大贤人者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370709_comment'></div>呜呼。今之人其慕通达之为弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370709_comment'></div>且古圣人言通者。盖百行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>众艺</span>备于身而行之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370709_comment'></div>今恒人之言通者。盖百行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>众艺</span>阙于身而求合者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370709_comment'></div>是则古之言通者。通于道义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370709_comment'></div>今之言通者。通于私曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370709_comment'></div>其亦异矣。将欲齐之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370709_comment'></div>其不犹矜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>粪丸</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/86/Comments/1")'>拟质</span>随珠者乎。且令今父兄教其子弟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370709_comment'></div>曰尔当通于行如仲尼。虽愚者亦知其不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370709_comment'></div>曰尔尚力一行如古之一贤。虽中人亦希其能矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370709_comment'></div>岂不由圣可慕而不可齐。贤可及而可齐邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370709_comment'></div>今之人行未能及乎贤。而欲齐乎圣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370709_comment'></div>亦见其病矣。夫古人之进修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370709_comment'></div>或几乎圣人。今之人行不出乎中人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370709_comment'></div>而耻乎力一行为独行。且曰我通同如圣人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370709_comment'></div>彼其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370709", 1370709, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>欺心</span>邪。吾不知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370709_comment'></div>彼其欺人而贼名邪。吾不知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370709_comment'></div>余惧其说之将深。为通解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370709_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1370709_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370710?labeling=true' target='_blank'>择言解</a><span class='authorDate'>（789年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370710")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370710_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370710'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370710'>火泄于密。而为用且大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370710_comment'></div>能不违于道。可燔可炙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370710_comment'></div>可镕可甄。以利乎生物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370710_comment'></div>及其放而不禁。反为灾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370710_comment'></div>水发于深。而为用且远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370710_comment'></div>能不违于道。可浮可载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370710_comment'></div>可饮可灌。以济乎生物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370710_comment'></div>及其导而不防。反为患矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370710_comment'></div>言起于微。而为用且博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370710_comment'></div>能不违于道。可化可令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370710_comment'></div>可告可训。以推于生物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370710_comment'></div>及其纵而不慎。反为祸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370710_comment'></div>火既我灾。有水而可伏其焰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370710_comment'></div>能使不陷于灰烬矣。水既我患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370710_comment'></div>有土而可遏其流。能使不仆于波涛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370710_comment'></div>言既我祸。即无以掩其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370710_comment'></div>能不罹于过者亦鲜矣。所以知理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370710_comment'></div>又焉得不择其言欤。其为慎而甚于水火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370710_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1370710_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=789&endYear=789')">789年</a>　在长安。此期间，鄠人割肉奉亲治病等愚孝行为，作文反对之。作品：鄠人对。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷34。）</span><div id='poem_1370720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鄠人对</a><span class='authorDate'>（789年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370720")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370720'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370720'>鄠有以孝为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>旌门</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370720_comment'></div>乃本其自于鄠人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370720_comment'></div>曰彼自剔股以奉母<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>疾瘳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370720_comment'></div>大夫以闻其令尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370720_comment'></div>令尹以闻其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370720_comment'></div>上俾聚土以旌其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370720_comment'></div>使勿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>输赋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370720_comment'></div>以为后劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370720_comment'></div>鄠大夫常曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370720_comment'></div>他邑有是人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370720_comment'></div>愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370720_comment'></div>母疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370720_comment'></div>则止于烹粉药石以为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370720_comment'></div>未闻毁伤支体以为养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370720_comment'></div>在教未闻有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370720_comment'></div>苟不伤于义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370720_comment'></div>则圣贤当先众而为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370720_comment'></div>是不幸因而致死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370720_comment'></div>则毁伤灭绝之罪有归矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370720_comment'></div>其为不孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370720_comment'></div>得无甚乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370720_comment'></div>苟有合孝之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370720_comment'></div>又不当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>旌门</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370720_comment'></div>盖生人之所宜为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370720_comment'></div>曷足为异乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370720_comment'></div>既以一家为孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370720_comment'></div>是辨一邑里皆无孝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370720_comment'></div>以一身为孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370720_comment'></div>是辨其祖父皆无孝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370720_comment'></div>然或陷于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>危难</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370720_comment'></div>能固其忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370720_comment'></div>而不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>苟生</span>之逆乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370720_comment'></div>以是而死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370720_comment'></div>乃旌表门闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370720_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>爵禄</span>其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370720_comment'></div>斯为为劝已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370720_comment'></div>矧非是而希<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370720", 1370720, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>免输</span>者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370720_comment'></div>曾不以毁伤为罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370720_comment'></div>灭绝为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370720_comment'></div>不腰于市而已黩于政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370720_comment'></div>况复旌其门。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370720_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=789&endYear=789')">789年</a>　本年，在长安。二次应进士试落第后，有回宣城探家之念。约于年底起行。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='3a251ac695be40b6bd37e591f4b92d3a_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=791&endYear=791')">791年</a>　本年，在长安。未登第，赠友人陈羽诗。作品：落叶一首送陈羽。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49531' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49531' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49531?labeling=true' target='_blank'>落叶送陈羽</a><span class='authorDate'>（791年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_49531_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49531'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49531'>落叶不更息，断蓬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49531", 49531, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>无复</span>归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49531_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=791&endYear=791')">791年</a>　本年，在长安。为河中府出现之连理木作颂文。作品：河中府连理木颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。张贞元六年，50。）</span><div id='poem_1370507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370507?labeling=true' "poem_title_1370507")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370507_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370507'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370507'>司空咸宁王尹蒲之七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370507_comment'></div>木连理生于河之东邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370507_comment'></div>野夫来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370507_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370507_comment'></div>吾不知古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370507_comment'></div>殆气之交畅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370507_comment'></div>维吾王之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370507_comment'></div>交畅者有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370507_comment'></div>是其应乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370507_comment'></div>训戎奋威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370507_comment'></div>荡戮凶回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370507_comment'></div>举政宣和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370507_comment'></div>人则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370507", 1370507, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>宁嘉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370507_comment'></div>入践台阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370507_comment'></div>庶尹克司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370507_comment'></div>来帅熊罴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370507_comment'></div>四方作仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370507_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370507", 1370507, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>闵仁</span>鳏寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370507_comment'></div>不宁燕息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370507_comment'></div>人乐王德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370507_comment'></div>祝年万亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370507_comment'></div>府有群吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370507_comment'></div>王有从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370507_comment'></div>异体同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370507_comment'></div>归民于理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370507_comment'></div>天子是嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370507_comment'></div>俾锡劳王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370507_comment'></div>王拜稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370507_comment'></div>天子之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370507_comment'></div>庶德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370507", 1370507, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>昭融</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370507_comment'></div>神斯降祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370507_comment'></div>殊本连理之柯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370507_comment'></div>同荣异垄之禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370507_comment'></div>吾徯之产兹土也久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370507_comment'></div>今欲明于大君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370507_comment'></div>纪于策书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370507_comment'></div>王抑余也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370507_comment'></div>冶金伐石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370507_comment'></div>垂耀无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370507_comment'></div>王余抑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370507_comment'></div>奋肆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370507", 1370507, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>姁媮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370507_comment'></div>不知所如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370507_comment'></div>愿托<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370507", 1370507, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>颂词</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370507_comment'></div>长言之于康衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370507_comment'></div>颂曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370507_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1370507'>木何为兮此祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370507_comment'></div>洵厥美兮在吾王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370507_comment'></div>愿封植兮永固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370507_comment'></div>俾斯人兮不忘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1370507_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年1月</a>　春，在长安。应进士试，有应试赋。作品：明水赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷31。）</span><div id='poem_1370504' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370504' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370504?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明水赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（以元化无宰至精感通为韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（792年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370504")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370504_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370504'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370504'>古者圣人之制祭祀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370504_comment'></div>必主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>忠敬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370504_comment'></div>崇吉蠲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370504_comment'></div>不贵其丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370504_comment'></div>乃或荐之以水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370504_comment'></div>不可以黩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370504_comment'></div>斯用致之于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370504_comment'></div>其事信美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370504_comment'></div>其义惟元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370504_comment'></div>月实水精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370504_comment'></div>故求其本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370504_comment'></div>明为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>君德</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370504_comment'></div>因取以名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370504_comment'></div>于是命烜氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370504_comment'></div>候清夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370504_comment'></div>或将祀圆丘于元冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370504_comment'></div>或将祭方泽于朱夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370504_comment'></div>持鉴而精气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>旁射</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370504_comment'></div>照月而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>阴灵</span>潜下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370504_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>视而不见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370504_comment'></div>谓合道于希夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370504_comment'></div>挹之则盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370504_comment'></div>方同功于造化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370504_comment'></div>应于有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370504_comment'></div>生于无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370504_comment'></div>形象未分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370504_comment'></div>徒骋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>离娄</span>之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370504_comment'></div>光华暗至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370504_comment'></div>如还合浦之珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370504_comment'></div>既齐芳于酒醴。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>明德惟馨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370504_comment'></div>元功不宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370504_comment'></div>于以表<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>诚洁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370504_comment'></div>于以戒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>荒怠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370504_comment'></div>苟失其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370504_comment'></div>杀牛之祭何为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370504_comment'></div>如得其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370504_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>明水</span>之荐斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370504_comment'></div>不引而自致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370504_comment'></div>不行而善至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370504_comment'></div>虽辞曲糵之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370504_comment'></div>实处樽罍之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370504_comment'></div>降于圆魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370504_comment'></div>殊匪金茎之露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370504_comment'></div>出自方诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370504_comment'></div>乍似鲛人之泪。<div id='poem_sentence_48_1370504_comment'></div>夜寂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370504", 1370504, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>天清</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370504_comment'></div>伊不注而能盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370504_comment'></div>霏然而象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370504_comment'></div><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370504_comment'></div>足以验圣贤之无党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370504_comment'></div>知天地之至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370504_comment'></div>窃比太羹之遗味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370504_comment'></div>幸希荐于庙中。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1370504_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年2月</a>　春，在长安登进士第。同年有李观、欧阳詹、崔群、王涯等，号“龙虎榜”。宰相陆贽任主考，梁肃、王础为佐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年2月</a>　春，在长安。登第日，赠同年李观诗。作品：北极赠李观。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49564' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_49564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49564'>川源浩浩隔，影响两无因。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49564'>我年二十五，求友昧其人。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49564_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年</a>　本年，在长安。讥刺谏议大夫阳城，有文。作品：争臣论。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4（作“谏臣论”））</span><div id='poem_1370686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370686?labeling=true' target='_blank'>争臣论</a><span class='authorDate'>（792年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370686")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370686_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370686'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370686'>或问谏议大夫阳城于愈。可以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>有道</span>之士乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370686_comment'></div>学广而闻多。不求闻于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370686_comment'></div>行古人之道。居于晋之鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370686_comment'></div>晋之鄙人。薰其德而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>善良</span>者几千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370686_comment'></div>大臣闻而荐之。天子以为谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370686_comment'></div>人皆以为华。阳子不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>色喜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370686_comment'></div>居于位五年矣。视其德如在野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370686_comment'></div>彼岂以富贵移易其心哉。愈应之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370686_comment'></div>是易所谓恒其德贞而夫子凶者也。恶得为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>有道</span>之士乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370686_comment'></div>在易蛊之上九云。不事王侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370686_comment'></div>高尚其事。蹇之六二则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370686_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>王臣</span>蹇蹇。匪躬之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370686_comment'></div>夫不以所居之时不一。而所蹈之德不同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370686_comment'></div>若蛊之上九。居无用之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370686_comment'></div>而致匪躬之节。蹇之六二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370686_comment'></div>在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>王臣</span>之位。而高不事之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370686_comment'></div>则冒进之患生。旷官之刺兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370686_comment'></div>志不可则。而尤不终无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370686_comment'></div>今阳子在位。不为不久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370686_comment'></div>闻天下之得失。不为不熟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370686_comment'></div>天子待之。不为不加矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370686_comment'></div>而未尝一言及于政。视政之得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370686_comment'></div>若越人视秦人之肥瘠。忽焉不加喜戚于其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370686_comment'></div>问其官。则曰谏议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370686_comment'></div>问其禄。则曰下大夫之秩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370686_comment'></div>问其政。则曰我不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370686_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>有道</span>之士。固如是乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370686_comment'></div>且吾闻之。有官守者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370686_comment'></div>不得其职则去。有言责者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370686_comment'></div>不得其言则去。今阳子以为得其言言乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370686_comment'></div>得其言而不言。与不得其言而不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370686_comment'></div>无一可者也。阳子将为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>禄仕</span>乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370686_comment'></div>古之人有云。仕不为贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370686_comment'></div>而有时乎为贫。谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>禄仕</span>者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370686_comment'></div>宜乎辞尊而居卑辞富而居贫。若抱关击柝者可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370686_comment'></div>盖孔子尝为委吏矣。尝为乘田矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370686_comment'></div>亦不敢旷其职。必曰会计当而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370686_comment'></div>必曰牛羊遂而已矣。若阳子之秩禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370686_comment'></div>不为卑且贫。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>章章</span>明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370686_comment'></div>而如此。其可乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370686_comment'></div>或曰否。非若此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370686_comment'></div>夫阳子恶讪上者。恶为人臣招其君之过而以为名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370686_comment'></div>故虽谏且议。使人不得而知焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370686_comment'></div>书曰。尔有嘉谟嘉猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370686_comment'></div>则入告尔后于内。尔乃顺之于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370686_comment'></div>曰斯谟斯猷。惟我后之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370686_comment'></div>夫阳子之用心亦若此者。愈应之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370686_comment'></div>若阳子之用心如此。滋所谓惑者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370686_comment'></div>入则谏其君。出不使人知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370686_comment'></div>大臣宰相者之事。非阳子之所宜行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370686_comment'></div>夫阳子本以布衣隐于蓬蒿之下。主上嘉其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>行谊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370686_comment'></div>擢在此位。官以谏为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370686_comment'></div>诚宜有以奉其职。使四方后代知朝廷有直言骨鲠之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370686_comment'></div>天子有不僭赏从谏如流之美。庶岩穴之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370686_comment'></div>闻而慕之。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>束带结发</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370686_comment'></div>愿进于阙下。而伸其辞说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370686_comment'></div>致吾君于尧舜。熙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>鸿号</span>于无穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370686_comment'></div>若书所谓。则大臣宰相之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370686_comment'></div>非阳子之所宜行也。且阳子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370686_comment'></div>将使君人者恶闻其过乎。是启之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370686_comment'></div>或曰。阳子之不求闻而人闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370686_comment'></div>不求用而君用之。不得已而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370686_comment'></div>守其道而不变。何子过之深也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370686_comment'></div>愈曰。自古圣人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>贤士</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370686_comment'></div>皆非有求于闻用也。闵其时之不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370686_comment'></div>人之不乂。得其道不敢独善其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370686_comment'></div>而必以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>兼济</span>天下也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>孜孜矻矻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370686_comment'></div>死而后已。故禹过家门不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370686_comment'></div>孔席不暇暖。而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>墨突</span>不得黔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370686_comment'></div>彼二圣一贤者。岂不知自安佚之为乐哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370686_comment'></div>诚畏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>天命</span>而悲人穷也。夫天授人以贤圣才能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370686_comment'></div>岂使自有馀而已。诚欲以补其不足者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370686_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/144/Comments/0")'>耳目</span>之于身也。耳司闻而目司见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370686_comment'></div>听其是非。视其险易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370686_comment'></div>然后身得安焉。圣贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370686_comment'></div>时人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>耳目</span>也。时人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370686_comment'></div>圣贤之身也。且阳子之不贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370686_comment'></div>则将役于贤以奉其上矣。若果贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370686_comment'></div>则固畏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>天命</span>而闵人穷也。恶得以自暇逸乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370686_comment'></div>或曰。吾闻君子不欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>加诸</span>人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370686_comment'></div>而恶讦以为直者。若吾子之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370686_comment'></div>直则直矣。无乃伤于德而费于辞乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370686_comment'></div>好尽言以招人过。国武子之所以见杀于齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370686_comment'></div>吾子其亦闻乎。愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370686_comment'></div>君子居其位。则思死其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370686_comment'></div>未得位。则思修其辞以明其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370686_comment'></div>我将以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>明道</span>也。非以为直而加人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370686_comment'></div>且国武子不能得善人。而好尽言于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/175/Comments/0")'>乱国</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370686_comment'></div>是以见杀。传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370686_comment'></div>惟善人能受尽言。谓其闻而能改之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370686_comment'></div>子告我曰。阳子可以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1370686", 1370686, "Clauses/181/Comments/0")'>有道</span>之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370686_comment'></div>今虽不能及已。阳子将不得为善人乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370686_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1370686_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年</a>　本年，在长安。始与孟郊订交。时孟郊长期不遇，新来长安。勉慰孟郊，有诗。作品：长安交游者一首赠孟郊。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_0_49560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49560'>亲朋<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作友）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49560", 49560, "Clauses/2/Comments/2")'>相过</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作遇）</span>时，亦各有以娱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49560_comment'></div></div><div
