id='poem_sentence_27_49624_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　本年，在长安。参加吏部博学鸿词科考试，未被录取。曾赴凤翔投谒，无果而返。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='240139f8763c41a5b6ddefc94b3cf0eb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("240139f8763c41a5b6ddefc94b3cf0eb");'><span id='240139f8763c41a5b6ddefc94b3cf0eb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=794')">793-794年</a>，26-27岁</div><div id='240139f8763c41a5b6ddefc94b3cf0eb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　本年，在长安。应博学鸿词科，有论议之文。作品：省试颜子不贰过论。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_1370685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370685?labeling=true' target='_blank'>省试颜子不贰过论</a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370685")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370685_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370685'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370685'>论曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370685_comment'></div>登孔氏之门者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370685_comment'></div>三千之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370685_comment'></div>四科之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370685_comment'></div>孰非由圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370685_comment'></div>为君子之儒者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370685_comment'></div>其于过行过言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370685_comment'></div>亦云鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370685_comment'></div>而夫子举不贰过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370685_comment'></div>惟颜氏之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370685_comment'></div>其何故哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370685_comment'></div>请试论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370685_comment'></div>夫圣人抱诚明之正性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370685_comment'></div>根中庸之至德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370685_comment'></div>苟发诸中形诸外者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370685_comment'></div>不由思虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370685_comment'></div>莫匪规矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370685_comment'></div>不善之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370685_comment'></div>无自入焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370685_comment'></div>可择之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370685_comment'></div>无自加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370685_comment'></div>故惟圣人无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370685_comment'></div>所谓过者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370685_comment'></div>非谓发于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370685_comment'></div>彰于言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370685_comment'></div>人皆谓之过而后为过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370685_comment'></div>生于其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370685_comment'></div>则为过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370685_comment'></div>故颜子之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370685_comment'></div>此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370685_comment'></div>不贰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370685_comment'></div>盖能止之于始萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370685_comment'></div>绝之于未形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370685_comment'></div>不贰之于言行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370685_comment'></div>中庸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370685_comment'></div>自诚明谓之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370685_comment'></div>自明诚谓之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370685_comment'></div>自诚明者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370685_comment'></div>不勉而中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370685_comment'></div>不思而得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370685_comment'></div>从容中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370685_comment'></div>圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370685_comment'></div>无过者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370685_comment'></div>自明诚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370685_comment'></div>择善而固执之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370685_comment'></div>不勉则不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370685_comment'></div>不思则不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370685_comment'></div>不贰过者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370685_comment'></div>故夫子之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370685_comment'></div>回之为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370685_comment'></div>择乎中庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370685_comment'></div>得一善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370685_comment'></div>则拳拳服膺而不失之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370685_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370685_comment'></div>颜氏之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370685_comment'></div>其殆庶几乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370685_comment'></div>言犹未至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370685_comment'></div>而孟子亦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370685_comment'></div>颜子具圣人之体而微者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370685_comment'></div>皆谓不能无生于其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370685_comment'></div>而亦不暴之于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370685_comment'></div>考之于圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370685_comment'></div>差为过耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370685_comment'></div>颜子自惟其若是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370685_comment'></div>于是居陋巷以致其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370685_comment'></div>饮一瓢以求其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370685_comment'></div>不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370685", 1370685, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>富贵</span>妨其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370685_comment'></div>不以隐约易其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370685_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370685", 1370685, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>确乎不拔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370685_comment'></div>浩然自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370685_comment'></div>知高坚之可尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370685_comment'></div>忘钻仰之为劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370685_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1370685", 1370685, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>任重道远</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370685_comment'></div>竟莫之致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370685_comment'></div>是以夫子叹其不幸短命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370685_comment'></div>今也则亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370685_comment'></div>谓其不能与已并立于至圣之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370685_comment'></div>观教化之大行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370685_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370685_comment'></div>夫行发于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370685_comment'></div>加于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370685_comment'></div>言发乎迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370685_comment'></div>见乎远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370685_comment'></div>苟不慎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370685_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1370685", 1370685, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>败辱</span>随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370685_comment'></div>而后思欲不贰过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370685_comment'></div>其于圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370685_comment'></div>不亦远乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370685_comment'></div>而夫子尚肯谓之其殆庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370685_comment'></div>孟子尚复谓之具体而微者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370685_comment'></div>则颜子之不贰过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370685_comment'></div>尽在是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370685_comment'></div>谨论。</div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1370685_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　本年，在长安。首次博学鸿词考试失败后，乃向崔元翰上书，表达感激之情，同时也流露不满。作品：上考功崔虞部书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷32。）</span><div id='poem_1370630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上考功崔虞部书</a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370630")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370630'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370630'>愈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>不肖</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370630_comment'></div>行能诚无可取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370630_comment'></div>行已颇僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370630_comment'></div>与时俗异态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370630_comment'></div>抱愚守迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370630_comment'></div>固不识<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>仕进</span>之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370630_comment'></div>乃与群士争名竞得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370630_comment'></div>行人之所甚鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370630_comment'></div>求人之所甚利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370630_comment'></div>其为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370630_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>童昏</span>实知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370630_comment'></div>如执事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370630_comment'></div>不以是为念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370630_comment'></div>援之幽穷之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370630_comment'></div>推之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>高显</span>之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370630_comment'></div>是知其人之或可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370630_comment'></div>而不知其人之莫可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370630_comment'></div>知其人之或可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370630_comment'></div>而不知其时之莫可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370630_comment'></div>既以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>自咎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370630_comment'></div>又叹执事者所守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370630_comment'></div>异于人人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370630_comment'></div>废耳任目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370630_comment'></div>华实不兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370630_comment'></div>故有所进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370630_comment'></div>故有所退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370630_comment'></div>且执事始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>考文</span>之明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370630_comment'></div>浮嚣之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370630_comment'></div>已相与称曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370630_comment'></div>某得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370630_comment'></div>某得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370630_comment'></div>问其所从来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370630_comment'></div>必言其有自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370630_comment'></div>一日之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370630_comment'></div>九变其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370630_comment'></div>凡进士之应此选者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370630_comment'></div>三十有二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370630_comment'></div>其所不言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370630_comment'></div>数人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370630_comment'></div>而愈在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370630_comment'></div>及执事既上名之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370630_comment'></div>三人之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370630_comment'></div>其二人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370630_comment'></div>固所传闻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370630_comment'></div>华实兼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370630_comment'></div>果竟得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370630_comment'></div>而又升焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370630_comment'></div>其一人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370630_comment'></div>则莫之闻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370630_comment'></div>实与华违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370630_comment'></div>行与时乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370630_comment'></div>果竟退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370630_comment'></div>如是则可见时之所与者时之所不与者之相远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370630_comment'></div>然愚之所守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370630_comment'></div>竟非偶然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370630_comment'></div>故不可变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370630_comment'></div>凡在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370630_comment'></div>八九年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370630_comment'></div>足不迹公卿之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370630_comment'></div>名不誉于大夫士之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370630_comment'></div>始者谬为今相国所第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370630_comment'></div>此时惟念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370630_comment'></div>以为得失固有天命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370630_comment'></div>不在趋时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370630_comment'></div>而偃仰一室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370630_comment'></div>啸歌古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370630_comment'></div>今则复疑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370630_comment'></div>未知夫天竟如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370630_comment'></div>命竟如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370630_comment'></div>由人乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370630_comment'></div>不由人乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370630_comment'></div>欲事干谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370630_comment'></div>则患不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>小书</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370630_comment'></div>困于投刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370630_comment'></div>欲学为佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370630_comment'></div>则患<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>言讷</span>词直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370630_comment'></div>卒事不成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370630_comment'></div>徒使其躬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>儳焉</span>而不终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370630_comment'></div>是以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>劳思</span>长怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370630_comment'></div>中夜起坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370630_comment'></div>度时揣已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370630_comment'></div>废然而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370630_comment'></div>虽欲从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370630_comment'></div>末由也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370630_comment'></div>又常念古之人日已进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370630_comment'></div>今之人日已退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370630_comment'></div>夫古之人四十而仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370630_comment'></div>其行道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>为学</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370630_comment'></div>既已大成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370630_comment'></div>而又之死不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370630_comment'></div>故其事业功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370630_comment'></div>老而益光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370630_comment'></div>故诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370630_comment'></div>虽无老成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370630_comment'></div>尚有典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370630_comment'></div>言老成之可尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370630_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370630_comment'></div>乐只君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370630_comment'></div>德音不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370630_comment'></div>谓死而不亡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370630_comment'></div>夫今之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370630_comment'></div>务利而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>遗道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370630_comment'></div>其学其问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370630_comment'></div>以之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>取名</span>致官而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370630_comment'></div>得一名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370630_comment'></div>获一位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370630_comment'></div>则弃其业而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>役役</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/106/Comments/1")'>持权</span>者之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370630_comment'></div>故其事业功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370630_comment'></div>日以忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370630_comment'></div>月以削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370630_comment'></div>老而益昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370630_comment'></div>死而遂亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370630_comment'></div>愈今二十有六矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370630_comment'></div>距古人始仕之年尚十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370630_comment'></div>岂为晚哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370630_comment'></div>行之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>不息</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370630_comment'></div>要之以至死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370630_comment'></div>不有得于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370630_comment'></div>必有得于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370630_comment'></div>不有得于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370630_comment'></div>必有得于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370630_comment'></div>用此自遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370630_comment'></div>且以为知己者之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370630_comment'></div>执事以为何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370630_comment'></div>其信然否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370630_comment'></div>今所病者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370630_comment'></div>在于穷约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370630_comment'></div>无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>僦屋</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/127/Comments/1")'>赁仆</span>之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370630_comment'></div>无缊袍粝食之给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370630_comment'></div>驱马出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370630_comment'></div>不知所之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370630_comment'></div>斯道未丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370630_comment'></div>天命不欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370630_comment'></div>岂遂殆哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370630_comment'></div>岂遂困哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370630_comment'></div>窃惟执事之于愈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370630_comment'></div>无师友之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370630_comment'></div>无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1370630", 1370630, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>久故</span>之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370630_comment'></div>无颜色言语之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370630_comment'></div>卒然振而发之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370630_comment'></div>必有以见知尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370630_comment'></div>故尽暴其所志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370630_comment'></div>不敢以默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370630_comment'></div>又惧执事多在省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370630_comment'></div>非公事不敢以至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370630_comment'></div>是则拜见之不可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370630_comment'></div>获侍之无时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370630_comment'></div>是以进其说如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370630_comment'></div>庶执事察之也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_148_1370630_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　本年，在长安。应科目时，有书与人。作品：应科目时与人书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_1370611' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370611' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370611?labeling=true' target='_blank'>应科目时与人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370611")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370611_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370611'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370611'>月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370611_comment'></div>愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370611_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>天池</span>之滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370611_comment'></div>大江之濆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370611_comment'></div>曰有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>怪物</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370611_comment'></div>盖非常鳞凡介之品汇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>匹俦</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370611_comment'></div>其得水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370611_comment'></div>变化风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370611_comment'></div>上下于天不难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370611_comment'></div>其不及水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370611_comment'></div>盖寻常尺寸之閒耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370611_comment'></div>无高山大陵旷途绝险为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>关隔</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370611_comment'></div>然其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>穷涸</span>不能自致乎水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370611_comment'></div>为猵獭之笑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370611_comment'></div>盖十八九矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370611_comment'></div>如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>有力</span>者哀其穷而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>运转</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370611_comment'></div>盖一举手一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>投足</span>之劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370611_comment'></div>然是物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370611_comment'></div>负其异于众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370611_comment'></div>且曰烂死于沙泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370611_comment'></div>吾宁乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370611_comment'></div>若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>俛首帖耳</span>摇尾而乞怜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370611_comment'></div>非我之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370611_comment'></div>是以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>有力</span>者遇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370611_comment'></div>熟视之若无睹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370611_comment'></div>其死其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370611_comment'></div>固不可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370611_comment'></div>今又有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>有力</span>者当其前矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370611_comment'></div>聊试仰首一鸣号焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370611_comment'></div>庸讵知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>有力</span>者不哀其穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370611_comment'></div>而忘一举手一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>投足</span>之劳而转之清波乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370611_comment'></div>其哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370611_comment'></div>命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370611_comment'></div>其不哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370611_comment'></div>命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370611_comment'></div>知其在命而且鸣号之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370611_comment'></div>亦命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370611_comment'></div>愈今者实有类于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370611_comment'></div>是以忘其疏愚之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370611_comment'></div>而有是说焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370611_comment'></div>閤下其亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370611", 1370611, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>怜察</span>之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370611_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　本年，在长安。有书信寄给凤翔邢君牙。作品：与凤翔邢尚书书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_1370609' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370609' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370609?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与凤翔邢尚书书</a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370609")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370609_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370609'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370609'>愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370609_comment'></div>布衣之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370609_comment'></div>身居穷约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370609_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>借势</span>于王公大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370609_comment'></div>则无以成其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370609_comment'></div>王公大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370609_comment'></div>功业显著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370609_comment'></div>不借誉于布衣之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370609_comment'></div>则无以广其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370609_comment'></div>是故布衣之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370609_comment'></div>虽甚贱而不谄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370609_comment'></div>王公大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370609_comment'></div>虽甚贵而不骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370609_comment'></div>其事势相须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370609_comment'></div>其先后相资也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370609_comment'></div>今閤下为王爪牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370609_comment'></div>为国<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>藩垣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370609_comment'></div>威行如秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370609_comment'></div>仁行如春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370609_comment'></div>戎狄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>弃甲</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>远遁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370609_comment'></div>朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>高枕</span>而不虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370609_comment'></div>是岂负大丈夫生平之志愿哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370609_comment'></div>岂负明天子非常之顾遇哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370609_comment'></div>赫赫乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370609_comment'></div>洸洸乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370609_comment'></div>功业逐日以新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370609_comment'></div>名声随风而流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370609_comment'></div>宜乎欢呼海隅高谈之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370609_comment'></div>奔走天下慕义之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370609_comment'></div>使或愿驰一传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370609_comment'></div>或愿操一戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370609_comment'></div>纳君于唐虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370609_comment'></div>收地于河湟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370609_comment'></div>然而未至乎是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370609_comment'></div>盖亦有说云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370609_comment'></div>岂非待士之道未甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370609_comment'></div>遇士之礼未甚优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370609_comment'></div>请粗言其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370609_comment'></div>閤下试详而听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370609_comment'></div>夫士之来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370609_comment'></div>必有求于閤下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370609_comment'></div>夫以贫贱而求于富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370609_comment'></div>正其宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370609_comment'></div>閤下之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370609_comment'></div>不可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>遍施</span>于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370609_comment'></div>在择其人之贤愚而厚薄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>等级</span>之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370609_comment'></div>假如贤者至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370609_comment'></div>閤下乃一见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370609_comment'></div>愚者至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370609_comment'></div>不得见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370609_comment'></div>则贤者莫不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370609_comment'></div>而愚者日远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370609_comment'></div>假如愚者至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370609_comment'></div>閤下以千金与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370609_comment'></div>贤者至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370609_comment'></div>亦以千金与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370609_comment'></div>则愚者莫不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370609_comment'></div>而贤者日远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370609_comment'></div>欲求得士之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370609_comment'></div>尽于此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370609_comment'></div>欲求士之贤愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370609_comment'></div>在于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>精鉴</span>博采之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370609_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>精鉴</span>于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370609_comment'></div>固己得其十七八矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370609_comment'></div>又博采于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370609_comment'></div>百无一二遗者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370609_comment'></div>若果能是道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370609_comment'></div>愈见天下之竹帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370609_comment'></div>不足书閤下之功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370609_comment'></div>天下之金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370609_comment'></div>不足颂閤下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>形容</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370609_comment'></div>愈也布衣之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370609_comment'></div>生七岁而读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370609_comment'></div>十三而能文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370609_comment'></div>二十五而擢第于春官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370609_comment'></div>以文名于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370609_comment'></div>前古之兴亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370609_comment'></div>未尝不经于心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370609_comment'></div>当世之得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370609_comment'></div>未尝不留于意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370609_comment'></div>尝以天下之安危在边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370609_comment'></div>故六月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>于迈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370609_comment'></div>来观其师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370609_comment'></div>及至此都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370609_comment'></div>徘徊而不能去者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370609_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370609", 1370609, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>诚说</span>閤下之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370609_comment'></div>愿少立于阶墀之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370609_comment'></div>望见君子之威仪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370609_comment'></div>居十日而不敢进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370609_comment'></div>诚以左右无先为容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370609_comment'></div>惧閤下以众人视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370609_comment'></div>则杀身不足以灭耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370609_comment'></div>徒悔恨于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370609_comment'></div>故先此书序其所以来之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370609_comment'></div>閤下其无以为狂而以礼进退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370609_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370609_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1370609_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　本年，在长安。友人齐暤下第离京，作序送之。作品：送齐暤下第序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。张贞元十年，77。）</span><div id='poem_1370641' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370641' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370641?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送齐皞下第序</a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370641")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370641_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370641'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370641'>古之所谓公无私者。其取舍进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370641_comment'></div>无择于亲疏远迩。惟其宜可焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370641_comment'></div>其下之视上也。亦惟视其举黜之当否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370641_comment'></div>不以亲疏远迩疑乎其上之人。故上之人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>行志</span>择谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370641_comment'></div>坦乎其无忧于下也。下之人剋己慎行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370641_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>确乎</span>其无惑于上也。是故为君不劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370641_comment'></div>而为臣甚易。见一善焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370641_comment'></div>可得详而举也。见一不善焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370641_comment'></div>可得明而去也。及道之衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370641_comment'></div>上下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>交疑</span>。于是乎举雠举子之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370641_comment'></div>载之传中而称美之。而谓之忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370641_comment'></div>见一善焉。若亲与迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370641_comment'></div>不敢举也。见一不善焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370641_comment'></div>若疏与远。不敢去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370641_comment'></div>众之所同好焉。矫而黜之乃公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370641_comment'></div>众之所同恶焉。激而举之乃忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370641_comment'></div>于是乎有违心之行。有怫志之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370641_comment'></div>有内愧之名。若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370641_comment'></div>俗所谓良有司也。肤受之诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370641_comment'></div>不行于君。巧言之诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370641_comment'></div>不起于人矣。乌虖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370641_comment'></div>今之君天下者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>不亦</span>劳乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370641_comment'></div>为有司者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>不亦</span>难乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370641_comment'></div>为人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>向道</span>者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>不亦</span>勤乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370641_comment'></div>是故端居而念焉。非君人者之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370641_comment'></div>则曰有司焉。则非有司之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370641_comment'></div>则曰今举天下人焉。则非今举天下人之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370641_comment'></div>盖其渐有因。其本有根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370641_comment'></div>生于私其亲。成于私其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370641_comment'></div>以己之不直而谓人皆然。其植之也固久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370641_comment'></div>其除之也实难。非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>百年</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/61/Comments/1")'>必世</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370641_comment'></div>不可得而化也。非知命不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370641_comment'></div>不可得而改也。已矣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370641_comment'></div>其终能复古乎。若高阳齐生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370641_comment'></div>其起予者乎。齐生之兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370641_comment'></div>为时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>名相</span>。出藩于南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370641_comment'></div>朝之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>硕臣</span>。皆其旧交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370641_comment'></div>齐生举进士。有司用是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>连枉</span>齐生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370641_comment'></div>齐生不以云。乃曰我之未至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370641_comment'></div>有司其枉我哉。我将利吾器而俟其时耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370641_comment'></div>抱负其业。东归于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370641_comment'></div>吾观于人。有不得志则非其上者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370641_comment'></div>亦莫计其身之短长也。若齐生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370641_comment'></div>既至矣。而曰我未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370641_comment'></div>不以闵于有司。其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370641", 1370641, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>不亦</span>鲜乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370641_comment'></div>吾用是知齐生后日诚良有司也。能复古者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370641_comment'></div>公无私者也。知命不惑者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370641_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1370641_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　春，在长安。第二次应博学宏辞，其应试之文留集中。作品：省试学生代斋郎议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_1370573' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370573' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370573?labeling=true' target='_blank'>省试学生代斋郎议</a><span class='authorDate'>（794年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370573")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370573_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370573'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370573'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>斋郎</span>职奉宗庙社稷之小事。盖士之贱者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370573_comment'></div>执豆笾。骏奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370573_comment'></div>以役于其官之长。不以德进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370573_comment'></div>不以言扬。盖取其人力以备其事而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370573_comment'></div>奉宗庙社稷之小事。执豆笾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370573_comment'></div>骏奔走。亦不可以不敬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370573_comment'></div>于是选大夫士之子弟未爵命者。以塞员填阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370573_comment'></div>而教之行事。其勤虽小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370573_comment'></div>其使之不可以不报也。必书其岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370573_comment'></div>岁既久矣。于是乎命之以官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370573_comment'></div>而授之以事。其亦微矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370573_comment'></div>学生或以通经举。或以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>能文</span>称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370573_comment'></div>其微者至于习法律。知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>字书</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370573_comment'></div>皆有以赞于教化。可以使令于上者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370573_comment'></div>自非天姿茂异。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>旷日经久</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370573_comment'></div>以所进业发闻于乡闾。称道于朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370573_comment'></div>荐于州府。而升之司业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370573_comment'></div>则不可得而齿乎国学矣。然则奉宗庙社稷之小事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370573_comment'></div>任力之小者也。赞于教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370573_comment'></div>可以使令于上者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>德艺</span>之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370573_comment'></div>其亦不可移易明矣。今议者谓学生之无所事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370573_comment'></div>谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>斋郎</span>之幸而进。不本其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370573_comment'></div>因谓可以代任其事而罢之。盖亦不得其理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370573_comment'></div>今夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>斋郎</span>之所事者。力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370573_comment'></div>学生之所事者。德与艺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370573_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>德艺</span>举之。而以力役之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370573_comment'></div>是使君子而服小人之事。且非国家崇儒劝学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370573_comment'></div>诱人为善之道也。此一说不可者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370573_comment'></div>抑又有大不可者焉。宗庙社稷之事虽小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370573_comment'></div>不可以不专。敬之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370573_comment'></div>古之道也。今若以学生兼其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370573_comment'></div>及其岁时日月。然后授其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>宗彝</span>罍洗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370573_comment'></div>其周旋必不合度。其进退必不得宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370573_comment'></div>其思虑必不固。其容貌必不庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370573_comment'></div>此无他。其事不习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370573_comment'></div>而其志不专故也。非近于不敬者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370573_comment'></div>又有大不可者。其是之谓欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370573_comment'></div>若知此不可。将令学生恒掌其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370573_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>隳坏</span>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/76/Comments/1")'>本业</span>。则是学生之教加少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370573_comment'></div>学生之道益贬。而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>斋郎</span>之实犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370573_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>斋郎</span>之名苟无也。大凡制度之改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370573_comment'></div>政令之变。利于其旧不什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370573_comment'></div>则不可为已。又况不如其旧哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370573_comment'></div>考之于古则非训。稽之于今则非利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370573_comment'></div>寻其名而求其实。则失其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370573_comment'></div>故曰议罢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370573", 1370573, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>斋郎</span>而以学生荐享。盖亦不得其理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370573_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1370573_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　春，在长安第二次参加博学宏词考试，仍落第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　春，长安淫雨成灾。李观生病，韩愈作诗赠之。作品：重云一首李观疾赠之。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49686' class='_poem'><div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49686", 49686, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>忧伤</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49686'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49686", 49686, id='poem_sentence_6_49686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49686'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49686", 49686, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49686", 49686, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>鸾凤</span>本高翔。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49686'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_49686_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='56fb0336b2b241a49acd31d86a0ef7fd_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=795')">794-795年</a>，27-28岁</div><div id='56fb0336b2b241a49acd31d86a0ef7fd' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　在长安。李观有砚一方，使用多年颇有感情，因误坠地损毁，以木匣盛之埋于房后，韩愈感此为之作铭。作品：瘗砚铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷26。）</span><div id='poem_1370699' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370699' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370699?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瘗砚铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（794年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370699")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370699_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370699'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370699'>陇西李观元宾。始从进士贡在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370699_comment'></div>或贻之砚。既四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370699_comment'></div>悲欢穷泰。未尝废其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370699_comment'></div>凡与之试艺春官。实二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370699_comment'></div>登上第。行于褒谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370699_comment'></div>役者刘允误坠之地。毁焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370699_comment'></div>乃匣归埋于京师里中。昌黎韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370699_comment'></div>其友人也。赞且识云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370699_comment'></div>土乎成质。陶乎成器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370699_comment'></div>复其质。非生死类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370699_comment'></div>全斯用。毁不忍弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370699_comment'></div>埋而识之。仁之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370699_comment'></div>砚乎砚乎。与瓦砾异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370699_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1370699_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　本年，在长安。为好友李观（字元宾）作墓志铭。作品：李元宾墓铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370812' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370812")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370812_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370812'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370812'>李观字元宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370812_comment'></div>其先陇西人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370812_comment'></div>始来自江之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370812_comment'></div>年二十四举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370812_comment'></div>三年登上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370812_comment'></div>又举博学宏词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370812_comment'></div>得太子校书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370812_comment'></div>又一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370812_comment'></div>年二十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370812_comment'></div>客死于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370812_comment'></div>既敛之三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370812_comment'></div>友人博陵崔宏礼葬之于国东门之外七里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370812_comment'></div>乡曰庆义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370812_comment'></div>原曰嵩原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370812_comment'></div>友人韩愈书石以志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370812_comment'></div>辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370812_comment'></div>已虖元宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370812_comment'></div>寿也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370812_comment'></div>吾不知其所慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370812_comment'></div>夭也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370812_comment'></div>吾不知其所恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370812_comment'></div>生而不淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370812_comment'></div>孰谓其寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370812_comment'></div>死而不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370812_comment'></div>孰谓之夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370812_comment'></div>已虖元宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370812_comment'></div>才高乎当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370812_comment'></div>而行出乎古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370812_comment'></div>已虖元宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370812_comment'></div>竟何为哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370812_comment'></div>竟何为哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1370812_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年12月</a>　年底，在长安。有感于果州女道士谢自然“白日飞升”事，赋诗，有批驳警醒之意。作品：谢自然。<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年1月27日</a>　一月，在长安。三次应博学宏词皆未举，韩愈先后三次向时相赵憬、贾耽、卢迈等上书，自鸣不平。此为第一书。作品：上宰相书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370588' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370588' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370588?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上宰相书</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年1月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370588")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370588_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370588'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370588'>正月二十七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370588_comment'></div>前乡贡进士韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370588_comment'></div>谨伏光范门下再拜献书相公閤下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370588_comment'></div>诗之序曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370588_comment'></div>菁菁者莪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370588_comment'></div>乐育材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370588_comment'></div>君子能长育人材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370588_comment'></div>则天下喜乐之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370588_comment'></div>其诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370588_comment'></div>菁菁者莪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370588_comment'></div>在彼中阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370588_comment'></div>既见君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370588_comment'></div>乐且有仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370588_comment'></div>说者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370588_comment'></div>菁菁者盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370588_comment'></div>莪微草也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370588_comment'></div>阿大陵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370588_comment'></div>言君子之长育人材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370588_comment'></div>若大陵之长育微草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370588_comment'></div>能使之菁菁然盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370588_comment'></div>既见君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370588_comment'></div>乐且有仪云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370588_comment'></div>天下美之之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370588_comment'></div>其三章曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370588_comment'></div>既见君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370588_comment'></div>锡我百朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370588_comment'></div>说者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370588_comment'></div>百朋多之之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370588_comment'></div>言君子既长育人材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370588_comment'></div>又当爵命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370588_comment'></div>赐之厚禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370588_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>宠贵</span>之云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370588_comment'></div>其卒章曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370588_comment'></div>汎汎杨舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370588_comment'></div>载沈载浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370588_comment'></div>既见君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370588_comment'></div>我心则休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370588_comment'></div>说者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370588_comment'></div>载载也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370588_comment'></div>沈浮者物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370588_comment'></div>言君子之于人才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370588_comment'></div>无所不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370588_comment'></div>若舟之于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370588_comment'></div>浮沈皆载之云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370588_comment'></div>既见君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370588_comment'></div>我心则休云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370588_comment'></div>言若此则天下之心美之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370588_comment'></div>君子之于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370588_comment'></div>既长育之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370588_comment'></div>又当爵命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>宠贵</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370588_comment'></div>而于其才无所遗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370588_comment'></div>孟子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370588_comment'></div>君子有三乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370588_comment'></div>王天下不与存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370588_comment'></div>其一曰乐得天下之英才而教育之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370588_comment'></div>此皆圣人贤士之所极言至论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370588_comment'></div>古今之所宜法者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370588_comment'></div>然则孰能长育天下之人才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370588_comment'></div>将非吾君与吾相乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370588_comment'></div>孰能教育天下之英才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370588_comment'></div>将非吾君与吾相乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370588_comment'></div>幸今天下无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370588_comment'></div>小大之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370588_comment'></div>各守其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370588_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>钱谷</span>甲兵之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370588_comment'></div>不至于庙堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370588_comment'></div>论道经邦之暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370588_comment'></div>舍此宜无大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370588_comment'></div>今有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370588_comment'></div>生二十八年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370588_comment'></div>名不著于农工商贾之版。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370588_comment'></div>其业则读书著文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370588_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>歌颂</span>尧舜之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370588_comment'></div>鸡鸣而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370588_comment'></div>孜孜焉亦不为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370588_comment'></div>其所读皆圣人之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370588_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>释老之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370588_comment'></div>无所入于其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370588_comment'></div>其所著皆约六经之旨而成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370588_comment'></div>抑邪与正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370588_comment'></div>辨时俗之所惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370588_comment'></div>居穷守约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370588_comment'></div>亦时有感激怨怼奇怪之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370588_comment'></div>以求知于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370588_comment'></div>亦不悖于教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370588_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>妖淫</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/85/Comments/1")'>谀佞</span>诪张之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370588_comment'></div>无所出于其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370588_comment'></div>四举于礼部乃一得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370588_comment'></div>三选于吏部卒无成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370588_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>九品</span>之位其可望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370588_comment'></div>一亩之宫其可怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370588_comment'></div>遑遑乎四海无所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370588_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>恤恤</span>乎饥不得食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370588_comment'></div>寒不得衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370588_comment'></div>滨于死而益固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370588_comment'></div>得其所者争笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370588_comment'></div>忽将弃其旧而新是图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370588_comment'></div>求老农老圃而为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370588_comment'></div>悼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>本志</span>之变化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370588_comment'></div>中夜涕泗交颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370588_comment'></div>虽不足当诗人孟子之谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370588_comment'></div>抑长育之使成材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370588_comment'></div>其亦可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370588_comment'></div>教育之使成才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370588_comment'></div>其亦可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370588_comment'></div>抑又闻古之君子相其君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370588_comment'></div>一夫不获其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370588_comment'></div>若己推而内之沟中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370588_comment'></div>今有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370588_comment'></div>生七年而学圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370588_comment'></div>以修其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370588_comment'></div>积二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370588_comment'></div>不得已一朝而毁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370588_comment'></div>是亦不获其所矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370588_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>伏念</span>今有仁人在上位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370588_comment'></div>若不往告之而遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370588_comment'></div>是果于自弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370588_comment'></div>而不以古之君子之道待吾相也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370588_comment'></div>其可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370588_comment'></div>宁往告焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370588_comment'></div>若不得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370588_comment'></div>则命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370588_comment'></div>其亦行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370588_comment'></div>洪范曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370588_comment'></div>凡厥庶民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370588_comment'></div>有猷有为有守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370588_comment'></div>汝则念之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370588_comment'></div>不协于极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370588_comment'></div>不罹于咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370588_comment'></div>皇则受之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370588_comment'></div>而康而色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370588_comment'></div>曰予攸好德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370588_comment'></div>汝则锡之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370588_comment'></div>是皆与善之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370588_comment'></div>抑又闻古之人有自进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370588_comment'></div>而君子不逆之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370588_comment'></div>曰予攸好德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370588_comment'></div>汝则锡之福之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370588_comment'></div>抑又闻上之设官制禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370588_comment'></div>必求其人而授之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370588_comment'></div>非苟慕其才而富贵其身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370588_comment'></div>盖将用其能理不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370588_comment'></div>用其明理不明者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370588_comment'></div>下之修己立诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370588_comment'></div>必求其位而居之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370588_comment'></div>非苟没于利而荣于名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370588_comment'></div>盖将推已之所馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370588_comment'></div>以济其不足者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370588_comment'></div>然则上之于求人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370588_comment'></div>下之于求位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370588_comment'></div>交相求而一其致焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370588_comment'></div>苟以是而为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370588_comment'></div>则上之道不必难其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370588_comment'></div>下之道不必难其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370588_comment'></div>可举而举焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1370588_comment'></div>不必让其自举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370588_comment'></div>可进而进焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370588_comment'></div>不必廉于自进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370588_comment'></div>抑又闻上之化下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370588_comment'></div>得其道则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_159_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>劝赏</span>不必遍加乎天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370588_comment'></div>而天下从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370588_comment'></div>因人之所欲为而遂推之之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370588_comment'></div>今天下不由吏部而仕进者几希矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370588_comment'></div>主上感伤山林之士有逸遗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370588_comment'></div>屡诏内外之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370588_comment'></div>旁求于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370588_comment'></div>而其至者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_166_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/166/Comments/0")'>盖阙</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370588_comment'></div>岂其无人乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370588_comment'></div>亦见国家不以非常之道礼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370588_comment'></div>而不来耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370588_comment'></div>彼之处隐就閒者亦人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370588_comment'></div>其耳目鼻口之所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370588_comment'></div>其心之所乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1370588_comment'></div>其体之所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1370588_comment'></div>岂有异于人乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1370588_comment'></div>今所以恶衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1370588_comment'></div>穷体肤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1370588_comment'></div>麋鹿之与处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1370588_comment'></div>猿狖之与居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1370588_comment'></div>固自以其身不能与时从顺俯仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1370588_comment'></div>故甘心自绝而不悔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1370588_comment'></div>而方闻国家之仕进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1370588_comment'></div>必举于州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1370588_comment'></div>然后升于礼部吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1370588_comment'></div>试之以绣绘雕琢之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1370588_comment'></div>考之以声势之逆顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1370588_comment'></div>章句之短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1370588_comment'></div>中其程式者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1370588_comment'></div>然后得从下士之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1370588_comment'></div>虽有化俗之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1370588_comment'></div>安边之画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1370588_comment'></div>不由是而稍进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1370588_comment'></div>万不有一得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1370588_comment'></div>彼惟恐入山之不深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1370588_comment'></div>入林之不密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1370588_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_195_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/195/Comments/0")'>影响</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_195_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/195/Comments/1")'>昧昧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1370588_comment'></div>惟恐闻于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1370588_comment'></div>今若闻有以书进宰相而求仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1370588_comment'></div>而宰相不辱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1370588_comment'></div>而荐之天子而爵命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1370588_comment'></div>而布其书于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1370588_comment'></div>枯槁沈溺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_201_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/201/Comments/0")'>魁闳</span>宽通之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1370588_comment'></div>必且<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_202_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/202/Comments/0")'>洋洋</span>焉动其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1370588_comment'></div>峨峨焉缨其冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1370588_comment'></div>于于焉而来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1370588_comment'></div>此所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_205_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/205/Comments/0")'>劝赏</span>不必遍加乎天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1370588_comment'></div>而天下从焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1370588_comment'></div>因人之所欲为而遂推之之谓者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1370588_comment'></div>伏惟览诗书孟子之所指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1370588_comment'></div>念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_209_1370588", 1370588, "Clauses/209/Comments/0")'>育才</span>锡福之所以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1370588_comment'></div>考古之君子相其君之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1370588_comment'></div>而忘自进自举之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1370588_comment'></div>思设官制禄之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1370588_comment'></div>以诱致山林逸遗之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1370588_comment'></div>庶天下之行道者知所归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1370588_comment'></div>小子不敢自幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1370588_comment'></div>其尝所著文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1370588_comment'></div>辄采其可者若干首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1370588_comment'></div>录在异卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1370588_comment'></div>冀辱赐观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1370588_comment'></div>干黩尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1370588_comment'></div>伏地待罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1370588_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_222_1370588_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年2月16日</a>　二月，在长安。三次应博学宏词皆未举，韩愈先后三次向时相赵憬、贾耽、卢迈等上书，自鸣不平。此为第二书。作品：后十九日复上书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370589' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370589' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370589?labeling=true' target='_blank'>后十九日复上书</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年2月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370589")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370589_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370589'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370589'>二月十六日。前乡贡进士韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370589_comment'></div>谨再拜言相公閤下。向上书及所著文后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370589_comment'></div>待命凡十有九日。不得命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370589_comment'></div>恐惧不敢逃遁。不知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370589_comment'></div>乃复敢自纳于不测之诛。以求毕其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370589_comment'></div>而请命于左右。愈闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370589_comment'></div>蹈水火者之求免于人也。不惟其父兄子弟之慈爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370589_comment'></div>然后呼而望之也。将有介于其侧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370589_comment'></div>虽其所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370589", 1370589, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>憎怨</span>。苟不至乎欲其死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370589_comment'></div>则将大其声疾呼。而望其仁之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370589_comment'></div>彼介于其侧者。闻其声而见其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370589_comment'></div>不惟其父兄子弟之慈爱。然后往而全之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370589_comment'></div>虽有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370589", 1370589, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>憎怨</span>。苟不至乎欲其死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370589_comment'></div>则将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370589", 1370589, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>狂奔</span>尽气。濡手足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370589_comment'></div>焦毛发。救之而不辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370589_comment'></div>若是者何哉。其势诚急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370589_comment'></div>而其情诚可悲也。愈之强学力行有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370589_comment'></div>愚不惟道之险夷。行且不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370589_comment'></div>以蹈于穷饿之水火。其既危且亟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370589_comment'></div>大其声而疾呼矣。閤下其亦闻而见之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370589_comment'></div>其将往而全之欤。抑将安而不救欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370589_comment'></div>有来言于閤下者曰。有观溺于水而爇于火者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370589_comment'></div>有可救之道。而终莫之救也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370589_comment'></div>閤下且以为仁人乎哉。不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370589_comment'></div>若愈者。亦君子之所宜动心者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370589_comment'></div>或谓愈。子言则然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370589_comment'></div>宰相则知子矣。如时不可何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370589_comment'></div>愈窃谓之不知言者。诚其材能不足当吾贤相之举耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370589_comment'></div>若所谓时者。固在上位者之为耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370589_comment'></div>非天之所为也。前五六年时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370589_comment'></div>宰相荐闻。尚有自布衣蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370589", 1370589, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>抽擢</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370589_comment'></div>与今岂异时哉。且今节度观察使及防御营田诸小使等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370589_comment'></div>尚得自举判官。无閒于已仕未仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370589_comment'></div>况在宰相。吾君所尊敬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370589_comment'></div>而曰不可乎。古之进人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370589_comment'></div>或取于盗。或举于管库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370589_comment'></div>今布衣虽贱。犹足以方乎此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370589_comment'></div>情隘辞蹙。不知所裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370589_comment'></div>亦惟少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370589", 1370589, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>垂怜</span>焉。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370589_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1370589_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年3月16日</a>　三月，在长安。三次应博学宏词皆未举，韩愈先后三次向时相赵憬、贾耽、卢迈等上书，自鸣不平。此为第三书。作品：后二十九日复上书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　本年东归之前，在长安。有诗，借燕相典故抒发不得志之情。作品：马厌谷。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49554' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49554")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49554_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49554'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49554'>马厌谷兮，士不厌<span class='link'
