id='poem_sentence_5_49554_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　本年，在长安。崔立之以书表劝慰之意，韩愈作书以答。作品：答崔立之书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370592' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370592' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370592?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答崔立之书</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370592")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370592_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370592'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370592'>斯立足下。仆见险不能止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370592_comment'></div>动不得时。颠顿狼狈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370592_comment'></div>失其所操持。困不知变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370592_comment'></div>以至辱于再三。君子小人之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>悯笑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370592_comment'></div>天下之所背而驰者也。足下犹复以为可教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370592_comment'></div>贬损道德。乃至手笔以问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370592_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>扳援</span>古昔。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>辞义</span>高远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370592_comment'></div>且进且劝。足下之于故旧之道得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370592_comment'></div>虽仆亦固望于吾子。不敢望于他人者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370592_comment'></div>然尚有似不相晓者。非故欲发余乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370592_comment'></div>不然。何子之不以丈夫期我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370592_comment'></div>不能默默。聊复自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370592_comment'></div>仆始年十六七时。未知人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370592_comment'></div>读圣人之书。以为人之仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370592_comment'></div>皆为人耳。非有利乎已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370592_comment'></div>及年二十时。苦家贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370592_comment'></div>衣食不足。谋于所亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370592_comment'></div>然后知仕之不唯为人耳。及来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370592_comment'></div>见有举进士者。人多贵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370592_comment'></div>仆诚乐之。就求其术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370592_comment'></div>或出礼部所试赋诗策等以相示。仆以为可无学而能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370592_comment'></div>因诣州县求举。有司者好恶出于其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370592_comment'></div>四举而后有成。亦未即得仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370592_comment'></div>闻吏部有以博学宏词选者。人尤谓之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370592_comment'></div>且得美仕。就求其术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370592_comment'></div>或出所试文章。亦礼部之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370592_comment'></div>私怪其故。然犹乐其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370592_comment'></div>因又诣州府求举。凡二试于吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370592_comment'></div>一既得之。而又黜于中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370592_comment'></div>虽不得仕。人或谓之能焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370592_comment'></div>退因自取所试读之。乃类于俳优者之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370592_comment'></div>颜忸怩而心不宁者数月。既已为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370592_comment'></div>则欲有所成就。书所谓耻过作非者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370592_comment'></div>因复求举。亦无幸焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370592_comment'></div>乃复自疑。以为所试与得之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370592_comment'></div>不同其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>程度</span>。及得观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370592_comment'></div>余亦无甚愧焉。夫所谓博学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370592_comment'></div>岂今之所谓者乎。夫所谓宏词者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370592_comment'></div>岂今之所谓者乎。诚使古之豪杰之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370592_comment'></div>若屈原孟轲司马迁相如扬雄之徒。进于是选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370592_comment'></div>必知其怀惭。乃不自进而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370592_comment'></div>设使与夫今之善进取者。竞于蒙昧之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370592_comment'></div>仆必知其辱焉。然彼五子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370592_comment'></div>且使生于今之世。其道虽不显于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370592_comment'></div>其自负何如哉。肯与夫斗筲者决得失于一夫之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370592_comment'></div>而为之忧乐哉。故凡仆之汲汲于进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370592_comment'></div>其小得盖欲以具裘葛。养穷孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370592_comment'></div>其大得盖欲以同吾之所乐于人耳。其他可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370592_comment'></div>自计已熟。诚不待人而后知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370592_comment'></div>今足下乃复比之献玉者。以为必俟工人之剖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370592_comment'></div>然后见知于天下。虽两刖足不为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370592_comment'></div>且无使勍者再剋。诚足下相勉之意厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370592_comment'></div>然仕进者。岂舍此而无门哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370592_comment'></div>足下谓我必待是而后进者。尤非相悉之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370592_comment'></div>仆之玉固未尝献。而足固未尝刖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370592_comment'></div>足下无为为我戚戚也。方今天下风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370592_comment'></div>尚有未及于古者。边境尚有被甲执兵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370592_comment'></div>主上不得怡。而宰相以为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370592_comment'></div>仆虽不贤。亦且<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>潜究</span>其得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370592_comment'></div>致之乎吾相。荐之乎吾君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370592_comment'></div>上希卿大夫之位。下犹取一障而乘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370592_comment'></div>若都不可得。犹将耕于宽閒之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370592_comment'></div>钓于寂寞之滨。求国家之遗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370592_comment'></div>考贤人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>哲士</span>之终始。作唐之一经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370592_comment'></div>垂之于无穷。诛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>奸谀</span>于既死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370592_comment'></div>发潜德之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>幽光</span>。二者将必有一可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370592_comment'></div>足下以为仆之玉凡几献。而足凡几刖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370592_comment'></div>又所谓勍者果谁哉。再剋之刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370592_comment'></div>信如何也。士固信于知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370592_comment'></div>微足下无以发吾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370592", 1370592, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>狂言</span>。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370592_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1370592_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　本年，离长安前，作书答同年侯继。作品：答侯继书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370591' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370591' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370591?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答侯继书</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370591")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370591_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370591'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370591'>裴子自城来。得足下一书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370591_comment'></div>明日。又于崔大处得足下陜州所留书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370591_comment'></div>玩而复之。不能自休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370591_comment'></div>寻知足下不得留。仆又为考官所辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370591_comment'></div>欲致一书开足下。并自舒其所怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370591_comment'></div>含意连辞。将发复已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370591_comment'></div>卒不能成就其说。及得足下二书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370591_comment'></div>凡仆之所欲进于左右者。足下皆以自得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370591_comment'></div>仆虽欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370591", 1370591, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>重累</span>其辞。谅无居足下之意外者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370591_comment'></div>故绝意不为。行自念方当远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370591_comment'></div>潜深伏隩。与时世不相闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370591_comment'></div>虽足下之思我。无所窥寻其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370591", 1370591, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>声光</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370591_comment'></div>故不得不有书为别。非复有所感发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370591_comment'></div>仆少好学问。自五经之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370591_comment'></div>百氏之书。未有闻而不求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370591_comment'></div>得而不观者。然其所志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370591_comment'></div>惟在其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370591", 1370591, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>意义</span>所归。至于礼乐之名数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370591_comment'></div>阴阳土地星辰方药之书。未尝一得其门户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370591_comment'></div>虽今之仕进者。不要此道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370591_comment'></div>然古之人未有不通此而能为大贤君子者。仆虽庸愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370591_comment'></div>每读书辄用自愧。今幸不为时所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370591_comment'></div>无朝夕役役之劳。将试学焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370591_comment'></div>力不足而后止。犹将愈于汲汲于时俗之所争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370591_comment'></div>既不得而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370591", 1370591, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>怨天尤人</span>者。此吾今之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370591_comment'></div>惧足下以我退归。因谓我不复能自彊不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370591_comment'></div>故因书奉晓。冀足下知吾之退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370591_comment'></div>未始不为进。而众人之进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370591_comment'></div>未始不为退也。既货马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370591_comment'></div>即求船东下。二事皆不过后月十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370591_comment'></div>有相问者。为我谢焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370591_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1370591_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　约于本年，赋《杂诗》作品：杂诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49581' class='_poem'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年5月2日</a>　五月二日，离长安东归洛阳。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b415b459e41046b9bba61c2a4e414c9c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b415b459e41046b9bba61c2a4e414c9c");'><span id='b415b459e41046b9bba61c2a4e414c9c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=800')">799-800年</a>，32-33岁</div><div id='b415b459e41046b9bba61c2a4e414c9c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年12月</a>　冬，奉张建封之命赴京朝正，时欧阳詹为国子监四门助教，欲推荐韩愈而未果，韩愈作诗赠之以寄意。作品：驽骥赠欧阳詹。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年12月</a>　冬，朝正京师时，因欧阳詹所云何蕃事迹，作传记文。作品：太学生何蕃传。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_1370819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370819?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太学生何蕃传</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370819")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370819'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370819'>太学生何蕃。入太学者廿馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370819_comment'></div>岁举进士。学成行尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370819_comment'></div>自太学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>诸生</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>推颂</span>不敢与蕃齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370819_comment'></div>相与言于助教博士。助教博士以状申于司业祭酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370819_comment'></div>司业祭酒撰次蕃之群行焯焯者数十馀事。以之升于礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370819_comment'></div>而以闻于天子。京师<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>诸生</span>以荐蕃名文说者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370819_comment'></div>不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>选纪</span>。公卿大夫知蕃者比肩立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370819_comment'></div>莫为礼部。为礼部者率蕃所不合者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370819_comment'></div>以是无成功。蕃淮南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370819_comment'></div>父母具全。初入太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370819_comment'></div>岁率一归。父母止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370819_comment'></div>其后閒一二岁乃一归。又止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370819_comment'></div>不归者五岁矣。蕃纯孝人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370819_comment'></div>闵亲之老不自克。一日揖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>诸生</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370819_comment'></div>归养于和州。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>诸生</span>不能止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370819_comment'></div>乃闭蕃空舍中。于是太学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>六馆</span>之士百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370819_comment'></div>又以蕃之义行言于司业阳先生城。请谕留蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370819_comment'></div>于是太学阙祭酒。会阳先生出道州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370819_comment'></div>不果留。欧阳詹生言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370819_comment'></div>蕃仁勇人也。或者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370819_comment'></div>蕃居太学。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>诸生</span>不为非义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370819_comment'></div>葬死者之无归。哀其孤而字焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370819_comment'></div>惠之大小。必以力复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370819_comment'></div>斯其所谓仁欤。蕃之力不任其体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370819_comment'></div>其貌不任其心。吾不知其勇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370819_comment'></div>欧阳詹生曰。朱泚之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370819_comment'></div>太学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>诸生</span>举将从之。来请起蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370819_comment'></div>蕃正色叱之。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>六馆</span>之士不从乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370819_comment'></div>兹非其勇欤。惜乎蕃之居下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370819_comment'></div>其可以施于人者不流也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370819", 1370819, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>譬之</span>水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370819_comment'></div>其为泽不为川乎。川者高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370819_comment'></div>泽者卑。高者流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370819_comment'></div>卑者止。是故蕃之仁义充诸心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370819_comment'></div>行诸太学。积者多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370819_comment'></div>施者不遐也。天将雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370819_comment'></div>水气上。无择于川泽涧溪之高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370819_comment'></div>然则泽之道。其亦有施乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370819_comment'></div>抑有待于彼者欤。故凡贫贱之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370819_comment'></div>必有待然后能有所立。独何蕃欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370819_comment'></div>吾是以言之。无亦使其无传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370819_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370819_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年1月</a>　一月，继续在长安朝正。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='87f53d44923a496aba22622ad58950ed_label'><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_49648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49648'>倏忽十六年，终朝苦寒饥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年10月</a>　冬十月，又赴长安调选。稍后任国子监四门博士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　冬，在长安任四门博士。为圬者王承福作传。作品：圬者王承福传。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370820?labeling=true' target='_blank'>圬者王承福传</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370820")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370820'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370820'>圬之为技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370820_comment'></div>贱且劳者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370820_comment'></div>有业之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370820_comment'></div>其色若自得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370820_comment'></div>听其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370820_comment'></div>约而尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370820_comment'></div>问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370820_comment'></div>王其姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370820_comment'></div>承福其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370820_comment'></div>世为京兆长安农夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370820_comment'></div>天宝之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370820_comment'></div>发人为兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370820_comment'></div>持弓矢十三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370820_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370820", 1370820, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>官勋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370820_comment'></div>弃之来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370820_comment'></div>丧其土田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370820_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370820", 1370820, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>手镘</span>衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370820_comment'></div>馀三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370820_comment'></div>舍于市之主人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370820_comment'></div>而归其屋食之当焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370820_comment'></div>视时屋食之贵贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370820_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370820", 1370820, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>上下</span>其圬之佣以偿之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370820_comment'></div>有馀则以与道路之癈疾饿者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370820_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370820_comment'></div>粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370820_comment'></div>稼而生者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370820_comment'></div>若布与帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370820_comment'></div>必蚕织而后成者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370820_comment'></div>其他所以养生之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370820_comment'></div>皆待人力而后完也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370820_comment'></div>吾皆赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370820_comment'></div>然人不可遍为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370820_comment'></div>宜乎各致其能以相生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370820_comment'></div>故君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370820_comment'></div>理我所以生者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370820_comment'></div>而百官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370820_comment'></div>承君之化者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370820_comment'></div>任有小大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370820_comment'></div>惟其所能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370820_comment'></div>若器皿焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370820_comment'></div>食焉而怠其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370820_comment'></div>必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370820", 1370820, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>天殃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370820_comment'></div>故吾不敢一日舍镘以嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370820_comment'></div>夫镘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370820_comment'></div>易能可力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370820_comment'></div>又诚有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370820_comment'></div>取其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370820_comment'></div>虽劳无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370820_comment'></div>吾心安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370820_comment'></div>夫力易强而有功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370820_comment'></div>心难强而有智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370820_comment'></div>用力者使于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370820_comment'></div>用心者使人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370820_comment'></div>亦其宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370820_comment'></div>吾特择其易为而无愧者取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370820_comment'></div>嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370820_comment'></div>吾操镘以入富贵之家有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370820_comment'></div>有一至者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370820_comment'></div>又往过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370820_comment'></div>则为墟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370820_comment'></div>有再至三至者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370820_comment'></div>而往过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370820_comment'></div>则为墟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370820_comment'></div>问之其邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370820_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370820_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370820_comment'></div>刑戮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370820_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370820_comment'></div>身既死而其子孙不能有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370820_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370820_comment'></div>死而归之官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370820_comment'></div>吾以是观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370820_comment'></div>非所谓食焉怠其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370820_comment'></div>而得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370820", 1370820, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>天殃</span>者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370820_comment'></div>非强心以智而不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370820_comment'></div>不择其才之称否而冒之者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370820_comment'></div>非多行可愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370820_comment'></div>知其不可而强为之者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370820_comment'></div>将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370820", 1370820, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>贵富</span>难守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370820_comment'></div>薄功而厚享之者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370820_comment'></div>抑丰悴有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370820_comment'></div>一去一来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370820_comment'></div>而不可常者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370820_comment'></div>吾之心悯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370820_comment'></div>是故择其力之可能者行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370820_comment'></div>乐富贵而悲贫贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370820_comment'></div>我岂异于人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370820_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370820_comment'></div>功大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370820_comment'></div>其所以自奉也博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370820_comment'></div>妻与子皆养于我者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370820_comment'></div>吾能薄而功小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370820_comment'></div>不有之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370820_comment'></div>又吾所谓劳力者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370820_comment'></div>若立吾家而力不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370820_comment'></div>则心又劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370820_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1370820", 1370820, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>一身而二任</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370820_comment'></div>虽圣者不可能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370820_comment'></div>愈始闻而惑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370820_comment'></div>又从而思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370820_comment'></div>盖贤者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370820_comment'></div>盖所谓独善其身者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370820_comment'></div>然吾有讥焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370820_comment'></div>谓其自为也过多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370820_comment'></div>其为人也过少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370820_comment'></div>其学杨朱之道者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370820_comment'></div>杨之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370820_comment'></div>不肯拔我一毛而利天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370820_comment'></div>而夫人以有家为劳心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370820_comment'></div>不肯一动其心以畜其妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370820_comment'></div>其肯劳其心以为人乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370820_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370820_comment'></div>其贤于世之患不得之而患失之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370820_comment'></div>以济其生之欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370820_comment'></div>贪邪而亡道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370820_comment'></div>以丧其身者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370820_comment'></div>其亦远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370820_comment'></div>又其言有可以警予者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370820_comment'></div>故予为之传而自鉴焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_118_1370820_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年1月</a>　年初，在长安任四门博士。荐友人侯喜、刘述古、韦群玉等人于祠部员外郎陆傪。作品：与祠部陆员外书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370608' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370608' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370608?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与祠部陆员外书</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370608")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370608_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370608'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370608'>执事好贤乐善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370608_comment'></div>孜孜以荐进良士明白是非为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370608_comment'></div>方今天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370608_comment'></div>一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370608_comment'></div>愈之获幸于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370608_comment'></div>其足迹接于门墙之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370608_comment'></div>升乎堂而望乎室者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370608_comment'></div>亦将一年于今矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370608_comment'></div>念虑所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370608_comment'></div>辄欲不自疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370608_comment'></div>外竭其愚而道其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370608_comment'></div>况在执事之所孜孜为己任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370608_comment'></div>得不少助而张之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370608_comment'></div>诚不自识其言之可采与否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370608_comment'></div>其事则小人之事君子尽心之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370608_comment'></div>天下之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370608_comment'></div>不可遽数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370608_comment'></div>又执事之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370608_comment'></div>或有待而为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370608_comment'></div>未敢一二言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370608_comment'></div>今但言其最近而切者尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370608_comment'></div>执事之与司贡士者相知诚深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370608_comment'></div>彼之所望于执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370608_comment'></div>执事之所以待乎彼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370608_comment'></div>可谓至而无閒疑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370608_comment'></div>彼之职在乎得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370608_comment'></div>执事之志在乎进贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370608_comment'></div>如得其人而授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370608_comment'></div>所谓两得其求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370608_comment'></div>顺乎其必从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370608_comment'></div>执事之知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370608_comment'></div>其亦博矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370608_comment'></div>夫子之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370608_comment'></div>举尔所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370608_comment'></div>然则愈之知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370608_comment'></div>亦可言已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370608_comment'></div>文章之尤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370608_comment'></div>有侯喜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370608_comment'></div>侯云长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370608_comment'></div>喜之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370608_comment'></div>在开元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370608_comment'></div>衣冠而朝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370608_comment'></div>兄弟五六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370608_comment'></div>及喜之父仕不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370608_comment'></div>弃官而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370608_comment'></div>喜率兄弟操耒耜而耕于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370608_comment'></div>地薄而赋多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370608_comment'></div>不足以养其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370608_comment'></div>则以其耕之暇读书而为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370608_comment'></div>以干于有位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370608_comment'></div>而取足焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370608_comment'></div>喜之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370608_comment'></div>学西京而为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370608_comment'></div>举进士十五六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370608_comment'></div>云长之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370608_comment'></div>执事所自知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370608_comment'></div>其为人淳重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>方实</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370608_comment'></div>可任以事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370608_comment'></div>其文与喜相上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370608_comment'></div>有刘述古者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370608_comment'></div>其文长于为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370608_comment'></div>文丽而思深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370608_comment'></div>当今举于礼部者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370608_comment'></div>其诗无与为比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370608_comment'></div>而又工于应主司之试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370608_comment'></div>其为人温良诚信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370608_comment'></div>无邪佞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>诈妄</span>之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370608_comment'></div>彊志而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>婉容</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370608_comment'></div>和平而有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370608_comment'></div>其趋事静以敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370608_comment'></div>著美名而负屈称者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370608_comment'></div>其日已久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370608_comment'></div>有韦群玉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370608_comment'></div>京兆之从子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370608_comment'></div>其文有可取者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370608_comment'></div>其进而未止者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370608_comment'></div>其为人贤而有才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370608_comment'></div>志刚而气和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370608_comment'></div>乐于荐贤为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370608_comment'></div>其在家无子弟之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370608_comment'></div>居京兆之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370608_comment'></div>遇事辄争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370608_comment'></div>不从其令而从其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370608_comment'></div>求子弟之贤而能业其家者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370608_comment'></div>群玉是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370608_comment'></div>凡此四子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370608_comment'></div>皆可以当执事首荐而极论者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370608_comment'></div>主司疑焉则以辩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370608_comment'></div>问焉则以告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370608_comment'></div>未知焉则殷勤而语之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370608_comment'></div>期乎有成而后止可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370608_comment'></div>有沈杞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370608_comment'></div>张⿱<span class='inlineComment2'>（艹宏）</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370608_comment'></div>尉迟汾者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370608_comment'></div>李绅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370608_comment'></div>张后馀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370608_comment'></div>李翊者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370608_comment'></div>或文或行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370608_comment'></div>皆出群之才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370608_comment'></div>凡此数子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370608_comment'></div>与之足以收人望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370608_comment'></div>得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>才实</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370608_comment'></div>主司疑焉则与解之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370608_comment'></div>问焉则以对之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370608_comment'></div>广求焉则以告之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370608_comment'></div>往者陆相公司贡士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370608_comment'></div>考文章甚详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370608_comment'></div>愈时亦幸在得中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370608_comment'></div>而未知陆之得人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370608_comment'></div>其后一二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370608_comment'></div>所与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>及第</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370608_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>赫然</span>有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370608_comment'></div>原其所以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370608_comment'></div>亦由梁补阙肃王郎中础佐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370608_comment'></div>梁举八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370608_comment'></div>无有失者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370608_comment'></div>其馀则王皆与谋焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370608_comment'></div>陆相之考文章甚详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370608_comment'></div>待梁与王如此不疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370608_comment'></div>梁与王举人如此之当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370608_comment'></div>至今以为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370608_comment'></div>自后主司不能信人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370608_comment'></div>人亦无足信者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370608_comment'></div>故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>蔑蔑</span>无闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370608_comment'></div>今执事之与司贡士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370608_comment'></div>有相信之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370608_comment'></div>谋行之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370608_comment'></div>惜乎其不可失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370608_comment'></div>方今在朝廷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370608_comment'></div>多以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_129_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>游宴</span>娱乐为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370608_comment'></div>独执事眇然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_130_1370608", 1370608, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>高举</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370608_comment'></div>有深思长虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370608_comment'></div>为国家树根本之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370608_comment'></div>宜乎小子之以此言闻于左右也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370608_comment'></div>愈恐惧再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_134_1370608_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年2月18日</a>　二月，在长安任四门博士。十八日，陆傪出刺歙州，赋诗为之壮行。作品：送陆歙州诗序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370637' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370637' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370637?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送陆歙州诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年2月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370637")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370637_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370637'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370637'>贞元十八年二月十八日。祠部员外郎陆君出刺歙州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370637_comment'></div>朝廷夙夜之贤。都邑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370637", 1370637, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>游居</span>之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370637_comment'></div>赍咨涕洟。咸以为不当去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370637_comment'></div>歙大州也。刺史尊官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370637_comment'></div>由郎官而往者。前后相望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370637_comment'></div>当今赋出于天下。江南居十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370637_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370637", 1370637, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>宣使</span>之所察。歙为富州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370637_comment'></div>宰臣之所荐闻。天子之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370637", 1370637, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>选用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370637_comment'></div>其不轻而重也较然矣。如是而赍咨涕洟以为不当去者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370637_comment'></div>陆君之道。行乎朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370637_comment'></div>则天下望其赐。刺一州则专而不能咸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370637_comment'></div>先一州而后天下。岂吾君与吾相之心哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370637_comment'></div>于是昌黎韩愈道愿留者之心而泄其思。作诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370637_comment'></div>我衣之华兮。我佩之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370637_comment'></div>陆君之去兮。谁与翱翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370637_comment'></div>敛此大惠兮。施于一州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370637_comment'></div>今其去矣。胡不为留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370637_comment'></div>我作此诗。歌于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370637", 1370637, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>逵道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370637_comment'></div>无疾其驱。天子有诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370637_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1370637_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　在长安为四门博士时，有感于时事，托诗见意。作品：夜歌。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_49618' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49618' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49618?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夜歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49618")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49618_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49618'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49618'>静夜有清光，闲堂仍独息。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49618'>念身幸无恨，志气方自得。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49618'>乐哉何所忧，所忧非我力。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49618'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_49618_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　春，在长安任四门博士。送孟郊南归，作序。作品：送孟东野序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370638' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370638' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370638?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送孟东野序</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370638")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370638_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370638'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370638'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>大凡</span>物不得其平则鸣。草木之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>无声</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370638_comment'></div>风挠之鸣。水之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>无声</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370638_comment'></div>风荡之鸣。其跃也或激之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370638_comment'></div>其趋也或梗之。其沸也或炙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370638_comment'></div>金石之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>无声</span>。或击之鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370638_comment'></div>人之于言也亦然。有不得已者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>而后</span>言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370638_comment'></div>其歌也有思。其哭也有怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370638_comment'></div>凡出乎口而为声者。其皆有弗平者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370638_comment'></div>乐也者。郁于中而泄于外者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370638_comment'></div>择其善鸣者而假之鸣。金石丝竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370638_comment'></div>匏土革木。八者物之善鸣者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370638_comment'></div>惟天之于时也亦然。择其善鸣者而假之鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370638_comment'></div>是故以鸟鸣春。以雷鸣夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370638_comment'></div>以虫鸣秋。以风鸣冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370638_comment'></div>四时之相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>推敚</span>。其必有不得其平者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370638_comment'></div>其于人也亦然。人声之精者为言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370638_comment'></div>文辞之于言。又其精也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370638_comment'></div>尤择其善鸣者而假之鸣。其在唐虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370638_comment'></div>咎陶禹其善鸣者也。而假以鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370638_comment'></div>夔弗能以文辞鸣。又自假于韶以鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370638_comment'></div>夏之时。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>五子</span>以其歌鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370638_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>伊尹</span>鸣殷。周公鸣周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370638_comment'></div>凡载于诗书六艺。皆鸣之善者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370638_comment'></div>周之衰。孔子之徒鸣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370638_comment'></div>其声大而远。传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370638_comment'></div>天将以夫子为木铎。其弗信矣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370638_comment'></div>其末也。庄周以其荒唐之辞鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370638_comment'></div>楚大国也。其亡也以屈原鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370638_comment'></div>臧孙辰孟轲荀卿以道鸣者也。杨朱墨翟管夷吾晏婴老聃申不害韩非慎到田骈邹衍尸佼孙武张仪苏秦之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370638_comment'></div>皆以其术鸣。秦之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370638_comment'></div>李斯鸣之。汉之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370638_comment'></div>司马迁相如扬雄。最其善鸣者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370638_comment'></div>其下魏晋氏。鸣者不及于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370638_comment'></div>然亦未尝绝也。就其善者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370638_comment'></div>其声清以浮。其节数以急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370638_comment'></div>其词淫以哀。其志弛以肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370638_comment'></div>其为言也。乱杂而无章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370638_comment'></div>将天丑其德莫之顾耶。何为乎不鸣其善鸣者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370638_comment'></div>唐之有天下。陈子昂苏源明元结李白杜甫李观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370638_comment'></div>皆以其所能鸣。其存而在下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370638_comment'></div>孟郊东野始以其诗鸣。其高出魏晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370638_comment'></div>不懈而及于古。其他<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>浸淫</span>乎汉氏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370638_comment'></div>从吾游者。李翱张籍其尤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370638_comment'></div>三子者之鸣信善矣。抑不知天将和其声而使鸣国家之盛耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370638_comment'></div>抑将穷饿其身。思愁其心肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370638_comment'></div>而使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370638", 1370638, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>自鸣</span>其不幸耶。三子者之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370638_comment'></div>则悬乎天矣。其在上也奚以喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370638_comment'></div>其在下也奚以悲。东野之役于江南也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370638_comment'></div>有若不释然者。故吾道其命于天者以解之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370638_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1370638_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年3月3日</a>　上巳日，长安国子学举行庆祝仪式，众人有诗，韩愈受命作序。作品：上巳日燕太学听弹琴诗序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370672' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370672' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370672?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上巳日燕太学听弹琴诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年3月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370672")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370672_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370672'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370672'>与众乐之之谓乐。乐而不失其正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370672_comment'></div>又乐之尤也。四方无斗争金革之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370672_comment'></div>京师之人。既庶且丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370672_comment'></div>天子念致理之艰难。乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>居安</span>之閒暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370672_comment'></div>肇置三令节。诏公卿群有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370672_comment'></div>至于其日。率厥官属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370672_comment'></div>饮酒以乐。所以同其休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370672_comment'></div>宣其和。感其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370672_comment'></div>成其文者也。三月初吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370672_comment'></div>实惟其时。司业武公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370672_comment'></div>于是总太学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>儒官</span>三十有六人。列燕于祭酒之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370672_comment'></div>樽俎既陈。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>肴羞</span>惟时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370672_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>盏斝</span>序行。献酬有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370672_comment'></div>歌风雅之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>古辞</span>。斥夷狄之新声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370672_comment'></div>褒衣危冠。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>与与</span>如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370672_comment'></div>有一儒生。魁然其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370672_comment'></div>抱琴而来。历阶以升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370672_comment'></div>坐于樽俎之南。鼓有虞氏之南风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370672_comment'></div>赓之以文王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>宣父</span>之操。优游<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>夷愉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370672_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>广厚</span>高明。追三代之遗音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370672_comment'></div>想<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>舞雩</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>咏叹</span>。及暮而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370672_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370672", 1370672, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>充然</span>若有得也。武公于是作歌诗以美之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370672_comment'></div>命属官咸作之。命四门博士昌黎韩愈序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370672_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1370672_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。约于此年作《师说》，文中所云李蟠贞元十九年进士，文应作于此前。作品：师说。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370706' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370706' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370706?labeling=true' target='_blank'>师说</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370706")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370706_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370706'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370706'>古之学者必有师。师者所以传道授业解惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370706_comment'></div>人非生而知之者。孰能无惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370706_comment'></div>惑而不从师。其为惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370706_comment'></div>终不解矣。生乎吾前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370706_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>闻道</span>也固先乎吾。吾从而师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370706_comment'></div>生乎吾后。其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>闻道</span>也亦先乎吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370706_comment'></div>吾从而师之。吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>师道</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370706_comment'></div>夫庸知其年之先后生于吾乎。是故无贵无贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370706_comment'></div>无长无少。道之所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370706_comment'></div>师之所存也。嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370706_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>师道</span>之不传也久矣。欲人之无惑也难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370706_comment'></div>古之圣人。其出人也远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370706_comment'></div>犹且从师而问焉。今之众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370706_comment'></div>其下圣人也亦远矣。而耻学于师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370706_comment'></div>是故圣益圣。愚益愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370706_comment'></div>圣人之所以为圣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>愚人</span>之所以为愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370706_comment'></div>其皆出于此乎。爱其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370706_comment'></div>择师而教之。于其身也则耻师焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370706_comment'></div>惑矣。彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>童子</span>之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370706_comment'></div>授之书而习其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>句读</span>者。非我所谓传其道解其惑者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370706_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>句读</span>之不知。惑之不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370706_comment'></div>或师焉。或不焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370706_comment'></div>小学而大遗。吾未见其明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370706_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>巫医</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>乐师</span>百工之人。不耻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>相师</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370706_comment'></div>士大夫之族。曰师曰弟子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>云者</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370706_comment'></div>则群聚而笑之。问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370706_comment'></div>则曰。彼与彼年相若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370706_comment'></div>道相似也。位卑则足羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370706_comment'></div>官盛则近谀。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370706_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>师道</span>之不复可知矣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>巫医</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>乐师</span>百工之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370706_comment'></div>君子不齿。今其智乃反不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370706_comment'></div>其可怪也欤。圣人无常师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370706_comment'></div>孔子师郯子苌宏师襄老聃。郯子之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370706_comment'></div>其贤不及孔子。孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370706_comment'></div>三人行。必有我师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370706_comment'></div>是故弟子不必不如师。师不必贤于弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370706_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>闻道</span>有先后。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>术业</span>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/73/Comments/1")'>专攻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370706_comment'></div>如是而已。李氏子蟠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370706_comment'></div>年十七。好古文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370706_comment'></div>六艺经传。皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370706", 1370706, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>通习</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370706_comment'></div>不拘于时。学于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370706_comment'></div>余嘉其能行古道。作师说以贻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370706_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1370706_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。时崔群任宣州判官，韩愈与其在洛阳分别后，曾两次写信问讯，今又作书寄之。作品：与崔群书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370602' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370602' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370602?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与崔群书</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370602")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370602_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370602'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370602'>自足下离东都。凡两度<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>枉问</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370602_comment'></div>寻承已达宣州。主人仁贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370602_comment'></div>同列皆君子。虽抱羁旅之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370602_comment'></div>亦且可以度日。无入而不自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370602_comment'></div>乐天知命者。固前修之所以御外物者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370602_comment'></div>况足下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>度越</span>此等百千辈。岂以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>出处</span>近远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370602_comment'></div>累其灵台耶。宣州虽称清凉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>高爽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370602_comment'></div>然皆大江之南。风土不并以北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370602_comment'></div>将息之道。当先理其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370602_comment'></div>心閒无事。然后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>外患</span>不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370602_comment'></div>风气所宜。可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>审备</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370602_comment'></div>小小者亦当自不至矣。足下之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370602_comment'></div>虽在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>穷约</span>。犹能不改其乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370602_comment'></div>况地至近。官荣禄厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370602_comment'></div>亲爱尽在左右者耶。所以如此云云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370602_comment'></div>以为足下贤者。宜在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>上位</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370602_comment'></div>托于幕府。则不为得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370602_comment'></div>是以及之。乃相亲重之道耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370602_comment'></div>非所以待足下者也。仆自少至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370602_comment'></div>从事于往还朋友閒。一十七年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370602_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>日月</span>不为不久。所与交往相识者千百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370602_comment'></div>人非不多。其相与如骨肉兄弟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370602_comment'></div>亦且不少。或以事同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370602_comment'></div>或以艺取。或慕其一善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370602_comment'></div>或以其久故。或初不甚知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370602_comment'></div>而与之已密。其后无大恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370602_comment'></div>因不复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>决舍</span>。或其人虽不皆入于善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370602_comment'></div>而于已已厚。虽欲悔之不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370602_comment'></div>凡诸浅者固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>不足道</span>。深者止如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370602_comment'></div>至于心所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>仰服</span>。考之言行而无瑕尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370602_comment'></div>窥之阃奥而不见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>畛域</span>。明白<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>淳粹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370602_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>辉光日新</span>者。惟吾崔君一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370602_comment'></div>仆愚陋无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>知晓</span>。然圣人之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370602_comment'></div>无所不读。其精粗巨细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370602_comment'></div>出入明晦。虽不尽识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370602_comment'></div>抑不可谓不涉其流者也。以此而推之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370602_comment'></div>以此而度之。诚知足下出群拔萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370602_comment'></div>无谓仆何从而得之也。与足下情义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370602_comment'></div>宁须言而后自明耶。所以言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370602_comment'></div>惧足下以为吾所与深者。多不置白黑于胸中耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370602_comment'></div>既谓能粗知足下。而复惧足下之不我知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370602_comment'></div>亦过也。比亦有人说足下诚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>尽善尽美</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370602_comment'></div>抑犹有可疑者。仆谓之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370602_comment'></div>何疑。疑者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370602_comment'></div>君子当有所好恶。好恶不可不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370602_comment'></div>如清河者。人无贤愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370602_comment'></div>无不说其善。服其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370602_comment'></div>以是而疑之耳。仆应之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370602_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>凤凰</span>芝草。贤愚皆以为美瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370602_comment'></div>青天白日。奴隶亦知其清明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370602_comment'></div>譬之食物。至于遐方异味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370602_comment'></div>则有嗜者。有不嗜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370602_comment'></div>至于稻也粱也。脍也𮌉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370602_comment'></div>岂闻有不嗜者哉。疑者乃解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370602_comment'></div>解不解。于吾崔君无所损益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370602_comment'></div>自古贤者少。不肖者多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370602_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>省事</span>以来。又见贤者恒不遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370602_comment'></div>不贤者比肩青紫。贤者恒无以自存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370602_comment'></div>不贤者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>志满气得</span>。贤者虽得卑位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370602_comment'></div>则旋而死。不贤者或至眉寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370602_comment'></div>不知造物者意竟如何。无乃所好恶与人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>异心</span>哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370602_comment'></div>又不知无乃都不省记。任其死生寿夭耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370602_comment'></div>未可知也。人固有薄卿相之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370602_comment'></div>千乘之位。而甘陋巷菜羹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370602_comment'></div>同是人也。犹有好恶如此之异者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370602_comment'></div>况天之与人。当必异其所好恶无疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370602_comment'></div>合于天而乖于人何害。况又时有兼得者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370602_comment'></div>崔君崔君。无怠无怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370602_comment'></div>仆无以自全活者。从一官于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370602_comment'></div>转困穷甚。思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>自放</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/139/Comments/1")'>伊颍</span>之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370602_comment'></div>当亦终得之。近者尤衰惫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370602_comment'></div>左车第二牙无故摇动脱去。目视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>昏花</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370602_comment'></div>寻常閒便不分人颜色。两鬓半白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370602_comment'></div>头发五分亦白其一。须亦有一茎两茎白者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370602_comment'></div>仆家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>不幸</span>。诸父诸兄皆康彊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370602", 1370602, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>早世</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370602_comment'></div>如仆者。又可以图于久长哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370602_comment'></div>以此匆匆。思与足下相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370602_comment'></div>一道其怀。小儿女满前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370602_comment'></div>能不顾念足下何由得归比来。仆不乐江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370602_comment'></div>官满便终老嵩下。足下可相就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370602_comment'></div>仆不可去矣。珍重自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370602_comment'></div>慎饮食。少思虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370602_comment'></div>惟此是望。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370602_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49567_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49567'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49567'>太华峰头<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49567", 49567, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>玉井莲</span>，开花十丈藕如船。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49567_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
