id='poem_sentence_4_49567_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年4月</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。友人独孤申叔去世，作哀辞悼之。与《欧阳生哀辞》前后作。作品：独孤申叔哀辞。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>独孤申叔哀辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370825")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370825'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370825'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370825", 1370825, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>众万</span>之生。谁非天耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370825_comment'></div>明昭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370825", 1370825, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>昏蒙</span>。谁使然耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370825_comment'></div>行何为而怒。居何故而怜耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370825_comment'></div>胡喜厚其所可薄。而恒不足于贤耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370825_comment'></div>将下民之好恶。与彼苍悬耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370825_comment'></div>抑苍茫无端。而暂寓其閒耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370825_comment'></div>死者无知。吾为子痛而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370825_comment'></div>如有知也。子其自知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370825_comment'></div>濯濯其英。煜煜其光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370825_comment'></div>如闻其声。如见其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370825_comment'></div>乌虖远矣。何日而忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370825_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1370825_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年4月</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。欧阳詹去世后，韩愈作哀辞悼念之。作品：欧阳生哀辞。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370823?labeling=true' target='_blank'>欧阳生哀辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370823")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370823'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370823'>欧阳詹世居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>闽越</span>。自詹已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370823_comment'></div>皆为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>闽越</span>官。至州佐县令者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370823_comment'></div>累累有焉。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>闽越</span>地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>肥衍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370823_comment'></div>有山泉禽鱼之乐。虽有长材<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>秀民</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370823_comment'></div>通文书吏事。与上国齿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370823_comment'></div>未尝肯出仕。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>今上</span>初故宰相常衮为福建诸州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>观察使</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370823_comment'></div>治其地。衮以文辞进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370823_comment'></div>有名于时。又作大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370823_comment'></div>临莅其民。乡县小民有能诵书作文辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370823_comment'></div>衮亲与之为客主之礼。观游宴飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370823_comment'></div>必召与之时。未几皆化翕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370823_comment'></div>詹于时独秀出。衮加敬爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370823_comment'></div>诸生皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>推服</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>闽越</span>之人举进士繇詹始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370823_comment'></div>建中贞元閒。予就食江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370823_comment'></div>未接人事。往往闻詹名闾巷閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370823_comment'></div>詹之称于江南也久。贞元三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370823_comment'></div>予始至京师举进士。闻詹名尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370823_comment'></div>八年春。遂与詹文辞同考试登第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370823_comment'></div>始相识。自后詹归闽中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370823_comment'></div>予或在京师他处。不见詹久者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370823_comment'></div>惟詹归闽中时为然。其他时与詹离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370823_comment'></div>率不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>历岁</span>。移时则必合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370823_comment'></div>合必两忘其所趋。久然后去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370823_comment'></div>故予与詹相知为深。詹事父母尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>孝道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370823_comment'></div>仁于妻子。于朋友义以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370823_comment'></div>气醇以方。容貌嶷嶷然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370823_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>燕私</span>善谑以和。其文章切深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370823_comment'></div>喜往复。善自道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370823_comment'></div>读其书。知其于慈孝最隆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370823_comment'></div>十五年冬。予以徐州从事朝正于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370823_comment'></div>詹为国子监四门助教。将率其徒伏阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370823_comment'></div>举予为博士。会监有狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370823_comment'></div>不果上。观其心有益于予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370823_comment'></div>将忘其身之贱而为之也。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370823_comment'></div>詹今其死矣。詹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>闽越</span>人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370823_comment'></div>父母老矣。舍朝夕之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370823_comment'></div>以来京师。其心将以有得于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370823_comment'></div>而归为父母荣也。虽其父母之心亦皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370823_comment'></div>詹在侧。虽无离忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370823_comment'></div>其志不乐也。詹在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370823_comment'></div>虽有离忧。其志乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370823_comment'></div>若詹者。所谓以志养志者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370823_comment'></div>詹虽未得位。其名声流于人人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370823_comment'></div>其德行信于朋友。虽詹与其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370823_comment'></div>皆可无憾也。詹之事业文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370823_comment'></div>李翱既为之传。故作哀辞以舒予哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370823_comment'></div>以传于后。以遗其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370823_comment'></div>而解其悲哀。以卒詹志云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370823_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1370823'>求仕与友兮。远违其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370823_comment'></div>父母之命兮。子奉以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370823_comment'></div>友则既获兮。禄实不丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370823_comment'></div>以志为养兮。何有牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370823_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370823", 1370823, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>事实</span>既修兮。名誉又光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370823_comment'></div>父母忻忻兮。常若在旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370823_comment'></div>命虽云短兮。其存者长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370823_comment'></div>终要必死兮。愿不永伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370823_comment'></div>朋友亲视兮。药物甚良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370823_comment'></div>饮食孔时兮。所欲无妨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370823_comment'></div>寿命不齐兮。人道之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370823_comment'></div>在侧与远兮。非有不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370823_comment'></div>山川阻深兮。魂魄流行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370823_comment'></div>祭祀则及兮。勿谓不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370823_comment'></div>哭泣无益兮。抑哀自彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370823_comment'></div>推生知死兮。以慰孝诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370823_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉兮。是亦难忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370823_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1370823_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年4月</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。题词于《欧阳生哀辞》之后，谈及对古文看法。作品：题哀辞后。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370824' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370824' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题哀辞后</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370824")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370824'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370824'>愈性不喜书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370824_comment'></div>自为此文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370824_comment'></div>惟自书两通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370824_comment'></div>其一通遗清河崔群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370824_comment'></div>群与予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370824_comment'></div>皆欧阳生友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370824_comment'></div>哀生之不得位而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370824_comment'></div>哭之过时而悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370824_comment'></div>其一通今书以遗彭城刘君伉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370824_comment'></div>君喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370824", 1370824, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>古文</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370824_comment'></div>以吾所为合于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370824_comment'></div>诣吾庐而来请者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370824_comment'></div>八九至而其色不怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370824_comment'></div>志益坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370824_comment'></div>凡愈之为此文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370824_comment'></div>盖哀欧阳生之不显荣于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370824_comment'></div>又惧其泯灭于后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370824_comment'></div>今刘君之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370824_comment'></div>未必知欧阳生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370824_comment'></div>其志在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370824", 1370824, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>古文</span>耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370824_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370824_comment'></div>愈之为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370824", 1370824, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>古文</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370824_comment'></div>岂独取其句读不类于今者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370824_comment'></div>思古人而不得见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370824_comment'></div>学古道则欲兼通其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370824_comment'></div>通其辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370824_comment'></div>本志乎古道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370824_comment'></div>古之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370824_comment'></div>不苟誉毁于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370824_comment'></div>刘君好其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370824_comment'></div>则其知欧阳生也无惑焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1370824_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年7月</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。马燧长子马汇卒，其弟马畅请求追赠其为绛州刺史，并请韩愈撰写行状。作品：唐故绛州刺史马府君行状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷27。）</span><div id='poem_1370818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故赠绛州刺史马府君行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370818")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370818'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370818'>君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370818_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370818_comment'></div>其先为嬴姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370818_comment'></div>当周之衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370818_comment'></div>处晋为赵氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370818_comment'></div>晋亡而赵氏为诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370818_comment'></div>其后益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370818_comment'></div>与齐楚韩魏燕为六国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370818_comment'></div>俱称王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370818_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>别子</span>赵奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370818_comment'></div>当赵时破秦军阏与有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370818_comment'></div>号马服君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370818_comment'></div>子孙由是以马为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370818_comment'></div>梁有安州刺史侍中赠太尉岫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370818_comment'></div>岫生乔卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370818_comment'></div>任襄州主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370818_comment'></div>国乱去官不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370818_comment'></div>乔卿生君才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370818_comment'></div>隋末为蓟令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370818_comment'></div>燕王艺师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370818_comment'></div>以有幽都之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370818_comment'></div>武德初朝京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370818_comment'></div>拜武侯大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370818_comment'></div>封南阳郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370818_comment'></div>卒葬大梁新里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370818_comment'></div>赵郡李华刻碑颂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370818_comment'></div>君才生珉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370818_comment'></div>为玉钤卫仓曹参军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370818_comment'></div>赠尚书左仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370818_comment'></div>生季龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370818_comment'></div>为岚州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370818_comment'></div>赠司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370818_comment'></div>清河崔元翰铭其德于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370818_comment'></div>在新里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370818_comment'></div>司空生燧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370818_comment'></div>为司徒侍中北平王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370818_comment'></div>赠太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370818_comment'></div>谥庄武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370818_comment'></div>庄武之勋劳在策书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370818_comment'></div>君其长子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370818_comment'></div>少举明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370818_comment'></div>司徒公作藩太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370818_comment'></div>授河南府参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370818_comment'></div>建中四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370818_comment'></div>司徒公使将武人子弟才力之士三百人朝行在捍卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370818_comment'></div>献御服用物弓甲煮器<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>幄幕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370818_comment'></div>奔走危难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370818_comment'></div>上嘉其勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370818_comment'></div>超拜太常丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370818_comment'></div>赐章服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370818_comment'></div>迁少府少监太仆少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370818_comment'></div>司徒公之薨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370818_comment'></div>刺臂出血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370818_comment'></div>书佛经千馀言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370818_comment'></div>期以报德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370818_comment'></div>庐墓侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370818_comment'></div>植松柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370818_comment'></div>终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370818_comment'></div>又拜太仆少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370818_comment'></div>疾病一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370818_comment'></div>贞元十八年七月二十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370818_comment'></div>终于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370818_comment'></div>凡年四十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370818_comment'></div>其弟少府监畅上印绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370818_comment'></div>求<span id='poem_sentence_65_1370818_comment'></div>布帛百匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370818_comment'></div>君在家行孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370818_comment'></div>待宾客朋友有<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370818_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>居丧</span>有过人行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370818_comment'></div>初司徒公娶河南元氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370818_comment'></div>封颍川郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370818_comment'></div>赠许国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370818_comment'></div>许国薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370818_comment'></div>少府始孩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370818_comment'></div>顾托以其侄为继室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370818_comment'></div>是为陈国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370818_comment'></div>陈国无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370818_comment'></div>爱君与少府如己生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370818_comment'></div>其薨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370818_comment'></div>君与少府丧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370818_comment'></div>犹实生己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370818_comment'></div>亲负土封其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370818_comment'></div>夫人荥阳郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370818_comment'></div>王屋县令况之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370818_comment'></div>有贤行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370818_comment'></div>侍君疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370818_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>逾年</span>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/89/Comments/1")'>下堂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370818_comment'></div>食菜饮水药物必自择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370818_comment'></div>将进辄先尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370818_comment'></div>方书本草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370818_comment'></div>恒置左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370818_comment'></div>子男二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370818_comment'></div>赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370818_comment'></div>前左卫仓曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370818_comment'></div>扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370818_comment'></div>右清道率府冑曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370818_comment'></div>女子二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370818_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_100_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>在室</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370818_comment'></div>虽皆幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370818_comment'></div>侍疾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>居丧</span>如成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370818_comment'></div>愈既世通家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370818_comment'></div>详闻其世系事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370818_comment'></div>今葬有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1370818", 1370818, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>期日</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370818_comment'></div>从少府请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370818_comment'></div>掇其大者为行状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370818_comment'></div>托立言之君子而图其不朽焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_108_1370818_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。寄书工部尚书、山南东道节度使（驻襄阳）于頔，有自荐求官之意。作品：与于襄阳书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370601' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370601' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370601?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与于襄阳书</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370601")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370601_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370601'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370601'>七月三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370601_comment'></div>将仕郎守国子四门博士韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370601_comment'></div>谨奉书尚书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>閤下</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370601_comment'></div>士之能享<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>大名</span>显当世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370601_comment'></div>莫不有先达之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370601_comment'></div>负天下之望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370601_comment'></div>为之前焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370601_comment'></div>士之能垂休光照后世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370601_comment'></div>亦莫不有后进之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370601_comment'></div>负天下之望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370601_comment'></div>为之后焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370601_comment'></div>莫为之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370601_comment'></div>虽美而不彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370601_comment'></div>莫为之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370601_comment'></div>虽盛而不传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370601_comment'></div>是二人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370601_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>未始</span>不相须也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370601_comment'></div>然而千百载乃一相遇焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370601_comment'></div>岂上之人无可援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370601_comment'></div>下之人无可推欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370601_comment'></div>何其相须之殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370601_comment'></div>而相遇之疏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370601_comment'></div>其故在下之人负其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370601_comment'></div>不肯谄其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370601_comment'></div>上之人负其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370601_comment'></div>不肯顾其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370601_comment'></div>故高材多戚戚之穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370601_comment'></div>盛位无赫赫之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370601_comment'></div>是二人者之所为皆过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370601_comment'></div>未尝干之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370601_comment'></div>不可谓上无其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370601_comment'></div>未尝求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370601_comment'></div>不可谓下无其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370601_comment'></div>愈之诵此言久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370601_comment'></div>未尝敢以闻于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370601_comment'></div>侧闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>閤下</span>抱不世之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370601_comment'></div>特立而独行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370601_comment'></div>道方而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>事实</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370601_comment'></div>卷舒不随乎时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370601_comment'></div>文武唯其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>所用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370601_comment'></div>岂愈所谓其人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370601_comment'></div>抑未闻后进之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370601_comment'></div>有遇知于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370601_comment'></div>获礼于门下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370601_comment'></div>岂求之而未得耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370601_comment'></div>将志存乎立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370601_comment'></div>而事专乎报主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370601_comment'></div>虽遇其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370601_comment'></div>未暇礼耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370601_comment'></div>何其宜闻而久不闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370601_comment'></div>愈虽不才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370601_comment'></div>其自处不敢后于恒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370601_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>閤下</span>将求之而未得欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370601_comment'></div>古人有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370601_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>请自隗始</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370601_comment'></div>愈今者惟朝夕刍米<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>仆赁</span>之资是急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370601_comment'></div>不过费<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370601", 1370601, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>閤下</span>一朝之享而足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370601_comment'></div>如曰吾志存乎立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370601_comment'></div>而事专乎报主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370601_comment'></div>虽遇其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370601_comment'></div>未暇礼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370601_comment'></div>则非愈之所敢知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370601_comment'></div>世之龊龊者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370601_comment'></div>既不足以语之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370601_comment'></div>磊落奇伟之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370601_comment'></div>又不能听焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370601_comment'></div>则信乎命之穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370601_comment'></div>谨献旧所为文一十八首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370601_comment'></div>如赐观览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370601_comment'></div>亦足知其志之所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370601_comment'></div>愈恐惧再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1370601_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。答复门弟子胡生直均，为之作书。作品：答胡生书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370600' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370600' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370600?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答胡生书</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370600")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370600_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370600'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370600'>愈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370600", 1370600, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>顿首</span>。胡生秀才足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370600_comment'></div>雨不止。薪刍价益高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370600_comment'></div>生远客。怀道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370600", 1370600, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>守义</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370600_comment'></div>非其人不交。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370600", 1370600, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>得无</span>病乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370600_comment'></div>斯须不展。思想无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370600_comment'></div>愈不善自谋。口多而食寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370600_comment'></div>然犹月有所入。以愈之不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370600_comment'></div>知生之穷也。至于是而不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370600_comment'></div>非信道笃者。其谁能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370600_comment'></div>所示千百言。略不及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370600_comment'></div>而以不屡相见为忧。谢相知为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370600_comment'></div>谋道不谋食。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370600", 1370600, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>乐以忘忧</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370600_comment'></div>生之谓矣。顾无以当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370600_comment'></div>如何。夫别是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370600_comment'></div>分贤与不肖。公卿贵位者之任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370600_comment'></div>愈不敢有意于是。如生之徒于我厚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370600_comment'></div>知其贤。时或道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370600_comment'></div>于生未有益也。不知者乃用是为谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370600_comment'></div>不敢自爱。惧生之无益而有伤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370600_comment'></div>如之何。若曰彼有所合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370600_comment'></div>吾不利其求。则庶可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370600_comment'></div>生又离乡邑。去亲爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370600_comment'></div>甘辛苦而不厌者。本非为是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370600_comment'></div>如之何。愈之于生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370600_comment'></div>既不变矣。戒生无以示愈者语于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370600_comment'></div>用息不知者之谤。生慎从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370600_comment'></div>讲礼释友二篇。比旧尤佳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370600_comment'></div>志深而喻切。因事以陈辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370600_comment'></div>古之作者正如是尔。愈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370600", 1370600, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>顿首</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370600_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1370600_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。答李师锡秀才，有书信，并借之怀念好友李观。作品：答李秀才书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370596' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370596' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370596?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李秀才书</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370596")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370596_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370596'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370596'>愈白。故友李观元宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370596_comment'></div>十年之前。示愈别<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370596", 1370596, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>吴中</span>故人诗六章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370596_comment'></div>其首章则吾子也。盛有所称引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370596_comment'></div>元宾行峻洁清。其中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370596", 1370596, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>狭隘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370596_comment'></div>不能包容。于寻常人不肯苟有论说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370596_comment'></div>因究其所以。于是知吾子非庸众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370596_comment'></div>时吾子在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370596", 1370596, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>吴中</span>。其后愈出在外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370596_comment'></div>无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370596", 1370596, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>因缘</span>相见。元宾既没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370596_comment'></div>其文益可贵重。思元宾而不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370596_comment'></div>见元宾之所与者。则如元宾焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370596_comment'></div>今者辱惠书及文章。观其姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370596_comment'></div>元宾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370596", 1370596, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>声容</span>。恍若相接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370596_comment'></div>读其文辞。见元宾之知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370596_comment'></div>交道之不污。甚矣子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370596_comment'></div>有似于吾元宾也。子之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370596_comment'></div>以愈所为不违孔子。不以雕琢为工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370596_comment'></div>将相从于此。愈敢自爱其道而以辞让为事乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370596_comment'></div>然愈之所志于古者。不惟其辞之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370596_comment'></div>好其道焉尔。读吾子之辞而得其所用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370596_comment'></div>将复有深于是者与。吾子乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370596_comment'></div>况其外之文乎。愈顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370596_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1370596_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。太学博士施士丐卒，韩愈受请为之作墓志铭。作品：施先生墓铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370814' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370814' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370814?labeling=true' target='_blank'>施先生墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370814")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370814_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370814'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370814'>贞元十八年十月十一日。太学博士施先生士丐卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370814_comment'></div>其寮太原郭伉买石志其墓。昌黎韩愈为之辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370814_comment'></div>先生明毛郑诗。通春秋左氏传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370814_comment'></div>善讲说。朝之贤士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370814_comment'></div>从而执经考疑者继于门。太学生习毛郑诗春秋左氏传者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370814_comment'></div>皆其弟子。贵游之子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370814_comment'></div>时先生之说二经。来太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370814_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>帖帖</span>坐诸生下。恐不卒得闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370814_comment'></div>先生死。二经生丧其师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370814_comment'></div>仕于学者亡其朋。故自贤士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370814_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>老师</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>宿儒</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>新进</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>小生</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370814_comment'></div>闻先生之死。哭泣相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370814_comment'></div>归衣服货财。先生年六十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370814_comment'></div>在太学者十九年。由四门助教为太学助教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370814_comment'></div>由助教为博士。太学秩满当去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370814_comment'></div>诸生辄拜疏乞留。或留或迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370814_comment'></div>凡十九年不离太学。祖曰旭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370814_comment'></div>袁州宜春尉。父曰婼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370814_comment'></div>豪州定远丞。妻曰太原王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370814_comment'></div>先先生卒。子曰友直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370814_comment'></div>明州鄮县主簿。曰友谅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370814_comment'></div>太庙斋郎。系曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370814_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1370814'>先生之祖。氏自施父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370814_comment'></div>其后施常。事孔子以彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370814_comment'></div>雠为博士。延为太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370814_comment'></div>太尉之孙。始为吴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370814_comment'></div>曰然曰续。亦载其迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370814_comment'></div>先生之兴。公车是召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370814_comment'></div>纂序前闻。于光有曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370814_comment'></div>古圣人言。其旨密微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370814_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>笺注</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/60/Comments/1")'>纷罗</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>颠倒是非</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370814_comment'></div>闻先生讲论。如客得归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370814_comment'></div>卑让<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370814", 1370814, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>肫肫</span>。出言孔扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370814_comment'></div>今其死矣。谁嗣为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370814_comment'></div>县曰万年。原曰神禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370814_comment'></div>高四尺者。先生墓耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370814_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370814_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。董邵南应举不第，去游河北，韩愈作序送之。作品：送董邵南序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。张元和二年，241。）</span><div id='poem_1370645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370645' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370645?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送董邵南序</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370645")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370645'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370645'>燕赵古称多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370645", 1370645, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>感慨</span>悲歌之士。董生举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370645_comment'></div>连不得志于有司。怀抱利器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370645_comment'></div>郁郁适兹土。吾知其必有合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370645_comment'></div>董生勉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370645", 1370645, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>乎哉</span>。夫以子之不遇时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370645_comment'></div>苟慕义彊仁者。皆爱惜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370645_comment'></div>矧燕赵之士出乎其性者哉。然吾尝闻风俗与化<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370645", 1370645, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>移易</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370645_comment'></div>吾恶知其今不异于古所云耶。聊以吾子之行卜之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370645_comment'></div>董生勉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370645", 1370645, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>乎哉</span>。吾因子有所感矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370645_comment'></div>为我吊望诸君之墓。而观于其市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370645_comment'></div>复有昔时屠狗者乎。为我谢曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370645_comment'></div>明天子在上。可以出而仕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370645_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1370645_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年1月</a>　一月，在长安任四门博士。好友陆傪去年病卒于赴歙州道上，今年杨凝又卒，韩愈同时哭之。作品：哭杨兵部凝陆歙州参。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_49520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49520?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭杨兵部凝陆歙州参</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49520")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49520_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49520'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49520'>人皆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作生）</span>期七十，才半岂蹉跎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49520'>并<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作数）</span>出知己泪，自然白发多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49520'>晨兴为谁恸，还坐久滂沱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49520'>论文<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作新坟）</span>与晤语<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作宿草）</span>，已矣可<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作两，又作复）</span>如何。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49520'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49520_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　春，在长安任四门博士。僧文畅将东南行，柳宗元先为文畅写序，并介绍与韩愈相识，亦请韩写序为之壮行。作品：送浮屠文畅师序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370648' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370648' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370648?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送浮屠文畅师序</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370648")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370648_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370648'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370648'>人固有儒名而墨行者。问其名则是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370648_comment'></div>校其行则非。可以与之游乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370648_comment'></div>如有墨名而儒行者。问其名则非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370648_comment'></div>校其行而是。可以与之游乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370648_comment'></div>扬子云称在门墙则挥之。在夷狄则进之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370648_comment'></div>吾取以为法焉。浮屠师文畅喜文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370648_comment'></div>其周游天下。凡有行必请于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>搢绅先生</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370648_comment'></div>以求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>咏歌</span>其所志。贞元十九年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370648_comment'></div>将行东南。柳君宗元为之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370648_comment'></div>解其装。得所得叙诗累百馀篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370648_comment'></div>非至笃好。其何能致多如是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370648_comment'></div>惜其无以圣人之道告之者。而徒举浮屠之说赠焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370648_comment'></div>夫文畅浮屠也。如欲闻浮屠之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370648_comment'></div>当自就其师而问之。何故谒吾徒而来请也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370648_comment'></div>彼见吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>君臣</span>父子之懿。文物<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>事为</span>之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370648_comment'></div>其心有慕焉。拘其法而未能入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370648_comment'></div>故乐闻其说而请之。如吾徒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370648_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>宜当</span>告之以二帝三王之道。日月星辰之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370648_comment'></div>天地之所以著。鬼神之所以幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370648_comment'></div>人物之所以蕃。江河之所以流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370648_comment'></div>而语之。不当又为浮屠之说而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>渎告</span>之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370648_comment'></div>民之初生。固若夷狄禽兽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370648_comment'></div>圣人者立。然后知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>宫居</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>粒食</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370648_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>亲亲</span>而尊尊。生者养而死者藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370648_comment'></div>是故道莫大乎仁义。教莫正乎礼乐刑政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370648_comment'></div>施之于天下。万物得其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370648_comment'></div>措之于其躬。体安而气平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370648_comment'></div>尧以是传之舜。舜以是传之禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370648_comment'></div>禹以是传之汤。汤以是传之文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370648_comment'></div>文武以是传之周公孔子。书之于册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370648_comment'></div>中国之人世守之。今浮屠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370648_comment'></div>孰为而孰传之耶。夫鸟俛而啄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370648_comment'></div>仰而四顾。夫兽深居而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370648_comment'></div>惧物之为己害也。犹且不脱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370648_comment'></div>弱之肉。强之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370648_comment'></div>今我与文畅安居而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>暇食</span>。优游以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370648", 1370648, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>生死</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370648_comment'></div>与禽兽异者。宁可不知其所自耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370648_comment'></div>夫不知者。非其人之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370648_comment'></div>知而不为者。惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370648_comment'></div>悦乎故。不能即乎新者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370648_comment'></div>弱也。知而不以告人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370648_comment'></div>不仁也。告而不以实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370648_comment'></div>不信也。余既重柳请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370648_comment'></div>又嘉浮屠能喜文辞。于是乎言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370648_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1370648_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年3月</a>　三月，在长安任四门博士。禘祫（大祭）争议由来已久，韩愈亦作文抒发己见。作品：禘祫议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_1370574' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370574' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370574?labeling=true' target='_blank'>禘祫议</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370574")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370574_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370574'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370574'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370574_comment'></div>今月十六日敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370574_comment'></div>宜令百寮议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370574_comment'></div>限五日内闻奏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370574_comment'></div>将仕郎守国子监四门博士臣韩愈谨献议曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370574_comment'></div>伏以陛下追孝祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370574_comment'></div>肃敬祀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370574_comment'></div>凡在拟议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370574_comment'></div>不敢自专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370574_comment'></div>聿求厥中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370574_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>延访</span>群下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370574_comment'></div>然而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>礼文</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>繁漫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370574_comment'></div>所执各殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370574_comment'></div>自建中之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370574_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>迄至</span>今岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370574_comment'></div>屡经禘祫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370574_comment'></div>未合适从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370574_comment'></div>臣生遭圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370574_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>涵泳</span>恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370574_comment'></div>虽贱不及议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370574_comment'></div>而志切效忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370574_comment'></div>今辄先举众议之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370574_comment'></div>然后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>申明</span>其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370574_comment'></div>一曰献懿庙主宜永藏之夹室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370574_comment'></div>臣以为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370574_comment'></div>夫祫者合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370574_comment'></div>毁庙之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370574_comment'></div>皆当合食于太祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370574_comment'></div>献懿二祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370574_comment'></div>即毁庙主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370574_comment'></div>今虽藏于夹室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370574_comment'></div>至禘祫之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370574_comment'></div>岂得不食于太庙乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370574_comment'></div>名曰合祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370574_comment'></div>而二祖不得祭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370574_comment'></div>不可谓之合矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370574_comment'></div>二曰献懿庙主宜毁之瘗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370574_comment'></div>臣又以为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370574_comment'></div>谨按礼记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370574_comment'></div>天子立七庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370574_comment'></div>一坛一墠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370574_comment'></div>其毁庙之主皆藏于祧庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370574_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>百代</span>不毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370574_comment'></div>祫则陈于太庙而飨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370574_comment'></div>自魏晋已降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370574_comment'></div>始有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>毁瘗</span>之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370574_comment'></div>事非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>经据</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370574_comment'></div>竟不可施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370574_comment'></div>今国家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>德厚流光</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370574_comment'></div>创立九庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370574_comment'></div>以周制推之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370574_comment'></div>献懿二祖犹在坛墠之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370574_comment'></div>况于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>毁瘗</span>而不禘祫乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370574_comment'></div>三曰献懿庙主宜各迁于其陵所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370574_comment'></div>臣又以为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370574_comment'></div>二祖之祭于京师列于太庙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370574_comment'></div>二百年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370574_comment'></div>今一朝迁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370574_comment'></div>岂惟人听疑惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370574_comment'></div>抑恐二祖之灵眷顾依迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370574_comment'></div>不即飨于下国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370574_comment'></div>四曰献懿庙主宜附于兴圣庙而不禘祫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370574_comment'></div>臣又以为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370574_comment'></div>传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370574_comment'></div>祭如在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370574_comment'></div>景皇帝虽太祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370574_comment'></div>其于属乃献懿之子孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370574_comment'></div>今欲正其子东向之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370574_comment'></div>废其父之大祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370574_comment'></div>固不可为典矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370574_comment'></div>五曰献懿二祖宜别立庙于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370574_comment'></div>臣又以为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370574_comment'></div>夫礼有所降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370574_comment'></div>情有所杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370574_comment'></div>是故去庙为祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370574_comment'></div>去祧为坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370574_comment'></div>去坛为墠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370574_comment'></div>去墠为鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370574_comment'></div>渐而之远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370574_comment'></div>其祭益稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370574_comment'></div>昔者鲁立炀宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370574_comment'></div>春秋非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370574_comment'></div>以为不当取已毁之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370574_comment'></div>既藏之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370574_comment'></div>而复筑宫以祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370574_comment'></div>今之所议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370574_comment'></div>与此正同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370574_comment'></div>又虽违礼立庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370574_comment'></div>至于禘祫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370574_comment'></div>合食则禘无其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370574_comment'></div>废祭则于义不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370574_comment'></div>此五说者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370574_comment'></div>皆所不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370574_comment'></div>故臣博采前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370574_comment'></div>求其折中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370574_comment'></div>以为殷祖元王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370574_comment'></div>周祖后稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370574_comment'></div>太祖之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370574_comment'></div>皆自为帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370574_comment'></div>又其代数已远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370574_comment'></div>不复祭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370574_comment'></div>故太祖得正东向之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370574_comment'></div>子孙从昭穆之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370574_comment'></div>礼所称者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370574_comment'></div>盖以纪一时之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370574_comment'></div>非传于后代之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370574_comment'></div>传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370574_comment'></div>子虽齐圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370574_comment'></div>不先父食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370574_comment'></div>盖言子为父屈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370574_comment'></div>景皇帝虽太祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370574_comment'></div>其于献懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370574_comment'></div>则子孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370574_comment'></div>当禘祫之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370574_comment'></div>献祖宜居东向之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370574_comment'></div>景皇帝宜从昭穆之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370574_comment'></div>祖以孙尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370574_comment'></div>孙以祖屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370574_comment'></div>求之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1370574", 1370574,
