id='poem_sentence_120_1370574_comment'></div>合祭甚寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370574_comment'></div>则是太祖所屈之祭至少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370574_comment'></div>所伸之祭至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370574_comment'></div>比于伸孙之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370574_comment'></div>废祖之祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370574_comment'></div>不亦顺乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370574_comment'></div>事异殷周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370574_comment'></div>礼从而变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370574_comment'></div>非所失礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370574_comment'></div>臣伏以制礼作乐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370574_comment'></div>天子之职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370574_comment'></div>陛下以臣议有可采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370574_comment'></div>粗合天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370574_comment'></div>断而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370574_comment'></div>是则为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370574_comment'></div>如以为犹或可疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370574_comment'></div>乞召臣对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370574_comment'></div>面陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1370574", 1370574, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>得失</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370574_comment'></div>庶有发明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370574_comment'></div>谨议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_140_1370574_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　春，在长安任四门博士。送太学生何坚，作序文。作品：送何坚序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370650' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370650' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370650?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送何坚序</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370650")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370650_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370650'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370650'>何与韩同姓为近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370650_comment'></div>坚以进士举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370650_comment'></div>于吾为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370650", 1370650, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>同业</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370650_comment'></div>其在太学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370650_comment'></div>吾为博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370650_comment'></div>坚为生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370650_comment'></div>生博士为同道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370650_comment'></div>其识坚也十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370650_comment'></div>为故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370650_comment'></div>同姓而近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370650_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370650", 1370650, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>同业</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370650_comment'></div>同道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370650_comment'></div>故人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370650_comment'></div>于其不得愿而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370650_comment'></div>其可以无言耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370650_comment'></div>坚道州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370650_comment'></div>道之守阳公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370650_comment'></div>贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370650_comment'></div>道于湖南为属州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370650_comment'></div>湖南杨公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370650_comment'></div>又贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370650_comment'></div>坚为民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370650_comment'></div>坚又贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370650_comment'></div>湖南得道为属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370650_comment'></div>道得坚为民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370650_comment'></div>坚归倡其州之父老<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370650", 1370650, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>子弟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370650_comment'></div>服阳公之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370650_comment'></div>道亦倡其县与其比州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370650_comment'></div>服杨公之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370650_comment'></div>吾闻鸟有凤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370650_comment'></div>恒出于有道之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370650_comment'></div>当汉时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370650_comment'></div>黄霸为颍川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370650_comment'></div>是鸟实集而鸣焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370650_comment'></div>若史可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370650_comment'></div>坚归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370650_comment'></div>吾将贺其见凤而闻其鸣也已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370650_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　春，在长安任四门博士。送太学生牛堪（时已明经及第），作序文。作品：送牛堪序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370644' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370644' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370644?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送牛堪序</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370644")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370644_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370644'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370644'>以明经举者。诵数十万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370644_comment'></div>又约通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370644", 1370644, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>大义</span>。徵辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370644", 1370644, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>引类</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370644_comment'></div>旁出入他经者。又诵数十万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370644_comment'></div>其为业也勤矣。登第于有司者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370644_comment'></div>去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370644", 1370644, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>民亩</span>而就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370644", 1370644, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>吏禄</span>。由是进而累为卿相者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370644_comment'></div>常常有之。其为获也亦大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370644_comment'></div>然吾未尝闻有登第于有司。而进谢于其门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370644_comment'></div>岂有司之待之也。抑以公不以情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370644_comment'></div>举者之望于有司也。亦将然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370644_comment'></div>其进而谢于其门也。则为私乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370644_comment'></div>抑无乃人事之未思。或者不能举其礼乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370644_comment'></div>若牛堪者。思虑足以及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370644_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370644", 1370644, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>材质</span>足以行之。而又不闻其往者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370644_comment'></div>其将有以哉。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370644", 1370644, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>违众</span>而求识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370644_comment'></div>立奇而取名。非堪心之所存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370644_comment'></div>由是而观之。若堪之用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370644_comment'></div>其至于大官也。不为幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370644_comment'></div>堪太学生也。余博士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370644_comment'></div>博士师属也。于其登第而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370644_comment'></div>将荣于其乡也。能无说乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370644_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1370644_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　春，在长安任四门博士。送太学生陈密，作序文。作品：送陈密序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370642' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370642' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370642?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送陈密序</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370642")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370642_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370642'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370642'>太学生陈密请于余曰。密承训于先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370642_comment'></div>今将归觐其亲。不得朝夕见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370642_comment'></div>愿先生赐之言。密将以为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370642_comment'></div>密来太学举明经。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370642", 1370642, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>累年</span>不获选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370642_comment'></div>是弗利于是科也。今将易其业而三礼是习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370642_comment'></div>愿先生之张之也。密将以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370642", 1370642, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>乡荣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370642_comment'></div>余愧乎其言。遗之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370642_comment'></div>子之业信习矣。其容信合于礼矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370642_comment'></div>抑吾所见者外也。夫外不足以信内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370642_comment'></div>子诵其文则思其义。习其仪则行其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370642_comment'></div>则将谓子君子也。爵禄之来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370642_comment'></div>不可辞矣。科宁有利不利耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370642_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370642_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。许志雍将赴郢州任刺史，属山南节度使于頔节制，于敛民方急，韩愈写序以规之。作品：送许郢州序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370639' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370639' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370639?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送许郢州序</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370639")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370639_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370639'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370639'>愈尝以书自通于于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370639_comment'></div>累数百言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370639_comment'></div>其大要言先达之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370639_comment'></div>得人而托之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370639_comment'></div>则道德彰而名问流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370639_comment'></div>后进之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370639_comment'></div>得人而托之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370639_comment'></div>则事业显而爵位通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370639_comment'></div>下有矜乎能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370639_comment'></div>上有矜乎位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370639_comment'></div>虽恒相求而喜不相遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370639_comment'></div>于公不以其言为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370639_comment'></div>复书曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370639_comment'></div>足下之言是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370639_comment'></div>于公身居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370639", 1370639, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>方伯</span>之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370639_comment'></div>蓄不世之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370639_comment'></div>而能与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370639", 1370639, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>卑鄙</span>庸陋相应答如影响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370639_comment'></div>是非忠乎君而乐乎善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370639_comment'></div>以国家之务为己任者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370639_comment'></div>愈虽不敢私其大恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370639_comment'></div>抑不可不谓之知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370639_comment'></div>恒矜而诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370639_comment'></div>情已至而事不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370639_comment'></div>小人之所不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370639_comment'></div>故于使君之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370639_comment'></div>道剌史之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370639_comment'></div>以为于公赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370639_comment'></div>凡天下之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370639_comment'></div>成于自同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370639_comment'></div>而败于自异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370639_comment'></div>为刺史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370639_comment'></div>恒私于其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370639_comment'></div>不以实应乎府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370639_comment'></div>为观察使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370639_comment'></div>恒急于其赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370639_comment'></div>不以情信乎州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370639_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370639", 1370639, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>繇是</span>刺史不安其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370639_comment'></div>观察使不得其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370639_comment'></div>财已竭而敛不休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370639_comment'></div>人已穷而赋愈急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370639_comment'></div>其不去为盗也亦幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370639_comment'></div>诚使刺史不私于其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370639_comment'></div>观察使不急于其赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370639_comment'></div>刺史曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370639_comment'></div>吾州之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370639_comment'></div>天下之民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370639_comment'></div>惠不可以独厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370639_comment'></div>观察使亦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370639_comment'></div>某州之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370639_comment'></div>天下之民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370639_comment'></div>敛不可以独急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370639_comment'></div>如是而政不均令不行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370639_comment'></div>未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370639_comment'></div>其前之言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370639_comment'></div>于公既已信而行之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370639_comment'></div>今之言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370639_comment'></div>其有不信乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370639_comment'></div>县之于州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370639_comment'></div>犹州之于府也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370639_comment'></div>有以事乎上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370639_comment'></div>有以临乎下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370639_comment'></div>同则成异则败者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370639_comment'></div>皆然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370639_comment'></div>非使君之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370639_comment'></div>其谁能信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370639_comment'></div>愈于使君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370639_comment'></div>非燕游一朝之好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370639_comment'></div>故其赠行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370639_comment'></div>不以颂而以规。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1370639_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。崔氏将赴复州任刺史，属山南节度使于頔节制，韩愈写序以规之。作品：赠崔复州序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370646' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370646?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠崔复州序</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370646")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370646_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370646'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370646'>有地数百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370646_comment'></div>趋走之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370646_comment'></div>自长史司马以下数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370646_comment'></div>其禄足以仁其三族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370646_comment'></div>及其朋友故旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370646_comment'></div>乐乎心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370646_comment'></div>则一境之人喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370646_comment'></div>不乐乎心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370646_comment'></div>则一境之人惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370646_comment'></div>丈夫官至刺史亦荣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370646_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370646_comment'></div>幽远之小民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370646_comment'></div>其足迹未尝至城邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370646_comment'></div>苟有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370646", 1370646, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>不得其所</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370646_comment'></div>能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370646", 1370646, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>自直</span>于乡里之吏者鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370646_comment'></div>况能自辨于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370646", 1370646, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>县吏</span>乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370646_comment'></div>能自辨于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370646", 1370646, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>县吏</span>者鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370646_comment'></div>况能自辨于刺史之庭乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370646_comment'></div>由是刺史有所不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370646_comment'></div>小民有所不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370646_comment'></div>赋有常而民产无恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370646_comment'></div>水旱疠疫之不期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370646_comment'></div>民之丰约悬于州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370646_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370646", 1370646, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>县令</span>不以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370646_comment'></div>连帅不以信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370646_comment'></div>民就穷而敛愈急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370646_comment'></div>吾见刺史之难为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370646_comment'></div>崔君为复州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370646_comment'></div>其连帅则于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370646_comment'></div>崔君之仁足以苏复人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370646_comment'></div>于公之贤足以庸崔君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370646_comment'></div>有刺史之荣而无其难为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370646_comment'></div>将在于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370646_comment'></div>愈常辱于公之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370646_comment'></div>而旧游于崔君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370646_comment'></div>庆复人之将蒙其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370646", 1370646, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>休泽</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370646_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370646", 1370646, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>于是乎</span>言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370646_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年6月25日</a>　六月，在长安。城南四十里有灵母谷，俗呼炭谷，有炭谷湫庙，为祈雨之所。或为因旱赴炭谷祈雨，作诗，兼讽时事。作品：题炭谷湫祠堂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（803年6月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", id='poem_sentence_17_49765_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49765'>龙<span class='inlineComment2'>（宋刻作尨）</span>区雏众碎，付与宿已颁。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49765_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49765'>弃去可奈何，吾其死茅菅。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49765_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_49765'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_49765_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年6月</a>　本年，在长安。题炭谷湫祠后，意犹未尽，又作诗以泄胸中之愤。作品：龙移。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。张永贞元年，208。）</span><div id='poem_49574' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49574' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49574?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙移<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（803年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49574")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49574_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49574_0'>① 此诗谓南山湫也。湫初在平地，一日风雷，移居山上，其山下湫遂化为土，长安人至今谓之乾湫。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49574'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49574'>天昏地黑蛟龙移，雷惊电激雄雌随。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49574'>清泉百丈化为土，鱼鳖枯死吁可悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49574'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49574_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年7月</a>　七月底，在长安任四门博士。侄韩老成去世，作文祭之。作品：祭十二郎文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭十二郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370835")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370835'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370835'>年月日。季父愈闻汝丧之七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370835_comment'></div>乃能衔哀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>致诚</span>。使建中远具时羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370835_comment'></div>告汝十二郎之灵。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370835_comment'></div>吾少孤。及长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370835_comment'></div>不省所怙。惟兄嫂是依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370835_comment'></div>中年兄殁南方。吾与汝俱幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370835_comment'></div>从嫂归葬河阳。既又与汝就食江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370835_comment'></div>零丁孤苦。未尝一日相离也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370835_comment'></div>吾上有三兄。皆不幸早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370835_comment'></div>承先人后者。在孙惟汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370835_comment'></div>在子惟吾。两世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>一身</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370835_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>形单影只</span>。嫂尝抚汝指吾而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370835_comment'></div>韩氏两世。惟此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370835_comment'></div>汝时犹小。当不复记忆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370835_comment'></div>吾时虽能记忆。亦未知其言之悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370835_comment'></div>吾年十九。始来京城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370835_comment'></div>其后四年。而归视汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370835_comment'></div>又四年。吾往河阳省坟墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370835_comment'></div>遇汝从嫂丧来葬。又二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370835_comment'></div>吾佐董丞相于汴州。汝来省吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370835_comment'></div>止一岁。请归取其孥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370835_comment'></div>明年丞相薨。吾去汴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370835_comment'></div>汝不果来。是年吾佐戎徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370835_comment'></div>使取汝者始行。吾又罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370835_comment'></div>汝又不果来。吾念汝从于东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370835_comment'></div>东亦客也。不可以久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370835_comment'></div>图久远者。莫如西归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370835_comment'></div>将成家而致汝。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370835_comment'></div>孰谓汝遽去吾而殁乎。吾与汝俱少年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370835_comment'></div>以为虽暂相别。终当久与相处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370835_comment'></div>故舍汝而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>旅食</span>京师。以求升斗之禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370835_comment'></div>诚知其如此。虽万乘之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>公相</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370835_comment'></div>吾不以一日辍汝而就也。去年孟东野往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370835_comment'></div>吾书与汝曰。吾年未四十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370835_comment'></div>而视茫茫。而发苍苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370835_comment'></div>而齿牙动摇。念诸父与诸兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370835_comment'></div>皆康强而早世。如吾之衰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370835_comment'></div>其能久存乎。吾不可去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370835_comment'></div>汝不肯来。恐旦暮死而汝抱无涯之戚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370835_comment'></div>孰谓少者殁而长者存。强者夭而病者全乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370835_comment'></div>呜呼。其信然邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370835_comment'></div>其梦邪。其传之非其真邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370835_comment'></div>信也。吾兄之盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370835_comment'></div>而夭其嗣乎。汝之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>纯明</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370835_comment'></div>而不克蒙其泽乎。少者彊者而夭殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370835_comment'></div>长者衰者而全存乎。未可以为信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370835_comment'></div>梦也。传之非其真也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370835_comment'></div>东野之书。耿兰之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370835_comment'></div>何为而在吾侧也。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370835_comment'></div>其信然矣。吾兄之盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370835_comment'></div>而夭其嗣矣。汝之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>纯明</span>宜业其家者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370835_comment'></div>而不克蒙其泽矣。所谓天者诚难测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370835_comment'></div>而神者诚难明矣。所谓理者不可推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370835_comment'></div>而寿者不可知矣。虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370835_comment'></div>我自今年来。苍苍者欲化而为白矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370835_comment'></div>动摇者欲脱而落矣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>毛血</span>日益衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370835_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>志气</span>日益微。几何不从汝而死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370835_comment'></div>死而有知。其几何离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370835_comment'></div>其无知。悲不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>几时</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370835_comment'></div>而不悲者无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>穷期</span>矣。汝之子始十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370835_comment'></div>吾之子始五岁。少而强者不可保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370835_comment'></div>如此孩提者。又可冀其成立邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370835_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370835_comment'></div>汝去年书云。比得软脚病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370835_comment'></div>往往而剧。吾曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370835_comment'></div>是病也。江南之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370835_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>常常</span>有之。未始以为忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370835_comment'></div>呜呼。其竟以此而殒其生乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370835_comment'></div>抑别有疾而至斯乎。汝之书六月十七日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370835_comment'></div>东野云。汝殁以六月二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370835_comment'></div>耿兰之报无月日。盖东野之使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370835_comment'></div>不知问家人以月日。如耿兰之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370835_comment'></div>不知当言月日。东野与吾书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370835_comment'></div>乃问使者。使者妄称以应之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370835_comment'></div>其然乎。其不然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370835_comment'></div>今吾使建中祭汝。吊汝之孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370835_comment'></div>与汝之乳母。彼有食可守以待终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370835_comment'></div>则待终丧而取以来。如不能守以终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370835_comment'></div>则遂取以来。其馀奴婢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370835_comment'></div>并令守汝丧。吾力能改葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370835_comment'></div>终葬汝于先人之兆。然后惟其所愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370835_comment'></div>呜呼。汝病吾不知时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370835_comment'></div>汝殁吾不知日。生不能相养于共居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370835_comment'></div>殁不能抚汝以尽哀。敛不凭其棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370835_comment'></div>窆不临其穴。吾行负神明而使汝夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370835_comment'></div>不孝不慈。而不得与汝相养以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370835_comment'></div>相守以死。一在天之涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370835_comment'></div>一在地之角。生而影不与吾形相依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370835_comment'></div>死而魂不与吾梦相接。吾实为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370835_comment'></div>其又何尤。彼苍者天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370835_comment'></div>曷其有极。自今已往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370835_comment'></div>吾其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/182/Comments/0")'>无意</span>于人世矣。当求数顷之田于伊颍之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370835_comment'></div>以待馀年。教吾子与汝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370835_comment'></div>幸其长成。吾女与汝女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370835_comment'></div>待其嫁。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>如此而已</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370835_comment'></div>呜呼。言有穷而情不可终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370835_comment'></div>汝其知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/192/Comments/0")'>也邪</span>。其不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1370835", 1370835, "Clauses/193/Comments/0")'>也邪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370835_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370835_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1370835_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。疑为讥李实等权臣闭塞言路，作文讽喻之。作品：子产不毁乡校颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370506' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370506' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370506?labeling=true' target='_blank'>子产不毁乡校颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370506")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1370506_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370506'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370506'>我思古人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1370506'>伊郑之侨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1370506'>以礼相国。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1370506'>人未安其教。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1370506'>游于乡之校。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1370506'>众口嚣嚣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1370506'>或谓子产。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1370506'>毁乡校则止。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1370506'>曰何患焉。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1370506'>可以成美。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1370506'>夫岂多言。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1370506'>亦各其志。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1370506'>善也吾行。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1370506'>不善吾避。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1370506'>维善维否。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1370506'>我于此视。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1370506'>川不可防。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1370506'>言不可弭。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1370506'>下塞上聋。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1370506'>邦其倾矣。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1370506'>既乡校不毁。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1370506'>而郑国以理。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1370506'>在周之兴。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1370506'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370506", 1370506, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>养老乞言</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1370506'>及其已衰。<div id='poem_sentence_24_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1370506'>谤者使监。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1370506'>成败之迹。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1370506'>昭哉可观。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1370506'>维是子产。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1370506'>执政之式。<div id='poem_sentence_29_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1370506'>维其不遇。<div id='poem_sentence_30_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1370506'>化止一国。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1370506'>诚率是道。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1370506'>相天下君。<div id='poem_sentence_33_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1370506'>交畅旁达。<div id='poem_sentence_34_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1370506'>施及无垠。<div id='poem_sentence_35_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1370506'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370506", 1370506, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>于虖</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_36_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1370506'>四海所以不理。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1370506'>有君无臣。<div id='poem_sentence_38_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1370506'>谁其嗣之。<div id='poem_sentence_39_1370506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1370506'>我思古人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370506_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安任四门博士。反对因天旱而权停举选，作状文。作品：论今年权停举选状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷27。）</span><div id='poem_1370542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论今年权停举选状</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370542")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370542_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370542'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370542'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370542_comment'></div>臣伏见今月十日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370542_comment'></div>今年诸色举选宜权停者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370542_comment'></div>道路相传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370542_comment'></div>皆云以岁之旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370542_comment'></div>陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>怜悯</span>京师之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370542_comment'></div>虑其乏食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370542_comment'></div>故权停举选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370542_comment'></div>以绝其来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370542_comment'></div>所以省费而足食也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370542_comment'></div>臣伏思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370542_comment'></div>窃以为十口之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370542_comment'></div>益之以一二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370542_comment'></div>于食未有所费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370542_comment'></div>今京师之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370542_comment'></div>不啻百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370542_comment'></div>都计举者不过五七千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370542_comment'></div>并其僮仆畜马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370542_comment'></div>不当京师百分之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370542_comment'></div>以十口之家计之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370542_comment'></div>诚未为有所损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370542_comment'></div>又今年虽旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370542_comment'></div>去岁大丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370542_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>商贾</span>之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370542_comment'></div>必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>储蓄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370542_comment'></div>举选者皆赍持资用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370542_comment'></div>以有易无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370542_comment'></div>未见其毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370542_comment'></div>今若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>暂停</span>举选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370542_comment'></div>或恐所害实深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370542_comment'></div>一则远近惊惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370542_comment'></div>一则人士失业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370542_comment'></div>臣闻古之求雨之词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370542_comment'></div>人失职欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370542_comment'></div>然则人之失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370542_comment'></div>足以致旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370542_comment'></div>今缘旱而停举选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370542_comment'></div>是使人失职而召灾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370542_comment'></div>臣又闻君者阳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370542_comment'></div>臣者阴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370542_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>独阳</span>为旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370542_comment'></div>独阴为水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370542_comment'></div>今者陛下圣明在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370542_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>尧舜</span>无以加之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370542_comment'></div>而群臣之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370542_comment'></div>不及于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370542_comment'></div>又不能尽心于国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370542_comment'></div>与陛下同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370542_comment'></div>助陛下为理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370542_comment'></div>有君无臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370542_comment'></div>是以久旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370542_comment'></div>以臣之愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370542_comment'></div>以为宜求纯信之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370542_comment'></div>骨鲠之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370542_comment'></div>忧国如家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370542_comment'></div>忘身奉上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370542_comment'></div>超其爵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370542_comment'></div>置在左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370542_comment'></div>如殷高宗之用傅说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370542_comment'></div>周文王之举太公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370542_comment'></div>齐桓公之拔宁戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370542_comment'></div>汉武帝之取公孙宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370542_comment'></div>清閒之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370542_comment'></div>时赐召问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370542_comment'></div>必能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>辅宣</span>王化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370542_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>销殄</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/65/Comments/1")'>旱灾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370542_comment'></div>臣虽非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370542", 1370542, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>朝官</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370542_comment'></div>月受俸钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370542_comment'></div>岁受禄粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370542_comment'></div>苟有所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370542_comment'></div>不敢不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370542_comment'></div>谨诣光顺门奉状以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370542_comment'></div>伏听圣旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1370542_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年7月26日</a>　在长安任四门博士。是年正月不雨，至七月甲戌，韩愈作文，借讽刺风伯，实为讥刺当时权臣。作品：讼风伯。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>讼风伯</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年7月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370729")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370729'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370729'>维兹之旱兮。其谁之由。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1370729'>我知其端兮。风伯是尤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1370729'>山升云兮泽上气。雷鞭车兮电<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370729", 1370729, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>摇帜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1370729'>雨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370729", 1370729, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>寖寖</span>兮将坠。风伯怒兮云不得止。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1370729'>旸乌之仁兮念此下民。閟其光兮不斗其神。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1370729'>嗟风伯兮其独谓何。我于尔兮岂有其他。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1370729'>求其时兮修祀事。羊甚肥兮酒甚旨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1370729'>食足饱兮饮足醉。风伯之怒兮谁使。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1370729'>云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370729", 1370729, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>屏屏</span>兮吹使醨之。气将交兮吹使离之。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1370729'>铄之使气不得化。寒之使云不得施。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1370729'>嗟尔风伯兮。欲逃其罪又何辞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1370729'>上天孔明兮有纪有纲。我今上讼兮其罪谁当。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1370729'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370729", 1370729, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>天诛</span>加兮不可悔。风伯虽死兮人谁汝伤。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1370729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1370729'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1370729_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　夏秋，在长安。岳母苗氏夫人去世，韩愈为之作墓志铭。作品：河南府法曹参军卢府君夫人苗氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷24。）</span><div id='poem_1370776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河南府法曹参军卢府君夫人苗氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370776")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370776'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370776'>夫人姓苗氏。讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370776_comment'></div>字某。上党人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370776_comment'></div>曾大父袭夔。赠礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370776_comment'></div>大父殆庶。赠太子太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370776_comment'></div>父如兰。仕至太子司议郎汝州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370776_comment'></div>夫人年若干。嫁河南法曹卢府君讳贻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370776_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370776", 1370776, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>文章</span>德行。其族世所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370776", 1370776, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>甲乙</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370776_comment'></div>先夫人卒。夫人生能配其贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370776_comment'></div>殁能守其法。男二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370776_comment'></div>于陵。浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370776_comment'></div>女三人。皆嫁为士妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370776_comment'></div>贞元十九年四月四日。卒于东都敦化里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370776_comment'></div>年六十有九。其年七月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370776_comment'></div>祔于法曹府君墓。在洛阳龙门山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370776_comment'></div>其季女婿昌黎韩愈为之志。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370776_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1370776'>赫赫苗宗。族茂位尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370776_comment'></div>或毗于王。或贰于藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370776_comment'></div>是生夫人。载穆令闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370776_comment'></div>爰初在家。孝友惠纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370776_comment'></div>乃及于行。克媲德门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370776_comment'></div>肃其为礼。裕其为仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370776_comment'></div>法曹之终。诸子实幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370776_comment'></div>茕茕其哀。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370776", 1370776, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>介介</span>其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370776_comment'></div>循道不违。厥声弥劭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370776_comment'></div>三女有从。二男知教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370776_comment'></div>闾里叹息。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370776", 1370776, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>母妇</span>思效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370776_comment'></div>岁时之嘉。嫁者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370776", 1370776, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>来宁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370776_comment'></div>累累<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370776", 1370776, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>外孙</span>。有携有婴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370776_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370776", 1370776, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>扶床</span>坐膝。嬉戏欢争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370776_comment'></div>既寿而康。既备而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370776_comment'></div>不歉于约。不矜于盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370776_comment'></div>伊昔淑哲。或图或书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370776_comment'></div>嗟咨夫人。孰与为俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370776_comment'></div>刻铭寘墓。以赞硕休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370776_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1370776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安。约在此年，作诗叙己落齿之状。作品：落齿。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_49735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>落齿</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49735")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49735_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49735'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(950, "poem_allusion_49735")'>不材木</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49735_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49735'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49735'>去年落一牙，今年落一齿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49735'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49735", 49735, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>俄然</span>落六七，落势殊未已。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49735'>馀存<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作在）</span>皆动摇，尽落应始止。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49735'>忆初落一时，但念豁可耻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49735'>及至落二三，始忧衰即死。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49735'>每一将落时，懔懔恒在已。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49735'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49735", 49735, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>叉牙</span>妨食物，颠倒怯漱水。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49735'>终焉舍我落，意与崩山比。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49735'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49735", 49735, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>今来</span>落既熟，见落空相似。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49735'>馀存二十馀，次第知落矣。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49735'>傥常岁落一，自足支两纪。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49735'>如其落并空，与渐亦同指。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49735'>人言齿之落，寿命理难恃。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49735'>我言生有涯，长短俱死尔。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49735'>人言齿之豁，左右惊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49735", 49735, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>谛视</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49735'>我言庄周云，水<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作木）</span>雁各有喜。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49735'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49735", 49735, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>语讹</span>默固好，嚼废软还美。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49735'>因歌遂成诗，持用诧妻子。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49735'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_49735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49735'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49735)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安。答陈姓友人，有书信。作品：答陈生书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370597' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370597' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370597?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答陈生书</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370597")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370597_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370597'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370597'>愈白。陈生足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370597_comment'></div>今之负名誉享显荣者。在上位几人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370597_comment'></div>足下求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370597", 1370597, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>速化</span>之术。不于其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370597_comment'></div>乃以访愈。是所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370597", 1370597, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>借听</span>于聋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370597_comment'></div>求道于盲。虽其请之勤勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370597_comment'></div>教之云云。未有见其得者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370597_comment'></div>愈之志在古道。又甚好其言辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370597_comment'></div>观足下之书及十四篇之诗。亦云有志于是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370597_comment'></div>而其所问则名。所慕则科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370597_comment'></div>故愈疑于其对焉。虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370597_comment'></div>厚意不可虚辱。聊为足下诵其所闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370597_comment'></div>盖君子病乎在已。而顺乎在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370597_comment'></div>待已以信。而事亲以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370597_comment'></div>所谓病乎在已者。仁义存乎内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370597_comment'></div>彼圣贤者能推而广之。而我蠢焉为众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370597_comment'></div>所谓顺乎在天者。贵贱穷通之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370597_comment'></div>平吾心而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370597", 1370597, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>随顺</span>之。不以累于其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370597_comment'></div>所谓待已以信者。已果能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370597_comment'></div>人曰不能。勿信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370597_comment'></div>已果不能。人曰能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370597_comment'></div>勿信也。孰信哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370597_comment'></div>信乎已而已矣。所谓事亲以诚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370597_comment'></div>尽其心。不夸于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370597_comment'></div>先乎其质。后乎其文者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370597_comment'></div>尽其心不夸于外者。不以已之得于外者为父母荣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370597_comment'></div>名与位之谓也。先乎其质者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370597_comment'></div>行也。后乎其文者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370597_comment'></div>饮食甘旨。以其外物供养之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370597_comment'></div>诚者。不欺之名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370597_comment'></div>待于外而后为养。薄于质而厚于文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370597_comment'></div>斯其不类于欺与。果若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370597_comment'></div>子之汲汲于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370597", 1370597, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>科名</span>。以不得进为亲之羞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370597_comment'></div>惑也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370597", 1370597, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>速化</span>之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370597_comment'></div>如是而已。古之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370597_comment'></div>惟义之问。诚将学于太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370597_comment'></div>愈犹守是说而俟见焉。愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370597_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370597_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安。送王含秀才，作书信。含乃王绩之后人。作品：送王秀才序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　秋七月后，在长安。罢四门学博士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安。写给友人给事中陈京之书信。作品：与陈给事书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370603' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370603' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370603?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与陈给事书</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370603")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370603_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370603'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370603'>愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370603_comment'></div>愈之获见于閤下有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370603_comment'></div>始者亦尝辱一言之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370603_comment'></div>贫贱也衣食于奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370603_comment'></div>不得朝夕继见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370603_comment'></div>其后閤下位益尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370603_comment'></div>伺候于门墙者日益进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370603_comment'></div>夫位益尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370603_comment'></div>则贱者日隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370603_comment'></div>伺候于门墙者日益进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370603_comment'></div>则爱博而情不专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370603_comment'></div>愈也道不加修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370603_comment'></div>而文日益有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370603_comment'></div>夫道不加修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370603_comment'></div>则贤者不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370603_comment'></div>文日益有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370603_comment'></div>则同进者忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370603_comment'></div>始之以日隔之疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370603_comment'></div>加之以不专之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370603_comment'></div>以不与者之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370603_comment'></div>而听忌者之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370603_comment'></div>由是閤下之庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370603_comment'></div>无愈之迹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370603_comment'></div>去年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370603_comment'></div>亦尝一进谒于左右矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370603_comment'></div>温乎其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370603_comment'></div>若加其新也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370603_comment'></div>属乎其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370603_comment'></div>若闵其穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370603_comment'></div>退而喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370603_comment'></div>以告于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370603_comment'></div>其后如东京取妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370603_comment'></div>又不得朝夕继见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370603_comment'></div>及其还也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370603_comment'></div>亦尝一进谒于左右矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370603_comment'></div>邈乎其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370603_comment'></div>若不察其愚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370603_comment'></div>悄乎其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370603_comment'></div>若不接其情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370603_comment'></div>退而惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370603_comment'></div>不敢复进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370603_comment'></div>今则释然悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370603_comment'></div>翻然悔曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370603_comment'></div>其邈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370603_comment'></div>乃所以怒其来之不继也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370603_comment'></div>其悄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370603_comment'></div>乃所以示其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370603_comment'></div>不敏之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370603_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370603", 1370603, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>逃避</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370603_comment'></div>不敢遂进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370603_comment'></div>辄自疏其所以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370603_comment'></div>并献近所为复志赋以下十首为一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370603_comment'></div>卷有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370603", 1370603, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>标轴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370603_comment'></div>送孟郊序一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370603_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370603", 1370603, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>生纸</span>写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370603_comment'></div>不加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370603", 1370603, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>装饰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370603_comment'></div>皆有揩字注字处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370603_comment'></div>急于自解而谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370603_comment'></div>不能俟更写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370603_comment'></div>閤下取其意而略其礼可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370603_comment'></div>愈恐惧再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1370603_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　本年，在长安。给李实上书，对其政绩大加吹嘘，希望提携援引自己。作品：上李尚书书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370582' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370582' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370582?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李尚书书</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370582")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370582_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370582'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370582'>月日。将仕郎前守四门博士韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370582_comment'></div>谨载拜奉书尚书大尹閤下。愈来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370582_comment'></div>于今十五年。所见公卿大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370582_comment'></div>不可胜数。皆能守官奉职无过失而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370582_comment'></div>未见有赤心事上忧国如家如閤下者。今年以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370582_comment'></div>不雨者百有馀日。种不入土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370582_comment'></div>野无青草。而盗贼不敢起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370582_comment'></div>谷价不敢贵。百坊百二十司六军二十四县之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370582_comment'></div>皆若閤下亲临其家。老奸宿赃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370582_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370582", 1370582, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>销缩</span>摧沮。魂亡魄丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370582_comment'></div>影灭迹绝。非閤下条理<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370582", 1370582, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>镇服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370582_comment'></div>宣布天子威德。其何能及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370582_comment'></div>愈也少从事于文学。见有忠于君孝于亲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370582_comment'></div>虽在千百年之前。犹敬而慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370582_comment'></div>况亲逢閤下。得不候于左右以求效其恳恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370582_comment'></div>谨献所为文两卷。凡十五篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370582_comment'></div>非敢以为文也。以为谒见之资也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370582_comment'></div>进退惟命。愈恐惧再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370582_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1370582_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　冬，在长安。迁监察御史。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　冬，在长安任监察御史。约在此年，作诗《利剑》，借物抒情言志。作品：利剑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_49591' class='_poem'><div id='poem_note_49617'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_49617_0'>⑴ 一作折。愈时盖以柳涧事下迁，此寄意于时宰也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49617_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　冬，调任监察御史，与柳宗元同事。二人与李翱、孟郊、石洪同游慈恩寺塔并题名。作品：长安慈恩塔题名。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。磊按：此篇为遗文。孟郊此年在溧阳尉任上，如何一起题名张谱系于元和九年（有《登科记考》佐证），是。然柳宗元、石洪又未必合矣。待考。）</span><div id='poem_1370730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370730' class='poemTitle /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年12月</a>　十二月，在长安任监察御史。因上表唐德宗论天旱人饥，遭受谗言，被贬连州阳山县令。作品：御史台上论天旱人饥状。<span id='poem_sentence_50_49732'></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_49732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49732'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_49732_0'>⑴ 《晋阳秋》：“陆抗、羊祜推侨札之好。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_49732_0'>⑵ 《左氏》：“尹公学射于庾公差，差学于公孙丁。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_30_49732_0'>⑶ 沈颜遗李肇书，谓退之托此以悲世人登高而不知止，且示戒焉</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49732_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年6月</a>　六月在长安任国子博士。生活闲适，与诸友相聚，诗兴颇高，多作联句。以类相从，暂系于此。叙离别后会合之意，有联句。作品：会合联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_49575' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49575' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49575?labeling=true' target='_blank'>会合联句</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49575")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49575_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49575'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49575'>离别言无期，会合意弥重<span class='inlineComment2'>（籍）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49575'>病添儿女恋，老丧丈夫勇<span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49575'>剑心知未死，诗思犹孤耸<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49575'>愁去剧箭飞，欢来若泉涌<span class='inlineComment2'>（彻）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49575'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49575", 49575, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>析言</span>多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49575", 49575, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>新贯</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49575", 49575, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>摅抱</span>无昔壅<span class='inlineComment2'>（籍）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49575'>念难须勤追，悔易勿轻踵<span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49575'>吟巴山荦峃<span class='inlineComment2'>（音学）</span>，说楚波堆垄<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49575'>马辞虎豹怒，舟出蛟鼍恐<span class='inlineComment2'>（彻）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49575'>狂鲸时孤轩，幽狖杂百种<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年闰6月</a>　闰六月底，在长安任国子博士。生活闲适，与诸友相聚，诗兴颇高。初回长安，与孟郊纳凉，有联句。作品：纳凉联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_49608' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年8月</a>　八九月间，在长安任国子博士。生活闲适，与诸友相聚，诗兴颇高。宪宗初命高崇文征讨刘辟，有感，与孟郊联句。作品：秋雨联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_49665' id='poem_sentence_138_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_139_49647'>鼻偷困淑郁<span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>，眼剽强盯𥋝。<div id='poem_sentence_139_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_140_49647'>是节饱颜色<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>，兹疆称都城。<div id='poem_sentence_140_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_141_49647'>书饶罄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_141_49647", 49647, "Clauses/282/Comments/1")'>鱼茧</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>，纪盛播琴筝。<div id='poem_sentence_141_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_142_49647'>奚必事远觌<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>，无端逐羁伧。<div id='poem_sentence_142_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_143_49647'>将身亲魍魅<span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>，浮迹侣鸥鶄。<div id='poem_sentence_143_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_144_49647'>腥味空奠屈<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>，天年徒羡彭。<div id='poem_sentence_144_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_145_49647'>惊魂见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_145_49647", 49647, "Clauses/290/Comments/1")'>蛇蚓</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_145_49647", 49647, "Clauses/291/Comments/0")'>触嗅</span>值虾蟛。<div id='poem_sentence_145_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_146_49647'>幸得履中气<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>，忝从拂天枨。<div id='poem_sentence_146_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_147_49647'>归私暂休暇<span id='poem_sentence_147_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_148_49647'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_148_49647", 49647, "Clauses/296/Comments/1")'>鲜意</span>竦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_148_49647", 49647, "Clauses/296/Comments/2")'>轻畅</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_148_49647", 49647, "Clauses/297/Comments/0")'>连辉</span>照琼莹。<div id='poem_sentence_148_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_149_49647'>陶暄逐风乙<span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>，跃视舞晴蜻。<div id='poem_sentence_149_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_150_49647'>足胜自多诣<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>，心贪敌无勍。<div id='poem_sentence_150_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_151_49647'>始知乐名教<span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>，何用苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_151_49647", 49647, "Clauses/303/Comments/0")'>拘儜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_151_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_152_49647'>毕景任诗趣<span class='inlineComment2'>（郊）</span>，焉能守䃘䃘<span class='inlineComment2'>（愈）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_152_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_153_49647'></div><div id='poem_sentence_153_49647_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49647'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49647)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年9月</a>　深秋，在长安任国子博士。游终南山，有诗。作品：南山诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_49642' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49642' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49642?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南山诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49642")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div "poem_allusion_49642")'>北公</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(649, "poem_allusion_49642")'>贲育</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(920, "poem_allusion_49642")'>巨灵</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49642_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49642'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49642'>吾闻京城南，兹惟群山囿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49642'>东西两际海，巨细难悉究。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49642'>山经及地志，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49642", 49642, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>茫昧</span>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49642", 49642, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>受授</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49642'>团辞试<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49642", 49642, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>提挈</span>，挂一念万漏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49642'>欲休谅不能，粗叙所经觏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49642'>尝升<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49642", 49642, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>崇丘</span>望，戢戢见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49642", 49642, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>相凑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49642'>晴明出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49642", 49642, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>棱角</span>，缕脉碎分绣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49642'>蒸岚相澒<span class='inlineComment2'>（胡孔切）</span>洞，表里忽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49642", 49642, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>通透</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49642'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49642", 49642, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>无风</span>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49642", 49642, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>飘簸</span>，融液煦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49642", 49642, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>柔茂</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49642'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49642", 49642, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>横云</span>时平凝，点点露数岫。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49642'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49642", 49642,
