class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49642'>春阳潜沮洳，濯濯吐深秀。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49642'>岩峦虽嵂崒，软弱类含酎<span class='inlineComment2'>（音宙）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49642'>夏炎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49642", 49642, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>百木</span>盛，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49642", 49642, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>荫郁</span>增<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49642", 49642, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>埋覆</span>。<div "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>歊<span class='inlineComment2'>（音枵）</span>歔</span>，云气争结构。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49642'>秋霜喜<span "Clauses/35/Comments/1")'>刚耿</span>陵<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作凌）</span>宇宙。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49642'>冬行虽<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_49642", 49642, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>分宅</span>占丁戊<span class='inlineComment2'>（音茂）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_49642'>逍遥越坤位，诋讦陷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_49642", 49642, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>乾窦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49642'>空虚寒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_49642", 49642, id='poem_sentence_24_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_49642'>朱维方烧日，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_49642", 49642, id='poem_sentence_25_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49642'>昆明大池北，去觌偶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_49642", 49642, class='inlineComment2'>（已上言南山方隅连亘之所）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_49642'>前寻径<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_32_49642'>行行将遂穷，岭陆烦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_49642", 49642, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>互走</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_32_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_49642'>勃然思坼裂，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_49642", 49642, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_49642", 49642, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>远旧</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_39_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_49642'>拘官计日月，欲进不可又。<div id='poem_sentence_40_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_49642'>因缘窥其湫<span 49642, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>鱼虾</span>可俯掇，神物安敢寇。<div id='poem_sentence_42_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_49642'><span class='link' "Clauses/86/Comments/1")'>脱叶</span>，欲堕鸟惊救<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_43_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/90/Comments/1")'>回睨</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_49642", 49642, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>达蘖</span>壮复奏。<div "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>化贸</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_46_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_49642'>前年遭谴谪，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_49642", 49642, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>探历</span>得邂逅。<div id='poem_sentence_47_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_49642'>初从蓝田入，顾盻劳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_49642", 49642, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>颈脰</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_48_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_49642'>时天晦大雪，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_49642", 49642, "Clauses/99/Comments/1")'>泪目</span>苦矇瞀<span class='inlineComment2'>（音茂）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_49_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_49642'>峻涂拖长冰，直上若悬溜。<div id='poem_sentence_50_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_49642'>褰衣步推马，颠蹶退且复。<div id='poem_sentence_51_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_49642'>苍黄忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_49642", 49642, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>遐睎</span>，所瞩才左右。<div id='poem_sentence_52_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_49642'>杉篁咤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_49642", 49642, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>蒲苏</span>，杲耀攒介胄。<div id='poem_sentence_53_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_49642'>专心忆平道，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_49642", 49642, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>脱险</span>逾避臭。<div id='poem_sentence_54_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_49642'>昨来逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_49642", 49642, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>清霁</span>，宿愿忻始副。<div id='poem_sentence_55_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_49642'>峥嵘跻冢顶，倏闪杂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_49642", 49642, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>鼯鼬</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_56_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_49642'>前低划<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_49642", 49642, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>开阔</span>，烂漫堆众皱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_57_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_49642'>或连若相从，或蹙若相斗。<div id='poem_sentence_58_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_49642'>或妥若弭伏，或竦若惊雊。<div id='poem_sentence_59_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_49642'>或散若瓦解，或赴若辐凑。<div id='poem_sentence_60_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_49642'>或翩若船游，或决若马骤。<div id='poem_sentence_61_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_49642'>或背若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_49642", 49642, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>相恶</span>，或向若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_49642", 49642, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>相佑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_62_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_49642'>或乱若抽笋，或嵲若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_49642", 49642, "Clauses/127/Comments/1")'>注<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作炷）</span>灸</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_63_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_49642'>或错若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_49642", 49642, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>绘画</span>，或缭若篆籀。<div id='poem_sentence_64_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_49642'>或罗若星离，或蓊若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_49642", 49642, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>云逗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_65_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_49642'>或浮若波涛，或碎若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_49642", 49642, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>锄耨</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_66_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_49642'>或如<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(649, "poem_sentence_67_49642")'>贲育</span>伦<span class='inlineComment2'>（秦勇士）</span>，赌胜勇前购。<div id='poem_sentence_67_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_49642'>先强势已出，后钝嗔䛠<span class='inlineComment2'>（音斗）</span>譳<span class='inlineComment2'>（音耨，不能言也）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_68_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_49642'>或如帝王尊，丛集朝贱幼。<div id='poem_sentence_69_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_49642'>虽亲不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_49642", 49642, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>亵狎</span>，虽远不悖谬。<div id='poem_sentence_70_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_49642'>或如临<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_49642", 49642, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>食案</span>，肴核纷饤饾。<div id='poem_sentence_71_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_72_49642'>又如游九原，坟墓包<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_49642", 49642, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>椁柩</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_72_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_73_49642'>或累若盆罂，或揭若豋<span class='inlineComment2'>（同登）</span>豆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作豆）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_73_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_74_49642'>或覆若曝鳖，或颓若<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_75_49642'>或蜿若藏龙，或翼若搏鹫。<div id='poem_sentence_75_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_49642'>或齐若友朋，或随若<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_77_49642'>或迸若流落，或顾若宿留。<div id='poem_sentence_77_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_49642'>或戾若仇雠，或密若婚媾。<div id='poem_sentence_78_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_49642'>或俨若峨冠，或翻若舞袖。<div id='poem_sentence_79_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_49642'>或屹若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_49642", 49642, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>战阵</span>，或围若蒐狩。<div id='poem_sentence_80_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_49642'>或靡然东注，或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_49642", 49642, id='poem_sentence_95_49642'>大哉立天地，经纪肖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_49642", 49642, "Clauses/191/Comments/0")'>营腠</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_95_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_49642'>厥初孰开张，僶俯谁劝侑。<div id='poem_sentence_96_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_97_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_49642'>得非施斧斤，无乃假<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_49642", 49642, "Clauses/197/Comments/0")'>诅咒</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_98_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_99_49642'>鸿荒竟<span class='link' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_101_49642'>斐然作歌诗，惟用赞报侑。<div id='poem_sentence_101_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_49642'></div><div id='poem_sentence_102_49642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49642'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_49642_0'>⑴ 音嗅，或作兽。礼运，龙以为嘼，谓湫中蛟也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_43_49642_0'>⑵ 其湫叶落，恐污水，鸟即衔去，盖其神物之灵如此</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_57_49642_0'>⑶ 言豁然见前山之低，虽有高陵深谷，但如皱物，微有蹙折之文耳</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49642_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49642'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49642)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年9月</a>　深秋，官国子博士时，有诗咏短灯檠。作品：短灯檠歌。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_49731' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49731")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49731_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49731'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49731'>长檠八尺空自长，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49731", 49731, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>短檠</span>二尺便且光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49731'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49731", 49731, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>黄帘</span>绿幕朱户闭，风露气入秋堂凉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49731'>裁衣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49731", 49731, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>寄远</span>泪眼暗，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49731", 49731, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>搔头</span>频挑移近床。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49731'>太学儒生东鲁客，二十辞家来射策。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49731'>夜书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49731", 49731, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>细字</span>缀语言，两目<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49731", 49731, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>眵<span class='inlineComment2'>（音痴）</span>昏</span>头雪白。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49731'>此时提携当案前，看书到晓那能眠。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49731'>一朝富贵还自恣，长檠<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_7_49731'>吁嗟世事无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49731", 49731, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>不然</span>，墙角君看<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49731", 49731, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>短檠</span>弃。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年9月</a>　九月，在长安任国子博士。推荐孟郊于郑馀庆，有诗。作品：荐士。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_49666' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49666' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49666?labeling=true' class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49666", 49666, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>三百篇</span>，雅丽理<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作埋）</span>训诰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49666'>曾经圣人手，议论安敢到。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49666'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49666", 49666, id='poem_sentence_4_49666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49666'>逶迤抵晋宋，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49666", 49666, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>气象</span>日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49666", 49666, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>凋耗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49666'>中间数鲍谢，比近最清奥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年9月</a>　九月或稍后在长安作。韩愈堂兄韩岌本年六月去世于虢州，九月下葬。韩愈为之作墓志铭。作品：虢州司户韩府君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷25。）</span><div id='poem_1370780' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370780' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370780?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虢州司户韩府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370780")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370780_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370780'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370780'>安定桓王五世孙睿素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370780_comment'></div>为桂州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370780_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370780", 1370780, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>化行</span>南方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370780_comment'></div>有子四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370780_comment'></div>最季曰绅卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370780_comment'></div>文而能官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370780_comment'></div>尝为扬州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370780_comment'></div>事故宰相崔圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370780_comment'></div>圆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370780", 1370780, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>狎爱</span>州民丁某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370780_comment'></div>至顾省其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370780_comment'></div>后大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370780", 1370780, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>衙会</span>日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370780_comment'></div>司录君趋以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370780_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370780", 1370780, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>大言</span>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370780_comment'></div>请举公过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370780_comment'></div>公与小民狎至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370780_comment'></div>至其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370780_comment'></div>害于政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370780_comment'></div>圆惊谢曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370780_comment'></div>录事言是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370780_comment'></div>圆实过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370780_comment'></div>乃自署罚五十万钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370780_comment'></div>由是迁泾阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370780_comment'></div>破豪家水碾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370780_comment'></div>利民田顷凡百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370780_comment'></div>君讳岌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370780_comment'></div>桂州君之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370780_comment'></div>司录君之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370780_comment'></div>亦以能官名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370780_comment'></div>少而奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370780_comment'></div>壮而强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370780_comment'></div>老而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370780_comment'></div>以元和元年六月十四日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370780_comment'></div>年五十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370780_comment'></div>娶京兆田氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370780_comment'></div>男曰家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370780_comment'></div>女曰门曰都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370780_comment'></div>皆幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370780_comment'></div>初君乐虢之土田山水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370780_comment'></div>求掾其州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370780_comment'></div>去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370780_comment'></div>犹家之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370780_comment'></div>既卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370780_comment'></div>因以其年九月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370780_comment'></div>葬州北十里崔长史墓西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370780_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370780_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1370780'>凡兆于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370780_comment'></div>惟其家之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370780_comment'></div>盖归有时。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1370780_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年9月</a>　九月在长安任国子博士作。韩愈堂兄韩岌本年六月去世于虢州，九月下葬。韩愈有文以祭。作品：祭十二兄文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370833' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370833_comment'></div>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。敢昭告于十二兄故虢州司户府君之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370833_comment'></div>呜呼。维我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370833", 1370833, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>皇祖</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370833_comment'></div>有孙八人。惟兄与我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370833_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370833", 1370833, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>后死</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370833", 1370833, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>孤存</span>。奈何于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370833_comment'></div>又弃而先。生不偕居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370833_comment'></div>疾药不亲。敛不摩棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370833_comment'></div>瘗不绕坟。趋奔束制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370833_comment'></div>生死亏恩。归女教男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370833_comment'></div>反骨本原。其不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370833", ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　下半年回长安后，任国子博士。生活闲适，与诸友相聚，诗兴颇高。叙离别后会合之意，与孟郊有联句。作品：有所思联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span>遣兴联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span>赠剑客李园联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年10月</a>　初冬，在长安任国子博士。赠友人崔立之，有诗。作品：赠崔立之。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_49782' class='_poem'><div class='authorDate'>（806年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10946, "poem_allusion_49782")'>子桑寒饥</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49782_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49782'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49782'>昔年十日雨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49782", 49782, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>子桑</span>苦寒饥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49782'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49782", 49782, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>哀歌</span>坐空室<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作房，一作屋）</span>，不怨但自悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49782'>其友名子舆，忽然忧且思。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49782'>搴裳触泥水，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49782", 49782, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>裹饭</span>往食之。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49782'>入门相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49782", 49782, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>对语</span>，天命良不疑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49782'>好事漆园吏，书之存雄词。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49782'>千年事已远，二子情可推。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49782'>我读此篇日，正当寒<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作雨）</span>雪时。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49782'>吾身固已困，吾友复何为。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49782'>薄粥不足裹，深泥谅难驰。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49782'>曾无子舆事，空赋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49782", 49782, id='poem_sentence_11_49782_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年11月</a>　十一月底，在长安任国子博士。孟郊离去，侯喜始来，韩愈有诗赠张籍张彻。作品：喜侯喜至赠张籍张彻。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_49713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49713' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49713?labeling=true' target='_blank'>喜侯喜至赠张籍张彻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", 愈初谪阳山令，元和改元，自江陵掾召国子博士，其从游如喜、如籍、如彻皆会都下，诗以是作。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49713'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4175, "poem_allusion_49713")'>铅椠</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49713'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49713'>昔我在南时，数君常在念。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49713'>摇摇不可止，讽咏日喁噞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49713'>如以膏濯衣，每渍垢逾染。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49713'>又如心中疾，针石非所砭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49713'>常思得游处，至死无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49713", 49713, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>倦厌</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49713'>地遐物<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49713", 49713, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>奇怪</span>，水镜涵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49713", 49713, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>石剑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49713'>荒花穷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49713", 49713, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>漫乱</span>，幽兽工<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49713", 49713, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>腾闪</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49713'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49713", 49713, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>碍目</span>不忍窥，忽忽坐昏垫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49713'>逢神多所祝，岂忘灵即验。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49713'>依依梦归路，历历想<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49713", 49713, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>行店</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49713'>今者诚自幸，所怀无一欠。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49713'>孟生去虽索，侯氏来还歉。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49713'>欹眠听新诗，屋角月艳艳。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49713'>杂作承间骋，交惊舌互舚<span class='inlineComment2'>（他念切，吐舌貌）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49713'>缤纷指瑕疵，拒捍阻城堑。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49713'>以余经摧挫，固请发<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4175, "poem_sentence_15_49713")'>铅椠</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49713'>居然妄推让，见谓爇天燄。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49713'>比疏语徒妍，悚息不敢占。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49713'>呼奴具盘餐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_49713", 49713, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>饤饾</span>鱼菜赡。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49713'>人生但如此，朱紫安足僭。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_49713'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_49713_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　下半年，在长安。国子博士任上，发现国子监所属三馆学生均有缺额，有违国家培育人才之意，故向宪宗上书。作品：请复国子监生徒状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷27。张贞元十九年。167。）</span><div id='poem_1370544' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370544' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370544?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请复国子监生徒状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", id='poem_title_1370544_0'>① 国子监应三馆学生等准六典国子馆学生三百人皆取文武三品已上及国公子孙从三品已上曾孙补充太学馆学生五百人皆取五品已上及郡县公子孙从三品已上曾孙补充四门馆学生五百人皆取七品已上及侯伯子男子补充</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370544'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370544'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370544_comment'></div>国家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>典章</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370544_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>崇重</span>庠序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370544_comment'></div>近日趋竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370544_comment'></div>未复本源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370544_comment'></div>至使公卿子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370544_comment'></div>耻游太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370544_comment'></div>工商凡冗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370544_comment'></div>或处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>上庠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370544_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>圣道</span>大明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370544_comment'></div>儒风复振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370544_comment'></div>恐须<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>革正</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370544_comment'></div>以赞鸿猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370544_comment'></div>今请国子馆并依六典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370544_comment'></div>其太学馆量许取常参官八品已上子弟充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370544_comment'></div>其四门馆亦量许取无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>资荫</span>有才业人充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370544_comment'></div>如有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>资荫</span>不补学生应举者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370544_comment'></div>请礼部不在收试限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370544_comment'></div>其新补人有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>冒荫</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370544_comment'></div>请牒送法司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>科罪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370544_comment'></div>缘今年举期已近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370544_comment'></div>伏请去上都五百里内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370544_comment'></div>特许非时收补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370544_comment'></div>其五百里外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370544_comment'></div>且任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>乡贡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370544_comment'></div>至来年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370544_comment'></div>一时收补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370544_comment'></div>其厨粮度支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370544_comment'></div>先给二百七十四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370544_comment'></div>今请准新补人数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370544_comment'></div>量加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370544", 1370544, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>支给</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370544_comment'></div>谨具如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370544_comment'></div>伏听处分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1370544_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　在长安任国子博士。约在此年前后，作《对禹问》一文。作品：对禹问。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷1。与柳宗元《舜禹之事》大约同时作。）</span><div id='poem_1370719' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370719' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370719?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对禹问</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370719")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370719_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370719'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370719'>或问曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370719_comment'></div>尧舜传诸贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370719_comment'></div>禹传诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370719_comment'></div>信乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370719_comment'></div>曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370719_comment'></div>然则禹之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370719_comment'></div>不及于尧与舜也欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370719_comment'></div>曰不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370719_comment'></div>尧舜之传贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370719_comment'></div>欲天下之得其所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370719_comment'></div>禹之传子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370719_comment'></div>忧后世争之之乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370719_comment'></div>尧舜之利民也大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370719_comment'></div>禹之虑民也深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370719_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370719_comment'></div>然则尧舜何以不忧后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370719_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370719_comment'></div>舜如尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370719_comment'></div>尧传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370719_comment'></div>禹如舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370719_comment'></div>舜传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370719_comment'></div>得其人而传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370719_comment'></div>尧舜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370719_comment'></div>无其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370719_comment'></div>虑其患而不传者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370719_comment'></div>禹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370719_comment'></div>舜不能以传禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370719_comment'></div>尧为不知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370719_comment'></div>禹不能以传子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370719_comment'></div>舜为不知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370719_comment'></div>尧以传舜为忧后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370719_comment'></div>禹以传子为虑后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370719_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370719_comment'></div>禹之虑也则深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370719_comment'></div>传之子而当不淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370719_comment'></div>则奈何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370719_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370719_comment'></div>时益以难理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370719_comment'></div>传之人则争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370719_comment'></div>未前定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370719_comment'></div>传之子则不争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370719_comment'></div>前定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370719_comment'></div>前定虽不当贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370719_comment'></div>犹可以守法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370719_comment'></div>不前定而不遇贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370719_comment'></div>则争且乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370719_comment'></div>天之生大圣也不数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370719_comment'></div>其生大恶也亦不数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370719_comment'></div>传诸人得大圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370719_comment'></div>然后人莫敢争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370719_comment'></div>传诸子得大恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370719_comment'></div>然后人受其乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370719_comment'></div>禹之后四百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370719_comment'></div>然后得桀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370719_comment'></div>亦四百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370719_comment'></div>然后得汤与伊尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370719_comment'></div>汤与伊尹不可待而传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370719_comment'></div>与其传不得圣人而争且乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370719_comment'></div>孰若传诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370719_comment'></div>虽不得贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370719_comment'></div>犹可守法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370719_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370719_comment'></div>孟子之所谓天与贤则与贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370719_comment'></div>天与子则与子者何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370719_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370719_comment'></div>孟子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370719_comment'></div>以为圣人不苟私于其子以害天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370719_comment'></div>求其说而不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370719_comment'></div>从而为之辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1370719_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年1月</a>　回长安后任国子博士，受宰相郑絪器重，但受人中伤谗毁，为自保，本年正月，请求分司东都洛阳以避祸。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年1月</a>　正月，于长安任国子博士。遇谗，请求分司东都洛阳，有诗献上，赞颂宪宗功绩。作品：元和圣德诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49785' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49785' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49785?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元和圣德诗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（807年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49785")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_49785_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49785_0'>① 初宪宗即位，剑南刘辟自称留后以叛。元和元年正月，以高崇文为左神策行营节度使讨辟。九月，克成都。十月，辟伏诛。二年正月己丑，朝献于大清宫。庚寅，朝享于太庙。辛卯，祀昊天上帝于郊丘。还宫，大赦天下。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49785'>初宪宗即位，剑南刘辟自称留后以叛。元和元年正月，以高崇文为左神策行营节度使讨辟。九月，克成都；十月，辟伏诛；二年正月己丑，朝献于大清宫；庚寅，朝享于太庙；辛卯，祀昊天上帝于郊丘。还宫，大赦天下。臣愈首再拜言，臣伏见皇帝陛下即位已来，诛流奸臣，朝廷清明，无有欺蔽，外斩杨惠琳、刘辟以收夏蜀，东定青齐积年之叛，海内怖骇，不敢违越。郊天告庙，神灵欢喜；风雨晦明，无不从顺。太平之期，适当今日。臣蒙被恩泽，日与群臣序立紫宸殿陛下，亲望穆穆之光，而其职业，又在以经籍教导国子，诚宜率先作歌诗以称道盛德，不可以辞语浅薄不足以自效为解，辄依古作四言〈元和圣德诗〉一篇，凡千有二十四字，指事实录，具载明天子文武神圣，以警动百姓耳目传示无极，其诗曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_49785_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49785'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2134, "poem_allusion_49785")'>丹凤门</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3633, "poem_allusion_49785")'>簋簠</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49785_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49785'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49785'>皇帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49785", 49785, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>即阼</span>，物无违拒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49785'>曰旸而旸，曰雨而雨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49785'>维是元年，有盗在夏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49785'>欲覆其州，以踵近<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作其）</span>武<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49785'>皇帝曰嘻，岂不在我。<div id='poem_sentence_77_49785'>戚见容色，泪落入俎。<div id='poem_sentence_77_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_49785'><span class='link' "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>恻楚</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_78_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_49785'>乃以上辛，于郊用牡。<div id='poem_sentence_79_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_49785'>除于国南，鳞笋毛簴。<div id='poem_sentence_80_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/250/Comments/0")'>亿载</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_125_49785", 49785, "Clauses/250/Comments/1")'>万年</span>，为父为母。<div id='poem_sentence_125_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_126_49785'>博士臣愈，职是训诂。<div id='poem_sentence_126_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_127_49785'>作为歌诗，以配吉甫。<div id='poem_sentence_127_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_128_49785'></div><div id='poem_sentence_128_49785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49785'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_49785_1'>⑴ 先是年德宗建中间，李希烈、朱泚等反，至是杨惠琳、刘辟继踵而起。此叙惠琳据夏州，出师征讨有功，以为平刘辟发端</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_49785_1'>⑵ 时严绶在河东，表请讨惠琳，诏与天德军合击之</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_49785_0'>⑶ 荆谓荆南节度使裴均、并谓河东节度使严绶、梁谓山南西道节度使严砺</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_89_49785_0'>⑷ 婐，乌果切，𡜮，五果切，身弱好也，谓月妃</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49785_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49785'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49785)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年2月</a>　二月，在长安任国子博士，遭遇谗言，上书宰相郑絪、翰林李吉甫、舍人裴垍加以解释。作品：释言。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370717?labeling=true' target='_blank'>释言</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370717")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370717_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370717'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370717'>元和元年六月十日。愈自江陵法曹诏拜国子博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370717_comment'></div>始进见今相国郑公。公赐之坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370717_comment'></div>且曰。吾见子某诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370717_comment'></div>吾时在翰林。职亲而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>地禁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370717_comment'></div>不敢相闻。今为我写子诗书为一通以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370717_comment'></div>愈再拜谢。退录诗书若干篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370717_comment'></div>择日时以献。于后之数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370717_comment'></div>有来谓愈者曰。子献相国诗书乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370717_comment'></div>曰然。曰有为谗于相国之座者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370717_comment'></div>韩愈曰相国徵余文。余不敢匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370717_comment'></div>相国岂知我哉。子其慎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370717_comment'></div>愈应之曰。愈为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370717_comment'></div>得罪德宗朝。同迁于南者凡三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370717_comment'></div>独愈为先收用。相国之赐大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370717_comment'></div>百官之进见相国者。或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>立语</span>以退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370717_comment'></div>而愈辱赐坐语。相国之礼过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370717_comment'></div>四海九州之人。自百官以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370717_comment'></div>欲以其业彻相国左右者多矣。皆惮而莫之敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370717_comment'></div>独愈辱先索。相国之知至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370717_comment'></div>赐之大。礼之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370717_comment'></div>知之至。是三者于敌以下受之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370717_comment'></div>宜以何报。况在天子之宰乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370717_comment'></div>人莫不自知。凡适于用之谓才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370717_comment'></div>堪其事之谓力。愈于二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370717_comment'></div>虽日勉焉而不近。束带执笏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370717_comment'></div>立士大夫之行。不见斥以不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370717_comment'></div>幸矣。其何敢敖于言乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370717_comment'></div>夫敖虽凶德。必有恃而敢行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370717_comment'></div>愈之族亲鲜少。无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>扳联</span>之势于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370717_comment'></div>不善交人。无相先相死之友于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370717_comment'></div>无宿资蓄货以钓声势。弱于才而腐于力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370717_comment'></div>不能奔走乘机<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>抵巇</span>以要权利。夫何恃而敖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370717_comment'></div>若夫狂惑丧心之人。蹈河而入火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370717_comment'></div>妄言而骂詈者。则有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370717_comment'></div>而愈人知其无是疾也。虽有谗者百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370717_comment'></div>相国将不信之矣。愈何惧而慎欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370717_comment'></div>既累月。又有来谓愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370717_comment'></div>有谗子于翰林舍人李公与裴公者。子其慎欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370717_comment'></div>愈曰。二公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370717_comment'></div>吾君朝夕访焉。以为政于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370717_comment'></div>而阶太平之治。居则与天子为心膂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370717_comment'></div>出则与天子为股肱。四海九州之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370717_comment'></div>自百官以下。其孰不愿忠而望赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370717_comment'></div>愈也不狂不愚。不蹈河而入火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370717_comment'></div>病风而妄骂。不当有如谗者之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370717_comment'></div>虽有谗者百人。二公将不信之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370717_comment'></div>愈何惧而慎。既以语应客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370717_comment'></div>夜归。私自尤曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370717_comment'></div>咄。市有虎而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>曾参杀人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370717_comment'></div>谗者之效也。诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370717_comment'></div>取彼谗人。投豺虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370717_comment'></div>豺虎不食。投有北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370717_comment'></div>有北不受。投有昊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370717_comment'></div>伤于谗疾而甚之之辞也。又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370717_comment'></div>乱之初生。僭始既涵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370717_comment'></div>乱之又生。君子信谗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370717_comment'></div>始疑而终信之之谓也。孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370717_comment'></div>远佞人。夫佞人不能远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370717_comment'></div>则有时而信之矣。今我恃直而不戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370717_comment'></div>祸其至哉。徐又自解之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370717_comment'></div>市有虎。听者庸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370717_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>曾参杀人</span>。以爱惑聪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370717_comment'></div>巷伯之伤。乱世是逢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370717_comment'></div>今三贤方与天子谋所以施政于天下。而阶太平之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370717_comment'></div>听聪而视明。公正而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>敦大</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370717_comment'></div>夫聪明则听视不惑。公正则不迩谗邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370717_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370717", 1370717, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>敦大</span>则有以容而思。彼谗人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370717_comment'></div>孰敢进而为谗哉。虽进而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370717_comment'></div>亦莫之听矣。我何惧而慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370717_comment'></div>既累月。上命李公相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370717_comment'></div>客谓愈曰。子前被言于一相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370717_comment'></div>今李公又相。子其危哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370717_comment'></div>愈曰。前之谤我于宰相者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370717_comment'></div>翰林不知也。后之谤我于翰林者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370717_comment'></div>宰相不知也。今二公合处而会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370717_comment'></div>言若及愈。必曰韩愈亦人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370717_comment'></div>彼敖宰相。又敖翰林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370717_comment'></div>其将何求。必不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370717_comment'></div>吾乃今知免矣。既而谗言果不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370717_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_79_1370717_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年2月10日</a>　二月，于长安任国子博士。为卢东美作墓志铭。卢系韩愈长兄韩会好友。作品：考功员外卢君墓铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370815' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370815' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370815?labeling=true' target='_blank'>考功员外卢君墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年2月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370815")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370815_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370815'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370815'>愈之宗兄故起居舍人君以道德文学伏一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370815_comment'></div>其友四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370815_comment'></div>其一范阳卢君东美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370815_comment'></div>少未出仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370815_comment'></div>皆在江淮閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370815_comment'></div>天下大夫士谓之四夔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370815_comment'></div>其义以为道可与古之夔皋者侔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370815_comment'></div>故云尔或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370815_comment'></div>夔尝为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370815_comment'></div>世谓相夔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370815_comment'></div>四人者虽处而未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370815_comment'></div>天下许以为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370815_comment'></div>故云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370815_comment'></div>大历初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370815_comment'></div>御史大夫李栖筠由工部侍郎为浙西观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370815_comment'></div>当是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370815_comment'></div>中国新去乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370815_comment'></div>士多避处江淮閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370815_comment'></div>尝为显官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370815_comment'></div>得名声以老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370815_comment'></div>故自任者以千百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370815_comment'></div>大夫莫之取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370815_comment'></div>独晨衣朝服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370815_comment'></div>从骑吏入下里舍请卢君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370815_comment'></div>君时始任戴冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370815_comment'></div>通诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370815_comment'></div>与其群日讲说周公孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370815_comment'></div>以相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370815", 1370815, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>磨砻浸灌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370815_comment'></div>婆娑嬉游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370815_comment'></div>未有舍所为为人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370815_comment'></div>既起从大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370815_comment'></div>天下未知君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370815_comment'></div>惟奇大夫之取人也不常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370815_comment'></div>必得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370815_comment'></div>其知君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370815_comment'></div>谓君之从人也非其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370815_comment'></div>守必得其从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370815_comment'></div>其后为太常博士监察御史河南府司录考功员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370815_comment'></div>年若干而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370815_comment'></div>在官举其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370815_comment'></div>夫人李姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370815_comment'></div>陇西人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370815_comment'></div>君在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370815_comment'></div>配君子无违德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370815_comment'></div>君殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370815_comment'></div>训子女得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370815", 1370815, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>母道</span>甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370815_comment'></div>后君二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370815_comment'></div>年六十六而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370815_comment'></div>将合葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370815_comment'></div>其子畅命其孙立曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370815_comment'></div>乃祖德烈靡不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370815_comment'></div>然其详而信者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370815_comment'></div>宜莫若吾先人之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370815_comment'></div>先人之友无在者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370815_comment'></div>起居丈有季曰愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370815_comment'></div>能为古文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370815_comment'></div>业其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370815_comment'></div>是必能道吾父事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370815_comment'></div>汝其往请铭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370815_comment'></div>立于是奉其父命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370815_comment'></div>奔走来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370815_comment'></div>愈谓立曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370815_comment'></div>子来宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370815_comment'></div>行不可一二举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370815_comment'></div>且我之生也后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370815_comment'></div>不与而祖接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370815_comment'></div>不得详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370815_comment'></div>其大者莫若众所与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370815_comment'></div>观所与众寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370815_comment'></div>兹可以审其德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370815_comment'></div>乃祖未出而处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370815_comment'></div>天下大夫士以为与古之夔皋者侔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370815_comment'></div>且可以为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370815_comment'></div>其德不既大矣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370815_comment'></div>讲说周公孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370815_comment'></div>乐其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370815_comment'></div>不乐从事于俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370815_comment'></div>得所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370815_comment'></div>不择内外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370815_comment'></div>奋而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370815_comment'></div>其进退不既合于义乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370815_comment'></div>铭如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370815_comment'></div>可以示于今与后也欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370815_comment'></div>立拜手曰唯唯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370815_comment'></div>君祖子舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370815_comment'></div>濮州濮阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370815_comment'></div>父同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370815_comment'></div>舒州望江令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370815_comment'></div>夫人之祖延宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370815_comment'></div>郓州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370815_comment'></div>父进成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370815_comment'></div>鄜州洛交令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370815_comment'></div>男三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370815_comment'></div>畅申易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370815_comment'></div>女三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370815_comment'></div>皆嫁为士人妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370815_comment'></div>墓在河南缑氏县梁国之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370815_comment'></div>其年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370815_comment'></div>元和二年二月十日云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1370815_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年2月</a>　二月，于长安任国子博士。遇谗请求分司东都，有诗。作品：三星行。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span>剥啄行。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49550' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49550' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49550?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三星行<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（807年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49550")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49550_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49550_0'>① 三星，斗、牛、箕也。愈自悯其生多訾毁如此。苏轼云：“吾生时与退之相似，吾命在牛斗间，其身宫亦在箕，斗牛宫为磨蝎，吾平生多得谤誉，殆同病也。”</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49550'><span "poem_allusion_49550")'>牛不服箱</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49550_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49550'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49550'>牛不见服箱，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2489, id='poem_sentence_3_49550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49550'>无善名已闻，无恶声已欢。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49789'>彼宁可隳，此不可干。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49789'>从者语我，嗟子诚难。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49789'>子虽云尔，其口益蕃。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49789'>我为子谋，有万其全。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49789'>凡今之人，急名与官。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49789'>子不引去，与为波澜。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49789'>虽不开口，虽不开关。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49789'>变化咀嚼，有鬼有神。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49789'>今去不勇，其如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49789", 49789, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>后艰</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49789'>我谢再拜，汝无复云。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49789'>往追不及，来不有年。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49789'></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_49789_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年4月13日</a>　四月，在长安任国子博士。阅李翰所作《张巡传》后，犹觉不足，乃补作《后叙》，为张巡、许远等人立传。作品：张中丞传后叙。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370671' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370671' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370671?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张中丞传后叙</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年4月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370671")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370671_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370671'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370671'>元和二年四月十三日夜。愈与吴郡张籍阅家中旧书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370671_comment'></div>得李翰所为张巡传。翰以文章自名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370671_comment'></div>为此传颇详密。然尚恨有阙者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370671_comment'></div>不为许远立传。又不载雷万春事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>首尾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370671_comment'></div>远虽材若不及巡者。开门纳巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370671_comment'></div>位本在巡上。授之柄而处其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370671_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>疑忌</span>。竟与巡俱守死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370671_comment'></div>成功名。城陷而虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370671_comment'></div>与巡死先后异耳。两家子弟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>材智</span>下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370671_comment'></div>不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>通知</span>二父志。以为巡死而远就虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370671_comment'></div>疑畏死而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>辞服</span>于贼。远诚畏死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370671_comment'></div>何苦守尺寸之地。食其所爱之肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370671_comment'></div>以与贼抗而不降乎。当其围守时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370671_comment'></div>外无蚍蜉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>蚁子</span>之援。所欲忠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370671_comment'></div>国与主耳。而贼语以国亡主灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370671_comment'></div>远见救援不至。而贼来益众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370671_comment'></div>必以其言为信。外无待而犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>死守</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370671_comment'></div>人相食且尽。虽愚人亦能数日而知死处矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370671_comment'></div>远之不畏死亦明矣。乌有城坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370671_comment'></div>其徒俱死。独蒙愧耻求活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370671_comment'></div>虽至愚者不忍为。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370671_comment'></div>而谓远之贤而为之耶。说者又谓远与巡分城而守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370671_comment'></div>城之陷自远所分始。以此诟远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370671_comment'></div>此又与儿童之见无异。人之将死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370671_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>脏腑</span>必有先受其病者。引绳而绝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370671_comment'></div>其绝必有处。观者见其然从而尤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370671_comment'></div>其亦不达于理矣。小人之好议论不乐成人之美如是哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370671_comment'></div>如巡远之所成就。如此卓卓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370671_comment'></div>犹不得免。其他则又何说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370671_comment'></div>当二公之初守也。宁能知人之卒不救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370671_comment'></div>弃城而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>逆遁</span>。苟此不能守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370671_comment'></div>虽避之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>他处</span>何益。及其无救而且穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370671_comment'></div>将其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>创残</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/64/Comments/1")'>饿羸</span>之馀。虽欲去必不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370671_comment'></div>二公之贤。其讲之精矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370671_comment'></div>守一城。捍天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370671_comment'></div>以千百就尽之卒。战百万日滋之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370671_comment'></div>蔽遮江淮。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>沮遏</span>其势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370671_comment'></div>天下之不亡。其谁之功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370671_comment'></div>当是时。弃城而图存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370671_comment'></div>不可一二数。擅彊兵坐而观者相环也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370671_comment'></div>不追议此。而责二公以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>死守</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370671_comment'></div>亦见其自比于逆乱。设淫辞而助之攻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370671_comment'></div>愈尝从事于汴徐二府。屡道于两府閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370671_comment'></div>亲祭于其所谓双庙者。其老人往往说巡远时事云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370671_comment'></div>南霁云之乞救于贺兰也。贺兰嫉巡远之声威功绩出已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370671_comment'></div>不肯出师救。爱霁云之勇且壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370671_comment'></div>不听其语。彊留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370671_comment'></div>具食与乐。延霁云坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370671_comment'></div>霁云慷慨语曰。云来时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370671_comment'></div>睢阳之人不食月馀日矣。云虽欲独食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370671_comment'></div>义不忍。虽食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370671_comment'></div>且不下咽。因拔所佩刀断一指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370671_comment'></div>血淋漓以示贺兰。一座大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370671_comment'></div>皆感激为云泣下。云知贺兰终无为云出师意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370671_comment'></div>即驰去。将出城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370671_comment'></div>抽矢射佛寺浮图。矢著其上砖半箭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370671_comment'></div>曰。吾归破贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370671_comment'></div>必灭贺兰。此矢所以志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370671_comment'></div>愈贞元中过泗州。船上人犹指以相语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370671_comment'></div>城陷。贼以刃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>胁降</span>巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370671_comment'></div>巡不屈。即牵去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370671_comment'></div>将斩之。又降霁云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370671_comment'></div>云未应。巡呼云曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370671_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>南八</span>。男儿死耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370671_comment'></div>不可为不义屈。云笑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370671_comment'></div>欲将以有为也。公有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370671_comment'></div>云敢不死。即不屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370671_comment'></div>张籍曰。有于嵩者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370671_comment'></div>少依于巡。及巡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>起事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370671_comment'></div>嵩常在围中。籍大历中于和州乌江县见嵩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370671_comment'></div>嵩时年六十馀矣。以巡初尝得临涣县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370671_comment'></div>好学无所不读。籍时尚小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370671_comment'></div>粗问巡远事。不能细也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370671_comment'></div>云巡长七尺馀。须髯若神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370671_comment'></div>尝见嵩读汉书。谓嵩曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370671_comment'></div>何为久读此。嵩曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370671_comment'></div>未熟也。巡曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370671_comment'></div>吾于书读不过三遍。终身不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370671_comment'></div>因诵嵩所读书。尽卷不错一字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370671_comment'></div>嵩惊。以为巡偶熟此卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370671_comment'></div>因乱抽他帙以试。无不尽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370671_comment'></div>嵩又取架上诸书。试以问巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370671_comment'></div>巡应口诵无疑。嵩从巡久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370671_comment'></div>亦不见巡常读书也。为文章操纸笔立书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370671_comment'></div>未尝起草。初守睢阳时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370671_comment'></div>士卒仅万人。城中居人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370671_comment'></div>户亦且数万。巡因一见问姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370671_comment'></div>其后无不识者。巡怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370671_comment'></div>须髯辄张。及城陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370671_comment'></div>贼縳巡等数十人坐。且将戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370671_comment'></div>巡起旋。其众见巡起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370671_comment'></div>或起或泣。巡曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370671_comment'></div>汝勿怖。死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370671_comment'></div>命也。众泣不能仰视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370671_comment'></div>巡就戮时。颜色不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370671_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>阳阳</span>如平常。远宽厚长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370671_comment'></div>貌如其心。与巡同年生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370671_comment'></div>月日后于巡。呼巡为兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370671_comment'></div>死时年四十九。嵩贞元初死于亳宋閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370671_comment'></div>或传嵩有田在亳宋閒。武人夺而有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370671_comment'></div>嵩将诣州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_100_1370671", 1370671, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>讼理</span>。为所杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370671_comment'></div>嵩无子。张籍云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370671_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_102_1370671_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='66bf7f5ef8014a37bf2035cf8b2d1248_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("66bf7f5ef8014a37bf2035cf8b2d1248");'><span id='66bf7f5ef8014a37bf2035cf8b2d1248_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=817')">811-817年</a>，44-50岁</div><div id='66bf7f5ef8014a37bf2035cf8b2d1248' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年7月</a>　初秋，在长安任职方员外郎。以诗写秋景赠卢云夫，表达兴奋之情。作品：酬司门卢四兄云夫院长望秋作。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬司门卢四兄云夫院长望秋作</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49752")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49752'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49752'>长安雨洗新秋出，极目寒镜开尘函。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49752'>终南晓望蹋龙尾，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49752", 49752, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>倚天</span>更觉青巉巉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49752'>自知短浅无所补，从事久此穿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49752", 49752, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>朝衫</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49752'>归来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49752", 49752, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>得便</span>即<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49752", 49752, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>游览</span>，暂似壮马脱重衔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49752'>曲江荷花盖十里，江湖生目思莫缄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49752'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49752", 49752, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>乐游</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49752", 49752, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>下瞩</span>无远近，绿槐萍合不可芟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49752'>白首寓居谁借问，平地寸步扃云岩。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49752'>云夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49752", 49752, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>吾兄</span>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49752", 49752, "Clauses/14/Comments/1")'>狂气</span>，嗜好与俗殊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49752", 49752, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>酸咸</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49752'>日来省我不肯去，论诗说赋相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49752", 49752, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>諵諵</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49752'>望秋一章已惊绝，犹言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49752", 49752, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>低抑</span>避<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49752", 49752, id='poem_sentence_10_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49752'>嗟我小生值强伴，怯胆变勇神明鉴。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49752'>驰坑跨谷终未悔，为利而止真<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49752", 49752, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>贪馋</span>。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49752", 49752, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>攕攕</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（所咸切，一作纤纤）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49752'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_49752_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　九月，在长安任职方员外郎。因富平有人为父报仇杀人，自首请罪，得以减死流配。作文议此事。作品：复仇状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷27。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　秋冬，在长安任职方员外郎。作《双鸟诗》，寓意颇深。姑系于此。作品：双鸟诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49556' class='_poem'><div
