class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370595' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370595' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370595?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代张籍与李浙东书</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370595")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370595_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370595'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370595'>月日。前某官某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370595_comment'></div>谨东向再拜寓书浙东观察使中丞李公閤下。籍闻议论者皆云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370595_comment'></div>方今居古<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370595", 1370595, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>方伯连帅</span>之职。坐一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370595_comment'></div>得专制于其境内者。惟閤下心事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370595", 1370595, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>荦荦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370595_comment'></div>与俗辈不同。籍固以藏之胸中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370595_comment'></div>近者閤下从事李协律翱到京师。籍与李君友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370595_comment'></div>不见六七年。闻其至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370595_comment'></div>驰往省之。问无恙外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370595_comment'></div>不暇出一言。且先贺其得贤主人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370595_comment'></div>李君曰。子岂尽知之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370595_comment'></div>吾将尽言之。数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370595_comment'></div>籍益闻所不闻。籍私独喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370595_comment'></div>常以为自今以后。不复有如古人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370595_comment'></div>于今忽有之。退而自悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370595_comment'></div>不幸两目不见物。无用于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370595_comment'></div>胸中虽有知识。家无钱财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370595_comment'></div>寸步不能自致。今去李中丞五千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370595_comment'></div>何由致其身于其人之侧。开口<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370595", 1370595, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>一吐</span>出胸中之奇乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370595_comment'></div>因饮泣不能语。既数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370595_comment'></div>复自奋曰。无所能人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370595_comment'></div>乃宜以盲废。有所能人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370595_comment'></div>虽盲。当废于俗辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370595_comment'></div>不当废于行古人之道者。浙水东七州户不下数十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370595_comment'></div>不盲者何限。李中丞取人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370595_comment'></div>固当问其贤不贤。不当计盲与不盲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370595_comment'></div>当今盲于心者皆是。若籍自谓独盲于目尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370595_comment'></div>其心则能别是非。若赐之坐而问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370595_comment'></div>其口固能言也。幸未死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370595_comment'></div>实欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370595", 1370595, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>一吐</span>出心中平生所知见。閤下能信而致之于门耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370595_comment'></div>籍又善于古诗。使其心不以忧衣食乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370595_comment'></div>閤下无事时。一致之座侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370595_comment'></div>使跪进其所有。閤下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370595", 1370595, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>凭几</span>而听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370595_comment'></div>未必不如听<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370595", 1370595, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>吹竹弹丝</span>敲金击石也。夫盲者业专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370595_comment'></div>于艺必精。故乐工皆盲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370595_comment'></div>籍傥可与此辈比并乎。使籍诚不以畜妻子忧饥寒乱心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370595_comment'></div>有钱财以济医药。其盲未甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370595_comment'></div>庶几其复见天地日月。目得不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370595_comment'></div>则自今至死之年。皆閤下之赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370595_comment'></div>閤下济之以已绝之年。赐之以既盲之视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370595_comment'></div>其恩轻重大小。籍宜如何报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370595_comment'></div>閤下裁之度之。籍惭腼再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370595_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1370595_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　秋后，在长安任职方员外郎。受同僚之请作祭文。作品：祭左司李员外太夫人文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370851' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370851_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370851'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370851'>维年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370851_comment'></div>某官某等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370851_comment'></div>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>全福</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370851_comment'></div>为妇为母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370851_comment'></div>再朝中宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370851_comment'></div>搢绅推荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370851_comment'></div>宗党是则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370851_comment'></div>某等幸随令子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370851_comment'></div>同服官僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370851_comment'></div>庶展哀诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370851_comment'></div>式陈牢醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370851_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1370851_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　秋后，在长安任职方员外郎。为范阳卢行简父母作墓志铭。作品：襄阳卢丞墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370808' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370808' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370808?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄阳卢丞墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370808")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370808_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370808'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370808'>范阳卢行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370808_comment'></div>将葬其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370808_comment'></div>乞铭于职方员外郎韩愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370808_comment'></div>吾先世世载族姓书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370808_comment'></div>吾冑于拓跋氏之宏农守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370808_comment'></div>守后四代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370808_comment'></div>吾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370808_comment'></div>为沂录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370808_comment'></div>五世而吾父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370808_comment'></div>为襄阳丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370808_comment'></div>始吾父自曹之南华尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370808_comment'></div>历万年县尉至襄阳丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370808_comment'></div>以材任烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370808_comment'></div>能持廉名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370808_comment'></div>去襄阳则署盐铁府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370808_comment'></div>出入十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370808_comment'></div>常最其列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370808_comment'></div>贞元十三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370808_comment'></div>终其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370808_comment'></div>年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370808_comment'></div>殡河南河阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370808_comment'></div>吾母燉煌张氏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370808_comment'></div>王父瓘为兖之金乡令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370808_comment'></div>先君殁十三年而夫人终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370808_comment'></div>年七十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370808_comment'></div>从殡河阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370808_comment'></div>生子男三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370808_comment'></div>居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370808_comment'></div>金吾兵曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370808_comment'></div>行则吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370808_comment'></div>其次也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370808_comment'></div>大理主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370808_comment'></div>佐江西军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370808_comment'></div>其幼可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370808_comment'></div>女子嫁浮梁尉崔叔宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370808_comment'></div>将以今年十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370808_comment'></div>自河阴启葬汝之临汝之汝原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370808_comment'></div>吾曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370808_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370808", 1370808, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370808", 1370808, "Clauses/38/Comments/1")'>星历</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370808_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370808", 1370808, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>近世</span>儒莫学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370808_comment'></div>独行以其力馀学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370808_comment'></div>能名一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370808_comment'></div>舍而从事于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370808_comment'></div>以材称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370808_comment'></div>葬其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370808_comment'></div>乞铭以图长存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370808_comment'></div>是真能子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370808_comment'></div>可铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370808_comment'></div>遂以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370808_comment'></div>宏农讳怀仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370808_comment'></div>沂讳璬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370808_comment'></div>襄阳讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370808_comment'></div>今年实元和六年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370808_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年11月</a>　冬，在长安任职方员外郎。送别贾岛回范阳，有诗。作品：送无本师归范阳。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49670' id='poem_sentence_5_49678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49678'>岁晚鸿雁过，乡思见新文。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49678'>感慨都门别，丈夫酒方醺。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49678'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_49678_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　冬，在长安任职方员外郎。写诗赠张籍。作品：赠张籍。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_17_49776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49776'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_49776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　冬，在长安任职方员外郎。以诗和卢云夫送盘谷子李愿诗，表达怨望牢骚之意。作品：卢郎云夫寄示盘谷子诗两章歌以和之。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49565' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49565' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49565?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卢郎中云夫寄示送盘谷子诗两章歌以和之</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49565")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49565_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49565'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(712, "poem_allusion_49565")'>长剑倚太行</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49565_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49565'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49565'>昔寻李愿向盘谷，正见高崖巨壁争开张。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49565'>是时新晴天井溢<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，谁把<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(712, "poem_sentence_1_49565")'>长剑倚太行</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49565'>冲风吹破落天外，飞雨白日洒洛阳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49565'>东蹈燕川食旷野，有馈木蕨芽满筐。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49565'>马头溪<span class='inlineComment2'>（溪名）</span>深不可厉，借车载过水入箱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49565'>平沙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49565", 49565, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>绿浪</span>榜方口<span class='inlineComment2'>（地名）</span>，雁鸭飞起穿垂杨。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49565'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49565", 49565, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>穷探</span>极览颇恣横，物外日月本不忙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49565'>归来辛苦欲谁为，坐令再往之计堕眇芒。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49565'>闭门长安三日雪，推书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49565", 49565, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>扑笔</span>歌慨慷。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49565'>旁无壮士遣属和，远忆卢老诗颠狂。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49565'>开缄忽睹送归作，字向纸上皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49565", 49565, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>轩昂</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49565'>又知李侯竟不顾，方冬独入崔嵬藏。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49565'>我今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49565", 49565, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>进退</span>几时决，十年蠢蠢随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49565", 49565, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>朝行</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49565'>家请官供不报答，何<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作无）</span>异雀鼠偷太仓。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49565'>行抽手版付丞相，不待弹劾还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49565", 49565, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>耕桑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49565'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_49565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49565'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_49565_0'>⑴ 天井，关名，在太行山上。《水经》曰：“天井溪出天井关，北流注白水，世谓之北流泉。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49565_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49565'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49565)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年12月</a>　年末，在长安任职方员外郎。应请为路应撰墓志铭。作品：银青光禄大夫守散骑常侍致仕上柱国襄阳郡王路公神道碑铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷16。）</span><div id='poem_1370759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>银青光禄大夫守左散骑常侍致仕上柱国襄阳郡王平阳路公神道碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370759")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370759_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370759'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370759'>惟路氏远有代序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370759_comment'></div>自隋尚书兵部侍郎讳衮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370759_comment'></div>四代而至冀公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370759_comment'></div>冀公讳嗣恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370759_comment'></div>以小邑萧关令发闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370759_comment'></div>开元受赐更名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370759_comment'></div>书于太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370759_comment'></div>治行灵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370759_comment'></div>终功南邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370759_comment'></div>享有丕祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370759_comment'></div>绍开厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370759_comment'></div>官至兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370759_comment'></div>封冀国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370759_comment'></div>薨赠尚书右仆射司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370759_comment'></div>公讳应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370759_comment'></div>字从众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370759_comment'></div>冀公之嫡子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370759_comment'></div>用大臣子谨饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370759_comment'></div>擢至侍御史著作郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370759_comment'></div>选刺虔州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370759_comment'></div>割馀雩都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370759_comment'></div>作县安远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370759_comment'></div>以利人属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370759_comment'></div>凿败滩石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370759_comment'></div>以平赣梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370759_comment'></div>陶甓而城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370759_comment'></div>罢人屡筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370759_comment'></div>诏嗣冀封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370759_comment'></div>又加尚书屯田郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370759_comment'></div>进服色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370759_comment'></div>遂临于温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370759_comment'></div>筑堤岳城横阳界中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370759_comment'></div>二邑得上田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370759_comment'></div>除水害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370759_comment'></div>拜尚书兵部郎中兼御史中丞淮南军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370759_comment'></div>改刺庐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370759_comment'></div>又甓其城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370759_comment'></div>人不岁苫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370759_comment'></div>入为尚书职方郎中兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370759_comment'></div>佐盐铁使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370759_comment'></div>使江东有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370759_comment'></div>用半岁历常州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370759_comment'></div>迁至宣歙池观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370759_comment'></div>进封襄阳郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370759_comment'></div>至则出仓米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370759_comment'></div>下其估半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370759_comment'></div>以廪饿人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370759_comment'></div>蜀辟诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370759_comment'></div>行军千五百人于蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370759_comment'></div>李锜将反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370759_comment'></div>以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370759_comment'></div>置乡兵万二千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370759_comment'></div>锜反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370759_comment'></div>命将期以卒救湖常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370759_comment'></div>坐牢江东心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370759_comment'></div>锜以无助败缚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370759_comment'></div>作响山亭营军左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370759_comment'></div>权丞相善之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370759_comment'></div>镵其说响山石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370759_comment'></div>居宣五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370759_comment'></div>以疾去位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370759_comment'></div>校其仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370759_comment'></div>得石者五十万馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370759_comment'></div>府得钱千者八十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370759_comment'></div>公之为州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370759_comment'></div>逢水旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370759_comment'></div>喜贱出与人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370759_comment'></div>岁稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370759_comment'></div>以其得收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370759_comment'></div>常有赢利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370759_comment'></div>故在所人不病饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370759_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370759", 1370759, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>官府</span>蓄积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370759_comment'></div>元和六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370759_comment'></div>天子悯公疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370759_comment'></div>不可烦以职。<div id='poem_sentence_76_1370759_comment'></div>其岁九月望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370759_comment'></div>薨于东都正平里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370759_comment'></div>年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370759_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370759_comment'></div>葬京兆万年少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370759_comment'></div>夫人荥阳郑氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370759_comment'></div>既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370759_comment'></div>其子临汉县男贯与其弟赏贞谋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370759_comment'></div>宜有刻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370759_comment'></div>告于叔父御史大夫鄜坊丹延观察使恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370759_comment'></div>因其族弟进士群以来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370759_comment'></div>遂以其事铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370759_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_89_1370759'>冀公之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370759_comment'></div>维艰就功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370759_comment'></div>襄阳继大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370759_comment'></div>启庆自躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370759_comment'></div>于虔洎温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370759_comment'></div>厥绪既作。<div id='poem_sentence_96_1370759_comment'></div>朝夕人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370759_comment'></div>下完上实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370759_comment'></div>师于其乡。<div id='poem_sentence_105_1370759_comment'></div>叙疏及迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370759_comment'></div>病不能廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370759_comment'></div>食禄卒齿。<div id='poem_sentence_110_1370759_comment'></div>既显既愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370759_comment'></div>戒于终咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370759_comment'></div>伊我襄阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370759_comment'></div>克慎以有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370759_comment'></div>延畀后承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370759_comment'></div>莫不率守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370759_comment'></div>有墓于原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370759_comment'></div>维树在经以告无期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370759_comment'></div>博士是铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_119_1370759_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年2月6日</a>　在长安。二月前仍为职方员外郎。因为华阴令辨曲直，有失，六日下迁为国子博士，颇感抑郁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年2月</a>　二月，在长安任国子博士。为李素撰墓志铭。作品：河南少尹李公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370803?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河南少尹李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370803")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370803_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370803'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370803'>元和七年二月一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370803_comment'></div>河南少尹李公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370803_comment'></div>年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370803_comment'></div>敛之三月某甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370803_comment'></div>葬河南伊阙鸣皋山下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370803_comment'></div>前事之月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370803_comment'></div>其子道敏哭再拜授使者公行状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370803_comment'></div>以币走京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370803_comment'></div>乞铭于博士韩愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370803_comment'></div>少尹将以某月日葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370803_comment'></div>宜有铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370803_comment'></div>其不肖嗣道敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370803_comment'></div>杖而执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370803_comment'></div>不敢违次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370803_comment'></div>不得跣以请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370803_comment'></div>愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370803_comment'></div>公行应铭法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370803_comment'></div>子又礼葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370803_comment'></div>敢不诺而铭诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370803_comment'></div>公讳素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370803_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370803_comment'></div>生七岁丧其父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370803_comment'></div>贫不能家。<div class='inline' "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>外氏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370803_comment'></div>以明经选主虢之宏农簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370803_comment'></div>又尉陕之芮城。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1370803_comment'></div>以课迁尉京兆鄠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370803_comment'></div>考满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370803_comment'></div>以书判出其伦。<div id='poem_sentence_33_1370803_comment'></div>食其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370803_comment'></div>母夫人卒三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370803_comment'></div>改尉长安。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　六七月间，在长安任国子博士。为石洪撰墓志铭。石洪六月卒，七月葬万年县白鹿原。作品：集贤殿校理石君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>集贤院校理石君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370804'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370804'>君讳洪。字浚川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370804_comment'></div>其先姓乌石兰。九代祖猛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370804_comment'></div>始从拓跋氏入夏。居河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370804_comment'></div>遂去乌与兰。独姓石氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370804_comment'></div>而官号大司空。后七世至行褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370804_comment'></div>官至易州刺史。于君为曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370804_comment'></div>易州生婺州金华令讳怀一。卒葬洛阳北山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370804_comment'></div>金华生君之考讳平。为太子家令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370804_comment'></div>葬金华墓东。而尚书水部郎刘复为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370804_comment'></div>君生七年丧其母。九年而丧其父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370804_comment'></div>能力学行。去黄州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370804_comment'></div>则不仕。而退处东都洛上十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370804_comment'></div>行益修。学益进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370804_comment'></div>交游益附。声号闻四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370804_comment'></div>故相国郑公馀庆留守东都。上言洪可付<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370804", 1370804, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>史笔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370804_comment'></div>李建拜御史。崔周祯为补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370804_comment'></div>皆举以让。宣歙池之使与浙东使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370804", 1370804, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>交牒</span>署君从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370804_comment'></div>河阳节度乌大夫重允閒以币先走庐下。故为河阳得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370804_comment'></div>佐河阳军。吏治民宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370804_comment'></div>考功奏从事考。君独于天下为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370804_comment'></div>元和六年。诏下河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370804_comment'></div>徵拜京兆昭应尉。校理集贤御书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370804_comment'></div>明年六月甲午。疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370804_comment'></div>年四十二。娶彭城刘氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370804_comment'></div>故相国晏之兄孙。生男二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370804_comment'></div>八岁曰壬。四岁曰申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370804_comment'></div>女子二人。顾言曰葬死所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370804_comment'></div>子以吾铭。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370804_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1370804'>生之艰。成之又艰。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1370804_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年7月27日</a>　七月，在长安任国子博士。为石洪撰祭文，并同宋景祭以文。石洪六月卒，七月下葬。作品：祭石君文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷35。）</span><div id='poem_1370844' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年8月15日</a>　中秋节，在长安任国子博士。和崔群咏月，有诗。作品：和崔舍人咏月二十韵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_49538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_8_49768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49768'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1154, id='poem_sentence_10_49768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49768'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49768)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　本年，在长安任国子博士。作书答刘伯刍之子正夫。作品：答刘正夫书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_1370612' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370612' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370612?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答刘正夫书</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370612")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370612_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370612'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370612'>愈白。进士刘君足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370612_comment'></div>辱笺。教以所不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370612_comment'></div>既荷厚赐。且愧其诚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370612_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。凡举进士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370612_comment'></div>于先进之门。何所不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370612_comment'></div>先进之于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370612", 1370612, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>后辈</span>。苟见其至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370612_comment'></div>宁可以不答其意耶。来者则接之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370612_comment'></div>举城士大夫。莫不皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370612_comment'></div>而愈不幸。独有接<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370612", 1370612, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>后辈</span>名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370612_comment'></div>名之所存。谤之所归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370612_comment'></div>有来问者。不敢不以诚答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370612_comment'></div>或问为文宜何师。必谨对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370612_comment'></div>宜师古圣贤人。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370612_comment'></div>古圣贤人所为书具存。辞皆不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370612_comment'></div>宜何师。必谨对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370612_comment'></div>师其意。不师其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370612_comment'></div>又问曰。文宜易宜难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370612_comment'></div>必谨对曰。无难易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370612_comment'></div>惟其是尔。如是而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370612_comment'></div>非固开其为此。而禁其为彼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370612_comment'></div>夫百物朝夕所见者。人皆不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370612", 1370612, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>注视</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370612_comment'></div>及睹其异者。则共观而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370612_comment'></div>夫文岂异于是乎。汉朝人莫不能为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370612_comment'></div>独司马相如太史公刘向扬雄为之最。然则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370612", 1370612, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>用功</span>深者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370612_comment'></div>其收名也远。若皆与世沈浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370612_comment'></div>不自树立。虽不为当时所怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370612_comment'></div>亦必无后世之传也。足下家中百物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370612_comment'></div>皆赖而用也。然其所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370612", 1370612, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>珍爱</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370612_comment'></div>必非常物。夫君子之于文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370612_comment'></div>岂异于是乎。今后进之为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370612_comment'></div>能深探而力取之。以古圣贤人为法者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370612_comment'></div>虽未必皆是。要若有司马相如太史公刘向扬雄之徒出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370612_comment'></div>必自于此。不自于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370612", 1370612, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>循常</span>之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370612_comment'></div>若圣人之道。不用文则已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370612_comment'></div>用则必尚其能者。能者非他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370612_comment'></div>能自树立。不因循者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370612_comment'></div>有文字来。谁不为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370612_comment'></div>然其存于今者。必其能者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370612_comment'></div>顾常以此为说耳。愈于足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370612_comment'></div>忝同道而先进者。又常从游于贤尊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370612", 1370612, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>给事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370612_comment'></div>既辱厚赐。又安得不进其所有以为答也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370612_comment'></div>足下以为何如。愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370612_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1370612_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　冬，在长安任国子博士。作诗寄崔立之，追述崔氏发展变化，并言及个人近状。作品：寄崔二十六立之。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_49705' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49705", 49705, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>科第</span>，若摘颔底髭。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49705'>岂论校书郎，袍笏光参差。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49705'>童稚见称说，祝身得如斯。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49705'>侪辈妒且热，喘如竹筒吹。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49705'>老妇愿嫁女，约不论财赀。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49705'>老翁不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49705", 49705, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>量分</span>，累月笞其儿。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49705'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_49705", 49705, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>搅搅</span>争附托，无人角雄雌。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49705'>由来人间事，翻覆不可知。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49705'>安有巢中鷇<span class='inlineComment2'>（音寇）</span>，插翅飞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49705", 49705, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>天陲</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49705'>驹麛著爪牙，猛虎借与皮。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49705'>汝头有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_49705", 49705, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>缰系</span>，汝脚有索縻。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_49705'>陷身<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_49705", 49705, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>泥沟</span>间，谁复禀指撝。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49705'>不脱吏部选，可见偶与奇。<div id='poem_sentence_21_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_49705'>又作朝士贬，得非命所施。<div id='poem_sentence_22_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_49705'>客居京城中，十日营一炊。<div id='poem_sentence_23_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49705'>逼迫走巴蛮<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作峦）</span>，恩爱座上离。<div id='poem_sentence_24_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_49705'>昨来汉水头，始得完<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_49705", 49705, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>孤羁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49705'>桁<span class='inlineComment2'>（音形）</span>挂新衣裳，盎弃食残糜。<div id='poem_sentence_26_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_49705'>苟无饥寒苦，那用分高卑。<div id='poem_sentence_27_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_49705'>怜我还好古，宦途同险巇。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_49705'>每旬遗我书，竟岁无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_49705", 49705, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>差池</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_49705'>新篇奚其思，风幡肆逶迤。<div id='poem_sentence_30_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_49705'>又论<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_49705", 49705, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>诸毛</span>功，劈水看蛟螭。<div id='poem_sentence_31_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_49705'>雷电生睒<span class='inlineComment2'>（音闪）</span>睗<span class='inlineComment2'>（音释）</span>，角鬣相撑披。<div id='poem_sentence_32_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_49705'>举头庭树豁，狂飙卷寒曦。<div id='poem_sentence_40_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_49705'>异日期对举，当如合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_49705", 49705, "Clauses/161/Comments/1")'>分支</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_80_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_49705'></div><div id='poem_sentence_81_49705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49705'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_49705_0'>⑴ 元和初，立之以前大理评事黜官，再转为蓝田县丞，西城谓蓝田也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_49705_0'>⑵ 立之中元和四年进士第，知举侍郎刘太真</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_80_49705_0'>⑶ 《通鉴》：“元魏熙平元年，立法，在军有功者，行台给券，当中竖裂，一支给勋人，一支送门下，以防伪巧。”今人亦谓析产符契为分支帐，即此义也。愈以双𧣴之一赠崔，故末句如此</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49705_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49705'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49705)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年12月4日</a>　十二月，在长安任国子博士，戏作《石鼎联句》作品：石鼎联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span>石鼎联句诗序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370675' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370675' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370675?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石鼎联句诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年12月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370675")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370675_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370675'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370675'>元和七年十二月四日。衡山道士轩辕弥明自衡下来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370675_comment'></div>旧与刘师服进士衡湘中相识。将过太白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370675_comment'></div>知师服在京。夜抵其居宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370675_comment'></div>有校书郎侯喜。新有能诗声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370675_comment'></div>夜与刘说诗。弥明在其侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370675_comment'></div>貌极丑。白须黑面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370675_comment'></div>长颈而高结。喉中又作楚语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370675_comment'></div>喜视之若无人。弥明忽轩衣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>张眉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370675_comment'></div>指炉中石鼎谓喜曰。子云能诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370675_comment'></div>能与我赋此乎。刘往见衡湘閒人说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370675_comment'></div>云年九十馀矣。解捕逐鬼物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370675_comment'></div>拘囚蛟螭虎豹。不知其实能否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370675_comment'></div>见其老。颇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>貌敬</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370675_comment'></div>不知其有文也。闻此说大喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370675_comment'></div>即援笔题其首两句。次传于喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370675_comment'></div>喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>踊跃</span>即缀其下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>云云</span>。道士哑然笑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370675_comment'></div>子诗如是而已乎。即<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>袖手</span>竦肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370675_comment'></div>倚北墙坐。谓刘曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370675_comment'></div>吾不解世俗书。子为我书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370675_comment'></div>因高吟曰。龙头缩菌蠢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370675_comment'></div>豕腹涨彭亨。初不似经意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370675_comment'></div>诗旨有似讥喜。二子相顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>惭骇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370675_comment'></div>欲以多穷之。即又为而传之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370675_comment'></div>喜思益苦。务欲压道士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370675_comment'></div>每<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>营度</span>欲出口吻。声鸣益悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370675_comment'></div>操笔欲书。将下复止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370675_comment'></div>竟亦不能奇也。毕即传道士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370675_comment'></div>道士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>高踞</span>大唱曰。刘把笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370675_comment'></div>吾诗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>云云</span>。其不用意而功益奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370675_comment'></div>不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>附说</span>。语皆侵刘侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370675_comment'></div>喜益忌之。刘与侯皆已赋十馀韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370675_comment'></div>弥明应之如响。皆㯋脱含<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>讥讽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370675_comment'></div>夜尽三更。二子思竭不能续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370675_comment'></div>因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>起谢</span>曰。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>尊师</span>非世人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370675_comment'></div>某伏矣。愿为弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370675_comment'></div>不敢更论诗。道士奋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370675_comment'></div>不然。章不可以不成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370675_comment'></div>又谓刘曰。把笔来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370675_comment'></div>吾与汝就之。即又唱出四十字为八句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370675_comment'></div>书讫使读。读毕谓二子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370675_comment'></div>章不已就乎。二子齐应曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370675_comment'></div>就矣。道士曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370675_comment'></div>此皆不足与语。此宁为文耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370675_comment'></div>吾就子所能而作耳。非吾之所学于师而能者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370675_comment'></div>吾所能者。子皆不足以闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370675_comment'></div>独文乎哉。吾语亦不当闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370675_comment'></div>吾闭口矣。二子大惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370675_comment'></div>皆起立。床下拜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370675_comment'></div>不敢他有问也。愿闻一言而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370675_comment'></div>先生称吾不解人閒书。敢问解何书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370675_comment'></div>请闻此而已。道士寂然若无闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370675_comment'></div>累问不应。二子不自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370675_comment'></div>即退就座。道士倚墙睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370675_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>鼻息如雷</span>鸣。二子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>怛然</span>失色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370675_comment'></div>不敢喘。斯须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370675_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>曙鼓</span>动鼕鼕。二子亦困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370675_comment'></div>遂坐睡。及觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370675_comment'></div>日已上。惊顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370675_comment'></div>觅道士不见。即问童奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370675_comment'></div>奴曰。天且明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370675_comment'></div>道士起出门。若将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370675", 1370675, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>便旋</span>然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370675_comment'></div>奴怪久不返。即出到门觅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370675_comment'></div>无有也。二子惊惋自责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370675_comment'></div>若有失者。閒遂诣余言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370675_comment'></div>余不能识其何道士也。尝闻有隐君子弥明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370675_comment'></div>岂其人耶。韩愈序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370675_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1370675_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　年初，在长安任国子博士。答诸生问学，有文，自喻抒怀。执政者览此文，奇其才。作品：进学解。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370708' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370708' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370708?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进学解</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370708")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370708_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370708'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370708'>国子先生晨入太学。招诸生立馆下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370708_comment'></div>诲之曰。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>业精于勤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370708_comment'></div>荒于嬉。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>行成于思</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370708_comment'></div>毁于随。方今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>圣贤</span>相逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>治具</span>毕张。拔去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>凶邪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>登崇</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>畯良</span>。占<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>小善</span>者率以录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370708_comment'></div>名一艺者无不庸。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>爬罗剔抉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>刮垢磨光</span>。盖有幸而获选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370708_comment'></div>孰云多而不扬。诸生业患不能精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370708_comment'></div>无患有司之不明。行患不能成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370708_comment'></div>无患有司之不公。言未既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370708_comment'></div>有笑于列者曰。先生欺余哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370708_comment'></div>弟子事先生。于兹有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370708_comment'></div>先生口不绝吟于六艺之文。手不停披于百家之编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370708_comment'></div>记事者必提其要。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>纂言</span>者必钩其元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>贪多务得</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>细大不捐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370708_comment'></div>焚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>膏油</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>继晷</span>。恒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>兀兀</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>穷年</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370708_comment'></div>先生之业。可谓勤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>抵排</span>异端。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>攘斥</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>佛老</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370708_comment'></div>补苴罅漏。张皇幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370708_comment'></div>寻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>坠绪</span>之茫茫。独旁搜而远绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370708_comment'></div>障百川而东之。回狂澜于既倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370708_comment'></div>先生之于儒。可谓有劳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>沈浸</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>醲郁</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>含英咀华</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370708_comment'></div>作为文章。其书满家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370708_comment'></div>上规姚姒。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>浑浑</span>无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370708_comment'></div>周诰殷盘。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>佶屈聱牙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370708_comment'></div>春秋谨严。左氏浮誇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370708_comment'></div>易奇而法。诗正而葩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370708_comment'></div>下逮庄骚。太史所录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370708_comment'></div>子云相如。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>同工异曲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370708_comment'></div>先生之于文。可谓闳其中而肆其外矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370708_comment'></div>少始知学。勇于敢为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370708_comment'></div>长通于方。左右具宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370708_comment'></div>先生之于为人。可谓成矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370708_comment'></div>然而公不见信于人。私不见助于友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>跋前踬后</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>动辄得咎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370708_comment'></div>暂为御史。遂窜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>南夷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370708_comment'></div>三年博士。冗不见治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370708_comment'></div>命与仇谋。取败几时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370708_comment'></div>冬暖而儿号寒。年丰而妻啼饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>头童齿豁</span>。竟死何裨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370708_comment'></div>不知虑此。而反教人为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370708_comment'></div>先生曰。吁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370708_comment'></div>子来前。夫大木为杗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370708_comment'></div>细木为桷。欂栌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>侏儒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370708_comment'></div>椳闑扂楔。各得其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370708_comment'></div>施以成室者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>匠氏</span>之工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>玉札</span>丹砂。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>赤箭</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/97/Comments/1")'>青芝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>牛溲马勃</span>。败鼓之皮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>俱收并蓄</span>。待用无遗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370708_comment'></div>医师之良也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>登明</span>选公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370708_comment'></div>杂进巧拙。纡馀为妍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370708_comment'></div>卓荦为杰。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>校短量长</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370708_comment'></div>惟器是适者。宰相之方也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370708_comment'></div>昔者孟轲好辩。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>孔道</span>以明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>辙环</span>天下。卒老于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370708_comment'></div>荀卿守正。大论是宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370708_comment'></div>逃谗于楚。废死兰陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370708_comment'></div>是二儒者。吐辞为经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370708_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>举足</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/120/Comments/1")'>为法</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>绝类离伦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370708_comment'></div>优入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>圣域</span>。其遇于世何如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370708_comment'></div>今先生学虽勤而不繇其统。言虽多而不要其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370708_comment'></div>文虽奇而不济于用。行虽修而不显于众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370708_comment'></div>犹且月费俸钱。岁靡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>廪粟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370708_comment'></div>子不知耕。妇不知织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370708_comment'></div>乘马<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>从徒</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>安坐</span>而食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370708_comment'></div>踵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>常途</span>之促促。窥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>陈编</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/135/Comments/1")'>盗窃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370708_comment'></div>然而圣主不加诛。宰相不见斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370708_comment'></div>兹非其幸欤。动而得谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370708_comment'></div>名亦随之。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>投闲置散</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370708_comment'></div>乃分之宜。若夫商财贿之有亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370708_comment'></div>计班资之崇庳。忘己量之所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370708_comment'></div>指前人之瑕疵。是所谓诘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>匠氏</span>之不以杙为楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370708_comment'></div>而訾医师以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>昌阳</span>引年。欲进其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370708", 1370708, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>豨苓</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370708_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_75_1370708_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年3月22日</a>　三月，韩愈又由国子博士改为尚书比部郎中，史官修撰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年3月</a>　三月，在长安任比部郎中。武元衡镇蜀时有咏韦皋所养孔雀诗，韩愈此时追和之。作品：奉和武相公镇蜀时咏使宅韦太尉所养孔雀。<span target='_blank'>奉和虢州刘给事使君<span class='inlineComment2'>（伯刍）</span>三堂新题二十一咏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>新亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49409")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49409_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49409_1'>① 并序。刘伯刍以元和八年出刺虢州。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49409'>虢州刺史宅连水池竹林，往往为亭台岛渚，目其处为三堂。刘兄自给事中出刺此州，在任馀岁，职修人治，州中称无事，颇复增饰。从子弟而游其间，又作二十一诗以咏其事，流行京师，文士争和之。余与刘善，故亦同作。</div><div id='poem_preface_49409_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49409'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49409'>湖上新亭好，公来日出初。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>竹洞</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49399_comment'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年6月</a>　六月，在长安任比部郎中。答刘轲秀才书，勉励之。作品：答刘秀才论史书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷32。）</span><div id='poem_1370631' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370631' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370631?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答刘秀才论史书</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370631")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370631_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370631'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370631'>六月九日。韩愈白秀才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370631_comment'></div>辱问见爱。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>教勉</span>以所宜务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370631_comment'></div>敢不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>拜赐</span>。愚以为凡史氏褒贬大法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370631_comment'></div>春秋已备之矣。后之作者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370631_comment'></div>在据事迹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>实录</span>。则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>善恶</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>自见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370631_comment'></div>然此尚非浅陋偷惰者所能就。况褒贬耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370631_comment'></div>孔子圣人。作春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370631_comment'></div>辱于鲁卫陈宋齐楚。卒不遇而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370631_comment'></div>齐太史氏兄弟几尽。左邱明纪春秋时事以失明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370631_comment'></div>司马迁作史记刑诛。班固瘐死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370631_comment'></div>陈寿起又废。卒亦无所至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370631_comment'></div>王隐谤退死家。习凿齿无一足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370631_comment'></div>崔浩范蔚宗赤诛。魏收夭绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370631_comment'></div>宋孝王诛死。足下所称吴兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370631_comment'></div>亦不闻身贵而今其后有闻也。夫为史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370631_comment'></div>不有人祸。则有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>天刑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370631_comment'></div>岂可不畏惧而轻为之哉。唐有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370631_comment'></div>二百年矣。圣君贤相相踵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370631_comment'></div>其馀文武之士。立功名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>跨越</span>前后者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370631_comment'></div>不可胜数。岂一人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>卒卒</span>能纪而传之邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370631_comment'></div>仆年志已就衰退。不可自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>敦率</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370631_comment'></div>宰相知其无他才能。不足用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370631_comment'></div>哀其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>老穷</span>。龃龉无所合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370631_comment'></div>不欲令四海内有戚戚者。猥言之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370631_comment'></div>苟加一职荣之耳。非必督责<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>迫蹙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370631_comment'></div>令就功役也。贱不敢逆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>盛指</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370631_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>行且</span>谋引去。且传闻不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370631_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>善恶</span>随人所见。甚者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>附党</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370631_comment'></div>憎爱不同。巧造语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370631_comment'></div>凿空构立。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>善恶</span>事迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370631_comment'></div>于今何所承受取信。而可草草作传记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370631_comment'></div>令传万世乎。若无鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370631_comment'></div>岂可不自心惭愧。若有鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370631_comment'></div>亦粗知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>自爱</span>。实不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>率尔</span>为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370631_comment'></div>夫圣唐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370631", 1370631, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>钜迹</span>。及贤士大夫事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370631_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>沈没</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370631_comment'></div>今馆中非无人。将必有作者勤而纂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370631_comment'></div>后生可畏。安知不在足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370631_comment'></div>亦宜勉之。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370631_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370631_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年6月19日</a>　六月，在长安任比部郎中。为郑儋撰神道碑文。郑卒于贞元十七年。作品：唐故河东节度观察使荥阳郑公神道碑文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷16。）</span><div id='poem_1370756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河东节度观察使荥阳郑公神道碑文</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年6月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370756")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370756'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370756'>河东节度使赠尚书右仆射郑公葬在荥阳索上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370756_comment'></div>元和八年六月庚子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370756_comment'></div>太史尚书比部郎中护军韩愈刻其墓碑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370756_comment'></div>司马氏迁江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370756_comment'></div>有郑豁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370756_comment'></div>仕慕容垂国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370756_comment'></div>为其太子少保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370756_comment'></div>其孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370756_comment'></div>当拓跋魏为荥阳太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370756_comment'></div>后者号其族为南祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370756_comment'></div>南祖之郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370756_comment'></div>入唐有为利之景谷令者曰嘉范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370756_comment'></div>于公为曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370756_comment'></div>是生抚俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370756_comment'></div>为泗之徐城令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370756_comment'></div>徐城生公之父曰洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370756_comment'></div>卒官凉之户曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370756_comment'></div>公讳儋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370756_comment'></div>少依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>母家</span>陇西李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370756_comment'></div>举止异<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>凡儿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370756_comment'></div>其舅吏部侍郎季卿谓其必能再立郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370756_comment'></div>稍长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370756_comment'></div>能自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>课学</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370756_comment'></div>明左氏春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370756_comment'></div>以进士选为太原参军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370756_comment'></div>对直言策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370756_comment'></div>拜京兆高陵尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370756_comment'></div>考府之进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370756_comment'></div>能第上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370756_comment'></div>以实不奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370756_comment'></div>樊仆射泽以襄阳兵战淮西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370756_comment'></div>公以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>参谋</span>留府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370756_comment'></div>能任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>后事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370756_comment'></div>户曹殡于凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370756_comment'></div>凉地入西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370756_comment'></div>自景谷徐城三世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370756_comment'></div>皆未还荥阳葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370756_comment'></div>公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>解官</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370756_comment'></div>举五丧为三墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370756_comment'></div>葬索东徐城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370756_comment'></div>墓无表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370756_comment'></div>公能幼长哀感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370756_comment'></div>心求不置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370756_comment'></div>以得旧人指告其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370756_comment'></div>其后为大理丞太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370756_comment'></div>迁起居郎尚书司封吏部二郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370756_comment'></div>能官举其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370756_comment'></div>德宗晚节储将于其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370756_comment'></div>以公为河东军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370756_comment'></div>能以无心处嫌閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370756_comment'></div>卒用有就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370756_comment'></div>贞元十六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370756_comment'></div>将说死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370756_comment'></div>即诏授司马节节度河东军除其官为工部尚书太原尹兼御史大夫北都留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370756_comment'></div>公之为司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370756_comment'></div>用宽廉平正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370756_comment'></div>得吏士心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370756_comment'></div>及升<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>大帅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370756_comment'></div>持是道不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370756_comment'></div>部将有因贵人求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>要职</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370756_comment'></div>公不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370756_comment'></div>用老而有功无势而远者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370756_comment'></div>削四邻之交贿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370756_comment'></div>省姱嬉之大燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370756_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>校讲</span>民事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370756_comment'></div>施罢不俟日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370756_comment'></div>用能以十月成政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370756_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>氓征</span>就宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370756_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>军给</span>以饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370756_comment'></div>十七年疾废朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370756_comment'></div>八月庚戌薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370756_comment'></div>享年六十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370756_comment'></div>天子为之不能临朝者三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370756_comment'></div>赠尚书右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370756_comment'></div>即以其年十月辛卯葬索上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370756_comment'></div>疾比薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370756_comment'></div>医问交道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370756_comment'></div>比葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370756_comment'></div>吊赠赐使者相及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370756_comment'></div>凡河东军之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370756_comment'></div>与太原之氓吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370756_comment'></div>及旁九郡百邑之鳏寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370756_comment'></div>外夷狄之统于府者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370756_comment'></div>闻公之薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370756_comment'></div>皆哭曰。<div id='poem_sentence_86_1370756_comment'></div>饮酒必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>极醉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370756_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>投壶</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_89_1370756_comment'></div>若乐而不厌者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370756_comment'></div>平居帘阁据几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370756_comment'></div>终日不知有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370756_comment'></div>别自号白云翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370756_comment'></div>名人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>魁士</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370756_comment'></div>鲜不与善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370756_comment'></div>好乐后进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370756_comment'></div>及门接引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370756_comment'></div>皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>恩意</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370756_comment'></div>始娶范阳卢氏女。<div id='poem_sentence_101_1370756_comment'></div>二季举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370756_comment'></div>皆早死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370756_comment'></div>仁本为<span
