id='poem_sentence_105_1370756_comment'></div>不乐举选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370756_comment'></div>年三十馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370756_comment'></div>始佐河阳军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370756_comment'></div>后娶赵郡李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370756_comment'></div>生三女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370756_comment'></div>二夫人凡三男五女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370756_comment'></div>长女嫁辽东李繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370756_comment'></div>繁亦名臣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370756_comment'></div>有才学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370756_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1370756", 1370756, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>遗命</span>二夫人各别为墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370756_comment'></div>不合葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370756_comment'></div>系曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370756_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_118_1370756'>士常患势卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370756_comment'></div>不能推功德及人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370756_comment'></div>常患贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370756_comment'></div>无以奉所欲得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370756_comment'></div>若郑公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370756_comment'></div>勤一生以得其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370756_comment'></div>而曾不得须臾有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370756_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370756_comment'></div>观其所既立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370756_comment'></div>其可知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370756_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_128_1370756_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年8月</a>　八月，在长安任比部郎中。应请为李栾夫人息国夫人何氏作墓志铭。何氏八月葬河阳。作品：息国夫人墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷18。）</span><div id='poem_1370785' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370785' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370785?labeling=true' target='_blank'>息国夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370785")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370785_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370785'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370785'>贞元十五年。灵州节度使御史大夫李公讳栾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370785_comment'></div>守边有劳。诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370785_comment'></div>栾妻何氏。可封息国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370785_comment'></div>元和二年。李公入为户部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370785_comment'></div>薨。夫人遂专家政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370785_comment'></div>公之男五人女二人。而何氏出者二男一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370785_comment'></div>夫人教养嫁娶如一。虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>门内</span>亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370785_comment'></div>不觉有纤毫薄厚。御<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>僮使</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370785_comment'></div>治居第生产。皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>条序</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370785_comment'></div>居卑尊閒。无不顺适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370785_comment'></div>命服在躬。承祀孔时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370785_comment'></div>年若干。元和七年甲子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>日南至</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370785_comment'></div>以疾卒。明年八月庚寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370785_comment'></div>葬河南河阳。夫人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>曾祖</span>某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370785_comment'></div>绥州刺史。祖某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370785_comment'></div>潞州别驾。父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370785_comment'></div>晋州录事参军。二男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370785_comment'></div>戡。左威卫仓曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370785_comment'></div>成。左清道率府录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370785_comment'></div>戡强以肃。成敏以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370785_comment'></div>女子嫁兴元参军郑博古。将葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370785_comment'></div>戡与成以其事乞铭于其邻韩愈。愈乃为铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370785_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1370785'>男主外事。治不为易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370785_comment'></div>施于其家。难甚吏治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370785_comment'></div>又况公侯。族大而贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370785_comment'></div>夫人是专。厥声惟懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370785_comment'></div>昔在贞元。有锡自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370785_comment'></div>启封备服。以畴时勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370785_comment'></div>婉婉夫人。有籍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>宫门</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370785_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>克承</span>其后。以嫁以婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370785_comment'></div>遂葬东土。在河之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370785_comment'></div>遥望公坟。而不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370785", 1370785, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>同藏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370785_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1370785_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年8月</a>　八月，在长安任比部郎中。应乌重胤之托，为乌父之庙作碑铭。庙坐落于京师崇化里，元和八年八月庙成。作品：乌氏庙碑铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷16。）</span><div id='poem_1370750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乌氏庙碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370750")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370750'>元和五年。天子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370750_comment'></div>卢从史始立议用师于恒。乃阴与寇连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370750_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>夸谩</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>凶骄</span>。出不逊言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370750_comment'></div>其执以来。其四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370750_comment'></div>中贵人承璀即诱而缚之。其下皆甲以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370750_comment'></div>操兵趋哗牙门。都将乌公重允当军门叱曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370750_comment'></div>天子有命。从有赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370750_comment'></div>敢违者斩。于是士皆敛兵还营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370750_comment'></div>卒致从史京师。壬辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370750_comment'></div>诏用乌公为银青光禄大夫河阳军节度使兼御史大夫。封张掖郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370750_comment'></div>居三年。河阳称治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370750_comment'></div>诏赠其父工部尚书。且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370750_comment'></div>其以庙享。即以其年营庙于京师崇化里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370750_comment'></div>军佐窃议曰。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>先公</span>既位常伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370750_comment'></div>而先夫人无加命号。名差卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370750_comment'></div>于配不宜。语闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370750_comment'></div>诏赠先夫人刘氏沛国太夫人。八年八月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370750_comment'></div>庙成。三室同宇祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370750_comment'></div>自左领府君而下。作主于第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370750_comment'></div>乙巳。升于庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370750_comment'></div>乌氏著于春秋。谱于世本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370750_comment'></div>列于姓苑。在莒者存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370750_comment'></div>在齐有馀枝鸣。皆为大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370750_comment'></div>秦有获。为大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370750_comment'></div>其后世之江南者家鄱阳。处北者家张掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370750_comment'></div>或入夷狄为君长。唐初察为左武卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370750_comment'></div>实张掖人。其子曰令望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370750_comment'></div>为左领军卫大将军。孙曰蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370750_comment'></div>为中郎将。是生赠尚书讳承玼字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370750_comment'></div>乌氏自莒齐秦大夫以来。皆以才力显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370750_comment'></div>及武德以来。始以武功为名将家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370750_comment'></div>开元中。尚书管平卢先锋军属破奚契丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370750_comment'></div>从战捺禄。走可突于渤海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370750_comment'></div>至马都山。吏民逃徙失业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370750_comment'></div>尚书领所部兵塞其道。堑原累石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370750_comment'></div>绵四百里。深高皆三丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370750_comment'></div>寇不得进。民还其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370750_comment'></div>岁罢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>运钱</span>三千万馀。黑水室韦以骑五千来属麾下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370750_comment'></div>边威益张。其后与耿仁智谋说史思明降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370750_comment'></div>思明复叛。尚书与兄承恩谋杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370750_comment'></div>事发族夷。尚书独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>走免</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370750_comment'></div>李光弼以闻。诏拜冠军将军守右威卫将军检校殿中监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370750_comment'></div>封昌化郡王。石岭军使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370750_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>积粟</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/86/Comments/1")'>厉兵</span>。出入耕战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370750_comment'></div>以疾去职。贞元十一年二月丁巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370750_comment'></div>薨于华阴告平里。年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370750_comment'></div>即葬于其地。二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370750_comment'></div>大夫为长。季曰重元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370750_comment'></div>为某官。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370750_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1370750'>乌氏在唐。有家于初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370750_comment'></div>左武左领。二祖绍居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370750_comment'></div>中郎少卑。属于尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370750_comment'></div>不偿其劳。乃相大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370750_comment'></div>授我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370750", 1370750, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>戎节</span>。制有疆墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370750_comment'></div>数备礼登。以有宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370750_comment'></div>作庙天都。以致其孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370750_comment'></div>右祖左孙。爰飨其报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370750_comment'></div>云谁无子。其有无孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370750_comment'></div>克对无羞。乃惟有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370750_comment'></div>念昔平卢。为艰为瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370750_comment'></div>大夫承之。危不弃义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370750_comment'></div>四方其平。士有迨息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370750_comment'></div>来觐来斋。以馈黍稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370750_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_63_1370750_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　十一月前，在长安任比部郎中。应请为董晋之子董溪作墓志铭。墓主卒于五月十二日，十一月下葬于河南县。作品：唐故朝散大夫商州刺史除名徙封州董府君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷19。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　本年，在长安任比部郎中。作序送韩重华归振武治所，有勉励之意。作品：送水路运使韩侍御归所治。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370662' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370662' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370662?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送水陆运使韩侍御归所治序</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370662")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370662_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370662'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370662'>六年冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370662_comment'></div>振武军吏走驿马诣阙告饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370662_comment'></div>公卿廷议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370662_comment'></div>以转运使不得其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370662_comment'></div>宜选才干之士往换之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370662_comment'></div>吾族子重华适当其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370662_comment'></div>至则出赃罪吏九百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370662_comment'></div>脱其桎梏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370662_comment'></div>给耒耜与牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370662_comment'></div>使耕其傍便近地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370662_comment'></div>以偿所负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370662_comment'></div>释其粟之在吏者四十万斛不徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370662_comment'></div>吏得去罪死假种粮齿平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370662_comment'></div>有以自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370662_comment'></div>莫不涕泣感奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370662_comment'></div>相率尽力以奉其令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370662_comment'></div>而又为之奔走经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370662_comment'></div>相原隰之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370662_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>指授</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>方法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370662_comment'></div>故连二岁大熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370662_comment'></div>吏得尽偿其所亡失四十万斛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370662_comment'></div>而私其赢馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370662_comment'></div>得以苏息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370662_comment'></div>军不复饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370662_comment'></div>君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370662_comment'></div>此未足为天子言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370662_comment'></div>请益募人为十五屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370662_comment'></div>屯置百三十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370662_comment'></div>而种百顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370662_comment'></div>令各就高为堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370662_comment'></div>东起振武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370662_comment'></div>转而西过云州界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370662_comment'></div>极于中受降城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370662_comment'></div>出入河山之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370662_comment'></div>六百馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370662_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>屯堡</span>相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370662_comment'></div>寇来不能为暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370662_comment'></div>人得肆耕其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370662_comment'></div>少可以罢漕挽之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370662_comment'></div>朝廷从其议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370662_comment'></div>秋果倍收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370662_comment'></div>岁省度支钱千三百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370662_comment'></div>八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370662_comment'></div>诏拜殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370662_comment'></div>锡服朱银。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370662_comment'></div>其冬来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370662_comment'></div>奏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370662_comment'></div>得益<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>开田</span>四千顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370662_comment'></div>则尽可以给<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>塞下</span>五城矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370662_comment'></div>田五千顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370662_comment'></div>法当用人七千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370662_comment'></div>臣令吏于无事时督习弓矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370662_comment'></div>为战守备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370662_comment'></div>因可以制虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370662_comment'></div>庶几所谓兵农兼事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370662_comment'></div>务一而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>两得</span>者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370662_comment'></div>大臣方持其议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370662_comment'></div>吾以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>边军</span>皆不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>耕作</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370662_comment'></div>开口望哺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370662_comment'></div>有司常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>僦人</span>以车船自他郡往输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370662_comment'></div>乘沙逆河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370662_comment'></div>远者数千里。<div 1370662, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>蹄踵</span>交道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370662_comment'></div>费不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370662_comment'></div>中国坐耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370662_comment'></div>而边吏恒苦食不继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370662_comment'></div>今君所请田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370662_comment'></div>皆故秦汉时郡县地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370662_comment'></div>其课绩又已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>验白</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370662_comment'></div>若从其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370662_comment'></div>其利未可遽以一二数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370662_comment'></div>今天子方举群策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370662_comment'></div>以收太平之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370662_comment'></div>宁使士有不尽用之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370662_comment'></div>怀奇见而不得施设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370662_comment'></div>君又何忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370662_comment'></div>而中台士大夫亦同言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370662_comment'></div>侍御韩君前领三县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370662_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1370662", 1370662, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>纪纲</span>二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370662_comment'></div>奏课常为天下第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370662_comment'></div>行其计于边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370662_comment'></div>其功烈又赫赫如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370662_comment'></div>使尽用其策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370662_comment'></div>西北边故所没地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370662_comment'></div>可指期而有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370662_comment'></div>闻其归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370662_comment'></div>皆相勉为诗以推大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370662_comment'></div>而属余为序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_88_1370662_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　夏秋之间，在长安。应请为田弘正夫人作墓志铭。作品：相州刺史御史中丞田公故夫人魏氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年10月</a>　十月，在长安任比部郎中。应请为李虚中撰墓志铭。作品：殿中侍御史李君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷18。）</span><div id='poem_1370788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370788' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370788?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中侍御史李君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370788")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370788_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370788'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370788'>殿中侍御史李君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370788_comment'></div>名虚中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370788_comment'></div>字常容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370788_comment'></div>其十一世祖冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370788_comment'></div>贵显拓跋世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370788_comment'></div>父恽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370788_comment'></div>河南温县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370788_comment'></div>娶陈留太守薛江童女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370788_comment'></div>生六子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370788_comment'></div>君最后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370788_comment'></div>爱于其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370788_comment'></div>年少长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370788_comment'></div>喜学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370788_comment'></div>学无所不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370788_comment'></div>最深于五行书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370788_comment'></div>以人之始生年月日所直日辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370788_comment'></div>支干相生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370788_comment'></div>胜衰死王相斟酌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370788_comment'></div>推人寿夭贵贱利不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370788_comment'></div>辄先处其年时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370788_comment'></div>百不失一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370788_comment'></div>其说<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>汪洋</span>奥美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370788_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>关节</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>开解</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370788_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>万端</span>千绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370788_comment'></div>参错重出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370788_comment'></div>学者就传其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370788_comment'></div>初若可取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370788_comment'></div>卒然失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370788_comment'></div>星官历翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370788_comment'></div>莫能与其校得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370788_comment'></div>进士及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370788_comment'></div>试<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>书判</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_32_1370788_comment'></div>母丧去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370788_comment'></div>卒丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370788_comment'></div>选补太子校书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370788_comment'></div>河南尹奏疏授伊阙尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370788_comment'></div>佐水陆<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_39_1370788_comment'></div>宰相武公元衡之出剑南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370788_comment'></div>奏夺为观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370788_comment'></div>授监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370788_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370788_comment'></div>御史台疏言行能高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370788_comment'></div>不宜用外府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370788_comment'></div>即诏为真御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370788_comment'></div>半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370788_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>分部</span>东都台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370788_comment'></div>迁殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370788_comment'></div>元和八年四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370788_comment'></div>诏徵既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370788_comment'></div>宰相欲白以为起居舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370788_comment'></div>经一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370788_comment'></div>疽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>发背</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370788_comment'></div>六月乙酉卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370788_comment'></div>年五十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370788_comment'></div>其年十月戊申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370788_comment'></div>葬河南洛阳县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370788_comment'></div>距其祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>渑池</span>令府君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>侨墓</span>十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370788_comment'></div>君昆弟六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370788_comment'></div>先君而殁者四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370788_comment'></div>其一人尝为郑之荥泽尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370788_comment'></div>信<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>道士</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>长生不死</span>之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370788_comment'></div>既去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370788_comment'></div>绝不营人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370788_comment'></div>故四门之寡妻孤孩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370788_comment'></div>与荥泽之妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370788_comment'></div>衣食百须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370788_comment'></div>皆由君出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370788_comment'></div>自初为伊阙尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370788_comment'></div>佐河南水陆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>运使</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370788_comment'></div>换两使经七年不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370788_comment'></div>所以为供给教养者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370788_comment'></div>及由蜀来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>辈类</span>御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370788_comment'></div>皆乐在朝廷进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370788_comment'></div>君独念寡稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370788_comment'></div>求分司东出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370788_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370788_comment'></div>其仁哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370788_comment'></div>君亦好<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>道士</span>说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370788_comment'></div>于蜀得秘方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370788_comment'></div>能以水银为黄金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370788_comment'></div>服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370788_comment'></div>冀果不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370788_comment'></div>将疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370788_comment'></div>谓其友卫中行大受韩愈退之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370788_comment'></div>大还者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370788_comment'></div>大归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370788_comment'></div>其告之矣。<div id='poem_sentence_102_1370788_comment'></div>与君合德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370788_comment'></div>亲戚无退一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370788_comment'></div>男三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370788_comment'></div>长曰初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370788_comment'></div>协律。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370788_comment'></div>女子九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370788_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370788_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_113_1370788'>不赢其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370788_comment'></div>以尚其后人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1370788_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年10月</a>　十月，在长安任比部郎中。长安降非常之大雪。韩愈有诗和崔立之咏雪之作。作品：酬蓝田崔丞立之咏雪见寄。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_49547' id='poem_sentence_3_49547'>不觉侵堂陛，方应折屋椽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49547'>出门愁落道，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49547", 49547, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>上马</span>恐平鞯。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年11月</a>　十一月，在长安任比部郎中、史馆修撰。监修李吉甫以韦处厚所撰《顺宗实录》三卷授韩愈，令与沈传师、宇文籍等共同采访重修。作品：顺宗实录。<span class='inlineComment2'>（马其昶《韩昌黎文集校注·文外集》下卷。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年11月</a>　十一月，在长安任比部郎中。奉诏为魏博节度观察使沂国公田弘正先庙撰写碑铭。作品：魏博节度观察使沂国公先庙碑铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷16。）</span><div id='poem_1370758' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370758' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370758?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏博节度观察使沂国公先庙碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370758")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370758_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370758'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370758'>元和八年十一月壬子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370758_comment'></div>上命丞相元衡丞相吉甫丞相绛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370758_comment'></div>召太史尚书比部郎中韩愈至政事堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370758_comment'></div>传诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370758_comment'></div>田宏正始有庙京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370758_comment'></div>朕惟宏正先祖父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370758_comment'></div>厥心靡不向帝室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370758_comment'></div>讫不得施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370758_comment'></div>乃以教付厥子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370758_comment'></div>维宏正衔训事嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370758_comment'></div>朝夕不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370758_comment'></div>以能迎天之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370758_comment'></div>显有丕功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370758_comment'></div>维父子继忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370758_comment'></div>予维宠嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370758_comment'></div>是以命汝愈铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370758_comment'></div>钦哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370758_comment'></div>惟时臣愈承命悸恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370758_comment'></div>明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370758_comment'></div>诣东上阁门拜疏辞谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370758_comment'></div>不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370758_comment'></div>退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370758_comment'></div>伏念昔者鲁僖公能遵其祖伯禽之烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370758_comment'></div>周天子实命其史臣克作为駉駜泮閟之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370758_comment'></div>使声于其庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370758_comment'></div>以假鲁灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370758_comment'></div>今天子嘉田侯服父训不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370758_comment'></div>用康靖我国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370758_comment'></div>盖宠铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370758_comment'></div>所以休宁田氏之祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370758_comment'></div>而臣适执笔隶太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370758_comment'></div>奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370758", 1370758, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>明命</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370758_comment'></div>其可以辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370758_comment'></div>谨桉魏博节度使银青光禄大夫检校工部尚书兼魏州大都督府长史御史大夫沂国公田宏正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370758_comment'></div>北平卢龙人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370758_comment'></div>故为魏博诸将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370758_comment'></div>忠孝畏慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370758_comment'></div>田季安卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370758_comment'></div>其子幼弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370758_comment'></div>用故事代父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370758_comment'></div>人吏不附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370758_comment'></div>迎宏正于其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370758_comment'></div>使领军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370758_comment'></div>宏正籍其军之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370758_comment'></div>与六州之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370758_comment'></div>还之朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370758_comment'></div>悉除河北故事比诸州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370758_comment'></div>故得用为帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370758_comment'></div>已而复赠其父故沧州刺史兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370758_comment'></div>母夫人郑氏梁国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370758_comment'></div>得立庙祭三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370758_comment'></div>曾祖都水使者府君祭初室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370758_comment'></div>祖安东司马赠襄州刺史府君祭二室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370758_comment'></div>兵部府君祭东室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370758_comment'></div>其铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370758_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_1370758'>唐继古帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370758_comment'></div>海外受制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370758_comment'></div>狎于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370758", 1370758, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>太宁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370758_comment'></div>燕盗以惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370758_comment'></div>群党相维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370758_comment'></div>河北失平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370758_comment'></div>号登元和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370758_comment'></div>大圣载营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370758_comment'></div>风挥日舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370758_comment'></div>咸顺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370758", 1370758, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>指令</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370758_comment'></div>嶪嶪魏土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370758_comment'></div>婴儿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370758", 1370758, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>戏兵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370758_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370758", 1370758, id='poem_sentence_83_1370758_comment'></div>以降命书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370758_comment'></div>旌节有韬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370758_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1370758", 1370758, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>承辅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370758_comment'></div>咨汝田侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370758_comment'></div>勿亟勿迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370758_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1370758", 1370758, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>觐飨</span>式时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370758_comment'></div>尔祖尔思。</div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1370758_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年12月</a>　年末，在长安任比部郎中。因武陵太守窦常倩人画《桃源图》，韩愈由之作诗，破神仙荒唐之说。作品：桃源图。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_comment_49690'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49690)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　本年，在长安任比部郎中。应请为马畅之妻卢氏撰墓志铭。作品：扶风郡夫人墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷18。）</span><div id='poem_1370787' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370787' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370787?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扶风郡夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370787")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370787_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370787'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370787'>夫人姓卢氏。范阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370787_comment'></div>亳州城父丞序之孙。吉州刺史彻之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370787_comment'></div>嫁扶风马氏。为司徒侍中庄武公之冢妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370787_comment'></div>少府监西平郡王赠工部尚书之夫人。初司徒与其配陈国夫人元氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370787_comment'></div>惟宗庙之尊重。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>继序</span>之不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370787_comment'></div>贤其子之才。求妇之可与齐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370787_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>内外亲</span>咸曰。卢某旧门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370787_comment'></div>承守不失其初。其子女闻教训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370787_comment'></div>有幽閒之德。为公子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>择妇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370787_comment'></div>宜莫如卢氏。媒者曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370787_comment'></div>卜者曰祥。夫人适年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370787_comment'></div>入门而媪御皆喜。既馈而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>公姑</span>交贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370787_comment'></div>克受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>成福</span>。母有多子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370787_comment'></div>为妇为母。莫不法式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370787_comment'></div>天资仁恕。左右<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>媵侍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370787_comment'></div>常蒙假与颜色。人人莫不自在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370787_comment'></div>杖婢使。数未尝过二三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370787_comment'></div>虽有不怿。未尝见声气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370787_comment'></div>元和五年。尚书薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370787_comment'></div>夫人哭泣成疾。后二年亦薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370787_comment'></div>年四十有六。九年正月癸酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370787_comment'></div>祔于其夫之封。长子殿中丞继祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370787_comment'></div>孝友以类。葬有日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370787_comment'></div>言曰。吾父友惟韩丈人视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>诸孤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370787_comment'></div>其往乞铭。以其状来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370787_comment'></div>愈曰。日尝闻乃公言然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370787_comment'></div>吾宜铭。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370787_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1370787'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>阴幽</span>坤从。惟德之恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370787_comment'></div>出为辨强。乃匪妇能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370787_comment'></div>淑哉夫人。夙有多誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370787_comment'></div>来嫔大家。不介父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370787_comment'></div>有事宾祭。酒食祗饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370787_comment'></div>协于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>尊章</span>。畏我侍侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370787_comment'></div>及嗣内事。亦莫有施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370787_comment'></div>齐其躬心。小大顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370787_comment'></div>夫先其归。其室有邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370787_comment'></div>合葬有铭。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370787", 1370787, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>壸彝</span>是收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370787_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1370787_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　本年，在长安任比部郎中、史馆修撰。受请为胡明允作墓志铭。作品：试大理评事胡君墓铭。<span "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>文谱</span>。进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370807", 1370807, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>连伦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370807_comment'></div>惟明允。加武资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370807_comment'></div>力牛虎。柔不持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370807_comment'></div>吏夏阳。有施为。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1370807_comment'></div>宜兹人。肖后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370807_comment'></div>五十七。不足年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370807_comment'></div>孤儿啼。死<span id='poem_sentence_14_1370807_comment'></div>作后铭。系序初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370807_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1370807_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。郑馀庆移驻兴元（今陕西汉中），用孟郊为其军参谋，试大理评事，孟郊率家人前往赴任。行前有诗赠韩愈，韩作诗答之。诗作于三月后。作品：江汉一首答孟郊。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_49587' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49587' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49587?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_7_49587_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。时郑馀庆、樊宗师为山南西正副节度使，诗中常念及韩愈，韩愈写诗以报。诗语奇而涩，乃效樊宗师体而作。诗作于三月后。作品：山南郑相公樊员外酬答为诗其末咸有见及语樊封以示愈依赋十四韵以献。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_49553' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49553?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_14_49553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49553'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_49553_0'>⑴ 烹谓烹击，斡谓斡旋，犹宰制也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_49553_0'>⑵ 岔，蒲闷切，词音佛，或作拂，坲𡋯，尘起貌</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_49553_0'>⑶ 《公羊传》：“宝者何，璋判白龟青纯。”何休注：“判，半也，半圭曰璋。龟判言其所执，衮黻言其所服。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_49553_0'>⑷ 呀豁，隙窍也。疚，劳也。因其隙窍，力加掊掘。掊掘者，讨究也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_49553_0'>⑸ 于聿切。耵聍，耳垢也，如新去耳垢，却闻雷霆飓䫻也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49553_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　秋，在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。张道士从长安回嵩山，作诗并序赠之。作品：送张道士并序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_49673' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49673' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49673?labeling=true' "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>寻尺</span>各有施。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49673'>况当营都邑，<span class='link' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49673'>诣阙三上书，臣非黄冠师。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49673'>臣有胆与气，不忍死茅茨。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49673'>其言简且要，陛下幸听之。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>收拾</span>不可迟。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49673'>岭北梁可构，寒鱼下清伊<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_49673", 49673, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>且复</span>还其私。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_49673'>从容进退间，无一不合宜。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49673'>时有利不利，虽贤欲奚为。<div id='poem_sentence_21_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_49673'>但当励前操，富贵非公谁。<div id='poem_sentence_22_49673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_49673'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_49673_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　秋，在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。某日早晨赴长安西街，参与国忌行香，作诗赠卢汀、李逢吉。作品：早赴街西行香赠卢李二中舍人。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_49488' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49488' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49488?labeling=true' target='_blank'>早赴街西行香赠卢李二中舍人<span class='inlineComment2'>（卢汀、李逢吉也。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49488")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_49488_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49488'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49488'>天街东西异，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49488", 49488, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>祗命</span>遂成游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49488'>月明御沟晓，蝉吟堤树秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49488'>老僧情不薄，僻寺境还幽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49488'>寂寥二三子，归骑得相收。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49488'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49488_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　九月前，在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。应请为刘昌裔作墓志铭。作品：检校尚书左仆射右龙武军统军刘公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷19。）</span><div id='poem_1370794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>检校尚书左仆射右龙武军统军刘公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370794")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370794'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370794'>公讳昌裔。字光后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370794_comment'></div>本彭城人。曾大父讳承庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370794_comment'></div>朔州刺史。大父巨敖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370794_comment'></div>好读老子庄周书。为太原晋阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370794_comment'></div>再世官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>北方</span>。乐其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>土俗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370794_comment'></div>遂著籍太原之阳曲。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370794_comment'></div>自吾为此邑人可也。何必彭城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370794_comment'></div>父讼。赠右散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370794_comment'></div>公少好学问。始为儿时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370794_comment'></div>重迟不戏。恒若有所思念计画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370794_comment'></div>及壮自试。以开吐蕃说干边将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370794_comment'></div>不售。入三蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370794_comment'></div>从道士游。久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370794_comment'></div>蜀人苦杨琳寇掠。公单船往说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370794_comment'></div>琳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>感欷</span>。虽不即降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370794_comment'></div>约其徒不得为虐。琳降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370794_comment'></div>公常随琳不去。琳死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370794_comment'></div>脱身亡。沈浮河朔之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370794_comment'></div>建中中。曲环招起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370794_comment'></div>为环檄李纳。指摘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>切刻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370794_comment'></div>纳悔恐动心。恒魏皆疑惑气懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370794_comment'></div>环封奏其本。德宗称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370794_comment'></div>环之会下濮州。战<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>白塔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370794_comment'></div>救宁陵襄邑。击李希烈陈州城下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370794_comment'></div>公常在军閒。环领陈许军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370794_comment'></div>公因为陈许从事。以前后功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370794_comment'></div>累迁检校兵部郎中御史中丞营田副使。吴少诚乘环丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370794_comment'></div>引兵叩城。留后上官说咨公以城守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370794_comment'></div>所以能擒诛叛将。为抗拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370794_comment'></div>令敌人不得其便。围解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370794_comment'></div>拜陈州刺史。韩全义败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370794_comment'></div>引军走陈州。求入保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370794_comment'></div>公自城上揖谢全义曰。公受命诣蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370794_comment'></div>何为来陈。公无恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370794_comment'></div>贼必不敢至我城下。明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370794_comment'></div>领骑步十馀抵全义营。全义惊喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370794_comment'></div>迎拜叹息。殊不敢以不见舍望公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370794_comment'></div>改授陈许军司马。上官说死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370794_comment'></div>拜金紫光禄大夫检校工部尚书。代说为节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370794_comment'></div>命界上吏不得犯蔡州人。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370794_comment'></div>俱天子人。奚为相伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370794_comment'></div>少诚吏有来犯者。捕得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>缚送</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370794_comment'></div>曰。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>妄称</span>彼人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370794_comment'></div>公宜自治之。少诚惭其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370794_comment'></div>亦禁界上暴者。两界耕桑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>交迹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370794_comment'></div>吏不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>何问</span>。封彭城郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370794_comment'></div>就拜尚书右仆射。元和七年得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370794_comment'></div>视政不时。八年五月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370794_comment'></div>涌水出他界。过其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370794_comment'></div>防穿不补。没邑屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370794_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>流杀</span>居人。拜疏请去职即罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370794_comment'></div>诏还京师。即其日与使者俱西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370794_comment'></div>大热。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>旦暮</span>驰不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370794_comment'></div>疾大发。左右手辔止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370794_comment'></div>公不肯曰。吾恐不得生谢天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370794_comment'></div>上益遣使者劳问。敕无亟行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370794_comment'></div>至则不得朝矣。天子以为恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370794_comment'></div>即其家拜检校左仆射右<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>龙武军</span>统军知军事。十一月某甲子薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370794_comment'></div>年六十二。上为之一日不视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370794_comment'></div>赠潞州大都督。命郎吊其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370794_comment'></div>明年某月某甲子。葬河南某县某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370794_comment'></div>公不好<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>音声</span>。不大为居宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370794_comment'></div>于诸帅中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>独然</span>。夫人邠国夫人武功苏氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370794_comment'></div>子四人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>嗣子</span>光禄主簿纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370794_comment'></div>学于樊宗师。士大夫多称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370794_comment'></div>长子元一。朴直<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370794", 1370794, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>忠厚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370794_comment'></div>便弓马。为淮南军衙门将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370794_comment'></div>次子景阳景长。皆举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370794_comment'></div>葬得日。相与选使者哭拜阶上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370794_comment'></div>使来乞铭。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370794_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_1370794'>提将之符。尸我一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370794_comment'></div>配古侯公。维德不爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370794_comment'></div>我铭不亡。后人之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370794_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_73_1370794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　九月前，在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。应请为刘昌裔作碑文。作品：刘统军碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷17。）</span><div id='poem_1370755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘统军碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370755")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370755'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370755'>唐故陈许军节度使金紫光禄大夫检校尚书左仆射兼御史大夫右龙武统军彭城郡开国公食邑二千户赠潞州大都督刘公。讳昌裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370755_comment'></div>字光后。薨既葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370755_comment'></div>将反机于京。舍于墓次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370755_comment'></div>故吏文武士门人送客讫事。会哭将退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370755_comment'></div>咸顾恋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>牵连</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>一口</span>言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370755_comment'></div>自我公薨至葬。凡所以校德焯勤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370755_comment'></div>莫不粗完。隐卒崇终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370755_comment'></div>有都督之诏。日事时功以著不可诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370755_comment'></div>有太史之状太常之状。有谥有诔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370755_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>幽堂</span>之铭。又如即外碑刻文以显诗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370755_comment'></div>其于传无已。岂不益可保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370755_comment'></div>于是相许诺。以告其孤纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370755_comment'></div>纵哭。舍杖拜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370755_comment'></div>纵不敢违。则相与刻铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370755_comment'></div>文曰。刘处彭城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370755_comment'></div>本自楚元。阳曲之别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370755_comment'></div>繇公祖迁。公曾祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370755_comment'></div>为朔州守。祖令太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370755_comment'></div>仍世北边。乐其高寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370755_comment'></div>弃楚不还。逮于公身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370755_comment'></div>三世晋人。公生而异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370755_comment'></div>魁颜钜鼻。幼如舒退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370755_comment'></div>少长好事。西戎乘势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370755_comment'></div>盗有河外。公虽家居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370755_comment'></div>为国<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>喑噫</span>。来告边帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370755_comment'></div>可破之计。杨琳为横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370755_comment'></div>巴蜀靡彫。公由游寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370755_comment'></div>单船<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>谕招</span>。折其尾毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370755_comment'></div>不得动摇。琳后来降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370755_comment'></div>公不有功。终琳之已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370755_comment'></div>还卧民里。盖古有云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370755_comment'></div>人职其忧。无事于职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370755_comment'></div>而与国谋。德宗之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370755_comment'></div>为曲环起。奋笔为檄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370755_comment'></div>强寇气死。决败算成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370755_comment'></div>效于屈指。环有许师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370755_comment'></div>公遂佐之。苏氏轧敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370755_comment'></div>多出公画。累拜郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370755_comment'></div>进兼中丞。虽在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>陪贰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370755_comment'></div>天子所凭。蔡卒幸丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370755_comment'></div>围我许郛。新师不牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370755_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>劻勷</span>将逋。公为陈方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370755_comment'></div>应变为械。与之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>上下</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370755_comment'></div>寇无所赖。遂至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>遁败</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370755_comment'></div>以功迁陈。实许之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370755_comment'></div>声驾元侯。以势自惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370755_comment'></div>复入居许。为军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370755_comment'></div>脱权下威。士心益归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370755_comment'></div>卒嗣环职。弃恶从德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370755_comment'></div>乃与蔡通。涂其榛棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370755_comment'></div>稚耆嬉遨。连手歌讴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370755_comment'></div>上无可怨。外无与雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370755_comment'></div>既长事官。浚之大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370755_comment'></div>其偿未塞。仆射以都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370755_comment'></div>及癸巳岁。秋涌水出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370755_comment'></div>流过其部。破民庐室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370755_comment'></div>公即疏言。此皆臣愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370755_comment'></div>防断不补。渍民于泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370755_comment'></div>臣耄且疾。宜即大罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370755_comment'></div>上曰𤉣害。大臣其来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370755_comment'></div>允余之思。其可止哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370755_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>驿隶</span>走呼。有中使来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370755_comment'></div>公迎于驿。遂行不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370755_comment'></div>六月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>隆热</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>上下</span>歊赩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370755_comment'></div>公鞭公驱。去马以舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370755_comment'></div>公病日恶。不能造阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370755_comment'></div>仆卧在宅。闵有加锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370755_comment'></div>命为统军。龙武之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370755_comment'></div>兼官左相。百僚长首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370755_comment'></div>冬十一月。日将南至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370755_comment'></div>公遂薨殂。年六十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370755_comment'></div>奏闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370755", 1370755, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>怛悼</span>。俾官临吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370755_comment'></div>悲不听朝。赠督潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370755_comment'></div>存殁之赉。于数为优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370755_comment'></div>明年九月。东葬金谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370755_comment'></div>公往有命。匪后人卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370755_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1370755_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年9月</a>　九月，在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。为好友孟郊作墓志铭。孟郊八月卒，十月葬于洛阳。作品：贞曜先生墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷19。）</span><div id='poem_1370790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贞曜先生墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370790")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370790'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370790'>唐元和九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370790_comment'></div>岁在甲午八月己亥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370790_comment'></div>贞曜先生孟氏卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370790_comment'></div>无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370790_comment'></div>其配郑氏以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370790_comment'></div>愈走位哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370790_comment'></div>且召张籍会哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370790_comment'></div>明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370790_comment'></div>使以钱如东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370790_comment'></div>供丧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370790_comment'></div>诸尝与往来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370790_comment'></div>咸来哭吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370790_comment'></div>韩氏遂以书告兴元尹故相馀庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370790_comment'></div>闰月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370790_comment'></div>樊宗师使来吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370790_comment'></div>告葬期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370790_comment'></div>徵铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370790_comment'></div>愈哭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370790_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370790_comment'></div>吾尚忍铭吾友也夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370790_comment'></div>兴元人以币如孟氏赙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370790_comment'></div>且来商家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370790_comment'></div>樊子使来速铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370790_comment'></div>不则无以掩诸幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370790_comment'></div>乃序而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370790_comment'></div>先生讳郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370790_comment'></div>字东野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370790_comment'></div>父庭玢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370790_comment'></div>娶裴氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370790_comment'></div>而选为昆山尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370790_comment'></div>生先生及二季酆郢而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370790_comment'></div>先生生六七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>端序</span>则见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370790_comment'></div>长而愈骞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370790_comment'></div>涵而揉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>内外</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/35/Comments/1")'>完好</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>色夷</span>气清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370790_comment'></div>可畏而亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370790_comment'></div>及其为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>刿目鉥心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>刃迎缕解</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>钩章棘句</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>搯擢</span>胃肾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>神施鬼设</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370790_comment'></div>閒见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>层出</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370790_comment'></div>惟其大玩于词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370790_comment'></div>而与世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>抹摋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370790_comment'></div>人皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>劫劫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370790_comment'></div>我独有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370790_comment'></div>有以后时开先生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370790_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370790_comment'></div>吾既挤而与之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370790_comment'></div>其犹足存耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370790_comment'></div>年几五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370790_comment'></div>始以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>尊夫人</span>之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370790_comment'></div>来集京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370790_comment'></div>从进士试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370790_comment'></div>既得即去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370790_comment'></div>閒四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370790_comment'></div>又命来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370790_comment'></div>选为溧阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370790_comment'></div>迎侍溧上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370790_comment'></div>去尉二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370790_comment'></div>而故相郑公尹河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370790_comment'></div>奏为水陆运从事试协律郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370790_comment'></div>亲拜其母于门内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370790_comment'></div>母卒五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370790_comment'></div>而郑公以节领兴元军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370790_comment'></div>奏为其军参谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370790_comment'></div>试大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370790_comment'></div>挈其妻行之兴元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370790_comment'></div>次于阌乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>暴疾</span>卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370790_comment'></div>年六十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370790_comment'></div>买棺以敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370790_comment'></div>以二人舆归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370790_comment'></div>酆郢皆在江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370790_comment'></div>十月庚申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370790_comment'></div>樊子合凡赠赙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370790_comment'></div>而葬之洛阳东其先人墓左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370790_comment'></div>以馀财附其家而供祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370790_comment'></div>将葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370790_comment'></div>张籍曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370790_comment'></div>先生揭德振华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370790_comment'></div>于古有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370790_comment'></div>贤者故事有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370790", 1370790, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>易名</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370790_comment'></div>况士哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370790_comment'></div>如曰贞曜先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370790_comment'></div>则姓名字行有载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370790_comment'></div>不待讲说而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370790_comment'></div>皆曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370619_comment'></div>尚有馀资。今裴押衙所送二百七十千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370619_comment'></div>足以益业。为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370619", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370853_comment'></div>丞相之所卒问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370853_comment'></div>群儒拱手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370853_comment'></div>孰云具美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370853_comment'></div>而不永年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370853_comment'></div>某等早接游从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370853_comment'></div>实钦道义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370853_comment'></div>致诚薄奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370853_comment'></div>以诀终天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370853_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370853_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1370853_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年10月</a>　十月中上旬，在长安，任比部郎中、史馆修撰。为大理评事王适作墓志铭。作品：试大理评事王君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷18。）</span><div id='poem_1370786' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370786")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370786_comment'></div>姓王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370786_comment'></div>好读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370786_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>怀奇</span>负气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370786_comment'></div>不肯随人后举选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370786_comment'></div>见功业有道路可指取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370786_comment'></div>有名节可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>戾契</span>致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370786_comment'></div>困于无资地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370786_comment'></div>不能自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370786_comment'></div>乃以干诸公贵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370786_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>借助</span>声势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370786_comment'></div>诸公贵人既志得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370786_comment'></div>皆乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>熟软</span>媚耳目者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370786_comment'></div>不喜闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>生语</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370786_comment'></div>一见辄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>戒门</span>以绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370786_comment'></div>上初即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370786_comment'></div>以四科募天下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370786_comment'></div>君笑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370786_comment'></div>此非吾时耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370786_comment'></div>即提所作书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370786_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>缘道</span>歌吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370786_comment'></div>趋直言试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370786_comment'></div>既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370786_comment'></div>对语惊人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370786_comment'></div>不中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370786_comment'></div>益困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370786_comment'></div><span 1370786, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>蹐门</span>告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370786_comment'></div>天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>奇男子</span>王适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370786_comment'></div>愿见将军白事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370786_comment'></div>一见语<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>合意</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370786_comment'></div>往来门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370786_comment'></div>卢从史既节度昭义军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370786_comment'></div>张甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370786_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370786", 1370786, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>奴视</span>法度士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370786_comment'></div>欲闻无顾忌<span id='poem_sentence_39_1370786_comment'></div>君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370786_comment'></div>狂子不足以共事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370786_comment'></div>立谢客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370786_comment'></div>以列幽墟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_132_1370786_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年10月21日</a>　十月二十一日，由尚书比部郎中转考功郎中，仍为史官修撰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年10月</a>　深秋，在长安，任考功郎中、史馆修撰。僧广宣居长安安国寺，频与诗人往来。韩愈作诗赠之，暗含厌恶之意。作品：广宣上人频见过。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_49479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广宣上人频见过</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年10月）</span><span
