class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_49479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49479'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49479'>三百<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作十）</span>六旬长扰扰，不冲风雨即尘埃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49479'>久惭<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作为）</span>朝士无裨补，空愧高僧数往来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49479'>学道穷年何所得，吟诗竟日未能回。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49479'>天寒古寺游人少，红叶窗前有几堆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49479'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49479'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49479)'>评注</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49457")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49457_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49457'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49457'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49457", 49457, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>软湿</span>青黄状可猜，欲烹还唤木盘回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49457'>烦君自入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49457", 49457, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>华阳洞</span>，直割乖龙左耳来<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49457'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49457'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_49457_0'>⑴ 柳宗元《龙城录》：“茅山道士吴绰，采药于华阳洞口，见一儿手把三珠，戏于松下，绰从之。奔入洞中，化为龙，以三珠填左耳中。绰斸其耳，而失其珠。”冯贽《云仙录》：“天罚乖龙，必割其耳。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49457_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年11月</a>　十一月，在长安，任考功郎中、史馆修撰。胡证以御史中丞任振武节度使，以诗奉酬之。作品：奉酬振武胡十二丈大夫。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_49506' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49506' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49506?labeling=true' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49506", 49506, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>虎臣</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49506'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49506", 49506, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>戎旆</span>暂停辞社树，里门先下敬乡人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49506'>自笑平生誇胆气，不离文字鬓毛新。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49506'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49506_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年12月15日</a>　十二月戊午日，任考功郎中、知制诰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年12月25日</a>　十二月，在长安，任考功郎中、知制诰。韦贯之任宰相，韩愈以考功郎中知制诰为之代作让官表。作品：为韦相公让官表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div id='poem_1370522' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370522' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370522?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为韦相公让官表</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年12月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370522")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370522_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370522'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370522'>臣某言。伏奉今日制命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370522_comment'></div>以臣为尚书右丞同中书门下平章事。非常之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370522_comment'></div>忽降于上天。不次之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370522_comment'></div>遽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>属于</span>庸品。承命震骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370522_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>心神</span>靡宁。顾已惭腼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370522_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>手足失措</span>。臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370522_comment'></div>臣本非长才。又乏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>敏识</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370522_comment'></div>学不能通达经训。文不足缘饰吏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370522_comment'></div>徒知立志廉谨。绝朋势之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370522_comment'></div>处官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>恪恭</span>。免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>请托</span>之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370522_comment'></div>因缘资序。骤历台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370522_comment'></div>蒙生成于天地。无裨补于涓尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370522_comment'></div>忝冒以居。涯分遂极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370522_comment'></div>常以盈满自诫。方思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>退处</span>里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370522_comment'></div>何意恩泽益深。猥令超参<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>鼎铉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370522_comment'></div>窃自惟度。实不堪任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370522_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。臣闻宰相者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370522_comment'></div>上熙陛下覆帱之恩。下遂群生性命之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370522_comment'></div>以正百度。以和四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370522_comment'></div>澄其源而清其流。统于一而应于万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370522_comment'></div>毫釐之差。或致弊于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>寰海</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370522_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>晷刻</span>之误。或遗患于历年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370522_comment'></div>固宜旁求隐士。必得能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370522_comment'></div>然后授之。不可轻以付臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370522_comment'></div>使人失望。上累圣主知人之哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370522_comment'></div>下乖微臣量已之义。无补于理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370522_comment'></div>有妨于贤。况今俊乂至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370522_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>耆硕</span>咸在。苟以登用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370522_comment'></div>皆踰于臣。伏乞特回所授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370522_comment'></div>以示至公之道。天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370522", 1370522, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>幸甚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370522_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1370522_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年12月</a>　十二月，在长安，任考功郎中、知制诰。因蒙魏博节度使田弘正之荐，韩愈改任知制诰，故作书以答谢之。作品：答魏博田仆射书。<span id='poem_sentence_34_1370623_comment'></div>欣荷实深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370623_comment'></div>伏望照察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370623_comment'></div>限以<span id='poem_sentence_38_1370623_comment'></div>无任驰恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370623_comment'></div>谨因使回奉状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370623_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370623_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1370623_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年1月1日</a>　元日，在长安，任考功郎中、知制诰。参加朝会回，卢汀有诗相赠，作诗以和。作品：奉和库部卢四兄曹长元日朝回。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_49503' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年2月</a>　初春惊蛰日，在长安，任考功郎中、知制诰。天降大雪，因去年天旱少雨雪，故为宰相武元衡等代作贺雪表。作品：为宰相贺雪表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>诏文</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370792_comment'></div>望临一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370792_comment'></div>登君于门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370792_comment'></div>归以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370792_comment'></div>选授奉礼郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370792_comment'></div>杨于陵为华州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370792_comment'></div>署君镇国军判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370792_comment'></div>奏授协律郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370792_comment'></div>朋游益附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370792_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>华问</span>弥大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370792_comment'></div>元和元年对诏策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370792_comment'></div>拜右拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370792_comment'></div>二年兼职史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370792_comment'></div>四年迁右补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370792_comment'></div>诏中贵人承璀将兵诛王承宗河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370792_comment'></div>君奏疏谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370792_comment'></div>召见问状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370792_comment'></div>有言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>动听</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370792_comment'></div>其后上将有所相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370792_comment'></div>不可于众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370792_comment'></div>君与起居舍人李约<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>交章</span>指摘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370792_comment'></div>事以不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370792_comment'></div>五年迁起居郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370792_comment'></div>为翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370792_comment'></div>愈被亲信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370792_comment'></div>有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>补助</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370792_comment'></div>权公既相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370792_comment'></div>君以嫌自列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370792_comment'></div>改尚书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>考功</span>员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370792_comment'></div>复史馆职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370792_comment'></div>七年以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>考功</span>知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370792_comment'></div>入谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370792_comment'></div>因赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370792_comment'></div>八年迁驾部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370792_comment'></div>职如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370792_comment'></div>权公去相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370792_comment'></div>复入翰林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370792_comment'></div>九年以疾罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370792_comment'></div>寻迁秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370792_comment'></div>即閒于郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370792_comment'></div>十年正月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370792_comment'></div>病遂殆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370792_comment'></div>甲午舆归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370792_comment'></div>卒于其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370792_comment'></div>赠绛州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370792_comment'></div>年四十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370792_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370792", 1370792, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>男子</span>二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370792_comment'></div>长曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370792_comment'></div>早死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370792_comment'></div>次曰天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370792_comment'></div>夫人天水权氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370792_comment'></div>赠太子太保贞孝公皋之承孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370792_comment'></div>谓愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370792_comment'></div>子知吾弟久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370792_comment'></div>敢属以铭。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　夏，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。时鄂岳观察使柳公绰以兵讨吴元济，作书鼓励之。作品：与鄂州柳中丞书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370621' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370621_comment'></div>环寇之师。殆且十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370621_comment'></div>瞋目<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370621", 1370621, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>语难</span>。自以为武人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370621_comment'></div>不肯循法度。颉颃作气势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370621_comment'></div>窃爵位自尊大者。肩相摩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370621_comment'></div>地相属也。不闻有一人援桴鼓誓众而前者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370621_comment'></div>但日令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370621", 1370621, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>走马</span>来求赏给。助寇为声势而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370621_comment'></div>閤下书生也。诗书礼乐是习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370621_comment'></div>仁义是修。法度是束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370621_comment'></div>一旦去文就武。鼓三军而进之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370621_comment'></div>陈师<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370621", 1370621, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>鞠旅</span>。亲与为辛苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370621_comment'></div>慷慨感激。同食<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370621", 1370621, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>下卒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370621_comment'></div>将二州之牧以壮士气。斩所乘马以祭踶死之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370621_comment'></div>虽古名将。何以加兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370621_comment'></div>此由天资忠孝。郁于中而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370621", 1370621, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>大作</span>于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370621_comment'></div>动皆中于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370621", 1370621, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>机会</span>。以取胜于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370621_comment'></div>而为戎臣师。岂常习于威暴之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370621_comment'></div>而乐其斗战之危也哉。愈诚怯弱不适于用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370621_comment'></div>听于下风。窃自增气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370621_comment'></div>誇于中朝稠人广众会集之中。所以羞武夫之颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370621_comment'></div>令议者知将国兵而为人之司命者。不在彼而在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370621_comment'></div>临敌重慎。诫轻出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370621_comment'></div>良用自爱。以副见慕之徒之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370621_comment'></div>而果为国立大功也。幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370621_comment'></div>不宣。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370621_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1370621_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　夏，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。时鄂岳观察使柳公绰以兵讨吴元济，作书鼓励之。柳氏回信后，又作书复之。作品：又一首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年6月3日</a>　六月，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。宰相武元衡被刺，朝廷悬赏捕贼。贼捕后八天，赏钱未兑现。上表论列。作品：论捕贼行赏表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370528' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370528' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370528?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论捕贼行赏表</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年6月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370528")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370528_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370528'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370528'>臣愈言。臣伏见六月八日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370528_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>狂贼</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>伤害</span>宰臣。擒捕未获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370528_comment'></div>陛下悲伤震悼。形于寝食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370528_comment'></div>特降诏书。明立条格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370528_comment'></div>云有能捉获贼者。赐钱万贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370528_comment'></div>仍加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>超授</span>。今下手贼等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370528_comment'></div>四分之内。已得其三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370528_comment'></div>其馀两人。盖不足计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370528_comment'></div>根寻踪迹。知自承宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370528_comment'></div>再降明诏。绝其朝请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370528_comment'></div>又与王士则士平等官。八日之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370528_comment'></div>无不行者。独有赏钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370528_comment'></div>尚未赐给。群情疑惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370528_comment'></div>未测圣心。闻初载钱置市之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370528_comment'></div>市中观者日数万人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>巡绕</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>瞻视</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370528_comment'></div>咨嗟叹息。既去复来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370528_comment'></div>以至日暮。百姓小人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370528_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>重财轻义</span>。不能深达事体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370528_comment'></div>但见不给其赏。便以为朝廷爱惜此钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370528_comment'></div>不守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>言信</span>。自近传远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370528_comment'></div>无由辩明。且出赏所以求贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370528_comment'></div>今贼已诛斩。若无人捉获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370528_comment'></div>国家何因得此贼而正刑法也。承宗何故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370528_comment'></div>而赐诛绝也。士则士平何故与美官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370528_comment'></div>三事既因获贼。获贼必有其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370528_comment'></div>不给赏钱。实亦难晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370528_comment'></div>假如圣心独有所见。审知不合加赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370528_comment'></div>其如天下百姓及后代久远之人哉。况今元济承宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370528_comment'></div>尚未擒灭。两河之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370528_comment'></div>大半未收。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>陇右</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>河西</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370528_comment'></div>皆没戎狄。所宜大明约束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370528_comment'></div>使信在言前。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>号令</span>指麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370528_comment'></div>以图功利。况自陛下即位以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370528_comment'></div>继有丕绩。斩杨惠琳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370528_comment'></div>收夏州。斩刘辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370528_comment'></div>收剑南东西川。斩李锜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370528_comment'></div>收江东。缚卢从史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370528_comment'></div>收泽潞等五州。威德所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370528_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>兵不污刃</span>。收魏博等六州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370528_comment'></div>致张茂昭张愔。收易定徐泗濠等五州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370528_comment'></div>创业已来。列圣功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370528_comment'></div>未有能高于陛下者。可谓赫赫巍巍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370528_comment'></div>光照前后矣。此由天授陛下神圣英武之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370528_comment'></div>为巨唐中兴之君。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>宗庙</span>神灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370528_comment'></div>所共祐助。勉强不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370528_comment'></div>守之以信。则故地不足收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370528_comment'></div>而太平不难致。如乘快马行平路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370528_comment'></div>迟速进退。自由其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370528_comment'></div>有所欲往。无不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370528_comment'></div>于此之时。特宜示人以信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370528_comment'></div>孔子欲存信去食。人非食不生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370528_comment'></div>尚欲舍生以存信。况可无故而轻弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370528_comment'></div>昔秦孝公用商鞅为相。欲富国强兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370528_comment'></div>行令于国。恐人不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370528_comment'></div>立三丈之木于市南门。募人有能徙置北门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370528_comment'></div>与五十金。有一人徙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370528_comment'></div>辄与五十金。秦人以君言为必信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370528_comment'></div>法令大行。国富兵强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370528_comment'></div>无敌天下。三丈之木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370528_comment'></div>非难徙也。徙之非有功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370528_comment'></div>孝公辄与之金者。所以示其言之必信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370528_comment'></div>昔周成王尚小。与其弟叔虞为戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370528_comment'></div>削桐叶为圭。曰以晋封汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370528_comment'></div>其臣史佚。因请择日立叔虞为侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370528_comment'></div>成王曰。吾与之戏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370528_comment'></div>史佚曰。天子无戏言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370528_comment'></div>言之则史书之。礼成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370528_comment'></div>乐歌之。于是遂封叔虞于晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370528_comment'></div>昔汉高祖出黄金四万斤与陈平。恣其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370528_comment'></div>不问出入。令谋项羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370528_comment'></div>平用金閒楚。数年之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370528_comment'></div>汉得天下。论者皆言汉高祖深达于利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370528_comment'></div>能以金四万斤致得天下。以此观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370528_comment'></div>自古以来。未有不信其言而能有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>大功</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370528_comment'></div>亦未有不费小财而能收大利者也。臣于告贼之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370528_comment'></div>本无恩义。彼虽获赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370528_comment'></div>了不关臣。所以区区尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370528_comment'></div>不避<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>烦黩</span>者。欲令陛下之信行于天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370528_comment'></div>伏望恕臣愚陋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370528", 1370528, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>僻憃</span>之罪。而收其恳款诚至之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370528_comment'></div>天下之幸。非臣之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370528_comment'></div>谨奉表以闻。臣愈诚惶诚恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370528_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_81_1370528_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年6月25日</a>　六月，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。御史中丞裴度被任命为中书侍郎同中书门下平章事，代为之作让官表。作品：为裴相公让官表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div id='poem_1370526' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370526' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370526?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为裴相公让官表</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年6月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370526")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370526_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370526'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370526'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370526_comment'></div>伏奉今日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370526_comment'></div>以臣为朝议大夫守中书侍郎同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370526_comment'></div>承命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370526", 1370526, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>惊惶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370526_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370526", 1370526, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>魂爽</span>飞越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370526_comment'></div>俯仰天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370526_comment'></div>若无所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370526_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370526_comment'></div>臣少涉经史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370526_comment'></div>粗知古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370526_comment'></div>天与朴忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370526_comment'></div>性惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370526", 1370526, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>愚直</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370526_comment'></div>知事君以道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370526_comment'></div>无惮杀身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370526_comment'></div>慕当官而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370526_comment'></div>不求利已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370526_comment'></div>人以为拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370526_comment'></div>臣行不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370526_comment'></div>元和之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370526_comment'></div>始拜御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370526_comment'></div>旋以论事过切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370526_comment'></div>为宰臣所非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370526_comment'></div>移官府廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370526_comment'></div>因佐戎幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370526_comment'></div>陛下恕臣之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370526_comment'></div>怜臣之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370526_comment'></div>拔居侍从之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370526_comment'></div>遂掌丝纶之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370526_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370526", 1370526, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>受恩</span>益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370526_comment'></div>顾己益轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370526_comment'></div>苟耳目所闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370526_comment'></div>心力所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370526", 1370526, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>迨及</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370526_comment'></div>少关政理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370526_comment'></div>辄以陈闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370526_comment'></div>于裨补无涓埃之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370526_comment'></div>而谗谤有邱山之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370526_comment'></div>陛下知其孤立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370526_comment'></div>赏其微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370526_comment'></div>独断不谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370526_comment'></div>奖待踰量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370526_comment'></div>臣诚见陛下具文武之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370526_comment'></div>有神圣之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370526_comment'></div>启中兴之宏图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370526_comment'></div>当太平之昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370526_comment'></div>勤身以俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370526_comment'></div>与物无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370526_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370526", 1370526, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>威怒</span>如雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_1370793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞部员外郎张府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370793")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370793'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370793'>尚书虞部员外郎安定张君。讳季友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370793_comment'></div>字孝权。年五十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370793_comment'></div>病卒东都。明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370793_comment'></div>兄子涂与其弟庾掞等。护柩归葬长安县马额原夫人北海唐氏之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370793_comment'></div>前事。涂进韩氏门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370793_comment'></div>伏哭庭下曰。叔父且死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370793_comment'></div>几于不能言矣。张目而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370793_comment'></div>吾不可无告韩君。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370793", 1370793, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>别藏</span>而不得韩君记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370793_comment'></div>犹不葬也。涂为书致吾意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370793_comment'></div>已而自署其末与封。敢告以请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370793_comment'></div>愈既与为礼。发书云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370793_comment'></div>其末有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370793", 1370793, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>复语</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370793", 1370793, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>千万</span>永诀八字。名日月与封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370793_comment'></div>皆孝权迹。孝权与余同年进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370793_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370793", 1370793, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>上世</span>有皓者。当宇文时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370793_comment'></div>为车骑大将军鄜城太守。卒葬河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370793_comment'></div>谥曰忠。公至孝权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370793_comment'></div>閒五世矣。孝权大父讳孝先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370793_comment'></div>太子通事舍人。父讳庭光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370793_comment'></div>赠绥州刺史。绥州之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370793_comment'></div>孝权盖尚小。母曰太原<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370793", 1370793, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>县君</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370793_comment'></div>卒既葬。孝权守墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370793_comment'></div>树松柏。三年而后归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370793_comment'></div>选为河南府文学。去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370793_comment'></div>徐州使拜章请为判官。授协律郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370793_comment'></div>孝权始不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370793", 1370793, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>痛绝</span>。诏下大悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370793_comment'></div>即诈称疾。不言三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370793_comment'></div>元和初。徐使死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370793_comment'></div>孝权疾即日已。试判入高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370793_comment'></div>授鄠县尉。明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370793_comment'></div>故相赵宗儒镇荆南。以孝权为判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370793_comment'></div>拜监察御史。经二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370793_comment'></div>拜真御史。明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370793_comment'></div>分司东台。转殿中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370793_comment'></div>桉皇甫氏子母病不侍。走京师求试职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370793_comment'></div>宰相怒曰。吾故皇甫氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370793_comment'></div>御史助所善相戏法侮我。皇甫媪何疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370793_comment'></div>衔未决。皇甫母病果死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370793_comment'></div>得解。迁留司虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370793_comment'></div>孝权为人孝谨。与人语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370793_comment'></div>恐伤之。而时嶷嶷有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370793_comment'></div>与孝权游者极众。而独以其死累余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370793_comment'></div>可尚也已。是为铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（铭亡）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370793_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1370793_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　秋，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。为房琯之孙房启撰墓碣铭。作品：清河郡公房公墓碣铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷17。）</span><div id='poem_1370763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370763?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370763'>公讳启。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370763_comment'></div>河南人。其大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>王父</span>融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370763_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>王父</span>琯。仍父子为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370763_comment'></div>融相天后。事远不大传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370763_comment'></div>琯相玄宗肃宗。处艰难中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370763_comment'></div>与道进退。薨赠太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370763_comment'></div>流声于兹。父乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370763_comment'></div>仕至秘书少监。赠太子詹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370763_comment'></div>公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>胚胎</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>前光</span>。生长食息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370763_comment'></div>不离典训之内。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>目擩耳染</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370763_comment'></div>不学以能。始为凤翔府参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370763_comment'></div>尚少。人吏迎观望见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370763_comment'></div>咸曰。真房太尉家子孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370763_comment'></div>不敢弄以事。转同州澄城丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370763_comment'></div>益自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>饰理</span>。同官惮伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370763_comment'></div>卫晏使岭南黜陟。求佐得公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370763_comment'></div>擢摘良奸。南土大喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370763_comment'></div>还进昭应主簿。裴冑领湖南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370763_comment'></div>表公为佐。拜监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370763_comment'></div>部无遗事。冑迁江西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370763_comment'></div>又以节镇江陵。公一随迁佐冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370763_comment'></div>累功进至刑部员外郎。赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370763_comment'></div>副冑使事为上介。上闻其名。<div class='inline' 1370763, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>憿绝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370763_comment'></div>贞元末。王叔文用事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370763_comment'></div>材公之为。举以为容州经略使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370763_comment'></div>拜御史中丞。服佩视三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370763_comment'></div>守条死要。不相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>渔劫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370763_comment'></div>税节赋时。公私有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370763_comment'></div>削衣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370763", 1370763, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>贬食</span>。不立资遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370763_comment'></div>以班亲旧朋友为义。在容九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370763_comment'></div>迁领桂州。封清河郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370763_comment'></div>食邑三千户。中人使授命书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370763_comment'></div><span class='link' "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>违言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370763_comment'></div>徵贰太仆。未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370763_comment'></div>贬虔州长史。而坐使者。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年10月</a>　十月，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。户部侍郎李逊被任为襄州刺史，众朝臣送行，分韵赋诗，韩愈亦有作。作品：送李尚书赴襄阳八韵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_8_49543_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　冬，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。衢州为古徐偃王立庙，韩愈受请为之撰碑。作品：衢州徐偃王庙碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷17。）</span><div id='poem_1370748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>衢州徐偃王庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370748")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370748'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370748'>徐与秦俱出柏翳为嬴姓。国于夏殷周世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370748_comment'></div>咸有大功。秦处西偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370748_comment'></div>专用武胜。遭世衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370748_comment'></div>无明天子。遂虎吞诸国为雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370748_comment'></div>诸国既皆入秦为臣属。秦无所取利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370748_comment'></div>上下相贼害。卒偾其国而沈其宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370748_comment'></div>徐处得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>地中</span>。文德为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370748_comment'></div>及偃王诞当国。益除去刑争末事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370748_comment'></div>凡所以君国子民。待四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370748_comment'></div>一出于仁义。当此之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370748_comment'></div>周天子穆王无道。意不在天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370748_comment'></div>好道士说。得八骏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370748_comment'></div>骑之西游。同王母宴于瑶池之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370748_comment'></div>歌讴忘归。四方诸侯之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>争辩</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370748_comment'></div>无所质正。咸宾祭于徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370748_comment'></div>贽玉帛死生之物于徐之庭者三十六国。得朱弓赤矢之瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370748_comment'></div>穆王闻之恐。遂称受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370748_comment'></div>命造父御。长驱而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370748_comment'></div>与楚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>连谋</span>伐徐。徐不忍斗其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370748_comment'></div>北走彭城武原山下。百姓随而从之万有馀家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370748_comment'></div>偃王死。民号其山为徐山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370748_comment'></div>凿石为室。以祠偃王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370748_comment'></div>偃王虽走死失国。民戴其嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370748_comment'></div>为君如初。驹王章禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370748_comment'></div>祖孙相望。自秦至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370748_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>名公巨人</span>。继迹史书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370748_comment'></div>徐氏十望其九。皆本于偃王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370748_comment'></div>而秦后迄兹无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>闻家</span>。天于柏翳之绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370748_comment'></div>非偏有厚薄。施仁与暴之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370748_comment'></div>自然异也。衢州故会稽太末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370748_comment'></div>民多姓徐氏。支县龙邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370748_comment'></div>有偃王遗庙。或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370748_comment'></div>偃王之逃战。不之彭城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370748_comment'></div>之越城之隅。弃玉几研于会稽之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370748_comment'></div>或曰。徐子章禹既执于吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370748_comment'></div>徐之公族子弟。散之徐扬二州閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370748_comment'></div>即其居立先王庙云。开元初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370748_comment'></div>徐姓二人相属为刺史。帅其部之同姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370748_comment'></div>改作庙屋。载事于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370748_comment'></div>后九十年。当元和九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370748_comment'></div>而徐氏放复为刺史。放字达夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370748_comment'></div>前碑所谓今户部侍郎。其大父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370748_comment'></div>春行视农。至于龙邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370748_comment'></div>有事于庙。思惟本原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370748_comment'></div>曰故制<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>觕朴</span>下窄。不足以揭虔妥灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370748_comment'></div>而又梁桷赤白陊剥不治。图像之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370748_comment'></div>䵝昧就灭。藩拔级夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370748_comment'></div>庭木秃。祈氓日慢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370748_comment'></div>祥庆弗下。州之群支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370748_comment'></div>不获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>荫庥</span>。余惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>遗绍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370748_comment'></div>而尸其土。不即不图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370748_comment'></div>以有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>资聚</span>。罚其可辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370748_comment'></div>乃命因故为新。众工齐事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370748_comment'></div>惟月若日。工告讫功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370748_comment'></div>大祠于庙。宗乡咸序应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370748_comment'></div>是岁州无怪风剧雨。民不夭厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370748_comment'></div>谷果完实。民皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370748_comment'></div>耿耿祉哉。其不可诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370748_comment'></div>乃相与请辞京师。归而镵之于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370748_comment'></div>辞曰。秦杰以颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370748_comment'></div>徐由逊绵。秦鬼久饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370748_comment'></div>徐有庙存。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>婉婉</span>偃王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370748_comment'></div>惟道之耽以国易仁。为笑于顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370748_comment'></div>自初擅命。其实几姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370748_comment'></div>历短詈长。有不偿亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370748_comment'></div>课其利害。孰与王当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370748_comment'></div>姑蔑之墟。太末之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370748_comment'></div>谁思王恩。立庙以祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370748_comment'></div>王之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370748", 1370748, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>闻孙</span>。世世多有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370748_comment'></div>唯临兹邦。庙土实守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370748_comment'></div>坚峤之后。达夫廓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370748_comment'></div>王殁万年。如始祔时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370748_comment'></div>王孙多孝。世奉王庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370748_comment'></div>达夫之来。先慎诏教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370748_comment'></div>尽惠庙民。不主于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370748_comment'></div>维是达夫。知孝之元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370748_comment'></div>太末之里。姑蔑之城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370748_comment'></div>庙事时修。仁孝振声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370748_comment'></div>宜宠其人。以及后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370748_comment'></div>嗟嗟维王。虽古谁亢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370748_comment'></div>王死于仁。彼以暴丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370748_comment'></div>文追作诔。刻示茫茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370748_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1370748_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　冬，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。受卫中行之请，为其兄卫中立撰墓志铭。作品：唐故监察御史卫府君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷20。）</span><div id='poem_1370788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370788' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370788?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中侍御史李君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370788'>殿中侍御史李君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370788_comment'></div>名虚中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370788_comment'></div>字常容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370788_comment'></div>其十一世祖冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370788_comment'></div>贵显拓跋世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370788_comment'></div>父恽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370788_comment'></div>河南温县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370788_comment'></div>娶陈留太守薛江童女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370788_comment'></div>生六子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370788_comment'></div>君最后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370788_comment'></div>爱于其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370788_comment'></div>年少长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370788_comment'></div>喜学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370788_comment'></div>学无所不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370788_comment'></div>最深于五行书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370788_comment'></div>以人之始生年月日所直日辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370788_comment'></div>支干相生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370788_comment'></div>胜衰死王相斟酌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370788_comment'></div>推人寿夭贵贱利不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370788_comment'></div>辄先处其年时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370788_comment'></div>百不失一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370788_comment'></div>其说<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>汪洋</span>奥美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370788_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>关节</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>开解</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370788_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>万端</span>千绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370788_comment'></div>参错重出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370788_comment'></div>学者就传其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370788_comment'></div>初若可取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370788_comment'></div>卒然失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370788_comment'></div>星官历翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370788_comment'></div>莫能与其校得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370788_comment'></div>进士及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370788_comment'></div>试<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>书判</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>入等</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370788_comment'></div>补秘书正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370788_comment'></div>母丧去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370788_comment'></div>卒丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370788_comment'></div>选补太子校书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370788_comment'></div>河南尹奏疏授伊阙尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370788_comment'></div>佐水陆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>运事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370788_comment'></div>故宰相郑公馀庆继尹河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370788_comment'></div>以公为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>运佐</span>如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370788_comment'></div>宰相武公元衡之出剑南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370788_comment'></div>奏夺为观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370788_comment'></div>授监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370788_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370788_comment'></div>御史台疏言行能高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370788_comment'></div>不宜用外府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370788_comment'></div>即诏为真御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370788_comment'></div>半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370788_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>分部</span>东都台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370788_comment'></div>迁殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370788_comment'></div>元和八年四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370788_comment'></div>诏徵既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370788_comment'></div>宰相欲白以为起居舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370788_comment'></div>经一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370788_comment'></div>疽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>发背</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370788_comment'></div>六月乙酉卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370788_comment'></div>年五十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370788_comment'></div>其年十月戊申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370788_comment'></div>葬河南洛阳县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370788_comment'></div>距其祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>渑池</span>令府君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>侨墓</span>十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370788_comment'></div>君昆弟六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370788_comment'></div>先君而殁者四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370788_comment'></div>其一人尝为郑之荥泽尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370788_comment'></div>信<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>道士</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>长生不死</span>之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370788_comment'></div>既去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370788_comment'></div>绝不营人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370788_comment'></div>故四门之寡妻孤孩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370788_comment'></div>与荥泽之妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370788_comment'></div>衣食百须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370788_comment'></div>皆由君出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370788_comment'></div>自初为伊阙尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370788_comment'></div>佐河南水陆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>运使</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370788_comment'></div>换两使经七年不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370788_comment'></div>所以为供给教养者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370788_comment'></div>及由蜀来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>辈类</span>御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370788_comment'></div>皆乐在朝廷进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370788_comment'></div>君独念寡稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370788_comment'></div>求分司东出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370788_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370788_comment'></div>其仁哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370788_comment'></div>君亦好<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>道士</span>说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370788_comment'></div>于蜀得秘方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370788_comment'></div>能以水银为黄金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370788_comment'></div>服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370788_comment'></div>冀果不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370788_comment'></div>将疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370788_comment'></div>谓其友卫中行大受韩愈退之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370788_comment'></div>吾梦大山裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370788_comment'></div>流出赤黄物如金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370788_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370788", 1370788, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>左人</span>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370788_comment'></div>是所谓大还者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370788_comment'></div>今三矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370788_comment'></div>君既殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370788_comment'></div>愈追占其梦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370788_comment'></div>山者艮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370788_comment'></div>艮为背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370788_comment'></div>裂而流赤黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370788_comment'></div>疽象也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370788_comment'></div>大还者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370788_comment'></div>大归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370788_comment'></div>其告之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370788_comment'></div>妻范阳卢氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370788_comment'></div>郑滑节度使兼御史大夫群之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370788_comment'></div>与君合德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370788_comment'></div>亲戚无退一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370788_comment'></div>男三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370788_comment'></div>长曰初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370788_comment'></div>协律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370788_comment'></div>次曰彪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370788_comment'></div>其幼曰还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370788_comment'></div>适三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370788_comment'></div>女子九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370788_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370788_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_113_1370788'>不赢其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370788_comment'></div>以尚其后人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1370788_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　本年，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。崔斯立被贬为蓝田县丞，抑郁无聊，韩愈同情之，为之作记。作品：蓝田县丞厅壁记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370679' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370679' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370679?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蓝田县丞厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370679")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370679_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370679'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370679'>丞之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370679_comment'></div>所以贰令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370679_comment'></div>于一邑无所不当问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370679_comment'></div>其下主簿尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370679_comment'></div>主簿尉乃有分职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370679_comment'></div>丞位高而偪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370679_comment'></div>例以嫌不可否事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370679_comment'></div>文书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370679_comment'></div>吏抱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370679", 1370679, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>成案</span>诣丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370679_comment'></div>卷其前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370679_comment'></div>钳以左手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370679_comment'></div>右手摘纸尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370679_comment'></div>雁鹜行以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370679_comment'></div>平立睨丞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370679_comment'></div>当署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370679_comment'></div>丞涉笔占位署惟谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370679_comment'></div>目吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370679_comment'></div>问可不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370679_comment'></div>吏曰得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370679_comment'></div>则退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370679_comment'></div>不敢略省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370679_comment'></div>漫不知何事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370679_comment'></div>官虽尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370679_comment'></div>力势反出主簿尉下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370679_comment'></div>谚数慢必曰丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370679_comment'></div>至以相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370679", 1370679, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>訾謷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370679_comment'></div>丞之设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370679_comment'></div>岂端使然哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370679_comment'></div>博陵崔斯立种学绩文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370679_comment'></div>以蓄其有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370679_comment'></div>浤涵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370679", 1370679, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>演迤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370679_comment'></div>日大以肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370679_comment'></div>贞元初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370679_comment'></div>挟其能战艺于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370679_comment'></div>再进再屈□人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370679_comment'></div>元和初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370679_comment'></div>以前大理评事言得失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370679", 1370679, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>黜官</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370679_comment'></div>再转而为丞兹邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370679_comment'></div>始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370679_comment'></div>喟曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370679_comment'></div>官无卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370679_comment'></div>顾材不足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370679", 1370679, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>塞职</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370679_comment'></div>既噤不得施用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370679_comment'></div>又喟曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370679_comment'></div>丞哉丞哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370679_comment'></div>余不负丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370679_comment'></div>而丞负余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370679_comment'></div>则尽蘖去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370679", 1370679, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>牙角</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370679_comment'></div>一蹑故迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370679_comment'></div>破崖岸而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370679_comment'></div>丞厅故有记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370679_comment'></div>坏漏污不可读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370679_comment'></div>斯立易桷与瓦墁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370679_comment'></div>治壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370679_comment'></div>悉书前任人名氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370679_comment'></div>庭有老槐四行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370679_comment'></div>南墙钜竹千梃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370679_comment'></div>俨立若相持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370679_comment'></div>水㶁㶁循除鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370679_comment'></div>斯立痛埽溉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370679_comment'></div>对树二松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370679_comment'></div>日哦其閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370679_comment'></div>有问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370679_comment'></div>辄对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370679_comment'></div>余方有公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370679_comment'></div>子姑去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370679_comment'></div>考功郎中知制诰韩愈记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1370679_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　冬，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。袁滋建先庙于京师，庙成时，央求韩愈撰写庙记。作品：袁氏先庙碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷17。）</span><div id='poem_1370749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁氏先庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370749")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370749'>袁公滋既成庙。明岁二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370749_comment'></div>自荆南以旂节朝京师。留六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370749_comment'></div>得壬子春分。率<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>宗亲</span>子属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370749_comment'></div>用少牢于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>三室</span>。既事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370749_comment'></div>退言曰。呜呼远哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370749_comment'></div>维世传德袭训集余。乃今有济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370749_comment'></div>今祭既不荐金石音声。使工歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370749_comment'></div>载烈象容。其奚以饬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>稚昧</span>于长久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370749_comment'></div>唯敬系羊豕。幸有石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370749_comment'></div>如具著先人名迹。因为诗系之语下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370749_comment'></div>于义其可。虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370749_comment'></div>余不敢。必属笃古而达于词者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370749_comment'></div>遂以命愈。愈谢非其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370749_comment'></div>不获命。则谨条袁氏本所以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370749_comment'></div>与其世系里居。起周历汉魏晋拓拔魏周隋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370749_comment'></div>入国家以来。高曾祖考所以劬躬焘后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370749_comment'></div>委祉于公。公之所以逢将承应者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370749_comment'></div>有槩有详。而缀以诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370749_comment'></div>其语曰。周树舜后陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370749_comment'></div>陈公子有为大夫食国之地袁乡者。其子孙世守不失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370749_comment'></div>因自别为袁氏。春秋世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370749_comment'></div>陈常压于楚。与中国相加尤疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370749_comment'></div>袁氏犹班班见可谱。常居阳夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370749_comment'></div>阳夏至晋属陈郡。故号陈郡袁氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370749_comment'></div>博士固。申儒遏黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370749_comment'></div>唱业于前。至司徒安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370749_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>怀德</span>于身。袁氏遂大显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370749_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>连世</span>有人。终汉连魏晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370749_comment'></div>分仕南北。始居华阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370749_comment'></div>为拓拔魏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>鸿胪</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>鸿胪</span>讳恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370749_comment'></div>生周梁州刺史新县孝侯讳颖。孝侯生隋左卫大将军讳温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370749_comment'></div>去官居华阴。武德九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370749_comment'></div>以大耋薨。始葬华州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370749_comment'></div>左卫生南州刺史讳士政。南州生当阳令讳伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370749_comment'></div>于公为曾祖。当阳生朝散大夫石州司马讳知元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370749_comment'></div>司马生赠工部尚书咸宁令讳煜。是为皇考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370749_comment'></div>袁氏旧族。而当阳以通经为儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370749_comment'></div>位止县令。石州用春秋持身治事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370749_comment'></div>为州司马以终。咸宁备学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370749_comment'></div>而贯以一。文武随用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370749_comment'></div>谋行功从。出入有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370749_comment'></div>不爵于朝。比三世宜达而窒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370749_comment'></div>归成后人。数当于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370749_comment'></div>公惟曾大父大父皇考比三世。存不大夫食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370749_comment'></div>殁祭在子孙。唯将相能致备物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370749_comment'></div>世弥远。礼则益不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370749_comment'></div>在慎德行。业治图功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370749_comment'></div>载名以待上可。无细大无敢不敬畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370749_comment'></div>无早夜无敢不思成于家。进于外以立于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370749_comment'></div>自侍御史历工部员外郎祠部郎中谏议大夫尚书右丞华州刺史金吾大将军。由卑而钜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370749_comment'></div>莫不官称。遂为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370749_comment'></div>以赞辩章。仍持节将蜀滑襄荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370749_comment'></div>略苞河山。秩登禄富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370749_comment'></div>以有庙祀。具如其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370749_comment'></div>又垂显刻。以教无忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370749_comment'></div>可谓大孝。诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370749_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1370749'>袁自陈分。初尚蹇连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370749_comment'></div>越秦造汉。博士发论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370749_comment'></div>司徒任德。忍不锢人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370749_comment'></div>收功厥后。五公重尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370749_comment'></div>晋氏于南。来处华下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370749_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370749", 1370749, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>鸿胪</span>孝侯。用适操舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370749_comment'></div>南州勤治。取最不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370749_comment'></div>当阳耽经。唯义之畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370749_comment'></div>石州烈烈。学专春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370749_comment'></div>懿哉咸宁。不名一休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370749_comment'></div>趋难避成。与时泛浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370749_comment'></div>是生孝子。天子之宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370749_comment'></div>出把将符。群州承楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370749_comment'></div>数以立庙。禄以备器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370749_comment'></div>由曾及考。同堂异置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370749_comment'></div>柏版松楹。其筵肆肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370749_comment'></div>维袁之庙。孝孙之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370749_comment'></div>顺势即宜。以诹以龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370749_comment'></div>以平其巇。屋墙持持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370749_comment'></div>孝孙来享。来拜庙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370749_comment'></div>陟堂进室。亲登笾铏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370749_comment'></div>肩臑胉骼。其樽元清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370749_comment'></div>降登受胙。于庆尔成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370749_comment'></div>维曾维祖。维考之施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370749_comment'></div>于汝孝嗣。以报以祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370749_comment'></div>凡我有今。非本曷思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370749_comment'></div>刻诗系牲。维以告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370749_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_83_1370749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　在长安，任知制诰期间，作《西掖雅言序》作品：西掖雅言序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年1月7日</a>　人日，在长安任考功郎中、知制诰。亲交子侄来长安城南别墅聚会登高，有诗。作品：人日城南登高。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_49548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>人日城南登高</a><span class='authorDate'>（816年1月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49548")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49548'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49548'>初正候才兆，涉七气已弄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49548'>霭霭野浮阳，晖晖水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49548", 49548, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>披冻</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49548'>圣朝身不废，佳节古所用。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49548'>亲交既许来，子妷<span class='inlineComment2'>（同侄）</span>亦可从。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49548'>盘蔬冬春杂，尊酒清浊共。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49548'>令徵前事为，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49548", 49548, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>觞咏</span>新诗送。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49548'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49548", 49548, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>扶杖</span>凌圮阯<span class='inlineComment2'>（或作址）</span>，刺船犯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49548", 49548, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>枯葑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49548'>恋池群鸭回，释峤孤云纵。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49548'>人生本坦荡，谁使妄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49548", 49548, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>倥偬</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49739_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　春，在长安，任中书舍人。作状，评论平淮西叛乱事宜，赞同裴度观点。作品：论淮西事宜状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370567' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370567' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370567?labeling=true'
