class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370567'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370567_comment'></div>臣伏以淮西三州之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370567_comment'></div>自少阳疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370567_comment'></div>去年春夏以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370567_comment'></div>图为今日之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370567_comment'></div>有职位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370567_comment'></div>劳于计虑抚循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370567_comment'></div>奉所役者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370567_comment'></div>修其器械<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>防守</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370567_comment'></div>金帛粮畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370567_comment'></div>耗于赏给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370567_comment'></div>执兵之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370567_comment'></div>四向侵掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370567_comment'></div>农夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>织妇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370567_comment'></div>携持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>幼弱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370567_comment'></div>饷于其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370567_comment'></div>虽时侵掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370567_comment'></div>小有所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370567_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>力尽筋疲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370567_comment'></div>不偿其费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370567_comment'></div>又闻畜马甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370567_comment'></div>自半年已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370567_comment'></div>皆上槽枥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370567_comment'></div>譬如有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370567_comment'></div>虽有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>十夫</span>之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370567_comment'></div>自朝及夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370567_comment'></div>常自大呼跳跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370567_comment'></div>初虽可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370567_comment'></div>其势不久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370567_comment'></div>必自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>委顿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370567_comment'></div>乘其力衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370567_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>三尺童子</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370567_comment'></div>可使制其死命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370567_comment'></div>况以三小州残毙困剧之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370567_comment'></div>而当天下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>全力</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370567_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>破败</span>可立而待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370567_comment'></div>然所未可知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370567_comment'></div>在陛下断与不断耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370567_comment'></div>夫兵不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370567_comment'></div>不足以必胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370567_comment'></div>必胜之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370567_comment'></div>必在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>速战</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370567_comment'></div>兵多而战不速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370567_comment'></div>则所费必广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370567_comment'></div>两界之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370567_comment'></div>疆场之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370567_comment'></div>日相攻劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370567_comment'></div>必有杀伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370567_comment'></div>近贼州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370567_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>徵役</span>百端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370567_comment'></div>农夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>织妇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370567_comment'></div>不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>安业</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370567_comment'></div>或时小遇水旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370567_comment'></div>百姓愁苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370567_comment'></div>当此之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370567_comment'></div>则人人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>异议</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370567_comment'></div>以惑陛下之听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370567_comment'></div>陛下持之不坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370567_comment'></div>半涂而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370567_comment'></div>伤威<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>损费</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370567_comment'></div>为毙必深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370567_comment'></div>所以要先决于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370567_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>详度</span>本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370567_comment'></div>事至不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370567_comment'></div>然可图功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370567_comment'></div>为统帅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370567_comment'></div>尽力行之于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370567_comment'></div>而参谋议者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370567_comment'></div>尽心奉之于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370567_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>内外</span>相应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370567_comment'></div>其功乃成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370567_comment'></div>昔者殷高宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370567_comment'></div>大圣之主也。<div id='poem_sentence_74_1370567_comment'></div>三年乃剋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370567_comment'></div>不以为迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370567_comment'></div>志在立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370567_comment'></div>不计所费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370567_comment'></div>传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370567_comment'></div>断而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370567_comment'></div>鬼神避之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370567_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>迟疑不断</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370567_comment'></div>未有能成其事者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370567_comment'></div>臣谬承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>恩宠</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1370567_comment'></div>事不得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1370567_comment'></div>所以有此讨伐。<div class='inline' 1370567, "Clauses/263/Comments/0")'>有功</span>业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1370567_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_264_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/264/Comments/0")'>相承</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_264_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/264/Comments/1")'>命节</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1370567_comment'></div>年岁已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1370567_comment'></div>朕必不利其土地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1370567_comment'></div>轻有改易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1370567_comment'></div>各宜自安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1370567_comment'></div>如妄自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_269_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/269/Comments/0")'>疑惧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1370567_comment'></div>敢相扇动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1370567_comment'></div>朕即赦元济<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_271_1370567", 1370567, "Clauses/271/Comments/0")'>不问</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1370567_comment'></div>回军讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1370567_comment'></div>自然破胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1370567_comment'></div>不敢妄有异说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1370567_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_275_1370567'>以前件谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1370567_comment'></div>伏乞天恩特赐裁择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1370567_comment'></div>谨奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_277_1370567_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　五月十八日前，在长安，任中书舍人。为侄女（韩俞侄女，周况之妻）作墓志铭。作品：四门博士周况妻韩氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷25。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_2_1370781_comment'></div>开封尉讳俞之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370781_comment'></div>开封娶赵氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370781_comment'></div>生二女三男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370781_comment'></div>开封卓越豪纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370781_comment'></div>不治资业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370781_comment'></div>喜酒色<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370781", 1370781, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>狗马</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370781_comment'></div>赵氏卒十一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370781_comment'></div>而开封亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370781_comment'></div>开封<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370781_comment'></div>乞分教东都生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370781_comment'></div>以收其孥于开封界中教畜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370781_comment'></div>韩氏嫁九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370781_comment'></div>生一男一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370781_comment'></div>年二十七。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年6月4日</a>　六月，在长安，任太子右庶子。李阳冰之子李服之曾赠韩愈汉代卫宏所书科斗文两册，韩愈转送归登，后又请人摹写之，作记述此事。作品：科斗书后记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370683' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370683' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370683?labeling=true' target='_blank'>科斗书后记</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370683'>愈叔父当大历世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370683_comment'></div>文辞独行中朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370683_comment'></div>天下之欲铭述其先人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370683", 1370683, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>功行</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370683_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370683", 1370683, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>取信</span>来世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370683_comment'></div>咸归韩氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370683_comment'></div>于时李监阳冰独能篆书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370683_comment'></div>而同姓叔父择木善八分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370683_comment'></div>不问可知其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370683_comment'></div>不如是者不称三服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370683_comment'></div>故三家传子弟往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370683_comment'></div>贞元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370683_comment'></div>愈事董丞相幕府于汴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370683_comment'></div>识开封令服之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370683_comment'></div>阳冰子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370683_comment'></div>授余以其家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370683", 1370683, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>科斗</span>孝经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370683_comment'></div>汉卫宏官书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370683_comment'></div>两部合一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370683_comment'></div>余宝蓄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370683_comment'></div>而不暇学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370683_comment'></div>后来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370683_comment'></div>为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370683", 1370683, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>四门博士</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370683_comment'></div>识归公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370683_comment'></div>归公好古书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370683_comment'></div>能通之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370683_comment'></div>愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370683_comment'></div>古书得其据依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370547_comment'></div>伏以正祥之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370547_comment'></div>必有从来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370547_comment'></div>物象既呈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370547_comment'></div>可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370547", 1370547, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>推究</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370547_comment'></div>古者谓龟为蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370547_comment'></div>蔡者龟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370547_comment'></div>今始入贼地而获龟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370547_comment'></div>是获蔡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370547_comment'></div>白者西方之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370547_comment'></div>刑戮之象也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370547_comment'></div>是必擒其帅而得其地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370547_comment'></div>提挈而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370547_comment'></div>生致阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370547_comment'></div>此象既见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370547_comment'></div>其应不遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370547_comment'></div>斯皆陛下圣德所施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370547_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370547", 1370547, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>灵物</span>来效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370547_comment'></div>太平之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370547_comment'></div>其在于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370547_comment'></div>臣等谬列台衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370547_comment'></div>亲睹嘉瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370547_comment'></div>无任抃跃之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370547_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　本年，在长安，任太子右庶子。梁国惠康公主卒，韩愈奉诏作挽歌二首。作品：梁国惠康公主挽歌二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　冬，在长安，任太子右庶子。受请为太原郡公王用撰神道碑文。作品：唐故银青光禄大夫检校左常侍兼右金吾卫大将军赠工部尚书太原郡公神道碑文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷17。）</span><div id='poem_1370752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>银青光禄大夫检校左散骑常侍兼右金吾卫大将军赠工部尚书太原郡公王公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370752")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370752'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370752'>公讳用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370752_comment'></div>字师柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370752_comment'></div>太原人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370752_comment'></div>庄宪<span id='poem_sentence_4_1370752_comment'></div>太师之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370752_comment'></div>太尉之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370752_comment'></div>司徒之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370752_comment'></div>元和元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370752_comment'></div>上朝太后南宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370752_comment'></div>大褒外氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370752_comment'></div>自外高王父而下至外王父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370752_comment'></div>咸册登公师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370752_comment'></div>事载之史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370752_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370752", 1370752, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>皇太后</span>昆弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370752_comment'></div>唯公一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370752_comment'></div>于是特拜银青光禄大夫太子少詹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370752_comment'></div>未三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370752_comment'></div>因迁大詹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370752_comment'></div>赐勋上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370752_comment'></div>爵封郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370752_comment'></div>国于太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370752_comment'></div>益掌厩苑之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370752_comment'></div>公起外戚子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370752_comment'></div>秩卑年少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370752_comment'></div>岁馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370752_comment'></div>超居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370752", 1370752, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>上班</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370752_comment'></div>官尊职大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370752_comment'></div>朝夕两宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370752_comment'></div>而能敬让以敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370752_comment'></div>持以礼法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370752_comment'></div>不挟不矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370752_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370752", 1370752, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>宾接</span>士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370752_comment'></div>高下中度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370752_comment'></div>兴官耆事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370752_comment'></div>滋久愈谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370752_comment'></div>由是朝廷推贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370752_comment'></div>所处号治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370752_comment'></div>转少府监太子宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370752_comment'></div>别职仍初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370752_comment'></div>迁左散骑常侍兼右金吾大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370752_comment'></div>皆以选进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370752_comment'></div>不专为恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370752_comment'></div>十一年秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370752_comment'></div>将以八月葬庄宪太后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370752_comment'></div>前一月壬申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370752_comment'></div>以疾告薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370752_comment'></div>春秋四十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370752_comment'></div>上罢朝二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370752_comment'></div>为位以哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370752_comment'></div>赠工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370752_comment'></div>十一月壬申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370752_comment'></div>葬于万年县落女原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370752_comment'></div>夫人河南胡氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370752_comment'></div>号太原郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370752_comment'></div>有子六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370752_comment'></div>女子一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370752_comment'></div>葬得日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370752_comment'></div>公之姊婿京兆尹李翛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370752_comment'></div>谓太子右庶子韩愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370752_comment'></div>子以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370752_comment'></div>常铭贤公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370752_comment'></div>今不可以辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370752_comment'></div>应曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370752_comment'></div>而为铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370752_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_1370752'>有蟜氏国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370752_comment'></div>实出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370752", 1370752, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>炎轩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370752_comment'></div>蜀涂莘挚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370752_comment'></div>正之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370752_comment'></div>孰丰其川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370752_comment'></div>不羡其源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370752_comment'></div>王氏周冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370752_comment'></div>官封继继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370752_comment'></div>实生圣女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370752_comment'></div>以母唐帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370752_comment'></div>公惟后季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370752_comment'></div>天子吾甥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370752_comment'></div>卑躬慎德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370752_comment'></div>不与宠横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370752_comment'></div>年方未老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370752_comment'></div>后哀犹新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370752_comment'></div>如何不惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370752_comment'></div>而殒其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370752_comment'></div>刻文兹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370752_comment'></div>久载攸存。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1370752_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　冬，在长安，任太子右庶子。为太原郡公王用撰神道碑文后，王家赠送贵重礼品，韩愈不敢受，上表朝廷奏闻此事。作品：进王用碑文状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div id='poem_1370549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370549?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进王用碑文状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370549")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370549_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1370549_0'>① 故检校左散骑常侍兼右金吾卫大将军赠工部尚书王用神道碑文</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370549'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370549'>右。京兆尹李翛是王用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370549", 1370549, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>亲表</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370549_comment'></div>传用男沼等意。请臣与亡父用撰前件碑文者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370549_comment'></div>伏以王用国之元舅。位望颇崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370549_comment'></div>岂臣短才。所能褒饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370549_comment'></div>不敢辞让。辄以撰讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370549_comment'></div>其碑文谨录本随状封进。伏听进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370549_comment'></div>其王用男所与臣马一匹。并<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370549", 1370549, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>鞍衔</span>白玉腰带一条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370549_comment'></div>臣并未敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370549", 1370549, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>受领</span>。谨奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370549_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1370549_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　冬，在长安，任太子右庶子。朝廷同意韩愈因撰碑文领受王用家赠礼，韩愈撰表状以谢。作品：谢许受王用男人事物状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div id='poem_1370550' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370550' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370550?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢许受王用男人事物状<span class='inlineComment2'>（某官某乙）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370550")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370550_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370550'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370550'>右。今日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370550", 1370550, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>品官</span>唐国珍到臣宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370550_comment'></div>奉宣进止。缘臣与王用撰神道碑文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370550_comment'></div>令臣领受用男沼所与臣马一匹。并鞍衔及白玉腰带一条者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370550_comment'></div>臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370550", 1370550, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>才识</span>浅薄。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370550", 1370550, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>词艺</span>荒芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370550_comment'></div>所撰碑文。不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370550", 1370550, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>备尽</span>事迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370550_comment'></div>圣恩宏奖。特令中使宣谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370550_comment'></div>并令臣受领<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370550", 1370550, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>人事物</span>等。承命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370550", 1370550, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>震悚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370550_comment'></div>再欣再跃。无任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370550", 1370550, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>荣忭</span>之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370550_comment'></div>谨附状陈谢以闻。谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370550_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1370550_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　冬，在长安，任太子右庶子。作状推荐殷侑任御史、太常博士。作品：冬荐官殷侑状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div id='poem_1370548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370548?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_1370548'>右。伏准贞元五年六月十一日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370548_comment'></div>停使郎官御史在城者。委常参官每年冬季闻荐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370548_comment'></div>前件官兼通三传。傍习诸经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370548_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370548", 1370548, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>注疏</span>之外。自有所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370548_comment'></div>久从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370548", 1370548, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>使幕</span>。亮直著名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370548_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370548", 1370548, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370548_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。伏听敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370548_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1370548_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年12月</a>　十二月初，在长安，任太子右庶子。某日傍晚，有诗赠张籍、周况。作品：晚寄张十八助教周郎博士。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　本年，在长安，任太子右庶子。受请为曹成王李皋撰写碑文。作品：曹成王碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷18。）</span><div id='poem_1370751' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370751")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1370751_comment'></div>讳皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370751_comment'></div>字子兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370751_comment'></div>谥曰成。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370751_comment'></div>得閒走蜀从天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370751_comment'></div>天子念之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370751_comment'></div>自都水使者拜左领军卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370751_comment'></div>转贰国子秘书。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370751_comment'></div>入则拥笏垂鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370751_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>坦坦</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/66/Comments/1")'>施施</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370751_comment'></div>即贬于潮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370751_comment'></div>以迁入贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370751_comment'></div>及是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370751_comment'></div>然后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>跪谢</span>告实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370751_comment'></div>初观察使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>虐使</span>将国良往戍界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370751_comment'></div>良以武冈叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370751_comment'></div>戍众万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370751_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>敛兵</span>荆黔洪桂伐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370751_comment'></div>二年尤张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370751_comment'></div>于是以王帅湖南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370751_comment'></div>将五万士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370751_comment'></div>以讨良为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370751_comment'></div>王至则屏兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370751_comment'></div>投良以书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370751_comment'></div>中其忌讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370751_comment'></div>良羞畏乞降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370751_comment'></div>狐鼠进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370751_comment'></div>王即假为使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370751_comment'></div>从一骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370751_comment'></div>踔五百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370751_comment'></div>抵良壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370751_comment'></div>鞭其门大呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370751_comment'></div>我曹王来受良降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370751_comment'></div>良今安在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370751_comment'></div>良不得已错愕迎拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370751_comment'></div>尽降其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370751_comment'></div>太薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370751_comment'></div>王弃部随丧之河南葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370751_comment'></div>及荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370751_comment'></div>被诏责还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370751_comment'></div>会梁崇义反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370751_comment'></div>王遂不敢辞以还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370751_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>升秩</span>散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370751_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370751_comment'></div>李希烈反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370751_comment'></div>迁御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370751_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>授节</span>帅江西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370751_comment'></div>以讨希烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370751_comment'></div>命至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370751_comment'></div>王出止外舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370751_comment'></div>禁无以家事关我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370751_comment'></div>裒兵大选江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370751_comment'></div>群能著职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370751_comment'></div>王亲教之搏力<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>勾卒</span>嬴越之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370751_comment'></div>曹诛五畀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370751_comment'></div>舰步二万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370751_comment'></div>以与贼遌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370751_comment'></div>嘬锋蔡山踣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370751_comment'></div>剜蕲之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>黄梅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370751_comment'></div>大鞣长平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370751_comment'></div>鏺广济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370751_comment'></div>掀蕲春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370751_comment'></div>撇蕲水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370751_comment'></div>掇黄冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370751_comment'></div>筴汉阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370751_comment'></div>行跐汊川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370751_comment'></div>还大膞蕲水界中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370751_comment'></div>披安三县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370751_comment'></div>拔其州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370751_comment'></div>斩伪刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370751_comment'></div>标光之北山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370751_comment'></div>随光化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370751_comment'></div>捁其州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370751_comment'></div>十抽一推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370751_comment'></div>救兵州东北属乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370751_comment'></div>还开军受降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370751_comment'></div>大小之战三十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370751_comment'></div>取五州十九县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370751_comment'></div>民老幼妇女不惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370751_comment'></div>市贾不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370751_comment'></div>田之果谷下无一迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370751_comment'></div>加银青光禄大夫工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370751_comment'></div>改户部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370751_comment'></div>再换节临荆及襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370751_comment'></div>真食三百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370751_comment'></div>王之在兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370751_comment'></div>天子西巡于梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370751_comment'></div>希烈北取汴郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370751_comment'></div>东略宋围陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370751_comment'></div>西取汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370751_comment'></div>薄东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370751_comment'></div>王坐南方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370751_comment'></div>北向落其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_149_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>角距</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370751_comment'></div>贼死咋不能入寸尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370751_comment'></div>亡将卒十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370751_comment'></div>尽输其南州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370751_comment'></div>王始政于温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370751_comment'></div>终政于襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1370751_comment'></div>恒平<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_155_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>物估</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370751_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_156_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>贱敛贵出</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370751_comment'></div>民用有经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370751_comment'></div>一吏轨民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370751_comment'></div>使令家听户视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370751_comment'></div>奸宄无所宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370751_comment'></div>府中不闻急步疾呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370751_comment'></div>治民用兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370751_comment'></div>各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_163_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>条次</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370751_comment'></div>世传为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370751_comment'></div>任马彝将慎将锷将潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370751_comment'></div>偕尽其力能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370751_comment'></div>薨赠右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370751_comment'></div>元和初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370751_comment'></div>以子道古在朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370751_comment'></div>更赠太子太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370751_comment'></div>道古进士司门郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370751_comment'></div>刺利随唐睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1370751_comment'></div>徵为少宗正兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1370751_comment'></div>以节督黔中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1370751_comment'></div>朝京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1370751_comment'></div>改命观察鄂岳蕲沔安黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1370751_comment'></div>提其师以伐蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1370751_comment'></div>且行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1370751_comment'></div>泣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1370751_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_180_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/180/Comments/0")'>先王</span>讨蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1370751_comment'></div>实取沔蕲安黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1370751_comment'></div>寄惠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_182_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/182/Comments/0")'>未亡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1370751_comment'></div>今余亦受命有事于蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1370751_comment'></div>而四州适在吾封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1370751_comment'></div>庶其有集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1370751_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_186_1370751", 1370751, "Clauses/186/Comments/0")'>先王</span>薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1370751_comment'></div>于今二十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1370751_comment'></div>吾昆弟在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1370751_comment'></div>而墓碑不刻无文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1370751_comment'></div>其实有待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1370751_comment'></div>子无用辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1370751_comment'></div>乃序而诗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1370751_comment'></div>辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1370751_comment'></div>太支十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1370751_comment'></div>曹于弟季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1370751_comment'></div>或亡或微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1370751_comment'></div>曹始就事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1370751_comment'></div>曹之祖王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1370751_comment'></div>畏塞绝迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1370751_comment'></div>零王黎公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1370751_comment'></div>不闻仅存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1370751_comment'></div>子父易封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1370751_comment'></div>三王守名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1370751_comment'></div>延延百载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1370751_comment'></div>以有成王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1370751_comment'></div>成王之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1370751_comment'></div>一自其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1370751_comment'></div>文被明章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1370751_comment'></div>武荐畯功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1370751_comment'></div>苏枯弱强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1370751_comment'></div>龈其奸猖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1370751_comment'></div>以报于宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1370751_comment'></div>以昭于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1370751_comment'></div>王亦有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1370751_comment'></div>处王之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1370751_comment'></div>唯旧之视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1370751_comment'></div>蹶蹶陛陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1370751_comment'></div>实取实似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1370751_comment'></div>刻诗其碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1370751_comment'></div>为示无止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_220_1370751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　本年，在长安。华山女道士被召皇宫，炙手可热。韩愈有诗讽喻之。作品：华山女。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。张元和十四年正月中上旬，363。）</span><div "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>乘龙</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_49577", 49577, "Clauses/23/Comments/2")'>驾鹤</span></span>去青冥。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49577'>豪家少年岂知道，来绕百匝脚不停。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49577'>云窗雾阁事恍惚，重重翠幕深金屏。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49577'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49577", 49577, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>仙梯</span>难攀俗缘重，浪凭<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7410, "poem_sentence_14_49577")'>青鸟</span>通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49577", 49577, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>丁宁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49577'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_49577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49577'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49577)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　本年，在长安。作文论军事戒备之重要性。作品：守戒。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>守戒</a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370726")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370726'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370726'>诗曰。大邦维翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370726_comment'></div>书曰。以藩王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370726_comment'></div>诸侯之于天子。不惟守土地奉职贡而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370726_comment'></div>固将有以翰藩之也。今人有宅于山者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370726_comment'></div>知猛兽之为害。则必高其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370726", 1370726, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>柴楥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370726_comment'></div>而外施<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370726", 1370726, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>窞阱</span>以待之。宅于都者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370726_comment'></div>知穿窬之为盗。则必峻其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370726", 1370726, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>垣墙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370726_comment'></div>而内固扃鐍以防之。此野人鄙夫之所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370726_comment'></div>非有过人之智而后能也。今之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370726", 1370726, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>通都大邑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370726_comment'></div>介于倔强之閒。而不知为之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370726_comment'></div>噫。亦惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370726_comment'></div>野人鄙夫能之。而王公大人反不能焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370726_comment'></div>岂材力为有不足欤。盖以谓不足为而不为耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370726_comment'></div>天下之祸。莫大于不足为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370726_comment'></div>材力不足者次之。不足为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370726_comment'></div>敌至而不知。材力不足者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370726_comment'></div>先事而思。则其于祸也有閒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370726_comment'></div>彼之倔强者。带甲荷戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370726_comment'></div>不知其多少。其绵地则千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370726_comment'></div>而与我壤地相错。无有邱陵江河洞庭孟门之关其閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370726_comment'></div>又自知其不得与天下齿。朝夕举踵引颈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370726_comment'></div>冀天下之有事。以乘吾之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370726_comment'></div>此其暴于猛兽穿窬也甚矣。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370726_comment'></div>胡知而不为之备乎哉。贲育之不戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370726_comment'></div>童子之不抗。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370726", 1370726, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>鲁鸡</span>之不期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370726_comment'></div>蜀鸡之不支。今夫鹿之于豹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370726_comment'></div>非不巍然大矣。然而卒为之禽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370726_comment'></div>爪牙之材不同。猛怯之资殊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370726_comment'></div>曰然则如之何而备之。曰在得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370726_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1370726_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年2月</a>　二月，在长安任太子右庶子。送殷侑出使回鹘，作序壮行。作品：送殷员外序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370660' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370660' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370660?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送殷员外序</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370660")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370660_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370660'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370660'>唐受天命为天子。凡四方万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370660_comment'></div>不问海内外。无小大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370660_comment'></div>咸臣顺于朝。时节贡水土百物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370660_comment'></div>大者特来。小者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370660", 1370660, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>附集</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370660_comment'></div>元和睿圣文武皇帝既嗣位。悉治方内就法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370660_comment'></div>十二年诏曰。四方万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370660_comment'></div>惟回鹘于唐最亲。奉职尤谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370660_comment'></div>丞相其选宗室四品一人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370660", 1370660, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>持节</span>往赐君长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370660_comment'></div>告之朕意。又选学有经法通知时事者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370660_comment'></div>与之为贰。由是殷侯侑自太常博士迁尚书虞部员外郎兼侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370660_comment'></div>朱衣象笏。承命以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370660_comment'></div>朝之大夫。莫不出饯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370660_comment'></div>酒半。右庶子韩愈执盏言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370660_comment'></div>殷大夫。今人适数百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370660_comment'></div>出门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370660", 1370660, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>惘惘</span>。有离别可怜之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370660_comment'></div>持被入直三省。丁宁顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370660", 1370660, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>婢子</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370660_comment'></div>语剌剌不能休。今子使万里外国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370660_comment'></div>独无几微出于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370660", 1370660, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>言面</span>。岂不真知轻重大丈夫哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370660_comment'></div>丞相以子应诏。真诚知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370660_comment'></div>士不通经。果不足用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370660_comment'></div>于是相属为诗。以道其行云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370660_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1370660_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　春夏，在长安任太子右庶子。闲游赋诗。作品：闲游二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_49495' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年12月</a>　十二月下旬，在长安。升刑部侍郎诏命下达后，举钱徽自代，以示谦退。作品：举钱徽自代状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div id='poem_1370552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370552?labeling=true' target='_blank'>举钱徽自代状<span class='inlineComment2'>（朝散大夫守太子右庶子飞骑尉钱徽）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（817年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370552")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370552'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370552'>右。臣伏准建中元年正月五日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370552_comment'></div>常参官授上后三日内。举一人以自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370552_comment'></div>前件官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370552", 1370552, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>器质</span>端方。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370552", 1370552, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>性怀</span>恬淡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370552_comment'></div>外和内敏。洁静精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370552_comment'></div>可以专<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370552", 1370552, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>刑宪</span>之司。参轻重之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370552_comment'></div>况<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370552", 1370552, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>时名</span>年辈。俱在臣前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370552_comment'></div>擢以代臣。必允<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370552", 1370552, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>众望</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370552_comment'></div>伏乞天恩。遂臣诚请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370552_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。谨奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370552_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1370552_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年1月14日</a>　在长安任刑部侍郎。一月十四日，奉命撰平淮西碑文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年1月</a>　春正月，在长安任刑部侍郎。送李正封分司东都洛阳，有诗。作品：送李员外院长分司东都。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_0_49517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49517'>今岁春光动，驱驰别上京。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1370527_comment'></div>群臣请刻石纪功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370527_comment'></div>明示天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370527_comment'></div>为将来法式。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1370527_comment'></div>使臣撰平淮西碑文者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370527_comment'></div>闻命震骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370527", 1370527, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>心识</span>颠倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370527_comment'></div>非其所任。<div 1370527, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>经涉</span>旬月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370527_comment'></div>不敢措手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370527_comment'></div>窃惟自古神圣之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370527_comment'></div>既立殊功异德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370527", 1370527, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>卓绝</span>之迹。<div id='poem_sentence_270_1370743_comment'></div>蔡之妇女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1370743_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_272_1370743", 1370743, "Clauses/272/Comments/0")'>迎门</span>笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1370743_comment'></div>蔡人告饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1370743_comment'></div>船粟往哺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1370743_comment'></div>蔡人告寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1370743_comment'></div>赐以缯布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1370743_comment'></div>始时蔡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1370743_comment'></div>禁不往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1370743_comment'></div>今相从戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1370743_comment'></div>里门夜开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1370743_comment'></div>始时蔡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1370743_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_282_1370743", 1370743, "Clauses/282/Comments/0")'>进战</span>退戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1370743_comment'></div>今旰而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1370743_comment'></div>左飧右粥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1370743_comment'></div>为之择人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1370743_comment'></div>以收馀惫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1370743_comment'></div>选吏赐牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1370743_comment'></div>教而不税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1370743_comment'></div>蔡人有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1370743_comment'></div>始迷不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1370743_comment'></div>今乃大觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1370743_comment'></div>羞前之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1370743_comment'></div>蔡人有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1370743_comment'></div>天子明圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1370743_comment'></div>不顺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_295_1370743", 1370743, "Clauses/295/Comments/0")'>族诛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1370743_comment'></div>顺保性命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1370743_comment'></div>汝不吾信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1370743_comment'></div>视此蔡方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1370743_comment'></div>孰为不顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1370743_comment'></div>往斧其吭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1370743_comment'></div>凡叛有数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1370743_comment'></div>声势相倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1370743_comment'></div>吾强不支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1370743_comment'></div>汝弱奚恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1370743_comment'></div>其告而长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1370743_comment'></div>而父而兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1370743_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_307_1370743", 1370743, "Clauses/307/Comments/0")'>奔走</span>偕来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1370743_comment'></div>同我太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1370743_comment'></div>淮蔡为乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1370743_comment'></div>天子伐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1370743_comment'></div>既伐而饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1370743_comment'></div>天子活之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1370743_comment'></div>始议伐蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1370743_comment'></div>卿士莫随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1370743_comment'></div>既伐四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1370743_comment'></div>小大并疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1370743_comment'></div>不赦不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1370743_comment'></div>由天子明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1370743_comment'></div>凡此蔡功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1370743_comment'></div>惟断乃成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1370743_comment'></div>既定淮蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1370743_comment'></div>四夷毕来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1370743_comment'></div>遂开明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1370743_comment'></div>坐以治之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_324_1370743_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年4月</a>　四月，在长安任刑部侍郎。郑馀庆为详定礼仪使，奏请韩愈、李程为副使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　本年，曾任详定礼仪副使，或作改葬服议。作品：改葬服议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_1370572' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370572' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370572?labeling=true' target='_blank'>改葬服议</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370572")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370572_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370572'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370572'>经曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370572_comment'></div>改葬缌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370572_comment'></div>春秋谷梁传亦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370572_comment'></div>改葬之礼缌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370572_comment'></div>举下缅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370572_comment'></div>此皆谓子之于父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370572_comment'></div>其他则皆无服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370572_comment'></div>何以识其必然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370572_comment'></div>经次五等之服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370572_comment'></div>小功之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370572_comment'></div>然后著改葬之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370572_comment'></div>更无轻重之差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370572_comment'></div>以此知惟记其最亲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370572_comment'></div>其他无服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370572_comment'></div>则不记也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370572_comment'></div>若主人当服<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370572", 1370572, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>斩衰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370572_comment'></div>其馀亲各服其服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370572_comment'></div>则经亦言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370572_comment'></div>不当惟云缌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370572_comment'></div>传称举下缅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370572_comment'></div>缅犹远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370572_comment'></div>下谓服之最轻者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370572_comment'></div>以其远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370572_comment'></div>故其服轻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370572_comment'></div>江熙曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370572_comment'></div>礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370572_comment'></div>天子诸侯易服而葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370572_comment'></div>以为交于神明者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370572_comment'></div>不可以纯凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370572_comment'></div>况其缅者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370572_comment'></div>是故改葬之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370572_comment'></div>其服惟轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370572_comment'></div>以此而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370572_comment'></div>则亦明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370572_comment'></div>卫司徒文子改葬其叔父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370572_comment'></div>问服于子思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370572_comment'></div>子思曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370572_comment'></div>礼父母改葬缌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370572_comment'></div>既葬而除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370572_comment'></div>不忍无服送至亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370572_comment'></div>非父母无服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370572_comment'></div>无服则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370572", 1370572, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>吊服</span>而加麻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370572_comment'></div>此又其著者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370572_comment'></div>文子又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370572_comment'></div>丧服既除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370572_comment'></div>然后乃葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370572_comment'></div>则其服何服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370572_comment'></div>子思曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370572_comment'></div>三年之丧未葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370572_comment'></div>服不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370572_comment'></div>除何有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370572_comment'></div>然则改葬与未葬者有异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370572_comment'></div>古者诸侯五月而葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370572_comment'></div>大夫三月而葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370572_comment'></div>士逾月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370572_comment'></div>无故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370572_comment'></div>未有过时而不葬者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370572_comment'></div>过时而不葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370572_comment'></div>谓之不能葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370572_comment'></div>春秋讥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370572_comment'></div>若有故而未葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370572_comment'></div>虽出三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370572_comment'></div>子之服不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370572_comment'></div>此孝子之所以著其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370572_comment'></div>先王之所以必其时之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370572_comment'></div>虽有其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370572_comment'></div>未有著其人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370572_comment'></div>以是知其至少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370572_comment'></div>改葬者为山崩水涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370572_comment'></div>毁其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370572_comment'></div>及葬而礼不备者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370572_comment'></div>若文王之葬王季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370572_comment'></div>以水齧其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370572_comment'></div>鲁隐公之葬惠公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370572_comment'></div>以有宋师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370572_comment'></div>太子少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370572_comment'></div>葬故有阙之类是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370572_comment'></div>丧事有进而无退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370572_comment'></div>有易以轻服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370572_comment'></div>无加以重服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370572_comment'></div>殡于堂则谓之殡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370572_comment'></div>瘗于野则谓之葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370572_comment'></div>近代已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370572_comment'></div>事与古异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370572_comment'></div>或游或仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370572_comment'></div>在千里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370572_comment'></div>或子幼妻稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370572_comment'></div>而不能自还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370572_comment'></div>甚者拘以阴阳畏忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370572_comment'></div>遂葬于其土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370572_comment'></div>及其反葬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370572_comment'></div>远者或至数十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370572_comment'></div>近者亦出三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370572_comment'></div>其吉服而从于事也久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370572_comment'></div>又安可取未葬不变服之例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370572_comment'></div>而反为之重服欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370572_comment'></div>在丧当葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370572_comment'></div>犹宜易以轻服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370572_comment'></div>况既远而反纯凶以葬乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370572_comment'></div>若果重服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370572_comment'></div>是所谓未可除而除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370572_comment'></div>不当重而更重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370572_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370572_comment'></div>丧与其易也宁戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370572_comment'></div>虽重服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370572_comment'></div>不亦可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370572_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370572_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370572_comment'></div>易之与戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370572_comment'></div>则易固不如戚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370572_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370572_comment'></div>未若合礼之为懿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370572_comment'></div>俭之与奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370572_comment'></div>则俭固愈于奢矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370572_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370572_comment'></div>未若合礼之为懿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370572_comment'></div>过犹不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370572_comment'></div>其此类之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370572_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370572_comment'></div>经称改葬缌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370572_comment'></div>而不著其月数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370572_comment'></div>则似三月而后除也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370572_comment'></div>子思之对文子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370572_comment'></div>则曰既葬而除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370572_comment'></div>今宜如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370572_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370572_comment'></div>自启殡至于既葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370572_comment'></div>而三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370572_comment'></div>则除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370572_comment'></div>未三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370572_comment'></div>则服以终三月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370572_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370572_comment'></div>妻为夫何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370572_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370572_comment'></div>如子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370572_comment'></div>无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_135_1370572", 1370572, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>吊服</span>而加麻则何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370572_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370572_comment'></div>今之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1370572", 1370572, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>吊服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370572_comment'></div>犹古之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1370572", 1370572, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>吊服</span>也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_138_1370572_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在长安任刑部侍郎。读皇甫湜《公安园池》诗，作诗书其后。作品：读皇甫湜公安园池诗书其后。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_49696' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年4月</a>　在长安任刑部侍郎。四月，上平淮西碑文后，宣赐韩弘一本，韩弘寄送韩愈绢五百皮，韩愈上表以奏。作品：奏韩弘人事物表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年4月</a>　在长安任刑部侍郎。四月，宪宗同意韩愈收受韩弘谢物，韩愈又上表以谢。作品：谢许受韩弘物状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370554'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370554_comment'></div>今日品官第五文嵩至臣宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370554_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370554_comment'></div>令臣受领韩宏等所寄撰碑人事绢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370554_comment'></div>恩随事至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370554_comment'></div>荣与幸并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370554_comment'></div>惭抃怵惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370554_comment'></div>罔知所喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370554_comment'></div>中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370554_comment'></div>伏以上赞圣功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370554_comment'></div>臣子之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370554_comment'></div>下沾群帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370554_comment'></div>文字所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370554_comment'></div>陛下谦光自居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370554_comment'></div>劝励为事。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1370554_comment'></div>韩宏荣于宠赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370554_comment'></div>遂寄缣帛与臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370554_comment'></div>于臣何为坐受厚贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370554_comment'></div>恩由上致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370554_comment'></div>利则臣归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370554_comment'></div>惭戴兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370554_comment'></div>举措无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370554_comment'></div>无任感恩惭恳之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370554_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
