id='poem_note_49571'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_49571_0'>⑴ 屋檐为荣，前荣，即南荣也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_49571_0'>⑵ 娄音缕。庄子，有卷娄者。注，卷娄，犹拘挛也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49571_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在长安任刑部侍郎。读史，有诗论东方朔，意刺张宿。作品：读东方朔杂事。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷8。张元和八年，299。）</span><div id='poem_49695' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49695' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49695?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读东方朔杂事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49695")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49695_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49695_0'>① 《汉武帝内传》：“帝好长生，七夕，西王母降其宫。索桃七枚，以四枚与帝，自食三枚，曰：‘此桃三千年一实。’时东方朔从殿东厢朱鸟牖中窥母，母谓帝曰：‘此窥牖儿尝三来偷吾桃，昔为太山上仙官，令到方丈，擅弄雷电，激波扬风，风雨失时，阴阳错迕，致令蛟鲸陆行，海水暴竭，黄鸟宿渊，于是九潦丈人乃言于太上，遂谪人间。’其后朔一旦乘龙飞去，不知所在。”</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49695'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2059, "poem_allusion_49695")'>噫为风</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6530, "poem_allusion_49695")'>溺殿衙</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49695_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49695'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49695'>严严<span class='inlineComment2'>（古岩严通）</span>王母宫，下维万仙家。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49695'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49695", 49695, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>噫欠</span>为飘风<span class='inlineComment2'>（聚气为噫，张口为欠）</span>，濯手大雨沱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49695'>方朔乃竖子，骄不加禁诃。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49695'>偷入雷电室，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49695", 49695, "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>輷<span class='inlineComment2'>（音轰）</span>輘</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（音棱）</span>掉狂车。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49695'>王母闻以笑，卫官助<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49695", 49695, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>呀呀</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49695'>不知万万人，生身埋泥沙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49695'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49695", 49695, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>簸顿</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49695", 49695, "Clauses/12/Comments/2")'>五山</span>踣<span class='inlineComment2'>（音匐）</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49695", 49695, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>流漂</span>八维蹉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49695'>曰吾儿可憎，奈此狡狯何。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49695'>方朔闻不喜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49695", 49695, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>褫身</span>络<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49695", 49695, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>蛟蛇</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49695'>瞻相北斗柄，两手自相挼<span class='inlineComment2'>（音傩）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49695'>群仙急乃言，百犯庸不科。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49695'>向观睥睨处，事在不可赦<span class='inlineComment2'>（音奢）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49695'>欲不布露言，外口实諠哗。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49695'>王母不得已，颜嚬口<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_49695", 49695, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>赍嗟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49695'>颔头可其奏，送以紫玉珂。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49695'>方朔不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_49695", 49695, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>惩创</span>，挟恩更矜誇。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49695'>诋欺刘天子，正昼<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6530, "poem_sentence_16_49695")'>溺殿衙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49695'>一旦不辞诀，摄身凌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49695", 49695, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>苍霞</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49695'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_49695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49695'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49695)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　五月至十一月，受请为李惟简撰写墓志铭。李葬于十一月十六日。作品：凤翔节度使李公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷20。）</span><div id='poem_1370797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>凤翔陇州节度使李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370797")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370797'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370797'>公讳惟。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370797_comment'></div>司空平章事赠太傅之子。太傅初姓张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370797_comment'></div>肃宗时。举恒赵深冀易定六州战卒五万人马五千匹以归听命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370797_comment'></div>天子嘉之。赐姓曰李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370797_comment'></div>更其名曰宝臣。立其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370797_comment'></div>号之曰成德。由是姓李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370797_comment'></div>太傅薨。公兄弟让嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370797_comment'></div>公竟弃其家。自归京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370797_comment'></div>及兄死家覆。有司设防守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370797_comment'></div>德宗如奉天。守卒出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370797_comment'></div>公即驰归。与母韩国夫人郑氏拜诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370797_comment'></div>属家徒随走所幸。道与贼遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370797_comment'></div>七斗乃至。有功迁太子谕德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370797_comment'></div>加御史中丞。从幸梁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370797_comment'></div>天黑失道。识焦中人声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370797_comment'></div>得见德宗于盩厔西。上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370797_comment'></div>卿有母。可随我耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370797_comment'></div>曰。臣以死从卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370797_comment'></div>及幸还。录功封武安郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370797_comment'></div>号<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>元从</span>功臣。图其形御阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370797_comment'></div>而以神威将军居北军卫。久乃加御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370797_comment'></div>丁韩国忧去官。累迁神威大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370797_comment'></div>加工刑二曹尚书天威统军。又改户部尚书金吾大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370797_comment'></div>有长上万国俊者。以军势夺兴平人地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370797_comment'></div>吏惮莫敢治。及公为金吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370797_comment'></div>兴平人曰。久闻李将军为人公平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370797_comment'></div>庶能直吾屈。即赍县牒来见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370797_comment'></div>公发视。立杖国俊废之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370797_comment'></div>以地还兴平人。闻者莫不称叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370797_comment'></div>于是天子以公材果可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>任用</span>。治人将兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370797_comment'></div>无所不宜。元和六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370797_comment'></div>即以公为凤翔陇州节度使户部尚书兼凤翔尹。陇州地与吐蕃接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370797_comment'></div>旧常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>朝夕</span>相伺。更入攻抄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370797_comment'></div>人吏不得息。公以为国家于夷狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370797_comment'></div>当用长算。边将当承上旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370797_comment'></div>谨条教。蓄财谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370797_comment'></div>完吏农力以俟。不宜规小利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370797_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>起事</span>盗恩。禁不得妄入其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370797_comment'></div>益市耕牛。铸镈钐钜斸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370797_comment'></div>以给农之不能自具者。丁壮兴励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370797_comment'></div>岁增田数十万亩。连八岁五种俱熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370797_comment'></div>公私有馀。贩者负入褒斜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370797_comment'></div>船循渭而下。首尾相继不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370797_comment'></div>十三年。公与忠武军节度使司空光颜邠宁节度使尚书钊俱来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370797_comment'></div>上为之燕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>三殿</span>。张百戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370797_comment'></div>公卿侍臣咸与。既事敕还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370797_comment'></div>公因进曰。臣幸得宿卫四十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370797_comment'></div>今年老斥外任。不胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>慕恋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370797_comment'></div>愿得死<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>辇下</span>。天子加慰遣焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370797_comment'></div>还镇告疾。其夏五月戊子薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370797_comment'></div>年五十五。讣至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370797_comment'></div>上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>悼怆</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370797", 1370797, "Clauses/102/Comments/1")'>罢朝</span>。遣郎中临吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370797_comment'></div>赠尚书左仆射。以其年十一月景申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370797_comment'></div>葬万年凤栖原。夫人博陵郡崔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370797_comment'></div>河阳尉镐之孙。大理评事可观之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370797_comment'></div>贤有法度。公有四子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370797_comment'></div>长曰元孙。三原尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370797_comment'></div>次曰元质。彭之濛阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370797_comment'></div>曰元立。兴平尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370797_comment'></div>曰元本。河南参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370797_comment'></div>皆愿敏好善。元立元本皆崔氏出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370797_comment'></div>葬得日。嗣子元立与其昆弟四人请铭于韩氏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370797_comment'></div>先人常有托于夫子也。愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370797_comment'></div>太傅功在史氏纪。仆射以孤童囚羁京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370797_comment'></div>卒能以忠为节。自显取爵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370797_comment'></div>立名绩。使天下拭目观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370797_comment'></div>父母与荣焉。既忠又孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370797_comment'></div>法宜铭。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370797_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_1370797'>太傅之显。自其躬兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370797_comment'></div>仆射童羁。孰与之朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370797_comment'></div>遭国之难。以节自发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370797_comment'></div>致其勤艰。以复考烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370797_comment'></div>孝由忠立。爵名随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370797_comment'></div>铭此元石。维昧之诒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370797_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1370797_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年8月</a>　八月，在长安任刑部侍郎。殷侑完成《公羊春秋新注》后，请韩愈作序。韩愈回信。作品：答殷侍御书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_1370613' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370613' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370613?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答殷侍御书</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370613")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370613_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370613'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370613'>某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370613_comment'></div>愈顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370613_comment'></div>辱赐书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370613_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>周览</span>累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370613_comment'></div>竦然增敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370613_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>蹙然</span>汗出以惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370613_comment'></div>愈于进士中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370613_comment'></div>粗为知读经书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370613_comment'></div>一来应举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370613_comment'></div>事随日生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370613_comment'></div>虽欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>加功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370613_comment'></div>竟无其暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370613_comment'></div>游从之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370613_comment'></div>相熟相同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370613_comment'></div>不教不学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370613_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>闷然</span>不见已缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370613_comment'></div>日失月亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370613_comment'></div>以至于老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370613_comment'></div>所谓无以自别于常人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370613_comment'></div>每逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>学士</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>真儒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370613_comment'></div>叹息踧踖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370613_comment'></div>愧生于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370613_comment'></div>颜变于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370613_comment'></div>不复自比于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370613_comment'></div>前者蒙示新注公羊春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370613_comment'></div>又闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>口授</span>指略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370613_comment'></div>私心喜幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370613_comment'></div>恨遭逢之晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370613_comment'></div>愿尽传其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370613_comment'></div>职事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>羁缠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370613_comment'></div>未得继请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370613_comment'></div>怠惰因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370613_comment'></div>不能自彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370613_comment'></div>此宜在摈而不教者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370613_comment'></div>今反谓少知根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370613_comment'></div>其辞章近古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370613_comment'></div>可令叙所著书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370613_comment'></div>惠出非望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370613_comment'></div>承命反侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370613_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>善诱</span>不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370613_comment'></div>斯为多方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370613_comment'></div>敢不喻所指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370613_comment'></div>八月益凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370613_comment'></div>时得休暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370613_comment'></div>傥矜其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>拘缀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370613_comment'></div>不得走请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370613_comment'></div>务道之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370613_comment'></div>而赐辱临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370613_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>执经</span>座下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370613_comment'></div>获卒所闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370613_comment'></div>是为大幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370613_comment'></div>况近世公羊学几绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370613_comment'></div>何氏注外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370613_comment'></div>不见他书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370613_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>圣经贤传</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370613_comment'></div>屏而不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370613_comment'></div>要妙之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370613_comment'></div>无自而寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370613_comment'></div>非先生好之乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370613_comment'></div>味于众人之所不味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370613_comment'></div>务张而明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370613_comment'></div>其孰能勤勤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>绻绻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370613_comment'></div>若此之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370613_comment'></div>固鄙心之所最急者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370613_comment'></div>如遂蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>开释</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370613_comment'></div>章分句断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370613_comment'></div>其心晓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370613_comment'></div>直使序所注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370613_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>挂名</span>经端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370613_comment'></div>自托<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370613", 1370613, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>不腐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370613_comment'></div>其又奚辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370613_comment'></div>将惟先生所以命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370613_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1370613_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　八月后，在长安任刑部侍郎。受请为权德舆撰写墓碑文，权卒于八月戊寅日。作品：唐故相权公墓碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷20。）</span><div id='poem_1370754' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370754' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370754?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故相权公墓碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370754")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370754_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370754'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370754'>上之元和六年。其相曰权公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370754_comment'></div>讳德舆。字载之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370754_comment'></div>其本出自殷帝武丁。武丁之子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>降封</span>于权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370754_comment'></div>权江汉閒国也。周衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370754_comment'></div>入楚为权氏。楚灭徙秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370754_comment'></div>而居天水略阳。符秦之王中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370754_comment'></div>其臣有安邱公翼者。有大臣之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370754_comment'></div>后六世至平凉公文诞。为唐上庸太守荆州大都督长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370754_comment'></div>焯有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>声烈</span>。平凉曾孙讳倕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370754_comment'></div>赠尚书礼部郎中。以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>艺学</span>与苏源明相善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370754_comment'></div>卒官羽林军录事参军。于公为王父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370754_comment'></div>郎中生赠太子太保讳皋。以忠孝致大名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370754_comment'></div>去官。累以官徵不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370754_comment'></div>追谥贞孝。是实生公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370754_comment'></div>公在相位三年。其后以吏部尚书授节镇山南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370754_comment'></div>年六十以薨。赠尚书左仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370754_comment'></div>谥文公。公生三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370754_comment'></div>知变四声。四岁能为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370754_comment'></div>七岁而贞孝公卒。来吊哭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370754_comment'></div>见其颜色声容。皆相谓权氏世有其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370754_comment'></div>及长好学。孝敬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>祥顺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370754_comment'></div>贞元八年以前江西府监察御史徵拜博士。朝士以得人相庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370754_comment'></div>改左补阙。章奏不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370754_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>讥排</span>奸倖。与阳城为助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370754_comment'></div>转起居舍人。遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>知制诰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370754_comment'></div>凡撰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>命词</span>九年。以类集为五十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370754_comment'></div>天下称其能。十八年以中书舍人典贡士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370754_comment'></div>拜尚书礼部侍郎。荐士于公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370754_comment'></div>其言可信。不以其人布衣不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370754_comment'></div>即不可信。虽大官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>势人</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>交言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370754_comment'></div>一不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>缀意</span>。奏广岁所取进士明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370754_comment'></div>在得人。不以员拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370754_comment'></div>转户兵吏三曹侍郎太子宾客。复为兵部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370754_comment'></div>迁太常卿。天下愈推为钜人长德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370754_comment'></div>时天子以为宰相宜参用道德人。因拜礼部尚书同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370754_comment'></div>公既谢辞。不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370754_comment'></div>其所设张举措。必本于宽大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370754_comment'></div>以几教化。多所助与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370754_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>维匡</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/76/Comments/1")'>调娱</span>。不失其正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370754_comment'></div>中于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>和节</span>。不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>声章</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370754_comment'></div>因善与贤。不矜主已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370754_comment'></div>以吏部尚书留守东都。东方诸帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370754_comment'></div>有利病不能自请者。公尝与疏陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370754_comment'></div>不以露布。复拜太常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370754_comment'></div>转刑部尚书。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>考定</span>新旧令式为三十编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370754_comment'></div>举可长用。其在山南河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370754_comment'></div>勤于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>选付</span>。治以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370754_comment'></div>人以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>宁便</span>。以疾求还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370754_comment'></div>十三年某月甲子。道薨于洋之白草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370754_comment'></div>奏至。天子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>痌伤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370754_comment'></div>为之不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>御朝</span>。郎官致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>赠锡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370754_comment'></div>官居野处。上下吊哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370754_comment'></div>皆曰善人死矣。其年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370754_comment'></div>葬河南北山。在贞孝东五里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370754_comment'></div>公由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>陪属</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/108/Comments/1")'>升列</span>。年除岁迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370754_comment'></div>以至公宰。人皆喜闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370754_comment'></div>若已与有。无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>忌嫉</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370754_comment'></div>于頔坐子杀人。失位自囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370754_comment'></div>亲戚莫敢过门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>省顾</span>。朝莫敢言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370754_comment'></div>公将留守东都。为上言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370754_comment'></div>頔之罪既贳不竟。宜因赐宽诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370754_comment'></div>上曰然。公为吾行谕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370754_comment'></div>頔以不忧死。前后考第进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370754_comment'></div>及廷所策试士。踵相蹑为宰相达官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370754_comment'></div>与公相先后。其馀布处台阁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>外府</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370754_comment'></div>凡百馀人。自始学至疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370754_comment'></div>未尝一日去书不观。公既以能为文辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>擅声</span>于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370754_comment'></div>多铭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>卿大夫</span>功德。然其为家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370754_comment'></div>不视簿书。未尝问有亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370754_comment'></div>费不偫馀。公娶清河崔氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370754_comment'></div>其父造。尝相德宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370754_comment'></div>号为名臣。既葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370754_comment'></div>其子监察御史璩。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>累然</span>服丧来有请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370754_comment'></div>乃作铭。文曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370754_comment'></div>权在商周。世次不存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370754_comment'></div>灭楚徙秦。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>嬴刘</span>之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370754_comment'></div>甘泉始侯。以及安邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370754_comment'></div>诋诃浮屠。皇极之扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370754_comment'></div>贞孝之生。凤鸟不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370754_comment'></div>爵位岂多。半涂以税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370754_comment'></div>寿考岂多。四十而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370754_comment'></div>惟其不有。以惠厥后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370754_comment'></div>是生相君。为朝德首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370754_comment'></div>行世祖之。文世师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370754_comment'></div>流连六官。出入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>屏毗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370754_comment'></div>无党无雠。举世莫疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370754_comment'></div>人所惮为。公勇为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370754_comment'></div>其所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370754", 1370754, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>竞驰</span>。公绝不窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370754_comment'></div>孰克知之。德将在斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370754_comment'></div>刻诗墓碑。以永厥垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370754_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_90_1370754_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　本年，在长安任刑部侍郎。再次为樊宗师作荐书。作品：荐樊宗师状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷28。）</span><div id='poem_1370551' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370551' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370551?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荐樊宗师状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370551")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370551_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1370551_0'>① 摄山南西道节度副使朝议郎前检校水部员外郎兼殿中侍御史赐绯鱼袋樊宗师</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370551'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370551'>右件官孝友忠信。称于宗族朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370551_comment'></div>可以厚风俗。勤于艺学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370551_comment'></div>多所通解。议论平正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370551_comment'></div>有经据可以备顾问。谨洁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370551", 1370551, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>和敏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370551_comment'></div>持身甚苦。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370551", 1370551, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>遇物</span>仁恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370551_comment'></div>有材有识。可任以事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370551_comment'></div>今左右史并阙员外郎。侍御史亦未备员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370551_comment'></div>若蒙擢授。必有补益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370551_comment'></div>忝在班列。知贤不敢不论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370551_comment'></div>谨录状上。伏听处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370551_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1370551_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在长安任刑部侍郎。约于此年作《答吕医山人书》一文。作品：答吕医山人书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_1370616' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370616' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370616?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答吕医山人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370616")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370616_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370616'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370616'>愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370616_comment'></div>惠书责以不能如信陵执辔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370616_comment'></div>夫信陵战国<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>公子</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370616_comment'></div>欲以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>取士</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>声势</span>倾天下而然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370616_comment'></div>如仆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370616_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>自度</span>若世无孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370616_comment'></div>不当在弟子之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370616_comment'></div>以吾子始自山出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370616_comment'></div>有朴茂之美意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370616_comment'></div>恐未砻磨以世事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370616_comment'></div>又自周后文弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370616_comment'></div>百子为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370616_comment'></div>各自名家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370616_comment'></div>乱圣人之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370616_comment'></div>后生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>习传</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370616_comment'></div>杂而不贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370616_comment'></div>故设问以观吾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370616_comment'></div>其已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>成熟</span>乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370616_comment'></div>将以为友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370616_comment'></div>其未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>成熟</span>乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370616_comment'></div>将以讲去其非而趋是耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370616_comment'></div>不如六国<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>公子</span>有市于道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370616_comment'></div>方今天下入仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370616_comment'></div>惟以进士明经及卿大夫之世耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370616_comment'></div>其人率皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>习熟</span>时俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370616_comment'></div>工于语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370616_comment'></div>识形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370616_comment'></div>善候人主意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370616_comment'></div>故天下靡靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370616_comment'></div>日入于衰坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370616_comment'></div>恐不复振起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370616_comment'></div>务欲进足下趋死不顾利害去就之人于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370616_comment'></div>以争救之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370616_comment'></div>非谓当今公卿閒无足下辈文学知识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370616_comment'></div>不得以信陵比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370616_comment'></div>然足下衣破衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370616_comment'></div>系麻鞋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370616_comment'></div>率然叩吾门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370616_comment'></div>吾待足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370616_comment'></div>虽未尽宾主之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370616_comment'></div>不可谓无意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370616_comment'></div>足下行天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370616_comment'></div>得此于人盖寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370616_comment'></div>乃遂能责不足于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370616_comment'></div>此真仆所汲汲求者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370616_comment'></div>议虽未中节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370616_comment'></div>其不肯阿曲以事人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370616_comment'></div>灼灼明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370616_comment'></div>方将坐足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370616_comment'></div>三浴而三熏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370616_comment'></div>听仆之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370616_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370616", 1370616, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>少安无躁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370616_comment'></div>愈顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370616_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在长安任刑部侍郎。约在此年之前作《读荀子》一文。作品：读荀子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷1。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年1月1日</a>　元日，在长安。马总元和十三年元日有诗赠韩愈，过一年，韩愈以诗赠答之。作品：元日酬蔡州马十二尚书去年蔡州元日见寄之什。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_49371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元日酬蔡州马十二尚书去年蔡州元日见寄之什</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49371")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49371'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49371'>元日新诗已去年，蔡州遥寄荷相怜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49371'>今朝纵有谁人领，自是三峰<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作冬）</span>不敢眠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49371'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年1月12日</a>　一月十二日，在长安。宪宗迎佛骨，韩愈上表以谏阻之，因此遭罪。作品：论佛骨表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370529' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370529' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370529?labeling=true' "poem_title_1370529")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370529_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370529'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370529'>臣某言。伏以佛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370529_comment'></div>夷狄之一法耳。自后汉时流入中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370529_comment'></div>上古未尝有也。昔者黄帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>在位</span>百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370529_comment'></div>年百一十岁。少昊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>在位</span>八十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370529_comment'></div>年百岁。颛顼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>在位</span>七十九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370529_comment'></div>年九十八岁。帝喾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>在位</span>七十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370529_comment'></div>年百五岁。帝尧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>在位</span>九十八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370529_comment'></div>年百一十八岁。帝舜及禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370529_comment'></div>年皆百岁。此时天下太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370529_comment'></div>百姓安乐寿考。然而中国未有佛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370529_comment'></div>其后殷汤亦年百岁。汤孙太戊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>在位</span>七十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370529_comment'></div>武丁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>在位</span>五十九年。书史不言其年寿所极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370529_comment'></div>推其年数。盖亦俱不减百岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370529_comment'></div>周文王年九十七岁。武王年九十三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370529_comment'></div>穆王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>在位</span>百年。此时佛法亦未入中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370529_comment'></div>非因事佛而致然也。汉明帝时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370529_comment'></div>始有佛法。明帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>在位</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370529_comment'></div>才十八年耳。其后乱亡相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>运祚</span>不长。宋齐梁陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>元魏</span>以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370529_comment'></div>事佛渐谨。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>年代</span>尤促。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370529_comment'></div>惟梁武帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>在位</span>四十八年。前后三度舍身施佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370529_comment'></div>宗庙之祭。不用牲牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>昼日</span>一食。止于菜果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370529_comment'></div>其后竟为侯景所逼。饿死台城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370529_comment'></div>国亦寻灭。事佛求福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370529_comment'></div>乃更得祸。由此观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370529_comment'></div>佛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>不足</span>事。亦可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370529_comment'></div>高祖始受隋禅。则议除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370529_comment'></div>当时群臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>材识</span>不远。不能深知先王之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370529_comment'></div>古今之宜。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>推阐</span>圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370529_comment'></div>以救斯弊。其事遂止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370529_comment'></div>臣常恨焉。伏惟睿圣文武皇帝陛下神圣英武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370529_comment'></div>数千百年已来。未有伦比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370529_comment'></div>即位之初。即不许度人为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>僧尼</span>道士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370529_comment'></div>又不许创立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>寺观</span>。臣尝以为高祖之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370529_comment'></div>必行于陛下之手。今纵未能即行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370529_comment'></div>岂可恣之。转令盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370529_comment'></div>今闻陛下令群僧迎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>佛骨</span>于凤翔。御楼以观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370529_comment'></div>舁入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>大内</span>。又令诸寺递迎供养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370529_comment'></div>臣虽至愚。必知陛下不惑于佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370529_comment'></div>作此崇奉。以祈福祥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370529_comment'></div>直以年丰人乐。徇人之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370529_comment'></div>为京都士庶设诡异之观。戏玩之具耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370529_comment'></div>安有圣明若此。而肯信此等事哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370529_comment'></div>然百姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>愚冥</span>。易惑难晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370529_comment'></div>苟见陛下如此。将谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>真心</span>事佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370529_comment'></div>皆云天子大圣。犹一心敬信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370529_comment'></div>百姓何人。岂合更惜身命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>焚顶</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/96/Comments/1")'>烧指</span>。百十为群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370529_comment'></div>解衣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>散钱</span>。自朝至暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370529_comment'></div>转相仿效。惟恐后时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370529_comment'></div>老少奔波。弃其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>业次</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370529_comment'></div>若不即加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>禁遏</span>。更历诸寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370529_comment'></div>必有断臂脔身。以为供养者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>伤风败俗</span>。传笑四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370529_comment'></div>非细事也。夫佛本夷狄之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370529_comment'></div>与中国言语不通。衣服殊制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370529_comment'></div>口不言先王之法言。身不服先王之法服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370529_comment'></div>不知君臣之义。父子之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>假如</span>其身至今尚在。奉其国命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370529_comment'></div>来朝京师。陛下容而接之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370529_comment'></div>不过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>宣政</span>一见。礼宾一设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370529_comment'></div>赐衣一袭。卫而出之于境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370529_comment'></div>不令惑众也。况其身死已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>枯朽</span>之骨。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>凶秽</span>之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370529_comment'></div>岂宜令入宫禁。孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370529_comment'></div>敬鬼神而远之。古之诸侯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>行吊</span>于其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370529_comment'></div>尚令巫祝先以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>桃茢</span>祓除不祥。然后进吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370529_comment'></div>今无故取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>朽秽</span>之物。亲临观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370529_comment'></div>巫祝不先。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>桃茢</span>不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370529_comment'></div>群臣不言其非。御史不举其失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370529_comment'></div>臣实耻之。乞以此骨付之有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370529_comment'></div>投诸水火。永绝根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370529_comment'></div>断天下之疑。绝后代之惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370529_comment'></div>使天下之人。知大圣人之所作为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370529_comment'></div>出于寻常万万也。岂不盛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370529_comment'></div>岂不快哉。佛如有灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370529_comment'></div>能作祸祟。凡有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>殃咎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370529_comment'></div>宜加臣身。上天<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>鉴临</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370529_comment'></div>臣不怨悔。无任感激<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1370529", 1370529, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>恳悃</span>之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370529_comment'></div>谨奉表以闻。臣某诚惶诚恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370529_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_81_1370529_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年1月14日</a>　一月十四日，在长安。因上谏佛骨表，触怒宪宗，本欲处极刑，赖裴度、崔群等求情，贬潮州刺史。即日上道赴贬所。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='93f7b6a672eb45e28fe3bd71e1f10509_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("93f7b6a672eb45e28fe3bd71e1f10509");'><span id='93f7b6a672eb45e28fe3bd71e1f10509_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=822')">820-822年</a>，53-55岁</div><div id='93f7b6a672eb45e28fe3bd71e1f10509' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年11月</a>　十一月中旬，到达长安。就职国子监祭酒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年12月</a>　冬，在长安。上任国子祭酒后，对选任学官方法予以改进，作牒文。作品：国子监新注学官牒。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370635' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370635' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370635?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国子监论新注学官牒</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370635")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370635_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370635'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370635'>国子监应令新注学官等牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370635_comment'></div>准今年赦文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370635_comment'></div>委国子祭酒选择有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370635", 1370635, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>经艺</span>堪训导生徒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370635_comment'></div>以充学官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370635_comment'></div>近年吏部所注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370635_comment'></div>多循资叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370635_comment'></div>不考艺能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370635_comment'></div>至令生徒不自劝励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370635_comment'></div>伏请非专诵经传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370635_comment'></div>博涉坟史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370635_comment'></div>及进士五经诸色登科人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370635_comment'></div>不以比拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370635_comment'></div>其新受官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370635_comment'></div>上日必加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370635", 1370635, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>研试</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370635_comment'></div>然后放行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370635_comment'></div>上副圣朝崇儒尚学之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370635_comment'></div>具状牒上吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370635_comment'></div>仍牒监者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370635_comment'></div>谨牒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1370635_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年12月</a>　冬，在长安任国子祭酒。改元大庆前后作表状，论岭南黄家少数民族作乱之事。作品：黄家贼事宜状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370564' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370564' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370564?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄家贼事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370564")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370564_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370564'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370564'>右。臣伏以臣去年贬岭外刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370564_comment'></div>其州虽与黄家贼不相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>邻接</span>。然见往来过客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370564_comment'></div>并谙知岭外事人所说至精至熟。其贼并是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>夷獠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370564_comment'></div>亦无城郭可居。依山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>傍险</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370564_comment'></div>自称洞主。衣服言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370564_comment'></div>都不似人。寻常亦各营生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370564_comment'></div>急则屯聚相保。比缘邕管经略使多不得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370564_comment'></div>德既不能绥怀。威又不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>临制</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370564_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>侵欺</span>虏缚。以致怨恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370564_comment'></div>蛮夷之性。易动难安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370564_comment'></div>遂致攻劫州县。侵暴平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370564_comment'></div>或复私仇。或贪小利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370564_comment'></div>或聚或散。终亦不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>为事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370564_comment'></div>近者征讨。本起于裴行立阳旻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370564_comment'></div>此两人者。本无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>远虑深谋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370564_comment'></div>意在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>邀功求赏</span>。亦缘见贼未屯聚之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370564_comment'></div>将谓单弱。立可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>摧破</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370564_comment'></div>争献谋计。惟恐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>后时</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370564_comment'></div>朝廷信之。遂允其请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370564_comment'></div>自用兵以来。已经二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370564_comment'></div>前后所奏杀获。计<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>不下</span>一二万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370564_comment'></div>傥皆非虚。贼已寻尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370564_comment'></div>至今贼犹依旧。足明欺罔朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370564_comment'></div>邕容两管。因此彫毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370564_comment'></div>杀伤疾患。十室九空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370564_comment'></div>百姓怨嗟。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>如出一口</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370564_comment'></div>阳旻行立。相继身亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370564_comment'></div>实由自邀功赏。造作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>兵端</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370564_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>人神共嫉</span>。以致殃咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370564_comment'></div>阳旻行立事既已往。今所用严公素者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370564_comment'></div>亦非抚御之才。不能别立规模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370564_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>依前</span>还请攻讨。如此不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370564_comment'></div>臣恐岭南一道。未有宁息之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370564_comment'></div>一。昨者并邕容两管为一道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370564_comment'></div>深合事宜。然邕州与贼逼近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370564_comment'></div>容州则甚悬隔。其经略使若置在邕州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370564_comment'></div>与贼隔江对岸。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>兵镇</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/73/Comments/1")'>所处</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370564_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>物力</span>必全。一则不敢轻有侵犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370564_comment'></div>一则易为逐便控制。今置在容州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370564_comment'></div>则邕州兵马必少。贼见势弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370564_comment'></div>易生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>奸心</span>。伏请移经略使于邕州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370564_comment'></div>其容州但置刺史。实为至便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370564_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1370564'>一。比者所发诸道南讨兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370564_comment'></div>例皆不谙山川。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>不伏水土</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370564_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>远乡</span>羁旅。疾疫杀伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370564_comment'></div>臣自南来。见说江西所发共四百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370564_comment'></div>曾未一年。其所存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370564_comment'></div>数不满百。岳鄂所发都三百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370564_comment'></div>其所存者。四分才一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370564_comment'></div>续添续死。每发倍难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370564_comment'></div>若令于邕容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>侧近</span>召募。添置千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370564_comment'></div>便割诸道见供行营人数粮赐。均融<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>充给</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370564_comment'></div>所费既不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>增加</span>。而兵士又皆便习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370564_comment'></div>长有守备。不同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>客军</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370564_comment'></div>守则有威。攻则有利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370564_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_1370564'>一。自南讨已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370564_comment'></div>贼徒亦甚伤损。察其情理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370564_comment'></div>厌苦必深。大抵岭南人稀地广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370564_comment'></div>贼之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>所处</span>。又更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>荒僻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370564_comment'></div>假如尽杀其人。尽得其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370564_comment'></div>在于国计。不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>有益</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370564_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>容贷</span>羁縻。比之禽兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370564_comment'></div>来则捍御。去则不追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370564_comment'></div>亦未亏损朝廷事势。以臣之愚。<div class='inline' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>降伏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370564_comment'></div>欢呼<span class='link' "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>择选</span>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370564", 1370564, "Clauses/133/Comments/1")'>材用</span>威信谙岭南事者为经略使。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年12月</a>　冬，在长安任国子祭酒。改元大庆前后作表状，言袁州弊政。作品：应所在典贴良人男女等状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370565' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370565' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370565?labeling=true' target='_blank'>应所在典贴良人男女等状<span class='inlineComment2'>（应所在典贴良人男女等）</span></a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370565'>右。准律不许<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370565", 1370565, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>典贴</span>良人男女作奴婢驱使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370565_comment'></div>臣往任袁州刺史日。检责州界内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370565_comment'></div>得七百三十一人。并是良人男女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370565_comment'></div>准律计佣折直。一时放免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370565_comment'></div>原其本末。或因水旱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370565", 1370565, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>不熟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370565_comment'></div>或因公私<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370565", 1370565, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>债负</span>。遂相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370565", 1370565, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>典贴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370565_comment'></div>渐以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370565", 1370565, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>成风</span>。名目虽殊。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年4月</a>　四月中旬，在长安任国子祭酒。作诗赠李宗闵。诗意隐晦，多引纷争。作品：南山有高树行赠李宗闵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49641' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49641' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49641?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南山有高树行赠李宗闵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（821年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49641")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49641_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49641_0'>① 凤凰谓裴度，何山鸟谓宗闵，挟丸子及黄鹄谓李德裕、李绅、元稹也。初度伐蔡，引宗闵为彰义观察判官，蔡平，进知制诰。长庆初，钱徽典贡举，宗闵托所亲于徽，德裕及绅、稹共发其事，宗闵坐贬剑州刺史，俄复为中书舍人，由是嫌怨显结，缙绅之祸，四十馀年不解。此赠诗，宗闵初贬时作也，后篇《猛虎行》，宗闵复入后作也。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49641'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2370, "poem_allusion_49641")'>挟丸子</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49641_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49641'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49641'>南山有高树，花叶何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49641", 49641, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>衰衰</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（考张衡南都赋，当作蓑蓑）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49641'>上有凤皇巢，凤皇乳且栖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49641'>四旁多长枝，群鸟所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49641", 49641, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>托依</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49641'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49641", 49641, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>黄鹄</span>据其高，众鸟接<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作栖）</span>其卑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49641'>不知何山鸟，羽毛有光辉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49641'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49641", 49641, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>飞飞</span>择所处，正得众所希。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49641'>上承凤皇恩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49641", 49641, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>自期</span>永不衰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49641'>中与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49641", 49641, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>黄鹄</span>群，不自隐其私。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49641'>下视众鸟群，汝徒竟何为。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49641'>不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2370, "poem_sentence_9_49641")'>挟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49641", 49641, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>丸子</span></span>，心默有所规。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49641'>弹汝枝叶间，汝翅不觉摧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49641'>或言由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_49641", 49641, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>黄鹄</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_49641", 49641, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>黄鹄</span>岂有之。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49641'>慎勿猜众鸟，众鸟不足猜<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作疑）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49641'>无人语凤皇，汝屈安得知。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49641'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49641", 49641, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>黄鹄</span>得汝去，婆娑弄毛衣。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49641'>前汝下视鸟，各议汝瑕疵。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49641'>汝岂无朋匹，有口莫肯开。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49641'>路远<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_49641", 49641,
