id='poem_sentence_20_49641'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_49641_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　本年，在长安任国子祭酒。以乐府旧题作《猛虎行》，讽喻时事。作品：猛虎行。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49653' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49653' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49653?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相和歌辞 猛虎行<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作猛虎行）。（一作韩愈诗）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49653")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49653_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49653'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49653'>猛虎虽云恶，亦各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49653", 49653, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>匹侪</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49653'>群行深谷间，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49653", 49653, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>百兽</span>望风低。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49653'>身食黄熊父，子食赤豹麛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49653'>择肉于熊罴<span class='inlineComment2'>（集作豹）</span>，肯视兔与狸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49653'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49653", 49653, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>正昼</span>当谷眠，眼有百步威。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49653'>自矜无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49653", 49653, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>当对</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49653", 49653, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>气性</span>纵以乖。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49653'>朝怒杀其子，暮还飧<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作食）</span>其妃。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49653'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49653", 49653, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>匹侪</span>四散走，猛虎还孤栖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49653'>狐鸣门四旁，乌鹊从噪之。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49653'>出逐猴<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作猚）</span>入居，虎不知所归。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49653'>谁云猛虎恶，中路正悲啼。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49653'>豹来衔其尾，熊来攫其颐。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49653'>猛虎死不辞，但惭前所为。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49653'>虎坐无助死，况如汝细微。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49653'>故当结以信，亲当结以私。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49653'>亲故且不保，人谁信汝为。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49653'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_49653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49653'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49653)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年5月</a>　五月前，在长安任国子祭酒。为李汉之父作祭文。作品：中大夫陕府左司马李公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷24。）</span><div id='poem_1370774' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370774' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370774?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中大夫陕府左司马李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370774")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370774_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370774'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370774'>公讳郱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370774_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370774_comment'></div>雍王绘之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370774_comment'></div>王孙道明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370774_comment'></div>唐初以属封淮阳王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370774_comment'></div>又追王其祖父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370774_comment'></div>曰雍王长平王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370774_comment'></div>淮阳王生景融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370774_comment'></div>景融亲益疏不王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370774_comment'></div>生务该。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370774_comment'></div>务该生思一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370774_comment'></div>思一生岌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370774_comment'></div>比四世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370774_comment'></div>官不过县令州佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370774_comment'></div>然益读书为行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370774_comment'></div>为士大夫家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370774_comment'></div>岌为蜀州晋原尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370774_comment'></div>生公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370774_comment'></div>未晬以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370774_comment'></div>无家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370774_comment'></div>母抱置之姑氏以去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370774_comment'></div>姑怜而食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370774_comment'></div>至五六岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370774_comment'></div>自问知本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370774_comment'></div>因不复与群儿戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370774_comment'></div>常默默独处曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370774_comment'></div>吾独无父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370774_comment'></div>不力学问自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370774_comment'></div>不名为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370774_comment'></div>年十四五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370774_comment'></div>能闇记论语尚书毛诗左氏文选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370774_comment'></div>凡百馀万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370774_comment'></div>凛然殊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370774_comment'></div>姑氏子弟莫敢为敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370774_comment'></div>浸传之闻诸父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370774_comment'></div>诸父泣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370774_comment'></div>吾兄尚有子耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370774_comment'></div>迎归而坐问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370774_comment'></div>应对横从无难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370774_comment'></div>诸父悲喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370774_comment'></div>顾语群子弟曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370774_comment'></div>吾为汝得师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370774_comment'></div>于是纵学无不观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370774_comment'></div>以朝邑员外尉选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370774_comment'></div>鲁公真卿第其所试文上等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370774_comment'></div>擢为同官正尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370774_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370774_comment'></div>文如李尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370774_comment'></div>乃可望此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370774_comment'></div>其后比以书判拔萃选为万年尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370774_comment'></div>为华州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370774_comment'></div>争事于刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370774_comment'></div>去官为陆浑令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370774_comment'></div>河南尹郑馀庆荐之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370774_comment'></div>拜南郑令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370774_comment'></div>尹家奴以书抵县<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370774", 1370774, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>请事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370774_comment'></div>公走府出其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370774_comment'></div>投之尹前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370774_comment'></div>尹惭其庭中人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370774_comment'></div>令辱我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370774_comment'></div>令辱我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370774_comment'></div>且曰令退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370774_comment'></div>遂怨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370774_comment'></div>拾掇三年无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370774_comment'></div>拜宗正丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370774_comment'></div>宰相以文理白为资州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370774_comment'></div>公喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370774_comment'></div>吾将有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370774_comment'></div>谗宰相者言之上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370774_comment'></div>是与其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370774_comment'></div>故得用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370774_comment'></div>改拜陜府左司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370774_comment'></div>公又喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370774_comment'></div>是官无所职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370774_comment'></div>吾其不以吏事受责死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370774_comment'></div>长庆元年正月丙辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370774_comment'></div>以疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370774_comment'></div>春秋七十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370774_comment'></div>公内外行完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370774_comment'></div>洁白奋厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370774_comment'></div>再成有家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370774_comment'></div>士大夫谈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370774_comment'></div>夫人博陵崔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370774_comment'></div>朝邑令友之之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370774_comment'></div>其曾伯父元炜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370774_comment'></div>有功中宗时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370774_comment'></div>夫人高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370774_comment'></div>遇子妇有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370774", 1370774, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>节法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370774_comment'></div>进见侍侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370774_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370774", 1370774, id='poem_sentence_91_1370774_comment'></div>其嫡激鄜城令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370774_comment'></div>放芮城尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370774_comment'></div>汉监察御史。<div id='poem_sentence_102_1370774_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_103_1370774'>愈下而微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370774_comment'></div>既极复飞。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年5月</a>　五月前，在长安任国子祭酒。为李汉之父作墓志铭。作品：祭故陕府李司马文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370832' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370832' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370832?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭故陕府李司马文</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370832")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370832_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370832'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370832'>维年月日。守国子祭酒赐紫金鱼袋韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370832_comment'></div>谨以清酌之奠。祭于故陕府左司马李公之灵曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370832_comment'></div>公学以为耕。文以为穫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370832_comment'></div>发愤孤身。复续厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370832_comment'></div>选于吏部。亟以科进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370832_comment'></div>历临大邑。惟政有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370832_comment'></div>遂丞宗正。日朝帝庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370832_comment'></div>出辅陕都。吏畏僚慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370832_comment'></div>子妇诸孙。盈于室堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370832_comment'></div>公姑悦喜。五福具有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370832_comment'></div>大夫士家。孰不荣羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370832_comment'></div>如何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370832", 1370832, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>不常</span>。以至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370832", 1370832, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>大故</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370832_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。愈以守官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370832_comment'></div>不获吊送。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370832", 1370832, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>昏姻</span>之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370832_comment'></div>以哀以悲。敬致微礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370832_comment'></div>公其歆之。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370832_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1370832_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　上半年，在长安任国子祭酒。受请为李道古撰墓志铭。作品：唐故昭武校尉守左金吾将军李公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷22。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年7月</a>　七月迁兵部侍郎前，在长安。率国子监所管众官吏上表请皇帝加尊号。作品：请上尊号表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370538' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370538")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370538_comment'></div>臣得所管国子太学广文四门及书算律等七馆学生沈周封等六百人状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370538_comment'></div>身虽贱微。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年7月</a>　七月转兵部侍郎前，在长安。兴庆宫参加朝贺，归而作诗呈送同官。作品：南内朝贺归呈同官。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span>朝归。<span id='poem_sentence_7_49716_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年7月26日</a>　七月二十六日，在长安。由国子祭酒转兵部侍郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年7月</a>　七月，在长安。接到转兵部侍郎诏令，按惯例，需上表状举别人代己任职。韩愈举韦顗代己。作品：举韦顗自代状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370558' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370558'>右。㐲准建中元年正月五日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370558_comment'></div>常参官上后三日。举一人自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370558_comment'></div>前件官学识该达。器量宏深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370558_comment'></div>朝推直道。代仰清节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370558_comment'></div>显映<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370558", 1370558, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>班序</span>。十五年馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370558_comment'></div>夷险一致。风猷益茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370558_comment'></div>屈居少列。未副群情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370558_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370558", 1370558, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>文昌</span>政本。侍郎官重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370558_comment'></div>尚德之举。顗宜当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370558_comment'></div>乞回臣所授。庶弭官谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370558_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。谨奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370558_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1370558_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　八月后，在长安任兵部侍郎。张彻八月在幽州被杀，韩愈为之撰祭文。作品：祭张给事文。<span id='poem_sentence_1_1370839_comment'></div>惟君之先。以儒名家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370839_comment'></div>逮君皇考。再振厥华。<div class='inline' "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>从女</span>。为君之配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370839_comment'></div>君于其家。行实高世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370839_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370839", 1370839, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>无所</span>于葬。舆魂东归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370839_comment'></div>诔以赠之。莫知我哀。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年9月</a>　九月，在长安任兵部侍郎。论钱重物轻、物价过低之弊，作状文。作品：钱重物轻状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷27。）</span><div id='poem_1370546' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370546' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370546?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钱重物轻状</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370546")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370546_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370546'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370546'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370546_comment'></div>臣伏准御史台牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370546_comment'></div>准中书门下帖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370546_comment'></div>奉进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370546_comment'></div>钱重物轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370546_comment'></div>为毙颇甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370546_comment'></div>详求适变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370546_comment'></div>可以便人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370546_comment'></div>所贵缗货通行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370546_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370546", 1370546, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>里闾</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370546", 1370546, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>宽息</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370546_comment'></div>宜令百寮随所见作利害状者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370546_comment'></div>臣愚以为钱重物轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370546_comment'></div>救之之法有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370546_comment'></div>一曰在物土贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370546_comment'></div>夫五谷布帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370546_comment'></div>农人之所能出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370546_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370546", 1370546, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>工人</span>之所能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370546_comment'></div>人不能铸钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370546_comment'></div>而使之卖布帛谷米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370546_comment'></div>以输钱于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370546_comment'></div>是以物愈贱而钱愈贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370546_comment'></div>今使出布之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370546_comment'></div>租赋悉以布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370546_comment'></div>出绵丝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370546", 1370546, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>百货</span>之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370546_comment'></div>租赋悉以绵丝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370546", 1370546, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>百货</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370546_comment'></div>去京百里悉出草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370546_comment'></div>三百里以粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370546_comment'></div>五百里之内及河渭可漕入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370546_comment'></div>愿以草粟租赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370546_comment'></div>悉以听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370546_comment'></div>则人益农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370546_comment'></div>钱益轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370546_comment'></div>谷米布帛益重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370546_comment'></div>二曰在塞其隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370546_comment'></div>无使之泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370546_comment'></div>禁人无得以铜为器皿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370546_comment'></div>禁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370546", 1370546, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>铸铜</span>为浮屠佛像钟磬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370546_comment'></div>蓄铜过若干斤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370546_comment'></div>铸钱以为他物者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370546_comment'></div>皆罪死不赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370546_comment'></div>禁钱不得出五岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370546_comment'></div>买卖一以银。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370546_comment'></div>盗以钱出岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370546_comment'></div>及违令以买卖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370546_comment'></div>皆坐死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370546_comment'></div>五岭旧钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370546_comment'></div>听人载出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370546_comment'></div>如此则钱必轻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370546_comment'></div>三曰更其文贵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370546_comment'></div>使一当五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370546_comment'></div>而新旧兼用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370546_comment'></div>凡铸钱千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370546_comment'></div>其费亦千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370546_comment'></div>今铸一而得五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370546_comment'></div>是费钱千而得钱五千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370546_comment'></div>可立多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370546_comment'></div>四曰扶其病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370546_comment'></div>使法必立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370546_comment'></div>凡法始立必有病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370546_comment'></div>今使人各输其土物以为租赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370546_comment'></div>则州县无见钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370546_comment'></div>州县无见钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370546_comment'></div>而谷米布帛未重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370546_comment'></div>则用不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370546_comment'></div>而官吏之禄俸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370546_comment'></div>月减其旧三之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370546_comment'></div>各置铸钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370546_comment'></div>使新钱一当五者以给之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370546_comment'></div>轻重平乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370546_comment'></div>四法用钱必轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370546_comment'></div>谷米布帛必重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370546_comment'></div>百姓必均矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370546_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370546_comment'></div>伏听敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370546_comment'></div>谨奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1370546_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　八至十一月间，在长安任兵部侍郎。郑群八月二十四日卒，十一月二十二日葬。为之作墓志铭。作品：唐故朝散大夫尚书库部郎中郑君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷22。）</span><div /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370766'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370766'>君讳群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370766_comment'></div>字宏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370766_comment'></div>世为荥阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370766_comment'></div>其祖于元魏时有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370766", 1370766, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>假封</span>襄城公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370766_comment'></div>子孙因称以自别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370766_comment'></div>曾祖匡时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370766_comment'></div>晋州霍邑令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370766_comment'></div>祖千寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370766_comment'></div>彭州九陇丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370766_comment'></div>父迪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370766_comment'></div>鄂州唐年令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370766_comment'></div>娶河南独孤氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370766_comment'></div>生二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370766_comment'></div>君其季也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370766_comment'></div>以进士选吏部考功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370766_comment'></div>所试判为上等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370766_comment'></div>授正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370766_comment'></div>自鄠县尉拜监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370766_comment'></div>佐鄂岳使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370766_comment'></div>裴均之为江陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370766_comment'></div>以殿中侍御史佐其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370766_comment'></div>均之徵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370766_comment'></div>迁虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370766_comment'></div>均镇襄阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370766_comment'></div>复以君为襄府左司马刑部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370766_comment'></div>副其支度使事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370766_comment'></div>均卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370766_comment'></div>李夷代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370766_comment'></div>因以故职留君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370766_comment'></div>岁馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370766_comment'></div>拜复州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370766_comment'></div>迁祠部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370766_comment'></div>会衢州无刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370766_comment'></div>方选人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370766_comment'></div>君愿行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370766_comment'></div>宰相即以君应诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370766_comment'></div>治衢五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370766_comment'></div>复入为库部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370766_comment'></div>行及扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370766_comment'></div>遇疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370766_comment'></div>居月馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370766_comment'></div>以长庆元年八月二十四日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370766_comment'></div>春秋六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370766_comment'></div>即以其年十一月二十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370766_comment'></div>从葬于郑州广武原先人之墓次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370766_comment'></div>君天性和乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370766_comment'></div>居家事人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370766_comment'></div>与待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370766", 1370766, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>交游</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370766_comment'></div>初持一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370766_comment'></div>未尝变节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370766_comment'></div>有所缓急曲直薄厚疏数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370766_comment'></div>不为翕翕热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370766_comment'></div>遇其空无时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370766_comment'></div>客至清坐相看。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370766_comment'></div>或竟日不能设食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370766_comment'></div>客主各自引退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370766_comment'></div>亦不为辞谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370766_comment'></div>与之游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370766_comment'></div>自少及老。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370766_comment'></div>长女嫁京兆韦词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370766_comment'></div>次嫁兰陵萧瓒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370766_comment'></div>后娶河南少尹赵郡李则女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370766_comment'></div>生一女二男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370766_comment'></div>其馀男二人女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370766_comment'></div>皆幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370766_comment'></div>嗣子退思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370766_comment'></div>韦氏生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370766_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370766_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_89_1370766'>再鸣以文进涂辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370766_comment'></div>佐三府治蔼厥迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370766_comment'></div>郎官郡守愈著白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370766_comment'></div>洞然浑朴绝瑕谪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370766_comment'></div>甲子一终返元宅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_93_1370766_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　九至十一月间，在长安任兵部侍郎。受请为薛戎作墓志铭。作品：唐故朝散大夫越州刺史薛公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷22。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　本年，在长安任兵部侍郎。受请为马继祖作墓志铭。作品：殿中少监马君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷23。）</span><div id='poem_1370772' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370772' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370772?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中少监马君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_1370772_comment'></div>司徒赠太师北平庄武王之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370772_comment'></div>少府监赠太子少傅讳畅之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370772_comment'></div>生四岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370772_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370772", 1370772, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>门功</span>拜太子舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370772_comment'></div>积三十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370772_comment'></div>五转而至殿中少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370772_comment'></div>年三十七以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370772_comment'></div>有男八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370772_comment'></div>女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370772_comment'></div>始予初冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370772_comment'></div>应进士贡在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370772_comment'></div>穷不自存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370772_comment'></div>以故人稚弟拜北平王于马前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370772_comment'></div>王问而怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370772_comment'></div>因得见于安邑里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370772_comment'></div>王轸其寒饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370772_comment'></div>赐食与衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370772_comment'></div>召二子使为之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370772_comment'></div>其季遇我特厚。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1370772_comment'></div>眉眼如画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370772_comment'></div>发漆黑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370772_comment'></div>肌肉<span "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>分散</span>在地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370747_comment'></div>其文<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>剥缺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370747_comment'></div>考<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>图记</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370747_comment'></div>言汉荆州牧刘表景升之立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370747_comment'></div>题曰湘夫人碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370747_comment'></div>今验其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370747_comment'></div>乃晋太康九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370747_comment'></div>又题其额曰虞帝二妃之碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370747_comment'></div>非景升立者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370747_comment'></div>秦博士对始皇帝云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370747_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>湘君</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370747_comment'></div>尧之二女舜妃者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370747_comment'></div>刘向郑元亦皆以二妃为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>湘君</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370747_comment'></div>而离骚九歌既有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>湘君</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370747_comment'></div>又有湘夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370747_comment'></div>王逸之解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370747_comment'></div>以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>湘君</span>者自其水神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370747_comment'></div>而谓湘夫人乃二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370747_comment'></div>从舜南征三苗不反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370747_comment'></div>道死沅湘之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370747_comment'></div>山海经曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370747_comment'></div>洞庭之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370747_comment'></div>帝之二女居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370747_comment'></div>郭璞疑二女者帝舜之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370747_comment'></div>不当降小水为其夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370747_comment'></div>因以二女为天帝之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370747_comment'></div>以余考之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370747_comment'></div>璞与王逸俱失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370747_comment'></div>尧之长女娥皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370747_comment'></div>为舜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>正妃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370747_comment'></div>故曰君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370747_comment'></div>其二女女英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370747_comment'></div>自宜降曰夫人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370747_comment'></div>故九歌辞谓娥皇为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370747_comment'></div>谓女英为帝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370747_comment'></div>各以其盛者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>推言</span>之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370747_comment'></div>礼有小君君母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370747_comment'></div>明其正自得称君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370747_comment'></div>书曰舜陟方乃死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370747_comment'></div>传谓舜升道南方以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370747_comment'></div>或又曰舜死葬苍梧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370747_comment'></div>二妃从之不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370747_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>溺死</span>沅湘之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370747_comment'></div>余谓竹书纪年帝王之没皆曰陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370747_comment'></div>陟升也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370747_comment'></div>谓升天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370747_comment'></div>书曰殷礼陟配天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370747_comment'></div>言以道终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370747_comment'></div>其德协天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370747_comment'></div>书纪舜之没云陟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370747_comment'></div>与竹书周书同文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370747_comment'></div>其下言方乃死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370747_comment'></div>所以释陟为死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370747_comment'></div>地之势东南下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370747_comment'></div>如言舜南巡而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370747_comment'></div>宜言下方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370747_comment'></div>不得言陟方也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370747_comment'></div>以此谓舜死葬苍梧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370747_comment'></div>于时二妃从之不及而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370747", 1370747, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>溺死</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370747_comment'></div>皆不可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370747_comment'></div>二妃既曰以谋语舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370747_comment'></div>脱舜之厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370747_comment'></div>成舜之圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370747_comment'></div>尧死而舜有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370747_comment'></div>为天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370747_comment'></div>二之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370747_comment'></div>宜常为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370747_comment'></div>食民之祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370747_comment'></div>今之渡湘江者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370747_comment'></div>莫敢不进礼庙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370747_comment'></div>元和十四年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370747_comment'></div>余以言事得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370747_comment'></div>黜为潮州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370747_comment'></div>其地于汉南海之揭阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370747_comment'></div>疠毒所聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370747_comment'></div>惧不得脱死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370747_comment'></div>过庙而祷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370747_comment'></div>其冬移袁州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370747_comment'></div>明年九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370747_comment'></div>拜国子祭酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370747_comment'></div>使以私钱十万抵岳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370747_comment'></div>愿易庙之桷腐瓦于刺史王堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370747_comment'></div>长庆元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370747_comment'></div>刺史张愉自京师往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370747_comment'></div>余与愉故善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370747_comment'></div>因谓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370747_comment'></div>丐我一碑石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370747_comment'></div>载二庙事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370747_comment'></div>且令后世知有子名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370747_comment'></div>愉曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370747_comment'></div>既至州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370747_comment'></div>报曰碑谨具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370747_comment'></div>遂篆其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370747_comment'></div>俾刻之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1370747_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在长安任兵部侍郎。年初，受请为许国公韩弘妻撰墓志铭。作品：楚国夫人墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷23。）</span><div id='poem_1370768' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370768' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370768?labeling=true' target='_blank'>楚国夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370768")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370768_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370768'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370768'>楚国夫人姓翟氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370768_comment'></div>故检校御史大夫宋州刺史良佐之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370768_comment'></div>今司徒兼中书令许国公之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370768_comment'></div>前鄜坊节度使散骑常侍兼御史大夫公武之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370768_comment'></div>夫人在家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370768_comment'></div>以孝友聪明为父母所偏爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370768_comment'></div>选所宜归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370768_comment'></div>以适韩氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370768_comment'></div>韩氏族大且贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370768_comment'></div>又太尉刘公甥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370768_comment'></div>内外尊显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370768_comment'></div>夫人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>入门</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370768_comment'></div>上下莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>赞贺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370768_comment'></div>事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>皇姑</span>齐国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370768_comment'></div>肃恭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>诚至</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370768_comment'></div>奉养不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370768_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>皇姑</span>以夫人能尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>妇道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370768_comment'></div>称之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>六亲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370768_comment'></div>其事夫义以顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370768_comment'></div>其教子爱以公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370768_comment'></div>司徒公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370768_comment'></div>我之能守贵富不危溢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370768_comment'></div>楚国有助焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370768_comment'></div>大夫领梁偏师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370768_comment'></div>卒就蔡功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370768_comment'></div>受节居藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370768_comment'></div>为邦家令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370768_comment'></div>父母之教然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370768_comment'></div>夫人以元和十四年十一月一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370768_comment'></div>薨于鄜之公府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370768_comment'></div>春秋若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370768_comment'></div>大夫委节去位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370768_comment'></div>奉丧以居东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370768_comment'></div>诏起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370768_comment'></div>辞以羸毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370768_comment'></div>不任即命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370768_comment'></div>又加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>喻勉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370768_comment'></div>固不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370768_comment'></div>天子嗟叹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370768_comment'></div>长庆二年三月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370768_comment'></div>葬夫人于洛阳北山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370768_comment'></div>夫人生二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370768_comment'></div>长曰肃元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370768_comment'></div>为太子司议郎以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370768_comment'></div>赠尚书主客郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370768_comment'></div>其次大夫公武也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370768_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370768_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1370768'>翟氏之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370768_comment'></div>盖出宗周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370768_comment'></div>璜显于魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370768_comment'></div>以佐文侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370768_comment'></div>高陵相汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370768_comment'></div>义以家酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370768_comment'></div>迁于南阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370768_comment'></div>始自郎苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370768_comment'></div>逮魏晋宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370768_comment'></div>代不绝史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370768_comment'></div>以至夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370768_comment'></div>太守之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370768_comment'></div>司徒之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370768_comment'></div>大夫之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370768_comment'></div>公居河东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370768_comment'></div>子在鄜畤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370768_comment'></div>为王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370768", 1370768, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>屏翰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370768_comment'></div>有壤千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370768_comment'></div>公曰姑止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370768_comment'></div>以承我祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370768_comment'></div>子曰母兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370768_comment'></div>莫我抚已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370768_comment'></div>文驷雕轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370768_comment'></div>往来有炜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370768_comment'></div>莫尊于母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370768_comment'></div>莫荣于妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370768_comment'></div>从古迄今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370768_comment'></div>孰盛与夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370768_comment'></div>用昭厥裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370768_comment'></div>篆此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1370768_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年2月1日</a>　二月初，在长安任兵部侍郎。与张籍等游杨于陵家林亭，有诗，寄杨于陵之子杨嗣复和白居易、冯宿。作品：早春与张十八博士籍游杨尚书林亭寄第三阁老兼呈白冯二阁老。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>早春与张十八博士籍游杨尚书林亭寄第三阁老兼呈白冯二阁老<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（822年2月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49374")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49374_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49374_0'>① 白居易、冯宿也。第三阁老，杨于陵之子嗣复也。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49374'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49374'>墙下春渠入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49374", 49374, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>禁沟</span>，渠冰初破满渠浮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49374'>凤池近日长先暖，流到池时更<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作见）</span>不流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49374'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年2月2日</a>　二月，在长安任兵部侍郎。二日，受命前往镇州宣抚王庭凑，成功而归。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='e53873ad94394c87aebce5c27717afaa_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　四五月，在长安任兵部侍郎。户部侍郎张平叔上疏请官自卖盐，韩愈、韦处厚条诘之，以为不可，平叔屈服。韩愈撰状文以上。作品：论变盐法事宜状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370568' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370568' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370568?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论变盐法事宜状<span class='inlineComment2'>（张平叔所奏盐法条件）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370568")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370568_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370568'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370568'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370568_comment'></div>奉敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370568_comment'></div>将变<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>盐法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370568_comment'></div>事贵精详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370568_comment'></div>宜令臣等各陈利害可否闻奏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370568_comment'></div>平叔所上变法条件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370568_comment'></div>臣终始详度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370568_comment'></div>恐不可施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370568_comment'></div>各随本条<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>分析</span>利害如后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1370568'>一件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370568_comment'></div>平叔请令州府差人自粜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>官盐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370568_comment'></div>收实估<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>匹段</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>省司</span>准旧例<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>支用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370568_comment'></div>自然获利一倍已上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370568_comment'></div>臣今通计所在百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370568_comment'></div>贫多富少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370568_comment'></div>除城郭外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370568_comment'></div>有见钱籴盐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370568_comment'></div>十无二三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370568_comment'></div>多用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>杂物</span>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>米谷</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/19/Comments/2")'>博易</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370568_comment'></div>盐商利归于已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370568_comment'></div>无物不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370568_comment'></div>或从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>赊贷</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>升斗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370568_comment'></div>约以时熟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>填还</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370568_comment'></div>用此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>取济</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370568_comment'></div>两得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>利便</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370568_comment'></div>今令州县人吏坐铺自粜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370568_comment'></div>利不关已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370568_comment'></div>罪则加身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370568_comment'></div>不得见钱及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>头段物</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370568_comment'></div>恐失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>官利</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370568_comment'></div>必不敢粜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370568_comment'></div>变法之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370568_comment'></div>百姓贫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>无从</span>得盐而食矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370568_comment'></div>求利未得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370568_comment'></div>敛怨已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370568_comment'></div>自然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>坐失</span>盐利常数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370568_comment'></div>所云获利一倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370568_comment'></div>臣所未见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1370568'>一件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370568_comment'></div>平叔又请<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>乡村</span>去州县远处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370568_comment'></div>令所由将盐就村粜易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370568_comment'></div>不得令百姓阙盐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370568_comment'></div>臣以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>乡村</span>远处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370568_comment'></div>或三家五家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370568_comment'></div>山谷居住。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370568_comment'></div>不可令人吏将盐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>家至户到</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370568_comment'></div>多将则粜货不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370568_comment'></div>少将则得钱无多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370568_comment'></div>计其往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370568_comment'></div>自充粮食不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370568_comment'></div>比来商人或自负担斗石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370568_comment'></div>往与百姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>博易</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370568_comment'></div>所冀平价之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370568_comment'></div>利得三钱两钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370568_comment'></div>不比所由为官所使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370568_comment'></div>到村之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370568_comment'></div>必索百姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>供应</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370568_comment'></div>所利至少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370568_comment'></div>为弊则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370568_comment'></div>此又不可行者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1370568'>一件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370568_comment'></div>平叔云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370568_comment'></div>所务至重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370568_comment'></div>须令庙堂宰相充使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370568_comment'></div>臣以为若法可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370568_comment'></div>不假令宰相充使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370568_comment'></div>若不可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370568_comment'></div>虽宰相为使无益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370568_comment'></div>又宰相者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370568_comment'></div>所以<span class='link' "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>百司</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370568_comment'></div>考其殿最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370568_comment'></div>若自为使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370568_comment'></div>纵有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>败阙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370568_comment'></div>遣谁举之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370568_comment'></div>此又不可者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_77_1370568'>一件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370568_comment'></div>平叔又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370568_comment'></div>法行之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370568_comment'></div>停减<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>盐司</span>所由粮课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370568_comment'></div>年可收钱十万贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370568_comment'></div>臣以为变法之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370568_comment'></div>弊随事生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370568_comment'></div>尚恐不登常数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370568_comment'></div>安得更望赢利。<div
