class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1370568_comment'></div>平叔云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1370568_comment'></div>初定两税时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1370568_comment'></div>绢一匹直钱三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1370568_comment'></div>今绢一匹直钱八百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1370568_comment'></div>百姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_260_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/260/Comments/0")'>贫虚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1370568_comment'></div>或先取粟麦价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1370568_comment'></div>及至收穫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1370568_comment'></div>悉以还债。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1370568_comment'></div>又充<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_264_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/264/Comments/0")'>官税</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_265_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/265/Comments/0")'>颗粒</span>不残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1370568_comment'></div>若官中粜盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1370568_comment'></div>一家五口所食盐价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1370568_comment'></div>不过十钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1370568_comment'></div>随日而输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1370568_comment'></div>不劳驱遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1370568_comment'></div>则必无举债逃亡之患者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1370568_comment'></div>臣以为百姓困弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1370568_comment'></div>不皆为盐价贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1370568_comment'></div>今官自粜盐与依旧令商人粜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1370568_comment'></div>其价贵贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1370568_comment'></div>所校无多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1370568_comment'></div>通计一家五口所食之盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1370568_comment'></div>平叔所计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1370568_comment'></div>一日以十钱为率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1370568_comment'></div>一月当用钱三百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1370568_comment'></div>是则三日食盐一斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1370568_comment'></div>一月率当十斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_283_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/283/Comments/0")'>新法</span>实价与旧每斤不校三四钱以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1370568_comment'></div>通计五口之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1370568_comment'></div>以平叔所约之法计之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1370568_comment'></div>贱于旧价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1370568_comment'></div>日校一钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1370568_comment'></div>月校三十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1370568_comment'></div>不满五口之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1370568_comment'></div>所校更少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1370568_comment'></div>然则改用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_291_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/291/Comments/0")'>新法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1370568_comment'></div>百姓亦未免穷困流散也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1370568_comment'></div>初定税时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1370568_comment'></div>一匹绢三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1370568_comment'></div>今只八百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1370568_comment'></div>假如特变<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_296_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/296/Comments/0")'>盐法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1370568_comment'></div>绢价亦未肯贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1370568_comment'></div>五口之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1370568_comment'></div>因变<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_299_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/299/Comments/0")'>盐法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1370568_comment'></div>日得一钱之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1370568_comment'></div>岂能便免作债。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1370568_comment'></div>收穫之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1370568_comment'></div>不被徵索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1370568_comment'></div>输<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_304_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/304/Comments/0")'>官税</span>后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1370568_comment'></div>有赢馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1370568_comment'></div>以臣所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1370568_comment'></div>百姓困弊日久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1370568_comment'></div>不以事扰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1370568_comment'></div>自然渐校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1370568_comment'></div>不在变<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_310_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/310/Comments/0")'>盐法</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1370568_comment'></div>今绢一匹八百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1370568_comment'></div>百姓尚多寒无衣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1370568_comment'></div>若使匹直三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1370568_comment'></div>则无衣者必更众多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1370568_comment'></div>况绢之贵贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1370568_comment'></div>皆不缘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_316_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/316/Comments/0")'>盐法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1370568_comment'></div>以此言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_318_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/318/Comments/0")'>盐法</span>未要变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_319_1370568'>一件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1370568_comment'></div>平叔云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1370568_comment'></div>每州粜盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1370568_comment'></div>不少长吏或有不亲公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1370568_comment'></div>所由浮词云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1370568_comment'></div>当界无人籴盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1370568_comment'></div>臣即请差清强<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_325_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/325/Comments/0")'>巡官</span>检责所在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_325_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/325/Comments/1")'>实户</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1370568_comment'></div>据口团保给一年盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1370568_comment'></div>使其四季输纳盐价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1370568_comment'></div>口多粜少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_328_1370568_comment'></div>及盐价<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_329_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/329/Comments/0")'>迟违</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_329_1370568_comment'></div>请停观察使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_330_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/330/Comments/0")'>见任</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_330_1370568_comment'></div>改散慢官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_331_1370568_comment'></div>其刺史已下贬与上佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_332_1370568_comment'></div>其馀官贬远处者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_333_1370568_comment'></div>平叔本请官自粜盐以宽百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_334_1370568_comment'></div>令其苏息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_335_1370568_comment'></div>免更流亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_336_1370568_comment'></div>今令责<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_337_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/337/Comments/0")'>实户</span>口团保给盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_337_1370568_comment'></div>令其随季输纳盐价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_338_1370568_comment'></div>所谓扰而困之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_339_1370568_comment'></div>非前意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_340_1370568_comment'></div>百姓贫家食盐至少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_341_1370568_comment'></div>或有淡食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_342_1370568_comment'></div>动经旬月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_343_1370568_comment'></div>若据口给盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_344_1370568_comment'></div>依时徵价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_345_1370568_comment'></div>办与不办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_346_1370568_comment'></div>并须纳钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_347_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_348_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/348/Comments/0")'>迟违</span>及违条件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_348_1370568_comment'></div>观察使已下各加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_349_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/349/Comments/0")'>罪谴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_349_1370568_comment'></div>苟官吏畏罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_350_1370568_comment'></div>必用威刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_351_1370568_comment'></div>臣恐因此所在不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_352_1370568_comment'></div>百姓转致流散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_353_1370568_comment'></div>此又不可之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_354_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_355_1370568'>一件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_355_1370568_comment'></div>平叔请限商人盐纳官后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_356_1370568_comment'></div>不得辄于诸军诸使觅职掌把钱捉店看守庄硙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_357_1370568_comment'></div>以求影庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_358_1370568_comment'></div>请令所在官吏严加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_359_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/359/Comments/0")'>防察</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_359_1370568_comment'></div>如有违犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_360_1370568_comment'></div>应有资财并令纳官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_361_1370568_comment'></div>仍牒送府县充所由者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_362_1370568_comment'></div>臣以为盐商纳榷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_363_1370568_comment'></div>为官粜盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_364_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_365_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/365/Comments/0")'>子父</span>相承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_365_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_366_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/366/Comments/0")'>坐受</span>厚利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_366_1370568_comment'></div>比之百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_367_1370568_comment'></div>实则校优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_368_1370568_comment'></div>今既夺其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_369_1370568_comment'></div>又禁不得求觅职事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_370_1370568_comment'></div>及为人把钱捉店看守庄硙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1370568_comment'></div>不知何罪一朝穷蹙之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1370568_comment'></div>若必行此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1370568_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_374_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/374/Comments/0")'>富商大贾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1370568_comment'></div>必生怨恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1370568_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_376_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/376/Comments/0")'>收市</span>重宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1370568_comment'></div>逃入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_377_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/377/Comments/0")'>反侧</span>之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1370568_comment'></div>以资寇盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1370568_comment'></div>此又不可不虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_380_1370568'>一件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1370568_comment'></div>平叔云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1370568_comment'></div>行此策后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1370568_comment'></div>两韨军人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_383_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/383/Comments/0")'>富商大贾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1370568_comment'></div>或行财贿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1370568_comment'></div>邀截<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_385_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/385/Comments/0")'>喧诉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1370568_comment'></div>请令所由切加收捉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_386_1370568_comment'></div>如获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_387_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/387/Comments/0")'>头首</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_387_1370568_comment'></div>所在决斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_388_1370568_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_389_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/389/Comments/0")'>连状</span>聚众人等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_389_1370568_comment'></div>各决<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_390_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/390/Comments/0")'>脊杖</span>二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_390_1370568_comment'></div>检责<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_391_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/391/Comments/0")'>军司</span>军户盐如有隐漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_391_1370568_comment'></div>并准府县例<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_392_1370568", 1370568, "Clauses/392/Comments/0")'>科决</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_392_1370568_comment'></div>并赏所由告人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_393_1370568_comment'></div>此一件若果行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_394_1370568_comment'></div>不惟大失人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_395_1370568_comment'></div>兼亦惊动远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_396_1370568_comment'></div>不知粜盐所获几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_397_1370568_comment'></div>而害人蠹政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_398_1370568_comment'></div>其弊实甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_399_1370568_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_400_1370568'>以前件状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_400_1370568_comment'></div>奉九月九日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_401_1370568_comment'></div>令臣等各陈利害者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_402_1370568_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_403_1370568_comment'></div>伏听敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_404_1370568_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在长安任兵部侍郎。八月前，为窦牟撰写墓志铭。窦二月卒，八月葬。作品：祭窦司业文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370827' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370827' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370827?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭窦司业文</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370827")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370827_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370827'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370827'>维年月日。兵部侍郎韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370827_comment'></div>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。祭于故国子司业窦君二兄之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370827_comment'></div>惟君文行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>夙成</span>。有声江东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370827_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>魁然</span>厚重。长者之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370827_comment'></div>一举于乡。遂收厥功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370827_comment'></div>屡佐大侯。以调<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>兵戎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370827_comment'></div>诏曰予虞。汝为郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370827_comment'></div>乃令洛阳。岁且四终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370827_comment'></div>惟刑之慎。掌正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>隶僮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370827_comment'></div>命守高平。命副<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>儒宫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370827_comment'></div>朱衣银鱼。象服以崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370827_comment'></div>锡荣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>考妣</span>。孝道上穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370827_comment'></div>官不满能。亦云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>达通</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370827_comment'></div>逾七望八。年孰非翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370827_comment'></div>在君无憾。我意不充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370827_comment'></div>君之昆弟。三以辞雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370827_comment'></div>刺史郎中。四继三同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370827_comment'></div>于士大夫。可谓显荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370827_comment'></div>我之获见。实自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>童蒙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370827_comment'></div>既爱既劝。在麻之蓬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370827_comment'></div>自视雏鷇。望君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370827", 1370827, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>飞鸿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370827_comment'></div>四十年馀。事如梦中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370827_comment'></div>分宰河洛。愧立并躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370827_comment'></div>俱官于学。以纤临洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370827_comment'></div>惠许不酬。报德以空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370827_comment'></div>死生莫接。孰明我衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370827_comment'></div>于祭告情。文以自攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370827_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370827_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1370827_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在长安任兵部侍郎。八月前，为窦牟撰写祭文。作品：唐故国子司业窦公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷23。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年5月</a>　五六月间，在长安任兵部侍郎。韦处厚在开州作有《盛山》诗十二篇，京师众文人和之，韩愈为此作序。作品：韦侍讲盛山十二诗序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370674' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370674' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370674?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韦侍讲盛山十二诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370674")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370674_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370674'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370674'>韦侯昔以考功副郎守盛山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370674_comment'></div>人谓韦侯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370674", 1370674, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>美士</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370674_comment'></div>考功显曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370674_comment'></div>盛山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370674", 1370674, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>僻郡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370674_comment'></div>夺所宜处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370674_comment'></div>纳之恶地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370674_comment'></div>以枉其材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370674_comment'></div>韦侯将怨且不释矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370674_comment'></div>或曰不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370674_comment'></div>夫得利则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370674", 1370674, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>跃跃</span>以喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370674_comment'></div>不利则戚戚以泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370674_comment'></div>若不可生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370674_comment'></div>岂韦侯谓哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370674_comment'></div>韦侯读六艺之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370674_comment'></div>以探周公孔子之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370674_comment'></div>又妙能为辞章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370674_comment'></div>可谓儒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370674_comment'></div>夫儒者之于患难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370674_comment'></div>苟非其自取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370674_comment'></div>其拒而不受于怀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370674_comment'></div>若筑河堤以障屋霤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370674_comment'></div>其容而消之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370674_comment'></div>若水之于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370674_comment'></div>冰之于夏日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370674_comment'></div>其玩而忘之以文辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370674_comment'></div>若奏金石以破蟋蟀之鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370674_comment'></div>虫飞之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370674_comment'></div>况一不快于考功盛山一出入息之閒哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370674_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370674_comment'></div>果有以韦侯所为十二诗遗余者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370674_comment'></div>其意方且以入溪谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370674_comment'></div>上岩石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370674_comment'></div>追逐云月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370674_comment'></div>不足日为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370674_comment'></div>读而歌咏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370674_comment'></div>令人欲弃百事往而与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370674_comment'></div>不知其出于巴东以属朐䏰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370674_comment'></div>于时应而和者凡十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370674_comment'></div>及此年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370674_comment'></div>韦侯为中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370674_comment'></div><span id='poem_sentence_40_1370674_comment'></div>和者通州元司马<span class='inlineComment2'>（稹）</span>为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370674_comment'></div>洋州许使君<span id='poem_sentence_45_1370674_comment'></div>温司马<span class='inlineComment2'>（造）</span>为起居舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370674_comment'></div>皆集阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370674_comment'></div>于是盛山十二诗与其和者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370674_comment'></div>大行于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370674_comment'></div>联为大卷。<div id='poem_sentence_52_1370674_comment'></div>则分为别卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370674_comment'></div>韦侯俾余题其首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1370674_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_49787_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49787_0'>① 马总为郓曹濮节度观察等使，为堂于居之西北隅，号曰溪堂。以下四首，从文集录入。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49787'>宪宗之十四年。始定东平。三分其地。以华州刺史礼部尚书兼御史大夫扶风马公为郓曹濮节度观察等使。镇其地。既一年。褒其军号曰天平军。上即位之二年。召公入。且将用之。以其人之安公也。复归之镇。上之三年。公为政于郓曹濮也。适四年矣。治成制定。众志大固。恶绝于心。仁形于色。竱心一力。以供国家之职。于时沂密始分而残其帅。其后幽镇魏不悦于政。相扇继变。复归于旧。徐亦乘势逐帅自置。同于三方。惟郓也截然中居。四邻望之。若防之制水。恃以无恐。然而皆曰。郓为虏巢且六十年。将彊卒武。曹濮于郓。州大而近。军所根柢。皆骄以易怨。而公承死亡之后。掇拾之馀。剥肤椎髓。公私埽地赤立。新旧不相保持。万目睽睽。公于此时能安以治之。其功为大。若幽镇魏徐之乱。不扇而变。此功反小。何也。公之始至。众未孰化。以武则忿以憾。以恩则横而肆。一以为赤子。一以为龙蛇。惫心罢精。磨以岁月。然后致之。难也。及教之行。众皆戴公为亲父母。夫叛父母。从仇雠。非人之情。故曰易。于是天子以公为尚书右仆射。封扶风县开国伯。以褒嘉之。公亦乐众之和。知人之悦。而侈上之赐也。于是为堂于其居之西北隅。号曰溪堂。以飨士大夫。通上下之志。既飨。其从事陈曾谓其众。言公之畜此邦。其勤不亦至乎。此邦之人。累公之化。惟所令之。不亦顺乎。上勤下顺。遂济登兹。不亦休乎。昔者人谓斯何。今者人谓斯何。虽然。斯堂之作。意其有谓。而喑无诗歌。是不考引公德而接邦人于道也。乃使来请。其诗曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_49787_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49787'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9655, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49787", 49787, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>宪考</span>，一收<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作牧）</span>正之。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49787_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49787'>视邦选侯，以公来尸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49787_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49787'>公来尸之，人始未信。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　冬，在长安任吏部侍郎。为友人侯喜撰祭文，遣人致祭。作品：祭侯主簿文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370828' class='_poem'><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49376'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49376'>莫道官忙身老大，即无年少逐春心。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49376'>凭君先到江头看，柳色如今深未深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49376'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年1月</a>　正月，在长安任吏部侍郎。为太学博士李于撰墓志铭，批判服食丹药之习。作品：故太学博士李君墓志铭。<span target='_blank'>太学博士李君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370779")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370779_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370779'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370779'>太学博士顿邱李于。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370779_comment'></div>余兄孙女婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370779_comment'></div>年四十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370779_comment'></div>长庆三年正月五日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370779_comment'></div>其月二十六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370779_comment'></div>穿其妻墓而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370779", 1370779, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>合葬</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370779_comment'></div>在某县某地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370779_comment'></div>子三人皆幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370779_comment'></div>初于以进士为鄂岳从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370779_comment'></div>遇方士柳泌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370779_comment'></div>从授药法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370779_comment'></div>服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370779_comment'></div>往往下血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370779_comment'></div>比四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370779_comment'></div>病益急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370779_comment'></div>乃死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370779_comment'></div>其法以铅满一鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370779_comment'></div>桉中为孔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370779_comment'></div>实以水银。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370779_comment'></div>盖封四际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370779_comment'></div>烧为丹砂云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370779_comment'></div>余不知服食说自何世起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370779_comment'></div>杀人不可计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370779_comment'></div>而世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370779", 1370779, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>慕尚</span>之益至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370779_comment'></div>此其惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370779_comment'></div>在文书所记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370779_comment'></div>及耳闻相传者不说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370779_comment'></div>今直取目见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370779_comment'></div>亲与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370779_comment'></div>而以药败者六七公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370779_comment'></div>以为世诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370779_comment'></div>工部尚书归登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370779_comment'></div>殿中御史李虚中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370779_comment'></div>刑部尚书李逊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370779_comment'></div>逊弟刑部侍郎建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370779_comment'></div>襄阳节度使工部尚书孟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370779_comment'></div>东川节度御史大夫卢坦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370779_comment'></div>金吾将军李道古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370779_comment'></div>此其人皆有名位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370779_comment'></div>世所共识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370779_comment'></div>工部既食水银得病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370779_comment'></div>自说若有烧铁杖自颠贯其下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370779_comment'></div>摧而为火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370779_comment'></div>射窍节以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370779_comment'></div>狂痛呼号乞绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370779_comment'></div>其茵席常得水银。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370779_comment'></div>发且止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370779_comment'></div>唾血数十升以毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370779_comment'></div>殿中疽发其背死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370779_comment'></div>刑部且死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370779_comment'></div>谓余曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370779_comment'></div>我为药误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370779_comment'></div>其季建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370779_comment'></div>一旦无病死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370779_comment'></div>襄阳黜为吉州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370779_comment'></div>余自袁州还京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370779_comment'></div>襄阳乘舸邀我于萧洲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370779_comment'></div>屏人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370779_comment'></div>我得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370779", 1370779, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>秘药</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370779_comment'></div>不可独不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370779_comment'></div>今遗子一器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370779_comment'></div>可用枣肉为丸服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370779_comment'></div>别一年而病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370779_comment'></div>其家人至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370779_comment'></div>讯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370779_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370779_comment'></div>前所服药误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370779_comment'></div>方且下之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370779_comment'></div>下则平矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370779_comment'></div>病二岁竟卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370779_comment'></div>卢大夫死时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370779_comment'></div>溺出血肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370779_comment'></div>痛不可忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370779_comment'></div>乞死乃死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370779_comment'></div>金吾以柳泌得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370779_comment'></div>食泌药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370779_comment'></div>五十死海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370779_comment'></div>此可以为诫者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370779_comment'></div>蕲不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370779_comment'></div>乃速得死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370779_comment'></div>谓之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370779_comment'></div>可不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370779_comment'></div>五谷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1370779", 1370779, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>三牲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370779_comment'></div>盐醯果蔬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370779_comment'></div>人所常御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370779_comment'></div>人相厚勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370779_comment'></div>必曰强食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370779_comment'></div>今惑者皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370779_comment'></div>五谷令人夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370779_comment'></div>不能无食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370779_comment'></div>当务减节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370779_comment'></div>盐醯以济百味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370779_comment'></div>豚鱼鸡三者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370779_comment'></div>古以养老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370779_comment'></div>反曰是皆杀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370779_comment'></div>不可食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370779_comment'></div>一筵之馔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370779_comment'></div>禁忌。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1370779", 1370779, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>鬼怪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370779_comment'></div>临死乃悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370779_comment'></div>后之好者又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370779_comment'></div>彼死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370779_comment'></div>皆不得其道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370779_comment'></div>及且死又悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370779_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370779_comment'></div>可哀也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370779_comment'></div>可哀也已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_112_1370779_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　春，在长安任吏部侍郎。为柳州罗池庙撰写碑文，颂扬柳宗元政绩。作品：柳州罗池庙碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷21。）</span><div id='poem_1370746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370746?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳州罗池庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370746")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370746_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370746'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370746'>罗池庙者。故刺史柳侯庙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370746_comment'></div>柳侯为州。不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>鄙夷</span>其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370746_comment'></div>动以礼法。三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370746_comment'></div>民各自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>矜奋</span>。曰兹土虽远京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370746_comment'></div>吾等亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>天氓</span>。今天幸惠仁侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370746_comment'></div>若不化服。我则非人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370746_comment'></div>于是老幼相教语。莫违侯令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370746_comment'></div>凡有所为于其乡闾。及于其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370746_comment'></div>皆曰吾侯闻之。得无不可于意否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370746_comment'></div>莫不忖度而后从事。凡令之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370746_comment'></div>民劝趋之。无有后先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370746_comment'></div>必以其时。于是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>民业</span>有经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370746_comment'></div>公无负租。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>流逋</span>四归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370746_comment'></div>乐生兴事。宅有新屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370746_comment'></div>步有新船。池园洁修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370746_comment'></div>猪牛鸭鸡。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>肥大</span>蕃息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370746_comment'></div>子严父诏。妇顺夫指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370746_comment'></div>嫁娶葬送。各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>条法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370746_comment'></div>出相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>弟长</span>。入相慈孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370746_comment'></div>先时民贫。以男女相质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370746_comment'></div>久不得赎。尽没为隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370746_comment'></div>我侯之至。桉国之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370746_comment'></div>以佣除本。悉夺归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370746_comment'></div>大修孔子庙。城郭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>巷道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370746_comment'></div>皆治使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>端正</span>。树以名木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370746_comment'></div>柳民既皆悦喜。常于其部将魏忠谢宁欧阳翼饮酒驿亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370746_comment'></div>谓曰。吾弃于时而寄于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370746_comment'></div>与若等好也。明年吾将死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370746_comment'></div>死而为神。后三年为庙祀我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370746_comment'></div>及期而死。三年孟秋辛卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370746_comment'></div>侯降于州之后堂。欧阳翼等见而拜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370746_comment'></div>其夕。梦翼而告之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370746_comment'></div>馆我于罗池。其月景辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370746_comment'></div>庙成大祭。过客李仪醉酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370746_comment'></div>慢侮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>堂上</span>。得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370746_comment'></div>扶出庙门即死。明年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370746_comment'></div>魏忠欧阳翼使谢宁来京师。请书其事于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370746_comment'></div>余谓柳侯生能泽其民。死能惊动祸福之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370746_comment'></div>以食其土。可谓灵也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370746_comment'></div>作迎享送神诗遗柳民。俾歌以祀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370746_comment'></div>而并刻之。柳侯河东人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370746_comment'></div>讳宗元。字子厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370746_comment'></div>贤而有文章。尝位于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370746_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370746", 1370746, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>光显</span>矣。已而摈不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370746_comment'></div>其辞曰。荔子丹兮蕉黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370746_comment'></div>杂肴蔬兮进侯堂。侯之船兮两旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370746_comment'></div>度中流兮风泊之。待侯不来兮不知我悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370746_comment'></div>侯乘驹兮入庙。慰我民兮不嚬以笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370746_comment'></div>鹅之山兮柳之水。桂树团团兮白石齿齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370746_comment'></div>侯朝出游兮暮来归。春与猿吟兮秋鹤与飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370746_comment'></div>北方之人兮为侯是非。千秋万岁兮侯无我违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370746_comment'></div>福我兮寿我。驱厉鬼兮山之左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370746_comment'></div>下无苦湿兮高无乾。粳稌充羡兮蛇蛟结蟠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370746_comment'></div>我民报事兮无怠。其始自今兮钦于世世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370746_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1370746_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年4月</a>　四月，在长安任吏部侍郎。郑权赴广州就任岭南节度使，韩愈有诗送之。作品：送郑尚书赴南海。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年4月</a>　四月，在长安任吏部侍郎。郑权赴广州就任岭南节度使，韩愈有诗送之，并作序。作品：送郑尚书序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370667' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370667' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370667?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送郑尚书序</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370667")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370667_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370667'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370667'>岭之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370667_comment'></div>其州七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370667_comment'></div>其二十二隶岭南节度府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370667_comment'></div>其四十馀分四府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370667_comment'></div>府各置帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370667_comment'></div>然独岭南节度为大府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370667_comment'></div>大府始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370667_comment'></div>四府必使其佐启问起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370667_comment'></div>谢守地不得即贺以为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370667_comment'></div>岁时必遣贺问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370667_comment'></div>致水土物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370667_comment'></div>大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>府帅</span>或道过其府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>府帅</span>必戎服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370667_comment'></div>左握刀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370667_comment'></div>右属弓矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>帕首</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>裤靴</span>迎郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370667_comment'></div>及既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370667_comment'></div>大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>府帅</span>先入据馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370667_comment'></div>帅守屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370667_comment'></div>若将趋入拜庭之为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370667_comment'></div>大府与之为让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370667_comment'></div>至一再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370667_comment'></div>乃敢改服以宾主见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370667_comment'></div>适位执爵皆兴拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370667_comment'></div>不许乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370667_comment'></div>虔若小侯之事大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370667_comment'></div>有大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370667_comment'></div>咨而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370667_comment'></div>隶府之州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370667_comment'></div>离府远者至三千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370667_comment'></div>悬隔山海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370667_comment'></div>使必数月而后能至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370667_comment'></div>蛮夷悍轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370667_comment'></div>易怨以变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370667_comment'></div>其南州皆岸大海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370667_comment'></div>多洲岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>帆风</span>一日踔数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>漫澜</span>不见踪迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370667_comment'></div>控御失所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370667_comment'></div>依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>险阻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370667_comment'></div>结<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>党仇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370667_comment'></div>机毒矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370667_comment'></div>以待将吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>撞搪</span>呼号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370667_comment'></div>以相和应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>蜂屯蚁杂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370667_comment'></div>不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>爬梳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370667_comment'></div>好则人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370667_comment'></div>怒则兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370667_comment'></div>故常薄其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>征入</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370667_comment'></div>节而疏目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370667_comment'></div>时有所遗漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370667_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>究切</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370667_comment'></div>长养以儿子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370667_comment'></div>至纷不可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370667_comment'></div>乃草薙而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>禽狝</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370667_comment'></div>尽根株痛断乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370667_comment'></div>其海外杂国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370667_comment'></div>若耽浮罗流求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>毛人</span>夷亶之州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>林邑</span>扶南真腊于陀利之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370667_comment'></div>东南际天地以万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370667_comment'></div>或时候风潮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370667_comment'></div>朝贡蛮胡贾人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370667_comment'></div>舶交海中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370667_comment'></div>若岭南帅得其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370667_comment'></div>则一边尽治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370667_comment'></div>不相寇盗贼杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370667_comment'></div>无风鱼之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370667_comment'></div>水旱疠毒之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370667_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370667", 1370667, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>外国</span>之货日至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370667_comment'></div>珠香象犀玳瑁奇物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370667_comment'></div>溢于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370667_comment'></div>不可胜用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370667_comment'></div>故选帅常重于他镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370667_comment'></div>非有文武威风知大体可畏信者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370667_comment'></div>则不幸往往有事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370667_comment'></div>长庆三年四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370667_comment'></div>以工部尚书郑公为刑部尚书兼御史大夫往践其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370667_comment'></div>郑公尝以节镇襄阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370667_comment'></div>又帅沧景德棣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370667_comment'></div>历河南尹华州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370667_comment'></div>皆有功德可称道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370667_comment'></div>入朝为金吾将军散骑常侍工部侍郎尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370667_comment'></div>家属百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370667_comment'></div>无数亩之宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370667_comment'></div>僦屋以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370667_comment'></div>可谓贵而能贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370667_comment'></div>为仁者不富之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370667_comment'></div>及是命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370667_comment'></div>朝廷莫不悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370667_comment'></div>将行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370667_comment'></div>公卿大夫士苟能诗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370667_comment'></div>咸相率为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370667_comment'></div>以美朝政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370667_comment'></div>以慰公南行之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370667_comment'></div>韵必以来字者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370667_comment'></div>所以祝公成政而来归疾也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1370667_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　在长安，任吏部侍郎。晚年有感而作《枯树》诗。作品：枯树。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49508' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49508' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49508?labeling=true' target='_blank'>枯树</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49508")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_49508_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49508'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49508'>老树无枝叶，风霜不复侵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49508'>腹穿人可过，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49508", 49508, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>皮剥</span>蚁还寻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49508'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49508", 49508, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>寄托</span>惟朝菌，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49508", 49508, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>依投</span>绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49508", 49508, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>暮禽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49508'>犹堪持改火，未肯但空心。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49508'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49508_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　夏，在长安任吏部侍郎。孔戣求致仕，韩愈乃向皇帝上状文，有挽留之意，未被纳。作品：论孔戣致仕状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370559' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370559' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370559?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论孔戣致仕状<span class='inlineComment2'>（某官某）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370559")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370559_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370559'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370559'>右。臣与孔戣同在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>南省</span>为官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370559_comment'></div>数得相见。戣为人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>守节</span>清苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370559_comment'></div>议论平正。今年才七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370559_comment'></div>筋力耳目。未觉衰老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370559_comment'></div>忧国忘家。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>用意</span>深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370559_comment'></div>所谓朝之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>耆德</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>老成人</span>者。臣知戣上疏求致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370559_comment'></div>故往看戣。戣为臣言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370559_comment'></div>已蒙圣主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>允许</span>。伏以陛下优贤尚齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370559_comment'></div>见戣频上三疏。言词恳到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370559_comment'></div>重违其意。遂即许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370559_comment'></div>此诚陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>仁德</span>之至。然如戣辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370559_comment'></div>在朝不过三数人。实可为国爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370559_comment'></div>自古以来。及圣朝故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370559_comment'></div>年虽八九十。但视听心虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370559_comment'></div>苟未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>昏错</span>。尚可顾问委以事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370559_comment'></div>虽求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>退罢</span>。无不殷勤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>留止</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370559_comment'></div>优以禄秩。不听其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370559_comment'></div>以明人君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>贪贤</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/34/Comments/1")'>敬老</span>之道也。礼大夫七十而致事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370559_comment'></div>若不得谢。则必赐之几杖安车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370559_comment'></div>七十求退。人臣之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>常礼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370559_comment'></div>若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>有德</span>及气力尚壮。则君优而留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370559_comment'></div>不必年过七十。尽许致事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370559_comment'></div>诗曰。虽无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>老成人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370559_comment'></div>尚有典刑。此言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>老成人</span>重于典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370559_comment'></div>不可不惜而留也。今戣幸无疾疹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370559_comment'></div>但以年当致事。据礼求退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370559_comment'></div>陛下若不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>听许</span>。亦无伤于义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370559_comment'></div>而有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>贪贤</span>之美。况左丞职事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370559_comment'></div>亦极清。若戣尚以繁要为词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370559_comment'></div>自可别授秩崇而务少者。今中外之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370559_comment'></div>有年过于戣。尚未得退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370559_comment'></div>戣独何人。得遂其愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370559_comment'></div>然人皆求进。戣独求退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370559_comment'></div>尤可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>贤重</span>。臣所领官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370559_comment'></div>无事不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>请对</span>。蒙陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>厚恩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370559_comment'></div>苟有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>所见</span>。不敢不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370559_comment'></div>伏望圣恩。特垂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370559", 1370559, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>察纳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370559_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1370559_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　七月前，在长安任吏部侍郎。受请为韩弘撰神道碑铭。作品：司徒兼侍中中书令赠太尉许国公神道碑铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷22。）</span><div id='poem_1370761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司徒兼侍中中书令许国公赠太尉韩公神道碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370761")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370761'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370761'>韩姬姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370761_comment'></div>以国氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370761_comment'></div>其先有自颍川徙阳夏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370761_comment'></div>其地于今为陈之太康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370761_comment'></div>太康之韩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370761_comment'></div>其称盖久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370761_comment'></div>然自公始大著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370761_comment'></div>公讳宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370761_comment'></div>公之父曰海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370761_comment'></div>为人魁伟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>沈塞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370761_comment'></div>以武勇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>游仕</span>许汴之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370761_comment'></div>寡言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>自可</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370761_comment'></div>不与人交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370761_comment'></div>众推以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>钜人</span>长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370761_comment'></div>官至游击将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370761_comment'></div>赠太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370761_comment'></div>娶乡邑刘氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370761_comment'></div>生公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370761_comment'></div>是为齐国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370761_comment'></div>夫人之兄曰司徒元佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370761_comment'></div>有功建中贞元之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370761_comment'></div>为宣武军帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370761_comment'></div>有汴宋亳颍四州之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370761_comment'></div>兵士十万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370761_comment'></div>公少依舅氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370761_comment'></div>读书习骑射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370761_comment'></div>事亲孝谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370761_comment'></div>侃侃自将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370761_comment'></div>不纵为子弟华靡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>遨放</span>事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370761_comment'></div>出入敬恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370761_comment'></div>军中皆目之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370761_comment'></div>尝一抵京师就明经试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370761_comment'></div>退曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370761_comment'></div>此不足发名成业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370761_comment'></div>复去从舅氏学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370761_comment'></div>将兵数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370761_comment'></div>悉识其材鄙怯智勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370761_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>指付</span>必堪其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370761_comment'></div>司徒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>叹奇</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370761_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>士卒</span>属心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370761_comment'></div>诸老将皆自以为不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370761_comment'></div>司徒卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370761_comment'></div>去为宋南城将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370761_comment'></div>比六七岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370761_comment'></div>汴军连乱不定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370761_comment'></div>贞元十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370761_comment'></div>刘逸淮死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370761_comment'></div>军中皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370761_comment'></div>此军司徒所树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370761_comment'></div>必择其骨肉为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>士卒</span>所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>慕赖</span>者付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370761_comment'></div>今见在人莫如韩甥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370761_comment'></div>且其功最大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370761_comment'></div>而材又俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370761_comment'></div>即<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>柄授</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370761_comment'></div>而请命于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370761_comment'></div>天子以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370761_comment'></div>遂自大理评事拜工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370761_comment'></div>代逸淮为宣武军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370761_comment'></div>悉有其舅司徒之兵与地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370761_comment'></div>当此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370761_comment'></div>陈许帅曲环死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370761_comment'></div>而吴少诚反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370761_comment'></div>自将围许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370761_comment'></div>求援于逸淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370761_comment'></div>啖之以陈归汴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370761_comment'></div>使数辈在馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370761_comment'></div>公悉驱出斩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370761_comment'></div>选卒三千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370761_comment'></div>会诸军击少诚许下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370761_comment'></div>少诚失势以走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370761_comment'></div>河南无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370761_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370761_comment'></div>自吾舅没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370761_comment'></div>五乱于汴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370761_comment'></div>吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>苗薅</span>而发栉之几尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370761_comment'></div>然不一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>揃刈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370761_comment'></div>不足令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>震駴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370761_comment'></div>命刘锷以其卒三百人待命于门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370761_comment'></div>数之以数与于乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370761_comment'></div>自以为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370761_comment'></div>并斩之以徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370761_comment'></div>血流波道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370761_comment'></div>自是讫公之朝京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370761_comment'></div>廿有一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370761_comment'></div>莫敢有欢呶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1370761", 1370761, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>叫号</span>于城郭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370761_comment'></div>李师古作言起事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370761_comment'></div>屯兵于曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370761_comment'></div>以吓滑帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370761_comment'></div>且告假道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370761_comment'></div>公使谓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370761_comment'></div>汝能越吾界而为盗耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370761_comment'></div>有以相待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370761_comment'></div>无为空言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370761_comment'></div>滑帅告急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370761_comment'></div>公使谓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370761_comment'></div>吾在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370761_comment'></div>公无恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370761_comment'></div>或告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370761_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1370761", 1370761, id='poem_sentence_307_1370761_comment'></div>万邦绝等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1370761_comment'></div>有弟有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1370761_comment'></div>提兵守藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1370761_comment'></div>一时三侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1370761_comment'></div>人莫敢扳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1370761_comment'></div>生莫与荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1370761_comment'></div>殁莫与令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1370761_comment'></div>刻文此碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1370761_comment'></div>以鸿厥庆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_316_1370761_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年6月8日</a>　在长安。由吏部侍郎调京兆尹兼御史大夫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年6月10日</a>　六月，在长安。被任为京兆尹，按制度须举人以自代，韩愈乃举马总。表不上报，韩愈乃接京兆尹。作品：举马总自代状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年6月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", id='poem_title_1370560_0'>① 银青光禄大夫检校尚书右仆射兼户部尚书马总</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370560'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370560'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370560_comment'></div>伏准建中元年正月五日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370560_comment'></div>常参官上后三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370560_comment'></div>举一人自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370560_comment'></div>伏以近者京尹用人稍轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370560_comment'></div>所以市井之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370560_comment'></div>盗贼未断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370560_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370560", 1370560, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>郊野</span>之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370560_comment'></div>疲瘵尚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370560_comment'></div>前件官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370560", 1370560, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>文武</span>兼资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370560_comment'></div>宽猛得所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370560_comment'></div>屡更方镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370560_comment'></div>皆有功能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370560_comment'></div>若以代臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370560_comment'></div>实为至当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370560_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370560_comment'></div>谨奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1370560_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年7月</a>　七月，任京兆尹。长安久旱不雨，禾苗枯槁，韩愈作文祭竹林神以求雨。作品：祭竹林神文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370829' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370829' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370829?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭竹林神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370829")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370829_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370829'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370829'>维年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370829_comment'></div>京兆尹兼御史大夫韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370829_comment'></div>谨以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370829", 1370829, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>酒脯</span>之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370829_comment'></div>再拜稽首告于竹林之神曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370829_comment'></div>天子不以愈为愚不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370829_comment'></div>使尹兹大众二十三县之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370829_comment'></div>今农既勤于稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370829_comment'></div>有苗盈野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370829_comment'></div>而天不雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370829_comment'></div>将尽槁以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370829_comment'></div>农将无所食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370829_comment'></div>鬼神将无以为飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370829_comment'></div>国家之礼天地百祀神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370829_comment'></div>不失其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370829_comment'></div>惠天之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370829_comment'></div>不失其和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370829_comment'></div>人又无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370829_comment'></div>何为造兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370829", 1370829, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>旱虐</span>以罚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370829_comment'></div>将俾尹者不仁不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370829_comment'></div>不能承帝之敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370829_comment'></div>以化正其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370829_comment'></div>闻无香惟腥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370829_comment'></div>神于惠罚无差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370829_comment'></div>施罪瘠于尹愈身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370829_comment'></div>是甘是宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370829_comment'></div>雨则时降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370829_comment'></div>神无爽其聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370829_comment'></div>永享于人无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370829_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1370829_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年7月</a>　七月，任京兆尹。长安久旱不雨，禾苗枯槁，韩愈作文祭竹林神后，又作文祭曲江龙以求雨。作品：祭曲江龙文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370830' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370830?labeling=true' target='_blank'>曲江祭龙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370830")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370830_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370830'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370830'>维年月日。京兆尹兼御史大夫韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370830_comment'></div>谨以香果之奠。敢昭告于东方青龙之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370830_comment'></div>天作旱灾。嘉谷将槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370830_comment'></div>乃于甲乙之日。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370830", 1370830, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>依准</span>古法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370830_comment'></div>作神之象。斋戒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370830", 1370830, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>祀祷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370830_comment'></div>神其享祐之。时降甘雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370830_comment'></div>以惠兹人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370830", 1370830, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>急急如律令</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370830_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1370830_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年7月</a>　七月，任京兆尹。上祭文后不久，得雨。韩愈向皇帝祝贺，作贺雨之表文。作品：贺雨文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年7月</a>　七八月间，在长安任京兆尹。卷入“台参”之争，作书给友人解释此事。作品：京尹不台参答友人书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370625?labeling=true' target='_blank'>京尹不台参答友人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370625")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370625_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370625'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370625'>所示情眷之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370625_comment'></div>不胜悚荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370625_comment'></div>台参实奏云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370625_comment'></div>容桂观察使带中丞尚不台参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370625_comment'></div>京尹郡国之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370625_comment'></div>所管神州赤县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370625_comment'></div>官带大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370625_comment'></div>岂得却不如事须台参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370625_comment'></div>圣恩以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370625_comment'></div>便令宣与李绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370625_comment'></div>不用台参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370625_comment'></div>亦是何典故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370625_comment'></div>赤令尚与中丞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370625", 1370625, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>分道</span>而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370625_comment'></div>何况京尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370625_comment'></div>人见近事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370625_comment'></div>习耳目所熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370625_comment'></div>稍殊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370625_comment'></div>即怪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370625_comment'></div>其于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370625", 1370625, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>道理</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370625_comment'></div>有何所伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370625_comment'></div>圣君使行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370625_comment'></div>即是故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370625_comment'></div>自古岂有定制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370625_comment'></div>停推巡缘府中褊迫是实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370625_comment'></div>若别差人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370625_comment'></div>即是妄说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370625_comment'></div>岂有此事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370625_comment'></div>小人言不可信类如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370625_comment'></div>亦在大贤斟酌而断之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370625_comment'></div>流言止于智者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370625_comment'></div>正谓此耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370625_comment'></div>客多自修报状不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370625_comment'></div>伏惟照察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1370625_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年9月</a>　九月，在长安任京兆尹。李逢吉摄祭南郊，有诗，韩愈和之。作品：和李相公摄事南郊览物兴怀呈一二知旧。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49613'
