捉一作握字，本《史记》。今人用吐握，本《韩诗外传》也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49613_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年10月1日</a>　十月，在长安任京兆尹。因当时认为九月朔日食，十月朔当亏；而其日太阳未亏，认为此乃皇帝克己修身所致，故上表状以贺。作品：贺太阳不亏状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370561' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370561' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370561?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺太阳不亏状<span class='inlineComment2'>（司天台奏今月一日太阳不亏）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年10月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370561")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370561_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370561'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370561'>右。司天台奏今日辰卯閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370561_comment'></div>太阳合亏。陛下敬畏天命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370561_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370561", 1370561, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>克己</span>修身。诚发于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370561_comment'></div>灾销于上。自卯及巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370561_comment'></div>当亏不亏。虽隔阴云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370561_comment'></div>转更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370561", 1370561, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>明朗</span>。比于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370561", 1370561, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>常日</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370561_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370561", 1370561, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>不觉</span>有殊。天且不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370561_comment'></div>庆孰为大。臣官忝京尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370561_comment'></div>亲睹殊祥。<span "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>尹寺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370831_comment'></div>适彼瓯闽。臲卼跋踬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370831_comment'></div>颠而不踒。乃得其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370831_comment'></div>于泉于虔。始执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370831", 1370831, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>郡符</span>。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370773'>樊绍述既卒且葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370773_comment'></div>愈将铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370773_comment'></div>从其家求书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370773_comment'></div>得书号魁纪公者三十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370773_comment'></div>曰樊子者又三十卷。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1370773_comment'></div>道路所遇及器物门里杂铭二百二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370773_comment'></div>赋十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370773_comment'></div>诗七百一十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370773_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370773_comment'></div>多矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370773_comment'></div>古未尝有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370773_comment'></div>然而必出于已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370773_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370773", 1370773, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>袭蹈</span>前人一言一句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370773_comment'></div>又何其难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370773_comment'></div>必出入仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370773_comment'></div>其富若生蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370773_comment'></div>万物毕具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370773_comment'></div>海含地负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370773_comment'></div>放恣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370773", 1370773, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>横从</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370773_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370773", 1370773, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>统纪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370773_comment'></div>然而不烦于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370773", 1370773, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>绳削</span>而自合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370773_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370773_comment'></div>绍述于斯术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370773_comment'></div>其可谓至于斯极者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370773_comment'></div>生而其家富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370773_comment'></div>长而不有其藏一钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370773_comment'></div>妻子告不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370773_comment'></div>顾且笑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370773_comment'></div>我道盖是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370773_comment'></div>皆应曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370773_comment'></div>无不意满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370773_comment'></div>尝以金部郎中告哀南方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370773_comment'></div>还言某师不治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370773_comment'></div>罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370773_comment'></div>以此出为绵州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370773_comment'></div>一年徵拜左司郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370773_comment'></div>又出刺绛州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370773_comment'></div>绵绛之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370773_comment'></div>至今皆曰于我有德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370773_comment'></div>以为谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370773_comment'></div>命且下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370773_comment'></div>遂病以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370773_comment'></div>年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370773_comment'></div>绍述讳宗师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370773_comment'></div>父讳泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370773_comment'></div>尝帅襄阳江陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370773_comment'></div>官至右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370773_comment'></div>赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370773_comment'></div>祖某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370773_comment'></div>讳泳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370773_comment'></div>自祖及绍述三世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370773_comment'></div>皆以军谋堪将帅策上第以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370773_comment'></div>绍述无所不学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370773_comment'></div>于辞于声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370773_comment'></div>天得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370773_comment'></div>在众若无能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370773_comment'></div>尝与观乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370773_comment'></div>问曰何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370773_comment'></div>曰后当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370773_comment'></div>已而果然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370773_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370773_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_1370773'>惟古于词必已出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370773_comment'></div>降而不能乃剽贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370773_comment'></div>后皆指前公相袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370773_comment'></div>从汉迄今用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370773", 1370773, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>一律</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370773_comment'></div>寥寥久哉莫觉属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370773_comment'></div>神徂圣伏道绝塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370773_comment'></div>既极乃通发绍述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370773_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370773", 1370773, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>文从字顺</span>各<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370773", 1370773, "Clauses/70/Comments/1")'>识职</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370773_comment'></div>有欲求之此其躅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1370773_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　本年，在长安。为张彻撰墓志铭。作品：故幽州节度判官赠给事中清河张君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷24。）</span><div id='poem_1370775' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370775' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370775?labeling=true' target='_blank'>幽州节度判官赠给事中清河张君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370775")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370775_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370775'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370775'>张君名彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370775_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370775_comment'></div>以进士累官至范阳府监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370775_comment'></div>长庆元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370775_comment'></div>今牛宰相为御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370775_comment'></div>奏君名迹中御史选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370775_comment'></div>诏即以为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370775_comment'></div>其府惜不敢留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370775_comment'></div>遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370775_comment'></div>而密奏幽州将父子继续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370775_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>廷选</span>且久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370775_comment'></div>今新收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370775_comment'></div>臣又始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370775_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>孤怯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370775_comment'></div>须强佐乃济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370775_comment'></div>发半道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370775_comment'></div>有诏以君还之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370775_comment'></div>仍迁殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370775_comment'></div>加赐朱衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370775_comment'></div>至数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370775_comment'></div>军乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370775_comment'></div>怨其府从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370775_comment'></div>尽杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370775_comment'></div>而囚其帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370775_comment'></div>且相约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370775_comment'></div>张御史长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370775_comment'></div>毋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>侮辱</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>轹蹙</span>我事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370775_comment'></div>毋庸杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370775_comment'></div>置之帅所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370775_comment'></div>居月馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370775_comment'></div>闻有中贵人自京师至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370775_comment'></div>君谓其帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370775_comment'></div>公无负此土人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370775_comment'></div>上使至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370775_comment'></div>可因请见自辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370775_comment'></div>幸得脱免归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370775_comment'></div>即推门求出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370775_comment'></div>守者以告其魁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370775_comment'></div>魁与其徒皆骇曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370775_comment'></div>必张御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370775_comment'></div>张御史忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370775_comment'></div>必为其帅告此馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370775_comment'></div>不如迁之别馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370775_comment'></div>即与众出君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370775_comment'></div>君出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370775_comment'></div>骂众曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370775_comment'></div>汝何敢反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370775_comment'></div>前日吴元济斩东市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370775_comment'></div>昨日李师道斩于军中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370775_comment'></div>同恶者父母妻子皆屠死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370775_comment'></div>肉喂狗鼠鸱鸦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370775_comment'></div>汝何敢反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370775_comment'></div>汝何敢反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370775_comment'></div>行且骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370775_comment'></div>众畏恶其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370775_comment'></div>不忍闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370775_comment'></div>且虞生变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370775_comment'></div>即击君以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370775_comment'></div>君抵死口不绝骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370775_comment'></div>众皆曰义士义士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370775_comment'></div>或收瘗之以俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370775_comment'></div>事闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370775_comment'></div>天子壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370775_comment'></div>赠给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370775_comment'></div>其友侯云长佐郓使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370775_comment'></div>请于其帅马仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370775_comment'></div>为之选于军中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370775_comment'></div>得故与君相知张恭李元实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370775_comment'></div>使以币请之范阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370775_comment'></div>范阳人义而归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370775_comment'></div>以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370775_comment'></div>诏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>所在</span>给船舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370775_comment'></div>传归其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370775_comment'></div>赐钱物以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370775_comment'></div>长庆四年四月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370775_comment'></div>其妻子以君之丧葬于某州某所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370775_comment'></div>君弟复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370775_comment'></div>亦进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370775_comment'></div>佐汴宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370775_comment'></div>得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370775_comment'></div>变易丧心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370775_comment'></div>惊惑不常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370775_comment'></div>君得閒即自视衣褥薄厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370775_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>节时</span>其饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370775_comment'></div>而匕箸进养之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370775_comment'></div>禁其家无敢高语出声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370775_comment'></div>医饵之药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370775_comment'></div>其物多空青雄黄诸奇怪物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370775_comment'></div>剂钱至数十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370775_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>营治</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/89/Comments/1")'>勤剧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370775_comment'></div>皆自君手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370775_comment'></div>不假之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370775_comment'></div>家贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370775_comment'></div>妻子常有饥色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370775_comment'></div>祖某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370775_comment'></div>某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370775_comment'></div>父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370775_comment'></div>某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370775_comment'></div>妻韩氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370775_comment'></div>礼部郎中某之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370775_comment'></div>汴州开封尉某之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370775_comment'></div>于余为叔父孙女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370775_comment'></div>君尝从余学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370775_comment'></div>选于诸生而嫁与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370775_comment'></div>孝顺祗修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370775_comment'></div>群女效其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370775_comment'></div>男若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370775_comment'></div>曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370775_comment'></div>女子曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370775_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370775_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_110_1370775'>呜呼彻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370775_comment'></div>世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>慕顾</span>以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370775_comment'></div>子揭揭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370775_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>噎喑</span>以为生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370775_comment'></div>子独割也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370775_comment'></div>为彼不清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370775_comment'></div>作玉雪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370775_comment'></div>仁义以为兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370775_comment'></div>用不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1370775", 1370775, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>缺折</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370775_comment'></div>知死不失名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370775_comment'></div>得猛烈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370775_comment'></div>自申于闇明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370775_comment'></div>莫之夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370775_comment'></div>我铭以贞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370775_comment'></div>不肖者之呾也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_124_1370775_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　本年，在长安。有诗咏鲁仲连，含讽喻之意。作品：嘲鲁连子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷9。张元和十一年，338。）</span><div id='poem_49757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>嘲鲁连子<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49757")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49757_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49757_0'>① 齐田巴辨于徂丘，议于稷下，一日而服千人。有徐劫弟子曰鲁连，年十二，谓劫曰：“臣愿当田子，使不得复说。”鲁连往见田巴，巴于是杜口易业，终身不谈。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49757'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49757'>鲁连细而<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作儿）</span>黠，有似黄鹞子。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49757'>田巴兀老苍，怜汝矜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49757", 49757, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>爪觜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49757'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49757", 49757, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>开端</span>要惊人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49757", 49757, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>雄跨</span>吾厌矣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49757'>高拱禅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49757", 49757, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>鸿声</span>，若辍<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作啜）</span>一杯水。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49757'>独称唐虞贤，顾未知之耳。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49757'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_49757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年1月</a>　年初，在长安。为王仲舒撰神道碑文。王二月葬。作品：故江南西道观察使赠左散骑常侍太原王公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷23。）</span><div id='poem_1370771' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370771' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江南西道观察使赠左散骑常侍太原王公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370771")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370771'>公讳仲舒。字宏中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370771_comment'></div>少孤。奉其母居江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370771_comment'></div>游学有名。贞元十年以贤良方正拜左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370771_comment'></div>改右补阙礼部考功吏部三员外郎。贬连州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370771_comment'></div>夔州司马。佐江陵使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370771_comment'></div>改祠部员外郎。复除吏部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370771_comment'></div>迁职方郎中知制诰。出为峡州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370771_comment'></div>迁庐州。未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370771_comment'></div>丁母忧。服阕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370771_comment'></div>改婺州苏州刺史。徵拜中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370771_comment'></div>既至。谓人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370771_comment'></div>吾老。不乐与少年治文书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370771_comment'></div>得一道。有地六七郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370771_comment'></div>为之三年。贫可富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370771_comment'></div>乱可治。身安功立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370771_comment'></div>无愧于国家可也。日日语人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370771_comment'></div>丞相闻问语验。即除江南西道观察使兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370771_comment'></div>至则奏罢榷酒钱九千万。以其利与民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370771_comment'></div>又罢军吏官债五千万。悉焚簿文书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370771_comment'></div>又出库钱二千万。以丐贫民遭旱不能供税者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370771_comment'></div>禁浮屠及老子为僧道士。不得于吾界内因山野立浮屠老子象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370771_comment'></div>以其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370771", 1370771, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>诳丐</span>渔利。夺编人之产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370771_comment'></div>在官四年。数其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370771", 1370771, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>蓄积</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370771_comment'></div>钱馀于库。米馀于廪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370771_comment'></div>朝廷选公卿于外。将徵以为左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370771_comment'></div>吏部已用薛尚书代之矣。长庆三年十一月十七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370771_comment'></div>未命而薨。年六十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370771_comment'></div>天子为之罢朝。赠左散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370771_comment'></div>远近相吊。以四年二月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370771_comment'></div>葬于河南某县先茔之侧。公之为拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370771_comment'></div>朝退。天子谓宰相曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370771_comment'></div>第几人非王某耶。是时公方与阳城更疏论裴延龄诈妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370771_comment'></div>士大夫重之。为考功吏部郎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370771_comment'></div>下莫敢有欺犯之者。非其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370771_comment'></div>虽与同列。未尝比数收拾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370771_comment'></div>故遭谗而贬。在制诰尽力直友人之屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370771_comment'></div>不以权臣为意。又被谗而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370771_comment'></div>元和初。婺州大旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370771_comment'></div>人饿死。户口亡十七八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370771_comment'></div>公居五年。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370771", 1370771, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>完富</span>如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370771_comment'></div>桉劾群吏。奏其赃罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370771_comment'></div>州部清整。加赐金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370771_comment'></div>其在苏州。治称第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370771_comment'></div>公所至辄先求人利害废置所宜。闭閤草奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370771_comment'></div>又具为科条。与人吏约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370771_comment'></div>事备。一旦张下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370771_comment'></div>民无不抃叫喜悦。或初若小烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370771_comment'></div>旬岁皆称其便。公所为文章无世俗气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370771_comment'></div>其所树立。殆不可学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370771_comment'></div>曾祖讳元暕。比部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370771_comment'></div>祖讳景肃。丹阳太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370771_comment'></div>考讳政。襄邓等州防御使鄂州采访使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370771_comment'></div>赠工部尚书。公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370771", 1370771, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>先妣</span>渤海李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370771_comment'></div>赠渤海郡太君。公娶其舅女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370771_comment'></div>有子男七人。初哲贞宏泰复洄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370771_comment'></div>初进士及第。哲文学俱善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370771_comment'></div>其馀幼也。长女婿刘仁师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370771_comment'></div>高陵令。次女婿李行修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370771_comment'></div>尚书刑部员外郎。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370771_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1370771'>气锐而坚。又刚以严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370771_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370771", 1370771, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>哲人</span>之常。爱人尽已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370771_comment'></div>不倦以止。乃吏之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370771_comment'></div>与其友处。顺若妇女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370771_comment'></div>何德之光。墓其有石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370771_comment'></div>我最其绩。万世之藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370771_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1370771_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年1月</a>　年初，在长安。为王仲舒撰墓志铭。王二月葬。作品：唐故江南西道观察使中大夫洪州刺史兼御史中丞上柱国赐紫金鱼袋赠左散骑常侍太原王公神道碑铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷21。）</span><div id='poem_1370760' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370760' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370760?labeling=true' id='poem_content_1370760'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370760'>王氏皆王者之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370760_comment'></div>在太原者为姬姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370760_comment'></div>春秋时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370760_comment'></div>王子成父败狄有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370760_comment'></div>因赐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370760_comment'></div>厥后世居太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370760_comment'></div>至东汉隐士烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370760_comment'></div>博士徵不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370760_comment'></div>居祁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370760_comment'></div>因号所居乡为君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370760_comment'></div>公其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>君子乡</span>人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370760_comment'></div>魏晋涉隋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370760_comment'></div>世有名人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370760_comment'></div>国朝大王父元暕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370760_comment'></div>历御史属<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>三院</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370760_comment'></div>止尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370760_comment'></div>生景肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370760_comment'></div>守三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370760_comment'></div>终傅凉王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370760_comment'></div>生政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370760_comment'></div>襄邓等州防御使鄂州采访使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370760_comment'></div>赠吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370760_comment'></div>公尚书之弟某子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370760_comment'></div>公讳仲舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370760_comment'></div>字宏中。<div 1370760, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>母夫人</span>家江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370760_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>读书</span>著文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370760_comment'></div>其誉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>蔼郁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370760_comment'></div>当时名公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370760_comment'></div>皆折官位<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>辈行</span>愿为交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370760_comment'></div>贞元初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370760_comment'></div>射策拜左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370760_comment'></div>与阳城合遏裴延龄不得为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370760_comment'></div>德宗初怏怏无奈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370760_comment'></div>久而嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370760_comment'></div>其后入阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370760_comment'></div>德宗顾列谓宰相曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370760_comment'></div>第几人必王某也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370760_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>果然</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370760_comment'></div>月馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370760_comment'></div>特改右补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370760_comment'></div>迁礼部考功吏部三员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370760_comment'></div>在礼部奏议详雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370760_comment'></div>省中伏其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370760_comment'></div>在考功吏部提约明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370760_comment'></div>故吏无以欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370760_comment'></div>同列有恃恩自得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370760_comment'></div>众皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>媚承</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370760_comment'></div>公疾其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370760_comment'></div>不直视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370760_comment'></div>由此贬连州司户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370760_comment'></div>移夔州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370760_comment'></div>又移荆南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370760_comment'></div>因佐其节度事为参谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370760_comment'></div>得五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370760_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>放迹</span>在外积四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370760_comment'></div>元和初。<div id='poem_sentence_59_1370760_comment'></div>未几为职方郎中知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370760_comment'></div>友人得罪斥逐后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370760_comment'></div>由是出为峡州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370760_comment'></div>转庐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370760_comment'></div>未至。<div id='poem_sentence_69_1370760_comment'></div>服除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370760_comment'></div>又为婺州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370760_comment'></div>时疫旱甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370760_comment'></div>人死亡且尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370760_comment'></div>公至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370760_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>多方</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370760", 1370760, "Clauses/75/Comments/1")'>救活</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370760_comment'></div>天遂雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370760_comment'></div>疫定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370760_comment'></div>比数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370760_comment'></div>里闾<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_224_1370760_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年5月</a>　夏，告病休养，于城南别墅养病两月余。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年5月</a>　五月，在长安。因由吏部侍郎兼礼仪使，唐穆宗卒后，上状文议迁玄宗庙之事。作品：请迁玄宗庙议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷31。）</span><div id='poem_1370575' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49644'>幽事随去多<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作幽寻事随去）</span>，孰能量近远。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49644'>阴沈过连树，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49644", 49644, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>藏昂</span>抵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49644", 49644, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>横坂</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49644'>石粗肆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49644", 49644, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>磨砺</span>，波恶厌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49644", 49644, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>牵挽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49644'>或倚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49644", 49644, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>偏岸</span>渔，竟就平洲饭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49644'>点点暮雨飘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49644", 49644, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>梢梢</span>新月偃。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49644'>馀年懔无几，休日怆已晚。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49644'>自是病使然，非由取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49644", 49644, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>高蹇</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作謇）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49644'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49645'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49645'>南溪亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49645", 49645, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49645", 49645, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>山农</span>惊见之，随我观不休。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49645'>不惟儿童辈，或有杖白头。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49645'>馈我笼<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作篱）</span>中瓜，劝我此淹留。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49645'>我云以病归，此已颇自由。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49645'>幸有用馀俸，置居在西畴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49645'>囷仓米谷满，未有旦夕忧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49645'>上去无得得，下来亦悠悠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49645'>但恐烦里闾，时有缓急投。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49645'>愿为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49645", 49645, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>同社</span>人，鸡豚燕春秋。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49645'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_49645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49646?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49646_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49646'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49646'>足弱不能步，自宜收朝迹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49646'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49646", 49646, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>羸形</span>可舆致，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49646", 49646, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>佳观</span>安事掷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49646'>即此南坂下，久闻有水石。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49646'>拖舟入其间，溪流正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49646", 49646, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>清激</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49646'>随波吾未能，峻濑乍可刺。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49646'>鹭起若导吾，前飞数十尺。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49646'>亭亭柳带沙，团团松冠壁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49646'>归时还尽夜，谁谓非事役。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49646'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_49646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49646'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49646)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　八月前，在长安。为孔戣作墓志铭。孔正月卒，八月八日葬。作品：唐正议大夫尚书左丞孔公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷23。）</span><div id='poem_1370770' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370770' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370770?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正议大夫尚书左丞孔公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370770")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370770_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370770'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370770'>孔子之后三十八世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370770_comment'></div>有孙曰戣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370770_comment'></div>字君严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370770_comment'></div>事唐为尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370770_comment'></div>年七十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370770_comment'></div>三上书去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370770_comment'></div>天子以为礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370770_comment'></div>禄之终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370770_comment'></div>而不敢烦以政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370770_comment'></div>吏部侍郎韩愈常贤其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370770_comment'></div>谓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370770_comment'></div>公尚壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370770_comment'></div>上三留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370770_comment'></div>奚去之果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370770_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370770_comment'></div>吾敢要君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370770_comment'></div>吾年至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370770_comment'></div>一宜去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370770_comment'></div>吾为左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370770_comment'></div>不能进退郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370770_comment'></div>惟相之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370770_comment'></div>二宜去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370770_comment'></div>愈又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370770_comment'></div>古之老于乡者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370770_comment'></div>将自佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370770_comment'></div>非自苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370770_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>闾井</span>田宅具在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370770_comment'></div>亲戚之不仕与倦而归者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370770_comment'></div>不在东阡在北陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370770_comment'></div>可杖屦来往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370770_comment'></div>今异于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370770_comment'></div>公谁与居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370770_comment'></div>且公虽贵而无留资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370770_comment'></div>何恃而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370770_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370770_comment'></div>吾负二宜去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370770_comment'></div>尚奚顾子言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370770_comment'></div>愈面叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370770_comment'></div>公于是乎贤远于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370770_comment'></div>明日奏疏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370770_comment'></div>臣与孔戣同在南省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370770_comment'></div>数与相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370770_comment'></div>戣为人守节清苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370770_comment'></div>论议正平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370770_comment'></div>年才七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370770_comment'></div>筋力耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370770_comment'></div>未尝衰老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370770_comment'></div>忧国忘家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370770_comment'></div>用意至到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370770_comment'></div>如戣辈在朝不过三数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370770_comment'></div>陛下不宜苟顺其求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370770_comment'></div>不留自助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370770_comment'></div>不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370770_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370770_comment'></div>长庆四年正月己未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370770_comment'></div>公年七十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370770_comment'></div>告薨于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370770_comment'></div>赠兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370770_comment'></div>公始以进士佐三府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370770_comment'></div>官至殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370770_comment'></div>元和元年以大理正徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370770_comment'></div>累迁江州刺史谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370770_comment'></div>事有害于正者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370770_comment'></div>无所不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370770_comment'></div>加皇太子侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370770_comment'></div>改给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370770_comment'></div>言京兆尹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>阿纵</span>罪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370770_comment'></div>诏夺京兆尹三月之俸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370770_comment'></div>权知尚书右丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370770_comment'></div>明年拜右丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370770_comment'></div>改华州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370770_comment'></div>明州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>岁贡</span>海虫淡菜蛤蚶可食之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370770_comment'></div>自海抵京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370770_comment'></div>道路水陆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>递夫</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/73/Comments/1")'>积功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370770_comment'></div>岁为四十三万六千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370770_comment'></div>奏疏罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370770_comment'></div>下邽令笞外桉小儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370770_comment'></div>系御史狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370770_comment'></div>公上疏理之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370770_comment'></div>诏释下邽令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370770_comment'></div>而以华州刺史为大理卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370770_comment'></div>十二年自国子祭酒拜御史大夫岭南节度等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370770_comment'></div>约以取足境内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370770_comment'></div>诸州负钱至二百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370770_comment'></div>悉放不收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370770_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>蕃舶</span>之至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/85/Comments/1")'>泊步</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370770_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>下碇</span>之税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370770_comment'></div>始至有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>阅货</span>之燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370770_comment'></div>犀珠磊落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370770_comment'></div>贿及仆隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370770_comment'></div>公皆罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370770_comment'></div>绝海之商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370770_comment'></div>有死于吾地者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370770_comment'></div>官藏其货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370770_comment'></div>满三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370770_comment'></div>无妻子之请者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370770_comment'></div>尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>没有</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370770_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370770_comment'></div>海道以年计<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>往复</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370770_comment'></div>何月之拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370770_comment'></div>苟有验者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370770_comment'></div>悉推与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370770_comment'></div>无算远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370770_comment'></div>厚守宰俸而严其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370770_comment'></div>岭南以口为货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370770_comment'></div>其荒阻处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370770_comment'></div>父子相缚为奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370770_comment'></div>公一禁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370770_comment'></div>有随公吏得无名儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370770_comment'></div>蓄不言官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370770_comment'></div>有讼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370770_comment'></div>公召杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370770_comment'></div>山谷诸黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370770_comment'></div>世自聚为豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370770_comment'></div>观吏厚薄缓急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370770_comment'></div>或叛或从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370770_comment'></div>容桂二管利其虏掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370770_comment'></div>请合兵讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370770_comment'></div>冀一有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370770_comment'></div>有所指取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370770_comment'></div>当是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370770_comment'></div>天子以武定淮西河南北用事者以破诸黄为类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370770_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>向意</span>助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370770_comment'></div>公屡言远人急之则惜性命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370770_comment'></div>相屯聚为寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370770_comment'></div>缓之则自相怨恨而散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370770_comment'></div>此禽兽耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370770_comment'></div>但可自计利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370770_comment'></div>不足与论是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370770_comment'></div>天子入先言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370770_comment'></div>遂敛兵江西岳鄂湖南岭南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370770_comment'></div>会容桂之吏以讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370770_comment'></div>被雾露毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370770_comment'></div>相枕藉死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370770_comment'></div>百无一二还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370770_comment'></div>安南乘势杀都护李象古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370770_comment'></div>桂将裴行立容将杨旻皆无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370770_comment'></div>数月自死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370770_comment'></div>岭南嚣然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370770_comment'></div>祠部岁下广州祭南海庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370770_comment'></div>庙入海口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370770_comment'></div>为州者皆惮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370770_comment'></div>不自奉事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370770_comment'></div>常称疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370770_comment'></div>命从事自代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370770_comment'></div>惟公岁常自行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370770_comment'></div>官吏刻石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370770_comment'></div>为诗美之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370770_comment'></div>十五年迁尚书吏部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370770_comment'></div>公之北归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370770_comment'></div>不载南物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370770_comment'></div>奴婢之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370770_comment'></div>不增一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370770_comment'></div>长庆元年改右散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370770_comment'></div>二年而为尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1370770_comment'></div>曾祖讳务本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370770_comment'></div>沧州东光令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370770_comment'></div>祖讳如圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370770_comment'></div>海州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370770_comment'></div>赠尚书工部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370770_comment'></div>皇考讳岑父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370770_comment'></div>秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370770_comment'></div>赠尚书左仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370770_comment'></div>公夫人京兆韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370770_comment'></div>父种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370770_comment'></div>大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370770_comment'></div>有四子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370770_comment'></div>长曰温质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370770_comment'></div>四门博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370770_comment'></div>遵孺遵宪温裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370770_comment'></div>皆明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370770_comment'></div>女子长嫁中书舍人平阳路隋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370770_comment'></div>其季者幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1370770_comment'></div>公之昆弟五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1370770_comment'></div>载戡戢戵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1370770_comment'></div>公于次为第二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1370770_comment'></div>公之薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1370770_comment'></div>戢自湖南入为少府监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1370770_comment'></div>其年八月甲申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1370770_comment'></div>戢与公子葬公于河南河阴广武原先公仆射墓之左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1370770_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1370770_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_181_1370770'>孔氏卅八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1370770_comment'></div>吾见其孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1370770_comment'></div>白而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_183_1370770", 1370770, "Clauses/183/Comments/0")'>长身</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1370770_comment'></div>寡笑与言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1370770_comment'></div>其尚类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1370770_comment'></div>莫与之伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1370770_comment'></div>德则多有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1370770_comment'></div>请考于文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_188_1370770_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　夏，在长安。为杨巨源作序。作品：送杨少尹序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370661' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370661' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370661?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杨少尹序</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370661")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370661_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370661'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370661'>昔疏广受二子以年老。一朝辞位而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370661_comment'></div>于时公卿设供张。祖道都门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370661_comment'></div>车数百两。道路观者多叹息泣下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370661_comment'></div>共言其贤。汉史既传其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370661_comment'></div>而后世工画者又图其迹。至今照人耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370661_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370661", 1370661, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>赫赫</span>若前日事。国子司业杨君巨源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370661_comment'></div>方以能诗训后进。一旦以年满七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370661_comment'></div>亦白丞相去归其乡。世常说古今人不相及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370661_comment'></div>今杨与二疏。其意岂异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370661_comment'></div>予忝在公卿后。遇病不能出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370661_comment'></div>不知杨侯去时。城门外送者几人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370661_comment'></div>车几两。马几匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370661_comment'></div>道旁观者。亦有叹息知其为贤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370661", 1370661, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>以否</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370661_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370661", 1370661, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>太史氏</span>又能张大其事为传继二疏踪迹否。不落莫否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370661_comment'></div>见今世无工画者。而画与不画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370661_comment'></div>固不论也。然吾闻杨侯之去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370661_comment'></div>丞相有爱而惜之者。白以为其都少尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370661_comment'></div>不绝其禄。又为歌诗以劝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370661_comment'></div>京师之长于诗者。亦属而和之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370661_comment'></div>又不知当时二疏之去。有是事否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370661_comment'></div>古今人同不同。未可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370661_comment'></div>中世士大夫以官为家。罢则无所于归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370661_comment'></div>杨侯始冠。举于其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370661_comment'></div>歌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370661", 1370661, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>鹿鸣</span>而来也。今之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370661_comment'></div>指其树曰。某树吾先人之所种也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370661_comment'></div>某水某邱吾童子时所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370661", 1370661, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>钓游</span>也。乡人莫不加敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370661_comment'></div>诫子孙以杨侯不去其乡为法。古之所谓乡先生没而可祭于社者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370661_comment'></div>其在斯人欤。其在斯人欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370661_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1370661_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年8月</a>　八月，病假已满，而病未痊愈。遂免吏部侍郎之职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年8月</a>　在长安。病假满后，与张籍同效阮籍之诗，有忧生之意。作品：与张十八同效阮步兵一日复一夕。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49551' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49551' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49551?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与张十八同效阮步兵一日复一夕</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49551")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49551_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49551'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49551'>一日复一日，一朝复一朝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49551'>秖见有不如，不见有所超。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49551'>食作前日味，事作前日调。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49551'>不知久不死，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49551", 49551, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>悯悯</span>尚谁要。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49551'>富贵自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49551", 49551, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>絷拘</span>，贫贱亦煎焦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49551'>俯仰未得所，一世已解镳。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49551'>譬如笼中鹤，六翮无所摇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49551'>譬如兔得蹄，安用东西跳。<div -----title
孟州（河阳）
