"poem_title_1370834")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370834_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370834'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370834'>维年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370834_comment'></div>愈谨于逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370834_comment'></div>备时羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370834_comment'></div>再拜顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370834_comment'></div>敢昭祭于六嫂荥阳郑氏夫人之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370834_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370834_comment'></div>天祸我家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370834_comment'></div>降集百殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370834_comment'></div>我生不辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370834_comment'></div>三岁而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>蒙幼</span>未知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370834_comment'></div>鞠我者兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370834_comment'></div>在死而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370834_comment'></div>实维嫂恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370834_comment'></div>未龀一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370834_comment'></div>兄宦王官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370834_comment'></div>提携<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>负任</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370834_comment'></div>去洛居秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370834_comment'></div>念寒而衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370834_comment'></div>念饥而飧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>疾疹</span>水火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370834_comment'></div>无灾及身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370834_comment'></div>劬劳闵闵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370834_comment'></div>保此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>愚庸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370834_comment'></div>年方及纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370834_comment'></div>荐及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>凶屯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370834_comment'></div>兄罹谗口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370834_comment'></div>承命远迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370834_comment'></div>穷荒海隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370834_comment'></div>夭阏百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370834_comment'></div>万里故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370834_comment'></div>幼孤在前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370834_comment'></div>相顾不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370834_comment'></div>泣血<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>号天</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370834_comment'></div>微嫂之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370834_comment'></div>化为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>夷蛮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370834_comment'></div>水浮陆走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>丹旐</span>翩然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370834_comment'></div>至诚感神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>返葬</span>中原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370834_comment'></div>既克<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>返葬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>遭时</span>艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370834_comment'></div>百口偕行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370834_comment'></div>避地江濆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370834_comment'></div>春秋霜露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370834_comment'></div>荐敬蘋蘩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370834_comment'></div>以享韩氏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>祖考</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370834_comment'></div>曰此韩氏之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370834_comment'></div>视余犹子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370834_comment'></div>诲化谆谆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370834_comment'></div>爰来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370834_comment'></div>年在成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370834_comment'></div>屡贡于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370834_comment'></div>名乃有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370834_comment'></div>念兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>顿顽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370834_comment'></div>非训曷因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370834_comment'></div>感伤怀归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>陨涕</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>熏心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370834_comment'></div>苟容躁进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370834_comment'></div>不顾其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>禄仕</span>而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370834_comment'></div>以为家荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370834_comment'></div>奔走乞假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370834_comment'></div>东西北南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370834_comment'></div>孰云此来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370834_comment'></div>乃睹灵车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370834_comment'></div>有志弗及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370834_comment'></div>长负殷勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370834_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370834_comment'></div>昔在韶州之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370834_comment'></div>受命于元兄曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370834_comment'></div>尔幼养于嫂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370834_comment'></div>丧服必以期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370834_comment'></div>今其敢忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370834_comment'></div>夭实临之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370834_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370834_comment'></div>日月有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370834_comment'></div>归合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370834", 1370834, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>茔封</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370834_comment'></div>终天永辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370834_comment'></div>绝而复苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370834_comment'></div>伏惟尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1370834_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b2f46a98034146e2a9c45969bf249205_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b2f46a98034146e2a9c45969bf249205");'><span id='b2f46a98034146e2a9c45969bf249205_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>，28岁</div><div id='b2f46a98034146e2a9c45969bf249205' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年5月</a>　五月，由长安东归洛阳、河阳，闲居。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　约五月底六月初，回河阳闲居。与人共观己藏之画，遇到画之原主赵侍御，遂慷慨赠还之，作记以留忆念。作品：画记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370682' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370682' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370682?labeling=true' target='_blank'>画记</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370682")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370682_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370682'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370682'>杂古今人物小画共一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370682_comment'></div>骑而立者五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370682_comment'></div>骑而披甲载兵立者十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370682_comment'></div>一人骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370682_comment'></div>执大旗前立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370682_comment'></div>骑而披甲载兵行且下牵者十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370682_comment'></div>骑且负者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370682_comment'></div>骑执器者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370682_comment'></div>骑拥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>田犬</span>者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370682_comment'></div>骑而牵者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370682_comment'></div>骑而驱者三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370682_comment'></div>执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>羁靮</span>立者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370682_comment'></div>骑而下倚马臂隼而立者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370682_comment'></div>骑而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>驱涉</span>者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370682_comment'></div>徒而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>驱牧</span>者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370682_comment'></div>坐而指使者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370682_comment'></div>甲冑手弓矢鈇钺植者七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370682_comment'></div>甲冑执帜植者十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370682_comment'></div>负者七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370682_comment'></div>偃寝休者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370682_comment'></div>甲冑坐睡者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370682_comment'></div>方涉者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370682_comment'></div>坐而脱足者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370682_comment'></div>寒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>附火</span>者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370682_comment'></div>杂执器物役者八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370682_comment'></div>奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>壶矢</span>者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370682_comment'></div>舍而具食者十有一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370682_comment'></div>挹且注者四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370682_comment'></div>牛牵者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370682_comment'></div>驴驱者四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370682_comment'></div>一人杖而负者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370682_comment'></div>妇人以孺子载而可见者六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370682_comment'></div>载而上下者三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370682_comment'></div>孺子戏者九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370682_comment'></div>凡人之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370682_comment'></div>三十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370682_comment'></div>为人大小百二十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370682_comment'></div>而莫有同者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370682_comment'></div>马大者九匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370682_comment'></div>于马之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370682_comment'></div>又有上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370682_comment'></div>下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370682_comment'></div>行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370682_comment'></div>牵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370682_comment'></div>涉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370682_comment'></div>陆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370682_comment'></div>翘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370682_comment'></div>顾者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370682_comment'></div>鸣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370682_comment'></div>寝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370682_comment'></div>讹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370682_comment'></div>立者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370682_comment'></div>人立者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370682_comment'></div>龁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370682_comment'></div>饮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370682_comment'></div>溲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370682_comment'></div>陟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370682_comment'></div>降者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370682_comment'></div>痒磨树者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370682_comment'></div>嘘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370682_comment'></div>嗅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370682_comment'></div>喜相戏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370682_comment'></div>怒相踶齧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370682_comment'></div>秣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370682_comment'></div>骑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370682_comment'></div>骤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370682_comment'></div>走者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370682_comment'></div>载服物者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370682_comment'></div>载狐兔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370682_comment'></div>凡马之事二十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370682_comment'></div>为马大小八十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370682_comment'></div>而莫有同者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370682_comment'></div>牛大小十一头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370682_comment'></div>橐驼三头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370682_comment'></div>驴如橐驼之数而加其一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370682_comment'></div>隼一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370682_comment'></div>犬羊狐兔麋鹿共三十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370682_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>旃车</span>三两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370682_comment'></div>杂兵器弓矢旌旗刀剑予楯弓服矢房甲冑之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370682_comment'></div>瓶盂簦笠筐筥锜釜饮食服用之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370682_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>壶矢</span>博奕之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370682_comment'></div>二百五十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370682_comment'></div>皆曲极其妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370682_comment'></div>贞元甲戌年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370682_comment'></div>余在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370682_comment'></div>甚无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370682_comment'></div>同居有独孤生申叔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370682_comment'></div>始得此画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370682_comment'></div>而与余弹棋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370682_comment'></div>余幸胜而获焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370682_comment'></div>意甚惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370682_comment'></div>以为非一工人之所能运思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370682_comment'></div>盖丛集众工人之所长耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370682_comment'></div>虽百金不愿易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370682_comment'></div>明年出京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370682_comment'></div>至河阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370682_comment'></div>与二三客论画<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>品格</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370682_comment'></div>因出而观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370682_comment'></div>座有赵侍御者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370682_comment'></div>君子人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370682_comment'></div>见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370682_comment'></div>戚然若有感然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370682_comment'></div>少而进曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370682_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370682_comment'></div>余之手摸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370682_comment'></div>亡之且二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370682_comment'></div>余少时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370682_comment'></div>常有志乎兹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370682_comment'></div>得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>国本</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370682_comment'></div>绝人事而摸得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370682_comment'></div>游闽中而丧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370682_comment'></div>居闲处独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370682_comment'></div>时往来余怀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370682_comment'></div>以其始为之劳而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>夙好</span>之笃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370682_comment'></div>今虽遇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370682_comment'></div>力不能为已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370682_comment'></div>且命工人存其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1370682", 1370682, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>大都</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370682_comment'></div>余既甚爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370682_comment'></div>又感赵君之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370682_comment'></div>因以赠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370682_comment'></div>而记其人物之形状与数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370682_comment'></div>而时观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370682_comment'></div>以自释焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_122_1370682_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c5fe1feb4c8c440c9c213f00f7c35acc_label'><a -----title
韶关（韶州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8bb77180df464d1295037540550a7675_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8bb77180df464d1295037540550a7675");'><span id='8bb77180df464d1295037540550a7675_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=777&endYear=779')">777-779年</a>，10-12岁</div><div id='8bb77180df464d1295037540550a7675' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=777&endYear=777')">777年4月</a>　四月，长兄韩会由起居舍人贬官岭南任韶州刺史。韩愈随其全家迁往。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=778&endYear=778')">778年</a>　本年，随长兄韩会居官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=779&endYear=779')">779年</a>　本年，长兄韩会病逝于韶州。随嫂郑氏扶柩北上，返葬故乡河阳。之后随家在河阳暂住。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b8e63315eddb473f983daf6e9bdf54d0_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>，52岁</div><div id='b8e63315eddb473f983daf6e9bdf54d0' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>三月上旬，被贬潮州途经曲江东北始兴江口，已近韶州州治，念及幼时随长兄韩会曾来韶州，今又经此，有感为诗。作品：过始兴江口感怀。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_49382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49382' 宣城

永济（永乐）

<div class='label1' id='d3ac93425e4148f8ba22312b22e57a22_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d3ac93425e4148f8ba22312b22e57a22");'><span id='d3ac93425e4148f8ba22312b22e57a22_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=787')">787年</a>，20岁</div><div id='d3ac93425e4148f8ba22312b22e57a22' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=787')">787年</a>　年初，赴长安应试，沿黄河西上，途经河中，过中条山，有诗。作品：条山苍。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。张贞元二年，40。）</span><div id='poem_49604' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49604' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49604?labeling=true' target='_blank'>条山苍<span class='inlineComment2'>（中条山在黄河之西）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（787年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49604")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49604_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49604'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49604'>条山苍，河水黄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49604'>浪波<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作波浪）</span>沄沄去，松柏在山<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作高）</span>冈。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49604'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49604'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49604)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
滑县（白马）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8d6f8621a29146a5960ca9f920069935_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8d6f8621a29146a5960ca9f920069935");'><span id='8d6f8621a29146a5960ca9f920069935_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=790&endYear=790')">790年</a>，23岁</div><div id='8d6f8621a29146a5960ca9f920069935' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=790&endYear=790')">790年</a>　本年，由宣城返长安途经滑州，上书滑州刺史贾耽以自荐。作品：上贾滑州书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷32。磊按：张清华《韩愈年谱汇证》云此文乃“过郑州”所写，而贾耽驻所应为滑州。疑误。）</span><div id='poem_1370629' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370629' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370629?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上贾滑州书</a><span class='authorDate'>（790年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370629")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370629_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370629'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370629'>愈闻儒服者不敢用他术干进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370629_comment'></div>又惟古执贽之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370629_comment'></div>窃整顿旧所著文一十五章以为贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370629_comment'></div>而喻所以然之意于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370629_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370629_comment'></div>丰山上有钟焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370629_comment'></div>人所不可至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370629_comment'></div>霜既降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370629_comment'></div>则铿然鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370629_comment'></div>盖气之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370629_comment'></div>非自鸣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370629_comment'></div>愈年二十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370629_comment'></div>读书学文十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370629_comment'></div>言行不敢戾于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370629_comment'></div>愚固泯泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370629_comment'></div>不能自计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370629_comment'></div>周流四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370629_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370629", 1370629, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>适归</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370629_comment'></div>伏惟閤下昭融古之典义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370629_comment'></div>含和发英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370629_comment'></div>作唐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370629", 1370629, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>德元</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370629_comment'></div>弃诡说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370629_comment'></div>保任皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370629_comment'></div>是宜小子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370629", 1370629, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>刻心</span>悚慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370629_comment'></div>又焉得不感而鸣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370629_comment'></div>徒以献策阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370629_comment'></div>方勤行役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370629_comment'></div>且有负薪之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370629_comment'></div>不得稽首<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370629", 1370629, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>轩阶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370629_comment'></div>遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370629", 1370629, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>拜书</span>家仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370629_comment'></div>待命于郑之逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370629_comment'></div>伏以小子之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370629_comment'></div>可见于十五章之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370629_comment'></div>小子之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370629_comment'></div>可见于此书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370629_comment'></div>与之进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370629_comment'></div>敢不勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370629_comment'></div>与之退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370629_comment'></div>敢不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370629_comment'></div>进退之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370629_comment'></div>实惟閤下裁之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370629_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
岐山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7f70ad27d6b64f2dba93d90c91eaaa6d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7f70ad27d6b64f2dba93d90c91eaaa6d");'><span id='7f70ad27d6b64f2dba93d90c91eaaa6d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>，26岁</div><div id='7f70ad27d6b64f2dba93d90c91eaaa6d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　夏，至凤翔谒节度使邢君牙，过岐山下，有诗。作品：岐山下二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岐山下二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49386")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49386_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49386_0'>① 朱熹《考异》曰：“诸本只作一首。”方云：“自日暮边火惊以上为一篇。世有《灌畦暇语》一书，谓子齐初应举，韩公赏之，为作丹穴五色羽。子齐姓程，字昔范，尝著《中谟》三卷，见《因话录》。则下诗似当为别篇，第前诗题以岐山下，此必游凤翔日作。”</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49386'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49386'>谁谓我有耳，不闻凤皇鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49386'>朅来岐山下，日暮边鸿<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作火）</span>惊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49386'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49386_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_49598' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49598' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49598?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49598_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49598'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49598'>丹穴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49598", 49598, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>五色羽</span>，其名为凤皇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49598'>昔周有盛德，此鸟鸣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49598", 49598, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>高冈</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49598'>和声随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49598", 49598, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>祥风</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49598", 49598, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>窅窕</span>相飘扬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49598'>闻者亦何事，但知时俗康。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49598'>自从公旦死，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49598", 49598, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>千载</span>閟其光。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49598'>吾君亦勤理，迟尔一来翔。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49598'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49598_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
郑州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c52d1febc35a409fbff280cf7397a030_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c52d1febc35a409fbff280cf7397a030");'><span id='c52d1febc35a409fbff280cf7397a030_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>，27岁</div><div id='c52d1febc35a409fbff280cf7397a030' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年9月</a>　九月，或曾去郑州。偶逢早慧张童子，作文赠之。作品：赠张童子序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370647' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370647' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370647?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠张童子序</a><span class='authorDate'>（794年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370647")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370647_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370647'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370647'>天下之以明二经举于礼部者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370647_comment'></div>岁至三千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370647_comment'></div>始自县考试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370647_comment'></div>定其可举者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370647_comment'></div>然后升于州若府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370647_comment'></div>其不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>中科</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370647_comment'></div>不与是数焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370647_comment'></div>州若府总其属之所升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370647_comment'></div>又考试之如县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370647_comment'></div>加察详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370647_comment'></div>定其可举者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370647_comment'></div>然后贡于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370647_comment'></div>而升之有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370647_comment'></div>其不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>中科</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370647_comment'></div>不与是数焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370647_comment'></div>谓之乡贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370647_comment'></div>有司者总州府之所升而考试之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370647_comment'></div>加察详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370647_comment'></div>第其可进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370647_comment'></div>以名上于天子而藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370647_comment'></div>属之吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370647_comment'></div>岁不及二百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370647_comment'></div>谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>出身</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370647_comment'></div>能在是选者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370647_comment'></div>厥惟艰哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370647_comment'></div>二经章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370647_comment'></div>仅数十万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370647_comment'></div>其传注在外皆诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370647_comment'></div>又约知其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>大说</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370647_comment'></div>繇是举者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370647_comment'></div>或远至十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370647_comment'></div>然后与乎三千之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370647_comment'></div>而升于礼部矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370647_comment'></div>又或远至十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370647_comment'></div>然后与乎二百之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370647_comment'></div>而进于吏部矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370647_comment'></div>班白之老半焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370647_comment'></div>昏塞不能及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370647_comment'></div>皆不在是限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370647_comment'></div>有终身不得与者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370647_comment'></div>张童子生九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370647_comment'></div>自州县达礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370647_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>一举</span>而进立于二百之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370647_comment'></div>又二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370647_comment'></div>益通二经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370647_comment'></div>有司复上其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370647_comment'></div>繇是拜卫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>兵曹</span>之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370647_comment'></div>人皆谓童子耳目明达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370647_comment'></div>神气以灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370647_comment'></div>余亦伟童子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>独出</span>于等夷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370647_comment'></div>童子请于其官之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370647_comment'></div>随父而宁母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370647_comment'></div>岁八月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370647_comment'></div>自京师道陜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370647_comment'></div>南至虢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370647_comment'></div>东及洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370647_comment'></div>北过大河之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370647_comment'></div>九月始来及郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370647_comment'></div>自朝之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>闻人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370647_comment'></div>以及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>五都</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>伯长</span>群吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370647_comment'></div>皆厚其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>饩赂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370647_comment'></div>或作歌诗以嘉童子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370647_comment'></div>童子亦荣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370647_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370647_comment'></div>愈当进童子于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370647_comment'></div>使人谓童子求益者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370647_comment'></div>非欲速成者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370647_comment'></div>夫少之与长也<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>异观</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370647_comment'></div>少之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370647_comment'></div>人惟童子之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370647_comment'></div>及其长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370647_comment'></div>将责成人之礼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370647_comment'></div>成人之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370647_comment'></div>非尽于童子所能而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370647_comment'></div>然则童子宜暂息乎其已学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370647_comment'></div>而勤乎其未学者可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370647_comment'></div>愈与童子俱陆公之门人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370647_comment'></div>慕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370647", 1370647, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>回路</span>二子之相请赠与处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370647_comment'></div>故有以赠童子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1370647_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
潼关（华阴）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='bd4757703fa04bcd814d5dd341af5066_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bd4757703fa04bcd814d5dd341af5066");'><span id='bd4757703fa04bcd814d5dd341af5066_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>，28岁</div><div id='bd4757703fa04bcd814d5dd341af5066' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年5月7日</a>　五月七日，出潼关，息于河之阴，见有笼白乌、白鸲鹆而西者，有感而作赋，抒发不遇时之叹，兼批判统治者喜好珍禽异兽之奢靡习气。作品：感二鸟赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（马其昶《韩昌黎文集校注》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_1370500' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370500' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370500?labeling=true' target='_blank'>感二鸟赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年5月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370500")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370500_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1370500'>贞元十一年五月戊辰。愈东归。癸酉。自潼关出息于河之阴。时始去京师。有不遇时之叹。见行有笼白乌白鸲鹆而西者。号于道曰。某土之守某官使使者进于天子。东西行者皆避路。莫敢正目焉。因窃自悲。幸生天下无事时。承先人之遗业。不识干戈耒耜攻守耕穫之勤。读书著文。自七岁至今。凡二十二年。其行已不敢有愧于道。其閒居思念前古当今之故。亦仅志其一二大者焉。选举于有司。与百十人偕进退。曾不得名荐书。齿下士于朝。以仰望天子之光明。今是鸟也。惟以羽毛之异。非有道德智谋承顾问赞教化者。乃反得蒙采擢荐进。光耀如此。故为赋以自悼。且明夫遭时者。虽小善必达。不遭时者。累善无所容焉。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1370500_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370500'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370500'>吾何归乎。吾将既行而后思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370500_comment'></div>诚不足以自存。苟有食其从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370500_comment'></div>出国门而东骛。触白日之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>隆景</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370500_comment'></div>时返顾以流涕。念西路之羌永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370500_comment'></div>过潼关而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>坐息</span>。窥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>黄流</span>之奔猛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370500_comment'></div>感二鸟之无知。方蒙恩而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>入幸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370500_comment'></div>惟进退之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>殊异</span>。增余怀之耿耿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370500_comment'></div>彼中心之何嘉。徒外饰焉是逞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370500_comment'></div>余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>生命</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>湮阨</span>。曾二鸟之不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370500_comment'></div>汨东西与南北。恒十年而不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370500_comment'></div>辱饱食其有数。况策名于荐书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370500_comment'></div>时所好之为贤。庸有谓余之非愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370500_comment'></div>昔殷之高宗。得良弼于宵寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370500_comment'></div>孰左右者为之先。信天同而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>神比</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370500_comment'></div>及时运之未来。或两求而莫致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370500_comment'></div>虽家到而户说。祗以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>招尤</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>速累</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370500_comment'></div>盖上天之生余。亦有期于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>下地</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370500_comment'></div>盍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370500", 1370500, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>求配</span>于古人。独怊怅于无位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370500_comment'></div>惟得之而不能。乃鬼神之所戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370500_comment'></div>幸年岁之未暮。庶无羡于斯类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370500_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1370500_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a9944e48b87d4be0b4c4230358b6e415_label'><a href='javascript: id='poem_comment_49379'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49379)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>十二月，班师西归路经潼关，作诗贺裴度军功。作品：次潼关上都统相公。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_49378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次潼关上都统相公<span class='inlineComment2'>（韩弘也）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（817年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49378")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49378'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49378'>暂辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49378", 49378, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>堂印</span>执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49378", 49378, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>兵权</span>，尽管诸军破贼年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49378'>冠盖相望催入相，待将功德格皇天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
偃师
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3c4711eb3d7d47e89c00f7dae913af7a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3c4711eb3d7d47e89c00f7dae913af7a");'><span id='3c4711eb3d7d47e89c00f7dae913af7a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>，28岁</div><div id='3c4711eb3d7d47e89c00f7dae913af7a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年9月11日</a>　九月十一日，自河阳去洛阳。路过洛阳东三十里偃师尸乡田横墓，作文吊田横以寄慨。作品：祭田横墓文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370841?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭田横墓文</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年9月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370841")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370841_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370841'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370841'>贞元十一年九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370841_comment'></div>愈如东京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370841_comment'></div>道出田横墓下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370841_comment'></div>感横义高能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370841", 1370841, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>得士</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370841_comment'></div>因取酒以祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370841_comment'></div>为文而吊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370841_comment'></div>其辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370841_comment'></div>事有旷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370841", 1370841, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>百世</span>而相感者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370841_comment'></div>余不自知其何心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370841_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370841", 1370841, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>今世</span>之所稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370841_comment'></div>孰为使余歔欷而不可禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370841_comment'></div>余既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370841", 1370841, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>博观</span>乎天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370841_comment'></div>曷有庶几乎夫子之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370841_comment'></div>死者不复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370841_comment'></div>嗟余去此其从谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370841_comment'></div>当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370841", 1370841, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>秦氏</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370841", 1370841, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>败乱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370841_comment'></div>得一士而可王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370841_comment'></div>何五百人之扰扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370841_comment'></div>而不能脱夫子于剑铓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370841_comment'></div>抑所宝之非贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370841_comment'></div>亦天命之有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370841_comment'></div>昔阙里之多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370841_comment'></div>孔圣亦云其遑遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370841_comment'></div>苟余行之不迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370841_comment'></div>虽颠沛其何伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370841_comment'></div>自古死者非一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370841_comment'></div>夫子至今有耿光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370841_comment'></div>跪陈辞而荐酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370841_comment'></div>魂髣髴而来享。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1370841_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f731897998924a2a8ff916c530e51bd0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f731897998924a2a8ff916c530e51bd0");'><span id='f731897998924a2a8ff916c530e51bd0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>，32岁</div><div id='f731897998924a2a8ff916c530e51bd0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年2月</a>　二月中旬初某夜，护丧董晋灵柩西归河中安葬，行至偃师西，闻汴州兵乱，家人已脱险赴徐州。有诗。作品：汴州乱。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49605' 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（799年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49605'>健儿争誇<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作诱）</span>杀留后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49605", 49605, -----title
洛阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='06c5d5c30e184b589a7c9d77ef3ad590_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("06c5d5c30e184b589a7c9d77ef3ad590");'><span id='06c5d5c30e184b589a7c9d77ef3ad590_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=796')">795-796年</a>，28-29岁</div><div id='06c5d5c30e184b589a7c9d77ef3ad590' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　马燧本年八月卒。得消息后，哭马燧于客舍。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　七月前，在洛阳或河阳闲居。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='0d87e279d903481bb9b4d1ade2d5165d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0d87e279d903481bb9b4d1ade2d5165d");'><span id='0d87e279d903481bb9b4d1ade2d5165d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>，33岁</div><div id='0d87e279d903481bb9b4d1ade2d5165d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年五月后，去徐州、居洛阳，无职事而闲居。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>五月后，韩愈脱徐州之难，卫中行有书贺之。韩愈抵洛阳后，作书答之，言穷居之状。作品：与卫中行书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370605' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370605' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370605?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与卫中行书</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370605")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370605_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370605'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370605'>大受足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370605_comment'></div>辱书为赐甚大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370605_comment'></div>然所称道过盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370605_comment'></div>岂所谓诱之而欲其至于是欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370605_comment'></div>不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370605_comment'></div>不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370605_comment'></div>其中择其一二近似者而窃取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370605_comment'></div>则于交友忠而不反于背面者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370605_comment'></div>少似近焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370605_comment'></div>亦其心之所好耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370605_comment'></div>行之不倦则未敢自谓能尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370605_comment'></div>不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370605_comment'></div>不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370605_comment'></div>至于汲汲于富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370605_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370605", 1370605, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>救世</span>为事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370605_comment'></div>皆圣贤之事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370605_comment'></div>知其智能谋力能任者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370605_comment'></div>如愈者又焉能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370605_comment'></div>始相识时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370605_comment'></div>方甚贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370605_comment'></div>衣食于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370605_comment'></div>其后相见于汴徐二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370605_comment'></div>仆皆为之从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370605_comment'></div>日月有所入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370605_comment'></div>比之前时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370605_comment'></div>丰约百倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370605_comment'></div>足下视吾饮食衣服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370605_comment'></div>亦有异乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370605_comment'></div>然则仆之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370605_comment'></div>或不为此汲汲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370605_comment'></div>其所不忘于仕进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370605_comment'></div>亦将小行乎其志耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370605_comment'></div>此未易遽言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370605_comment'></div>凡祸福吉凶之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370605_comment'></div>似不在我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370605_comment'></div>惟君子得祸为不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370605_comment'></div>而小人得祸为恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370605_comment'></div>君子得福为恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370605_comment'></div>而小人得福为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370605_comment'></div>以其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370605_comment'></div>似有以取之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370605_comment'></div>必曰君子则吉小人则凶者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370605_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370605_comment'></div>贤不肖存乎己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370605_comment'></div>贵与贱祸与福存乎天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370605_comment'></div>名声之善恶存乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370605_comment'></div>存乎己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370605_comment'></div>吾将勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370605_comment'></div>存乎天存乎人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370605_comment'></div>吾将任彼而不用吾力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370605_comment'></div>其所守者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370605_comment'></div>岂不约而易行哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370605_comment'></div>足下曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370605_comment'></div>命之穷通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370605_comment'></div>自我为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370605_comment'></div>吾恐未合于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370605_comment'></div>足下徵前世而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370605_comment'></div>则知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370605_comment'></div>若曰以道德为已任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370605_comment'></div>穷通之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370605_comment'></div>不接吾心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370605_comment'></div>则可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370605_comment'></div>穷居荒凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370605_comment'></div>草树茂密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370605_comment'></div>出无驴马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370605_comment'></div>因与人绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370605_comment'></div>一室之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370605_comment'></div>有以自娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370605_comment'></div>足下喜吾复脱祸乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370605_comment'></div>不当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370605", 1370605, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>安安</span>而居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370605_comment'></div>迟迟而来也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1370605_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，在洛阳。穆员父母相继过世，服丧期间哀伤过度早卒，韩愈为之作祭文。暂系此年。亦可系于元和六年。作品：祭穆员外文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为崔侍御祭穆员外文</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370846")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370846'>于乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370846_comment'></div>建中之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370846_comment'></div>子居于嵩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370846_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>携扶</span>北奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370846_comment'></div>避盗来攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370846_comment'></div>晨及洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370846_comment'></div>相遇一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370846_comment'></div>顾我如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370846_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>眷然</span>顾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370846_comment'></div>子有令闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370846_comment'></div>我来自山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370846_comment'></div>子之俊明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370846_comment'></div>我钝而顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370846_comment'></div>道既云异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370846_comment'></div>谁从知我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370846_comment'></div>我思其厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370846_comment'></div>不知其可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370846_comment'></div>于后八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370846_comment'></div>君从杜侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370846_comment'></div>我时在洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370846_comment'></div>亦应其招。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370846_comment'></div>留守无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370846_comment'></div>多君子僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370846_comment'></div>罔有疑忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370846_comment'></div>维其嬉游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370846_comment'></div>草生之春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370846_comment'></div>鸟鸣之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370846_comment'></div>我辔在手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370846_comment'></div>君扬其镳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370846_comment'></div>君居于室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370846_comment'></div>我既来即。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370846_comment'></div>或以啸歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370846_comment'></div>或以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>偃侧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370846_comment'></div>诲予以义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370846_comment'></div>复我以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370846_comment'></div>终日以语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370846_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>无非</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>德声</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370846_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>主人</span>信谗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370846_comment'></div>有惑其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370846_comment'></div>杀人无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370846_comment'></div>诬以成过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370846_comment'></div>入救不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370846_comment'></div>反以为祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370846_comment'></div>赫赫有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370846_comment'></div>王命三司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370846_comment'></div>察我于狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370846_comment'></div>相从系缧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370846_comment'></div>曲生何乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370846_comment'></div>直死何悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370846_comment'></div>上怀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>主人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370846_comment'></div>内闵其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370846_comment'></div>进退之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370846_comment'></div>君处之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370846_comment'></div>既释于囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370846_comment'></div>我来徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370846_comment'></div>道之悠悠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370846_comment'></div>思君为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370846_comment'></div>我如京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370846_comment'></div>君居父丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370846_comment'></div>哭泣而拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370846_comment'></div>言词不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370846_comment'></div>我归自西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370846_comment'></div>君反<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1370846", 1370846, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>吉服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370846_comment'></div>晤言无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370846_comment'></div>往复其昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370846_comment'></div>不日而违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370846_comment'></div>重我心恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370846_comment'></div>自后闻君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370846_comment'></div>母丧是丁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370846_comment'></div>痛毒之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370846_comment'></div>六年以并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370846_comment'></div>孰云孝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370846_comment'></div>而殒厥灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370846_comment'></div>今我之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370846_comment'></div>入门失声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370846_comment'></div>酒肉在前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370846_comment'></div>君胡不餐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370846_comment'></div>升君之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370846_comment'></div>不与我言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370846_comment'></div>于乎死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370846_comment'></div>何日来还。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1370846_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，在洛阳。生活困窘清闲。始拟入京之时，寄诗于侄韩老成。作品：河之水二首寄子侄老成。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河之水二首寄子侄老成<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49630")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49630_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49630_0'>① 老成，愈兄介之子，即所谓十二郎是也。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49630'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49630'>河之水，去悠悠，我不如，水东流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49630'>我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49630", 49630, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>孤侄</span>在海陬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，三年不见兮使我生忧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49630'>日复日，夜复夜，三年不见汝，使我鬓发未老而先化。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49630'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_49630_0'>⑴ 一作隅。古音隅，将侯切，亦与流通</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49630_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_37425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_37425' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/37425?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_37425_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_37425'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_37425'>河之水，悠悠去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_37425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_37425'>我不如，水东注。<div id='poem_sentence_1_37425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_37425'>我有孤侄在海浦，三年不见兮使我心苦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_37425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_37425'>采蕨于山，缗鱼于渊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_37425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_37425'>我徂京师，不远其还。<div id='poem_sentence_4_37425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_37425'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_37425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_37425'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(37425)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，闲居洛阳。回顾两入戎幕而不得遇之经历，述志抒情，有赋。作品：闵己赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（马其昶《韩昌黎文集校注》卷1。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋，闲居洛阳。送僧澄观赴临淮太守招，有诗。作品：送僧澄观。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49685?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送僧澄观<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49685")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49685_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49685_0'>① 李邕泗州普光王寺碑，僧伽者，龙朔中西来，尝纵观临淮，发念置寺。既成，中宗赐名普光王寺，以景龙四年三月二日示灭于京，后澄观建僧伽塔于泗州。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49685'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3092, "poem_allusion_49685")'>伏犀</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49685_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49685'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49685'>浮屠西来何施为，扰扰四海争奔驰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49685'>构楼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49685", 49685, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>架阁</span>切星汉，誇雄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49685", 49685, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>斗丽</span>止者谁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49685'>僧伽后出淮泗上，势到众佛尤恢奇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49685'>越商<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49685", 49685, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>胡贾</span>脱身罪，圭璧满船宁计资。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49685'>清淮无波平如席，栏柱倾扶半天赤。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49685'>火烧水转扫地空，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49685", 49685, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>突兀</span>便高三百尺。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49685'>影沈潭底龙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49685", 49685, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>惊遁</span>，当昼无云跨虚碧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49685'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49685", 49685, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>借问</span>经营本何人，道人澄观名籍籍。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49685'>愈昔从军<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49685", 49685, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>大梁</span>下，往来满屋贤豪者。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49685'>皆言澄观虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49685", 49685, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>僧徒</span>，公才<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49685", 49685, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>吏用</span>当今无。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49685'>后从徐州辟书至，纷纷过客何由记。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49685'>人言澄观乃诗人，一座竞吟诗句新。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49685'>向风长叹不可见，我欲收敛加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49685", 49685, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>冠巾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49685'>洛阳穷秋厌穷独，丁丁啄门疑啄木。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49685'>有僧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49685", 49685, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>来访</span>呼使前，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3092, id='poem_sentence_14_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49685'>惜哉已老无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_49685", 49685, id='poem_sentence_16_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49685'>好奇赏俊直难逢，去去为致思从容。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49685'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_49685_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='128312349e76474896385fa3197744a5_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>，34岁</div><div id='128312349e76474896385fa3197744a5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年3月</a>　三月，因调选未成，由长安返洛阳。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　夏秋，闲居洛阳，与诸友交游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年7月22日</a>　七月，与李景俭、侯喜、尉迟汾等同渔于温洛，宿惠林寺而归。作诗记叙此事并赠侯喜。作品：赠侯喜。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_49779' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49779' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49779?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠侯喜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（801年7月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49779")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49779_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49779_0'>① 愈贞元十七年七月二十二日，与李景兴、侯喜、尉迟汾同渔于洛，有石刻在焉，诗必是时作。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49779'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1413, "poem_allusion_49779")'>南入箕颍</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49779_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49779'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49779'>吾党侯生字叔𨑓<span class='inlineComment2'>（古起字）</span>，呼我持竿钓温水。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49779'>平明鞭马出都门，尽日行行荆棘里。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49779'>温水微茫绝又流，深如车辙阔容辀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49779'>虾蟆跳过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49779", 49779, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>雀儿</span>浴，此纵有鱼何足求。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49779'>我为侯生不能已，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49779", 49779, id='poem_sentence_6_49779'>暂动还休未可期，虾行蛭<span class='inlineComment2'>（音质）</span>渡似皆疑。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49779'>举竿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49779", 49779, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>引线</span>忽有得，一寸才分鳞与鬐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49779'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49779", 49779, id='poem_sentence_10_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49779'>人间事势岂不见，徒自辛苦终何为。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　夏秋，在洛阳闲居。侯生问《论语》，作书以答。作品：答侯生问论语书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。）</span><div id='poem_1370626' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370626' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370626?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答侯生问论语书</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370626")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370626_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370626'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370626'>愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370626_comment'></div>侯生足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370626_comment'></div>所示论语问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370626_comment'></div>甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370626_comment'></div>圣人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370626", 1370626, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>践形</span>之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370626_comment'></div>孟子详于其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370626_comment'></div>当终始究之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370626_comment'></div>若万物皆备于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370626_comment'></div>反身而诚是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370626_comment'></div>苟有伪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370626_comment'></div>则万物不备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370626_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370626", 1370626, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>践形</span>之道无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370626_comment'></div>诚是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370626_comment'></div>足下谓贤者不能<span class='link'
