id='poem_sentence_14_1370626_comment'></div>贤者非不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370626", 1370626, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>践形</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370626_comment'></div>能而不备耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370626_comment'></div>形言其备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370626_comment'></div>所谓具体而微是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370626_comment'></div>充实之谓美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370626_comment'></div>充实而有光辉之谓大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370626_comment'></div>充实则具体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370626_comment'></div>未大则微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370626_comment'></div>故或去圣一閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370626_comment'></div>或得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370626", 1370626, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>一体</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370626_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370626", 1370626, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>践形</span>而未备者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370626_comment'></div>唯反身而诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370626_comment'></div>则能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370626", 1370626, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>践形</span>之备者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370626_comment'></div>愈昔注解其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370626_comment'></div>而不敢过求其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370626_comment'></div>取圣人之旨而合之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370626_comment'></div>则足以信后生辈耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370626_comment'></div>此说甚为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370626", 1370626, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>稳当</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370626_comment'></div>切更思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370626_comment'></div>愈白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1370626_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　夏秋，在洛阳闲居。荐侯喜于汝州刺史卢虔，有荐文。作品：与汝州卢郎中荐侯喜状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷27。）</span><div id='poem_1370541' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370541' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370541?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与汝州卢郎中论荐侯喜状<span class='inlineComment2'>（进士侯喜）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370541")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370541_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370541'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370541'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370541_comment'></div>其人为文甚古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370541_comment'></div>立志甚坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370541_comment'></div>行止取舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370541_comment'></div>有士君子之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370541_comment'></div>家贫亲老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370541_comment'></div>无援于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370541_comment'></div>在举场十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370541_comment'></div>竟无知遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370541_comment'></div>愈常慕其才而恨其屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370541_comment'></div>与之还往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370541_comment'></div>岁月已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370541_comment'></div>常欲荐之于主司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370541_comment'></div>言之于上位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370541_comment'></div>名卑官贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370541_comment'></div>其路无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370541_comment'></div>观其所为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370541_comment'></div>未尝不掩卷长叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370541_comment'></div>去年愈从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370541", 1370541, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>调选</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370541_comment'></div>本欲携持同行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370541_comment'></div>适遇其人自有家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370541_comment'></div>迍邅坎轲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370541_comment'></div>又废一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370541_comment'></div>及春末自京还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370541_comment'></div>怪其久绝消息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370541_comment'></div>五月初至此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370541_comment'></div>自言为閤下所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370541_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370541", 1370541, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>辞气</span>激扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370541_comment'></div>面有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370541", 1370541, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>矜色</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370541_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370541_comment'></div>侯喜死不恨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370541_comment'></div>喜辞亲入关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370541_comment'></div>羁旅道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370541_comment'></div>见王公数百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370541_comment'></div>未尝有如卢公之知我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370541_comment'></div>比者分将委弃泥涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370541_comment'></div>老死草野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370541_comment'></div>今胸中之气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370541", 1370541, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>勃勃</span>然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370541_comment'></div>复有仕进之路矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370541_comment'></div>愈感其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370541_comment'></div>贺之以酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370541_comment'></div>谓之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370541_comment'></div>卢公天下之贤刺史也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370541_comment'></div>未闻有所推引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370541_comment'></div>盖难其人而重其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370541_comment'></div>今子郁为选首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370541_comment'></div>其言死不恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370541_comment'></div>固宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370541_comment'></div>古所谓知己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370541_comment'></div>正如此耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370541_comment'></div>身在贫贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370541_comment'></div>为天下所不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370541_comment'></div>独见遇于大贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370541_comment'></div>乃可贵耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370541_comment'></div>若自有名声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370541_comment'></div>又托形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370541_comment'></div>此乃市道之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370541_comment'></div>又何足贵乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370541_comment'></div>子之遇知于卢公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370541_comment'></div>真所谓知已者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370541_comment'></div>士之修身立节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370541_comment'></div>而竟不遇知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370541_comment'></div>前古以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370541_comment'></div>不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370541_comment'></div>或日接膝而不相知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370541_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370541", 1370541, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>异世</span>而相慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370541_comment'></div>以其遭逢之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370541_comment'></div>故曰士为知已者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370541_comment'></div>不其然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370541_comment'></div>不其然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370541_comment'></div>閤下既已知侯生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370541_comment'></div>而愈复以侯生言于閤下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370541_comment'></div>非为侯生谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370541_comment'></div>感知已之难遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370541_comment'></div>大閤下之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370541_comment'></div>而怜侯生之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370541_comment'></div>故因其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370541_comment'></div>而献于左右焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370541_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1370541_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　夏秋，在洛阳闲居。回复李翊书信，阐述古文理论。作品：答李翊书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370593' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370593' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370593?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李翊书</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370593")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370593_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370593'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370593'>六月二十六日愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370593_comment'></div>李生足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370593_comment'></div>生之书辞甚高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370593_comment'></div>而其问何下而恭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370593_comment'></div>能如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370593_comment'></div>谁不欲告生以其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370593_comment'></div>道德之归也<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370593", 1370593, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>有日</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370593_comment'></div>况其外之文乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370593_comment'></div>抑愈所谓望孔子之门墙而不入于其宫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370593_comment'></div>焉足以知是且非耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370593_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370593_comment'></div>不可不为生言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370593_comment'></div>生所谓立言者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370593_comment'></div>生所为者与所期者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370593_comment'></div>甚似而几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370593_comment'></div>抑不知生之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370593_comment'></div>蕲胜于人而取于人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370593_comment'></div>将蕲至于古之立言者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370593_comment'></div>蕲胜于人而取于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370593_comment'></div>则固胜于人而可取于人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370593_comment'></div>将蕲至于古之立言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370593_comment'></div>则无望其速成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370593_comment'></div>无诱于势利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370593_comment'></div>养其根而俟其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370593_comment'></div>加其膏而希其光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370593_comment'></div>根之茂者其实遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370593_comment'></div>膏之沃者其光煜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370593_comment'></div>仁义之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370593_comment'></div>其言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370593", 1370593, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>蔼如</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370593_comment'></div>抑又有难者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370593_comment'></div>愈之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370593_comment'></div>不自知其至犹未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370593_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370593_comment'></div>学之二十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370593_comment'></div>始者非三代两汉之书不敢观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370593_comment'></div>非圣人之志不敢存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370593_comment'></div>处若忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370593_comment'></div>行若遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370593_comment'></div>俨乎其若思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370593_comment'></div>茫乎其若迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370593_comment'></div>当其取于心而注于手也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370593_comment'></div>惟陈言之务去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370593_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370593", 1370593, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>戛戛</span>乎其难哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370593_comment'></div>其观于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370593_comment'></div>不知其非笑之为非笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370593_comment'></div>如是者亦有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370593_comment'></div>犹不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370593_comment'></div>然后识古书之正伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370593_comment'></div>与虽正而不至焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370593_comment'></div>昭昭然白黑分矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370593_comment'></div>而务去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370593_comment'></div>乃徐有得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370593_comment'></div>当其取于心而注于手也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370593_comment'></div>汨汨然来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370593_comment'></div>其观于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370593_comment'></div>笑之则以为喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370593_comment'></div>誉之则以为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370593_comment'></div>以其犹有人之说者存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370593_comment'></div>如是者亦有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370593_comment'></div>然后浩乎其沛然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370593_comment'></div>吾又惧其杂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370593_comment'></div>迎而距之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370593_comment'></div>平心而察之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370593_comment'></div>其皆醇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370593_comment'></div>然后肆焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370593_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370593_comment'></div>不可以不养也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370593_comment'></div>行之乎仁义之途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370593_comment'></div>游之乎诗书之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370593_comment'></div>无迷其途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370593_comment'></div>无绝其源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370593_comment'></div>终吾身而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370593_comment'></div>气水也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370593_comment'></div>言浮物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370593_comment'></div>水大而物之浮者大小毕浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370593_comment'></div>气之与言犹是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370593_comment'></div>气盛则言之短长与声之高下皆宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370593_comment'></div>虽如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370593_comment'></div>其敢自谓几于成乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370593_comment'></div>虽几于成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370593_comment'></div>其用于人也奚取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370593_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370593_comment'></div>待用于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370593_comment'></div>其肖于器耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370593_comment'></div>用与舍属诸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370593_comment'></div>君子则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370593_comment'></div>处心有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370593_comment'></div>行已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370593", 1370593, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>有方</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370593_comment'></div>用则施诸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370593_comment'></div>舍则传诸其徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370593_comment'></div>垂诸文而为后世法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370593_comment'></div>如是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370593_comment'></div>其亦足乐乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370593_comment'></div>其无足乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370593_comment'></div>有志乎古者希矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370593_comment'></div>志乎古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370593_comment'></div>必遗乎今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370593_comment'></div>吾诚乐而悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370593_comment'></div>亟称其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370593_comment'></div>所以劝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370593_comment'></div>非敢褒其可褒而贬其可贬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370593_comment'></div>问于愈者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370593_comment'></div>念生之言不志乎利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370593_comment'></div>聊相为言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370593_comment'></div>愈白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_104_1370593_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　夏秋，在洛阳闲居。接李翊回信后，再次写信回复之。作品：重答李翊书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370593' id='poem_sentence_76_1370593_comment'></div>虽如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370593_comment'></div>其敢自谓几于成乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370593_comment'></div>虽几于成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370593_comment'></div>其用于人也奚取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370593_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370593_comment'></div>待用于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370593_comment'></div>其肖于器耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370593_comment'></div>用与舍属诸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370593_comment'></div>君子则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370593_comment'></div>处心有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370593_comment'></div>行已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370593", 1370593, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>有方</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370593_comment'></div>用则施诸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370593_comment'></div>舍则传诸其徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370593_comment'></div>垂诸文而为后世法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370593_comment'></div>如是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370593_comment'></div>其亦足乐乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370593_comment'></div>其无足乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370593_comment'></div>有志乎古者希矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370593_comment'></div>志乎古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370593_comment'></div>必遗乎今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370593_comment'></div>吾诚乐而悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370593_comment'></div>亟称其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370593_comment'></div>所以劝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370593_comment'></div>非敢褒其可褒而贬其可贬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370593_comment'></div>问于愈者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370593_comment'></div>念生之言不志乎利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370593_comment'></div>聊相为言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370593_comment'></div>愈白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_104_1370593_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　夏秋，在洛阳闲居。尉迟汾问作文之法，作书答之。作品：答尉迟生书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370585' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370585' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370585?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答尉迟生书</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370585")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370585_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370585'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370585'>愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370585_comment'></div>尉迟生足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370585_comment'></div>夫所谓文者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370585_comment'></div>必有诸其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370585_comment'></div>是故君子慎其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370585_comment'></div>实之美恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370585_comment'></div>其发也不掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370585_comment'></div>本深而末茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370585_comment'></div>形大而声宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370585_comment'></div>行峻而言厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370585_comment'></div>心醇而气和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370585_comment'></div>昭晰者无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370585_comment'></div>优游者有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370585_comment'></div>体不备不可以为成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370585_comment'></div>辞不足不可以为成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370585_comment'></div>愈之所闻者如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370585_comment'></div>有问于愈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370585_comment'></div>亦以是对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370585_comment'></div>今吾子所为皆善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370585_comment'></div>谦谦然若不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370585_comment'></div>而以徵于愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370585_comment'></div>愈又敢有爱于言乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370585_comment'></div>抑所能言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370585_comment'></div>皆古之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370585_comment'></div>古之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370585_comment'></div>不足以取于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370585_comment'></div>吾子何其爱之异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370585_comment'></div>贤公卿大夫在上比肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370585_comment'></div>始进之贤士在下比肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370585_comment'></div>彼其得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370585_comment'></div>必有以取之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370585_comment'></div>子欲仕乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370585_comment'></div>其往问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370585_comment'></div>皆可学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370585_comment'></div>若独有爱于是而非仕之谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370585_comment'></div>则愈也尝学之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370585_comment'></div>请继今以言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370585_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　本年，在洛阳。窦平作为从事随赵植赴任广州刺史，窦牟聚集洛阳能文者二十八人赋诗赠之，韩愈亦为之作序文。作品：送窦从事序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370640?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送窦从事序</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370640")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370640'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370640'>踰瓯闽而南。皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370640", 1370640, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>百越</span>之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370640_comment'></div>于天文。其次星纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370640_comment'></div>其星牵牛。连山隔其阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370640_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370640", 1370640, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>钜海</span>敌其阳。是维岛居卉服之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370640_comment'></div>风气之殊。著自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370640", 1370640, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>古昔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370640_comment'></div>唐之有天下。号令之所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370640_comment'></div>无异于远近。民俗既迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370640_comment'></div>风气亦随。雪霜时降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370640_comment'></div>疠疫不兴。濒海之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370640_comment'></div>固加于初。是以人之之南海者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370640_comment'></div>若东西州焉。皇帝临天下二十有二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370640_comment'></div>诏工部侍郎赵植为广州刺史。尽牧南海之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370640_comment'></div>署从事扶风窦平。平以文辞进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370640_comment'></div>于其行也。其族人殿中侍御史牟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370640_comment'></div>合东都交游之能文者二十有八人。赋诗以赠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370640_comment'></div>于是昌黎韩愈嘉赵南海之能得人。壮从事之答于知我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370640_comment'></div>不惮行之远也。又乐贻周之爱其族叔父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370640_comment'></div>能合文辞以宠荣之。作送窦从事少府平序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370640_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1370640_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　本年，在洛阳。送李愿归盘谷，作序文。盘谷在怀州太行山，属孟州济源县。作品：送李愿归盘谷序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷9。）</span><div id='poem_1370643' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370643")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370643_comment'></div>盘谷之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370643_comment'></div>泉甘而土肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370643_comment'></div><span "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>丛茂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370643_comment'></div>居民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370643", 1370643, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>鲜少</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370643_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370643_comment'></div>谓其环两山之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370643_comment'></div>故曰盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370643_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370643_comment'></div>是谷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370643_comment'></div>宅幽而势阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370643_comment'></div>隐者之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370643", 1370643, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>友人</span>李愿居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370643_comment'></div>愿之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370643_comment'></div>人之称大丈夫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370643_comment'></div>我知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370643_comment'></div>利泽施于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370643_comment'></div>名声昭于时。<div "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>形势</span>之途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370643_comment'></div>足将进而趑趄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370643_comment'></div>口将言而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370643", 1370643, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>嗫嚅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370643_comment'></div>处秽污而不羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370643_comment'></div>触刑辟而诛戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370643_comment'></div>徼倖于万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370643_comment'></div>老死而后止者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370643_comment'></div>其于为人贤不肖何如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370643_comment'></div>昌黎韩愈闻其言而壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370643_comment'></div>与之酒而为之歌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370643_comment'></div>盘之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370643_comment'></div>维子之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370643_comment'></div>盘之土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370643_comment'></div>可以稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370643_comment'></div>盘之泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370643_comment'></div>可濯可沿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370643_comment'></div>盘之阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370643_comment'></div>谁争子所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370643_comment'></div>窈而深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370643_comment'></div>廓其有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370643_comment'></div>缭而曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370643_comment'></div>如往而复。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　本年，在洛阳。应请为李翱祖父、原贝州司法参军李楚金作墓志铭。作品：故贝州司法参军李君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷24。）</span><div id='poem_1370777' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370777' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370777?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贝州司法参军李君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370777")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370777_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370777'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370777'>贞元十七年九月丁卯。陇西李翱合葬其皇祖考贝州司法参军楚金皇祖妣清河崔氏夫人于汴州开封县某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370777_comment'></div>昌黎韩愈纪其世。著其德行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370777_comment'></div>以识其葬。其世曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370777_comment'></div>由梁武昭王六世至司空。司空之后二世为刺史清渊侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370777_comment'></div>由侯至于贝州。凡五世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370777_comment'></div>其德行曰。事其兄如事其父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370777_comment'></div>其行不敢有出焉。其夫人事其姒如事其姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370777_comment'></div>其于家不敢有专焉。其在贝州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370777_comment'></div>其刺史不悦于民。将去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370777_comment'></div>民相率欢哗。手瓦石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370777_comment'></div>胥其出击之。刺史匿不敢出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370777_comment'></div>州县吏由别驾以下不敢禁。司法君奋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370777_comment'></div>是何敢尔。属小吏百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370777_comment'></div>持兵仗以出。立木而署之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370777_comment'></div>刺史出。民有敢观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370777_comment'></div>杀之木下。民闻皆惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370777_comment'></div>相告散去。后刺史至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370777_comment'></div>加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370777", 1370777, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>擢任</span>。贝州由是大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370777_comment'></div>其葬曰。翱既迁贝州君之丧于贝州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370777_comment'></div>殡于开封。遂迁夫人之丧于楚州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370777_comment'></div>八月辛亥。至于开封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370777_comment'></div>圹于丁巳。坟于九月辛酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370777_comment'></div>窆于丁卯。人谓李氏世家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370777_comment'></div>侯之后五世。仕不遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370777_comment'></div>蕴必发。其起而大乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370777_comment'></div>四十年而其兄之子衡始至户部侍郎。君之子四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370777_comment'></div>官又卑。翱其孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370777_comment'></div>有道而甚文。固于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370777_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1370777_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　本年，在洛阳。接杨敬之文章五篇，作书以答。作品：答杨子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370586?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答杨子书</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370586")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370586'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370586'>辱书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370586_comment'></div>并示表记述书辞等五篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370586_comment'></div>比于东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370586_comment'></div>略见颜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370586_comment'></div>未得接言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370586_comment'></div>心固已相奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370586_comment'></div>但不敢果于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370586", 1370586, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>貌定</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370586_comment'></div>知人尧舜所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370586_comment'></div>又尝服宰予之诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370586_comment'></div>故未敢决然挹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370586_comment'></div>亦不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370586", 1370586, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>忽然</span>忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370586_comment'></div>到城以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370586_comment'></div>不多与人还往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370586_comment'></div>友朋之中所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370586", 1370586, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>敬信</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370586_comment'></div>平昌孟东野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370586_comment'></div>东野吃吃说足下不离口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370586_comment'></div>崔大敦诗不多见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370586_comment'></div>每每说人物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370586_comment'></div>亦以足下为处子之秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370586_comment'></div>近又得李七翱书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370586_comment'></div>亦云足下之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370586_comment'></div>远其兄甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370586_comment'></div>夫以平昌之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370586_comment'></div>其言一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370586_comment'></div>固足信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370586_comment'></div>况又崔与李继至而交说耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370586_comment'></div>故不待相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370586_comment'></div>相信已熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370586_comment'></div>既相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370586_comment'></div>不要约已相亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370586_comment'></div>审知足下之才充其容也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370586_comment'></div>今辱书乃云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370586_comment'></div>是所谓以黄金注重外而内惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370586_comment'></div>然恐足下少年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370586_comment'></div>与仆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370586", 1370586, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>老者</span>不相类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370586_comment'></div>尚须验以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370586_comment'></div>故具白所以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370586_comment'></div>而今而后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370586_comment'></div>不置疑于其閒可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370586_comment'></div>若曰长育人才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370586_comment'></div>则有天子之大臣在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370586_comment'></div>若仆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370586_comment'></div>守一官且不足以修理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370586_comment'></div>况如是重任耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370586_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370586", 1370586, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>学问</span>有暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370586_comment'></div>幸时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370586", 1370586, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>见临</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370586_comment'></div>愈白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1370586_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　本年，在洛阳。作文记述与祠部员外郎陆傪就荐贤用人等问题所讨论之内容。作品：行难。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷1。张贞元十八年，159。）</span><div id='poem_1370718' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370718' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370718?labeling=true' target='_blank'>行难</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370718")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370718_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370718'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370718'>或问行孰难。曰舍我之矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370718_comment'></div>从尔之称。孰能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370718_comment'></div>曰陆先生参何如。曰先生之贤闻天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370718_comment'></div>是是而非非。贞元中自越州徵拜祠部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370718_comment'></div>京师之人日造焉。闭门而拒之满街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370718_comment'></div>愈尝往閒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370718", 1370718, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>客席</span>。先生矜语其客曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370718_comment'></div>某胥也。某商也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370718_comment'></div>其生某任之。其死某诔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370718_comment'></div>某与某何人也。任与诔也非罪欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370718_comment'></div>皆曰然。愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370718_comment'></div>某之胥。某之商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370718_comment'></div>其得任与诔也有由乎。抑有罪不足任而诔之邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370718_comment'></div>先生曰否。吾恶其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370718_comment'></div>不然。任与诔也何尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370718_comment'></div>愈曰。苟如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370718_comment'></div>先生之言过矣。昔者管敬子取盗二人为大夫于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370718_comment'></div>赵文子举管库之士七十有馀家。夫恶求其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370718_comment'></div>先生曰不然。彼之取者贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370718_comment'></div>愈曰。先生之所谓贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370718_comment'></div>大贤欤。抑贤于人之贤欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370718_comment'></div>齐也晋也。且有二与七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370718_comment'></div>而可谓今之天下无其人邪。先生之选人也已详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370718_comment'></div>先生曰然。愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370718_comment'></div>圣人不世出。贤人不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370718", 1370718, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>时出</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370718_comment'></div>千百岁之閒傥有焉。不幸而有出于胥商之族者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370718_comment'></div>先生之说传。吾不忍赤子之不得乳于其母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370718_comment'></div>先生曰然。他日又往坐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370718_comment'></div>先生曰。今之用人也不详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370718_comment'></div>位乎朝者。吾取某与某而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370718_comment'></div>在下者多于朝。凡吾与者若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370718_comment'></div>愈曰。先生之与者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370718_comment'></div>尽于此乎。其皆贤乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370718_comment'></div>抑犹有举其多而缺其少乎。先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370718_comment'></div>固然。吾敢求其全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370718_comment'></div>愈曰。由宰相至百执事凡几位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370718_comment'></div>由一方至一州凡几位。先生之得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370718_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370718", 1370718, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>无乃</span>不足充其位邪。不早图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370718_comment'></div>一朝而举焉。今虽详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370718_comment'></div>其后用也必粗。先生曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370718_comment'></div>子之言。孟轲不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370718_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370718_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　本年，在洛阳。作文就春秋时“获麟”一事发表己见，后李翱曾以文示陆傪。作品：获麟解。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370707' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370707' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370707?labeling=true' target='_blank'>获麟解</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370707")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370707_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370707'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370707'>麟之为灵昭昭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370707_comment'></div>咏于诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370707_comment'></div>书于春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370707_comment'></div>杂出于传记百家之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370707_comment'></div>虽妇人小子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370707_comment'></div>皆知其为祥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370707_comment'></div>然麟之为物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370707_comment'></div>不畜于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370707_comment'></div>不恒有于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370707_comment'></div>其为形也不类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370707_comment'></div>非若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370707", 1370707, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>马牛</span>犬豕豺狼麋鹿然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370707_comment'></div>然则虽有麟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370707_comment'></div>不可知其为麟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370707_comment'></div>角者吾知其为牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370707_comment'></div>鬣者吾知其为马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370707_comment'></div>犬豕豺狼麋鹿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370707_comment'></div>吾知其为犬豕豺狼麋鹿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370707_comment'></div>惟麟也不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370707_comment'></div>不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370707_comment'></div>则其谓之不祥也亦宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370707_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370707_comment'></div>麟之出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370707_comment'></div>必有圣人在乎位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370707_comment'></div>麟为圣人出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370707_comment'></div>圣人者必知麟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370707_comment'></div>麟之果不为不祥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370707_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370707_comment'></div>麟之所以为麟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370707_comment'></div>以德不以形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370707_comment'></div>若麟之出不待圣人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370707_comment'></div>则谓之不祥也亦宜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1370707_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='55bcb3baa148498eb6be6d95957c2e5f_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>，35岁</div><div id='55bcb3baa148498eb6be6d95957c2e5f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年3月</a>　在长安任四门博士。春，赴洛阳接家属来长安居住。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='623de3c8ef2e4fdbba80322c17a6e494_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=808')">807-808年</a>，40-41岁</div><div id='623de3c8ef2e4fdbba80322c17a6e494' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年6月</a>　六月，去京就洛，请分司东都。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　在洛阳，任国子博士。答同年好友冯宿之书信。作品：答冯宿书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370604' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370604' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370604?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答冯宿书</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370604")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370604_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370604'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370604'>垂示仆所阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370604_comment'></div>非情之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370604_comment'></div>仆安得闻此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370604_comment'></div>朋友道阙绝久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370604_comment'></div>无有相箴规<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370604", 1370604, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>磨切</span>之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370604_comment'></div>仆何幸乃得吾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370604_comment'></div>仆常闵时俗人有耳不自闻其过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370604_comment'></div>懔懔然惟恐已之不自闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370604_comment'></div>而今而后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370604_comment'></div>有望于吾子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370604_comment'></div>然足下与仆交久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370604_comment'></div>仆之所守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370604_comment'></div>足下之所熟知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370604_comment'></div>在京城时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370604_comment'></div>嚣嚣之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370604_comment'></div>相訾百倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370604_comment'></div>足下时与仆居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370604_comment'></div>朝夕同出入起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370604_comment'></div>亦见仆有不善乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370604_comment'></div>然仆退而思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370604_comment'></div>虽无以获罪于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370604_comment'></div>亦有以获罪于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370604_comment'></div>仆在京城一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370604_comment'></div>不一至贵人之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370604_comment'></div>人之所趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370604_comment'></div>仆之所傲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370604_comment'></div>与己合者则从之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370604_comment'></div>不合者虽造吾庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370604_comment'></div>未尝与之坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370604_comment'></div>此岂徒足致谤而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370604_comment'></div>不戮于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370604_comment'></div>则幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370604_comment'></div>追思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370604_comment'></div>可为战慄寒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370604_comment'></div>故至此已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370604_comment'></div>剋已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370604", 1370604, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>自下</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370604_comment'></div>虽不肖人至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370604_comment'></div>未尝敢以貌慢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370604_comment'></div>况时所尚者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370604_comment'></div>以此自谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370604_comment'></div>庶几无时患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370604_comment'></div>不知犹复云云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370604_comment'></div>闻流言不信其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370604_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370604_comment'></div>不复有斯人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370604_comment'></div>君子不为小人之恟恟而易其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370604_comment'></div>仆何能尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370604_comment'></div>委曲从顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370604_comment'></div>向风承意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370604_comment'></div>汲汲然恐不得合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370604_comment'></div>犹且不免云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370604_comment'></div>命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370604_comment'></div>可如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370604_comment'></div>然子路闻其过则喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370604_comment'></div>禹闻昌言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370604_comment'></div>则下车拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370604_comment'></div>古人有言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370604_comment'></div>告我以吾过者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370604_comment'></div>吾之师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370604_comment'></div>愿足下不惮烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370604_comment'></div>苟有所闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370604_comment'></div>必以相告吾亦有以报子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370604_comment'></div>不敢虚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370604_comment'></div>不敢忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370604_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1370604_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　七八月间，在洛阳任国子博士。。为妻兄卢于陵作墓志铭。卢卒于五月戊辰。作品：处士卢君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷24。）</span><div id='poem_1370778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处士卢君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370778")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370778'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370778'>处士讳于陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370778_comment'></div>其先范阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370778_comment'></div>父贻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370778_comment'></div>为河南法曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370778_comment'></div>河南尹与人有仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370778_comment'></div>诬仇与贼通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370778_comment'></div>收掠取服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370778_comment'></div>法曹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370778_comment'></div>我官司也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370778_comment'></div>我在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370778_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370778", 1370778, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>可以</span>为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370778_comment'></div>廷争之以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370778_comment'></div>河南怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370778_comment'></div>命卒捽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370778_comment'></div>法曹争尤强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370778_comment'></div>遂并收法曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370778_comment'></div>竟奏杀仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370778_comment'></div>籍其家而释法曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370778_comment'></div>法曹出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370778_comment'></div>径归卧家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370778_comment'></div>念河南势弗可败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370778_comment'></div>气愤弗食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370778_comment'></div>呕血卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370778_comment'></div>东都人至今犹道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370778_comment'></div>处士少而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370778_comment'></div>母夫人怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370778_comment'></div>读书学文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370778_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370778", 1370778, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>不待</span>强教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370778_comment'></div>卒以自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370778_comment'></div>在母夫人侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370778_comment'></div>油油翼翼不忍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370778_comment'></div>时岁母夫人既终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370778_comment'></div>育幼弟与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370778", 1370778, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>归宗</span>之妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370778_comment'></div>经营勤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370778_comment'></div>未暇进仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370778_comment'></div>年三十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370778_comment'></div>元和二年五月壬辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370778_comment'></div>以疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370778_comment'></div>有男十岁曰义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370778_comment'></div>女九岁曰孟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370778_comment'></div>又有女生处士卒后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370778_comment'></div><span id='poem_sentence_43_1370778_comment'></div>葬以车一乘于龙门山先人兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370778_comment'></div>愈于处士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370778_comment'></div>妹婿也。<div id='poem_sentence_48_1370778_comment'></div>贵兮富兮如其材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370778_comment'></div>得何数兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370778_comment'></div>名兮寿兮如其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370778_comment'></div>岂无有兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370778_comment'></div>彼皆逢其臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370778_comment'></div>子独迎其凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370778_comment'></div>兹命也耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370778_comment'></div>兹命也耶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1370778_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　秋，分司于东都洛阳任国子博士。。时裴度为河南府功曹，曾赠韩愈诗，韩有诗回赠。作品：酬裴十六功曹巡府西驿途中见寄。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49754' class='authorDate'>（807年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49754")'>韩愈</a></span><br 裴十六，度也，监察御史出为河南府功曹，时故相郑馀庆为河南尹。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49754'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(246, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年12月</a>　十二月，在洛阳任国子博士。。受苗藩妻之请，为苗作墓志铭。苗卒于二月六日。作品：太原参军苗君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370809' id='poem_sentence_1_1370791_comment'></div>视汝如生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370791_comment'></div>迁汝居兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370791_comment'></div>日月之良。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　春初，在洛阳任国子博士。孟郊幼子夭折，韩愈写诗安慰。作品：孟东野失子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49623' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49623' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49623?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孟东野失子</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49623")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49623_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49623'>东野连产三子，不数日，辄失之。几老，念无后以悲，其友人昌黎韩愈，惧其伤也，推天假其命以喻之。</div><div id='poem_preface_49623_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49623'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6297, id='poem_sentence_1_49623'>女实主下人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49623", 49623, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>与夺</span>一何偏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49623_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49623'>彼于女何有，乃令蕃且延。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49623_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=809')">808-809年</a>，41-42岁</div><div id='30892566bd524481a5c362da77509059' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　春，在洛阳任国子博士。赠唐衢诗，表同情问慰之情。作品：赠唐衢。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49780' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49780' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49780?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠唐衢<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49780")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49780_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49780_0'>① 衢应进士，久而不第。能为歌诗，见人文章有所伤叹者，读讫必哭。每与人言论，既别，发声一号，音辞哀切，闻者莫不泣下，故世称唐衢善哭。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49780'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49780'>虎有爪兮牛有角，虎可搏兮牛可触。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49780'>奈何君独抱奇材，手把锄犁饿空谷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49780'>当今天子急贤良，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49780", 49780, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>匦函</span>朝出开明光。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49780'>胡不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49780", 49780, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>上书</span>自荐达，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49780", 49780, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>坐令</span>四海如虞唐。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49780'></div><div class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370798' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370798' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370798?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河南少尹裴君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370798'>公讳复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370798_comment'></div>字茂绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370798_comment'></div>河东人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370798_comment'></div>曾大父元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370798_comment'></div>大理正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370798_comment'></div>大父旷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370798_comment'></div>御史中丞京畿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370798", 1370798, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>采访使</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370798_comment'></div>父虬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370798_comment'></div>以有气略敢谏诤为谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370798_comment'></div>引正大疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370798_comment'></div>有宠代宗朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370798_comment'></div>屡辞官不肯拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370798_comment'></div>卒赠工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370798_comment'></div>公举贤良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370798_comment'></div>拜同官尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370798_comment'></div>仆射南阳公开府徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370798_comment'></div>召公主书记。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1370798_comment'></div>累迁至刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370798_comment'></div>疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370798_comment'></div>改河南少尹。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年9月</a>　九月，任国子博士。在洛阳城洛桥边设祖席，为王涯徙袁州刺史送行，有诗。作品：祖席——前字、秋字。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49513' /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　本年，在洛阳任国子博士。约于本年，作诗安慰皇甫湜被贬陆浑尉。作品：寄皇甫湜。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49704' "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>善幻</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49706'>三年国子师，肠肚习<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_49706", 49706, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>藜苋</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_49706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49706'>谋拙日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_49706", 49706, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>焦拳</span>，<span class='link' class='inlineComment2'>（普患切）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_49706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49706'>为官不<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_28_49706'>岁穷寒气骄，冰雪滑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_49706", 49706, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>磴栈</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_49706'>音问难屡通，何由觌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_49706", 49706, id='poem_note_49706_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　本年，在洛阳为国子博士。答举子陈商，有书信。作品：答陈商书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_1370614' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370614' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370614?labeling=true' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370614_comment'></div>三四读尚不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370614", 1370614, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>通晓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370614_comment'></div>无过人知识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370614_comment'></div>且喻以所守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370614_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370614", 1370614, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>幸甚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370614_comment'></div>愈敢不吐情实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370614_comment'></div>然自识其不足补吾子所须也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370614_comment'></div>齐王好竽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370614_comment'></div>有求仕于齐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370614_comment'></div>操瑟而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370614_comment'></div>立王之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370614_comment'></div>三年不得入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370614_comment'></div>叱曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370614_comment'></div>吾瑟鼓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370614_comment'></div>能使鬼神上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370614_comment'></div>吾鼓瑟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370614_comment'></div>合轩辕氏之律吕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370614_comment'></div>客骂之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370614_comment'></div>王好竽而子鼓瑟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370614_comment'></div>虽工如王不好何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370614_comment'></div>是所谓工于瑟而不工于求齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370614_comment'></div>今举进士于此世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370614_comment'></div>求禄利行道于此世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370614_comment'></div>而为文必使一世人不好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370614_comment'></div>得无与操瑟立齐门者比欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370614_comment'></div>文虽工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370614_comment'></div>不利于求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370614_comment'></div>求不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370614_comment'></div>则怒且怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370614_comment'></div>不知君子必尔为不也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370614_comment'></div>故区区之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370614_comment'></div>每有来访者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370614_comment'></div>皆有意于不肖者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370614_comment'></div>略不辞让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370614_comment'></div>遂尽言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370614_comment'></div>惟吾子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370614", 1370614, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>谅察</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370614_comment'></div>愈白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370614_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年12月</a>　十二月，在洛阳任国子博士。作书赠少室李渤，促其出山接受征召。作品：与少室李拾遗书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷32。）</span><div id='poem_1370627' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370627' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370627?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与少室李拾遗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370627")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370627_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370627'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370627'>十二月某日。愈顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370627_comment'></div>伏承天恩。诏河南敦喻拾遗公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370627_comment'></div>朝廷之士。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>引颈</span>东望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370627_comment'></div>若景星凤凰之始见也。争先睹之为快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370627_comment'></div>方今天子仁圣。小大之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370627_comment'></div>皆出宰相。乐善言如不得闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370627_comment'></div>自即大位已来。于今四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370627_comment'></div>凡所施者。无不得宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370627_comment'></div>勤俭之声。宽大之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370627_comment'></div>幽闺妇女。草野小人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370627_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>饱闻</span>而厌道之。愈不通于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370627_comment'></div>请问先生。世非太平之运欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370627_comment'></div>加又有非人力而至者。年谷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>熟衍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370627_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>符贶</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>委至</span>。干纪之奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370627_comment'></div>不战而拘累。强梁之凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370627_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>销铄</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>缩栗</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>迎风</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>委伏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370627_comment'></div>其有一事未就正。自视若不成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370627_comment'></div>四海之所环。无一夫甲而兵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370627_comment'></div>若此时也。拾遗公不疾起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370627_comment'></div>与天下之士君子乐成而享之。斯无时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370627_comment'></div>昔者孔子知不可为而为之不已。足迹接于诸侯之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370627_comment'></div>今可为之时。自藏深山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370627_comment'></div>牢关而固距。即与仁义者异守矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370627_comment'></div>想拾遗公冠带就车。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>惠然肯来</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370627_comment'></div>抒所蓄积。以补缀盛德之有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>阙遗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370627_comment'></div>利加于时。名垂于将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370627_comment'></div>踊跃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>悚企</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>倾刻</span>以冀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370627_comment'></div>又窃闻朝廷之议。必起拾遗公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370627_comment'></div>使者往。若不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370627_comment'></div>即河南必继以行。拾遗徵君若不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370627_comment'></div>必加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>高秩</span>。如是则辞少就多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370627_comment'></div>伤于廉而害于义。拾遗公必不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370627_comment'></div>善人斯进其类。皆有望于拾遗公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370627_comment'></div>拾遗公傥不为起。是使众善人不与斯人施也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370627_comment'></div>由拾遗公而使天子不尽得良臣。君子不尽得显位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370627_comment'></div>人庶不尽被<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>惠利</span>。其害不为细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370627_comment'></div>必望<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>审察</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370627", 1370627, "Clauses/72/Comments/1")'>远思</span>之。务使合于孔子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370627_comment'></div>幸甚。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370627_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1370627_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　在洛阳任国子博士。约于此年，有诗《知音者诚希》，大抵为孟郊作。作品：知音者诚希。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。张清华《韩愈年谱汇证》，贞元十四年，102页。）</span><div id='poem_49634' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49634' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49634?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_2_49634'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49634_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年1月19日</a>　正月丙申，在洛阳任国子博士。与孟郊等至洛阳东景云山，送李翱赴任岭南，有诗送行。作品：送李翱。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_49675' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49675' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49675?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李翱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span 翱娶愈兄弇之女，与愈善。杨于陵为广州刺史，表翱佐其府。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49675'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49675'>广州万里途，山重江逶迤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49675_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49675'>行行何时到，谁能定归期。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49675_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49675_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49675'>虽云有追<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作迎）</span>送，<span class='link'
