ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年闰3月21日</a>　闰三月二十一日，在洛阳任国子博士。与侯继等人一起，祭友人薛公达之文。作品：祭薛助教文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370848' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370848' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370848?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭薛助教文</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年闰3月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370848")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370848_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370848'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370848'>维元和四年岁次己丑后三月二十一日景寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370848_comment'></div>朝散郎守国子博士韩愈太学助教侯继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370848_comment'></div>谨以清酌之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370848_comment'></div>祭于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370848", 1370848, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>亡友</span>国子助教薛君之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370848_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370848_comment'></div>吾徒学而不见施设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370848_comment'></div>禄又不足以活身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370848_comment'></div>天于此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370848_comment'></div>夺其友人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370848_comment'></div>同官太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370848_comment'></div>日得相因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370848_comment'></div>奈何永违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370848_comment'></div>祗隔数晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370848_comment'></div>笑语为别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370848_comment'></div>恸哭来门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370848_comment'></div>藏棺蔽帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370848_comment'></div>欲见无缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370848_comment'></div>皎皎眉目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370848_comment'></div>在人目前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370848_comment'></div>酌以告诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370848_comment'></div>庶几有神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370848_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370848_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1370848_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　四五月间，在洛阳任国子博士。作祭薛公达文之后，又为之作墓志铭。薛五月十五日葬。作品：国子助教河东薛君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370799' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370799' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370799?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国子助教河东薛君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370799")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370799_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370799'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370799'>君讳公达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370799_comment'></div>字大顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370799_comment'></div>薛姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370799_comment'></div>曾祖曰希庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370799_comment'></div>抚州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370799_comment'></div>赠大理卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370799_comment'></div>祖曰元晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370799_comment'></div>果州流溪县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370799_comment'></div>赠左散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370799_comment'></div>父曰播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370799_comment'></div>尚书礼部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370799_comment'></div>侍郎命君后兄据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370799_comment'></div>据为尚书水部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370799_comment'></div>赠给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370799_comment'></div>君少气高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370799_comment'></div>为文有气力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370799_comment'></div>务出于奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370799_comment'></div>以不同俗为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370799_comment'></div>始举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370799_comment'></div>不与先辈揖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370799_comment'></div>作胡马及圜丘诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370799_comment'></div>京师人未见其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370799_comment'></div>皆口相传以熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370799_comment'></div>及擢第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370799_comment'></div>补家令主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370799_comment'></div>佐凤翔军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370799_comment'></div>军帅武人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370799_comment'></div>君为作书奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370799_comment'></div>读不识句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370799_comment'></div>传一幕以为笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370799_comment'></div>不为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370799_comment'></div>后九月九日大会射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370799_comment'></div>设标的高出百数十尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370799_comment'></div>令曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370799_comment'></div>中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370799_comment'></div>酬锦与金若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370799_comment'></div>一军尽射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370799_comment'></div>莫能中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370799_comment'></div>君执弓腰二矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370799_comment'></div>指一矢以兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370799_comment'></div>揖其帅曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370799_comment'></div>请以为公欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370799_comment'></div>遂适射所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370799_comment'></div>一座皆起随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370799_comment'></div>射三发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370799_comment'></div>连三中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370799_comment'></div>的坏不可复射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370799_comment'></div>中辄一军大呼以笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370799_comment'></div>连三大呼笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370799_comment'></div>帅益不喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370799_comment'></div>即自免去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370799_comment'></div>后佐河阳军任事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370799_comment'></div>去害兴利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370799_comment'></div>功为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370799_comment'></div>拜协律郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370799_comment'></div>益弃奇与人为同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370799_comment'></div>今天子修太学官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370799_comment'></div>有公卿言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370799_comment'></div>诏拜国子助教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370799_comment'></div>分教东都生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370799_comment'></div>元和四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370799_comment'></div>年三十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370799_comment'></div>二月十四日疾暴卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370799_comment'></div>君再娶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370799_comment'></div>初娶琅邪王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370799_comment'></div>后娶京兆韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370799_comment'></div>凡产四男五女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370799_comment'></div>男生辄即死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370799_comment'></div>自给事至君后再绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370799_comment'></div>皆有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370799_comment'></div>遗言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370799_comment'></div>以公仪之子已已后我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370799_comment'></div>其年闰三月廿一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370799_comment'></div>弟试太子通事舍人公仪京兆府司录公干以君之丧归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370799_comment'></div>以五月十五日葬于京兆府万年县少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370799_comment'></div>合祔王夫人茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370799_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370799_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_77_1370799'>宦不遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370799_comment'></div>归讥于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370799_comment'></div>身不得年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370799_comment'></div>又将尤谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370799_comment'></div>世再绝而绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370799_comment'></div>祭以不隳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1370799_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年4月</a>　三四月间，在洛阳任国子博士。为唐充妻卢氏作墓志铭。卢氏与韩愈妻乃同母姐妹，正月卒，四月葬河南府河南县大石山下。作品：河南缑氏主簿唐充妻卢氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷25。）</span><div id='poem_1370783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370783?labeling=true' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49681", 49681, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>迁满</span>一已异，乖离坐难凭。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49681'>行行事结束，人马何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_49681", 49681, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>蹻腾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49681'>感激生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49681", 49681, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>胆勇</span>，从军岂尝曾。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49681'>洸洸司徒公<span id='poem_sentence_19_49681'>河北兵未进<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，蔡州师新薨<span class='inlineComment2'>（吴少诚卒，弟少阳自称留后）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49681_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_note_49681'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_49681_0'>⑴ 时讨王承宗，吐突承璀督师，逗留不进</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49681_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年6月10日</a>　六月十日，韩愈由国子博士改为尚书都官员外郎，仍分司东都。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年7月</a>　七月，在洛阳任都官员外郎。为元稹妻韦丛作墓志铭。韦氏七月九日卒，十月葬咸阳。作品：监察御史元君妻京兆韦氏夫人墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370800' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370800' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370800?labeling=true' target='_blank'>监察御史元君妻京兆韦氏夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370800'>夫人讳丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370800_comment'></div>字茂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370800_comment'></div>姓韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370800_comment'></div>其上七世祖父封龙门公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370800_comment'></div>龙门之后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370800_comment'></div>率相继为显官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370800_comment'></div>夫人曾祖父讳伯阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370800_comment'></div>自万年令为太原少尹副留守北都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370800_comment'></div>卒赠秘书监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370800_comment'></div>其大王父迢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370800_comment'></div>以都官郎为岭南军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370800_comment'></div>卒赠同州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370800_comment'></div>王考夏卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370800_comment'></div>以太子少保卒赠左仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370800_comment'></div>仆射娶裴氏皋女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370800_comment'></div>皋为给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370800_comment'></div>皋父宰相耀卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370800_comment'></div>夫人于仆射为季女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370800_comment'></div>爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370800_comment'></div>选婿得今御史河南元稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370800_comment'></div>稹时始以选校书秘书省中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370800_comment'></div>其后遂以能直言策第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370800_comment'></div>拜左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370800_comment'></div>果直言失官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370800_comment'></div>又起为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370800_comment'></div>举职无所顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370800_comment'></div>夫人固前受教于贤父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370800_comment'></div>得其良夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370800_comment'></div>又及教于先姑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370800_comment'></div>率所事所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370800_comment'></div>皆从仪法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370800_comment'></div>年二十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370800_comment'></div>以元和四年七月九日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370800_comment'></div>卒三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370800_comment'></div>得其年之十月十三日葬咸阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370800_comment'></div>从先舅姑兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370800_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370800_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1370800'>诗歌硕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370800_comment'></div>爰叙宗亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370800_comment'></div>女子之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370800_comment'></div>有以荣身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370800_comment'></div>夫人之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370800_comment'></div>累公累卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370800_comment'></div>有赫外祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370800_comment'></div>相我唐明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370800_comment'></div>归逢其良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370800_comment'></div>夫夫妇妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370800_comment'></div>独不与年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370800_comment'></div>而卒以夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370800_comment'></div>实生五子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370800_comment'></div>一女之存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370800_comment'></div>铭于好辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370800_comment'></div>以永于闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370800_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年9月22日</a>　九月，在洛阳任都官员外郎。迎杜兼、李宗闵、牛僧孺、郑伯义等人奉诏祠济渎归，并陪众人游宿，留此题名。作品：迓杜兼题名。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。）</span><div id='poem_1370735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>迓杜兼题名</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_1370735_comment'></div>前同州韩城县尉郑伯义。元和四年九月二十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370735_comment'></div>大尹给事奉诏祠济渎回。愈与二判官于此迎候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370735_comment'></div>遂陪游宿。愈题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370735_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1370735_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>丽句</span>不可继，见寄聊且慰分司。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49615'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_49615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49615'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49615)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在洛阳。约本年末，受张园夫人之请，为张园作墓志铭。张园元和四年秋八月死于汴州城西双丘，五年二月，葬河南偃师。作品：唐河中府法曹张君墓碣铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河中府法曹张君墓碣铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370762")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370762'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370762'>有女奴抱婴儿来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370762_comment'></div>致其主夫人之语曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370762_comment'></div>妾张圆之妻刘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370762_comment'></div>妾夫常语妾云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370762_comment'></div>吾常获私于夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370762_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370762_comment'></div>夫子天下之名能文辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370762_comment'></div>凡所言必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370762", 1370762, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>传世</span>行后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370762_comment'></div>今妾不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370762_comment'></div>夫逢盗死途中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370762_comment'></div>将以日月葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370762_comment'></div>妾重哀其生志不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370762_comment'></div>恐死遂沈泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370762_comment'></div>敢以其稚子汴见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370762_comment'></div>先生将赐之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370762_comment'></div>是其死不为辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370762_comment'></div>而名永长存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370762_comment'></div>所以盖覆其遗允子若孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370762_comment'></div>且死万一能有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370762_comment'></div>将不悼其不幸于土中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370762_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370762_comment'></div>妾夫在岭南时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370762_comment'></div>尝疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370762_comment'></div>泣语曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370762_comment'></div>吾志非不如古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370762_comment'></div>吾才岂不如今人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370762_comment'></div>而至于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370762_comment'></div>而死于是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370762_comment'></div>若尔吾哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370762_comment'></div>必求夫子铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370762_comment'></div>是尔与吾不朽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370762_comment'></div>愈既哭吊辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370762_comment'></div>遂叙次其族世名字事始终而铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370762_comment'></div>君字直之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370762_comment'></div>祖欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370762_comment'></div>父孝新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370762_comment'></div>皆为官汴宋閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370762_comment'></div>君尝读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370762_comment'></div>为文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370762_comment'></div>有气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370762_comment'></div>有吏才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370762_comment'></div>尝感激欲自奋拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370762_comment'></div>树功名以见世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370762_comment'></div>初举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370762_comment'></div>再不第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370762_comment'></div>因去事宣武军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370762_comment'></div>得官至监察御史。<div id='poem_sentence_48_1370762_comment'></div>摄虞乡令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370762_comment'></div>有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370762_comment'></div>进摄河东令。<div id='poem_sentence_53_1370762_comment'></div>绛州阙刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370762_comment'></div>摄绛州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370762_comment'></div>能闻朝廷。<div id='poem_sentence_58_1370762_comment'></div>既还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370762_comment'></div>八月壬辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370762_comment'></div>死于汴城西双邱。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　约于此年在洛阳作《毛颍传》作品：毛颍传。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷26。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　本年，在洛阳。李益来东都，韩愈作序送之。作品：送幽州李端公序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_50_1370656_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年1月</a>　在洛阳任都官员外郎。年初，为友人杜兼撰写墓志铭。杜卒于元和四年十一月二十二日，五年二月甲午葬怀州。作品：故中散大夫河南尹杜君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷16。）</span><div id='poem_1370811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中散大夫河南尹杜君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370811'>杜氏自戴侯畿始分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370811_comment'></div>戴侯之子恕为幽州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370811_comment'></div>今居京兆诸杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370811_comment'></div>其后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370811_comment'></div>其季宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370811_comment'></div>孝廉郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370811_comment'></div>宽后三世曼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370811_comment'></div>为河东太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370811_comment'></div>葬其父洹水之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370811_comment'></div>其后世皆从葬洹水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370811_comment'></div>及正伦为太宗宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370811_comment'></div>犹封襄阳公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370811_comment'></div>太宗始诏葬京兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370811_comment'></div>襄阳公无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370811_comment'></div>以兄正藏子志静后。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1370811_comment'></div>为怀州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370811_comment'></div>弃官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370811_comment'></div>老沁水上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370811_comment'></div>为富家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370811_comment'></div>卒葬怀州武陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370811_comment'></div>长史生损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370811_comment'></div>为左司郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370811_comment'></div>卒赠少大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370811_comment'></div>大理生廙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370811_comment'></div>为郑州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370811_comment'></div>死思明乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370811_comment'></div>赠吏部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370811_comment'></div>公讳兼。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1370811_comment'></div>举进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370811_comment'></div>司徒北平王燧战河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370811_comment'></div>掌书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370811_comment'></div>上固爱其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370811_comment'></div>书奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370811_comment'></div>即除吏部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370811_comment'></div>遂为给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370811_comment'></div>出为商州刺史金商防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370811_comment'></div>改河南少尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370811_comment'></div>行大尹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370811_comment'></div>半岁拜大尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370811_comment'></div>元和四年十一月二十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370811_comment'></div>无疾暴薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370811_comment'></div>年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370811_comment'></div>明年二月甲午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370811_comment'></div>从葬怀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370811_comment'></div>夫人常山郡君张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370811_comment'></div>彭州刺史赠礼部侍郎蔇之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370811_comment'></div>生子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370811_comment'></div>男三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370811_comment'></div>柔立为天长主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370811_comment'></div>词立为寿州参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370811_comment'></div>谊立为顺宗挽郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370811_comment'></div>女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370811_comment'></div>将葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370811_comment'></div>公之母兄太学博士冀与公之夫人及子男女谋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370811_comment'></div>葬宜有铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370811_comment'></div>凡与吾弟游而有文者谁乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370811_comment'></div>遂来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370811_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370811_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_77_1370811'>杜氏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370811", 1370811, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>大家</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370811_comment'></div>世有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370811", 1370811, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>显人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370811_comment'></div>承继绵绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370811_comment'></div>以及公身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370811_comment'></div>始为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370811_comment'></div>乃笃朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370811_comment'></div>及作大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370811_comment'></div>克施克守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370811_comment'></div>纂辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370811", 1370811, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>奋笔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370811_comment'></div>涣若不思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370811_comment'></div>公牒盈前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370811_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1370811", 1370811, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>笑语指麾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370811_comment'></div>禄以给求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370811_comment'></div>食以会同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370811_comment'></div>不畜不收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370811_comment'></div>库厩虚空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370811_comment'></div>事在于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370811_comment'></div>日远日忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370811_comment'></div>何以传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370811_comment'></div>刻此铭章。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1370811_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_22_49562'>群公一何贤，上戴天子圣。<div id='poem_sentence_22_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_49562'>谋谟收<span class='link' "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>雄劲</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49562'>转输非不勤，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_49562", 49562, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>稽逋</span>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_49562", 49562, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>军令</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_24_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_49562'>在庭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_49562", 49562, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>百执事</span>，奉职各<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_49562", 49562, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>祗敬</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49562'>我独胡为哉，坐与亿兆庆。<div id='poem_sentence_26_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_49562'>譬如笼中鸟，仰给活<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_49562", 49562, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>性命</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_49562'>为诗告<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10068, "poem_sentence_28_49562")'>友生</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_49562", 49562, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>负愧</span>终究竟。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_49562'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_49562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49562'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_49562_0'>⑴ 《河南志》云：“洛水经尚善、旌盖二坊之北，南溢为池，深处至数顷。水鸟翔泳，荷芰翻覆，为都城之胜。贞观中以赐魏王泰，故号魏王池。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49562_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在洛阳任都官员外郎。正月至八月间，为同僚孔戡作墓志铭。作品：唐朝散大夫赠司勋员外郎孔君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷16。）</span><div id='poem_1370810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散大夫赠司勋员外郎孔君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370810")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370810_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370810'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370810'>昭义节度卢从史有贤佐曰孔君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370810_comment'></div>讳戡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370810_comment'></div>字君胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370810_comment'></div>从史为不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370810_comment'></div>君阴争不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370810_comment'></div>则于会肆言以折之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370810_comment'></div>从史羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370810_comment'></div>面颈发赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370810_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370810", 1370810, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>抑首</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370810", 1370810, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>伏气</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370810_comment'></div>不敢出一语以对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370810_comment'></div>立为君更令改章辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370810_comment'></div>前后累数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370810_comment'></div>坐则与从史说古今君臣父子道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370810_comment'></div>顺则受成福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370810_comment'></div>逆辄危辱诛死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370810_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370810_comment'></div>公当为彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370810_comment'></div>不得为此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370810_comment'></div>从史常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370810", 1370810, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>耸听</span>喘汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370810_comment'></div>居五六岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370810_comment'></div>益骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370810_comment'></div>有悖语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370810_comment'></div>君争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370810_comment'></div>无改悔色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370810_comment'></div>则悉引从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370810_comment'></div>空一府往争之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370810_comment'></div>从史虽羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370810_comment'></div>退益甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370810_comment'></div>君泣语其徒曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370810_comment'></div>吾所为止于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370810_comment'></div>不能以有加矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370810_comment'></div>遂以疾辞去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370810_comment'></div>卧东都之城东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370810_comment'></div>酒食<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370810", 1370810, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>伎乐</span>之燕不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370810_comment'></div>当是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370810_comment'></div>天下以为贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370810_comment'></div>论士之宜在天子左右者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370810_comment'></div>皆曰孔君孔君云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370810_comment'></div>会宰相李公镇扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370810_comment'></div>首奏起君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370810_comment'></div>君犹卧不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370810_comment'></div>从史读诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370810_comment'></div>是故舍我而从人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370810_comment'></div>即诬奏君前在军有某事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370810_comment'></div>上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370810_comment'></div>吾知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370810_comment'></div>奏三上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370810_comment'></div>乃除君卫尉丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370810_comment'></div>分司东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370810_comment'></div>诏始下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370810_comment'></div>门下给事中吕元膺封还诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370810_comment'></div>上使谓吕君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370810_comment'></div>吾岂不知戡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370810_comment'></div>行用之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370810_comment'></div>明年元和五年正月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370810_comment'></div>将浴临汝之汤泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370810_comment'></div>壬子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370810_comment'></div>至其县食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370810_comment'></div>遂卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370810_comment'></div>年五十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370810_comment'></div>公卿大夫士相吊于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370810_comment'></div>处士相吊于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370810_comment'></div>君卒之九十六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370810_comment'></div>诏缚从史送阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370810_comment'></div>数以违命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370810_comment'></div>流于日南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370810_comment'></div>遂诏赠君尚书司勋员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370810_comment'></div>盖用尝欲以命君者信其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370810_comment'></div>其年八月甲申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370810_comment'></div>从葬河南河阴之广武原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370810_comment'></div>君于为义若嗜欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370810_comment'></div>勇不顾前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370810_comment'></div>于利与禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370810_comment'></div>则畏避退处如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370810", 1370810, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>怯夫</span>然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370810_comment'></div>始举进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370810_comment'></div>自金吾卫录事为大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370810_comment'></div>佐昭义军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370810_comment'></div>军帅死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370810_comment'></div>从史自其军诸将代为帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370810_comment'></div>请君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370810_comment'></div>从史起此军行伍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370810_comment'></div>凡在幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370810_comment'></div>惟公无分寸私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370810_comment'></div>公苟留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370810_comment'></div>惟公之所欲为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370810_comment'></div>君不得已留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370810_comment'></div>一岁再奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370810_comment'></div>自监察御史至殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370810_comment'></div>从史初听用其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370810_comment'></div>得不败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370810_comment'></div>后不听信。<div id='poem_sentence_92_1370810_comment'></div>遂败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370810_comment'></div>祖某某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370810_comment'></div>赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370810_comment'></div>父某某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370810_comment'></div>赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370810_comment'></div>君始娶宏农杨氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370810_comment'></div>卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370810_comment'></div>又娶其舅宋州刺史京兆韦屺女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370810_comment'></div>皆有妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370810_comment'></div>凡生一男四女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370810_comment'></div>皆幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370810_comment'></div>前夫人从葬舅姑兆次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370810_comment'></div>卜人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370810_comment'></div>今兹岁未可以祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370810_comment'></div>从卜人言不祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370810_comment'></div>君母兄戣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370810_comment'></div>尚书兵部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370810_comment'></div>母弟戢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370810_comment'></div>殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370810_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370810_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_117_1370810'>允义孔君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370810_comment'></div>兹惟其藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370810_comment'></div>更千万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370810_comment'></div>无敢坏伤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_120_1370810_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_3_49671'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49671", 49671, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>钜鹿</span>师欲老，常山险犹恃<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49671'>岂惟彼相忧，固是吾徒耻。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49671'>去去事方急，酒行可以起。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49671'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49671'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_49671_0'>⑴ 时冀镇王承宗反，以兵讨之，无功，遂赦承宗</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49671_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年6月</a>　六月，在洛阳。洛阳好友送石洪处士赴河阳节度使乌重胤幕，众人有诗，请韩愈作序文。作品：送石处士序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370665' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370665' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370665?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送石处士序</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370665")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370665_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370665'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370665'>河阳军节度御史大夫乌公为节度之三月。求士于从事之贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370665_comment'></div>有荐石先生者。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370665_comment'></div>先生何如。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370665_comment'></div>先生居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>嵩邙</span>谷之閒。冬一裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370665_comment'></div>夏一葛。食朝夕饭一盂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370665_comment'></div>蔬一盘。人与之钱则辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370665_comment'></div>请与出游。未尝以事辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370665_comment'></div>劝之仕不应。坐一室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370665_comment'></div>左右图书。与之语道理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370665_comment'></div>辨古今事当否。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>论人</span>高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370665_comment'></div>事后当成败。若河决下流而东注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370665_comment'></div>若驷马驾轻车就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>熟路</span>。而王良造父为之先后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370665_comment'></div>若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>烛照数计</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/24/Comments/1")'>龟卜</span>也。大夫曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370665_comment'></div>先生有以自老。无求于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370665_comment'></div>其肯为某来耶。从事曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370665_comment'></div>大夫文武忠孝。求士为国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370665_comment'></div>不私于家。方今寇集于恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370665_comment'></div>师环其疆。农不耕收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370665_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>财粟</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>殚亡</span>。吾所处地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370665_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>归输</span>之涂。治法征谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370665_comment'></div>宜有所出。先生仁且勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370665_comment'></div>若以义请而彊委重焉。其何说之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370665_comment'></div>于是撰书词。具<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>马币</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370665_comment'></div>卜日以授使者。求先生之庐而请焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370665_comment'></div>先生不告于妻子。不谋于朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370665_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>冠带</span>出见客。拜受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>书礼</span>于门内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370665_comment'></div>宵则沐浴戒行事。载书册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370665_comment'></div>问道所由。告行于常所来往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370665_comment'></div>晨则毕至。张上东门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370665_comment'></div>酒三行。且起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370665_comment'></div>有执爵而言者曰。大夫真能以义取人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370665_comment'></div>先生真能以道自任。决去就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370665_comment'></div>为先生别。又酌而祝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370665_comment'></div>凡去就出处何常。惟义之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370665_comment'></div>遂以为先生寿。又酌而祝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370665_comment'></div>使大夫恒无变其初。无务富其家而饥其师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370665_comment'></div>无甘受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>佞人</span>而外敬正士。无味于谄言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370665_comment'></div>惟先生是听。以能有成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370665_comment'></div>保天子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>宠命</span>。又祝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370665_comment'></div>使先生无图利于大夫。而私便其身图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370665_comment'></div>先生起拜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>祝辞</span>曰。敢不敬蚤夜以求从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370665", 1370665, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>祝规</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370665_comment'></div>于是东都之人士。咸知大夫与先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370665_comment'></div>果能相与以有成也。遂各为歌诗六韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370665_comment'></div>退。愈为之序云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370665_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1370665_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年7月</a>　七月，在洛阳任都官员外郎。。作文记河南府所出裴均等人经历及功绩。作品：河南府同官记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷34。）</span><div id='poem_1370684' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370684' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370684?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河南府同官记</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370684")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370684_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370684'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370684'>永贞元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370684_comment'></div>愈自阳山移江陵法曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370684_comment'></div>获事河东公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370684_comment'></div>公尝与其从事言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370684_comment'></div>建中初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370684_comment'></div>天子始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>纪年</span>更元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370684_comment'></div>命官司举贞观开元之烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370684_comment'></div>群臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>惕慄</span>奉职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>命材</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>登良</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370684_comment'></div>不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>私违</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370684_comment'></div>当时自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>齿朝之士</span>而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370684_comment'></div>以及下百执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370684_comment'></div>官阙一人将补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370684_comment'></div>必取其良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370684_comment'></div>然而河南同时于天下称多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370684_comment'></div>独得将相五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370684_comment'></div>故于府之参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370684_comment'></div>则得我公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370684_comment'></div>于河南主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370684_comment'></div>则得故相国范阳卢公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370684_comment'></div>于汜水主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370684_comment'></div>则得故相国今太子宾客荥阳郑公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370684_comment'></div>于陆浑主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370684_comment'></div>则得相国今吏部侍郎天水赵公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370684_comment'></div>于登封主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370684_comment'></div>则得故吏部尚书东都<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>留守</span>吴郡顾公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370684_comment'></div>卢公去河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370684_comment'></div>为右补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370684_comment'></div>其后由尚书左丞至宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370684_comment'></div>郑公去汜水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370684_comment'></div>为监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370684_comment'></div>佐山南军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370684_comment'></div>其后由工部侍郎至宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370684_comment'></div>罢而又为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370684_comment'></div>赵公去陆浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370684_comment'></div>为右拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370684_comment'></div>其后由给事中为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370684_comment'></div>顾公去登封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370684_comment'></div>为监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370684_comment'></div>其后由京兆尹至吏部尚书东都<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>留守</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370684_comment'></div>我公去府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370684_comment'></div>为长水尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370684_comment'></div>其后由膳部郎中为荆南节度<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>行军司马</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370684_comment'></div>遂为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>节度使</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370684_comment'></div>自工部尚书至吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370684_comment'></div>三相国之劳在史册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370684_comment'></div>顾吏部<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>慎职</span>小心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370684_comment'></div>于时有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370684_comment'></div>我公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>愿洁</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/48/Comments/1")'>沈密</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>开亮</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>卓伟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370684_comment'></div>行茂于宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370684_comment'></div>事修于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>嗣绍</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/52/Comments/1")'>家烈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370684_comment'></div>不违其先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370684_comment'></div>作帅南荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370684_comment'></div>厥闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>休显</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>武志</span>既扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>文教</span>亦熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>登槐</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/58/Comments/1")'>赞元</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370684_comment'></div>其庆且至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370684_comment'></div>故好语故事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370684_comment'></div>以为五公之始迹也同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370684_comment'></div>其后进而偕大也亦同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370684_comment'></div>其称名臣也又同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370684_comment'></div>官职虽分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370684_comment'></div>而功德有巨细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370684_comment'></div>其有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>忠劳</span>于国家也同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370684_comment'></div>有若将同其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370684_comment'></div>而先同其初也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370684_comment'></div>有闻而问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370684_comment'></div>于是焉书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370684_comment'></div>既五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370684_comment'></div>始立石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370684_comment'></div>刻其语河南府参军舍庭中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370684_comment'></div>于时河东公为左仆射宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>出藩</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/75/Comments/1")'>大邦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370684_comment'></div>开府汉南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370684_comment'></div>郑公以工部尚书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>留守</span>东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370684_comment'></div>赵公以吏部尚书镇江陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370684_comment'></div>汉南地连七州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370684_comment'></div>戎士十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370684_comment'></div>其官宰相也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370684_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>留守</span>之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370684_comment'></div>居禁省中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370684_comment'></div>岁时出旌旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370684_comment'></div>序留司文武百官于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370684", 1370684, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>宫城</span>门外而衙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370684_comment'></div>江陵故楚都也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370684_comment'></div>戎士五万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370684_comment'></div>三公同时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370684_comment'></div>千里相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370684_comment'></div>可谓盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370684_comment'></div>河东公名均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370684_comment'></div>姓裴氏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1370684_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　秋，在洛阳任都官员外郎。。曾蒙郑馀庆询问近状，作启文报之。作品：上郑尚书相公启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上郑尚书相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370633")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370633'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370633'>愈启。伏蒙仁恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370633_comment'></div>猥赐示问。感戴战悚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370633_comment'></div>若无所容措。然尚有厥诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370633_comment'></div>须尽露于左右者。敢避其烦黩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370633_comment'></div>怀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370633", 1370633, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>不满</span>之意于受恩之地哉。愈幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370633_comment'></div>三得为属吏。朝夕不离门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370633_comment'></div>出入五年。窃自计较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370633_comment'></div>受与报不宜在门下诸从事后。故事有当言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370633_comment'></div>未尝敢不言。有不便于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370633_comment'></div>辄吐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370633", 1370633, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>私情</span>。閤下所宜怜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370633_comment'></div>分司郎官职事。惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370633", 1370633, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>祠部</span>为烦且重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370633_comment'></div>愈独判二年。日与宦者为敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370633_comment'></div>相伺候罪过。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370633", 1370633, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>恶言</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370633", 1370633, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>詈辞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370633_comment'></div>狼藉公牒。不敢为耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370633_comment'></div>实虑陷祸。故前者怀状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370633_comment'></div>乞与诸郎官更判。意虽甚专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370633_comment'></div>事似率尔。言语精神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370633_comment'></div>不能自明。不蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370633", 1370633, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>察允</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370633_comment'></div>遽以惭归。僶俛日日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370633_comment'></div>遂踰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370633", 1370633, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>累旬</span>。私图其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370633_comment'></div>敢以病告。鸤鸠平均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370633_comment'></div>歌于国风。从事独贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370633_comment'></div>雅以怨刺。伏惟俯加怜察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370633_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370633_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370633_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　深秋，在洛阳任都官员外郎。。送故人之子湖南李础归乡，有诗。作品：送湖南李正字归。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49684' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49684' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49684?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送湖南李正字归<span class='inlineComment2'>（《英华》作《送李础判官归湖南》）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49684")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49684_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49684'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49684'>长沙入楚深，洞庭值秋晚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49684'>人随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49684", 49684, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>鸿雁</span>少，江共蒹葭远。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49684'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49684", 49684, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>历历</span>余所经，悠悠子当返。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49684'>孤游怀耿介，旅宿梦婉娩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49684'>风土稍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49684", 49684, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>殊音</span>，鱼虾日异饭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49684'>亲交俱在此，谁与同息偃。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49684'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49684'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49684)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370664' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370664' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370664?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送湖南李正字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370664")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370664_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370664'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370664'>贞元中。愈从太傅陇西公平汴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370664_comment'></div>李生之尊府以侍御史管汴之盐铁。日为酒杀羊享宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370664_comment'></div>李生则尚与其弟学读书习文辞。以举进士为业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370664_comment'></div>愈于太傅府年最少。故得交李生父子閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370664_comment'></div>公薨军乱。军司马从事皆死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370664_comment'></div>侍御亦被谗为民日南。其后五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370664_comment'></div>愈又贬阳山令。今愈以都官郎守东都省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370664_comment'></div>侍御自衡州刺史为亲王长史。亦留此掌其府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370664_comment'></div>李生自湖南从事请告来觐。于时太傅府之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370664_comment'></div>惟愈与河南司录周君巢独存。其外则李氏父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370664_comment'></div>相与为四人。离十三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370664_comment'></div>幸而集处。得燕而举一觞相属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370664_comment'></div>此天也。非人力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370664_comment'></div>侍御与周君。于今为先辈成德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370664_comment'></div>李生温然为君子。有诗八百篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370664_comment'></div>传咏于时。惟愈也业不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370664", 1370664, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>益进</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370664_comment'></div>行不加修。顾惟未死耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370664_comment'></div>往拜侍御。谒周君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370664_comment'></div>抵李生。退未尝不发愧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370664_comment'></div>往时侍御有无尽费于朋友。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370664", 1370664, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>及今</span>则又不忍其三族之寒饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370664_comment'></div>聚而馆之。疏远毕至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370664_comment'></div>禄不足以养。李生虽欲不从事于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370664_comment'></div>其势不可得已也。重李生之还者皆为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370664_comment'></div>愈最故。故又为序云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370664_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370664_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　冬，代薛戎为河南令。严于吏治，虽引起军士地方官等不安，但也得到宪宗赞赏。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　冬，在洛阳。洛阳好友送石洪、温造赴河阳节度使乌重胤幕，韩愈序文送之。作品：送温处士赴河阳军序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370666' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370666' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370666?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送温处士赴河阳军序</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370666")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370666_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370666'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370666'>伯乐一过冀北之野而马群遂空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370666_comment'></div>夫冀北马多天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370666_comment'></div>伯乐虽善知马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370666_comment'></div>安能空其群耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370666_comment'></div>解之者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370666_comment'></div>吾所谓空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370666_comment'></div>非无马也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370666_comment'></div>无良马也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370666_comment'></div>伯乐知马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370666_comment'></div>遇其良辄取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370666_comment'></div>群无留良焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370666_comment'></div>苟无良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370666_comment'></div>虽谓无马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370666_comment'></div>不为虚语矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370666_comment'></div>东都固士大夫之冀北也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370666_comment'></div>恃才能深藏而不韨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370666_comment'></div>洛之北涯曰石生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370666_comment'></div>其南涯曰温生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370666_comment'></div>大夫乌公以鈇钺镇河阳之三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370666_comment'></div>以石生为才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370666_comment'></div>以礼为罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370666_comment'></div>罗而致之幕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370666_comment'></div>朱数月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370666_comment'></div>以温生为才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370666_comment'></div>于是以石生为媒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370666_comment'></div>以礼为罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370666_comment'></div>又罗而致之幕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370666_comment'></div>东都虽信多才士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370666_comment'></div>朝取一人焉拔其尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370666_comment'></div>暮取一人焉拔其尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370666_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370666", 1370666, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>居守</span>河南尹以及百司之执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370666_comment'></div>与吾辈二县之大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370666_comment'></div>政有所不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370666_comment'></div>事有所可疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370666_comment'></div>奚所咨而处焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370666_comment'></div>士大夫之去位而巷处者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370666_comment'></div>谁与嬉游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370666_comment'></div>小子后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370666_comment'></div>于何考德而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370666", 1370666, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>问业</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370666_comment'></div>搢绅之东西行过是都者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370666_comment'></div>无所礼于其庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370666_comment'></div>若是而称曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370666_comment'></div>大夫乌公一镇河阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370666_comment'></div>而东都处士之庐无人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370666_comment'></div>岂不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370666_comment'></div>夫南面而听天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370666_comment'></div>其所托重而恃力者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370666_comment'></div>惟相与将耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370666_comment'></div>相为天子得人于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370666_comment'></div>将为天子得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370666", 1370666, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>文武士</span>于幕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370666_comment'></div>求内外无治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370666_comment'></div>不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370666_comment'></div>愈縻于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370666_comment'></div>不能自引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370666_comment'></div>资二生以待老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370666_comment'></div>今皆为有力者夺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370666_comment'></div>其何能无介然于怀耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370666_comment'></div>生既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370666_comment'></div>拜公于军门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370666_comment'></div>其为吾以前所称为天下贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370666_comment'></div>以后所称为吾致私怨于尽取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370666_comment'></div>留守相公首为四韵诗歌其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370666_comment'></div>愈因推其意而序之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1370666_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年11月</a>　冬，在洛阳。效法玉川子卢仝作《月蚀》诗，有讽喻之意。作品：月蚀效玉川子作。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div "poem_allusion_49559")'>乌龟</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10100, "poem_allusion_49559")'>鱼头生</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49559_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49559'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49559'>元和庚寅斗插子，月十四日三更中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49559'>森森万木夜僵立，寒气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49559", 49559, "Clauses/3/Comments/2")'>屃<span class='inlineComment2'>（音戏）</span>奰</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（音备）</span>顽无风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49559'>月形如白盘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49559", 49559, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>完完</span>上天东。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49559'>忽然有物来啖之，不知是何虫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49559'>如何至神物，遭此狼狈凶。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49559'>星如撒沙出，攒集争<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49559", 49559, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>强雄</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49559'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49559", 49559, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>油灯</span>不照席，是夕吐燄如长虹。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49559'>玉川子，涕泗下，中庭独行<span class='inlineComment2'>（独下或有自字）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49559'>念此日月者，为天之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49559", 49559, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>眼睛</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49559'>此犹不自保，吾道何由行。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49559'>尝闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49559", 49559, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>古老</span>言，疑是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49559", 49559, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>虾蟆精</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49559'>径圆千里纳女腹，何处养女百丑形。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49559'>杷<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作爬）</span>沙脚手钝，谁使女解缘青冥。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49559'>黄帝有四目，帝舜重其明。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49559'>今天祗两目，何故许食使偏盲。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49559'>尧呼大水浸<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5070, "poem_sentence_15_49559")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_49559", 49559, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>十日</span></span>，不惜万国赤子<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10100, "poem_sentence_15_49559")'>鱼头生</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49559'>女于此时若食日，虽食八九无嚵名。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49559'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49559", 49559, "Clauses/35/Comments/1")'>赤龙</span>黑鸟<span class='inlineComment2'>（日下三足乌也）</span>烧口热，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49559", 49559, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>翎鬣</span>倒侧相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49559", 49559, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>饥肠</span>彻死无由鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49559'>后时食月罪当死，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_20_49559'>玉川子立于庭而言曰，地行贱臣仝。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49559'>再拜敢告上天公，臣有一寸刃。<div id='poem_sentence_21_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_49559'>可刳凶蟆肠，无梯可上天。<div id='poem_sentence_22_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_49559'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_49559", 49559, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>天阶</span>无由有臣踪，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_24_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_49559'>薄命正值飞廉慵，东方青色龙。<div id='poem_sentence_25_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49559'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_49559", 49559, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>牙角</span>何<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_27_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_49559'>安用为龙窟天河，赤鸟司南方。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_49559'>汝口开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_49559", 49559,
