id='poem_sentence_31_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_49559'>旗旄卫毵<span class='inlineComment2'>（音参）</span>㲚<span class='inlineComment2'>（音沙）</span>，既从白帝祠。<div id='poem_sentence_32_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_49559'>又食于蜡礼有加，忍令月被恶物食。<div id='poem_sentence_33_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_49559'>枉于汝口插齿牙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8850, "poem_sentence_34_49559")'>乌龟</span>怯奸。<div id='poem_sentence_34_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_49559'>怕寒缩颈，以壳自遮。<div id='poem_sentence_35_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_49559'>终令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_49559", 49559, "Clauses/73/Comments/1")'>夸蛾</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>抉汝出，卜师烧锥钻灼满板如星罗。<div id='poem_sentence_36_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_49559'>此外内外官<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，琐细不足科。<div id='poem_sentence_37_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_49559'>臣请悉埽除，慎勿许语令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_49559", 49559, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>啾哗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_49559'>并光全耀归我月，盲眼镜净无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_49559", 49559, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>纤瑕</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_39_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_49559'>弊<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作毙）</span>蛙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_49559", 49559, "Clauses/81/Comments/1")'>拘送</span>主府官，帝箸下腹尝其皤。<div id='poem_sentence_40_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_49559'>依前使兔操杵臼，玉阶桂树闲婆娑。<div id='poem_sentence_41_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_49559'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(477, "poem_sentence_42_49559")'>姮娥</span>还宫室，太阳有室家。<div id='poem_sentence_42_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_49559'>天虽高，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2674, "poem_sentence_43_49559")'>耳属地</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_43_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_49559'>感臣赤心，使臣知意。<div id='poem_sentence_44_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_49559'>虽无明言，潜喻厥旨。<div id='poem_sentence_45_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_49559'>有气有形，皆吾赤子。<div id='poem_sentence_46_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_49559'>虽忿大伤，忍杀孩稚。<div id='poem_sentence_47_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_49559'>还汝月明，安行于次。<div id='poem_sentence_48_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_49559'>尽释众罪，以蛙磔死。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_49559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49559'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_49559_0'>⑴ 陟加切，角上张也，字亦作𧤺</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_36_49559_0'>⑵ 列子，夸蛾氏二子负二山，盖有神力者</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_37_49559_0'>⑶ 《汉书·天文志》：“经星常宿，中外官百十八名，七百八十三星。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49559_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　冬，在洛阳。任河南令后，再上郑馀庆启，解释自己某些严峻执法行为。作品：上留守郑相公启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370634' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370634' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370634?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为河南令上留守郑相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370634")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370634_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370634'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370634'>愈启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370634_comment'></div>愈为相公官属五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370634_comment'></div>辱知辱爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370634_comment'></div>伏念曾无丝毫事为报答效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370634_comment'></div>日夜思虑谋画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370634_comment'></div>以为事大君子当以道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370634_comment'></div>不宜苟且求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>容悦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370634_comment'></div>故于事未尝敢疑惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370634_comment'></div>宜行则行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370634_comment'></div>宜止则止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370634_comment'></div>受容受察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370634_comment'></div>不复进谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370634_comment'></div>自以为如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370634_comment'></div>真得事大君子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370634_comment'></div>今虽蒙沙汰为县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370634_comment'></div>固犹在相公治下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370634_comment'></div>未同去离门墙为故吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370634_comment'></div>为形迹嫌疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370634_comment'></div>改前所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370634_comment'></div>以自疏外于大君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370634_comment'></div>固当不待烦说于左右而后察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370634_comment'></div>人有告人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>辱骂</span>其妹与妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370634_comment'></div>为其长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370634_comment'></div>得不追而问之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370634_comment'></div>追而不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370634_comment'></div>为其长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370634_comment'></div>得不怒而杖之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370634_comment'></div>坐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>军营</span>操兵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>守御</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370634_comment'></div>为留守出入前后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>驱从</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370634_comment'></div>此真为军人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370634_comment'></div>坐坊市卖饼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370634_comment'></div>又称军人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370634_comment'></div>则谁非军人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370634_comment'></div>愚以为此必奸人以钱财赂将吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370634_comment'></div>盗相公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>文牒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370634_comment'></div>窃注名姓于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>军籍</span>中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370634_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>陵驾</span>府县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370634_comment'></div>此固相公所欲去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370634_comment'></div>奉法吏所当嫉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370634_comment'></div>虽捕系杖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370634_comment'></div>未过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370634_comment'></div>昨闻相公追捕所告受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>辱骂</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370634_comment'></div>愚以为大君子为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370634_comment'></div>当有权变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370634_comment'></div>始似小异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370634_comment'></div>要归于正耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370634_comment'></div>军吏纷纷入见告屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370634_comment'></div>为其长者安得不小致为之之意乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370634_comment'></div>未敢以此仰疑大君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370634_comment'></div>及见诸从事说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370634_comment'></div>则与小人所望信者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370634_comment'></div>少似乖戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370634_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370634_comment'></div>岂敢生疑于万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370634_comment'></div>必诸从事与诸将吏未能去朋党心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370634_comment'></div>盖复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>黤黮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370634_comment'></div>不以真情状<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>白露</span>左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370634_comment'></div>小人受私恩良久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370634_comment'></div>安敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>闭蓄</span>以为私恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370634_comment'></div>不一二陈道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370634_comment'></div>伏惟相公怜察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370634_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370634_comment'></div>愈无适时才用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370634_comment'></div>渐不喜为吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370634_comment'></div>得一事为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370634_comment'></div>可自罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370634_comment'></div>不啻如弃涕唾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370634_comment'></div>无一分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370634", 1370634, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>顾藉</span>心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370634_comment'></div>顾失大君子纤芥意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370634_comment'></div>如邱山重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370634_comment'></div>守官去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370634_comment'></div>惟今日指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370634_comment'></div>愈惶惧再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1370634_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年11月</a>　仲冬，在洛阳任河南令。参与“乡贡”及宴礼，宴河南府秀才，有诗。作品：燕河南府秀才。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_0_49767_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49767'>诏下诸郡国，岁贡乡曲英。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49767_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49767_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49767'>群儒负己材，相贺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49767", 49767, class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49540'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49540'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49540)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年11月</a>　十一月，在洛阳。好友、登封县尉卢殷贫病交加，卒。韩愈、郑馀庆等出资为其下葬，韩愈并撰墓志。作品：登封县卢殷墓志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登封县尉卢殷墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370801")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370801'>元和五年十月日。范阳卢殷以故登封县尉卒登封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370801_comment'></div>年六十五。君能为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370801_comment'></div>自少至老。诗可录传者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370801_comment'></div>在纸凡千馀篇。无书不读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370801_comment'></div>然止用以资为诗。与谏议大夫孟协律孟郊监察御史冯宿好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370801_comment'></div>期相推挽。卒以病不能为官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370801_comment'></div>在登封尽写所为诗。抵故宰相东都留守郑公馀庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370801_comment'></div>留守数以帛米周其家。书荐宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370801_comment'></div>宰相不能用。竟饥寒死登封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370801_comment'></div>将死。自为书告留守与河南尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370801_comment'></div>乞葬已。又为诗与常所来往河南令韩愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370801_comment'></div>为我具棺。留守尹为具凡葬事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370801_comment'></div>韩愈与买棺。又为作铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370801_comment'></div>十一月某日。葬嵩下郑夫人墓中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370801_comment'></div>君始娶荥阳郑氏。后娶陇西李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370801_comment'></div>生男辄死。卒无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370801_comment'></div>女一人。学浮屠法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370801_comment'></div>不嫁。为比邱尼云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370801_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1370801_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年11月</a>　十一月，在洛阳任河南令。为李贺因父名晋肃而不得举进士鸣不平，作《讳辩》作品：讳辩。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370701' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370701' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370701?labeling=true' target='_blank'>讳辩</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370701")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370701_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370701'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370701'>愈与李贺书。劝贺举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370701_comment'></div>贺举进士有名。与贺争名者毁之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370701_comment'></div>贺父名晋肃。贺不举进士为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370701_comment'></div>劝之举者为非。听者不察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370701_comment'></div>和而唱之。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370701", 1370701, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>同然一辞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370701_comment'></div>皇甫湜曰。若不明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370701_comment'></div>子与贺且得罪。愈曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370701_comment'></div>律曰。二名不偏讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370701_comment'></div>释之者曰。谓若言徵不称在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370701_comment'></div>言在不称徵是也。律曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370701_comment'></div>不讳嫌名。释之者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370701_comment'></div>谓若禹与雨。邱与蓲之类是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370701_comment'></div>今贺父名晋肃。贺举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370701_comment'></div>为犯二名律乎。为犯嫌名律乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370701_comment'></div>父名晋肃。子不得举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370701_comment'></div>若父名仁。子不得为人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370701_comment'></div>夫讳始于何时。作法制以教天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370701_comment'></div>非周公孔子欤。周公作诗不讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370701_comment'></div>孔子不偏讳二名。春秋不讥不讳嫌名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370701_comment'></div>康王钊之孙实为昭王。曾参之父名皙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370701_comment'></div>曾子不讳昔。周之时有骐期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370701_comment'></div>汉之时有杜度。此其子宜如何讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370701_comment'></div>将讳其嫌。遂讳其姓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370701_comment'></div>将不讳其嫌者乎。汉讳武帝名彻为通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370701_comment'></div>不闻又讳车辙之辙为某字也。讳吕后名雉为野鸡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370701_comment'></div>不闻又讳治天下之治为某字也。今上章及诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370701_comment'></div>不闻讳浒势秉机也。惟宦者宫妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370701_comment'></div>乃不敢言谕及机。以为触犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370701_comment'></div>士君子言语行事。宜何所法守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370701_comment'></div>今考之于经。质之于律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370701_comment'></div>稽之以国家之典。贺举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370701_comment'></div>为可耶。为不可耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370701_comment'></div>凡事父母得如曾参。可以无讥矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370701_comment'></div>作人得如周公孔子。亦可以止矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370701_comment'></div>今世之士。不务行曾参周公孔子之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370701_comment'></div>而讳亲之名。则务胜于曾参周公孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370701_comment'></div>亦见其惑也。夫周公孔子曾参卒不可胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370701_comment'></div>胜周公孔子曾参。乃比于宦者宫妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370701_comment'></div>则是宦者宫妾之孝于其亲。贤于周公孔子曾参者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370701_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1370701_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　本年，在洛阳。约于本年，作文就前河南尹房式之事答渝州李使君。作品：答渝州李使君书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷8。）</span><div id='poem_1370617' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370617' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370617?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答渝州李使君书</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370617")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370617_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370617'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370617'>乖隔年多。不获数附书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370617_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>慕仰</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>风味</span>。未尝敢忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370617_comment'></div>使至。连辱两书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370617_comment'></div>告以恩情<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>迫切</span>。不自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>聊赖</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370617_comment'></div>重序河南事迹本末。文字<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>绸密</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370617_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>典实</span>可寻。而推究之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370617_comment'></div>万万无一可疑者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>钦想</span>所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370617_comment'></div>益深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>勤企</span>。岂以愈为粗有知识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370617_comment'></div>可语以心而告之急哉。是比数愈于人而收之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370617_comment'></div>何幸之大也。愈虽无节槩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370617_comment'></div>知感激。若使在形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370617_comment'></div>亲狎于要路。有言可信之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370617_comment'></div>虽百悔吝。不敢默默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370617_comment'></div>今既无由缘进言。言之恐益累<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>高明</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370617_comment'></div>是以负所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>期待</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>窃窃</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370617", 1370617, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>转语</span>于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370617_comment'></div>不见成效。此愈之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370617_comment'></div>然不敢去心。期之无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370617_comment'></div>以报见待。惟且迟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370617_comment'></div>勿遽捐罢。幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370617_comment'></div>庄子云。知其无可奈何而安之若命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370617_comment'></div>圣也。传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370617_comment'></div>君子俟命。然无所补益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370617_comment'></div>进其厌饫者。祗增愧耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370617_comment'></div>良务宽大。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370617_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370617_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　春夏，在洛阳。仍为河南令。初秋，迁尚书职方员外郎，始回到京师长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年1月14日</a>　正月，在洛阳任河南令。为房武撰墓志。房武葬于元和六年正月。作品：兴元少尹房君墓志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兴元少尹房君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年1月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370802")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370802_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370802'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370802'>房故为官族。称世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370802", 1370802, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>有人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370802_comment'></div>自太尉琯以德行为相。相玄宗肃宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370802_comment'></div>名声益彰彻大行。世号其门为太尉家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370802_comment'></div>宗族子弟皆法象其贤。公曾祖讳元静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370802_comment'></div>尚书膳部郎中。历资泾隰四州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370802_comment'></div>太尉之叔父也。祖讳肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370802_comment'></div>为虢州司马。父讳峦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370802_comment'></div>都水使者。皆名能守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370802", 1370802, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>家法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370802_comment'></div>公讳武。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370802_comment'></div>以明经历官至兴元少尹。谨饬畏慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370802_comment'></div>年七十三。以其官终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370802_comment'></div>幼壮为良子弟。老为贤父兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370802_comment'></div>历十二官。处事无纤毫过差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370802_comment'></div>尝以殿中侍御史副丹阳军使。其后为盩厔令施州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370802_comment'></div>丹阳盩厔施州吏民。至今思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370802_comment'></div>娶荥阳郑氏女。生男六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370802_comment'></div>其长曰次卿。次卿有大才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370802_comment'></div>不能俯仰顺时。年四十馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370802_comment'></div>尚守京兆兴平尉。然其友皆曰房氏有子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370802_comment'></div>次曰次公次膺次回次衡次元。始学而未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370802_comment'></div>女三人。皆嫁为士人妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370802_comment'></div>初公之在施州。夫人卒焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370802_comment'></div>殡于江陵。元和五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370802_comment'></div>次卿与其群弟奉公之丧。自兴元至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370802_comment'></div>堂殡于伊水之南。六年正月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370802_comment'></div>次公奉夫人之丧。自江陵至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370802_comment'></div>遂以其月十四日。合葬河南缑氏之高龙原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370802_comment'></div>公母弟式。自给事中为河南尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370802_comment'></div>孝友<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370802", 1370802, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>慈良</span>。尽费其财以奉公葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370802_comment'></div>未葬之一月。诏以河南为御史中丞领宣州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370802_comment'></div>将行。召河南令韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370802_comment'></div>泣谓曰。吾兄之葬于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370802_comment'></div>而吾为尹于是。吾以为得尽其道于吾兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370802_comment'></div>今压于上命。不得视吾兄之棺入此土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370802_comment'></div>岂非天耶。子与吾儿次卿游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370802_comment'></div>我重知子。凡吾兄之终事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370802_comment'></div>将子是托焉。愈既不获辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370802_comment'></div>既助其凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370802", 1370802, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>役事</span>。退又为铭云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370802_comment'></div>有位<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370802", 1370802, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>有年</span>。有弟有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370802_comment'></div>从先人葬。是谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370802", 1370802, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>受祉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370802_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370802_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年1月30日</a>　正月乙丑晦，在洛阳任河南令。沿袭当时习俗写游戏寓言之文《送穷文》作品：送穷文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷26。）</span><div id='poem_1370688' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370688?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送穷文</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年1月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370688")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370688_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370688'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370688'>元和六年。正月乙丑晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370688_comment'></div>主人使奴星结柳作车。缚草为船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370688_comment'></div>载糗舆粻。牛系轭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370688_comment'></div>引帆上樯。三揖穷鬼而告之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370688_comment'></div>闻子行有日矣。鄙人不敢问所涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370688_comment'></div>窃具船与车。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>备载</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>糗粻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370688_comment'></div>日吉时良。利行四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370688_comment'></div>子饭一盂。子啜一觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370688_comment'></div>携朋挈俦。去故就新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370688_comment'></div>驾尘彍风。与电争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370688_comment'></div>子无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>底滞</span>之尤。我有资送之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370688_comment'></div>子等有意于行乎。屏息<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>潜听</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370688_comment'></div>如闻音声。若啸若啼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370688_comment'></div>𥒐歘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>嚘嘤</span>。毛发尽竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370688_comment'></div>竦肩缩颈。疑有而无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370688_comment'></div>久乃可明。若有言者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370688_comment'></div>吾与子居。四十年馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370688_comment'></div>子在孩提。吾不子愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370688_comment'></div>子学子耕。求官与名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370688_comment'></div>惟子是从。不变于初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370688_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>门神</span>户灵。我叱我呵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370688_comment'></div>包羞诡随。志不在他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370688_comment'></div>子迁南荒。热烁湿蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370688_comment'></div>我非其乡。百鬼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>欺陵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370688_comment'></div>太学四年。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>朝齑暮盐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370688_comment'></div>惟我保汝。人皆汝嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370688_comment'></div>自初及终。未始背汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370688_comment'></div>心无异谋。口绝行语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370688_comment'></div>于何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>听闻</span>。云我当去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370688_comment'></div>是必夫子信谗。有閒于予也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370688_comment'></div>我鬼非人。安用车船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370688_comment'></div>鼻嗅臭香。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>糗粻</span>可捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370688_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>单独</span>一身。谁为朋俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370688_comment'></div>子苟备知。可数已不。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370688_comment'></div>子能尽言。可谓圣智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370688_comment'></div>情状既露。敢不回避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370688_comment'></div>主人应之曰。子以吾为真不知也耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370688_comment'></div>子之朋俦。非六非四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370688_comment'></div>在十去五。满七除二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370688_comment'></div>各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>主张</span>。私立名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370688_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>捩手覆羹</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>转喉触讳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370688_comment'></div>凡所以使吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>面目可憎</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>语言无味</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370688_comment'></div>皆子之志也。其名曰智穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370688_comment'></div>矫矫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>亢亢</span>。恶圆喜方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370688_comment'></div>羞为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>奸欺</span>。不忍害伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370688_comment'></div>其次名曰学穷。傲数与名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370688_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>摘抉</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/92/Comments/1")'>杳微</span>。高挹群言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370688_comment'></div>执神之机。又其次曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>文穷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370688_comment'></div>不专一能。怪怪奇奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370688_comment'></div>不可时施。祗以自嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370688_comment'></div>又其次曰命穷。影与形殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370688_comment'></div>面丑心妍。利居众后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370688_comment'></div>责在人先。又其次曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>交穷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370688_comment'></div>磨肌戛骨。吐出心肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370688_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>企足</span>以待。寘我雠冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370688_comment'></div>凡此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>五鬼</span>。为吾五患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370688_comment'></div>饥我寒我。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>兴讹造讪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370688_comment'></div>能使我迷。人莫能閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370688_comment'></div>朝悔其行。暮已复然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370688_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>蝇营狗苟</span>。驱去复还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370688_comment'></div>言未毕。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>五鬼</span>相与张眼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/121/Comments/1")'>吐舌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370688_comment'></div>跳踉偃仆。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>抵掌</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/123/Comments/1")'>顿脚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370688_comment'></div>失笑相顾。徐谓主人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370688_comment'></div>子知我名。凡我所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370688_comment'></div>驱我令去。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>小黠大痴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370688_comment'></div>人生一世。其久几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370688_comment'></div>吾立子名。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>百世不磨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370688_comment'></div>小人君子。其心不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370688_comment'></div>惟乖于时。乃与天通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370688_comment'></div>携持琬玉。易一羊皮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370688_comment'></div>饫于肥甘。慕彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>糠糜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370688_comment'></div>天下知子。谁过于予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370688_comment'></div>虽遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/144/Comments/0")'>斥逐</span>。不忍子疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370688_comment'></div>谓予不信。请质诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370688_comment'></div>主人于是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>垂头丧气</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>上手</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370688", 1370688, "Clauses/149/Comments/1")'>称谢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370688_comment'></div>烧车与船。延之上座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370688_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1370688_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年2月</a>　二月，在洛阳任河南令。为毕坰作墓志铭。作品：唐故河南府王屋县尉毕君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷15。）</span><div id='poem_1370806' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370806' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370806?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河南府王屋县尉毕君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370806")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370806_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370806'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370806'>毕氏出东平。历汉魏晋宋齐梁陈士大夫不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370806_comment'></div>入国朝。有为司卫少卿贝邢庐许州刺史者曰憬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370806_comment'></div>憬之子构。累官至吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370806_comment'></div>卒赠黄门监。是为景公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370806_comment'></div>景公生抗。为广平太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370806_comment'></div>抗安禄山。城陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370806_comment'></div>覆其宗。赠户部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370806_comment'></div>尚书生坰。家破时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370806_comment'></div>坰生始四岁。与其弟增以俱小漏名籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370806_comment'></div>得不诛。为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370806", 1370806, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>赏口</span>贼中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370806_comment'></div>宝应二年。河北平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370806_comment'></div>宗人宏以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370806", 1370806, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>家财</span>赎出之。求增不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370806_comment'></div>增长为河北从事。兼官至御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370806_comment'></div>坰既至长安。宏养于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370806_comment'></div>教读书。明经第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370806_comment'></div>宏死。坰益壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370806_comment'></div>始自别为毕氏。历尉临涣安邑王屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370806_comment'></div>年六十一。以元和六年二月二日卒于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370806_comment'></div>初罢临涣。徐州节度张建封慕广平之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370806", 1370806, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>节死</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370806_comment'></div>闻君笃行能官。请相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370806_comment'></div>署诸从事。摄符离令四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370806_comment'></div>及尉王屋。徐之从事有为河南尹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370806_comment'></div>闻君当来。喜谓人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370806_comment'></div>河南库岁入钱以千计者五六十万。须谨廉吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370806_comment'></div>今毕侯来。吾济矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370806_comment'></div>继数尹诸署于府者无不变。而毕侯固如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370806_comment'></div>竟以其职死。君睦亲善事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370806_comment'></div>过客未尝问有无。既卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370806_comment'></div>家无一钱。凡棺与墓事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370806_comment'></div>皆同官与相识者事之。娶清河张氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370806_comment'></div>生男四人。曰镐鉟銶锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370806_comment'></div>女子三人。其长学浮屠法为比邱尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370806_comment'></div>其季二人未嫁。以其月二十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370806_comment'></div>从葬偃师之土娄。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370806_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1370806'>上古爱民。为官求人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370806_comment'></div>苟可以任。位加其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370806_comment'></div>其后喜权。人自求官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370806_comment'></div>退而缓者。身后人先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370806_comment'></div>故广平死节。而子不荷其泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370806_comment'></div>王屋谨廉。而神不福其谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370806_comment'></div>呜呼天与人。苟无伤其穴与坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370806_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1370806_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_7_49601'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_49601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49601'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49601)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　春，在洛阳任河南令。期间读书为乐，奖掖后进。有南山杨之罘来问学，又归，韩愈惜其学，以诗召之。作品：招杨之罘一首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49629' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49629' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49629?labeling=true' target='_blank'>招杨之罘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49629")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49629_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49629_0'>① 之罘，宪宗元和十一年进士。愈为河南令，之罘自中山来，相从问学，惜其归，以诗招之。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49629'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1034, "poem_allusion_49629")'>不远复</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1320, "poem_allusion_49629")'>依人弹铗</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2524, "poem_allusion_49629")'>独学陋</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49629_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49629'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49629'>柏生两石间，万岁终不大。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49629'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49629", 49629, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>野马</span>不识人，难以驾车盖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49629'>柏移就平地，马羁入厩中。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49629'>马思自由悲，柏有伤根容。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49629'>伤根柏不死，千丈日以至。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49629'>马悲罢还乐，振迅矜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49629", 49629, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>鞍辔</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49629'>之罘南山来，文字得我惊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49629'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49629", 49629, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>馆置</span>使读书，日有求归声。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49629'>我令之罘归，失得柏与马。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49629'>之罘别我去，计出柏马下。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49629'>我自之罘归，入门思而悲。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49629'>之罘别我去，能不思我为。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49629'>洒埽县中居，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49629", 49629, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>引水</span>经竹间。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49629'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_49629", 49629, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>嚣哗</span>所不及，何异山中闲。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49629'>前陈百家书，食有肉与鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49629'>先王遗文章，缀缉实在余。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49629'>礼称<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2524, "poem_sentence_16_49629")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49629", 49629, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>独学</span>陋</span>，易贵<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1034, "poem_sentence_16_49629")'>不远复</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49629'>作诗招之罘，晨夕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49629", 49629, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>抱饥渴</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49629'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_49629_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年2月</a>　仲春，在洛阳任河南令，有诗寄卢仝。时卢仝闭门高卧，安贫乐道，不愿见郑馀庆、石洪等人。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49703' id='poem_sentence_32_49703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_49703'></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_49703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49703'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49703)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年3月</a>　三月，在洛阳任河南令。河南府有吕氏子，痴迷学仙。韩愈贻诗河南少尹李素，嘱其往劝吕氏子归家。作品：谁氏子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谁氏子<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49698")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49698_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49698_0'>① 吕炅，河南人。元和中，弃其妻，著道士服，谢母曰：“当学仙王屋山。”去数月，复出见河南少尹李素。素立之府门，使吏卒脱道士服，给冠带，送付其母。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49698'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1565, "poem_allusion_49698")'>萧史</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5321, "poem_allusion_49698")'>哭穿市</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49698_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49698'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49698'>非痴非狂谁氏子，去入王屋称道士。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49698'>白头老母遮门啼，挽断衫袖留不止。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49698'>翠眉新妇年二十，载送还家<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5321, "poem_sentence_2_49698")'>哭穿市</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49698'>或云欲学吹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49698", 49698, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>凤笙</span>，所慕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49698", 49698, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>灵妃</span>媲<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1565, "poem_sentence_3_49698")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49698", 49698, "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>萧史</span></span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49698'>又云时俗轻寻常，力行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49698", 49698, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>险怪</span>取贵仕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49698'>神仙虽然有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49698", 49698, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>传说</span>，知者尽知其妄矣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49698'>圣君贤相安可欺，乾死穷山竟何俟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49698'>呜呼余心诚岂弟，愿往教诲究终始。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49698'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49698", 49698, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>罚一劝百</span>政之经，不从而诛未晚耳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49698'>谁其友亲能哀怜，写吾此诗持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49698", 49698, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>送似</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49698'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_49698_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年3月</a>　三月十八日至二十一日，在洛阳任河南令。为乳母李氏下葬，并撰墓志铭。作品：乳母墓铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷25。）</span><div id='poem_1370784' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370784' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370784?labeling=true' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370784_comment'></div>入韩氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370784_comment'></div>乳其儿愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370784_comment'></div>愈生未再周月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370784_comment'></div>孤失怙恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370784_comment'></div>李怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370784_comment'></div>历佐汴徐军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370784_comment'></div>入朝为御史国子博士尚书都官员外郎河南令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370784_comment'></div>娶妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370784_comment'></div>生二男五女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370784_comment'></div>时节庆贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370784_comment'></div>辄率妇孙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370784", 1370784, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>列拜</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_18_1370784_comment'></div>元和六年三月十八日疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370784_comment'></div>卒三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370784_comment'></div>葬河南县北十五里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370784_comment'></div>愈率妇孙视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370784", 1370784, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>窆封</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370784_comment'></div>且刻其语于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370784_comment'></div>纳诸墓为铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370784_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　春以后，在洛阳任河南令。房武长子房次卿卒，为之作祭文。作品：祭房君文。<span id='poem_sentence_1_1370845_comment'></div>以酒肉之馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370845_comment'></div>展祭于五官蜀客之柩前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370845_comment'></div>呜呼。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　本年，在洛阳任河南令。约于本年作诗《池上絮》作品：池上絮。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49380' class='_poem'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　本年，在洛阳任河南令。受张生所请，作《石鼓歌》作品：石鼓歌。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_49570' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49570' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49570?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石鼓歌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49570")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49570_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49570_0'>① 欧阳修《集古录》云：“石鼓文在岐阳，初不见称于世，至唐人始盛称之，而韦应物以为周文王之鼓，至宣王刻诗尔。韩退之直以为宣王之鼓，在今凤翔孔子庙。鼓有十，先时散弃于野，郑馀庆始置于庙，而亡其二。皇祐四年，向传师求于民间，得之，十鼓乃足。”石鼓文可见者，其略曰：“我车既攻，我马既同。”又曰：“我车既好，我马既騊。君子员猎，员猎员游。麋鹿速速，君子之求。”又曰：“左骖幡幡，右骖騝騝。秀弓时射，麋豕孔庶。”又曰：“其鱼维何，维鱮维鲤。何以𣙲之，维杨与柳。”</div></div></div><div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_49570", 49570, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>节角</span>，安置妥帖平不颇。<div id='poem_sentence_23_49570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49570'>大厦深檐与盖覆，经历久远期无佗。<div id='poem_sentence_24_49570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_49570'>中朝大官老于事，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_25_49570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49570'>牧童<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_49570", 49570, id='poem_sentence_26_49570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_49570'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_49570", 49570, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>姿媚</span>，数纸尚可<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(255, "poem_sentence_28_49570")'>博白鹅</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_49570'>继周八代争战罢，无人收拾理则那。<div id='poem_sentence_29_49570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_49570'>方今太平日无事，<span class='link' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370689_comment'></div>复出其箧实而陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370689_comment'></div>抱婴儿以泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370689_comment'></div>且殆而悔曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370689_comment'></div>是真何益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370689_comment'></div>吾不能了释氏之信不。<div -----title
开封（汴州）
-----detail

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　本年，在汴州。始与李翱订交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　本年，在汴州，为俱文珍建亭作《监军新竹亭记》作品：监军新竹亭记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=797&endYear=797')">797年</a>　在汴州继续任观察使推官。是年夏，一度病休。稍痊后，照常从政。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=797&endYear=797')">797年</a>　春，在汴州。汴州监军宦官俱文珍平乱有功，深得董晋倚重，将回长安，董晋为之饯行，韩愈奉董晋之命作序并诗。作品：送汴州监军俱文珍序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷33。）</span><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370501'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370501'>居悒悒之无解兮。独长思而永叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370501_comment'></div>岂朝食之不饱兮。宁<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>有知</span>兮。诚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>坎轲</span>而艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370501_comment'></div>当岁行之未复兮。从伯氏以南迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370501_comment'></div>凌大江之惊波兮。过洞庭之漫漫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370501_comment'></div>至曲江而乃息兮。逾南纪之连山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370501_comment'></div>嗟日月其几何兮。携孤嫠而北旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370501_comment'></div>值中原之有事兮。将就食于江之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370501_comment'></div>始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>专专</span>于讲习兮。非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>古训</span>为无所用其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370501_comment'></div>窥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>前灵</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>逸迹</span>兮。超孤举而幽寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370501_comment'></div>既识路又疾驱兮。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>孰知</span>余力之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>不任</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370501_comment'></div>考<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>古人</span>之所佩兮。阅时俗之所服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370501_comment'></div>忽忘身之不肖兮。谓青紫其可拾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370501_comment'></div>自知者为明兮。故吾之所以为惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370501_comment'></div>择吉日余西征兮。亦既造夫京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370501_comment'></div>君之门不可径而入兮。遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>从试</span>于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370501_comment'></div>惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>名利</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>都府</span>兮。羌众人之所驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370501_comment'></div>竞乘时而附势兮。纷变化其难推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370501_comment'></div>全纯愚以靖处兮。将与彼而异宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370501_comment'></div>欲奔走以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>及事</span>兮。顾初心而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>自非</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370501_comment'></div>朝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370501", 1370501, id='poem_sentence_20_1370501_comment'></div>谅却步以图前兮。不浸近而逾远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370501_comment'></div>哀白日之不与吾谋兮。至今十年其犹初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370501_comment'></div>岂不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370501", 1370501, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>登名</span>于一科兮。曾不补其遗馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370501_comment'></div>情怊怅以自失兮。心无归之茫茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370501_comment'></div>苟不内得其如斯兮。孰与不食而高翔。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=797&endYear=797')">797年</a>　本年，在汴州。与好友李翱、孟郊，同僚杨凝、陆长源、孟叔度、丘颍等交往。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=797&endYear=797')">797年</a>　十月，张籍由和州来汴州，经孟郊介绍与韩愈交友，寓居韩愈处。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年12月</a>　在汴州主持贡士举考，权秀才亦中举。年底，进京应试时，韩愈作序送之。作品：送权秀才序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370663' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370663' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370663?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送权秀才序</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年12月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370663_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370663'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370663'>伯乐之厩多良马。卞和之匮多美玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370663_comment'></div>卓荦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370663", 1370663, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>瑰怪</span>之士。宜乎游于大人君子之门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370663_comment'></div>相国陇西公既平汴州。天子命御史大夫吴县男为军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370663_comment'></div>门下之士权生实从之来。权生之貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370663_comment'></div>固若常人耳。其文辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370663", 1370663, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>引物连类</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370663_comment'></div>穷情尽变。宫商相宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370663_comment'></div>金石谐和。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370663", 1370663, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>寂寥</span>乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370663", 1370663, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>短章</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370663_comment'></div>舂容乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370663", 1370663, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>大篇</span>。如是者阅之累日而无穷焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370663_comment'></div>愈常观于皇都。每年贡士至千馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370663_comment'></div>或与之游。或得其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370663_comment'></div>若权生者。百无一二焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370663_comment'></div>如是而将进于明有司。重之以吴县之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370663_comment'></div>其果有成哉。于是咸赋诗以赠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370663_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1370663_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年12月</a>　十二月，在汴州任观察推官。杨凝与韩愈同佐董晋，适值杨凝自汴州赴京朝贺新正，韩愈作诗送之。作品：天星送杨凝郎中贺正。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49557' target='_blank'>古风<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49566_0'>① 安史之后，方镇相望于内地。大者连州十馀，小者不下三四，兵骄则逐帅，帅强则叛上，不廷不贡，往往而是，故托古风以寓意，观诗意当在德宗朝作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49566'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49566'>今日曷不乐，幸时不用兵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49566'>无曰既蹙矣，乃尚可以生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49566'>彼州之赋，去汝不顾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49566'>此州之役，去我奚适。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49566'>一邑之水，可走而违。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49566'>天下汤汤，曷其而归。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49566'>好我衣服，甘我饮食。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49566'>无念百年，聊乐一日。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年</a>　本年，在汴州任观察推官。与冯宿论文而作文，反映韩愈力图摆脱时文、力推古文之观点。作品：与冯宿论文书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370607' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370607' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370607?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与冯宿论文书</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370607")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370607_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370607'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370607'>辱示初筮赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370607_comment'></div>实有意思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370607_comment'></div>但力为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370607_comment'></div>古人不难到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370607_comment'></div>但不知直似古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370607_comment'></div>亦何得于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370607", 1370607, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>今人</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370607_comment'></div>仆为文久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370607_comment'></div>每自则意中以为好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370607_comment'></div>则人必以为恶矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370607_comment'></div>小称意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370607_comment'></div>人亦小怪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370607_comment'></div>大称意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370607_comment'></div>即人必大怪之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370607_comment'></div>时时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370607", 1370607, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>应事</span>作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370607", 1370607, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>俗下文字</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370607_comment'></div>下笔令人惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370607_comment'></div>及示人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370607_comment'></div>则人以为好矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370607_comment'></div>小惭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370607_comment'></div>亦蒙谓之小好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370607_comment'></div>大惭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370607_comment'></div>即必以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370607", 1370607, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>大好</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370607_comment'></div>不知古文直何用于今世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370607_comment'></div>然以俟知者知耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370607_comment'></div>昔扬子云著太元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370607_comment'></div>人皆笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370607_comment'></div>子云之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370607_comment'></div>世不我知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370607_comment'></div>无害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370607_comment'></div>后世复有扬子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370607_comment'></div>必好之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370607_comment'></div>子云死近千载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370607_comment'></div>竟未有扬子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370607_comment'></div>可叹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370607_comment'></div>其时桓谭亦以为雄书胜老子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370607_comment'></div>老子未足道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370607_comment'></div>子云岂止与老子争彊而已乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370607_comment'></div>此未为知雄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370607_comment'></div>其弟子侯芭颇知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370607_comment'></div>以为其师之书胜周易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370607_comment'></div>然侯之他文不见于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370607_comment'></div>不知其人果如何耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370607_comment'></div>以此而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370607_comment'></div>作者不祈人之知也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370607_comment'></div>直百世以俟圣人而不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370607_comment'></div>质鬼神而不疑耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370607_comment'></div>足下岂不谓然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370607_comment'></div>近李翱从仆学文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370607_comment'></div>颇有所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370607_comment'></div>然其人家贫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370607", 1370607, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>多事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370607_comment'></div>未能卒其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370607_comment'></div>有张籍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370607_comment'></div>年长于翱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370607_comment'></div>而亦学于仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370607_comment'></div>其文与翱相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370607", 1370607, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>上下</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370607_comment'></div>一二年业之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370607_comment'></div>庶几乎至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370607_comment'></div>然闵其弃俗尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370607_comment'></div>而从于寂寞之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370607_comment'></div>以之争名于时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370607_comment'></div>久不谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370607_comment'></div>聊感足下能自进于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370607_comment'></div>故复发愤一道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370607_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1370607_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年</a>　春，在汴州董晋幕府正式就任将仕郎试秘书省校书郎、汴宋亳颍等州观察推官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年2月</a>　仲春，在汴州任观察推官。孟郊将离汴州南下，韩愈、孟郊、李翱三人共作联句。作品：远游联句。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49610'
