class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年3月1日</a>　正月七日，在汴州任观察推官。董晋下令修建汴州东西水门。三月完成时，开会庆祝，韩愈自请作记，追述修建经过与成绩。作品：汴州东西水门记并序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汴州东西水门记</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年3月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370676")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370676_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1370676'>贞元十四年正月戊子。陇西公命作东西水门。越三月辛巳朔。水门成。三日癸未。大合乐。设水嬉。会监军军司马宾佐僚属将校熊罴之士。肃四方之宾客以落之。士女和会。阗郭溢郛。既卒事。其从事昌黎韩愈请纪成绩。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1370676_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370676'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370676'>维汴州河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370676_comment'></div>水自中注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370676_comment'></div>厥初距河为城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370676_comment'></div>其不合者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370676_comment'></div>诞寘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370676", 1370676, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>联锁</span>于河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370676_comment'></div>宵浮昼湛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370676_comment'></div>舟不潜通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370676_comment'></div>然其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370676", 1370676, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>襟抱</span>亏疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370676_comment'></div>风气宣泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370676_comment'></div>邑居勿宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370676_comment'></div>讹言屡腾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370676_comment'></div>历载已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370676_comment'></div>孰究孰思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370676_comment'></div>皇帝御天下十有八载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370676_comment'></div>此邦之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370676_comment'></div>遭逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370676", 1370676, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>疾威</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370676_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370676", 1370676, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>嚚童</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370676", 1370676, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>噭嘑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370676_comment'></div>劫众阻兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370676_comment'></div>懔懔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370676", 1370676, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>栗栗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370676_comment'></div>若坠若覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370676_comment'></div>时维陇西公受命作藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370676_comment'></div>爰自洛京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370676_comment'></div>单车来临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370676_comment'></div>遂拯其危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370676_comment'></div>遂去其疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370676_comment'></div>弗肃弗厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370676_comment'></div>薰为太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370676_comment'></div>神应祥福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370676_comment'></div>五谷穰熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370676_comment'></div>既庶而丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370676_comment'></div>人力有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370676_comment'></div>监军是咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370676_comment'></div>司马是谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370676_comment'></div>乃作水门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370676_comment'></div>为邦之郛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370676_comment'></div>以固风气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370676_comment'></div>以闬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370676", 1370676, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>寇偷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370676_comment'></div>黄流浑浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370676_comment'></div>飞阁渠渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370676_comment'></div>因而饰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370676_comment'></div>匪为观游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370676_comment'></div>天子之武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370676_comment'></div>维陇西公是布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370676_comment'></div>天子之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370676_comment'></div>维陇西公是宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370676_comment'></div>河之沄沄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370676_comment'></div>源于昆崙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370676_comment'></div>天子万祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370676_comment'></div>公多受祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370676_comment'></div>乃伐山石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370676_comment'></div>刻之日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370676_comment'></div>尚俾来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370676_comment'></div>知作之所始。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370676_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年</a>　本年，在汴州任观察推官。与张籍有书信往来，谈文论道。作品：答张籍书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span>重答张籍书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_1370578' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370578' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370578?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答张籍书</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370578")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370578_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370578'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370578'>愈始者望见吾子于人人之中。固有异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370578_comment'></div>及聆其音声。接其辞气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370578_comment'></div>则有愿交之志。因缘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>幸会</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370578_comment'></div>遂得所图。岂惟吾子之不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370578_comment'></div>抑仆之所遇有时焉耳。近者尝有意吾子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>阙焉</span>无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370578_comment'></div>意仆所以交之之道不至也。今乃大得所图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370578_comment'></div>脱然若沈疴去体。洒然若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>执热</span>者之濯清风也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370578_comment'></div>然吾子所论排释老不若著书。嚣嚣多言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370578_comment'></div>徒相为訾。若仆之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370578_comment'></div>则有异乎此也。夫所谓著书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370578_comment'></div>义止于辞耳。宣之于口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370578_comment'></div>书之于。何择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370578_comment'></div>孟轲之书。非轲自著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370578_comment'></div>轲既殁。其徒万章公孙丑相与记轲所言焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370578_comment'></div>仆自得圣人之道而诵之。排前二家有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370578_comment'></div>不知者以仆为好辩也。然从而化者亦有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370578_comment'></div>闻而疑者又有倍焉。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>顽然</span>不入者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370578_comment'></div>亲以言谕之。不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370578_comment'></div>则其观吾书也。固将无得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370578_comment'></div>为此而止。吾岂有爱于力乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370578_comment'></div>然有一说。化当世莫若口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370578_comment'></div>传来世莫若书。又惧吾力之未至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370578_comment'></div>三十而立。四十而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>不惑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370578_comment'></div>吾于圣人。既过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370578_comment'></div>犹惧不及。矧今未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370578_comment'></div>固有所未至耳。请待五六十然后为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370578_comment'></div>冀其少过也。吾子又讥吾与人人为无实駮杂之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370578_comment'></div>此吾所以为戏耳。比之酒色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370578_comment'></div>不有閒乎。吾子讥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370578_comment'></div>似同浴而讥裸裎也。若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>商论</span>不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>下气</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370578_comment'></div>或似有之。当更思而悔之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370578_comment'></div>博塞之讥。敢不承教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370578_comment'></div>其他俟相见。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>薄晚</span>须到<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370578", 1370578, "Clauses/65/Comments/1")'>公府</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370578_comment'></div>言不能尽。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370578_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1370578_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370579' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370579' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370579?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重答张籍书</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370579")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370579_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370579'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370579'>吾子不以愈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>无似</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370579_comment'></div>意欲推而纳诸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>圣贤</span>之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370579_comment'></div>拂其邪心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370579_comment'></div>增其所未高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370579_comment'></div>谓愈之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370579_comment'></div>有可以至于道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370579_comment'></div>浚其源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370579_comment'></div>导其所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370579_comment'></div>溉其根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370579_comment'></div>将食其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370579_comment'></div>此盛德者之所辞让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370579_comment'></div>况于愈者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370579_comment'></div>抑其中有宜复者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370579_comment'></div>故不可遂已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370579_comment'></div>昔者圣人之作春秋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370579_comment'></div>既深其文辞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370579_comment'></div>然犹不敢公传道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370579_comment'></div>口授弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370579_comment'></div>至于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370579_comment'></div>然后其书出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370579_comment'></div>其所以虑患之道微也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370579_comment'></div>今夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>二氏</span>之所宗而事之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370579_comment'></div>下及公卿辅相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370579_comment'></div>吾岂敢昌言排之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370579_comment'></div>择其可语者诲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370579_comment'></div>犹时与吾悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370579_comment'></div>其声<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>哓哓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370579_comment'></div>若遂成其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370579_comment'></div>则见而怒之者必多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370579_comment'></div>必且以我为狂为惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370579_comment'></div>其身之不能恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370579_comment'></div>书于吾何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370579_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>夫子</span>圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370579_comment'></div>且曰自吾得子路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370579_comment'></div>而恶声不入于耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370579_comment'></div>其馀辅而相者周天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370579_comment'></div>犹且绝粮于陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370579_comment'></div>畏于匡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370579_comment'></div>毁于叔孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370579_comment'></div>奔走于齐鲁宋卫之郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370579_comment'></div>其道虽尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370579_comment'></div>其穷也亦甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370579_comment'></div>赖其徒相与守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370579_comment'></div>卒有立于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370579_comment'></div>向使独言之而独书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370579_comment'></div>其存也可冀乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370579_comment'></div>今夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>二氏</span>行乎中土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370579_comment'></div>盖六百年有馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370579_comment'></div>其植根固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370579_comment'></div>其流波漫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370579_comment'></div>非所以朝令而夕禁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370579_comment'></div>自文王没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370579_comment'></div>武王周公成康相与守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370579_comment'></div>礼乐皆在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370579_comment'></div>及乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>夫子</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370579_comment'></div>未久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370579_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>夫子</span>而及乎孟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370579_comment'></div>未久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370579_comment'></div>自孟子而及乎扬雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370579_comment'></div>亦未久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370579_comment'></div>然犹其勤若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370579_comment'></div>其困若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370579_comment'></div>而后能有所立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370579_comment'></div>吾其可易而为之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370579_comment'></div>其为也易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370579_comment'></div>则其传也不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370579_comment'></div>故余所以不敢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370579_comment'></div>然观古人得其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370579_comment'></div>行其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370579_comment'></div>则无所为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370579_comment'></div>书者皆所为不行乎今而行乎后世者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370579_comment'></div>今吾之得吾志失吾志未可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370579_comment'></div>俟五六十为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370579_comment'></div>未失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370579_comment'></div>天不欲使兹人有知乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370579_comment'></div>则吾之命不可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370579_comment'></div>如使兹人有知乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370579_comment'></div>非我其谁哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370579_comment'></div>其行道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370579_comment'></div>其为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370579_comment'></div>其化今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370579_comment'></div>其传后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370579_comment'></div>必有在矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370579_comment'></div>吾子其何遽戚戚于吾所为哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370579_comment'></div>前书谓我与人商论不能下气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370579_comment'></div>若好胜者然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370579_comment'></div>虽诚有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370579_comment'></div>抑非好已胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370579_comment'></div>好已之道胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370579_comment'></div>非好已之道胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370579_comment'></div>已之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370579_comment'></div>乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>夫子</span>孟子扬雄所传之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370579_comment'></div>若不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370579_comment'></div>则无以为道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370579_comment'></div>吾岂敢避是名哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370579_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>夫子</span>之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370579_comment'></div>吾与回言终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370579_comment'></div>不违如愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370579_comment'></div>则其与众人辩也有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370579_comment'></div>駮杂之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370579_comment'></div>前书尽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370579_comment'></div>吾子其复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370579_comment'></div>昔者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1370579", 1370579, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>夫子</span>犹有所戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370579_comment'></div>诗不云乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370579_comment'></div>善戏谑兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370579_comment'></div>不为虐兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370579_comment'></div>记曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370579_comment'></div>张而不弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370579_comment'></div>文武不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370579_comment'></div>恶害于道哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370579_comment'></div>吾子其未之思乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370579_comment'></div>孟君将有所适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370579_comment'></div>思与吾子别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370579_comment'></div>庶几一来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370579_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1370579_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年</a>　本年，在汴州任观察推官。受请为名将杨燕奇撰碑。杨死于是年五月，葬于十月。作品：清边郡王杨燕奇碑文。<div id='poem_1370757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清边郡王杨燕奇碑文</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370757")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370757'>公讳燕奇。字燕奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370757_comment'></div>宏农华阴人也。大父知古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370757_comment'></div>祁州司仓。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>烈考</span>文诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370757_comment'></div>天宝中实为平卢衙前兵马使。位至特进检校太子宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370757_comment'></div>封宏农郡开国伯。世掌诸蕃互市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370757_comment'></div>恩信著明。夷人慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370757_comment'></div>禄山之乱。公年几二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370757_comment'></div>进言于其父曰。大人守官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370757_comment'></div>宜不得去。王室在难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370757_comment'></div>某其行矣。其父为之请于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>戎帅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370757_comment'></div>遂率诸将校之子弟各一人。间道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>趋阙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370757_comment'></div>变服<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>诡行</span>。日倍百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370757_comment'></div>天子嘉之。特拜左金吾卫大将军员外置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370757_comment'></div>赐勋上柱国。宝应二年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370757_comment'></div>诏从仆射田公平刘展。又从下河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370757_comment'></div>大历八年。帅师纳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>戎帅</span>勉于滑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370757_comment'></div>九年。从朝于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370757_comment'></div>建中二年。城汴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370757_comment'></div>功劳居多。三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370757_comment'></div>从攻李希烈。先登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370757_comment'></div>贞元二年。从司徒刘公复汴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370757_comment'></div>十二年。与诸将执以城叛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370757_comment'></div>归之于京师。事平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370757_comment'></div>授御史大夫。食实封百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370757_comment'></div>赐缯䌽有加。十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370757_comment'></div>年六十一。五月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370757_comment'></div>终于家。自始命左金吾大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370757_comment'></div>凡十五迁为御史大夫。职为节度押衙右厢兵马使兼马军先锋兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370757_comment'></div>阶为特进。勋为上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370757_comment'></div>爵为清边郡王。食<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>虚邑</span>自三百户至三千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370757_comment'></div>真食五百户终焉。公结发从军四十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370757_comment'></div>敌攻无坚。城守必完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370757_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>临危</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/64/Comments/1")'>蹈难</span>。歔欷感发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370757_comment'></div>乘机<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>应会</span>。捷出神怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370757_comment'></div>不畏义死。不荣幸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370757_comment'></div>故其事君无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>疑行</span>。其事上无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370757_comment'></div>初仆射田公。其母隔于冀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370757_comment'></div>公独请往迎之。经营贼城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370757_comment'></div>出入死地。卒致其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370757_comment'></div>田公德之。约谓父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370757_comment'></div>故公始姓田氏。田公终而后复其族焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370757_comment'></div>嗣子通王属良祯。以其年十月庚寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370757_comment'></div>葬公于开封县鲁陵冈。陇西郡夫人李氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370757_comment'></div>夫人清夷郡太守祐之孙。渔阳郡长史献之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370757_comment'></div>柔嘉淑明。先公而殂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370757_comment'></div>有男四人女三人。后夫人河南郡夫人雍氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370757_comment'></div>某官之孙。某官之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370757_comment'></div>有男一人女二人。咸有至性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>纯行</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370757_comment'></div>夫人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>同仁</span>均养。亲族不知异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370757_comment'></div>君子于是知杨公之德又行于家也。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370757_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_1370757'>烈烈大夫。逢时之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370757_comment'></div>感泣辞亲。从难于秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370757_comment'></div>维兹爰始。遂勤其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370757_comment'></div>四十馀年。或裨或专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370757_comment'></div>攻牢保危。爵位已跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370757_comment'></div>既明且慎。终老无隳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370757_comment'></div>鲁陵之冈。蔡河在侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370757_comment'></div>烝烝孝子。思显勋绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370757_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370757", 1370757, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>斲石</span>于此。式垂后嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370757_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1370757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年</a>　贞元十二年至十四年，在汴州。此期间某年夏秋之间，作《奏汴州得嘉禾嘉瓜状》作品：奏汴州得嘉禾嘉瓜状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。）</span><div id='poem_1370566' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370566' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370566?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏汴州得嘉禾嘉瓜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370566")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370566_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370566'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370566'>右。谨按<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370566", 1370566, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>符瑞图</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370566_comment'></div>王者德至于地。则嘉禾生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370566_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道合天地。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370566", 1370566, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>恩沾</span>动植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370566_comment'></div>迩无不协。远无不宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370566_comment'></div>神人以和。风雨咸若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370566_comment'></div>前件嘉禾等。或两根并植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370566_comment'></div>一穗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370566", 1370566, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>连房</span>。或延蔓敷荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370566_comment'></div>异实共蒂。既叶和同之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370566_comment'></div>又标丰稔之祥。感自<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370566", 1370566, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>微茎</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370566", 1370566, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>何极</span>于造化。亲逢嘉瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370566_comment'></div>小臣喜遇于休明。无任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370566_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1370566_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年11月</a>　孟冬，在汴州任观察推官。病中赠张籍诗。作品：病中赠张十八。<span id='poem_sentence_8_49692'>吾欲盈其气，不令见麾幢。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49692'>牛羊满田野，解旆束空杠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49692'>倾尊与斟酌，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49692", 49692, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>四壁</span>堆罂缸。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49692'>玄帷隔雪风，照炉钉明釭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49692'>夜阑纵捭<span class='inlineComment2'>（音摆）</span>阖，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49692", 49692, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>哆口</span>疏眉厖。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49692'>势侔高阳翁，坐约<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6807, "poem_sentence_13_49692")'>齐横降</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（音杭）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49692'>连日挟所有，形躯顿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49692", 49692, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>膀<span class='inlineComment2'>（音滂）</span>肛</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49692'>将归乃徐谓，子言得无哤<span class='inlineComment2'>（音厖）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49692'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49692", 49692, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>回军</span>与角逐，斫树收穷庞。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49692'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1936, "poem_sentence_17_49692")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49692", 49692, "Clauses/34/Comments/1")'>雌声</span></span>吐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49692", 49692, "Clauses/34/Comments/2")'>款要</span>，酒壶缀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49692", 49692, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>羊腔</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49692'>君乃昆崙渠，籍乃岭头泷。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49692'>譬如蚁蛭微，讵可陵崆㟅。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_49692'>幸愿终赐之，斩拔蘖与桩。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49692'>从此识归处，东流水淙淙。<div id='poem_sentence_21_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_49692'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_49692_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49692'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49692)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年11月</a>　十一月，主汴州贡士举考，试进士策问，张籍中选，得首荐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年11月</a>　十一月，主汴州贡士举考，试进士策问。集中《进士策问十三首》，前六首乃此次考试所出。作品：进士策问十三首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_1370509' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370509' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370509?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进士策问十三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370509")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370509_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370509'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370509'>问。书称汝则有大疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370509_comment'></div>谋及乃心。谋及卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370509_comment'></div>以至于庶人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370509", 1370509, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>龟筮</span>考其从违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370509_comment'></div>以审吉凶。则是圣人之举事兴为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370509_comment'></div>无不与人共之者也。于易则又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370509_comment'></div>君不密。则失臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370509_comment'></div>臣不密。则失身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370509_comment'></div>几事不密。则害成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370509_comment'></div>而春秋亦有讥漏言之词。如是则又似不与人共之而独运者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370509_comment'></div>书与易春秋经也。圣人于是乎尽其心焉耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370509_comment'></div>今其文相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370509", 1370509, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>戾悖</span>如此。欲人之无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370509_comment'></div>不可得已。是二说者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370509_comment'></div>其信有是非乎。抑所指各殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370509_comment'></div>而学者不之能察也。谅非深考古训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370509_comment'></div>读圣人之书者。其何能辨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370509_comment'></div>此固吾子之所宜无让者。愿承教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370509_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1370509_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370510?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370510_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370510'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370510'>问。古之人有云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370510_comment'></div>夏之政尚忠。殷之政尚敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370510_comment'></div>而周之政尚文。是三者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370510_comment'></div>相循环<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370510", 1370510, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>终始</span>。若五行之与四时焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370510_comment'></div>原其所以为心。皆非故立殊而求异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370510_comment'></div>各适于时。救其弊而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370510_comment'></div>夏殷之书存者可见矣。至周之典籍咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370510_comment'></div>考其文章。其所尚若不相远然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370510_comment'></div>焉所谓三者之异云乎。抑其道深微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370510_comment'></div>不可究欤。将其词隐而难知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370510_comment'></div>不然。则是说为谬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370510_comment'></div>周之后秦汉蜀吴魏晋之兴与霸。亦有尚乎无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370510_comment'></div>观其所为。其亦有意云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370510_comment'></div>循环之说安在。吾子其无所隐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370510_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1370510_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370511' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370511' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370511?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370511_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370511'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370511'>问。夫子之序帝王之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370511_comment'></div>而系以秦鲁。及次列国之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370511_comment'></div>而宋鲁独称颂焉。秦穆之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370511_comment'></div>不踰于二霸。宋鲁之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370511_comment'></div>不贤乎齐晋。其位等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370511_comment'></div>其德同。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370511", 1370511, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>升黜</span>取舍如是之相远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370511_comment'></div>亦将有由乎。愿闻所以辨之之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370511_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1370511_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370512?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370512'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370512'>问。夫子既没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370512_comment'></div>圣人之道不明。盖有杨墨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370512_comment'></div>始侵而乱之。其时天下咸化而从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370512_comment'></div>孟子辞而辟之。则既廓如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370512_comment'></div>今其书尚有存者。其道可推而知不可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370512_comment'></div>其所守者何事。其不合于道者几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370512_comment'></div>孟子之所以辞而辟之者何说。今之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370512_comment'></div>有学于彼者乎。有近于彼者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370512_comment'></div>其已无传乎。其无乃化而不自知乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370512_comment'></div>其无传也则善矣。如其尚在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370512_comment'></div>将何以救之乎。诸生学圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370512_comment'></div>必有能言是者。其无所为让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370512_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370512_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370513?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370513'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370513'>问。所贵乎道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370513_comment'></div>不以其便于人而得于己乎。当周之衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370513_comment'></div>管夷吾以其君霸。九合诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370513_comment'></div>一匡天下。戎狄以微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370513_comment'></div>京师以尊。四海之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370513_comment'></div>无不受其赐者。天下诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370513_comment'></div>奔走其政令之不暇。而谁与为敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370513_comment'></div>此岂非便于人而得于已乎。秦用商君之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370513_comment'></div>人以富。国以强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370513_comment'></div>诸侯不敢抗。及七君而天下为秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370513_comment'></div>使天下为秦者。商君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370513_comment'></div>而后代之称道者。咸羞言管商氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370513_comment'></div>何哉。庸非求其名而不责其实欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370513_comment'></div>愿与诸生论之。无惑于旧说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370513_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1370513_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370514' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370514' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370514?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370514_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370514'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370514'>问。夫子之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370514_comment'></div>盍各言尔志。又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370514_comment'></div>居则曰不吾知也。如或知尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370514_comment'></div>则何以哉。今之举者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370514_comment'></div>不本于乡。不序于庠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370514_comment'></div>一朝而群至乎有司。有司之不之知也宜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370514_comment'></div>今将自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370514", 1370514, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>州县</span>始。请各诵所怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370514_comment'></div>聊以观诸生之志。死者可作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370514_comment'></div>其谁与归。事其大夫之贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370514_comment'></div>友其士之仁者。敢问诸生之所事而友者为谁乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370514_comment'></div>所谓贤而仁者。其事如何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370514_comment'></div>言及之而不言。亦君子之所不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370514_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370514_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370515' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370515' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370515?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370515_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370515'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370515'>问。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370515", 1370515, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>春秋</span>之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370515_comment'></div>百有馀国。皆有大夫士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370515_comment'></div>详于传者。无国无贤人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370515_comment'></div>其馀皆足以充其位。不闻有无其人而阙其官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370515_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370515", 1370515, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>春秋</span>之后。其书尤详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370515_comment'></div>以至于吴蜀魏。下及晋氏之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370515_comment'></div>国分如锱铢。读其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370515_comment'></div>亦皆有人焉。今天下九州四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370515_comment'></div>其为土地大矣。国家之举士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370515_comment'></div>内有明经进士。外有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370515", 1370515, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>方维</span>大臣之荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370515_comment'></div>其馀以门地勋力进者。又有倍于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370515_comment'></div>其为门户多矣。而自御史台尚书省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370515_comment'></div>以至于中书门下省。咸不足其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370515_comment'></div>岂今之人不及于古之人邪。何求而不得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370515_comment'></div>夫子之言曰。十室之邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370515_comment'></div>必有忠信如某者焉。诚得忠信如圣人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370515_comment'></div>而委之以大臣宰相之事。有不可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370515_comment'></div>况于百执事之微者哉。古之十室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370515_comment'></div>必有任宰相大臣者。今之天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370515_comment'></div>而不足士大夫于朝。其亦有说乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370515_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1370515_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370516' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370516' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370516?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370516_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370516'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370516'>问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370516_comment'></div>夫子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370516_comment'></div>洁净精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370516_comment'></div>易教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370516_comment'></div>今习其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370516_comment'></div>不识四者之所谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370516_comment'></div>盍举其义而陈其数焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1370516_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370517' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370517' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370517?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370517_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370517'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370517'>问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370517_comment'></div>易之说曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370517_comment'></div>乾健也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370517_comment'></div>今考乾之爻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370517_comment'></div>在初者曰潜龙勿用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370517_comment'></div>在三者曰夕惕若厉无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370517_comment'></div>在四者亦曰无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370517_comment'></div>在上曰有悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370517_comment'></div>卦六位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370517_comment'></div>一勿用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370517_comment'></div>二苟得无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370517_comment'></div>一有悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370517_comment'></div>安在其为健乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370517_comment'></div>又曰乾以易知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370517_comment'></div>坤以能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370517_comment'></div>乾之四位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370517_comment'></div>既不为易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370517_comment'></div>坤之爻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370517_comment'></div>又曰龙战于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370517_comment'></div>战之于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370517_comment'></div>其足为乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370517_comment'></div>易六经也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370517_comment'></div>学者之所宜用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370517_comment'></div>愿施其词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370517_comment'></div>陈其义焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370517_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370518?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370518'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370518'>问。人之仰而生者谷帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370518_comment'></div>谷帛丰。无饥寒之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370518_comment'></div>然后可以行之于仁义之途。措之于安平之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370518_comment'></div>此愚智所同识也。今天下谷愈多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370518_comment'></div>而帛愈贱。人愈困者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370518_comment'></div>何也。耕者不多而谷有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370518_comment'></div>蚕者不多而帛有馀。有馀宜足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370518_comment'></div>而反不足。此其故又何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370518_comment'></div>将以救之。其说如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370518_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1370518_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370519?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370519'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370519'>问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370519_comment'></div>夫子言尧舜垂衣裳而天下理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370519_comment'></div>又曰无为而理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370519_comment'></div>其舜也欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370519_comment'></div>书之说尧曰亲九族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370519_comment'></div>又曰平章百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370519_comment'></div>又曰协和万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370519_comment'></div>又曰历象日月星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370519_comment'></div>敬授人时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370519_comment'></div>又曰洪水怀山襄陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370519_comment'></div>下人其咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370519_comment'></div>夫亲九族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370519_comment'></div>平百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370519_comment'></div>和万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370519_comment'></div>则天道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370519_comment'></div>授人时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370519_comment'></div>愁水祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370519_comment'></div>非无事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370519_comment'></div>而其言曰垂衣裳而天下理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370519_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370519_comment'></div>于舜则曰慎五典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370519_comment'></div>又曰叙百揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370519_comment'></div>又曰宾四门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370519_comment'></div>又曰齐七政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370519_comment'></div>又曰类上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370519_comment'></div>禋六宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370519_comment'></div>望山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370519_comment'></div>遍群神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370519_comment'></div>又曰协时月正日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370519_comment'></div>同律度量衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370519_comment'></div>五载一巡狩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370519_comment'></div>又曰分十二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370519_comment'></div>封山浚川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370519_comment'></div>恤五刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370519_comment'></div>典三礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370519_comment'></div>彰施五色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370519_comment'></div>出纳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370519", 1370519, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>五言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370519_comment'></div>于虖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370519_comment'></div>其何勤且烦如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370519_comment'></div>而其言曰无为而理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370519_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370519_comment'></div>将亦有深辞隐义不可晓邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370519_comment'></div>抑其年代已远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370519_comment'></div>失其传邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370519_comment'></div>二三子其辩焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1370519_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370520?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370520_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370520'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370520'>问。古之学者必有师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370520_comment'></div>所以通其业。成就其道德者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370520_comment'></div>由汉氏已来。师道日微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370520_comment'></div>然犹时有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370520", 1370520, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>授经</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370520", 1370520, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>传业</span>者。及于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370520_comment'></div>则无闻矣。德行若颜回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370520_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370520", 1370520, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>言语</span>若子贡。政事若子路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370520_comment'></div>文学若子游。犹且有师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370520_comment'></div>非独如此。虽孔子亦有师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370520_comment'></div>问礼于老聃。问乐于苌宏是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370520_comment'></div>今之人不及孔子颜回远矣。而且无师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370520_comment'></div>然其不闻有业不通而道德不成者。何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370520_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1370520_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370521?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（798年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370521_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370521'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370521'>问。食粟衣帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370521_comment'></div>服仁行义。以俟死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370521_comment'></div>二帝三王之所守。圣人未之有改焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370521_comment'></div>今之说者。有神仙不死之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370521_comment'></div>不食粟。不衣帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370521_comment'></div>薄仁义以为不足为。是诚何道邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370521_comment'></div>圣人之于人。犹父母之于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370521_comment'></div>有其道而不以教之。不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370521_comment'></div>其道虽有而未之知。不智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370521_comment'></div>仁与智且不能。又乌足为圣人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370521_comment'></div>不然。则说神仙者妄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370521_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1370521_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　年初，在汴州任观察推官。为崔翰作墓志铭。崔是年正月五日病殁于家，二月安葬。作品：崔评事墓铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370807' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370807' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370807?labeling=true' target='_blank'>试大理评事胡君墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370807")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370807_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370807'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370807'>胡之氏。别于陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370807_comment'></div>明允先。河东人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370807_comment'></div>世勤固。戴厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370807_comment'></div>籍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370807", 1370807, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>文谱</span>。进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370807", 1370807, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>连伦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370807_comment'></div>惟明允。加武资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370807_comment'></div>力牛虎。柔不持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370807_comment'></div>吏夏阳。有施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370807_comment'></div>去平阳。民思悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370807_comment'></div>河东土。河陆原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370807_comment'></div>宜兹人。肖后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370807_comment'></div>五十七。不足年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370807_comment'></div>孤儿啼。死<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370807", 1370807, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>下官</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370807_comment'></div>母弟证。秩大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370807_comment'></div>摭君遗。哭泣书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370807_comment'></div>友韩愈。司马徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370807_comment'></div>作后铭。系序初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370807_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1370807_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年2月6日</a>　二月六日，在汴州。董晋灵柩西归前，作祭董晋文。作品：祭董相公文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷35。）</span><div id='poem_1370843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭董相公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年2月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370843")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370843'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370843'>维贞元十五年岁次己卯二月乙亥朔某日。节度行军司马检校右散骑常侍兼御史大夫知使事吴县开国男食邑三百户陆长源度支营田判官检校金部员外郎侍御史孟叔度观察支使监察御史里行邱颍观察推官守秘书省校书郎韩愈等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370843_comment'></div>谨以少牢之奠。敬祭于故尚书右仆射平章事陇西公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370843_comment'></div>呜呼。天高而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370843_comment'></div>地厚而平。五气叙行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370843_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370843", 1370843, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>万汇</span>顺成。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370843", 1370843, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>交感</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370843", 1370843, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>旁畅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370843_comment'></div>圣贤以生。雨水于云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370843_comment'></div>渎水于坤。蕃昌生物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370843_comment'></div>有假有因。天眷唐邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370843_comment'></div>锡之元臣。肫肫元臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370843_comment'></div>其德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370843", 1370843, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>孔硕</span>。不谄不笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370843_comment'></div>不威不赫。不求其盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370843_comment'></div>不致其敌。爰立作相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370843_comment'></div>吁谟实勤。出若无辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370843_comment'></div>畴德之闻。帝念东土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370843_comment'></div>公其来抚。乃守洛都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370843_comment'></div>乃藩浚郊。乃去厥疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370843_comment'></div>乃施厥膏。不知其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370843_comment'></div>鳏寡以饶。维昔浚郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370843_comment'></div>厥乱维旧。有狡有狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370843_comment'></div>其群孔丑。公其来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370843_comment'></div>为民父母。父诲其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370843_comment'></div>母仁其愚。既变既从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370843_comment'></div>孰云其初。自迩徂远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370843_comment'></div>混然一区。公来自中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370843_comment'></div>天子所倚。公今不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370843_comment'></div>谁佐天子。公既来止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370843_comment'></div>东人以完。公既殁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370843_comment'></div>人谁与安。浊流浑浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370843_comment'></div>有辟其郛。填道欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370843_comment'></div>公来之初。今公之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370843_comment'></div>公在丧车。旨酒既盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370843_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370843", 1370843, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>嘉肴</span>在盛。呜呼我公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370843_comment'></div>庶享其诚。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370843_comment'></div></div><div -----title
孟津（洛阳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3f399911b4bb4c3ab9805a7e28ff9b05_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3f399911b4bb4c3ab9805a7e28ff9b05");'><span id='3f399911b4bb4c3ab9805a7e28ff9b05_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>，32岁</div><div id='3f399911b4bb4c3ab9805a7e28ff9b05' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年2月</a>　二月中旬，知汴州乱消息后，次日晨由偃师护送董晋丧车至孟津渡河，之后立即骑马东返。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
巩义（汜水）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9f0abdec6cb94c71bce97b3b94b72ad0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9f0abdec6cb94c71bce97b3b94b72ad0");'><span id='9f0abdec6cb94c71bce97b3b94b72ad0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>，32岁</div><div id='9f0abdec6cb94c71bce97b3b94b72ad0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年2月</a>　二月中旬，由河阳立即东往徐州，当日黄昏时抵达汜水，夜渡黄河。<br /></div>

-----title
宿州（符离）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3daaa731d4674126880e64c18bc6885b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3daaa731d4674126880e64c18bc6885b");'><span id='3daaa731d4674126880e64c18bc6885b_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年3月</a>　在符离。作诗赠徐州刺史张建封，有责张不参与征讨吴少诚寇唐州之意。作品：赠张徐州莫辞酒。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49775' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49775")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49775_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49775'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_0_49775'>莫辞酒，此会固难同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49775_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49775'>请看女工机上帛，半作<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_2_49775'>莫辞酒，谁为君王之<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10875, "poem_sentence_2_49775")'>爪牙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49775_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49775'>春雷三月不作响，战士岂得来还家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49775_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49775'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49775_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_3_49586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49586'>我名属相府<span class='inlineComment2'>（时佐董晋幕府）</span>，欲往不得行。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49586'>思之不可见，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49586", 49586, 汴州举进士，愈为考官，试反舌无声诗，籍中等</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_49586_0'>⑵ 贞元十五年，高郢知举，籍登第。是岁三月，晋卒，愈护其丧行</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_54_49586_0'>⑶ ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年5月18日</a>　五月，在徐州符离。为董晋撰写行状。作品：赠太傅董公行状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷27。）</span><div id='poem_1370817' class='_poem'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370817'>曾祖仁琬，皇任梁州博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370817_comment'></div>祖大礼，皇赠右散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370817_comment'></div>父伯良，皇赠尚书左仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370817_comment'></div>公讳晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370817_comment'></div>字混成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370817_comment'></div>河中虞乡万岁里人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370817_comment'></div>少以明经上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370817_comment'></div>宣皇帝居原州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370817_comment'></div>公在原州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370817_comment'></div>宰相以公善为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370817_comment'></div>任翰林之选闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370817_comment'></div>召见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370817_comment'></div>拜秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370817_comment'></div>入翰林为学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370817_comment'></div>三年出入左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370817_comment'></div>天子以为谨愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370817_comment'></div>赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370817", 1370817, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>绯鱼袋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370817_comment'></div>累升为卫尉寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370817_comment'></div>出翰林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370817_comment'></div>以疾辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370817_comment'></div>拜汾州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370817_comment'></div>崔圆为扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370817_comment'></div>诏以公为圆节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370817_comment'></div>摄殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370817_comment'></div>以军事如京师朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370817_comment'></div>天子识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370817_comment'></div>拜殿中侍御史内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370817", 1370817, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>供奉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370817_comment'></div>由殿中为侍御史入尚书省为主客员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370817_comment'></div>由主客为祠部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370817_comment'></div>取回纥力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370817_comment'></div>约我为市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370817_comment'></div>马既入。<div id='poem_sentence_40_1370817_comment'></div>涵惧不敢对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370817_comment'></div>视公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370817_comment'></div>公与之言曰。<div id='poem_sentence_154_1370817_comment'></div>由太常拜门下侍郎平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370817_comment'></div>在宰相位凡五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370817_comment'></div>所奏于上前者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370817_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_158_1370817", 1370817, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>二帝三王</span>之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370817_comment'></div>由秦汉以降未尝言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370817_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_160_1370817", 1370817, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>退归</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370817_comment'></div>未尝言所言于上者于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370817_comment'></div>子弟有私问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370817_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370817_comment'></div>宰相所职系天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370817_comment'></div>天下安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370817_comment'></div>宰相之能与否可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370817_comment'></div>欲知宰相之能与否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370817_comment'></div>如此视之其可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370817_comment'></div>凡所谋议于上前者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370817_comment'></div>不足道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370817_comment'></div>故其事卒不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370817_comment'></div>以疾病辞于上前者不记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1370817_comment'></div>退以表辞者八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1370817_comment'></div>方许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1370817_comment'></div>拜礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1370817_comment'></div>制曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1370817_comment'></div>事上尽大臣之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1370817_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1370817_comment'></div>一心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_179_1370817", 1370817, "Clauses/182/Comments/0")'>奉公</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1370817_comment'></div>于是天下知公之有言于上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1370817_comment'></div>初公为宰相时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1370817_comment'></div>五月朔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_182_1370817", 1370817, "Clauses/185/Comments/0")'>会朝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1370817_comment'></div>疾作不能事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1370817_comment'></div>凡将大朝会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1370817_comment'></div><span id='poem_sentence_215_1370817_comment'></div>拜检校尚书左仆射同中书门下平章事汴州刺史宣武军节度副大使知节度事管内支度营田汴宋亳颍等州观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1370817_comment'></div>汴州自大历来多兵事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1370817_comment'></div>万荣病风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1370817_comment'></div>昏不知事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1370817_comment'></div>其子乃复欲为士宁之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1370817_comment'></div>未尝言兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1370817_comment'></div>有问之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1370817_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1370817_comment'></div>吾志于教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1370817_comment'></div>享年七十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1370817_comment'></div>阶累升为金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1370817_comment'></div>勋累升为上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1370817_comment'></div>爵累升为陇西郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1370817_comment'></div>娶南阳张氏夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1370817_comment'></div>后娶京兆韦氏夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1370817_comment'></div>皆先公终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1370817_comment'></div>四子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1370817_comment'></div>全道溪全素澥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1370817_comment'></div>全道全素皆上所赐名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1370817_comment'></div>全道为秘书省著作郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_386_1370817_comment'></div>溪为秘书省秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_387_1370817_comment'></div>全素为大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_388_1370817_comment'></div>澥为太常寺太祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_389_1370817_comment'></div>皆善士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_390_1370817_comment'></div>有学行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_391_1370817_comment'></div>谨具历官行事状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_392_1370817_comment'></div>伏请牒考功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_393_1370817_comment'></div>并牒太常议所谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_394_1370817_comment'></div>牒史馆请垂编录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_395_1370817_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_396_1370817_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　夏秋间，入徐州节度使幕之前，曾与张彻为邻，有诗文往来。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　本年，在徐州符离。子韩昶生，小名“符”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　本年，在徐州符离。有族侄来访，赠之诗。作品：赠族侄。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49781' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_1_49781'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49781", 49781, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>作书</span>献<span class='link' "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>秋蓬</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49781'><span class='link' "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>迁次</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49781", 49781, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>身命</span>多厄穷。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49781'>击门者谁子，问言乃吾宗。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49781'>自云有奇术，探妙知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49781", 49781, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>天工</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49781'>既往怅何及，将来喜还通。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
徐州（彭城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='de97678b3f0e462bb68c0f92037b66ef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("de97678b3f0e462bb68c0f92037b66ef");'><span id='de97678b3f0e462bb68c0f92037b66ef_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　本年，在徐州。李翱来信，回复之，有文。作品：与李翱书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷6。）</span><div id='poem_1370598' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370598_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370598'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370598'>使至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370598_comment'></div>辱足下书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370598_comment'></div>欢愧来并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370598_comment'></div>不容于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370598_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370598_comment'></div>子之言意皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370598_comment'></div>仆虽巧说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370598_comment'></div>何能逃其责耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370598_comment'></div>然皆子之爱我多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370598_comment'></div>重我厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370598_comment'></div>不酌时人待我之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370598_comment'></div>而以子之待我之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370598_comment'></div>使我望于时人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370598_comment'></div>仆之家本穷空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370598_comment'></div>重遇攻劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370598_comment'></div>衣服无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370598_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370598", 1370598, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>养生</span>之具无所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370598_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370598", 1370598, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>家累</span>仅三十口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370598_comment'></div>携此将安所归托乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370598_comment'></div>舍之入京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370598_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370598_comment'></div>挈之而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370598_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370598_comment'></div>足下将安以为我谋哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370598_comment'></div>此一事耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370598_comment'></div>足下谓我入京城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370598_comment'></div>有所益乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370598_comment'></div>仆之有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370598_comment'></div>犹有不知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370598_comment'></div>时人能知我哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370598_comment'></div>持仆所守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370598_comment'></div>驱而使奔走伺候公卿閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370598_comment'></div>开口<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_33_1370598_comment'></div>仆在京城八九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370598_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370598", 1370598, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>取资</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370598_comment'></div>日求于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370598_comment'></div>以度时月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370598_comment'></div>当时行之不觉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370598_comment'></div>今而思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370598_comment'></div>如痛定之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370598_comment'></div>思当痛之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370598_comment'></div>不知何能自处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370598_comment'></div>今年加长矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370598_comment'></div>复驱之使就其故地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370598_comment'></div>是亦难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370598_comment'></div>所贵乎京师者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370598_comment'></div>不以明天子在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370598_comment'></div>贤公卿在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370598_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370598", 1370598, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>布衣韦带</span>之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370598_comment'></div>谈道义者多乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370598_comment'></div>以仆遑遑于其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370598_comment'></div>能上闻而下达乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370598_comment'></div>其知我者固少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370598_comment'></div>知而相爱不相忌者又加少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370598_comment'></div>内无所资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370598_comment'></div>外无所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370598_comment'></div>终安所为乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370598_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370598_comment'></div>子之责我诚是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370598_comment'></div>爱我诚多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370598_comment'></div>今天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370598_comment'></div>有如子者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370598_comment'></div>自尧舜以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370598_comment'></div>士有不遇者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370598_comment'></div>无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370598_comment'></div>子独安能使我洁清不污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370598_comment'></div>而处其所可乐哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370598_comment'></div>非不愿为子之所云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370598_comment'></div>力不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370598_comment'></div>势不便故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370598_comment'></div>仆于此岂以为大相知乎。<div
