id='poem_sentence_73_1370598_comment'></div>饥而食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370598_comment'></div>饱而嬉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370598_comment'></div>其所以止而不去者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370598_comment'></div>以其心诚有爱于仆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370598_comment'></div>然所爱于我者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370598_comment'></div>不知我者犹多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370598_comment'></div>吾岂乐于此乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370598_comment'></div>将亦有所病而求息于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370598_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370598_comment'></div>子诚爱我矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370598_comment'></div>子之所责于我者诚是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370598_comment'></div>然恐子有时不暇责我而悲我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370598_comment'></div>不暇悲我而自责且自悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370598_comment'></div>及之而后知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370598_comment'></div>履之而后难耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370598_comment'></div>孔子称颜回一箪食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370598_comment'></div>一瓢饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370598_comment'></div>人不堪其忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370598_comment'></div>回也不改其乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370598_comment'></div>彼人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370598_comment'></div>有圣者为之依归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370598_comment'></div>而又有箪食瓢饮。<div id='poem_sentence_103_1370598_comment'></div>其不亦难乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370598_comment'></div>子之闻我言亦悲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370598_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>专使</span>驰此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370598_comment'></div>候足下意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370598_comment'></div>并以自解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370598_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1370598_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　秋，张建封奏韩愈为节度推官，试协律郎，入徐州节度使幕。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　秋，在徐州任节度推官。夏秋之际，郑州滑州发大水。有诗，抒发忧民之心。作品：龊龊。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49766' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49766?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龊龊</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49766")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49766_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49766'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4748, id='poem_sentence_3_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49766'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49766", 49766, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>妖姬</span>坐左右，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49766", 49766, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>柔指</span>发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49766", 49766, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>哀弹</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49766'>酒肴虽日陈，感激宁为欢。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49766'>秋阴欺白日，泥潦不少乾。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49766'>河堤决<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49766", 49766, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>东郡</span>，老弱随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49766", 49766, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>惊湍</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49766'>天意固有属，谁能诘其端。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49766'>愿辱太守荐，得充谏诤官。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49766'>排云叫<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4748, "poem_sentence_10_49766")'>阊阖</span>，披腹呈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49766", 49766, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>琅玕</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49766'>致君岂无术，自进诚独难。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49766'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_49766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49766'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49766)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年9月1日</a>　九月，在徐州任节度推官。上书张建封，不满“晨入夜归”之旧规。作品：上张仆射书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370599' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370599' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370599?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上张仆射书</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年9月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370599")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370599_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370599'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370599'>九月一日。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370599_comment'></div>受牒之明日。在使院中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370599_comment'></div>有小吏持院中故事节目十馀事来示愈。其中不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370599_comment'></div>有自九月至明年二月之终。皆晨入夜归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370599_comment'></div>非有疾病<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>事故</span>。辄不许出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370599_comment'></div>当时以初受命。不敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370599_comment'></div>古人有言曰。人各有能有不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370599_comment'></div>若此者。非愈之所能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370599_comment'></div>抑而行之。必发狂疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370599_comment'></div>上无以承事于公。忘其将所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>报德</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370599_comment'></div>下无以自立。丧失其所以为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370599_comment'></div>夫如是。则安得而不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370599_comment'></div>凡执事之择于愈者。非为其能晨入夜归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370599_comment'></div>必将有以取之。苟有以取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370599_comment'></div>虽不晨入而夜归。其所取者犹在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370599_comment'></div>下之事上。不一其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370599_comment'></div>上之使下。不一其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370599_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>量力</span>而仕之。度才而处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370599_comment'></div>其所不能。不彊使为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370599_comment'></div>是故为下者不获罪于上。为上者不得怨于下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370599_comment'></div>孟子有云。今之诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370599_comment'></div>无大相过者。以其皆好臣其所教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370599_comment'></div>而不好臣其所受教。今之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370599_comment'></div>与孟子之时又加远矣。皆好其闻命而奔走者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370599_comment'></div>不好其直己而行道者。闻命而奔走者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370599_comment'></div>好利者也。直己而行道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370599_comment'></div>好义者也。未有好利而爱其君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370599_comment'></div>未有好义而忘其君者。今之王公大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370599_comment'></div>惟执事可以闻此言。惟愈于执事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370599_comment'></div>可以此言进。愈蒙幸于执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370599_comment'></div>其所从旧矣。若宽假之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370599_comment'></div>使不失其性。加待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370599_comment'></div>使足以为名。寅而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370599_comment'></div>尽辰而退。申而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370599_comment'></div>终酉而退。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>率以为常</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370599_comment'></div>亦不废事。天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370599_comment'></div>闻执事之于愈如是也。必皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370599_comment'></div>执事之好士也如此。执事之待士以礼如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370599_comment'></div>执事之使人不枉其性而能有容如此。执事之欲成人之名如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370599_comment'></div>执事之厚于故旧如此。又将曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370599_comment'></div>韩愈之识其所依归也如此。韩愈之不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>谄屈</span>于富贵之人如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370599_comment'></div>韩愈之贤能使其主待之以礼如此。则死于执事之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370599_comment'></div>无悔也。若使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>随行</span>而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370599_comment'></div>逐队而趋。言不敢尽其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370599_comment'></div>道有所屈于己。天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370599_comment'></div>闻执事之于愈如此。皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370599_comment'></div>执事之用韩愈。哀其穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370599_comment'></div>收之而已耳。韩愈之事执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370599_comment'></div>不以道。利之而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370599_comment'></div>苟如是。虽日受千金之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370599_comment'></div>一岁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>九迁</span>其官。感恩则有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370599_comment'></div>将以称于天下。曰知已知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370599_comment'></div>则未也。伏惟哀其所不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370599_comment'></div>矜其愚。不录其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370599_comment'></div>察其辞而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370599", 1370599, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>垂仁</span>采纳焉。愈恐惧再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370599_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1370599_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年9月</a>　本年，在徐州任节度推官。上书张建封，谏阻张建封击马毬。作品：上张仆射第二书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷7。）</span><div id='poem_1370606' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370606' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370606?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上张仆射第二书</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370606")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370606_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370606'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370606'>愈再拜。以击毬事谏执事者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370606_comment'></div>谏者不休。执事不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370606_comment'></div>此非为其乐不可舍。其谏不足听故哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370606_comment'></div>谏不足听者。辞不足感心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370606_comment'></div>乐不可舍者。患不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>切身</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370606_comment'></div>今之言毬之害者。必曰有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>危堕</span>之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370606_comment'></div>有激射之虞。小者伤面目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370606_comment'></div>大者残形躯。执事闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370606_comment'></div>若不闻者。其意必曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370606_comment'></div>进若习熟。则无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>危堕</span>之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370606_comment'></div>避能便捷。则免激射之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370606_comment'></div>小何伤于面目。大何累于形躯者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370606_comment'></div>愈今所言。皆不在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370606_comment'></div>其指要非以他事外物牵引相比也。特以击毬之閒之事明之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370606_comment'></div>马之与人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>情性</span>殊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370606_comment'></div>至于筋骸之相束。血气之相持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370606_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>安佚</span>则适。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>劳顿</span>则疲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370606_comment'></div>同也。乘之有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370606_comment'></div>步骤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>折中</span>。少必无疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370606_comment'></div>老必后衰。及以之驰毬于场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370606_comment'></div>荡摇其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>心腑</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>振挠</span>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>骨筋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370606_comment'></div>气不及出入。走不及回旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370606_comment'></div>远者三四年。近者一二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370606_comment'></div>无全马矣。然则毬之害于人也决矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370606_comment'></div>凡五脏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>系络</span>甚微。立坐必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>悬垂</span>于胸臆之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370606_comment'></div>而以之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>颠顿</span>驰骋。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370606_comment'></div>其危哉。春秋传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370606_comment'></div>夫有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>尤物</span>。足以移人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370606_comment'></div>苟非德义。则必有祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370606_comment'></div>虽岂弟君子。神明所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370606", 1370606, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>扶持</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370606_comment'></div>然广虑之。深思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370606_comment'></div>亦养寿命之一端也。愈恐惧再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370606_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1370606_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年9月</a>　本年，在徐州任节度推官。劝谏张建封应努力讨贼，不应沉湎于击马球。有诗。作品：汴泗交流赠张仆射。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49607' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49607' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49607?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汴泗交流赠张仆射<span class='inlineComment2'>（建封）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（799年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49607")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49607_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49607'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49607'>汴泗交流郡城角，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49607", 49607, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>筑场</span>十<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作千）</span>步平如削。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49607'>短垣三面缭逶迤，击鼓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49607", 49607, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>腾腾</span>树<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49607", 49607, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>赤旗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49607'>新秋朝凉未见日，公早结束来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49607", 49607, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>何为</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49607'>分曹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49607", 49607, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>决胜</span>约前定，百马<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49607", 49607, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>攒蹄</span>近相映。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49607'>毬惊杖奋合且离，红牛缨绂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49607", 49607, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>黄金羁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49607'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49607", 49607, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>侧身</span>转臂著马腹，霹雳应手<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49607", 49607, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>神珠</span>驰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49607'>超遥散漫两闲暇，挥霍纷纭争变化。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49607'>发难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49607", 49607, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>得巧</span>意气粗，欢声<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49607", 49607, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>四合</span>壮士呼。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49607'>此诚习战非为剧，岂若安坐行良图。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49607'>当今忠臣不可得，公马莫走须杀贼。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49607'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_49607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49607'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49607)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　秋冬，在徐州任节度推官。随张建封出猎，有诗。作品：雉带箭。<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　秋冬，在徐州任节度推官。作诗叹从仕之难，抒发内心极度苦闷之情。作品：从仕。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49480' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49480")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49480_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　秋，有人在符离安阜屯捉到一只白兔，上献张建封，众人以为吉兆，韩愈也上书祝贺。作品：贺徐州张仆射白兔书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。张贞元十六年，130。）</span><div id='poem_1370583' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370583' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370583?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺徐州张仆射白兔状</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370583")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370583'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370583'>伏闻今月五日。营田巡官陈从政献瑞兔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370583_comment'></div>毛质<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>皦白</span>。天驯其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370583_comment'></div>其始实得之符离安阜屯。屯之役夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370583_comment'></div>朝行遇之。迫之弗逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370583_comment'></div>人立而拱。窃惟休咎之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370583_comment'></div>天所以启觉于下。依类托喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370583_comment'></div>事之纤悉。不可图验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370583_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>睿智</span>博通。孰克究明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370583_comment'></div>愈虽不敏。请试辨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370583_comment'></div>兔阴类也。又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>窟居</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370583_comment'></div>狡而伏。逆象也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370583_comment'></div>今白其色。绝其群也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370583_comment'></div>驯其心。化吾德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370583_comment'></div>人立而拱。非禽兽之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370583_comment'></div>革而从人。且<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>服罪</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370583_comment'></div>得之符离。符离实戎国名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370583_comment'></div>又附丽也。不在农夫之田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370583_comment'></div>而在军田。武德行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370583_comment'></div>不战而来之之道也。有安阜之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>嘉名</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370583_comment'></div>伏惟閤下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>股肱</span>帝室。藩垣天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370583_comment'></div>四方其有逆乱之臣。未血斧锧之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370583_comment'></div>畏威<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>崩析</span>。归我乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370583_comment'></div>其事兆矣。是宜具迹表闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370583_comment'></div>以承答天意。小子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370583", 1370583, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>不惠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370583_comment'></div>猥以文句微识蒙念。睹兹盛美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370583_comment'></div>焉敢避不让之责而默默耶。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370583_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1370583_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年11月</a>　十一月，在徐州张建封幕。受邀作记文，揄扬李博、张建封。作品：徐泗濠三州节度掌书记厅石记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370678' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370678' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370678?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐泗豪三州节度掌书记厅石记</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370678")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370678_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370678'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370678'>书记之任亦难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370678_comment'></div>元戎整齐三军之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370678_comment'></div>统理所部之氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370678_comment'></div>以镇守邦国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370678_comment'></div>赞天子施教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370678_comment'></div>而又外与宾客四邻交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370678_comment'></div>其朝觐聘问慰荐祭祀祈祝之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370678_comment'></div>与所部之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370678_comment'></div>三军之号令升黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370678_comment'></div>凡文辞之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370678_comment'></div>皆出书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370678_comment'></div>非闳辨通敏兼人之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370678_comment'></div>莫宜居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370678_comment'></div>然皆元戎自辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370678_comment'></div>然后命于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370678_comment'></div>苟其帅之不文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370678_comment'></div>则其所辟或不当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370678_comment'></div>亦其理宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370678_comment'></div>南阳公自御史大夫豪寿庐三州观察使授节移镇徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370678_comment'></div>历十一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370678_comment'></div>而掌书记者凡三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370678_comment'></div>其一人曰高阳许孟容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370678_comment'></div>入仕于王朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370678_comment'></div>今为尚书礼部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370678_comment'></div>其一人曰京兆杜兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370678_comment'></div>今为尚书礼部员外郎观察判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370678_comment'></div>其一人陇西李博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370678_comment'></div>自前乡贡进士授秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370678_comment'></div>方为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370678_comment'></div>南阳公文章称天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370678_comment'></div>其所辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370678_comment'></div>实所谓闳辨通敏兼人之才者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370678_comment'></div>后之人苟未知南阳公之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370678_comment'></div>吾请观于三君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370678_comment'></div>苟未知三君子之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370678_comment'></div>吾请观于南阳公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370678_comment'></div>可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370678_comment'></div>蔚乎其相章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370678_comment'></div>炳乎其相辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370678_comment'></div>志同而气合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370678_comment'></div>鱼川泳而鸟云飞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370678_comment'></div>愈乐是宾主之相得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370678_comment'></div>故请刻石以记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370678_comment'></div>而陷置于壁閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370678_comment'></div>俾来者得以览观焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1370678_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　本年，在徐州任节度推官。赠张建封女婿李君房，有文。作品：爱直赠李君房别。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>爱直赠李君房别</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370716")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370716'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370716'>左右前后皆正人也。欲其身之不正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370716_comment'></div>乌可得邪。吾观李生在南阳公之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370716_comment'></div>有所不知。知之未尝不为之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370716_comment'></div>有所不疑。疑之未尝不为之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370716_comment'></div>勇不动于气。义不陈乎色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370716_comment'></div>南阳公举措<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370716", 1370716, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>施为</span>。不失其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370716_comment'></div>天下之所以窥观称道洋洋者。抑亦左右前后有其人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370716_comment'></div>凡在此趋公之庭。议公之事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370716_comment'></div>吾既从而游矣。言而公信之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370716_comment'></div>谋而公从之者。四方之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370716_comment'></div>则既闻而知之矣。李生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370716_comment'></div>南阳公之甥也。人不知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370716_comment'></div>将曰李生之托婚于贵富之家。将以充其所求而止耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370716_comment'></div>故吾乐为天下道其为人焉。今之从事于彼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370716_comment'></div>吾为南阳公爱之。又未知人之举李生于彼者何辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370716_comment'></div>彼之所以待李生者何道。举不失辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370716_comment'></div>待不失道。虽失之此足爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370716_comment'></div>而得之彼为欢忻。于李生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370716_comment'></div>道犹若也。举之不以吾所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370716_comment'></div>待之不以吾所期。李生之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370716_comment'></div>不可出诸其口矣。吾重为天下惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370716_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1370716_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年12月</a>　冬，以徐州从事朝正京师，途行河堤，有感赋诗。作品：暮行河堤上。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>暮行河堤上</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49756")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49756'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49756'>暮行河堤上，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49756", 49756, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>四顾</span>不见人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49756'>衰草际黄云，感叹愁我神。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49756'>夜归孤舟卧，展转空及晨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49756'>谋计竟何就，嗟嗟世与身。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49756'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49756_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='65d66a719fe646afbb2a08684374b1f6_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年3月</a>　春，在徐州任节度推官。感春意，触幽怀，有诗。作品：幽怀。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_49649' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49649' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49649?labeling=true' target='_blank'>幽怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49649")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49649_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49649'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49649'>幽怀不能写，行此春江浔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49649_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49649'>适与佳节会，士女竞光阴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49649_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49649_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49649'>间关林中鸟，亦知和为音。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49649_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年3月</a>　韩愈在徐州张建封幕近一年，不得意，拟秋后离徐。三月，作书信与孟郊，希望孟前来，与李翱、张籍等相聚。作品：与孟东野书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370580' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370580' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370580?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与孟东野书</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370580")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370580_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370580'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370580'>与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>足下</span>别久矣。以吾心之思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>足下</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370580_comment'></div>知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>足下</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>悬悬</span>于吾也。各以事牵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370580_comment'></div>不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>合并</span>。其于人人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370580_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>足下</span>之为见而日与之处。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>足下</span>知吾心乐否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370580_comment'></div>吾言之而听者谁欤。吾倡之而和者谁欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370580_comment'></div>言无听也。倡无和也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370580_comment'></div>独行而无徒也。是非无所与同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370580_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>足下</span>知吾心乐否也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>足下</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>才高气清</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370580_comment'></div>行古道。处今世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370580_comment'></div>无田而衣食。事亲左右无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370580_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>足下</span>之用心勤矣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>足下</span>之处身劳且苦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370580_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>混混</span>与世相浊。独其心追古人而从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370580_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>足下</span>之道。其使吾悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370580_comment'></div>去年春。脱汴州之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370580_comment'></div>幸不死。无所于归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370580_comment'></div>遂来于此。主人与吾有故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370580_comment'></div>哀其穷。居吾于符离睢上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370580_comment'></div>及秋。将辞去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370580_comment'></div>因被留以职事。默默在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370580_comment'></div>行一年矣。到今年秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370580_comment'></div>聊复辞去。江湖余乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370580_comment'></div>与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>足下</span>终幸矣。李习之娶吾亡兄之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370580_comment'></div>期在后月。朝夕当来此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370580_comment'></div>张籍在和州居丧。家甚贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370580_comment'></div>恐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>足下</span>不知。故具此白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370580_comment'></div>冀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>足下</span>一来相视也。自彼至此虽远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370580_comment'></div>要皆舟行可至。速图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370580_comment'></div>吾之望也。春且尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370580_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>时气</span>向热。惟侍奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>吉庆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370580_comment'></div>愈眼疾比剧。甚无聊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370580_comment'></div>不复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370580", 1370580, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>一一</span>。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370580_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1370580_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>　本年五月前，在徐州。董邵南未应举之时，韩愈作诗褒扬荐举之。作品：嗟哉董生行。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷1。张贞元十五年，118。）</span><div id='poem_49714' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49714' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49714?labeling=true' id='poem_content_49714'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49714'>淮水出桐柏，山东驰遥遥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作悠悠）</span>，千里不能休。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49714'>淝水出其侧，不能千里百里入淮流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49714'>寿州属县有安丰，唐贞元时县人董生召南隐居行义于其中。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49714'>刺史不能荐，天子不闻名声，爵禄不及门。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49714'>门外惟有吏，日来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49714", 49714, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>徵租</span>更索钱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49714'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49714", 49714, id='poem_sentence_6_49714'>尽日不得息，或山而<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作于）</span>樵，或水而<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作于）</span>渔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49714_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_49714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49714'>父母不戚戚，妻子不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49714", 49714, -----title
邳州（下邳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6de381647fd5476c85d8eda68c8d8aed_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6de381647fd5476c85d8eda68c8d8aed");'><span id='6de381647fd5476c85d8eda68c8d8aed_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年5月14日</a>　五月，离张建封幕与李翱、王涯、侯喜同游，在下邳偶与旧识李平相遇，同游睢阳等地，作文题壁留念。次日徐州即发生兵变，韩愈再次侥幸逃脱。作品：题李生壁。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷34。磊按：下邳在徐州东南，韩愈去徐归洛，当西行，不应过下邳。且此文多叙述宋州景物。疑有误。）</span><div id='poem_1370728' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370728' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370728?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题李生壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年5月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1370728'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370728'>余始得李生于河中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370728_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370728", 1370728, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>相遇</span>于下邳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370728_comment'></div>自始及今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370728_comment'></div>十四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370728_comment'></div>始相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370728_comment'></div>吾与之皆未冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370728_comment'></div>未通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370728", 1370728, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>人事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370728_comment'></div>追思多有可笑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370728_comment'></div>与生皆然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370728_comment'></div>今者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370728", 1370728, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>相遇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370728_comment'></div>皆有妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370728_comment'></div>昔时无度量之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370728_comment'></div>宁复可有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370728_comment'></div>是生之为交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370728_comment'></div>何其近古人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370728_comment'></div>是来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370728_comment'></div>余黜于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370728", 1370728, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>徐州</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370728_comment'></div>将西居于洛阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370728_comment'></div>汎舟于清泠池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370728_comment'></div>泊于文雅台下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370728_comment'></div>西望商邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370728_comment'></div>东望修竹园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370728_comment'></div>入微子庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370728_comment'></div>求邹阳枚叔司马相如之故文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370728_comment'></div>久立于庙陛閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370728_comment'></div>悲那颂之不作于是者已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370728_comment'></div>陇西李翱太原王涯上谷侯喜实同与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370728_comment'></div>贞元十六年五月十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370728_comment'></div>昌黎韩愈书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1370728_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
华阴
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1c3e9f00b32245d288cd21e71dc7e75b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1c3e9f00b32245d288cd21e71dc7e75b");'><span id='1c3e9f00b32245d288cd21e71dc7e75b_link' -----title
阳山
-----detail

"Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>嶙峋</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49683'>夜宿最高顶，举头看星辰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49683'>光芒相照烛，南北争<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49683", 49683, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>罗陈</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49683'>兹地绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49683", 49683, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>翔走</span>，自然严且神。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49683'>微风吹木石，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49683", 49683, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>澎湃</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7486, "poem_sentence_8_49683")'>闻韶</span>钧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49683'>夜半起下视，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49683", 49683, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>溟波</span>衔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49683", 49683, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>日轮</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49683'>鱼龙惊踊跃，叫啸成悲辛。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49683'>怪气或紫赤，敲磨共轮囷。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49683'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49683", 49683, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>金鸦</span>既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49683", 49683, "Clauses/24/Comments/1")'>腾翥</span>，六合俄清新。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49683'>常闻禹穴奇，东去窥瓯闽。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49683'>越俗不好古，流传失其真。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49683'>幽踪邈难得，圣路<span class='inlineComment2'>（舜禹南巡之路）</span>嗟长堙。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49683'>回临浙江涛，屹起高<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49683", 49683, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>峨岷</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49683'>壮志死不息，千年如隔晨。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49683'>是非竟何有，弃去非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_49683", 49683, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_49683", 49683, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>游巡</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_49683'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_49683", 49683, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>崔崒</span>没云表，陂陀浸湖沦。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49683'>是时雨初霁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_49683", 49683, id='poem_sentence_21_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_49683'>前年往罗浮，步戛南海漘。<div id='poem_sentence_22_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49683'>鹏鶱堕长翮，鲸戏侧脩鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_24_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_49683'>自来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_49683", 49683, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>连州</span>寺，曾未造城闉。<div id='poem_sentence_25_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49683'>日携<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_49683", 49683, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>青云客</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_49683", 49683, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>探胜</span>穷崖滨。<div id='poem_sentence_26_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_49683'>太守邀不去，群官请徒频。<div id='poem_sentence_27_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_49683'>囊无一金资，翻谓富者贫。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_49683'>昨日忽不见，我令访其邻。<div id='poem_sentence_29_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_49683'>奔波自追及，把手问所因。<div id='poem_sentence_30_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_49683'>顾我却兴欢，君宁异于民。<div id='poem_sentence_31_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_49683'>离合自古然，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_49683", 49683, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>辞别</span>安足珍。<div id='poem_sentence_32_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_49683'>吾闻九疑好，夙志今欲伸。<div id='poem_sentence_33_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_49683'>斑竹<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(452, "poem_sentence_34_49683")'>啼舜妇</span>，清湘<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1456, "poem_sentence_34_49683")'>沈楚臣</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_34_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_49683'>衡山与洞庭，此固道所循。<div id='poem_sentence_35_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_49683'>寻崧方抵洛，历华遂之秦。<div id='poem_sentence_36_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_49683'>浮游靡定处，偶往即通津。<div id='poem_sentence_37_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_49683'>吾言子当去，子道非吾遵。<div id='poem_sentence_38_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_49683'>江鱼不池活，野鸟难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_49683", 49683, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>笼驯</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_39_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_49683'>吾非<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9038, "poem_sentence_40_49683")'>西方教</span>，怜子狂且醇。<div id='poem_sentence_40_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_49683'>吾嫉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_49683", 49683, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>惰游</span>者，怜子愚且谆。<div id='poem_sentence_41_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_49683'>去矣各异趣，何为浪沾巾。<div id='poem_sentence_42_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_49683'></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_49683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49683'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49683)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。送僧人灵师，有诗。作品：送灵师。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_49676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送灵师</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49676")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49676_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49676'><span "poem_allusion_49676")'>一掷</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1472, "poem_allusion_49676")'>头风痊</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49676_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49676'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49676'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49676", 49676, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>佛法</span>入中国，尔来六百年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49676'>齐民逃赋役，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49676", 49676, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>高士</span>著幽禅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49676'>官吏不之制，纷纷听其然。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49676'>耕桑日失隶，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49676", 49676, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>朝署</span>时遣贤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49676'>灵师皇甫姓，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49676", 49676, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>胤胄</span>本蝉联。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49676'>少小涉书史，早能缀文篇。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49676'>中间不得意，失迹成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49676", 49676, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>延迁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49676'>逸志不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49676", 49676, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>拘教</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49676", 49676, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>轩腾</span>断<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49676", 49676, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>牵挛</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49676'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49676", 49676, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>围棋</span>斗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49676", 49676, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>白黑</span>，生死随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49676", 49676, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>机权</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49676'>六博在<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(412, "poem_sentence_9_49676")'>一掷</span>，枭卢叱回旋。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49676'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49676", 49676, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>战诗</span>谁与敌，浩汗横戈鋋<span class='inlineComment2'>（音延）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49676'>饮酒尽百𧣴，嘲诣思逾鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49676'>有时醉花月，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49676", 49676, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>高唱</span>清且绵。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49676'>四座咸寂默，杳如奏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_49676", 49676, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>湘弦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49676'>寻胜不惮险，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49676", 49676, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>黔江</span>屡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49676", 49676, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>洄沿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49676'>瞿塘五六月，惊电让归船。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49676'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49676", 49676, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>怒水</span>忽中裂，千寻堕幽泉。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49676'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49676", 49676, "Clauses/43/Comments/1")'>转延</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_49676'>开忠二<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_23_49676'>失职不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_49676", 49676, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>把笔</span>，珠玑为君编。<div id='poem_sentence_23_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49676'>强留费日月，密席罗婵娟。<div id='poem_sentence_24_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_49676'>湖游泛漭沆，溪宴驻潺湲。<div id='poem_sentence_27_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_49676'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_49676", 49676, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>别语</span>不许出，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_49676", 49676, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>行裾</span>动遭牵。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_49676'>邻州竞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_49676", 49676, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>招请</span>，书札何翩翩。<div id='poem_sentence_29_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_49676'>十月下桂岭，乘寒恣窥缘。<div id='poem_sentence_30_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_49676'>自从入宾馆，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_49676", 49676, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>占吝</span>久能专。<div id='poem_sentence_32_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_49676'>吾徒颇携被，接宿穷欢妍。<div id='poem_sentence_33_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_49676'>听说两京事，分明皆眼前。<div id='poem_sentence_34_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_49676'>纵横杂谣俗，琐屑咸罗穿。<div id='poem_sentence_35_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_49676'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_49676", 49676, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>材调</span>真可惜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_49676", 49676, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>朱丹</span>在磨研。<div id='poem_sentence_36_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_49676'>方将敛之道，且欲冠其颠。<div id='poem_sentence_37_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_49676'>韶阳李太守，高步凌云烟。<div id='poem_sentence_38_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_49676'>得客辄忘食，开囊乞缯钱。<div id='poem_sentence_39_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_49676'>手持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_49676", 49676, "Clauses/80/Comments/1")'>南曹</span>叙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，字重青瑶镌。<div id='poem_sentence_40_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_49676'><span id='poem_sentence_42_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_49676'>还如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_49676", 49676, id='poem_sentence_45_49676'></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_49676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49676'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_49676_0'>⑴ ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。李伯康守郴州，韩愈南行途经时曾谒之。是年冬，韩愈赠李伯康黄柑，李回赠纸笔，韩作诗以答。作品：李员外寄纸笔。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div "poem_allusion_49599")'>虞卿</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49599_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49599'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49599'>题是<span id='poem_sentence_1_49599'>兔尖针莫并，茧净雪难如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49599'>莫怪殷勤谢，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7111, "poem_sentence_2_49599")'>虞卿</span>正著书。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49599'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_49599_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。为连州司户参军王弘中之燕喜亭作记。作品：燕喜亭记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370677' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370677' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370677?labeling=true' target='_blank'>燕喜亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370677")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370677_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370677'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370677'>太原王宏中在连州。与学佛人景常元慧游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370677_comment'></div>异日从二人者。行于其居之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370677_comment'></div>邱荒之閒。上高而望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370677_comment'></div>得异处焉。斩茅而嘉树列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370677_comment'></div>发石而清泉激。辇粪壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370677_comment'></div>燔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370677", 1370677, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>椔翳</span>。却立而视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370677_comment'></div>出者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370677", 1370677, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>突然</span>成邱。陷者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370677", 1370677, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>呀然</span>成谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370677_comment'></div>洼者为池。而阙者为洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370677_comment'></div>若有鬼神异物。阴来相之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370677_comment'></div>自是宏中与二人者。晨往而夕忘归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370677_comment'></div>乃立屋以避风雨寒暑。既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370677_comment'></div>愈请名之。其邱曰俟德之邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370677_comment'></div>蔽于古而显于今。有俟之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370677_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370677", 1370677, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>石谷</span>曰谦受之谷。瀑曰振鹭之瀑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370677_comment'></div>谷言德。瀑言容也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370677_comment'></div>其土谷曰黄金之谷。瀑曰秩秩之瀑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370677_comment'></div>谷言容。瀑言德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370677_comment'></div>洞曰寒居之洞。志其入时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370677_comment'></div>池曰君子之池。虚以钟其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370677_comment'></div>盈以出其恶也。泉之源曰天泽之泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370677_comment'></div>出高而施下也。合而名之以屋曰燕喜之亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370677_comment'></div>取诗所谓鲁侯燕喜者颂也。于是州民之老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370677_comment'></div>闻而相与观焉。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370677_comment'></div>吾州之山水名天下。然而无与燕喜者比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370677_comment'></div>经营于其侧者相接也。而莫直其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370677_comment'></div>凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370677", 1370677, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>天作</span>而地藏之。以遗其人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370677_comment'></div>宏中自吏部郎贬秩而来。次其道途所经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370677_comment'></div>自蓝田入商洛。涉淅湍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370677_comment'></div>临汉水。升岘首以望方城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370677_comment'></div>出荆门。下岷江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370677_comment'></div>过洞庭。上湘水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370677_comment'></div>行衡山之下。繇郴踰岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370677_comment'></div>猿狖所家。鱼龙所宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370677_comment'></div>极幽遐瑰诡之观。宜其于山水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370677", 1370677, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>饫闻</span>而厌见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370677_comment'></div>今其意乃若不足。传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370677_comment'></div>知者乐水。仁者乐山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370677_comment'></div>宏中之德与其所好。可谓协矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370677_comment'></div>智以谋之。仁以居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370677_comment'></div>吾知其去是而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370677", 1370677, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>羽仪</span>于天朝也不远矣。遂刻石以记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370677_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1370677_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。答张署赠诗，有诗。作品：答张十一功曹。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_49530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49530'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49530'>山净江空水见沙，哀猿啼处两三家。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。时杨仪之以湖南支使来，韩愈作赋别之。作品：别知赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（马其昶《韩昌黎文集校注》卷1。）</span><div id='poem_1370503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370503?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别知赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（送杨仪之）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370503")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370503'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370503'>余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>取友</span>于天下。将岁行之两周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370503_comment'></div>下何深之不即。上何高之不求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370503_comment'></div>纷扰扰其既多。咸喜能而好修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370503_comment'></div>宁安显而独裕。顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>阨穷</span>而共愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370503_comment'></div>惟知心之难得。斯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>百一</span>而为收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370503_comment'></div>岁癸未而<span class='link' "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>虫蛇</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>海陬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370503_comment'></div>遇夫人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>来使</span>。辟公馆而罗羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370503_comment'></div>索微言于乱志。发孤笑于群忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370503_comment'></div>物何深而不镜。理何隐而不抽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370503_comment'></div>始参差以异序。卒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>烂漫</span>而同流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370503_comment'></div>何此欢之不可恃。遂驾马而回辀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370503_comment'></div>山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>磝磝</span>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>相轧</span>。树蓊蓊其相摎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370503_comment'></div>雨浪浪其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>不止</span>。云浩浩其常浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370503_comment'></div>知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>来者</span>之不可以数。哀去此而无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370503_comment'></div>倚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370503", 1370503, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>郭郛</span>而<span class='link' "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>迟留</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370503_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1370503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。时杨仪之以湖南支使来，韩愈作序别之。作品：送杨支使序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370649' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370649' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370649?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杨支使序</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370649")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370649_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370649'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370649'>愈在京师时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370649_comment'></div>尝闻当今藩翰之宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370649_comment'></div>惟宣州为多贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370649_comment'></div>与之游者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370649_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370649", 1370649, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>陇西</span>李博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370649_comment'></div>清河崔群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370649_comment'></div>群与博之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370649_comment'></div>吾知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370649_comment'></div>道不行于主人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370649_comment'></div>与之处者非其类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370649_comment'></div>虽有享之以季氏之富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370649_comment'></div>不一日留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370649_comment'></div>以群博论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370649_comment'></div>凡在宣州之幕下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370649_comment'></div>虽不尽与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370649_comment'></div>皆可信而得其为人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370649_comment'></div>愈未尝至宣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370649_comment'></div>而乐颂其主人之贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370649_comment'></div>以其取人信之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370649_comment'></div>今中丞之在朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370649_comment'></div>愈日侍言于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370649_comment'></div>其来而镇兹土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370649_comment'></div>有问湖南之宾客者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370649_comment'></div>愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370649_comment'></div>知其客可以信其主者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370649_comment'></div>宣州也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370649_comment'></div>知其主可以信其客者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370649_comment'></div>湖南也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370649_comment'></div>去年冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370649_comment'></div>奉诏为邑于阳山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370649_comment'></div>然后得谒湖南之宾客于幕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370649_comment'></div>于是知前之信之也不失矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370649_comment'></div>及仪之之来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370649_comment'></div>闻其言而见其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370649_comment'></div>则向之所谓群与博者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370649_comment'></div>吾何先后焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370649_comment'></div>仪之智足以造谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370649_comment'></div>材足以立事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370649_comment'></div>忠足以勤上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370649_comment'></div>惠足以存下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370649_comment'></div>而又侈之以诗书六艺之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370649_comment'></div>先圣贤之德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370649_comment'></div>以成其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370649_comment'></div>以辅其质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370649_comment'></div>宜乎从事于是府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370649_comment'></div>而流声实于天朝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370649_comment'></div>夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370649", 1370649, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>乐道</span>人之善以勤其归者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370649_comment'></div>乃吾之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370649_comment'></div>谓我为邑长于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370649_comment'></div>而媚夫人云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370649_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370649", 1370649, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>知言</span>者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370649_comment'></div>工乎诗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370649_comment'></div>歌以系之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370649_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。答窦存亮之书信，自述经历、吐露情怀。作品：答窦秀才书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370581' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370581' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370581?labeling=true' "poem_title_1370581")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370581_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370581'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370581'>愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370581_comment'></div>愈少驽怯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370581_comment'></div>于他艺能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370581_comment'></div>自度无可努力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370581_comment'></div>又不通时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370581_comment'></div>而与世多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>龃龉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370581_comment'></div>念终无以树立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370581_comment'></div>遂发愤笃专于文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370581_comment'></div>学不得其术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370581_comment'></div>凡所辛苦而仅有之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370581_comment'></div>皆符于空言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370581_comment'></div>而不适于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>实用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370581_comment'></div>又重以自废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370581_comment'></div>是故学成而道益穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370581_comment'></div>年老而智愈困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370581_comment'></div>今又以罪黜于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370581_comment'></div>远宰蛮县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370581_comment'></div>愁忧无聊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370581_comment'></div>瘴疠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>侵加</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370581_comment'></div>喘喘焉无以冀朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370581_comment'></div>足下年少才俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370581_comment'></div>辞雅而气锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370581_comment'></div>当朝廷求贤如不及之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370581_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>当道</span>者又皆良有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370581_comment'></div>操数寸之管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370581_comment'></div>书盈尺之纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370581_comment'></div>高可以钓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>爵位</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370581_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>循次</span>而进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370581_comment'></div>亦不失万一于甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370581_comment'></div>今乃乘不测之舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370581_comment'></div>入无人之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370581_comment'></div>以相从问文章为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370581_comment'></div>身勤而事左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370581_comment'></div>辞重而请约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370581_comment'></div>非计之得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370581_comment'></div>虽使古之君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370581_comment'></div>积道藏德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370581_comment'></div>遁其光而不曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370581_comment'></div>胶其口而不传者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370581_comment'></div>遇足下之请恳恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370581_comment'></div>犹将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>倒廪倾囷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370581_comment'></div>罗列而进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370581_comment'></div>若愈之愚不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370581_comment'></div>又安敢有爱于左右哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370581_comment'></div>顾足下之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370581_comment'></div>足以自奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370581_comment'></div>愈之所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370581_comment'></div>如前所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370581_comment'></div>是以临事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>愧耻</span>而不敢答也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370581_comment'></div>钱财不足以贿左右之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>匮急</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370581_comment'></div>文章不足以发足下之事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370581_comment'></div>秵载而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370581_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370581", 1370581, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>垂橐</span>而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370581_comment'></div>足下亮之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370581_comment'></div>愈白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1370581_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　本年，在阳山令任上。困厄中，进行著述。作品：原道。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷1。）</span>原性。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷1。）</span>原毁。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷1。）</span>原人。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷1。）</span>原鬼。<span
