"poem_title_1370711")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370711_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370711'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370711'>博爱之谓仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370711_comment'></div>行而宜之之谓义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370711_comment'></div>由是而之焉之谓道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370711_comment'></div>足乎已无待于外之谓德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370711_comment'></div>仁与义为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>定名</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370711_comment'></div>道与德为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>虚位</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370711_comment'></div>故道有君子小人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370711_comment'></div>而德有凶有吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370711_comment'></div>老子之小仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370711_comment'></div>非毁之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370711_comment'></div>其见者小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370711_comment'></div>坐井而观天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370711_comment'></div>曰天小者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370711_comment'></div>非天小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370711_comment'></div>彼以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>煦煦</span>为仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>孑孑</span>为义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370711_comment'></div>其小之也则宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370711_comment'></div>其所谓道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370711_comment'></div>道其所道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370711_comment'></div>非吾所谓道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370711_comment'></div>其所为德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370711_comment'></div>德其所德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370711_comment'></div>非吾所谓德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370711_comment'></div>凡吾所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>道德</span>云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370711_comment'></div>合仁与义言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370711_comment'></div>天下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>公言</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370711_comment'></div>老子之所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>道德</span>云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370711_comment'></div>去仁与义言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370711_comment'></div>一人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>私言</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>周道</span>衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370711_comment'></div>孔子没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370711_comment'></div>火于秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>黄老</span>于汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370711_comment'></div>佛于晋魏梁隋之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370711_comment'></div>其言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>道德</span>仁义者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370711_comment'></div>不入于杨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370711_comment'></div>则入于墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370711_comment'></div>不入于老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370711_comment'></div>则入于佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370711_comment'></div>入于彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370711_comment'></div>必出于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370711_comment'></div>入者主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370711_comment'></div>出者奴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370711_comment'></div>入者附之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370711_comment'></div>出者污之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370711_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370711_comment'></div>后之人其欲闻仁义<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>道德</span>之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370711_comment'></div>孰从而听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>老者</span>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370711_comment'></div>孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370711_comment'></div>吾师之弟子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370711_comment'></div>佛者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370711_comment'></div>孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370711_comment'></div>吾师之弟子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370711_comment'></div>为孔子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370711_comment'></div>习闻其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370711_comment'></div>乐其诞而自小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370711_comment'></div>亦曰吾师亦尝云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370711_comment'></div>不惟举之于其口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370711_comment'></div>而又笔之于其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370711_comment'></div>不求其端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370711_comment'></div>不讯其末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370711_comment'></div>惟怪之欲闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370711_comment'></div>古之为民者四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370711_comment'></div>今之为民者六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370711_comment'></div>古之教者处其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370711_comment'></div>今之教者处其三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370711_comment'></div>农之家一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370711_comment'></div>而食粟之家六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370711_comment'></div>工之家一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370711_comment'></div>而用器之家六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370711_comment'></div>贾之家一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370711_comment'></div>而资焉之家六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370711_comment'></div>奈之何民不穷且盗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370711_comment'></div>古之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370711_comment'></div>人之害多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370711_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>圣人</span>者立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370711_comment'></div>然后教之以相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>生养</span>之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370711_comment'></div>为之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370711_comment'></div>为之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370711_comment'></div>驱其虫蛇禽兽而处之中土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370711_comment'></div>寒然后为之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370711_comment'></div>饥然后为之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>土处</span>而病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370711_comment'></div>然后为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>宫室</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370711_comment'></div>为之工以赡其器用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370711_comment'></div>为之贾以通其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>有无</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370711_comment'></div>为之医药以济其夭死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370711_comment'></div>为之葬埋祭祀以长其恩爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370711_comment'></div>为之礼以次其先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370711_comment'></div>为之乐以宣其湮郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370711_comment'></div>为之政以率其怠勌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370711_comment'></div>为之刑以锄其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>强梗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370711_comment'></div>相欺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370711_comment'></div>为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>符玺</span>斗斛权衡以信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370711_comment'></div>相夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370711_comment'></div>为之城郭甲兵以守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370711_comment'></div>害至而为之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370711_comment'></div>患生而为之防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370711_comment'></div>今其言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>圣人</span>不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370711_comment'></div>大盗不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370711_comment'></div>剖斗折衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370711_comment'></div>而民不争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370711_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370711_comment'></div>其亦不思而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370711_comment'></div>如古之无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>圣人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370711_comment'></div>人之类灭久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370711_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370711_comment'></div>无羽毛鳞介以居寒热也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370711_comment'></div>无爪牙以争食也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370711_comment'></div>是故君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370711_comment'></div>出令者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370711_comment'></div>臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370711_comment'></div>行君之令而致之民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370711_comment'></div>民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370711_comment'></div>出粟米麻丝作器皿通货财以事其上者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370711_comment'></div>君不出令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370711_comment'></div>则失其所以为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370711_comment'></div>臣不行君之令而致之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370711_comment'></div>则失其所以为臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370711_comment'></div>民不出粟米麻丝作器皿通货财以事其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370711_comment'></div>则诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370711_comment'></div>今其法曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370711_comment'></div>必弃而君臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370711_comment'></div>去而父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370711_comment'></div>禁而相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_131_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>生养</span>之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370711_comment'></div>以求其所谓清静寂灭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370711_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370711_comment'></div>其亦幸而出于三代之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370711_comment'></div>不见黜于禹汤文武周公孔子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370711_comment'></div>其亦不幸而不出于三代之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370711_comment'></div>不见正于禹汤文武周公孔子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370711_comment'></div>帝之与王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370711_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_139_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>号名</span>殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370711_comment'></div>其所以为圣一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_141_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>夏葛</span>而冬裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370711_comment'></div>渴饮而饥食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370711_comment'></div>其事殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370711_comment'></div>其所以为智一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370711_comment'></div>今其言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370711_comment'></div>曷不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_146_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>太古</span>之无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370711_comment'></div>是亦责冬之裘者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370711_comment'></div>曷不为葛之之易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370711_comment'></div>责饥之食者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370711_comment'></div>曷不为饮之之易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370711_comment'></div>传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370711_comment'></div>古之欲明明德于天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370711_comment'></div>先治其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370711_comment'></div>欲治其国者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1370711_comment'></div>先齐其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370711_comment'></div>欲齐其家者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370711_comment'></div>先修其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370711_comment'></div>欲修其身者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370711_comment'></div>先正其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370711_comment'></div>欲正其心者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370711_comment'></div>先诚其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370711_comment'></div>然则古之所谓正心而诚意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370711_comment'></div>将以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370711_comment'></div>今也欲治其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370711_comment'></div>而外天下国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370711_comment'></div>灭其天常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370711_comment'></div>子焉而不父其父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370711_comment'></div>臣焉而不君其君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370711_comment'></div>民焉而不事其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370711_comment'></div>孔子之作春秋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370711_comment'></div>诸侯用夷礼则夷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370711_comment'></div>进于中国则中国之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1370711_comment'></div>经曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1370711_comment'></div>夷狄之有君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1370711_comment'></div>不如诸夏之亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1370711_comment'></div>诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1370711_comment'></div>戎狄是膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1370711_comment'></div>荆舒是惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1370711_comment'></div>今也举夷狄之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1370711_comment'></div>而加之先王之教之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1370711_comment'></div>几何其不胥而为夷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1370711_comment'></div>夫所谓先王之教者何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1370711_comment'></div>博爱之谓仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1370711_comment'></div>行而宜之之谓义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1370711_comment'></div>由是而之焉之谓道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1370711_comment'></div>足乎已无待于外之谓德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1370711_comment'></div>其文诗书易春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1370711_comment'></div>其法礼乐刑政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1370711_comment'></div>其民士农工贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1370711_comment'></div>其位君臣父子师友宾主昆弟夫妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1370711_comment'></div>其服麻丝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1370711_comment'></div>其居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_192_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/192/Comments/0")'>宫室</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1370711_comment'></div>其食粟米果蔬鱼肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1370711_comment'></div>其为道易明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1370711_comment'></div>而其为教易行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1370711_comment'></div>是故以之为已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1370711_comment'></div>则顺而祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1370711_comment'></div>以之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1370711_comment'></div>则爱而公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1370711_comment'></div>以之为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1370711_comment'></div>则和而平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1370711_comment'></div>以之为天下国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1370711_comment'></div>无所处而不当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1370711_comment'></div>是故生则得其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1370711_comment'></div>死则尽其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1370711_comment'></div>郊焉而天神假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1370711_comment'></div>庙焉而人鬼享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1370711_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1370711_comment'></div>斯道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1370711_comment'></div>何道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1370711_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1370711_comment'></div>斯吾所谓道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1370711_comment'></div>非向所谓老与佛之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1370711_comment'></div>尧以是传之舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1370711_comment'></div>舜以是传之禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1370711_comment'></div>禹以是传之汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1370711_comment'></div>汤以是传之文武周公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1370711_comment'></div>文武周公传之孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1370711_comment'></div>孔子传之孟轲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1370711_comment'></div>轲之死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1370711_comment'></div>不得其传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1370711_comment'></div>荀与扬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1370711_comment'></div>择焉而不精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1370711_comment'></div>语焉而不详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1370711_comment'></div>由周公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_225_1370711", 1370711, "Clauses/225/Comments/0")'>而上</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1370711_comment'></div>上而为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1370711_comment'></div>故其事行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1370711_comment'></div>由周公而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1370711_comment'></div>下而为臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1370711_comment'></div>故其说长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1370711_comment'></div>然则如之何而可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1370711_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1370711_comment'></div>不塞不流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1370711_comment'></div>不止不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1370711_comment'></div>人其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1370711_comment'></div>火其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1370711_comment'></div>庐其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1370711_comment'></div>明先王之道以道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1370711_comment'></div>鳏寡孤独废疾者有养也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1370711_comment'></div>其亦庶乎其可也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_240_1370711_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>原性</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370712")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370712'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370712'>性也者。与生俱生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370712_comment'></div>情也者。接于物而生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370712_comment'></div>性之品有三。而其所以为性者五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370712_comment'></div>情之品有三。而其所以为情者七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370712_comment'></div>曰何也。曰性之品有上中下三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370712_comment'></div>上焉者。善焉而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370712_comment'></div>中焉者。可导而上下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370712_comment'></div>下焉者。恶焉而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370712_comment'></div>其所以为性者五。曰仁曰礼曰信曰义曰智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370712_comment'></div>上焉者之于五也。主于一而行于四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370712_comment'></div>中焉者之于五也。一不少有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370712_comment'></div>则少反焉。其于四也混。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370712_comment'></div>下焉者之于五也。反于一而悖于四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370712_comment'></div>性之于情视其品。情之品有上中下三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370712_comment'></div>其所以为情者七。曰喜曰怒曰哀曰惧曰爱曰恶曰欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370712_comment'></div>上焉者之于七也。动而处其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370712_comment'></div>中焉者之于七也。有所甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370712_comment'></div>有所亡。然而求合其中者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370712_comment'></div>下焉者之于七也。亡与甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370712_comment'></div>直情而行者也。情之于性视其品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370712_comment'></div>孟子之言性曰。人之性善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370712_comment'></div>荀子之言性曰。人之性恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370712_comment'></div>扬子之言性曰。人之性善恶混。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370712_comment'></div>夫始善而进恶。与始恶而进善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370712_comment'></div>与始也混而今也善恶。皆举其中而遗其上下者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370712_comment'></div>得其一而失其二者也。叔鱼之生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370712_comment'></div>其母视之。知其必以贿死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370712_comment'></div>杨食我之生也。叔向之母闻其号也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370712_comment'></div>知必灭其宗。越椒之生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370712_comment'></div>子文以为大戚。知若敖氏之鬼不食也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370712_comment'></div>人之性果善乎。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370712", 1370712, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>后稷</span>之生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370712_comment'></div>其母无灾。其始匍匐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370712_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370712", 1370712, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>岐岐</span>然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370712", 1370712, "Clauses/64/Comments/1")'>嶷嶷</span>然。文王之在母也母不忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370712_comment'></div>既生也傅不勤。既学也师不烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370712_comment'></div>人之性果恶乎。尧之朱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370712_comment'></div>舜之均。文王之管蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370712_comment'></div>习非不善也。而卒为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370712_comment'></div>瞽瞍之舜。鲧之禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370712_comment'></div>习非不恶也。而卒为圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370712_comment'></div>人之性善恶果混乎。故曰三子之言性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370712_comment'></div>举其中而遗其上下者也。得其一而失其二者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370712_comment'></div>曰然则性之上下者。其终不可移乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370712_comment'></div>曰上之性就学而易明。下之性畏威而寡罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370712_comment'></div>是故上者可教。而下者可制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370712_comment'></div>其品则孔子谓不移也。曰今之言性者异于此何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370712_comment'></div>曰今之言者。杂佛老而言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370712_comment'></div>杂佛老而言也者。奚言而不异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370712_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1370712_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370713' class='poemTitle id='poem_content_1370713'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370713'>古之君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370713_comment'></div>其责己也重以周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370713_comment'></div>其待人也轻以约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370713_comment'></div>重以周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370713_comment'></div>故不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370713_comment'></div>轻以约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370713_comment'></div>故人乐为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370713_comment'></div>闻古之人有舜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370713_comment'></div>其为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370713_comment'></div>仁义人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370713_comment'></div>求其所以为舜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370713_comment'></div>责于己曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370713_comment'></div>彼人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370713_comment'></div>予人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370713_comment'></div>彼能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370713_comment'></div>而我乃不能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370713_comment'></div><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_17_1370713_comment'></div>就其如舜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370713_comment'></div>闻古之人有周公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370713_comment'></div>其为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370713_comment'></div>多才与艺人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370713_comment'></div>求其所以为周公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370713_comment'></div>责于己曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370713_comment'></div>彼人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370713_comment'></div>予人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370713_comment'></div>彼能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370713_comment'></div>而我乃不能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370713_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370713", 1370713, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>早夜</span>以思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370713_comment'></div>去其不如周公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370713_comment'></div>就其如周公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370713_comment'></div>舜大圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370713_comment'></div>后世无及焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370713_comment'></div>周公大圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370713_comment'></div>后世无及焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370713_comment'></div>是人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370713_comment'></div>乃曰不如舜不如周公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370713_comment'></div>吾之病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370713_comment'></div>是不亦责于身者重以周乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370713_comment'></div>其于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370713_comment'></div>曰彼人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370713_comment'></div>能有是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370713_comment'></div>是足为良人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370713_comment'></div>能善是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370713_comment'></div>是足为艺人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370713_comment'></div>取其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370713_comment'></div>不责其二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370713_comment'></div>即其新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370713_comment'></div>不究其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370713_comment'></div>恐恐然惟惧其人之不得为善之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370713_comment'></div>一善易修也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370713_comment'></div>一艺易能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370713_comment'></div>其于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370713_comment'></div>乃曰能有是。<div id='poem_sentence_55_1370713_comment'></div>是亦足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370713_comment'></div>不亦待于人者轻以约乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370713_comment'></div>今之君子则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370713_comment'></div>其责人也详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370713_comment'></div>其待己也廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370713_comment'></div>详故人难于为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370713_comment'></div>廉故自取也少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370713_comment'></div>己未有善。<div id='poem_sentence_65_1370713_comment'></div>己未有能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370713_comment'></div>曰我能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370713_comment'></div>是亦足矣。<div id='poem_sentence_75_1370713_comment'></div>彼虽善是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370713_comment'></div>其用不足称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370713_comment'></div>举其一。<div id='poem_title_1370714' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370714?labeling=true' target='_blank'>原人</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1370714_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370714'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370714'>形于上者谓之天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370714_comment'></div>形于下者谓之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370714_comment'></div>命于其两閒者谓之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370714_comment'></div>形于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370714_comment'></div>日月星辰皆天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370714_comment'></div>形于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370714_comment'></div>草木山川皆地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370714_comment'></div>命于其两閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370714_comment'></div>夷狄禽兽皆人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370714_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370714_comment'></div>然则吾谓禽兽人可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370714_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370714_comment'></div>非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370714_comment'></div>指山而问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370714_comment'></div>曰山乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370714_comment'></div>曰山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370714_comment'></div>可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370714_comment'></div>山有草木禽兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370714_comment'></div>皆举之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370714_comment'></div>指山之一草而问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370714_comment'></div>曰山乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370714_comment'></div>曰山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370714_comment'></div>则不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370714_comment'></div>故天道乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370714_comment'></div>而日月星辰不得其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370714_comment'></div>地道乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370714_comment'></div>而草木山川不得其平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370714_comment'></div>人道乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370714_comment'></div>而夷狄禽兽不得其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370714_comment'></div>天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370714_comment'></div>日月星辰之主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370714_comment'></div>地者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370714_comment'></div>草木山川之主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370714_comment'></div>人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370714_comment'></div>夷狄禽兽之主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370714_comment'></div>主而暴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370714_comment'></div>不得其为主之道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370714_comment'></div>是故圣人一视而同仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370715_comment'></div>无见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370715_comment'></div>斯鬼乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370715_comment'></div>曰非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370715_comment'></div>鬼无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370715_comment'></div>有立于堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370715_comment'></div>从而视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370715_comment'></div>鬼无形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370715_comment'></div>有触吾躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370715_comment'></div>从而执之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370715_comment'></div>无得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370715_comment'></div>斯鬼乎。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1370715_comment'></div>安有气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370715_comment'></div>曰鬼无声也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370715_comment'></div>无形也。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1370715_comment'></div>曰有形而无声者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370715_comment'></div>物有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370715_comment'></div>土石是也。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1370715_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370715", 1370715, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>风霆</span>是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370715_comment'></div>有声与形者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370715_comment'></div>物有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370715_comment'></div>人兽是也。<div id='poem_sentence_33_1370715_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370715", 1370715, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>鬼神</span>是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370715_comment'></div>曰然则有怪而与民物接者何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370715_comment'></div>曰是有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370715_comment'></div>有鬼有物。<div id='poem_sentence_39_1370715_comment'></div>民有忤于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370715_comment'></div>有违于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370715_comment'></div>有爽于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370715_comment'></div>逆于伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370715_comment'></div>而感于气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370715_comment'></div>于是乎鬼有形于形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370715_comment'></div>有凭于声以应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370715_comment'></div>而下殃祸焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370715_comment'></div>皆民之为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370715_comment'></div>其既也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370715_comment'></div>又反乎其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370715_comment'></div>曰何谓物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370715_comment'></div>曰成于形与声者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370715_comment'></div>土石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370715", 1370715, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>风霆</span>人兽是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370715_comment'></div>反乎无声与形者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370715_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370715", 1370715, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>鬼神</span>是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370715_comment'></div>不能有形与声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370715_comment'></div>不能无形与声者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370715_comment'></div>物怪是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370715_comment'></div>故其作而接于民也无恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370715_comment'></div>故有动于民而为祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370715_comment'></div>亦有动于民而为福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370715_comment'></div>亦有动于民而莫之为祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370715_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1370715", 1370715, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>适丁</span>民之有是时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370715_comment'></div>作原鬼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1370715_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年1月</a>　春，正月某日，韩愈离开阳山之前，作诗送区册回家探亲。作品：送区册序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_1370657' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370657' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370657?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送区册序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370657")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370657_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370657'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370657'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>阳山</span>。天下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>穷处</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370657_comment'></div>陆有邱陵之险。虎豹之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370657_comment'></div>江流<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>悍急</span>。横波之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370657_comment'></div>廉利侔剑戟。舟上下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>失势</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370657_comment'></div>破碎沦溺者。往往有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370657_comment'></div>县郭无居民。官无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>丞尉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370657_comment'></div>夹江荒茅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>篁竹</span>之閒。小吏十馀家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370657_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>鸟言</span>夷面。始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370657_comment'></div>言语不通。画地为字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370657_comment'></div>然后可告以出租赋。奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>期约</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370657_comment'></div>是以宾客游从之士。无所为而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370657_comment'></div>愈待罪于斯。且半岁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370657_comment'></div>有区生者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>誓言</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>相好</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370657_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>南海</span>拿舟而来。升自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>宾阶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370657_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>仪观</span>甚伟。坐与之语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370657_comment'></div>文义卓然。庄周云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370657_comment'></div>逃空虚者。闻人足音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370657_comment'></div>跫然而喜矣。况如斯人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370657_comment'></div>岂易得哉。入吾室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370657_comment'></div>闻诗书仁义之说。欣然喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370657_comment'></div>若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>有志</span>于其閒也。与之翳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>嘉林</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370657_comment'></div>坐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370657", 1370657, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>声利</span>而不厌乎贫贱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370657_comment'></div>岁之初吉。归拜其亲。<div class='inline' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370657", 1370657, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>识别</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370657_comment'></div></div><div 郴州

《唐五行志》：“休留一名训狐。或曰训狐，其声也，因以名之。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49689_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年8月15日</a>　中秋夜，与张署同在郴州。已官江陵曹掾，尚未北行。作诗赠张署。作品：八月十五夜赠张功曹。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_49549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49549?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八月十五夜赠张功曹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（805年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49549")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49549_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49549_0'>① 张功曹，署也。愈与署以贞元二十一年二月二十四日赦自南方，俱徙掾江陵，至是俟命于郴，而作是诗。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49549'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5362, "poem_allusion_49549")'>夔皋</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49549'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49549'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49549", 49549, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>纤云</span>四卷天无河，清风吹空月舒波。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49549'>沙平水息声影绝，一杯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49549", 49549, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>相属</span>君当歌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49549'>君歌声酸辞且苦，不能听终泪如雨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49549'>洞庭连天九疑高，蛟龙出没猩鼯号。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49549'><span class='link' "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>官所</span>，幽居默默如藏逃。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49549'>下床畏蛇食畏药，海气湿蛰熏腥臊。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49549'>迁者追回流者还，涤瑕荡垢清朝班。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49549'>判司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49549", 49549, id='poem_sentence_10_49549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49549'>同时辈流多上道，天路幽险难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_49549", 49549, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年8月</a>　八九月间，在郴州。因染疟疾，不便北上，暂留于郴州。有诗。作品：谴疟鬼。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_49760' class='_poem'><div -----title
耒阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='38f3148bb5c64b44881e3be331ea861d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("38f3148bb5c64b44881e3be331ea861d");'><span id='38f3148bb5c64b44881e3be331ea861d_link' id='poem_49463' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49463' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49463?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题木居士二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49463")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49463_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div -----title
衡阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f65efe7dcd8c4db297769585e5fbf3a8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f65efe7dcd8c4db297769585e5fbf3a8");'><span id='f65efe7dcd8c4db297769585e5fbf3a8_link' 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>九月初，北返途经衡州合江亭，有诗。合江亭建在衡阳湘、蒸合流之石鼓山上。作品：合江亭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_49578' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49578' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49578?labeling=true' target='_blank'>合江亭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（805年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49578")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49578_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49578_0'>① 诸本作题合江亭寄刺史邹君。亭在衡州负郭，今之石鼓头，即其地也。地形特异，岿然崛起于二水之间，旁有朱陵洞，唐人题刻散满岩上。愈自阳山量移江陵，道衡山作。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49578'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5088, "poem_allusion_49578")'>九畹</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49578_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49578'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49578'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49578", 49578, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>红亭</span>枕湘江，蒸水会其左。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49578'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49578", 49578, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>瞰临</span>眇空阔，绿净不可唾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49578'>维昔经营初，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49578", 49578, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>邦君</span>实<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49578", 49578, "Clauses/5/Comments/2")'>王佐</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（此亭，故相齐公映所作）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49578'>剪林迁神祠，买地费<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49578", 49578, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>家货</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49578'>梁栋宏可爱，结构丽匪过。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49578'>伊人去轩腾，兹宇遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49578", 49578, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>颓挫</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49592'>祝融峰下一回首，即是此生长别离。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370651'>五岳于中州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370651_comment'></div>衡山最远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370651_comment'></div>南方之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370651_comment'></div>巍然高而大者以百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370651_comment'></div>独衡为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370651_comment'></div>最远而独为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370651_comment'></div>其神必灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370651_comment'></div>衡之南八九百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370651_comment'></div>地益高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370651_comment'></div>山益峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370651_comment'></div>水清而益驶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370651_comment'></div>其最高而横绝南北者岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370651_comment'></div>郴之为州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370651_comment'></div>在岭之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370651_comment'></div>测其高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370651_comment'></div>得三之二焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370651_comment'></div>中州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>清淑</span>之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370651_comment'></div>于是焉穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370651_comment'></div>气之所穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370651_comment'></div>盛而不过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370651_comment'></div>必蜿蟺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>扶舆</span>磅礡而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>郁积</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370651_comment'></div>衡山之神既灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370651_comment'></div>而郴之为州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370651_comment'></div>又当中州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>清淑</span>之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370651_comment'></div>蜿蟺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>扶舆</span>磅礡而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/24/Comments/1")'>郁积</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370651_comment'></div>其水土之所生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370651_comment'></div>神气之所感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370651_comment'></div>白金水银丹砂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>石英</span>钟乳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370651_comment'></div>橘柚之包。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370651_comment'></div>竹箭之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370651_comment'></div>千寻之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>名材</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370651_comment'></div>不能独当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370651_comment'></div>意必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>魁奇</span>忠信<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>材德</span>之民生其閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370651_comment'></div>而吾又未见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370651_comment'></div>其无乃迷惑溺没于佛老之学而不出耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370651_comment'></div>廖师郴民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370651_comment'></div>而学于衡山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370651_comment'></div>气专而容寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370651_comment'></div>多艺而善游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370651_comment'></div>岂吾所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370651", 1370651, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>魁奇</span>而迷溺者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370651_comment'></div>廖师善知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370651_comment'></div>若不在其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370651_comment'></div>必在其所与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370651_comment'></div>访之而不吾告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370651_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370651_comment'></div>于其别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370651_comment'></div>申以问之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1370651_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='57f3441f18b54420b0ac4ba1d5bd1ca5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("57f3441f18b54420b0ac4ba1d5bd1ca5");'><span id='57f3441f18b54420b0ac4ba1d5bd1ca5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>，38岁</div><div id='57f3441f18b54420b0ac4ba1d5bd1ca5' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>九月下，沿湘江北返，快到潭州时，有诗。因对江陵职事不满，借机投诗，希引起同情，汲引回朝。作品：赴江陵途中寄赠王二十补阙李十一拾遗李二十六员外郎翰林三学士。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_49667' inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（805年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", 德宗贞元二十年移江陵法曹参军，未几以四门博士召，三学士王涯、李建、李程也。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49667'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(104, id='poem_content_49667'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49667'>孤臣昔放逐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49667", 49667, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>血泣</span>追愆尤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49667'>汗漫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49667", 49667, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>省识</span>，恍如乘桴浮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49667'>或自疑上疏，上疏岂其由。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49667'>是年京师旱，田亩少所收。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49667'>上怜民无食，征赋半已休。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49667'>有司恤经费，未免烦徵求。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49667'>富者既云急，贫者固已流。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49667'>传闻闾里间，赤子弃渠沟。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49667", 49667, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>掉臂</span>莫肯酬。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49667'>我时出衢路，饿者何其稠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49667'>亲逢道边死，伫立久<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49667", 49667, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>咿嚘</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49667'>归舍不能食，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_49667", 49667, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>有如</span>鱼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_49667", 49667, "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>中钩</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49667'>适会除御史，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_49667", 49667, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>诚当</span>得言秋。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49667'>拜疏移<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_49667", 49667, id='poem_sentence_14_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49667'>下陈畿甸内，根本理宜优。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49667'>积雪验丰熟，幸宽待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_49667", 49667, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>蚕麰</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49667'>天子恻然感，司空叹绸缪。<div id='poem_sentence_17_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49667'>谓言即施设，乃反迁炎州<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49667'>同官尽<span id='poem_sentence_20_49667'>或虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_49667", 49667, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>语言</span>泄，传之落冤雠。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49667'>二子不宜尔，将疑断还不。<div id='poem_sentence_21_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_49667'>中使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_49667", 49667, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>临门</span>遣，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_23_49667'>病妹卧床褥，分知隔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_49667", 49667, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>明幽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_49667'>悲啼乞就别，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_49667", 49667, id='poem_sentence_26_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_49667'>朝为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_49667", 49667, id='poem_sentence_28_49667'>商山季冬月，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_49667", 49667, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>冰冻</span>绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_49667", 49667, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>行辀</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_49667", 49667, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>低颜</span>奉君侯。<div id='poem_sentence_30_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_49667'>酸寒何足道，随事生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_49667", 49667, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>疮疣</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_49667'>远地触途异，吏民似猿猴。<div id='poem_sentence_32_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_49667'>生狞多忿很，辞舌纷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_49667", 49667, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>嘲啁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_33_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_49667'>白日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_49667", 49667, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_49667", 49667, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>可畏</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_49667", 49667, id='poem_sentence_40_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_49667'>前日遇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_49667", 49667, id='poem_sentence_44_49667'>栖栖法曹掾，何处事卑陬。<div id='poem_sentence_44_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_49667'>生平企<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_49667", 49667, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>仁义</span>，所学皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_49667", 49667, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>孔周</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_45_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_49667'>早知大理官，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(985, "poem_sentence_46_49667")'>不列三后</span>俦。<div id='poem_sentence_46_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_49667'>何况亲犴<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_49667", 49667, "Clauses/95/Comments/1")'>奸偷</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_47_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_49667'>悬知失事势，恐自罹罝罘。<div id='poem_sentence_48_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_49667'>湘水清且急，凉风日脩脩。<div id='poem_sentence_49_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_49667'>胡为首归路，旅泊尚夷犹。<div id='poem_sentence_50_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_49667'>昨者京使至，嗣皇传<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_49667", 49667, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>冕旒</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_51_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_49667'>赫然下明诏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_49667", 49667, "Clauses/105/Comments/1")'>首罪</span>诛共吺<span class='inlineComment2'>（古兜字）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_52_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_49667'>复闻<span "Clauses/106/Comments/2")'>颠夭</span></span>辈<span class='inlineComment2'>（谓杜黄裳、郑馀庆之徒为相）</span>，峨冠进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_49667", 49667, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>鸿畴</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_53_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_49667'>班行再肃穆，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_49667", 49667, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>璜佩</span>鸣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_49667", 49667, id='poem_sentence_58_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_49667'>小雅咏<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6029, "poem_sentence_59_49667")'>鹿鸣</span><span id='poem_sentence_61_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_49667'>自从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_49667", 49667, onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4805, "poem_sentence_68_49667")'>借前筹</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_68_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_49667'>殷勤答吾友，明月非<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(104, "poem_sentence_69_49667")'>暗投</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_69_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_49667'></div><div id='poem_sentence_70_49667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49667'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_49667_0'>⑴ 《旧史》言公自监察御史上章数千言，极论宫市，德宗怒，贬阳山令。《新史》亦云上疏论宫市。今诗自序其得罪之由，大抵言京师旱饥，未尝力言宫市。惟皇甫湜神道碑云：“关中旱饥，先生力言天下根本，专政者恶之，出为阳山令。”湜当时从公游者，知公之不以论宫市出，审矣</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_49667_0'>⑵ 贞元二十一年正月乙巳，顺宗即位。二月甲子，大赦天下，愈量移江陵掾</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49667_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49667'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49667)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>九月末，途经潭州，受到湖南江西观察使兼潭州刺史杨凭款待，逗留数日。有诗，写初至潭州泊船时受欢迎之场面。作品：潭州泊船呈诸公。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_49533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49533' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49533?labeling=true' "poem_title_49533")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_49533_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49533'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2029, "poem_allusion_49533")'>错刀</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49533_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49533'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49533'>夜寒眠半觉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49533", 49533, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>鼓笛</span>闹嘈嘈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49533'>暗浪舂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49533", 49533, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>楼堞</span>，惊风破<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49533", 49533, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>竹篙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49533'>主人看使范<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作帆，去声）</span>，客子读离骚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49533'>闻道松醪贱，何须吝<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2029, "poem_sentence_3_49533")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49533", 49533, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>错刀</span></span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49533'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49533_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>九月末，过潭州，见陈彤于杨湖南（杨凭）门下，作序送陈彤应举。作品：送陈秀才彤序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370654' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370654' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370654?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送陈秀才彤序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370654")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370654_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370654'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370654'>读书以为学。缵言以为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370654_comment'></div>非以誇多而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370654", 1370654, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>斗靡</span>也。盖学所以为道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370654_comment'></div>文所以为理耳。苟行事得其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370654_comment'></div>出言适其要。虽不吾面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370654_comment'></div>吾将信其富于文学也。颍川陈彤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370654_comment'></div>始吾见之杨湖南门下。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370654", 1370654, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>颀然</span>其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370654_comment'></div>薰然其和。吾目其貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370654_comment'></div>耳其言。因以得其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370654_comment'></div>及其久也。果若不可及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370654_comment'></div>夫湖南之于人。不轻以事接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370654_comment'></div>争名者之于艺。不可以虚屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370654_comment'></div>吾见湖南之礼有加。而同进之士交誉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370654_comment'></div>又以信吾信之不失也。如是而又问焉以质其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370654_comment'></div>策焉以考其文。则何信之有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370654_comment'></div>故吾不徵于陈。而陈亦不出于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370654_comment'></div>此岂非古人所谓可为智者道。难与俗人言者类耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370654_comment'></div>凡吾从事于斯也久。未见举进士有如陈生而不如志者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370654_comment'></div>于其行。姑以是赠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370654_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1370654_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>九月末，途经潭州，至城西岳麓山佛寺游赏，有诗。作品：陪杜侍御游湘西两寺杜宿有题一首因献杨常侍。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_49700' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49700' class='poemTitle class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49700")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49700'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1359, "poem_allusion_49700")'>贾谊贬</span>　<span class='link' "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>徂岁</span>嗟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_49700", 49700, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>荏苒</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_24_49700'>展转岭猿鸣，曙灯青睒睒。<div id='poem_sentence_24_49700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_49700'></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_49700_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
岳阳（巴陵）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2733c60185a94b57b04d610f955b5583_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2733c60185a94b57b04d610f955b5583");'><span id='2733c60185a94b57b04d610f955b5583_link' "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>雾雨</span>晦争泄，波涛怒相投。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49652'>犬鸡断四听，粮绝谁与谋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49652'>相去不容步，险如碍山丘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49569' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49569?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永贞行<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（805年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", 贞元二十一年，德宗崩，顺宗立，改元永贞。韦执谊，王叔文等用事，又谋夺中官兵，制天下之命。是年八月，皇太子即位，帝自称太上皇，上贬执谊，叔文等，愈故作永贞行云。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49569'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_17_49569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_49569'>吾尝同僚情可胜，具书目见非妄徵，嗟尔既往宜为惩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_49569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49569'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_49569_0'>⑴ 是岁王叔文等以金吾大将军范希朝为左右神策诸行营节度使，以韩泰为其行军司马。叔文欲夺取宦官兵权以自固，藉希朝老将，使主其名，而实以泰专其事，人情疑惧</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_49569_0'>⑵ 王叔文用事，一日诸相会食，叔文至中书，欲与韦执谊计事，执谊起迎，诸相停箸以待。有顷，报叔文索饭，已与韦相同餐閤中矣。杜佑、高郢惧，不敢言。郑珣瑜独叹曰：“吾岂可复居此位？”索马径归，卧不起</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_49569_0'>⑶ 谓贬礼部员外郎柳宗元邵州、司封郎中韩晔池州、屯田员外郎刘禹锡连州各郡刺史也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49569_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_49482_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49482'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49482'>新开寒露丛，远比水间红。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49482'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年10月</a>　十月抵达江陵后，作序送岭南秀才孟琯离开荆州去京师应举。作品：送孟秀才序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_1370653' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370653' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370653?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送孟秀才序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370653")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370653_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370653'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370653'>今年秋。见孟氏子琯于郴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370653_comment'></div>年甚少。礼甚度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370653_comment'></div>手其文一编甚钜。退披其编以读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370653_comment'></div>尽其书无有不能。吾固心存而目识之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370653_comment'></div>其十月。吾道于衡潭以之荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370653_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370653", 1370653, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>累累</span>见孟氏子焉。其所与偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370653_comment'></div>尽善人长者。吾益以奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370653_comment'></div>今将去是而随举于京师。虽不有请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370653_comment'></div>犹将彊而授之。以就其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370653_comment'></div>况其请之烦耶。京师之进士以千数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370653_comment'></div>其人靡所不有。吾常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370653", 1370653, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>折肱</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370653_comment'></div>其要在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370653", 1370653, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>详择</span>而固交之。善虽不吾与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370653_comment'></div>吾将彊而附。不善虽不吾恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370653_comment'></div>吾将彊而拒。苟如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370653_comment'></div>其于高爵犹阶而升堂。又况其细者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370653_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1370653_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年11月19日</a>　冬至日前后，在江陵法曹参军任上，为房武夫人撰写嫔表。作品：施州房使君郑夫人殡表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷14。）</span><div id='poem_1370742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>施州房使君郑夫人殡表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年11月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370742")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370742'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370742'>夫人之先出于周。以郑为氏因初侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370742_comment'></div>曾祖讳随祖讳玠。厥考讳绛咸垂休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370742_comment'></div>归于房宗生九子。左右黍稷祠春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370742_comment'></div>道顺德严显且裕。宜寿而富今何谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370742_comment'></div>永贞冬至前四日。寓殡坟此非其邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370742_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1370742_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年12月9日</a>　十二月九日，在江陵法曹参军任上，上书兵部侍郎李巽。作品：上兵部李侍郎书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷5。）</span><div id='poem_1370584' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370584' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370584?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上兵部李侍郎书</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年12月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370584")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370584_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370584'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370584'>十二月九日。将仕郎守江陵府法曹参军韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370584_comment'></div>谨上书侍郎閤下。愈少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>鄙钝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370584_comment'></div>于时事都不通晓。家贫不足以自活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370584_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>应举</span>觅官。凡二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370584_comment'></div>薄命不幸。动遭谗谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370584_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>进寸退尺</span>。卒无所成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370584_comment'></div>性本好<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>文学</span>。因困厄悲愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370584_comment'></div>无所告语。遂得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>究穷</span>于经传史记百家之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370584_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>沈潜</span>乎训义。反复乎句读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370584_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>砻磨</span>乎事业。而奋发乎文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370584_comment'></div>凡自唐虞以来。编所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370584_comment'></div>大之为河海。高之为山岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370584_comment'></div>明之为日月。幽之为鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370584_comment'></div>纤之为珠玑华实。变之为雷霆风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370584_comment'></div>奇辞奥旨。靡不通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370584_comment'></div>惟是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>鄙钝</span>不通晓于时事。学成而道益穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370584_comment'></div>年老而智益困。私自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>怜悼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370584_comment'></div>悔其初心。发秃齿落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370584_comment'></div>不见知己。夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>牛角之歌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370584_comment'></div>辞鄙而义拙。堂下之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370584_comment'></div>不书于传记。齐桓举以相国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370584_comment'></div>叔向携手以上。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>然则</span>非言之难为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370584_comment'></div>听而识之者难遇也。伏以閤下内仁而外义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370584_comment'></div>行高而德钜。尚贤而与能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370584_comment'></div>哀穷而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>悼屈</span>。自江而西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370584_comment'></div>既化而行矣。今者入守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>内职</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370584_comment'></div>为朝廷大臣。当天子新即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370584_comment'></div>汲汲于理化之日。出言举事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370584_comment'></div>宜必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>施设</span>。既有听之之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370584_comment'></div>又有振之之力。宁戚之歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370584_comment'></div>●8C6B明之言。不发于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370584_comment'></div>则后而失其时矣。谨献旧文一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370584_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>扶树</span>教道。有所明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370584_comment'></div>南行诗一卷。舒忧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>娱悲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370584_comment'></div>杂以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>瑰怪</span>之言。时俗之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370584_comment'></div>所以讽于口而听于耳也。如赐览观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370584_comment'></div>亦有可采。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>干黩</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370584", 1370584, "Clauses/73/Comments/1")'>严尊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370584_comment'></div>伏增惶恐。愈再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370584_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1370584_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年12月</a>　在法曹参军任上。十二月立春后，遇雪，喜作诗献荆南行军司马知江陵节度使裴均。作品：喜雪献裴尚书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷3。）</span><div
