ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年12月</a>　十二月，在江陵法曹参军任上。作者时年三十八岁，回顾身世，作箴文数篇，有自警之意。作品：五箴并序·序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span>五箴并序·游箴。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span>五箴并序·言箴。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span>五箴并序·行箴。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span>五箴并序·好恶箴。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span>五箴并序·知名箴。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷2。）</span><div id='poem_1370694' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370694' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370694?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五箴<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>游箴</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370694")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370694_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1370694'>人患不知其过。既知之。不能改。是无勇也。余生二十有八年。发之短者日益白。齿之摇者日益脱。聪明不及于前时。道德日负于初心。其不至于君子而卒为小人也昭昭矣。作五箴以讼其恶云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1370694_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370694'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370694'>余少之时。将求多能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370694_comment'></div>蚤夜以孜孜。余今之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370694_comment'></div>既饱而嬉。蚤夜以无为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370694_comment'></div>呜呼余乎。其无知乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370694_comment'></div>君子之弃。而小人之归乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370694_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1370694_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370695' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370695' class='poemTitle class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370695_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370695'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370695'>不知言之人。乌可与言。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1370695_comment'></div>台中之评。人反以汝为倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370695_comment'></div>汝不惩邪。而呶呶以害其生邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370695_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1370695_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370696' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370696' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_12_1370698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1370698'>及其既宁，终莫能戒。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1370698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年2月24日</a>　二月，在江陵法曹参军任上。祭故友郴州刺史李伯康。作品：祭郴州李使君文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370847?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭郴州李使君文</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年2月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370847")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370847_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370847'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370847'>维年月日。将仕郎守江陵府法曹参军韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370847_comment'></div>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。敬祭于故郴州李使君之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370847_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>古语</span>有之。白头如新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370847_comment'></div>倾盖若旧。顾意气之何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370847_comment'></div>何日时之足究。当贞元之癸未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370847_comment'></div>惕皇威而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>左授</span>。伏荒炎之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>下邑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370847_comment'></div>嗟名颓而位仆。历贵部而西迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370847_comment'></div>迩清光于暂觏。言莫交而情无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370847_comment'></div>既不贾而奚售。哀穷遐之无徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370847_comment'></div>挐百忧以自副。辱问讯之绸缪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370847_comment'></div>恒饱饥而愈疚。接雄词于章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370847_comment'></div>窥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>逸迹</span>于篆籀。苞黄甘而致贻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370847_comment'></div>获纸笔之双贸。投叉鱼之短韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370847_comment'></div>愧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>韬瑕</span>而举秀。俟新命于衡阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370847_comment'></div>费薪刍于馆候。空大亭以见处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370847_comment'></div>憩水木之幽茂。逞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>英心</span>于纵博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370847_comment'></div>沃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>烦肠</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>清酎</span>。航北河之空明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370847_comment'></div>觑鳞介之惊透。宴州楼之豁达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370847_comment'></div>众管啾而并奏。得恩惠于新知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370847_comment'></div>脱穷愁于往陋。辍行谋于俄顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370847_comment'></div>见秋月之三彀。逮天书之下降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370847_comment'></div>犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>低回</span>以宿留。念暌离之在期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370847_comment'></div>谓此会之难又。授<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>缟纻</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>托心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370847_comment'></div>示兹诚之不谬。傥后日之北迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370847_comment'></div>约穷欢于一昼。虽掾俸之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>酸寒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370847_comment'></div>要拔贫而为富。何人生之难信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370847_comment'></div>捐斯言而莫就。始讶信于暂疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370847_comment'></div>遂承凶于不救。见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>明旌</span>之低昂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370847_comment'></div>尚迟疑于别褎。忆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>交酬</span>而迭舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370847_comment'></div>奠单杯而哭柩。美夫君之为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370847_comment'></div>不挠志于谗构。遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>唇舌</span>之纷罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370847_comment'></div>独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>陵晨</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370847", 1370847, "Clauses/62/Comments/1")'>孤雊</span>。彼憸人之浮言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370847_comment'></div>虽百车其何诟。洞古往而高观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370847_comment'></div>固邪正之相寇。幸窃睹其始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370847_comment'></div>敢不明白而蔽覆。神乎来哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370847_comment'></div>辞以为侑。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370847_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370847_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年2月25日</a>　春，在江陵法曹参军任上。张署病多日，有诗赠韩愈。韩愈以诗和之。作品：忆昨行和张十一。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_20_49558_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49558'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_49558_0'>⑴ 上公一作杜公，云杜佑自淮南入朝也。一作社公，云此为荆帅裴均罢社享客也。朱熹《考异》云：“左传五行之官，封为上公，杜注用币于社云，以请于上公，则上公即社神也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_49558_0'>⑵ 愈责连之阳山令，张为郴之临武，郴在江南，连则广南也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_49558_0'>⑶ 元和元年正月，顺宗即位。二月大赦，愈自阳山徙掾江陵，三奸方用事。其年八月，宪宗立。伾贬开州司马、叔文渝州司户，并员外置。十一月继贬执谊崖州司马，三奸始悉破碎焉</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49558_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年3月</a>　三月，在江陵法曹参军任上。寒食日，出游夜归，见张署所赠《病中忆花》九首诗，有诗回赠。张署时已病多日，诗中多关怀之意。作品：寒食日出游。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷4。）</span><div id='poem_49715' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49715?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寒食日出游<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49715")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49715_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49715_0'>① 自注，张十一院长见示病中忆花九篇，寒食日出游夜归，因以投赠。张十一，即功曹署，外郎遗补相呼为院长。愈与署同自御史贬官，又同为江陵掾，愈法曹参军，署功曹参军。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49715'><span "poem_allusion_49715")'>断鹤两翅</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10643, "poem_allusion_49715")'>絷骥四足</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49715'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49715'>李花初发君始病，我往看君花转盛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49715'>走马城西惆怅归，不忍千株雪相映。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49715'><span class='link' "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>交开</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49715", 49715, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>红白</span>如<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_3_49715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49715'>纷纷落尽泥与尘，不共新妆比端正。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49715'>三公尽是知音人，曷不荐贤陛下圣。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49637'>携来当昼不得卧，一府<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49637", 49637, id='poem_sentence_1_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49637'>体坚色净又藏节，尽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作满）</span>眼<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_3_49637'>法曹贫贱众所易，腰腹空大何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49637", 49637, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>能为</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49637'>自从五月困暑湿，如坐深甑遭蒸炊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49637'>手磨袖拂心语口，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49637", 49637, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>慢肤</span>多汗真相宜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49637'>日暮归来独惆怅，有卖直欲倾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_49637", 49637, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>家资</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49637'>谁谓故人知我意，卷送八尺含风漪。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49637'>呼奴扫地铺未了，光彩照耀惊童儿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49637'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_49637", 49637, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>青蝇</span>侧翅蚤虱避，肃肃疑有清飙吹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49637'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49637", 49637, class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370673'>从事有示愈以荆潭唱和诗者。愈既受以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>卒业</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370673_comment'></div>因仰而言曰。夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>和平</span>之音<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>淡薄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370673_comment'></div>而愁思之声要妙。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>欢愉</span>之辞难工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370673_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>穷苦</span>之言易好也。是故文章之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370673_comment'></div>恒发于羁旅草野。至若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>王公</span>贵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370673_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>气满志得</span>。非性能而好之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370673_comment'></div>则不暇以为。今仆射裴公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>开镇</span>蛮荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370673_comment'></div>统郡惟九。常侍杨公领湖之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370673_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>壤地</span>二千里。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>德刑</span>之政并勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370673_comment'></div>爵禄之报两崇。乃能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>存志</span>乎诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370673_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>寓辞</span>乎咏歌。往复循环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370673_comment'></div>有唱斯和。搜奇抉怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370673_comment'></div>雕镂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>文字</span>。与韦布里闾憔悴专一之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370673_comment'></div>较其毫釐分寸。铿锵发金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370673_comment'></div>幽感鬼神。信所谓材全而能钜者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370673_comment'></div>两府之从事与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370673", 1370673, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>部属</span>之吏。属而和之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370673_comment'></div>苟在编者。咸可观也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370673_comment'></div>宜乎施之乐章。纪诸册书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370673_comment'></div>从事曰。子之言是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370673_comment'></div>告于公。书以为荆潭唱和诗序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370673_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1370673_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年6月8日</a>　六月八日，自江陵法曹参军，诏拜国子博士。由江陵启程，始返回长安。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
邓州（穰县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e5824528705047da87335b3530d33c99_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e5824528705047da87335b3530d33c99");'><span id='e5824528705047da87335b3530d33c99_link' -----title
宜阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a92bf13c20ba483d90ee9892beaf4d39_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a92bf13c20ba483d90ee9892beaf4d39");'><span id='a92bf13c20ba483d90ee9892beaf4d39_link' -----title
登封
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_6_1370734_comment'></div>上太室中峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370734_comment'></div>宿封禅坛下石室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370734_comment'></div>遂自龙泉寺钓龙潭水遇雷。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1370850_comment'></div>仆来告言。虎入厩处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370850_comment'></div>无敢惊逐。以我𩦺去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370850_comment'></div>君云是物。不骏于乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370850_comment'></div>虎取而往。来寅其徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370850_comment'></div>我预在此。与君俱膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370850_comment'></div>猛兽果信。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>恶祷</span>而凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370850_comment'></div>余出岭中。君俟州下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370850_comment'></div>偕掾江陵。非余望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370850_comment'></div>郴山奇变。其水清写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370850_comment'></div>泊沙倚石。有遌无舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370850_comment'></div>衡阳放酒。熊咆虎嗥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370850_comment'></div>不存<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>令章</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>罚筹</span>猬毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370850_comment'></div>委舟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>湘流</span>。往观南岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370850_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>云壁</span>潭潭。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>穹林</span>攸擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370850_comment'></div>避风太湖。七日鹿角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370850_comment'></div>钩登大鲇。怒颊豕狗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370850_comment'></div>脔盘炙酒。群奴馀啄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370850_comment'></div>走官阶下。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>首下尻高</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370850_comment'></div>下马伏涂。从事是遭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370850_comment'></div>予徵博士。君以使己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370850_comment'></div>相见京师。过愿之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370850_comment'></div>分教<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>东生</span>。君掾雍首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370850_comment'></div>两都相望。于别何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370850_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>解手</span>背面。遂十一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370850_comment'></div>君出我入。如相避然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370850_comment'></div>生阔死休。吞不复宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370850_comment'></div>刑官属郎。引章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>讦夺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370850_comment'></div>权臣不爱。南康是斡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370850_comment'></div>明条<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>谨狱</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>氓獠</span>户歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370850_comment'></div>用迁澧浦。为人受瘥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370850_comment'></div>还家东都。起令河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370850_comment'></div>屈拜后生。愤所不堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370850_comment'></div>屡以正免。身伸事蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370850_comment'></div>竟死不升。孰劝为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370850_comment'></div>丞相南讨。余辱司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370850_comment'></div><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370850_comment'></div>不抚其子。葬不送野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370850_comment'></div>望君伤怀。有陨如泻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370850_comment'></div>铭君之绩。纳石壤中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370850_comment'></div>爰及祖考。纪德事功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370850_comment'></div>外著后世。鬼神与通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370850_comment'></div>君其奚憾。不余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370850", 1370850, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>鉴衷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370850_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370850_comment'></div></div><div "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>洪赦</span>方下究，武飙亦旁魄。<div id='poem_sentence_56_49707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_49707'>南据定蛮陬，北攫空朔漠<span -----title
襄城
-----detail

-----title
临汝
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a949313de39340098b578e6281d1a523_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a949313de39340098b578e6281d1a523");'><span id='a949313de39340098b578e6281d1a523_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>，50岁</div><div id='a949313de39340098b578e6281d1a523' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年12月</a>　十二月，班师西归途中路过汝州，于神龟驿台住宿，作诗招请李正封、冯宿。作品：宿神龟招李二十八冯十七。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_49431' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49431' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49431?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿神龟招李二十八冯十七<span class='inlineComment2'>（龟下或有驿字）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（817年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49431")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49431_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49431'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49431'>荒山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49431", 49431, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>野水</span>照斜晖，啄雪寒鸦趁始<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作影）</span>飞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49431_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49431'>夜宿驿亭愁不睡，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49431", 49431, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>幸来</span>相就盖征衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49431_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49431'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49431_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
灵宝（弘农）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fcf249a5aa114afe88cb58936d3bef36_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fcf249a5aa114afe88cb58936d3bef36");'><span id='fcf249a5aa114afe88cb58936d3bef36_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>，50岁</div><div id='fcf249a5aa114afe88cb58936d3bef36' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年12月7日</a>　十二月七日夜，随裴度班师行至桃林。知朝廷封裴度晋国公，作诗以贺。作品：桃林夜贺晋公。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷10。）</span><div id='poem_49427' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49427' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49427?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桃林夜贺晋公</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年12月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49427")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49427_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49427'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49427'>西来骑火照山红，夜宿桃林腊月中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49427'>手把<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49427", 49427, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>命圭</span>兼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49427", 49427, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>相印</span>，一时重叠赏元功。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49427'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49427_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
丹凤（商洛）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ba2a9a1f064d49e29e0448b4a12f500e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ba2a9a1f064d49e29e0448b4a12f500e");'><span id='ba2a9a1f064d49e29e0448b4a12f500e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>，52岁</div><div id='ba2a9a1f064d49e29e0448b4a12f500e' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>一月中旬末，贬潮路上，行至商洛县武关之西，逢吐蕃囚流配湖南，有感作诗。作品：武关西逢配流吐蕃。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_49412' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49412' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49412?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武关西逢配流吐蕃<span class='inlineComment2'>（谪潮州时途中作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（819年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49412")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49412_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49412'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49412'>嗟尔戎人莫惨然，湖南地近保生全。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49412'>我今罪重无归望，直去长安路八千。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49412'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49412_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>一月二十日前后，贬潮途经楚堰（秦楚交界处，武关南，邓州北），见路旁古土堠，有感作诗。作品：路旁堠。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_49750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>路傍堠<span class='inlineComment2'>（以下四篇并元和十四年出为潮州作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（819年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49750")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49750'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49750'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49750", 49750, "Clauses/0/Comments/2")'>堆堆</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（唐本作堠堠）</span>路傍堠<span class='inlineComment2'>（音后）</span>，一双复一只。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49750'>迎我出秦关，送我入楚泽。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49750'>千以高山遮，万以远<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作大）</span>水隔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49750'>吾君勤听治，照与日月敌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49750'>臣愚幸可哀，臣罪庶可释。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49750'>何当迎送归，缘路高历历。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49750'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49750_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
宜城（率道）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c2cfcf26d73e44c08120122ec7a71051_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c2cfcf26d73e44c08120122ec7a71051");'><span id='c2cfcf26d73e44c08120122ec7a71051_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>，52岁</div><div id='c2cfcf26d73e44c08120122ec7a71051' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年2月2日</a>　二月二日，贬潮途经宜城驿，作记。作品：记宜城驿。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷34。）</span><div id='poem_1370681' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370681?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记宜城驿</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年2月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370681")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370681_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370681'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370681'>此驿置在古宜城内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370681_comment'></div>驿东北有井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370681_comment'></div>传是昭王井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370681_comment'></div>有灵异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370681_comment'></div>至今人莫汲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370681_comment'></div>驿前水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370681_comment'></div>传是白起堰西山下涧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370681_comment'></div>灌此城坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370681_comment'></div>楚人多死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370681_comment'></div>流城东陂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370681_comment'></div>臭闻远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370681_comment'></div>因号其陂臭陂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370681_comment'></div>有蛟害人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370681_comment'></div>渔者避之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370681_comment'></div>井东北数十步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370681_comment'></div>有楚昭王庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370681_comment'></div>有旧时高木万株。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370681_comment'></div>多不得其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370681_comment'></div>历代莫敢剪伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370681_comment'></div>尤多古松大竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370681_comment'></div>于太傅帅襄阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370681_comment'></div>迁宜城县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370681_comment'></div>并改造南境数驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370681_comment'></div>材木<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370681", 1370681, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>取足</span>此林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370681_comment'></div>旧庙屋极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370681", 1370681, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>宏盛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370681_comment'></div>今惟草屋一区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370681_comment'></div>然问左侧人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370681_comment'></div>尚云每岁十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370681_comment'></div>民相率聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370681_comment'></div>祭其前庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370681_comment'></div>后小城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370681_comment'></div>盖王居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370681_comment'></div>其内处偏高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370681_comment'></div>广员八九十亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370681_comment'></div>号殿城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370681_comment'></div>当是王朝内之所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370681_comment'></div>多砖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370681_comment'></div>可为书砚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370681_comment'></div>自小城内地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370681_comment'></div>今皆属甄氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370681_comment'></div>甄氏于小城北立墅以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370681_comment'></div>甄氏有节行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370681_comment'></div>其子逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370681_comment'></div>以学行为助教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370681_comment'></div>元和十四年二月二日题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1370681_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年2月</a>　春，贬潮路上。行至宜城驿，访楚昭王庙，有诗。作品：题楚昭王庙。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_49472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题楚昭王庙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49472_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_49472_0'>① -----title
乐昌
-----detail

49632, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>险恶</span>不可状，船石相舂撞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49632'>往问泷头吏，潮州尚几里。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49632'>行当何时到，土风复何似。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49632'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49632", 49632, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>泷吏</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49632", 49632, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>垂手</span>笑，官何问之愚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49632'>譬官居京邑<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作譬如官居北）</span>，何由知东吴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49632'>东吴游宦乡，官知自有由。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49632'>潮州底处所，有罪乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_49632", 49632, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>窜流</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49632'>侬幸无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_49632", 49632, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>负犯</span>，何由到而知。<div id='poem_sentence_8_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_49632'>官今行自到，那遽妄问为。<div id='poem_sentence_9_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_49632'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_49632", 49632, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>不虞</span>卒见困，汗出愧且骇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_49632'>吏曰聊戏官，侬尝使往罢。<div id='poem_sentence_11_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_49632'>岭南大抵同，官去道苦辽。<div id='poem_sentence_12_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49632'>下此三千里，有州始名潮。<div id='poem_sentence_13_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_49632'>恶溪瘴毒聚，雷电常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_49632", 49632, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>汹汹</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_49632'>鳄鱼大于船，牙眼怖杀侬。<div id='poem_sentence_15_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49632'>州南数十里，有海<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作水）</span>无天地。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49632'>飓风有时作，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_49632", 49632, id='poem_sentence_18_49632'>圣人于天下，于物无不容。<div id='poem_sentence_18_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_49632'>比闻此州囚，亦在生还侬。<div id='poem_sentence_19_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_49632'>官无嫌此州，固罪人所徙<span class='inlineComment2'>（阁本作官嫌此州恶，固人之所徙）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_49632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_49632'>官当明时来，事不待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_49632", 49632, -----title
增城
-----detail

-----title
潮州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2d362ddb03a14242b5bc10d9767cb02c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2d362ddb03a14242b5bc10d9767cb02c");'><span id='2d362ddb03a14242b5bc10d9767cb02c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>，52岁</div><div id='2d362ddb03a14242b5bc10d9767cb02c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年3月25日</a>　三月二十五日抵达潮州任所，即上表谢恩，认罪同时亦有乞恩之意。作品：潮州刺史谢上表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370530?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潮州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年3月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370530")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370530'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370530'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370530_comment'></div>臣以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>狂妄</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>戆愚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370530_comment'></div>不识礼度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370530_comment'></div>上表陈佛骨事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370530_comment'></div>言涉不敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370530_comment'></div>正名定罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370530_comment'></div>万死犹轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370530_comment'></div>陛下哀臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>愚忠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370530_comment'></div>恕臣狂直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370530_comment'></div>谓臣言虽可罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370530_comment'></div>心亦无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370530_comment'></div>特屈刑章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370530_comment'></div>以臣为潮州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370530_comment'></div>既免刑诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370530_comment'></div>又获禄食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370530_comment'></div>圣恩宏大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370530_comment'></div>天地莫量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>破脑刳心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370530_comment'></div>岂足为谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370530_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370530_comment'></div>臣以正月十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370530_comment'></div>蒙恩除潮州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370530_comment'></div>即日奔驰上道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370530_comment'></div>经涉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>岭海</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370530_comment'></div>水陆万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370530_comment'></div>以今月二十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370530_comment'></div>到州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370530_comment'></div>与官吏百姓等相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370530_comment'></div>具言朝廷治平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370530_comment'></div>天子神圣威武慈仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>子养</span>亿兆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>人庶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370530_comment'></div>无有亲疏远迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370530_comment'></div>虽在万里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>岭海</span>之陬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370530_comment'></div>待之一如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>畿甸</span>之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370530_comment'></div>辇毂之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370530_comment'></div>有善必闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370530_comment'></div>有恶必见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370530_comment'></div>早朝晚罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370530_comment'></div>兢兢业业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370530_comment'></div>惟恐四海之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370530_comment'></div>天地之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370530_comment'></div>一物不得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370530_comment'></div>故遣刺史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>面问</span>百姓疾苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370530_comment'></div>苟有不便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370530_comment'></div>得以上陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370530_comment'></div>国家宪章完具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370530_comment'></div>为治日久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370530_comment'></div>守令承奉诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370530_comment'></div>违犯者鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370530_comment'></div>虽在蛮荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370530_comment'></div>无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>安泰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370530_comment'></div>闻臣所称圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370530_comment'></div>惟知鼓舞欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370530_comment'></div>不劳施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370530_comment'></div>坐以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370530_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370530_comment'></div>臣所领州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370530_comment'></div>在广府极东界上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370530_comment'></div>去广府虽云才二千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370530_comment'></div>然往来动皆经月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370530_comment'></div>过海口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370530_comment'></div>下恶水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370530_comment'></div>涛泷壮猛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370530_comment'></div>难计程期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370530_comment'></div>飓风鳄鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370530_comment'></div>患祸不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370530_comment'></div>州南近界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370530_comment'></div>涨海连天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370530_comment'></div>毒雾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>瘴氛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370530_comment'></div>日夕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>发作</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370530_comment'></div>臣少多病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370530_comment'></div>年才五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370530_comment'></div>发白齿落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370530_comment'></div>理不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>久长</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>加以</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/75/Comments/1")'>罪犯</span>至重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370530_comment'></div>所处又极远恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>忧惶</span>惭悸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370530_comment'></div>死亡无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370530_comment'></div>单立一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370530_comment'></div>朝无亲党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370530_comment'></div>居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>蛮夷</span>之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370530_comment'></div>与魑魅为群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370530_comment'></div>苟非陛下哀而念之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370530_comment'></div>谁肯为臣言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370530_comment'></div>臣受性愚陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370530_comment'></div>人事多所不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370530_comment'></div>惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>酷好</span>学问文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370530_comment'></div>未尝一日暂废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370530_comment'></div>实为时辈所见推许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370530_comment'></div>臣于当时之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370530_comment'></div>亦未有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370530_comment'></div>至于论述陛下功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370530_comment'></div>与诗书相表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370530_comment'></div>作为歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370530_comment'></div>荐之郊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370530_comment'></div>纪泰山之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370530_comment'></div>镂白玉之牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370530_comment'></div>铺张对天之闳休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>扬厉</span>无前之伟绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370530_comment'></div>编之乎诗书之策而无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370530_comment'></div>措之乎天地之閒而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>无亏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370530_comment'></div>虽使古人复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370530_comment'></div>臣亦未肯多让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370530_comment'></div>伏以大唐受命有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370530_comment'></div>四海之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370530_comment'></div>莫不臣妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370530_comment'></div>南北东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370530_comment'></div>地各万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370530_comment'></div>自天宝之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370530_comment'></div>政治少懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>文致</span>未优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370530_comment'></div>武剋不刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370530_comment'></div>孽臣奸隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370530_comment'></div>蠹居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>棋处</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>摇毒</span>自防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370530_comment'></div>外顺内悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370530_comment'></div>父死子代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370530_comment'></div>以祖以孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370530_comment'></div>如古诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370530_comment'></div>自擅其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370530_comment'></div>不贡不朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370530_comment'></div>六七十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370530_comment'></div>四圣传序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370530_comment'></div>以至陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370530_comment'></div>陛下即位以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370530_comment'></div>躬亲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_126_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>听断</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>旋乾转坤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_128_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>关机</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_128_1370530", 1370530, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_131_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>天戈</span>所麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370530_comment'></div>莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>宁顺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_133_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>大宇</span>之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_134_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>生息</span>理极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370530_comment'></div>高祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_135_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>创制</span>天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370530_comment'></div>其功大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370530_comment'></div>而治未太平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370530_comment'></div>太宗太平矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370530_comment'></div>而大功所立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370530_comment'></div>咸在高祖之代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370530_comment'></div>非如陛下承天宝之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370530_comment'></div>接因循之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370530_comment'></div>六七十年之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370530_comment'></div>赫然兴起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370530_comment'></div>南面指麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370530_comment'></div>而致此巍巍之治功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370530_comment'></div>宜定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_147_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>乐章</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370530_comment'></div>以告神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370530_comment'></div>东巡泰山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370530_comment'></div>奏功皇天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370530_comment'></div>具著显庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370530_comment'></div>明示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_152_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/152/Comments/0")'>得意</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370530_comment'></div>使永永年代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370530_comment'></div>服我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_154_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>成烈</span>。<div class='inline' "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>千载一时</span>不可逢之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_156_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/156/Comments/1")'>嘉会</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370530_comment'></div>而臣负罪婴亹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370530_comment'></div>自拘海岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370530_comment'></div>戚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_159_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>戚嗟</span>嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370530_comment'></div>日与死迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370530_comment'></div>曾不得奏薄技于从官之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_162_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>隶御</span>之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_163_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>穷思毕精</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370530_comment'></div>以赎罪过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370530_comment'></div>怀痛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_165_1370530", 1370530, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>穷天</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370530_comment'></div>死不闭目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370530_comment'></div>瞻望宸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370530_comment'></div>魂神飞去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370530_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下天地父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370530_comment'></div>哀而怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370530_comment'></div>无任感恩恋阙惭惶恳迫之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370530_comment'></div>谨附表陈谢以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_172_1370530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在潮州刺史任上。柳宗元在贬所柳州有食蛤蟆诗寄来。韩愈作诗以答。作品：答柳柳州食虾蟆。<span id='poem_sentence_12_49734_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_49734'>常惧染蛮夷，失平生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_49734", 49734, class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_49734'>哀哉思虑深，未见许回棹。<div id='poem_sentence_16_49734_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_49734'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_49734_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49734'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49734)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　夏，在潮州刺史任上。因潮州人未知学，作牒文请置乡校州学，令进士赵德教之。作品：潮州请置乡校牒。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷35。）</span><div id='poem_1370636' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370636' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370636?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潮州请置乡校牒</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370636")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370636_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370636'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370636'>孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370636_comment'></div>道之以政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370636_comment'></div>齐之以刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370636_comment'></div>则民免而无耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370636_comment'></div>不如以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370636", 1370636, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>德礼</span>为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370636_comment'></div>而辅以政刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370636_comment'></div>夫欲用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370636", 1370636, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>德礼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370636_comment'></div>未有不由学校师弟子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370636_comment'></div>此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370636", 1370636, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>州学</span>废日久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370636_comment'></div>进士明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370636_comment'></div>百十年閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370636_comment'></div>不闻有业成贡于王庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370636_comment'></div>试于有司者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370636_comment'></div>人吏目不识乡饮酒之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370636_comment'></div>耳未尝闻鹿鸣之歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370636_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370636", 1370636, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>忠孝</span>之行不劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370636_comment'></div>亦县之耻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370636_comment'></div>夫十室之邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370636_comment'></div>必有忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370636_comment'></div>今此州户万有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370636_comment'></div>岂无庶几者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370636_comment'></div>刺史县令不躬为之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370636_comment'></div>里闾后生无所从学尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370636_comment'></div>赵德秀才沈雅专静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370636_comment'></div>颇通经有文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370636_comment'></div>能知先王之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370636_comment'></div>论说且排异端而宗孔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370636_comment'></div>可以为师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370636_comment'></div>请摄海阳县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370636_comment'></div>为衙推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370636_comment'></div>专勾当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370636", 1370636, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>州学</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370636_comment'></div>以督生徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370636_comment'></div>兴恺悌之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370636_comment'></div>刺史出己俸百千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370636_comment'></div>以为举本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370636_comment'></div>收其赢馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370636_comment'></div>以给学生厨馔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370636_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　夏，在潮州刺史任上。因潮州人多患于鳄鱼，韩愈戏作文驱之。作品：鳄鱼文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷26。）</span><div id='poem_1370842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370842?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭鳄鱼文</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370842")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370842'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370842'>维年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370842_comment'></div>潮州刺史韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370842_comment'></div>使军事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>衙推</span>秦济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370842_comment'></div>以羊一猪一投恶溪之潭水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370842_comment'></div>以与鳄鱼食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370842_comment'></div>而告之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370842_comment'></div>昔先王既有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370842_comment'></div>列山泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370842_comment'></div>罔绳擉刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370842_comment'></div>以除虫蛇恶物为民害者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370842_comment'></div>驱而出之四海之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370842_comment'></div>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>后王</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>德薄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370842_comment'></div>不能远有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370842_comment'></div>则江汉之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370842_comment'></div>尚皆弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370842_comment'></div>以与蛮夷楚越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370842_comment'></div>况潮岭海之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370842_comment'></div>去京师万里哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370842_comment'></div>鳄鱼之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>涵淹</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>卵育</span>于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370842_comment'></div>亦固其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370842_comment'></div>今天子嗣唐位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370842_comment'></div>神圣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>慈武</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370842_comment'></div>四海之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370842_comment'></div>六合之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370842_comment'></div>皆抚而有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370842_comment'></div>况<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>禹迹</span>所掩扬州之近地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370842_comment'></div>刺史县令之所治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370842_comment'></div>出贡赋以供天地宗庙百神之祀之壤者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370842_comment'></div>鳄鱼其不可与刺史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>杂处</span>此土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370842_comment'></div>刺史受天子命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370842_comment'></div>守此土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370842_comment'></div>治此民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370842_comment'></div>而鳄鱼睅然不安溪潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370842_comment'></div>据处食民畜熊豕鹿獐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370842_comment'></div>以肥其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370842_comment'></div>以种其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370842_comment'></div>与刺史抗拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370842_comment'></div>争为长雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370842_comment'></div>刺史虽驽弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370842_comment'></div>亦安肯为鳄鱼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>低首下心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370842_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>伈伈</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>睍睍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370842_comment'></div>为民吏羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370842_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>偷活</span>于此耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370842_comment'></div>且承天子命以来为吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370842_comment'></div>固其势不得不与鳄鱼辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370842_comment'></div>鳄鱼有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370842_comment'></div>其听刺史言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370842_comment'></div>潮之州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370842_comment'></div>大海在其南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370842_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>鲸鹏</span>之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370842_comment'></div>虾蟹之细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370842_comment'></div>无不容归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370842_comment'></div>以生以食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370842_comment'></div>鳄鱼朝发而夕至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370842_comment'></div>今与鳄鱼约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370842_comment'></div>尽三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370842_comment'></div>其率丑类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370842_comment'></div>南徙于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370842_comment'></div>以避天子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>命吏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370842_comment'></div>三日不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370842_comment'></div>至五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370842_comment'></div>五日不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370842_comment'></div>至七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370842_comment'></div>七日不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370842_comment'></div>是终不肯徙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370842_comment'></div>是不有刺史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>听从</span>其言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370842_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370842_comment'></div>则是鳄鱼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>冥顽</span>不灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370842_comment'></div>刺史虽有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370842_comment'></div>不闻不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370842_comment'></div>夫傲天子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>命吏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370842_comment'></div>不听其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370842_comment'></div>不徙以避之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370842_comment'></div>与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>冥顽</span>不灵而为民物害者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370842_comment'></div>皆可杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370842_comment'></div>刺史则选<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>材技</span>吏民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370842_comment'></div>操强弓毒矢以与鳄鱼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1370842", 1370842, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>从事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370842_comment'></div>必尽杀乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370842_comment'></div>其无悔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1370842_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　夏秋，在潮州刺史任上。作一系列祭神文，关心民治生产。作品：潮州祭神文五首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_1370854' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370854' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370854?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潮州祭神文五首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370854")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370854_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370854'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370854'>维年月日。潮州刺史韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370854_comment'></div>谨差摄潮阳县尉史虚已。以特羊庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370854_comment'></div>告于大湖神之灵。愈承朝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370854_comment'></div>为此州长。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370854", 1370854, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>今月</span>二十五日至治下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370854_comment'></div>凡大神降依庇贶斯人者。皆愈所当率徒属奔走致诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370854_comment'></div>亲执祀事于庙庭下。今以始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370854_comment'></div>方上奏天子。思虑不能专一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370854_comment'></div>冠衣不净洁。与人吏未相识知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370854_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370854", 1370854, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>牲糈</span>酒食。器皿觕弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370854_comment'></div>不能严清。又未卜日时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370854_comment'></div>不敢自荐见。使摄潮阳县尉史虚已以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370854_comment'></div>神其降鉴。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370854_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370854_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370855' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370855' class='poemTitle id='poem_title_1370855_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370855'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370855'>维年<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_1_1370855_comment'></div>谨以清酌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370855", 1370855, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>腶脩</span>之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370855_comment'></div>祈于大湖神之灵曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370855_comment'></div>稻既穟矣而雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370855_comment'></div>不得熟以获也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370855_comment'></div>蚕起且眠矣而雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370855_comment'></div>不得老以簇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370855_comment'></div>岁且尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370855_comment'></div>稻不可以复种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370855_comment'></div>而蚕不可以复育也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370855_comment'></div>农夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370855", 1370855, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>桑妇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370855_comment'></div>将无以应赋税继衣食也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370855_comment'></div>非神之不爱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370855_comment'></div>刺史失所职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370855_comment'></div>百姓何罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370855_comment'></div>使至极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370855_comment'></div>神聪明而端一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370855_comment'></div>听不可滥以惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370855_comment'></div>刺史不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370855_comment'></div>可坐以罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370855_comment'></div>惟彼无辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370855_comment'></div>惠以福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370855_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370855", 1370855, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>划劙</span>云阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370855_comment'></div>卷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370855", 1370855, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>月日</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370855_comment'></div>幸身有衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370855_comment'></div>口得食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370855_comment'></div>给神役也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370855_comment'></div>充上之须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370855_comment'></div>脱刑辟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370855_comment'></div>选牲为酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370855_comment'></div>以报灵德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370855_comment'></div>吹击管鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370855_comment'></div>侑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370855", 1370855, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>香洁</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370855_comment'></div>拜庭跪坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370855_comment'></div>如法式也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370855_comment'></div>不信当治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370855_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370855", 1370855, class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370856' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370856?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>柔毛</span>刚鬣清酌庶羞之奠。祭于城隍之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370856_comment'></div>閒者以淫雨将为人灾。无以应贡赋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370856", 1370856, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>供给</span>神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370856_comment'></div>上下获罪罚之故。乃以六月壬子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370856_comment'></div>奔走分告。乞晴于尔明神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370856_comment'></div>闵人之不辜。若飨若答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370856_comment'></div>粪除天地山川。清风时兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370856_comment'></div>白日显行。蚕谷以登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370856_comment'></div>人不咨嗟。惟神之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370856_comment'></div>夙夜不敢忘怠。谨卜良日。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370858_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370858", 1370858, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>今兹</span>无有水旱雷雨<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_0_1370531_comment'></div>臣伏闻宰相公卿百官及关辅百姓耆耋等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370531_comment'></div>以陛下功崇德钜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370531_comment'></div>天成地平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370531_comment'></div>宜加号于殊常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370531_comment'></div>以昭示于来代。<div "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>首序</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370531_comment'></div>令月吉辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370531_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370531", 1370531, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>发扬</span>鸿休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370531_comment'></div>膺受显册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370531_comment'></div>天人合庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370531_comment'></div>日月扬光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370531_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370531", 1370531, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>环海</span>之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370531_comment'></div>含生之类。<div class='inline' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370531", 1370531, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>戡定</span>祸乱之谓武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370531_comment'></div>先天不违之谓法天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370531_comment'></div>道济天下之谓应道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370531_comment'></div>伏惟元和圣文神武法天应道皇帝陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370531", 1370531, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>子育</span>亿兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370531_comment'></div>视之如伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370531_comment'></div>可谓体仁以长人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370531_comment'></div>喜怒以类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370531_comment'></div>刑赏不差。<div id='poem_sentence_35_1370531_comment'></div>幽隐毕达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370531_comment'></div>可谓无所不通矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370531_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370531", 1370531, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>发号出令</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370531_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370531", 1370531, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>云行雨施</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370531_comment'></div>可谓妙而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370531", 1370531, "Clauses/64/Comments/1")'>刑章</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370531_comment'></div>假息海隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370531_comment'></div>死亡无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370531_comment'></div>瞻望宸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370531_comment'></div>心魂飞扬。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年7月13日</a>　在潮州刺史任上。七月十三日，因群臣向宪宗上尊号，大赦天下，逐臣亦在宽赦之列。韩愈逢赦。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年8月</a>　八月，在潮州刺史任上，作状谢广州刺史孔戣。孔七月曾遣人赠钱贻书慰问韩愈。作品：潮州谢孔大夫状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷36。）</span><div id='poem_1370571' id='poem_sentence_2_1370571_comment'></div>以州小俸薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370571_comment'></div>虑有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370571", 1370571, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>阙乏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370571_comment'></div>每月别给钱五十千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370571_comment'></div>以送使钱充者。<div class='inline' class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370571", 1370571, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>穷州</span>使宾罕至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370571_comment'></div>身衣口食绢米<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370571", 1370571, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>过此以往</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370571_comment'></div>实无所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370571_comment'></div>积之于室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370571_comment'></div>非廉者所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370571_comment'></div>受之于官。<div
