id='poem_sentence_28_1370571_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在潮州刺史任上。本年，受请为胡良公撰写神道碑文。作品：唐故中散大夫少府监胡良公墓神道碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷20。）</span><div id='poem_1370753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故中散大夫少府监胡良公墓神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370753")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370753'>少府监胡公者。讳珦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370753_comment'></div>字润博。年七十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370753_comment'></div>以官卒。明年八月十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370753_comment'></div>葬京兆奉先。夫人天水赵氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370753_comment'></div>其子逞乃巡遇述迁造。与公婿广文博士吴郡张籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370753_comment'></div>以公之族出行治历官寿年为书。使人自京师南走八千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370753_comment'></div>至闽南<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>两越</span>之界上。请为公铭刻之墓碑于潮州刺史韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370753_comment'></div>曰。胡姓本出安定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370753_comment'></div>后徙清河。于今为宗城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370753_comment'></div>属贝州。大父讳秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370753_comment'></div>武后时以文材徵。为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>麟台</span>正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370753_comment'></div>父宰臣。用进士卒官平阳冀氏令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370753_comment'></div>赠潭州大都督。公早孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370753_comment'></div>能自劝学。立节槩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370753_comment'></div>非其身力。不以衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370753_comment'></div>凡一试进士。二即吏部选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370753_comment'></div>皆以文章占上第。乐为俭勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370753_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>刻削</span>。不干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370753_comment'></div>以矫时弊。及为富平尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370753_comment'></div>一府称其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>断决</span>。建中四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370753_comment'></div>侍郎赵赞为度支使。荐公为监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370753_comment'></div>主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>馈给</span>渭桥以东军。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>洗手奉职</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370753_comment'></div>不以一钱假人。贼平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370753_comment'></div>有司考覈。群吏多坐贬死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370753_comment'></div>独公以清苦能检饬。无漏失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370753_comment'></div>迁河南仓曹。魏公贾耽以节镇郑滑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370753_comment'></div>以公佐观察事。检校尚书工部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370753_comment'></div>以刚直龃龉不阿。忤权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370753_comment'></div>除献陵令。居陵下七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370753_comment'></div>市置田宅。务种树为业以自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370753_comment'></div>教授子弟。贞元十一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370753_comment'></div>吏部大选。以公考选人艺学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370753_comment'></div>以劳迁奉先令。以治办迁尚书膳部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370753_comment'></div>改坊州刺史。州经乱无孔子庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370753_comment'></div>公至则命筑宫。造祭器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370753_comment'></div>率博士生讲读以时。如法以祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370753_comment'></div>人吏聚观叹息。迁舒州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370753_comment'></div>州岁大熟。麦一茎数穗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370753_comment'></div>闾里歌舞之。考功以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370753_comment'></div>迁尚书驾部郎中。数以事犯尚书李巽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370753_comment'></div>巽时主盐铁事。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>富骄</span>恃势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370753_comment'></div>以语丞相。由是退公为凤翔少尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370753_comment'></div>巽死。迁少大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370753_comment'></div>改少詹事。元和十二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370753_comment'></div>朝廷以公年老能自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>祗力</span>。事职<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>不懈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370753_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>坚悍</span>不衰。事可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>传载</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370753_comment'></div>可为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370753", 1370753, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>成德</span>。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370753_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1370753_comment'></div>挟艺射科。每发如望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370753_comment'></div>人求于人。我己为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370753_comment'></div>自始迄终。不降色辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370753_comment'></div>因官立事。随有可载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370753_comment'></div>发迹馈军。遭谗府介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370753_comment'></div>去居陵下。为吏为隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370753_comment'></div>坊舒之政。于兹有靳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370753_comment'></div>守官驾部。名升已屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370753_comment'></div>少府古卿。公优止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370753_comment'></div>刻文碑石。以显公行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370753_comment'></div>维公后人。无怠嗣庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370753_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1370753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　抵潮州之后，忧思深远，借古圣贤以自写性情，作《琴操》十首。作品：琴操十首并序·将归操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·猗兰操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·龟山操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·越裳操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·拘幽操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·岐山操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·履霜操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·雉朝飞操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·别鹄操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span>琴操十首并序·残形操。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_49726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>琴操十首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>将归操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49726")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49726_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49726'>孔子之赵，闻杀鸣犊作。赵杀鸣犊，孔子临河，叹而作歌曰：秋之水兮风扬波，舟楫颠倒更相加，归来归来胡为斯。</div><div id='poem_preface_49726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49726'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49726'>秋之水兮，其色幽幽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49726'>我将济兮，不得其由。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49726'>涉其浅兮，石齧我足。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49726'>乘其深兮，龙入我舟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49726'>我济而悔兮，将安归尤。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49726'>归兮归兮，无与石斗兮，无应龙求。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_49726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49726'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49726)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_49793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49793?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>猗兰操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49793_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49793'>一曰幽兰操。孔子伤不逢时作。古琴操云：习习谷风，以阴以雨。之子于归，远送于野。何彼苍天，不得其所。逍遥九州，无有定处。世人暗蔽，不知贤者。年纪逝迈，一身将老。</div><div id='poem_preface_49793_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_49793'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6641, "poem_allusion_49793")'>佩兰</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_49793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49793'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49793'>兰之猗猗，扬扬其香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49793'>不采而佩，于兰何伤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49793'>今天之旋，其曷为然。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49793'>我行四方，以日以年。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49793'>雪霜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49793", 49793, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>贸贸</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（音茂）</span>，荠麦之茂。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49793'>子如不伤，我不尔觏。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49793'>荠麦之茂，荠麦之有。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49793'>君子之伤，君子之守。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49793'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_49793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49793'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49793)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_49720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49720?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>龟山操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49720_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49720'>孔子以季桓子受齐女乐，谏不从，望龟山而作。龟山在太山博县。古琴操云：予欲望鲁兮，龟山蔽之。手无斧柯，奈龟山何。</div><div id='poem_preface_49720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49720'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49720'>龟之氛<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作气）</span>兮，不能云<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作为）</span>雨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49720'>龟之蘖<span class='inlineComment2'>（牙葛切，亦作檗）</span>兮，不中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49720", 49720, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>梁柱</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49720'>龟之大兮，祗以奄鲁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49720'>知将隳兮，哀莫余伍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49720'>周公有鬼<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作思）</span>兮，嗟余归辅。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49720'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_49720_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_49725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49725?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>越裳操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49725_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49725'>周公作。古琴操云：于戏嗟嗟，非旦之力，乃文王之德。</div><div id='poem_preface_49725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49725'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49725'>雨之施物以孳，我何意于彼为。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49725'>自周之先，其艰其勤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49725'>以有疆宇，私我后人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49725'>我祖在上，四方在下。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49725'>厥临<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49725", 49725, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>孔威</span>，敢戏以侮。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49725'>孰荒于门，孰治于田。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49725'>四海既均，越裳是臣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49725'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_49725_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_49727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49727?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>拘幽操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49727_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49727'>文王哀羑里，文王拘于羑里而作。古琴操云：殷道溷溷，浸浊烦兮。朱紫相合，不别分兮。迷乱声色，信谗言兮。炎炎之虐，使我愆兮。幽闭牢阱，由其言兮。遘我四人，忧勤勤兮。</div><div id='poem_preface_49727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49727'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49727'>目<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49727", 49727, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>窈窈</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作掩掩）</span>兮，其凝其盲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49727'>耳肃肃兮，听不闻声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49727'>朝不<span class='inlineComment2'>（一有见字）</span>日出兮，夜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49727", 49727, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>不见</span>月与星。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49727'>有知无知兮，为死为生。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49727'>呜呼！<div id='poem_sentence_4_49727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49727'>臣罪当诛兮，天王圣明。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_49727_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_49792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49792?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>岐山操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49792_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49792'>周公为太王作。本词云：狄戎侵兮，土地迁移。邦邑适于岐山，烝民不忧兮谁者知。嗟嗟奈何兮，予命遭斯。</div><div id='poem_preface_49792_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49792'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49792'>我家于豳，自我先公。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49792'>伊我承绪<span class='inlineComment2'>（集作序）</span>，敢有不同。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49792'>今狄之人，将土我疆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49792'>民为我战，谁使死伤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49792'>彼岐有岨，我往独处。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49792'>人莫<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作莫尔）</span>余追，无思我悲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49792'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49792_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_49794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49794?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>履霜操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49794_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49794'>尹吉甫子伯奇无罪，为后母谮而见逐，自伤作。本词云：朝履霜兮采晨寒，考不明其心兮信谗言。孤恩别离兮摧肺肝，何辜皇天兮遭斯愆。痛殁不同兮恩有偏，谁能流顾兮知我冤。</div><div id='poem_preface_49794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49794'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49794'>父兮儿寒，母兮儿饥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49794'>儿罪当笞，逐儿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49794", 49794, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>何为</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49794'>儿在中野，以宿以处。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49794'>四无人声，谁与儿语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49794'>儿寒何衣，儿饥何食。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49794'>儿行于野，履霜以足。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49794'>母生众儿，有母怜之。<div id='poem_sentence_6_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_49794'>独无母怜，儿宁不悲。<div id='poem_sentence_7_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_49794'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_49794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49728?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span>雉朝飞操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49728_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49728'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49728'>雉之飞，于朝日。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49728'>群雌孤雄，意气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_49728", 49728, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>横出</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49728'>当东而西，当啄而飞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49728'>随飞随啄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_49728", 49728, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>群雌粥粥</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49728'>嗟我虽人，曾不如彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_49728", 49728, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>雉鸡</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_49728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_49728'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_49728", 49728, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>生身</span>七十年，无一妾与妃<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本无鸡字，下语妃音媲，与雉叶）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_49728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_49728'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_49728_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_49729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49729?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>别鹄操</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_49729_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49729'>商陵穆子，娶妻五年无子。父母欲其改娶，其妻闻之，中夜悲啸，穆子感之而作。本词云：将乖比翼隔天端，山川悠远路漫漫，揽衾不寐食忘飧。</div><div id='poem_preface_49729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49729'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49729'>雄鹄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>衔枝来，雌鹄啄泥归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49729'>巢成不生子，大义当乖离。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49729'>江汉水之大，鹄身鸟之微。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49729'>更无相逢日，且可绕树相随飞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49729'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49729'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_49729_0'>⑴ 《乐府诗集》作雄鹤，以下鹄俱作鹤</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_49729_0'>⑵ 《乐府》作更无相逢日，安可相随飞</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49729_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_49729'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(49729)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_49730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49730' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49730?labeling=true' class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_49730'>曾子梦见一狸，不见其首作</div><div id='poem_preface_49730_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49730'><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年12月</a>　在潮州。十二月左右，得知蒙赦，量移袁州。韶州张蒙有诗相贺，韩愈作诗以酬答之。作品：量移袁州张韶州端公以诗相贺因酬之。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷11。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_10_1378555_comment'></div>傥惠能降谕。非所敢望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1378555_comment'></div>至此一二日。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1378555", 1378555, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>却归</span>高居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1378555_comment'></div>亦无不可。旦夕渴望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1378555_comment'></div>不宣。愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1378555_comment'></div>愈启。惠匀至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1378555_comment'></div>辱答问。珍悚无己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1378555_comment'></div>所示广大深迥。非造次可谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1378555_comment'></div>易大传曰。书不尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1378555_comment'></div>言不尽意。然则圣人之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1378555_comment'></div>其终不可得而见耶。如此而论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1378555_comment'></div>读来一百遍。不如亲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1378555", 1378555, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>见颜</span>色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1378555_comment'></div>幸甚。旦夕驰望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1378555_comment'></div>愈闻道无疑滞。行止系缚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1378555_comment'></div>苟非所恋著。则山林閒寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1378555_comment'></div>与城郭无异。大颠师论甚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1378555", 1378555, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>宏博</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1378555_comment'></div>而必守山林。义不至城郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1378555_comment'></div>自激修行。独立空旷无累之地者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1378555_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1378555", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1378555_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1378555_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年闰1月</a>　年初，抵达袁州后，上表以闻。作品：袁州刺史谢上表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_1370532_comment'></div>先朝恕臣愚直。不加大罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370532_comment'></div>自刑部侍郎贬授潮州刺史。伏遇其年七月十三日恩赦至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370532_comment'></div>其年十月二十四日。准例量移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370532_comment'></div>改授袁州刺史。以今月八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370532_comment'></div>到任上讫。臣某诚欢诚喜顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370532_comment'></div>伏以州小地狭。税赋及时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370532_comment'></div>人安吏循。闾里无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370532_comment'></div>微臣惟当布陛下维新之泽。守国家太平之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370532_comment'></div>德重恩宏。身微命贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370532_comment'></div>无阶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370532", 1370532, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>答谢</span>。惟积惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370532_comment'></div>无任感恩惭惕之至。谨差军事副将郝泰奉表陈谢以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370532_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1370532_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: "poem_title_1370615")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370615_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370615'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370615'>愈白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>行官</span>自南回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370615_comment'></div>过吉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370615_comment'></div>得吾兄二十四日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>手书</span>数番。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>忻悚</span>兼至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370615_comment'></div>未审入秋来眠食何似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370615_comment'></div>伏惟万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370615_comment'></div>来示云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370615_comment'></div>有人传愈近少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>信奉</span>释氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370615_comment'></div>此传之者妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370615_comment'></div>潮州时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370615_comment'></div>有一老僧号大颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370615_comment'></div>颇聪明识道理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370615_comment'></div>远地无可与语者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370615_comment'></div>故自山召至州郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370615_comment'></div>留十数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370615_comment'></div>实能外形骸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370615_comment'></div>以理自胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370615_comment'></div>不为事物<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>侵乱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370615_comment'></div>与之语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370615_comment'></div>虽不尽解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370615_comment'></div>要自胸中无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>滞碍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370615_comment'></div>以为难得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370615_comment'></div>因与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>来往</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370615_comment'></div>及祭神至海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370615_comment'></div>遂造其庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370615_comment'></div>及来袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370615_comment'></div>留衣服为别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370615_comment'></div>乃人之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370615_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>崇信</span>其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370615_comment'></div>求福田利益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370615_comment'></div>孔子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370615_comment'></div>某之祷久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370615_comment'></div>凡君子行已立身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370615_comment'></div>自有法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370615_comment'></div>圣贤事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370615_comment'></div>具在方策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370615_comment'></div>可效可师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370615_comment'></div>仰不愧天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370615_comment'></div>俯不愧人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370615_comment'></div>内不愧心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>积善</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>积恶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370615_comment'></div>殃庆自各以其类至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370615_comment'></div>何有去圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370615_comment'></div>舍先王之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370615_comment'></div>而从夷狄之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370615_comment'></div>以求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>福利</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370615_comment'></div>诗不云乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370615_comment'></div>恺悌君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370615_comment'></div>求福不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370615_comment'></div>传又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370615_comment'></div>不为威惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370615_comment'></div>不为利疚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370615_comment'></div>假如释氏能与人为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>祸祟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370615_comment'></div>非守道君子之所惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370615_comment'></div>况万万无此理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370615_comment'></div>且彼佛者果何人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370615_comment'></div>其行事类君子耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370615_comment'></div>小人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370615_comment'></div>若君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370615_comment'></div>必不妄加祸于守道之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370615_comment'></div>如小人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370615_comment'></div>其身已死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370615_comment'></div>其鬼不灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370615_comment'></div>天地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>神祇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370615_comment'></div>昭布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>森列</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370615_comment'></div>非可诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370615_comment'></div>又肯令其鬼行胸臆作威福于其閒哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370615_comment'></div>进退无所据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370615_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>信奉</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370615_comment'></div>亦且惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370615_comment'></div>且愈不助释氏而排之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370615_comment'></div>其亦有说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370615_comment'></div>孟子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370615_comment'></div>今天下不之杨则之墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>交乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370615_comment'></div>而圣贤之道不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370615_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>三纲</span>沦而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/77/Comments/1")'>九法</span>斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370615_comment'></div>礼乐崩而夷狄横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370615_comment'></div>几何其不为禽兽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370615_comment'></div>故曰能言距<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370615_comment'></div>皆圣人之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370615_comment'></div>扬子云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370615_comment'></div>古者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/83/Comments/1")'>塞路</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370615_comment'></div>孟子辞而辟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>廓如</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370615_comment'></div>夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370615_comment'></div>正道废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370615_comment'></div>且将数百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370615_comment'></div>以至于秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370615_comment'></div>卒灭先王之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>烧除</span>其经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370615_comment'></div>坑杀学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370615_comment'></div>天下遂大乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370615_comment'></div>及秦灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370615_comment'></div>汉兴且百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370615_comment'></div>尚未知修明先王之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370615_comment'></div>其后始除挟书之律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370615_comment'></div>稍求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>亡书</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370615_comment'></div>招学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370615_comment'></div>经虽少得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370615_comment'></div>尚皆残缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370615_comment'></div>十亡二三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370615_comment'></div>故学士多老死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370615_comment'></div>新者不见全经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370615_comment'></div>不能尽知先王之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370615_comment'></div>各以所见为守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370615_comment'></div>分离乖隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370615_comment'></div>不合不公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370615_comment'></div>二帝三王群圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370615_comment'></div>于是大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370615_comment'></div>后之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370615_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>寻逐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370615_comment'></div>以至于今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>泯泯</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370615_comment'></div>其祸出于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/114/Comments/1")'>肆行</span>而莫之禁故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370615_comment'></div>孟子虽贤圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370615_comment'></div>不得位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_117_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>空言</span>无施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370615_comment'></div>虽切何补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370615_comment'></div>然赖其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370615_comment'></div>而今学者尚知宗孔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370615_comment'></div>崇仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>贵王贱霸</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370615_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>大经大法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370615_comment'></div>皆亡灭而不救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370615_comment'></div>坏烂而不收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370615_comment'></div>所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_126_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>存十一于千百</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370615_comment'></div>安在其能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>廓如</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370615_comment'></div>然向无孟氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370615_comment'></div>则皆服左衽而言侏离矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370615_comment'></div>故愈尝推尊孟氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370615_comment'></div>以为功不在禹下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370615_comment'></div>为此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370615_comment'></div>汉氏以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370615_comment'></div>群儒区区<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_134_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>修补</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370615_comment'></div>百孔千疮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370615_comment'></div>随乱随失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370615_comment'></div>其危如一发引千钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370615_comment'></div>绵绵延延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370615_comment'></div>䆮以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_139_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>微灭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370615_comment'></div>于是时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370615_comment'></div>而倡释老于其閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370615_comment'></div>鼓天下之众而从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370615_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370615_comment'></div>其亦不仁甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370615_comment'></div>释老之害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370615_comment'></div>过于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_146_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370615_comment'></div>韩愈之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370615_comment'></div>不及孟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370615_comment'></div>孟子不能救之于未亡之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370615_comment'></div>而韩愈乃欲全之于已坏之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370615_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370615_comment'></div>其亦不量其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370615_comment'></div>且见其身之危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370615_comment'></div>莫之救以死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1370615_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370615_comment'></div>使其道由愈而粗传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370615_comment'></div>虽灭死万万无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370615_comment'></div>天地鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370615_comment'></div>临之在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370615_comment'></div>质之在旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370615_comment'></div>又安得因一摧折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370615_comment'></div>自毁其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370615_comment'></div>以从于邪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370615_comment'></div>籍湜辈虽屡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_164_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/164/Comments/0")'>指教</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370615_comment'></div>不知果能不叛去否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370615_comment'></div>辱吾兄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_166_1370615", 1370615, "Clauses/166/Comments/0")'>眷厚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370615_comment'></div>而不获承命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370615_comment'></div>惟增惭惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370615_comment'></div>死罪死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370615_comment'></div>愈再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_170_1370615_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年闰1月</a>　闰一月，在袁州任刺史。收到正月二十七日朝廷所下宪宗驾崩哀诏，上表慰穆宗。作品：慰国哀表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370537' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370537' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370537?labeling=true' target='_blank'>慰国哀表</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年闰1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370537")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370537_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370537'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370537'>臣某言。伏奉正月二十七日诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370537_comment'></div>大行皇帝奄弃万国。承诏哀惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370537_comment'></div>号踊无地。伏惟圣情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370537_comment'></div>何可堪处。大行皇帝功济寰区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370537_comment'></div>仁沾动植。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370537", 1370537, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>奉讳</span>之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370537_comment'></div>率土<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370537", 1370537, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>崩心</span>。凡在臣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370537_comment'></div>不胜殒裂。伏惟陛下痛贯宸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370537_comment'></div>圣情难居。臣拘守远郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370537_comment'></div>不获匍匐奉慰。瞻望阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370537_comment'></div>且悲且恋。谨奉表陈慰以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370537_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1370537_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年闰1月</a>　闰一月，在袁州任刺史。作表贺穆宗即位。作品：贺皇帝即位表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_2_1370533_comment'></div>永有承事。神人交庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370533_comment'></div>日月贞明。臣某诚欢诚喜顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370533_comment'></div>臣闻王者必为天所相。为人所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370533_comment'></div>上符天心。下合人志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370533_comment'></div>然后奄有四海。以君万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370533_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370533", 1370533, id='poem_sentence_10_1370533_comment'></div>英伟之姿。久动群听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370533_comment'></div>及初嗣位。遐迩莫不欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370534_comment'></div>庆溢寰海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370534_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚喜顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370534_comment'></div>臣闻王者必于嗣位之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370534_comment'></div>降非常之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370534_comment'></div>所以象德乾坤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370534_comment'></div>同明日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370534_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下文思聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370534_comment'></div>圣神睿哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370534_comment'></div>发号出令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370534_comment'></div>云行雨施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370534_comment'></div>惧刑政之或差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370534_comment'></div>怜鳏寡之重困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370534_comment'></div>知事久之滋弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370534_comment'></div>虑法讹之益奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370534_comment'></div>罪人悉原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370534_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370534", 1370534, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>坠典</span>咸举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370534_comment'></div>微臣往因论事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370534_comment'></div>获谴海隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370534_comment'></div>旋沐朝奖。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370534", 1370534, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>贬窜</span>之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370534_comment'></div>忽逢旷荡之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370534_comment'></div>踊跃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370534", 1370534, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>欣欢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370534_comment'></div>实倍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370534", 1370534, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>常品</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370534_comment'></div>限以官守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370534_comment'></div>不获随例称庆阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370534_comment'></div>无任感恩恋阙之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370534_comment'></div>谨奉表陈贺以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1370534_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年5月5日</a>　五月，在袁州任刺史。柳宗元在柳州去世，灵柩北移时，韩愈作祭文，派人于途中祭吊。作品：祭柳子厚文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370862' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370862' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370862?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭柳子厚文</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年5月5日）</span><span id='poem_sentence_2_1370862_comment'></div>嗟嗟子厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370862_comment'></div>而至然邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370862_comment'></div>自古莫不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370862_comment'></div>我又何嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370862_comment'></div>人之生世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370862_comment'></div>其閒利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370862_comment'></div>竟亦何校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370862_comment'></div>当其梦时。<div id='poem_sentence_58_1370862_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370862_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1370862_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年5月</a>　五月，在袁州任刺史。为柳宗元作墓志铭。柳七月十日下葬。作品：柳子厚墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷22。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370764'>子厚讳宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370764_comment'></div>七世祖庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370764_comment'></div>为拓跋魏侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370764_comment'></div>封济阴公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370764_comment'></div>曾伯祖奭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370764_comment'></div>为唐宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370764_comment'></div>与褚遂良韩瑗俱得罪武后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370764_comment'></div>死高宗朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370764_comment'></div>皇考讳镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370764_comment'></div>以事母弃太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370764_comment'></div>求为县令江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370764_comment'></div>其后以不能媚权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370764_comment'></div>失御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370764_comment'></div>权贵人死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370764_comment'></div>乃复拜侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370764_comment'></div>号为刚直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370764_comment'></div>所与游皆当世名人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370764_comment'></div>子厚少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370764", 1370764, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>精敏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370764_comment'></div>无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370764", 1370764, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>通达</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370764_comment'></div>逮其父时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370764_comment'></div>虽少年已自成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370764_comment'></div>能取进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370764_comment'></div>崭然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370764", 1370764, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>见头角</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370764_comment'></div>众谓柳氏有子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370764_comment'></div>其后以博学宏词授集贤殿正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370764_comment'></div>俊杰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370764", 1370764, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>廉悍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370764_comment'></div>议论證据今古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370764_comment'></div>出入经史百子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370764_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370764", 1370764, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>踔厉风发</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370764_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370764", 1370764, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>率常</span>屈其座人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370764_comment'></div>名声大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370764_comment'></div>一时皆慕与之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370764_comment'></div>诸公要人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370764_comment'></div>争欲令出我门下。<div id='poem_sentence_34_1370764_comment'></div>贞元十九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370764_comment'></div>由蓝田尉拜监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370764_comment'></div>顺宗即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370764_comment'></div>拜礼部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370764_comment'></div>遇用事者得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370764_comment'></div>例出为刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370764_comment'></div>未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370764_comment'></div>又例贬州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370764_comment'></div>居閒益自刻苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370764_comment'></div>务记览为词章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370764_comment'></div>为深博无涯涘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370764_comment'></div>一自肆于山水閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370764_comment'></div>元和中。<div id='poem_sentence_50_1370764_comment'></div>而子厚得柳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370764_comment'></div>既至叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370764_comment'></div>是岂不足为政耶。<div id='poem_sentence_62_1370764_comment'></div>其尤贫力不能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370764_comment'></div>令书其佣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370764_comment'></div>足相当。<div id='poem_sentence_67_1370764_comment'></div>比一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370764_comment'></div>免而归者且千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370764_comment'></div>衡湘以南为进士者。<div "Clauses/72/Comments/1")'>口讲指画</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370764_comment'></div>为文词者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370764_comment'></div>悉有法度可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370764_comment'></div>其召至京师而复为刺史也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370764_comment'></div>中山刘梦得禹锡亦在遣中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370764_comment'></div>当诣播州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370764_comment'></div>子厚泣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370764_comment'></div>播州非人所居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370764_comment'></div>而梦得亲在堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370764_comment'></div>吾不忍梦得之穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370764_comment'></div>无辞以白其大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370764_comment'></div>且万无母子俱往理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370764_comment'></div>请于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370764_comment'></div>将拜疏愿以柳易播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370764_comment'></div>虽重得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370764_comment'></div>死不恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370764_comment'></div>遇有以梦得事白上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370764_comment'></div>梦得于是改刺连州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370764_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1370764", 1370764, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>呜呼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370859_comment'></div>刺史无治行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370859_comment'></div>无以媚于神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370859_comment'></div>天降之罚。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1370859_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年6月16日</a>　在袁州任刺史。六月，见西北有庆云，作表贺之。作品：贺庆云表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370536' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370536' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370536?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370536'>臣某言。臣所领州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370536_comment'></div>今月十六日申时。有庆云见于西北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370536_comment'></div>至暮方散。臣及举州官吏百姓等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370536_comment'></div>无不见者。五彩五色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370536_comment'></div>光华不可遍观。非烟非云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370536_comment'></div>容状讵能详述。抱日增丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370536_comment'></div>浮空不收。既变化而无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370536_comment'></div>亦卷舒而莫定。斯为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370536", 1370536, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>上瑞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370536_comment'></div>实应太平。臣某诚欢诚喜顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370536_comment'></div>谨按沈约宋书云。庆云五色者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370536_comment'></div>太平之应。又据孝经援神契曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370536_comment'></div>王者德至山陵。则庆云出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370536_comment'></div>故黄帝因之以纪事。虞舜由之而作歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370536_comment'></div>又按季夏六月。土王用事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370536_comment'></div>其日景戌。亦主于土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370536_comment'></div>西北方者。京师所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370536_comment'></div>土为国家之德。祥见京师之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370536_comment'></div>既徵于古。又验于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370536_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下德合覆载。道光轩虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370536_comment'></div>嗣位之初。祯祥继至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370536_comment'></div>升平之符既兆。仁寿之域以跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370536_comment'></div>微臣往在先朝。以论事得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370536_comment'></div>身居贬黜之地。目睹殊常之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370536_comment'></div>抃跃欣幸。实倍常情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370536_comment'></div>伏乞宣付史官。以彰圣德所致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370536_comment'></div>瞻恋阙庭。心魂飞驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370536_comment'></div>无任欣抃踊跃之至。谨差某官奉表陈贺以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370536_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1370536_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年9月</a>　九月，在袁州任刺史。作状文呈江西观察使王仲舒，言公文格式事。作品：袁州申使状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷30。）</span><div id='poem_1370563' class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370563", 1370563, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>公牒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370563_comment'></div>牒尾故牒字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370563_comment'></div>皆为谨牒字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370563_comment'></div>有异于常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370563_comment'></div>初不敢陈论。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1370563_comment'></div>以安下情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370563_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　在袁州任刺史。韩愈侄孙韩滂随迁潮、苑，病殁袁州，韩愈为之作墓志铭。作品：祭滂文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭滂文</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370837")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370837'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370837'>维年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370837_comment'></div>十八翁及十八婆卢氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370837_comment'></div>以清酌庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370837_comment'></div>祭于二十三郎滂之灵曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370837_comment'></div>汝聪明和顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370837_comment'></div>出于辈流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370837_comment'></div>强记好文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370837_comment'></div>又少与比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370837_comment'></div>将谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370837", 1370837, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>成长</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370837_comment'></div>以兴吾宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370837_comment'></div>如何不祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370837_comment'></div>未冠而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370837_comment'></div>吾与卢氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370837_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370837", 1370837, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>痛伤</span>可言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370837_comment'></div>思母之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370837_comment'></div>连呼以绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370837_comment'></div>执兄之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370837_comment'></div>勉以无悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370837_comment'></div>情一何长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370837_comment'></div>命一何短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370837_comment'></div>权葬远地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370837_comment'></div>孤魂无依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370837_comment'></div>沥酒告情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370837_comment'></div>哀何有极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370837_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　在袁州任刺史。韩愈侄孙韩滂随迁潮、苑，病殁袁州，韩愈作祭文哭之。作品：韩滂墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷25。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_2_1370782_comment'></div>号安定桓王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370782_comment'></div>滂父老成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370782_comment'></div>厚谨以文。<div "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>言词</span>为世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370782", 1370782, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>轨式</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370782_comment'></div>其叔祖愈命滂归后其祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370782_comment'></div>滂清明逊悌以敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370782_comment'></div>读书<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370782", 1370782, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>兼人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370782_comment'></div>为文词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370782_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1370782'>天固生之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370782_comment'></div>偶自生耶。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370744'>海于天地间为物最钜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370744_comment'></div>自三代圣王。<div class='inline' "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>南海神</span>次最贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370744_comment'></div>在北东西三神河伯之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370744_comment'></div>号为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>祝融</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370744_comment'></div>天宝中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370744_comment'></div>天子以为古爵莫贵于公侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370744_comment'></div>故海岳之祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370744_comment'></div><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370744_comment'></div>所以致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>崇极</span>于大神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370744_comment'></div>今王亦爵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370744_comment'></div>而礼海岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370744_comment'></div>尚循公侯之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370744_comment'></div>虚王仪而不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370744_comment'></div>非致<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370744_comment'></div>明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370744_comment'></div>吏以风雨白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370744_comment'></div>不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370744_comment'></div>于是州府文武吏士凡百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370744_comment'></div>交谒更谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370744_comment'></div>皆揖而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370744_comment'></div>公遂升舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370744_comment'></div>风雨少弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370744_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>棹夫</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/93/Comments/1")'>奏功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370744_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>云阴</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/94/Comments/1")'>解駮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370744_comment'></div>日光<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>穿漏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370744_comment'></div>波伏不兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370744_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>省牲</span>之夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370744_comment'></div>载旸载阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370744_comment'></div>将事之夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370744_comment'></div>天地<span id='poem_sentence_103_1370744_comment'></div>公乃盛服执笏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370744_comment'></div>以入即事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370744_comment'></div>文武<span id='poem_sentence_116_1370744_comment'></div>阖庙旋舻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370744_comment'></div>祥飙送帆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370744_comment'></div>旗纛<span id='poem_sentence_138_1370744_comment'></div>明年其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370744_comment'></div>公又固往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370744_comment'></div>不懈益虔。<div id='poem_sentence_161_1370744_comment'></div>由是皆自重慎法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370744_comment'></div>人士之落南不能归者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370744_comment'></div>与流徙之冑百廿八族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370744_comment'></div>用其才良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370744_comment'></div>而廪其无告者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370744_comment'></div>其女子可嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370744_comment'></div>与之钱财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370744_comment'></div>令无失时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370744_comment'></div>刑德并流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370744_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_171_1370744", 1370744, "Clauses/171/Comments/0")'>方地</span>数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370744_comment'></div>不识盗贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1370744_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_173_1370744", 1370744, id='poem_sentence_175_1370744_comment'></div>其可谓备至耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1370744_comment'></div>咸愿刻庙石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1370744_comment'></div>以著厥美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1370744_comment'></div>而系以诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1370744_comment'></div>乃作诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1370744_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_181_1370744'>南海之墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1370744_comment'></div><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_183_1370744_comment'></div>帝命南伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1370744_comment'></div>吏隋不躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1370744_comment'></div>正自今公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1370744_comment'></div>明用享锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1370744_comment'></div>右我家邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1370744_comment'></div>惟明天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1370744_comment'></div>惟慎厥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1370744_comment'></div>我公在官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1370744_comment'></div>神人致喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1370744_comment'></div>海岭之陬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1370744_comment'></div>既足既濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1370744_comment'></div>胡不均宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1370744_comment'></div>俾执事枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1370744_comment'></div>公行勿迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1370744_comment'></div>公无遽归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1370744_comment'></div>匪我私公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1370744_comment'></div>神人具依。</div><div id='poem_sentence_200_1370744_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年9月22日</a>　九月二十二日，在袁州任刺史。诏为朝散大夫，守国子祭酒，复赐金紫。然接诏时，约已十月中旬。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年10月</a>　十月上旬，在袁州刺史任上。奉王仲舒之请，为新修滕王阁作记。作品：新修滕王阁记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷3。）</span><div id='poem_1370680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新修滕王阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370680")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370680_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370680'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370680'>愈少时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370680_comment'></div>则闻江南多临观之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370680_comment'></div>而滕王阁独为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370680_comment'></div>有瑰伟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>绝特</span>之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370680_comment'></div>及得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>三王</span>所为序赋记等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370680_comment'></div>壮其文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370680_comment'></div>益欲往一观而读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370680_comment'></div>以忘吾忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370680_comment'></div>系官于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370680_comment'></div>愿莫之遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370680_comment'></div>十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370680_comment'></div>以言事斥守揭阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370680_comment'></div>便道取疾以至海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370680_comment'></div>又不得过南昌而观所谓滕王阁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370680_comment'></div>其冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370680_comment'></div>以天子进大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370680_comment'></div>加恩区内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370680_comment'></div>移刺袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370680_comment'></div>袁于南昌为属邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370680_comment'></div>私喜幸自语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370680_comment'></div>以为当得躬诣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>大府</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370680_comment'></div>受约束于下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370680_comment'></div>及其无事且还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370680_comment'></div>倘得一至其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370680_comment'></div>窃寄目偿所愿焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370680_comment'></div>至州之七月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370680_comment'></div>诏以中书舍人太原王公为御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370680_comment'></div>观察江南西道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370680_comment'></div>洪江饶虔吉信抚袁悉属治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370680_comment'></div>八州之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370680_comment'></div>前所不便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370680_comment'></div>及所愿欲而不得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370680_comment'></div>公至之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370680_comment'></div>皆罢行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370680_comment'></div>大者驿闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370680_comment'></div>小者立变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370680_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>春生</span>秋杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370680_comment'></div>阳开阴闭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370680_comment'></div>令修于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>庭户</span>数日之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370680_comment'></div>而人自得于湖山千里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370680_comment'></div>吾虽欲出意见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370680_comment'></div>论利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370680_comment'></div>听命于幕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370680_comment'></div>而吾州乃无一事可假而行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370680_comment'></div>又安得舍己所事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370680_comment'></div>以勤馆人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370680_comment'></div>则滕王阁又无因而至焉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370680_comment'></div>其岁九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370680_comment'></div>人吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>浃和</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370680_comment'></div>公与监军使燕于此阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370680_comment'></div>文武宾士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370680_comment'></div>皆与在席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370680_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>酒半</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370680_comment'></div>合辞言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370680_comment'></div>此屋不修且坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370680_comment'></div>前公为从事此邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370680_comment'></div>适理新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370680_comment'></div>公所为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370680_comment'></div>实书在壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370680_comment'></div>今三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370680_comment'></div>而公来为邦伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370680_comment'></div>适及期月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370680_comment'></div>公又来燕于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370680_comment'></div>公乌得无情哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370680_comment'></div>公应曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370680_comment'></div>于是栋楹梁桷板槛之腐黑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>挠折</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370680_comment'></div>盖瓦级砖之破缺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370680_comment'></div>赤白之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>漫漶</span>不鲜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370680_comment'></div>治之则已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370680_comment'></div>无侈前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370680_comment'></div>无废后观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370680_comment'></div>工既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>讫功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370680_comment'></div>公以众饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370680_comment'></div>而以书命愈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370680_comment'></div>子其为我记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370680_comment'></div>愈既以未得造观为叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370680_comment'></div>窃喜载名其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370680_comment'></div>词列<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>三王</span>之次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370680_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370680", 1370680, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>荣耀</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370680_comment'></div>乃不辞而承公命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370680_comment'></div>其江山之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370680_comment'></div>登望之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370680_comment'></div>虽老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370680_comment'></div>如获从公游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370680_comment'></div>尚能为公赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370680_comment'></div>元和十五年十月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370680_comment'></div>袁州刺史韩愈记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1370680_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年10月</a>　十月中下旬，已收到朝廷国子祭酒之任命，但尚未离袁州，作祭湘君夫人文，并派人祭之、修缮庙宇。作品：祭湘君夫人文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷13。）</span><div id='poem_1370826' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370826' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370826?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭湘君夫人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370826")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370826_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370826'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370826'>维元和十五年岁次庚子十月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370826_comment'></div>朝散大夫守国子祭酒护军赐紫金鱼袋韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370826_comment'></div>谨使前袁州军事判官张得一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370826_comment'></div>以清酌之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370826_comment'></div>敢昭告于湘君湘夫人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370826", 1370826, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>二妃</span>之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370826_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370826", 1370826, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>前岁</span>之春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370826_comment'></div>愈以罪犯黜守潮州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370826_comment'></div>惧以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370826", 1370826, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>谴死</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370826_comment'></div>且虞海山之波雾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370826", 1370826, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>瘴毒</span>为灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370826_comment'></div>以殒其命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370826_comment'></div>舟次祠下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370826_comment'></div>是用有祷于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370826_comment'></div>神享其衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370826_comment'></div>赐以<span id='poem_sentence_14_1370826_comment'></div>蒙神之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370826_comment'></div>启帝之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370826_comment'></div>去潮即袁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370826_comment'></div>今又获位于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370826_comment'></div>服其章绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370826_comment'></div>退思往昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370826_comment'></div>实发梦寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370826_comment'></div>凡卅年。<div
