id='poem_sentence_24_1370826_comment'></div>敢忘神之大庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370826_comment'></div>伏以祠宇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370826", 1370826, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>毁顿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370826_comment'></div>凭附之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370826_comment'></div>丹青之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370826_comment'></div>不称<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370826", 1370826, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>灵明</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370826_comment'></div>万世不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370826_comment'></div>惟神其鉴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370826_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370826_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年10月</a>　十月，在袁州刺史任上，收到国子祭酒之诏令，按惯例，需上表状举别人代己任职。韩愈举张惟素代己。作品：举张惟素自代状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", id='poem_title_1370555_0'>① 中散大夫守左散骑常侍上柱国赐紫金鱼袋张惟素</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370555'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370555'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370555_comment'></div>伏准建中元年正月五日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370555_comment'></div>常参官上后三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370555_comment'></div>举一人自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370555_comment'></div>前件官文学治行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370555_comment'></div>众所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370555", 1370555, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>推与</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370555_comment'></div>累历中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370555_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370555", 1370555, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>资序</span>已深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370555_comment'></div>和而不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370555_comment'></div>静而有守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370555_comment'></div>敦厚退让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370555_comment'></div>可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370555", 1370555, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>训人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370555_comment'></div>臣所不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370555_comment'></div>辄举自代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370555_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1370555_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　在袁州刺史任上。受请为处州孔子庙作碑文。作品：处州孔子庙碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷21。）</span><div id='poem_1370745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处州孔子庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_1370745")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370745'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370745'>自天子至郡邑守长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370745_comment'></div>通得祀而遍天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370745_comment'></div>唯社稷与孔子焉<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作为）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370745_comment'></div>然而社祭土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370745_comment'></div>稷祭谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370745_comment'></div>句龙与弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370745_comment'></div>乃其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>佐享</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370745_comment'></div>非其专主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370745_comment'></div>又其位所不屋而坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370745_comment'></div>岂如孔子用王者礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370745_comment'></div>巍然当座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370745_comment'></div>以门人为配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370745_comment'></div>自天子而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370745_comment'></div>北面跪祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370745_comment'></div>进退诚敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370745_comment'></div>礼如亲弟子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370745_comment'></div>句龙弃以功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370745_comment'></div>孔子以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370745_comment'></div>固自有次第哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370745_comment'></div>自古多有以功德得其位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370745_comment'></div>不得常祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370745_comment'></div>句龙弃孔子皆不得位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370745_comment'></div>而得常祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370745_comment'></div>然其祀事皆不如孔子之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370745_comment'></div>所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>生人</span>以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370745_comment'></div>未有如孔子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370745_comment'></div>其贤过于尧舜远者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370745_comment'></div>此其效欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370745_comment'></div>郡邑皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>孔子庙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370745_comment'></div>或不能修事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370745_comment'></div>虽设博士弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370745_comment'></div>或役于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370745_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>名存实亡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370745_comment'></div>失其所业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370745_comment'></div>独处州刺史邺侯李繁至官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370745_comment'></div>能以为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370745_comment'></div>既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>新作</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>孔子庙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370745_comment'></div>又令工改为颜子至子夏十人像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370745_comment'></div>其馀六十二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370745_comment'></div>及后大儒公羊高左邱明孟轲荀况伏生毛公韩生董生高堂生扬雄郑元等数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370745_comment'></div>皆图之壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370745_comment'></div>选博士弟子必皆其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370745_comment'></div>又为置讲堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370745_comment'></div>教之行礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370745_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>肄习</span>其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370745_comment'></div>置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>本钱</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>廪米</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370745_comment'></div>令可继处以守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370745_comment'></div>庙成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370745_comment'></div>躬率吏及博士弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370745_comment'></div>入学行释菜礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370745_comment'></div>耆老叹嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370745_comment'></div>其子弟皆兴于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370745_comment'></div>邺侯尚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370745_comment'></div>其于古记无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370745", 1370745, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>贯达</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370745_comment'></div>故其为政知所先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370745_comment'></div>可歌也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370745_comment'></div>乃作诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370745_comment'></div>惟此庙学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370745_comment'></div>邺侯所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370745_comment'></div>厥初庳下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370745_comment'></div>神不以宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370745_comment'></div>先师所处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370745_comment'></div>亦窘寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370745_comment'></div>乃新斯宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370745_comment'></div>神降其献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370745_comment'></div>讲读有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370745_comment'></div>不诫用劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370745_comment'></div>揭揭元哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370745_comment'></div>有师之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370745_comment'></div>群圣严严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370745_comment'></div>大法以存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370745_comment'></div>像图孔肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370745_comment'></div>咸在斯堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370745_comment'></div>以瞻以仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370745_comment'></div>俾不或忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370745_comment'></div>后之君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370745_comment'></div>无废成美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370745_comment'></div>琢词碑石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370745_comment'></div>以赞攸始。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1370745_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年10月</a>　十月，在袁州刺史任上。离任袁州刺史前，举漳州刺史韩泰代己为袁州刺史。作品：举韩泰自代状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘真伦、岳珍《韩愈文集汇校笺注》卷29。）</span><div id='poem_1370556' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370556' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370556?labeling=true' target='_blank'>举韩泰自代状<span id='poem_sentence_1_1370556_comment'></div>常参官及刺史授上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370556_comment'></div>三日内举一人自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370556_comment'></div>前件官词学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370556", 1370556, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>优长</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370556_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370556", 1370556, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>才器</span>端实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370556_comment'></div>早登科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370556_comment'></div>亦更台省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370556_comment'></div>往因过犯贬黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370556_comment'></div>至今十五馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370556_comment'></div>自领漳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370556_comment'></div>悉心为治。<div class='inline' "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>安宁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370556_comment'></div>并得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370556_comment'></div>臣在潮州之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370556_comment'></div>与其州界相接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370556_comment'></div>臣之政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370556_comment'></div>远所不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370556_comment'></div>乞以代臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370556_comment'></div>庶为允当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370556_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1370556_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年10月</a>　十月底，离开袁州，返回京师长安。<br /></div>

南昌（豫章）

安陆
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e7d32b6a2b9b4232aa4eae85361dda9c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e7d32b6a2b9b4232aa4eae85361dda9c");'><span id='e7d32b6a2b9b4232aa4eae85361dda9c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>，53岁</div><div id='e7d32b6a2b9b4232aa4eae85361dda9c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年11月</a>　冬，自袁州召返长安，途经安陆，先以诗寄随州刺史周君巢。作品：自袁州还京行次安陆先寄随州周员外。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49492?labeling=true' target='_blank'>自袁州还京行次安陆先寄随州周员外<span class='inlineComment2'>（周君巢也，时为随州刺史。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49492")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_49492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49492'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49492'>行行指汉东，暂喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_49492", 49492, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>笑言</span>同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49492'>雨雪离江上，蒹葭出梦中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49492'>面犹含<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_49492", 49492, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>瘴色</span>，眼已见华风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_49492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_49492'>岁暮难相值，酣歌未可终。<div id='poem_sentence_3_49492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_49492'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_49492_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

随州（隋县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='10cff227f1154d228e821345e2f1c4b9_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("10cff227f1154d228e821345e2f1c4b9");'><span id='10cff227f1154d228e821345e2f1c4b9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>，53岁</div><div id='10cff227f1154d228e821345e2f1c4b9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年11月</a>　冬，自袁州召返长安，行经随州，有诗寄赠周君巢。作品：寄随州周员外。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49432' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49432' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49432?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄随州周员外</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(21679, "中唐", "韩愈", "poem_title_49432")'>韩愈</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_49432_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_49432'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49432'>陆孟丘杨久作尘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，同时存者更谁人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49432_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_49432'>金丹别后知传得，乞取刀圭救病身<span class='inlineComment2'>（周好金丹服饵之术）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_49432_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_49432'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_49432_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_49432'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_49432_0'>⑴ 愈与陆长源、孟叔度、丘颖、杨凝及君巢，同为董晋幕客</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_49432_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

襄阳

-----title
商州（上洛）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c3805327b000408892d94a0ea10a6f78_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c3805327b000408892d94a0ea10a6f78");'><span id='c3805327b000408892d94a0ea10a6f78_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年11月</a>　冬，返长安途经商州层峰驿。去年韩愈贬潮，幼女拿于贬途中惊病交加，去世于层峰驿并葬于此。今返途哭之，题诗驿梁。作品：去岁自刑部侍郎以罪贬潮州刺史乘驿赴任其后家亦谴逐小女道死殡之层峰驿旁山下蒙恩还朝过其墓留题驿梁。<span class='inlineComment2'>（钱仲联《韩昌黎诗系年集释》卷12。）</span><div id='poem_49483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_49483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/49483?labeling=true' id='poem_content_49483'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_49483'>数条藤束木皮棺，草殡荒山白骨寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_49483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
